NGUNA-TONGOA, NEW HEBRIDES
LONDON
BRITISH AND FOREIGN BIBLE SOCIETY
146 QUEEN VICTORIA STREET




THE
NEW TESTAMENT
OUR LORD AND SAVIOUR
JESUS CUEIST
TRANSLATED OUT OF THE GREEK
INTO THE LANGUAGE OF
NGUNA-TONGOA, NEW HEBRIDES

TUSI NI NAROGOEOGOANA WIA
MATAIO.
Matele 1.
1 Tusi ni navakilinaana ki Yesu
Kristo, natu ni David, natu ni
Abraham.
2 Abrabam e pesi Isaak; go
Isaak e pesi Yakob; go Yakob e
3 pesi Yudab go taina maga; go
Yudab e pesi Perez go Zerab ki
Tamar ; go Perez e pesi Hezron :
4go Hezron e pesi Ram; go Ram e
pesi Amminadab ; go Amminadab e
pesi Nabsbon ; go Nahsbon e pesi
Salmon; go Salmon e pesi Boaz
ski Rahab ; go Boaz e pesi Obed
ki Rutb; go Obed e pesi Yesse ;
6go Yesse e pesi David nawota.
Go David e pesi Solomon ki
Uriah anagoroi; go Solomon e pesi
7 Reboboam ; go Reboboam e pesi
Abiyab; go Abiyab e pesi Asa ;
Bgo Asa e pesi Yebosbafat; go
Yeboshafat e pesi Yoram; go
9 Yoram e pesi Uzziah; go Uzziah
e pesi Yotbam; go Yotbam e pesi
Abaz ; go Ahaz e pesi Hezekiab ;
10 go Hezekiab e pesi Manasseb; go
Manasseh e pesi Amon; go Amon
lie pesi Yosiab; go Yosiab e pesi
Yekoniah go taina maga, ragi ni
naviragiluaana paki Babelon.
12 Go ragi edaku ki naviragiluaana
paki Babelon, Yekoniah e pesi
Sbealtiel; go Shealtiel e pesi
13 Zerubbabel; go Zerubbabel e pesi
Abiud ; go Abiud e pesi Eliakim ;
14 go Eliakim e pesi Azor; go Azor
e pesi Sadok; go Sadok e pesi
Akim ; go Akim e pesi Blind ; go 15
Blind e pesi Eleazar; go Eleazar
e pesi Matthan; go Mattban e pesi
Yakob; go Yakob e pesi Yosef 16
Maria anawota, go Maria* Yesu e
pakilina mein asa, waina e pei tea
sosoana ki Kristo. •
Dapala nogoe tagona maga ma- 17
man puti pae Abraham pa pa paki
David eu pei tagona rualima sikai
tamate pati; go pae David pa pa
paid naviragiluaana paki Babelon
tagona rualima sikai tamate pati;
go pae naviragiluaana paki Babelon
pa pa paki Kristo tagona rualima
sikai tamate pati.
Go navakilinaana ki Yesu 18
Kristo e dapala waia ; Ragi waina
pilana Maria e magi Yosef pei, tea
vasasokiana sua, ragi waina ero ko
da saisai mau e pei tea vapaiana e
magi Naatana Tapu diena. Go 19
anawota Yosef, waina e pei tea
leana sikai, po da masauna mau
naga ega mari a ega vei tea vasa-
potaeana lina, e midoa ki nia naga
ega tipakilua panako e. Ma ragi 20
waina e do midoa ki tea maga
wanogoe, kuga leo, agelo sikai ki
Yehovah e pakilina ki nia naperea
sikai, po naga, Yosef, natu ni
David, pa ta mataku piragi Maria
amagoroi mau : nalakena tea waina
e diena ki nia e pei tea ni Na
atana Tapu. Go ega wo pisola ki 21
natuna naanoai sikai; go pa wo


salagisana ki YESU; nalakena
nae ega wo mauti pauri narei
aneana melu dua ki namarinaleo-
22 saana adeada maga. Go tea ma-
mau wanogoe e pakilina, naga tea
waina Yehovah e noa e pae perofeta
ega lolomana, e naga,
23 Kuga leo, nagoroi atara ega wo
diena, go ega wo pisola ki
natuna naanoai sikai,
Go euga wo soso nagisana ki
Emmanuel;
waina e pei tea vasadoaana e pei
24 Supe sikoti gida. Go Yosef e
duleana meludua ki namaturuana
aneana, po mari dapala waina agelo
ki Yehovah e dipa ki nia asa, po
25 piragi anagoroi; go eda atae a
man pa pa e pisola ki sua natuna
• naanoai sikai : go e salagisana ki
YESU.
Matele 2.
1 Go ragi waina Yesu e pakilina
Bethlehem ni Yudea naaleatia maga
ki Herod nawota, kuga leo, macoi
seara eu pae ist umai paki Yeru-
-2 salem, eu naga, Tea waina e po
pakilina Nawota ki naka ni Yudea
wai ? nalakena au punusi masoe
kakana ist, go au po umai naga auga
3 lotu ki nia. Go ragi waina Herod
nawota e dogo tea wanogoe, e
manaunau asa, go Yerusalem ma-
-4 mau eu sikoti a asa. Go e saisai ki
puti tea viri warua maga go tea
midiri maga ni narei, po pusuusu
paki da ki tokora waina Kristo ega
5 vakilina asa. Go eu noa ki nia,
eu naga, Bethlehem ni Yudea :
nalakena e pei tea midiriana pae
perofeta dapala waia,
6 Go nigo Bethlehem, navanua ki
Yudah,
Ku da pei tea kiki sa ni tea
maraki maga ki Yudah mau:
Nalakena tea maramara sikai ega
wo melu ako umai,
Waina ega wo leo parati ki pakale
narei aginau Israel.
Ragi wanogoe Herod e soso panako 7
macoi maga, po pusuusu ki parati
ki nia paki da ki ragi ni masoe
waina e pakilina. Go e dipakilua 8
ra paki Bethlehem, po naga, Kuga
vano po pusuusu ki parati ki nia
nalo ni piakiki vusavusa wanogoe ;
go ragi waina kuga vapai a, kuga
i moro umai po noakisai au asa,
naga kinau ma aga valoti po lotu
ki nia. Go nara, ragi waina eu 9
dogo sua navasaana ki nawota, eu
surata pano ; go kuga leo, masoe,
waina eu punusi a ist, e pea ki da,
pa pa e umai po lawodu elagi ki
tokora waina piakiki vusavusa e
doko asa. Go ragi waina eu pu- 10
nusi masoe, eu laelaea ki nalae-
laeaana warua liu. Go eu rumai 11
paki ekopu ni nasuma po punusi
piakiki vusavusa go pilana Maria;
go eu do wo. pakitano po lotu ki
nia ; go eu polagati bokes adeada
maga po dua e navituaana maga,
cold go libano go murra. Go 12
nalakena eu pei tea vasakorokoro-
ana pae naperea sikai naga euga
ta liliu pa punusi Herod mau,
eu pae napua pota sikai po melu
paki navanua adeada pano.
Go ragi waina nara eu melu pano 13
sua, kuga leo, agelo sikai ki Yehovah
e pakilina ki Yosef naperea sikai,
po naga, Pa tuleana po piragilua
piakiki vusavusa go pilana, go pa
sava paki Ityipt pano, go pa toko
asa doko pa pa aga wo noa ki-go :
nalakena Herod ega we laga piakiki
vusavusa naga ega maripunue a.
Go e duleana po piragilua piakiki 14
vusavusa go pilana pogi, po melu
paki Ityipt pano; po doko asa
doko pa pa Herod e mate; naga 15
tea waina Yehovah e noa e pae
perofeta ega lolomana, e naga, A
soso natugu e inelu dua ki Ityipt
umai. Ragi wanogoe Herod, waina 16


e punusi naga macoi maga eu mi-
doakiparo ki nia, e maeto parua,
po dipakilua, po maripunue puti
piakiki naanoai maga waina eu
doko Bethlehem, go waina eu doko
nadigi kakana maga mamau puti,
waina eu da liu natau dua mau,
dapala ragi waina e pusuusu ki
parati ki nia paki macoi maga.
17 Ragi wanogoe tea waina e pei tea
noaana pae perofeta Yeremiah e
lolomana, e naga,
18 Nadaleo sikai e pei tea rogoana
Ramah,
Natagiana go nalalagaarovaana
warua,
Rahel e do dagisi natuna maga ;
Go e da masauna mau naga ega
vei tea vasapakavakaleana, na
lakena eu da doko mau.
19 Ma ragi waina Herod e mate,
kuga leo, agelo sikai ki Yehovah e
pakilina ki Yosef naperea sikai
20 Ityipt, e naga, Pa tuleana po piragi-
lua piakiki vusavusa go pilana, go
pa vaki navanua ki Israel pano :
nalakena tea maga waina eu laga
namauriana ki piakiki vusavusa
21 eu mate. Go e duleana po piragi-
lua piakiki vusavusa go pilana,
po umai paki navanua ki Israel.
22 Ma ragi waina e dogo naga Arkelao
e do maramara dapau Yudea po du
oli tamana Herod, e mataku paki
asa ; go nalakena e pei tea vasa-
korokoroana pae naperea sikai, e
melu paki tokora maga ni Calilea
23 pano, po umai doko natokoana
sikai waina e pei tea sosoana ki
Nazareth: naga tea waina e pei
tea noaana pae perofeta maga ega
lolomana, naga ega vei tea sosoana
ki naataiholi sikai ni Nazareth.
Matele 3.
1 Go naaleatia maga wanogoe Yoane
tea Bapetizo e umai, po do dogo-
-2 rogo masopalo ni Yudea, e naga,
Kuga midoakidoa; nalakena na
marakiana ni nakoroatelagi maga
e pei maladigi. Nalakena nae 3
wanogoe e pei tea waina e pei
tea noaana pae perofeta Isaiah, e
naga,
Nadaleo ni tea waina e do pioso
masopalo,
Kuga marifnata ki napua ki
Yehovah,
Kuga mari napua tuniana aneana
maga euga leana.
Go Yoane nae e suni sugoro aneana 4
ni nafnau ni kamel, go e dasoki
namalona ki tasoki sikai ni nawili;
go navinaga aneana e pei midiri
maga go honi mila. Ragi wanogoe 5
Yerusalem, go Yudea mamau, go
navanua mamau waina e doko
pisari Yordan eu dave pano punusi
a; goebapetizoranoaisaraYordan, 6
eu noasai namarinaleosaana adeada
maga. Ma ragi waina e punusi 7
Farisi maga go Sadduki maga tea
lapa kakada eu pa raki nabapeti-
zoana aneana umai, e noa ki da,
e naga, Maata sa natuda maga, sei
e noakisai mu naga kuga savadua
ki namaetoana waina ega wo umai ?
Nalakena tea wanogoe kuga tau ki 8
nawamu waina e pia ki namidoa-
kidoaana : go kuga ta midoa ki 9
nia noa napalaumu, Abraham e
pei tamagami: nalakena a noa ki
mu, naga Supe e mariatae magi
Abraham mari natuna maga euga
vakilina melu vatu maga waia eu
one. Go ragi waia tagoto e pei 10
tea toropusiana e one pisari nalake
ni nakau maga one : nalakena tea
wanoge sara nakau waina eu da
dau ki nawada wia mau eu do pei
tea taeana eu dowo, po pei tea
nadikiana paki nakapu. Kinau all
bapetizo mu lomou ki noai paki
namidoakidoaana : ma tea waina
e edakugoro au umai e kasua liu
au, a da pia mau naga aga maneana
dapetape nafhelevasiana aneana


maga: nae ega wo bapetizo mu ki
12 Naatana Tapu go ki nakapu ; tea
silaki aneana e doko namelearuna.
go ega wo mari malo wokalesue
aneana ega tautau puti; go ega
wo saisai ki whit aneana paki ekopu
ni nasufna ni whit, ma ega wo da-
para ki napolagana ki nakapu
waina e pe ta pei tea maripunueana
mau.
13 Ragi wanogoe Yesu e pae Calilea
umai paki Yordan punusi Yoane,
14 naga Yoane ega bapetizo e. Ma
Yoane e do dipagoro e asa, po
naga, Nigo ku pe bapetizo au a pe
wia, go nigo ku umai punusi au
15 kite ? Ma Yesu e jmsadara po
noa ki nia, e naga, Pa ko suasua
asa ragi waia: nalakena e pia
naga nigida toroga mari sara na
marinaleoleanaana ega tapala nogoe.
Ragi wanogoe e suasua ki nia asa.
16 Go Yesu, ragi waina e pei tea bape-
tizoana sua, e pae noai sake pano
maraverave : go kuga leo, nakoro-
atelagi maga eu maneana pama-
wota, go e punusi Naata ni Supe
e do siwo dakiusi tokopea sikai,
17 po do umai lawo e ; go kuga leo,
nadaleo sikai e dave nakoroatelagi
maga umai, po naga, Tea waia e pei
Natugu tea dodomiana aginau,
waina a midoa ki rnata ki nia.
Matele 4.
1 Ragi wanogoe Yesu e pei tea viragi-
ana sake pae Naatana paki maso
palo pano naga ega vei tea maridogo-
-2 ana pae diabolo. Go ragi waina
e pali sua naaleatia rualima pati go
napogiana rualima pati, e edaku
3 pitolo. Go tea maridogo e umai
po noa ki nia, e naga, Ku pe vei
Supe Natuna, pa vitipaki naga
vatu maga waia eu one euga vei
4 bred maga. Ma e pasadara po naga,
E pei tea midiriana, e naga, Naata-
fnoli ega wo da mauri pae bred
sikina mau, ma ega wo mauri pae
sara navasaana waina eu do dave
pae nawoka ni Supe umai. Ragi 5
wanogoe diabolo e piragilua e paki
natokoana tapu; go elawo ki nia
e lawodu tea varau pakilagi ni- nasu-
fna tapu, po noa ki nia, e naga, Ku 6
pe vei Supe Natuna, pa tumama
nadi ki-go pakitano : nalakena e pei
tea midiriana, e naga,
Ega wo dipa ki agelo aneana
maga nalo kakama :
Go euga wo dapetape ko doko
namelearuda maga,
Naga pa ta dapilagona te vatu
sikai mau.
Yesu e noa ki nia, e naga, E moro 7
pei tea midiriana, e naga, Pa ta
maridogo Yehovah Supe anigo mau.
Diabolo e moro piragilua e paki 8
tava sikai waina e pakilagi liu, po
pisei ki nia namarakiana maga
mamau puti ni maramana, go na
samasamaana kakada: go e noa 9
ki nia, e naga, Tea maga mamau
puti waina, ku pe rowo pakitano
po lotu ki nau, a pe wo dua puti ko
ara. Ragi wanogoe Yesu e noa ki 10
nia, e naga, Pa vano, Satan : nala-
kena e pei tea midiriana, e naga, Pa
lotu ki Yehovah Supe anigo, go pa
maneana suasua ega sikina. Ragi 11
wanogoe diabolo e doropusi a e
madoko ; go kuga leo, agelo maga
eu rumai po maneana suasua hi
navinaga.
Go ragi waina e dogo naga Yoane 12
e pei tea vituakiana, e fnelu paki
Calilea pano ; go e doropusi Naza- 13
teth e madoko, po umai doko Ka-
pernaum doko, natokoana ni elau,
nadigi ni navanua ki Zebulon go
ki Naftali: naga tea waina e pei 14
tea noaana pae perofeta Isaiah ega
lolomana, e naga,
Navanua ki Zebulon go navanua 15
ki Naftali,
Napua ni elau, taleva kerua ni
Yordan,


Calilea ni nalauna pota maga,
16 Narei waina eu doko namaligo
Eu punusi na'marama warua
sikai,
Go magi tea maga waina eu doko
malo go melu ni namateana
doko,
Namarama e madeada pakilina.
17 Ragi wanogoe Yesu e pae asa
dogorogo, po naga, Kuga midoa
kidoa; nalakena namarakiana ni
nakoroatelagi maga e pei maladigi.
18 Go e surata pae elau ni natasi ni
Calilea, po punusi tamataida dua,
Simon waina e pei tea sosoana ki
Petero, go taina Anderea, ero do
siva ki kupena sikai paki natasi;
19 nalakena ero pei tea ara ika. Go
e noa ki da, e naga, Koroga rausi au,
go aga wo mari mu koroga wo pei
tea ara ika ki naatamoli maga.
20 Go ero maraverave doropusi kupena
adeada maga eu madoko, po dausi
21 a. Go e moro surata melu dua ki
tokora wanogoe pano po punusi
tamataida dua pota, Yakobo natu
ni Zebedaio, go taina Yoane, ero
doko rarua sikotitamada Zebedaio,
eu do oliloli kupena adeada maga;
22 go e soso ra. Go ero maraverave
doropusi rarua go tamada ero
madoko, po dausi a.
23 Go Yesu e surata papule Calilea
mamau, po do pasapisei ki da ekopu
ni nasuina ni nasaisaiana adeada
maga, po do dogorogo ki narogo-
rogoana wia ni namarakiana, po do
marilua sara nasasanaana go sara
namanainaiana maleoputo ni narei.
24 Go narogorogoana kakana e soka-
pule Siria mamau: go eu piragi
umai punusi a tea maga mamau puti
waina eu dogokitesa, wSina eu sua
nasasanaana go navitinuana visara-
sara, tea maga waina eu pei dimon,
go tea maga waina eu doropa, go
tea maga waina eu sarumate, go e
25 maripauri ra. Go taua warua maga
ni naatamoli maga eu dausi a, eu
pae Calilea go Dekapolis go Yeru-
salem go Yudea go taleva kerua ni
Yordan umai.
Matele 5.
Go e punusi taua maga ni na 1
atamoli maga wanogoe, po sake
paki tava sikai; go ragi waina
e dasake sua, tea vasapiseikiana
aneana maga eu rumai punusi a;
go e polagati nawokana po pasa 2
pisei ki da, e naga,
Tea maga waina eu pei tea tika 3
pae naatada eu maropa : nalakena
namarakiana ni nakoroatelagi maga
e pei tea adeada.
Tea maga waina eu do susue eu 4
maropa : nalakena nara euga wo
pei tea vasapakavakaleana.
Tea maga waina eu matemate eu 5
maropa : nalakena nara euga wo
peani navanua.
Tea maga waina eu do pitolo 6
po do madou ki namarinaleoleana-
ana eu maropa: nalakena nara
euga wo puka.
Tea maga waina eu do dodomi 7
eu maropa: nalakena nara euga
wo pei tea dodomiana.
Tea maga waina eu dautau pae 8
napopoda eu maropa: nalakena
nara euga wo punusi Supe.
Tea maga waina eu do atukoro- 9
koro eu maropa; nalakena nara
euga wo pei tea sosoana ki Supe
natuna maga.
Tea maga waina eu pei tea kopa- 10
leleana nalakena namarinaleoleana-
ana eu maropa : nalakena nama-
rakiana ni nakoroatelagi maga e
pei tea adeada. Ku maropa ragi 11
waina euga wo pasapinoa ki mu,
po kopalele mu, po noa sorosoro
sara namarinaleosaana dipa mu,
nalakena kinau. Kuga laelaea, po 12
sokamidi; nalakena namoriana ani-
mu e parua nakoroatelagi maga:


nalakena eu kopalele perofeta maga
waina eu pea ki mu e dapala nogoe.
13 Nimu ku pei natasimena ni
natano; ma nagagadiana ni na
tasimena e pe melu, eu pe wo mari
a ega wo moro gagadi ega tapale
sava ? eda moro pia kite na
vatuna mau, ma naga ega vei tea
sapurakiana paki katama go naga
ega vei tea vasiana ki nainele ni
14 naatamoli maga. Nimu ku pei na
marama ni maramana. Natokoana
waina e doko tava e pe ta sili mau.
15 Go eu da dokoni nasulu, po doro-
pusi a nawoka ni lasa totowo waina
e dapolo siwo doko mau; ma eu
dokoni a po lawo ki nia naliana ; go
e do magi tea maga mamau puti
waina eu doko ekopu ni nasuina
16 maramalaga. Namarama animu
ega to maramalaga narae ni naata-
moli maga ega tapala nogoe, naga
euga vunusi namariana wia animu
maga, po samasamani Tamamu
waina e doko nakoroatelagi maga
doko.
17 Kuga ta midoa ki nia mau naga
a umai naga aga tapera ki nawo-
taeana kite perofeta maga : a da
umai naga aga tapera mau, ma a
18 umai naga aga vakavuro. Nala-
kena lomau a noa ki mu, a naga,
Pa pa nakoroatelagi go maramana
eroga wo pano puoli, iota sikai kite
namatapago sikai ni letter sikai ega
wo da pano puoli ki nawotaeana
mau, pa pa naleo maga mamau
puti euga wo pei tea mariana sua.
19 Nalakena tea wanogoe naata wai-
na e pe wo peresi tea kiki sa
sikai ni natipakiana kiki maga
wanogoe, go waina e pe wo pasa
pisei ki naatamoli maga dapala
nogoe, e pe wo pei tea sosoana ki
tea kiki sa namarakiana ni nakoro-
atelagi maga : ma naata waina e
pe wo mari ra po pasapiseiki ara,
nae e pe wo pei tea sosoana ki tea
warua namarakiana ni nakoroatelagi
maga. Nalakena a noa ki mu, 20
naga namarinaleoleanaana animu
e pe ta parua liu namarinaleoleana-
ana ki tea midiri maga go Farisi
maga man, ku pe wo da sili paki
namarakiana ni nakoroatelagi maga
mau.
Ku dogo naga e pei tea noaana 21
paki naatamoli maga ni tuai.
Pa ta maripunue mau ; go naata
waina e pe wo maripunue e pe wo
pei tea waina ega vei tea vasa-
potaeana : ma kinau a noa ki mu, 22
naga sara naata waina eu maeto
palo ki taida euga wo pei tea waina
euga vei tea vasapotaeana; go
naata waina e pe wo noa ki taina,
Ku pei tea palo, e pe wo pei tea
waina ega vei tea vasapotaeana
nasaisaiana ki tea vusumaki maga ;
go naata waina e pe wo naga,
Ku pei napau, e pe wo pei tea
waina ega vaki napaloa ni nakapu.
Nalakena tea wanogoe ku pe tape 23
navituaana anigo paki wede ni
naviriana, po midoa ki nia tokora
wanogoe naga taifna e peani te na
vatuna dipa ko, pa toropusi navi- 24
tuaana anigo tokora wanogoe narae
ni wede ni naviriana, go pa vano,
pa vea pei popo wia paki taima,
go ragi wanogoe pa umai po pitua
ki navituaana anigo. Napopoma 25
ega wia paki tea vasadipa ko
ega maraverave, ragi waina ku
sikoti a doko napua; mase tea
vasadipa e pe vitua ki-go paki tea
vasapotae, go tea vasapotae e pe
vitua ki-go paki tasiga, go ku pe
vei tea nadikiana paki ekopu ni
nasuina ni navavaiana. Lomau a 26
noa ki-go, Pa wo da dave tokora
wanogoe umai mau pa pa pa wo
lagati pitufki farthing edaku.
Ku dogo naga e pei tea noaana, 27
Pa ta maripele mau : ma kinau 28
a noa ki mu, naga sara naata
waina eu leopunusi nagoroi sikai
naga euga masausau paki nia eu


po maripele sua asa napopoda.
29 Go namatama ni matua e pe mari
ko ku pe tapilagona, pa vakulua e,
po nadi ki nia ega inelu dua ki-go
pano : nalakena e pia ki-go naga
naleo kakama sikai ega vuoli, go
naga napatokoma mamau ega ta pei
tea nadikiana paki pokasi mau.
30 Go namelearuma ni matua e pe
mari ko ku pe tapilagona, pa ta-
kotovi a, po nadi ki nia ega fnelu
dua ki-go pano: nalakena e pia
ki-go naga naleo kakama sikai ega
vuoli, go naga napatokoma mamau
ega ta paki pokasi pano mau.
31 Go e .pei tea noaana, naga
Naata waina e pe wo dipakilua
anagoroi ega tua e namidiriana
32 sikai ni natoropusiana : ma kinau
a noa ki mu, naga sara naata waina
eu dipakilua nagoroi adeada, na
maripeleana e pe ta pei nalakena
mau, eu mari ra eu pei tea mari-
pele : go naata waina e pe wo tawiri
tea waina e pei tea tipakiluaana
e pe maripele.

ma pa lagati dua Yekovah na

navasaana animu ega vei, 10, io ;

sikai, go napati sikai ega tipa

waina e sa mau : ma naata

puma ni mawiri. Go tea waina e4O
masauna naga ega viragi ko pano

anigo. Go naata waina ega wo 41
maridie ko naga pa sikoti a pano

govi ko, go tea waina e masauna
naga ega sea paki-go pa ta atutaku
ki nia mau.
Ku dogo naga e pei tea noaana, 43
Pa dodomi tea ni maladigi ki-go,
go pa vilosi tea kokona ki-go:
ma kinau a noa ki mu, Kuga 44
dodomi tea maga waina eu kokona
ki mu, go kuga magi tea maga
waina eu do kopalele mu dapasa-
vasa ; naga kuga vei natu maga 45
ni Tamamu waina e doko nakoro-
atelagi maga doko: nalakena e
mari elo aneana e sake paki tea
sa maga go tea wia maga, go e
mari usa e powo paki tea, leana
maga go tea tagele maga. Ku pe 46
dodomi tea maga waina eu do

nasava ? tea tape nasautoga maga
eu da mari tea wanogoe kite ? Go 47
ku pe vasadodomi taimu maga
sikida, ku pe mari tea warua liu sei
maga 1 tea maga ni nalauna pota
maga eu da mari tea wanogoe kite ?

wialua, ega tapala waina Tamamu
ni nakoroatelagi e pialua.
Matele 6,
Kuga vunusi naga kuga ta mari 1
namarinaleoleanaana animu narae
ni naatamoli maga mau, naga euga
vunusi mu: ku pe mari dapala
nogoe ku pe ta peani te namoriana


mau sikoti Tamamu waina e doko
nakoroatelagi maga doko.
2 Nalakena tea wanogoe ragi waina
ku pe mari navituamolikiana, pa
ta sui paiga sikai naraema mau,
dakiusi waina nakalepo maga eu
mari a ekopu ni nasuma ni nasai-
saiana maga go napua maga ni
natokoana, naga euga vei tea sama-
samaniana pae naatamoli maga.
Lomau a noa ki mu, Eu dape
3 sua namoriana adeada. Ma ragi
waina nigo ku mari navituamoli-
kiana, nafnelearuma ni mawori ega
ta atae tea waina nafnelearuma ni
1 matua e mari a mau; naga navi-
tuafnolikiana anigo ega vei tea
sili; go Tamamu waina e sili po do
punusi ega wo lagati dua ko.
5 Go ragi waina kuga tapasavasa,
kuga wo da dapala nakalepo maga
mau: nalakena eu masauna naga

naweluki maga ni napua welewelea

lina ki naatamoli maga. Lomau a
noa ki mu, Eu dape sua namori-
-6 ana adeada. Ma nigo, ragi waina

anigo, pa tapasavasa ki Tamama
waina e sili, go Tamama waina
e sili po do punusi ega wo la-
-7 gati dua ko. Go ragi waina ku

wo pei tea rogoana nalakena navasa-
-8 parauana adeada. Nalakena tea
wanogoe kuga ta dakiusi ra mau :
nalakena Tamamu e atae naleo maga
waina eu pia ki mu ragi waina ku

kena tea wanogoe kuga tapasavasa
ega tapala waia; Mamaginami waina
ku doko nakoroatelagi maga doko,

anigo ega umai. Namasauana anigo

nakoroatelagi. Pa tua garni masoso 11
te navinaga waina e pia ki garni.

dogoana mau, ma pa vualua garni

korokoro natapiriana adeada maga,

pei tea mata susue mau, dapala

dape sua namoriana adeada. Ma 17

patokoma ; nalakena tea wanogoe

ako e pe vei namaligo, namaligo
21 wanogoe epe warua pa ! Te naata

dua suasua mau : nalakena ega wo

25 mammon suasua. Nalakena tea
wanogoe, a noa ki mu, Kuga ta

munugi a; go magi napatokomu
mau, tea waina kuga wo suni a.

naga kite ? go napatokomu e da
26 parua liu sugoro maga kite ? Kuga
leopunusi manu maga ni nakoro-

mu ku da pia liu parua ki da kite %

usiusi lili maga ni vanua, dapala
waina eu do ulua; eu da posiwosi

-30 da mau. Ma Supe e pe sugoro

maga eu do laga naleo maga

Matele 7.
Kuga ta pasapotae mau, naga I
kuga ta pei tea vasapotaeana mau.
Nalakena navasapotoaeana waina 2
ku do pasapotae asa, kuga wo pei
tea vasapotaeana asa : go totowo
waina ku do dowogi asa ega wo ma-
nimu pei tea towogianaasa. Go eka- 3
Sana ku punusi namotamota waina
e doko namata ni taima, ma ku da
midoa ki natokai mau waina e doko
namatama doko ? Kite pa wo noa 1
ki taima dapale sava, Pa suasua
naga aga tapelua namotamota waina
e doko namatama; go pa leo, na
tokai e doko namatama doko ?
Nakalepo, pa vea dapelua natokoai 5
waina e doko namatama; go ragi
wanogoe pa wo leopunu pia naga
pa tapelua namotamota waina e
doko namata ni taima doko.


6 Kuga ta dua koria maga tea
waina e dapu mau, go kuga ta nadi
ki napati ni vilavila animu maga
narae ni wago maga mau, mase eu
pe vapuludoa ra ki naineleda, po
dumada doa ra po katiporae mu.

vituakiana paki mu ; kuga laga, go

tea waina e do pokawoka ega wo

naatamoli sei kakamu e doko, w T aina,
natuna e pe tatagovi a ki bred
sikai, e pe wo dua e vatu sikai;

11 wo dua e inaata sikai ? Go nimu,
waina ku sa, ku pe atae naga

doko nakoroatelagi maga e pe wo
pitua e pe warua liu sa pa ki tea
wia maga paki tea maga waina eu
12 datagovi a ara. Nalakena tea

moli maga euga manimu mari ra,

goe e pei nawotaeana go peroveta
maga.
13 Kuga sili pae namatapua kiki:

soro maga, waina eu suni sugoro

ma eu pei wulf tapepavakoto maga
16 napalauda. Kuga wo atae ra ki
nawada maga. Naatamoli maga
eu lei nawa ni vaine maga melu
namatagauta maga kite ? kite na
puliva maga melu tea vivitipa maga
kite ? Dapala nogoe sara nakau 17
wia eu do dau ki nawa wia; ma
nakau sa edo dau ki nawa sa. Na 18
kau wia sikai e marisa dau ki nawa
sa, go nakau sa sikai e marisa dau
ki nawa wia. Sara nakau waina 19
eu da dau ki nawa wia mau eu do
pei tea taeana eu dowo, po pei tea
nadikiana paki nakapu. Nalakena 20
tea wanogoe kuga wo atae ra ki
nawada. Sara naata waina eu do 21
noa ki nau, Nawota, Nawota, euga
wo da mamau puti sili paki na
marakiana ni nakoroatelagi maga
mau; ma tea waina e do marina
masauana ki Tamagu waina e doko
nakoroatelagi doko ega wo sili paki
asa. Tea lapa euga wo noa ki 22
nau naaleatia wanogoe, euga wo
naga, Nawota, Nawota, au da dapa-
vanau ki nagisaina kite, go au da
mari dimon maga eu melu pano ki
nagisaina kite ? go au da mari nawosi-
ana kasua lapa ki nagisaina kite ?

ra, naga A da' atae mu te ragi
mau : kuga inelu dua ki nau pano,

naleotageleana. Nalakena tea wa- 24
nogoe sara naata waina eu dogo

ananaga eu dakiusi naatamoli manu-

noai sara maga eu rumai, go nalagi

. wanogoe e duleana, po pasa kasua
ki nalagi maga go natasi; go nata-
-27 mateana warua e pakilina. Go
naatamoli maga wanogoe eu maga,
po naga, Naatamoli waia e dapale
sava, waina nalagi maga go natasi
eu dogo parati ki nia 1
28 Go ragi waina e duagoto sua
umai paki navanua ki naka ni
Cadara, tea rua waina ero pei
dimon ero sua e, ero dave pae
matigo maga umai, ero mata sa
parua sa, dapala waina te naata
sikai e da mariatae surata liu pae
29 napua wanogoe mau. Go kuga leo,
ero pioso, po naga, Aroga kasa
ki-go, Supe Natuna ? ku po umai
paki nea naga pa mari garni auga
vitinu ega vea ki ragi kakana kite ?
30 Go navata sikai ni wago lapa eu
doko uvea ki da eu do ganikani,
31 Go dimon maga eu pavarani a, eu
naga, Ku pe mari garni au pe tave
pano, pa tipakilua garni auga va
sili navata ni wago maga. Go e 32
noa ki da, e naga, Kuga.vano. Go
eu dave umai, po pano sili wago
maga wanogoe: go kuga leo,
navata mamau eu sava kasua siwo
napatira paki natasi, po mate noai
maga. Go tea maga waina eu do 33
pagani ra eu sava pano, po paki
natokoana, po dogorogo ki naleo
maga mamau puti, go tea waina
e pakilina ki tea rua waina ero pei
dimon. Go kuga leo, natokoana 34
mamau eu dave puti umai naga euga
sua Yesu : go ragi waina eu punusi
a, eu pavarani a naga ega meludua
ki kokoi adeada maga pano.
Matele 9.
Go e pagi rarua sikai, po duagoto 1
paki taleva kerua, po umai paki
natokoana aneana. Go kuga leo, eu 2
dape , tea sarumate sikai umai
punusi a, e one nawewele sikai one :
go Yesu e punusi nasaralomauana
adeada po noa ki tea sarumate, e
naga, Koto, pa marasike ; namari-
naleosaana anigo maga eu pei tea
midoakikorokoroana. Go kuga leo, 3
tea midiri maga seara kakada eu
noa napalauda, eu naga, Naatamoli
waia e pasasaki. Go Yesu waina e 4
atae namidodoana adeada maga e
naga, Ekasana ku midoa ki tea sa
napopomu ? Nalakena seve tea e 5
manainai pia, naga aga noa, Namari-
naleosaana anigo maga eu pei tea
midoakikorokoroana ; kite naga aga
noa, Pa tuleana, po surata ? Ma 6
naga kuga atae naga naatamoli
Natuna e peani naveinawotaana
maramana naga ega midoakikoro-
koro namarinaleosaana maga, (ragi
wanogoe e noa ki tea sarumate, e
naga), Pa tuleana, po dape dakati
nawewele anigo, po paki nasurna
anigo pano. Go e duleana, po paki 7
nasurna aneana pano. Ma ragi 8


waina taua maga ni naatamoli maga
eu punusi a, eu mataku, po sama-
samani Supe, waina e dua naata
moli maga naveinawotaana tapala
nogoe.
9 Go ragi waina Yesu edo liu mein
dua ki tokora wanagoe pano, e
punusi naatainoli sikai, waina e pei
tea sosoana ki Mataio, e do dasake
tokora ni nasautoga: go e noa ki
nia, e naga, Pa rausi au. Go e
duleana, po dausi a.
10 Go e pakilina, ragi waina e kere-
one ganikani ekopu ni nasufna,
kuga leo, tea tape nasautoga lapa go
tea mari naleo sa lapa eu rumai po
kereone ganikani sikoti Yesu go tea
11 vasapiseikiana aneana maga. Go
ragi waina Farisi maga eu punusi a,
eu noa ki tea vasapiseikiana aneana
maga, eu naga, Ekasana Tea Vasa-
piseiki animu e ganikani sikoti tea
tape nasautoga maga go tea mari
12 naleo sa maga ? Ma ragi waina e
dogo e, e naga, Tea maga waina eu
kasua eu da dapala waina e pia naga
euga masau naatainoli sikai nimedi-
sina mau, ma tea maga waina eu
13 sasana eu dapala nogoe. Ma kuga
vano po ataedogo tea waia e pei
nasava, A masau nadodomiana, a
da masau naviriana mau : nalakena
a da umai naga aga soso tea leana
maga mau, ma a umai naga aga soso
tea mari naleo sa maga.
14 Ragi wanogoe tea vasapiseikiana
maga ki Yoane eu rumai punusi a,
eu naga, Ekasana kinami go Farisi
maga au do paka lapa pali, ma tea
vasapiseikiana anigo maga eu da pali
15 mau ? Go Yesu 6 noa ki da, e naga,
Tea vitawiri tana ri maga eu mari-
atae susue ragi waina tea vitawiri e
sikoti ra doko kite ? Ma naaleatia
maga euga wo umai waina tea vita-
wiri ega wo per tea tapeluaana ki ada
asa, go euga wo pali ragi wanogoe.
16 Go te naata sikai e da usuvaki sugoro
tuai ki matele sikai ni nakulukulu
waina e ko da pei tea marimataki-
ana mau ; nalakena nausuvakiana e
mariporae sugoro, go e moro ma-
woro parua. Go eu da da ki waina 17
vau paki noai ni nawili tuai maga
mau : eu pe ta ki nia paki ara eu pe
masai, gowaine e pe toroa,go nawili
maga eu pe sa : ma eu da ki waine
vau paki nawili vau maga, go ero
dua pia doko.
Ragi waina e do pasa ki da tea 18
maga wanogoe, kuga leo, tea maraki
sikai e umai, po lotu ki nia, e naga,
Natugu nagoroi e po mate ragi waia:
ma pa umai po doropusi namele-
arufna asa, go ega wo mauri. Go 19
Yesu e duleana, po dausi a, go tea
vasapiseikiana aneana maga eu
mamau. Go kuga leo, nagoroi sikai 20
waina e dape nada varan natau
rualima sikai tamate dua, e umai
paki natakuna, po kisidogo narepu
ni sugoro aneana : nalakena e noa 21
napalauna, e naga, A pe kisidogo
sugoro aneana, a pe wo pei tea mari-
pauriana. Ma Yesu e dumana doa e 22
po punusi a po naga, Lei, pa mara-
sike ; nasaralomauana anigo e po
maripauri ko. Go nagoroi wanogoe
e pei tea maripauriana pae aura
wanogoe pa pa. Go ragi waina 23
Yesu e umai paki ekopu ni nasufna
ki tea maraki wanogoe, po punusi
tea sui lokore maga, go taua ni
naatainoli maga eu do lalagaarova, e
naga, Kuga fnelu : nalakena koroi 24
kiki e da mate mau, ma e maturu.
Go eu muru ki nia. Ma ragi waina 25
taua ni naatamoli maga eu pei tea
mariana eu paki katama, e paki
ekopu, po puati namelearuna ; go
koroi kiki e duleana. Go narogo- 26
rogoana wanogoe e sokapule paki
navanua wanogoe mamau.
Go ragi waina Yesu e do liu pae 27
tokora wanogoe pano, naatamoli
kesa dua ero dausi a, ero do pioso,
po do naga. Pa dodomi garni, natu
ni David. Go ragi waina e umai 28


paid ekopu ni nasuma, tea kesa dua
wanogoe ero umai punusi a : go
Yesu e noa ki da, e naga, Koro
saralomau naga a mariatae mari tea
wanogoe kite ? Ero noa ki nia, ero
29 naga, loro, Nawota. Ragi wanogoe
e kisidogo namatada maga, po naga,
Bga manimu pei tea mariana ega
vae nasaralomauana animu. Go
30 namatada maga eu leosai. Go Yesu
e pasasoki kasua ki da, e naga,
Koroga vunusi naga te naata ega
ta atae a man. Ma ero dave
31 pano po pasa peravera ki narogo-
rogoana kakana navanua wanogoe
mamau.
32 Go ragi waina nara ero do dave
pano, kuga leo, eu piragi umai
punusi a naatamoli pusa sikai waina
33 e pei dimon. Go ragi waina dimon
e pei tea mariana e dave pano, pusa
e pasa : go taua maga ni naatamoli
maga eu maga, po naga, Sala vea
e da pei tea vunusiana dapalana
34 Israel mau. Ma Farisi maga eu
do naga, E mari dimon maga eu
dave pano pae nawota ki dimon
maga.
35 Go Yesu e surata pa pule puti
natokoana warua maga go natoko-
ana kiki maga, e do pasapiseiki
ekopu ni nasuma ni nasaisaiana
adeada maga, po do dogorogo ki
narogorogoana wia ni namarakiana,
po do marilua sara nasasanaana go
36 sara namanainaiana. Ma ragi waina
e punusi taua maga ni naatamoli
maga, e maritadodomi ra, nalakena
eu dogokitesa po pei daveravera,
dakiusi shiip waina tea leo parati
37 ki da e dika. Ragi wanogoe e
noa ki tea vasapiseikiana aneana
maga, e naga, Nalolovaeana e parua
lomau, ma tea wosiwosi maga eu
pisa maau. Nalakena tea wanogoe
kuga vavarani Nawota ni nalolo-
vaeana naga ega tipakilua tea wosi-
wosi maga paki nalolovaeana
aneana.
Matele 10.
Go e soso tea vasapiseikiana 1
aneana rualima sikai tamate dua eu
rumai punusi a, go e dua ra naveina-
wotaana dapau naatana loa maga,
naga euga mari ra euga tave pano,
go naga euga marilua sara nasasa-
naana go sara namanainaiana.
Go nagisa maga ni apostolo rua- 2
lima sikai tamate dua eu pei tea
maga waia : tea vea Simon, waina
e pei tea sosoana ki Petero, go taina
Anderea; Yakobo natu ni Zebedaio,
go taina Yoane; Filipo, go Bar- 3
tolomaio ; Toma, go Mataio tea tape
nasautoga ; Yakobo natu ni Alefaio, 4
go Lebbaio; Simon Kananaio, go
Yuda Iskariote, nae waina e pitua ki
nia. Tea rualima sikai tamate dua 5
wanogoe Yesu e dipakilua ra, po
dipa ki da, e naga.
Kuga ta pae te napua sikai ki tea 6
ni nalauna pota maga mau, go kuga
ta sili paki te natokoana sikai ki
naka ni Samaria mau : ma kuga
vano punusi shiip sasapo ni nasuma
ni Israel. Go ragi waina kuga to 7
pano, kuga to dogorogo, po naga,
Namarakiana ni nakoroatelagi maga
e pei inaladigi. Kuga maripauri tea 8
sasana maga, kuga mari tea mate
maga euga tuleana, kuga mari tea
vei lepero maga euga tautau, kuga
mari dimon maga euga tave pano :
ku dape rnoli, kuga vitua inoli. Kuga 9
ta dalua cold seara, kite silver seara,
kite brass seara paki napalau ni
tasoki animu maga mau ; kuga ta
dalua nala ni navinaga raki napua 10
mau, kite sugoro dua mau, kite na
melevasiana maga mau, kite tiko
sikai mau ; nalakena, tea wosiwosi
e pia ki navinaga aneana. Go na 11
tokoana warua kite natokoana kiki
waina ku pe wo sili paki asa, kuga
vusuusu ki parati ki sei e doko asa
waina e pia ; go kuga toko tokora
wanogoe doko pa pa ku pe wo pano.


12 Go ragi waina kuga wo paki ekopu
13 ni nasuma, kuga vasadodomi a. Go
nasuma e pe wia, natainateana
animu ega umai paki asa : ma e pe
ta pia mau, natainateana animu ega
14 liliu paki mu. Go naata waina epe
wo da piragi mu mau, go waina e pe
wo da dogo navasaan.a animu mau,
ragi waina kuga tave meludua ki
nasuma wanogoe kite natokoana
wanogoe, kuga meseura ki namota-
-15 fnota ni namelemu maga. Lomau
a noa ki mu, naga Navaratiana ni
navanua ni Sodom go ni Gomorrah
naaleatia ni navasapotaeana ega
wo parua, ma navaratiana ni na
tokoana wanogoe ega wo parua liu sa.
16 Kuga leo, kinau a dipakilua mu
ku dapala shiip maleoputo ni
wulf maga : nalakena tea wanogoe
kuga vei manumatua dapala fhaata
maga, go tea ta marisaki mau
17 dapala tokopea maga. Ma kuga
matamatua ki naatamoli maga:
nalakena euga wo pitua ki mu paki
nasaisaiana maga ki tea vusumaki
maga, go euga wo parati mu ekopu
ni nasuma ni nasaisaiana adeada
18 maga; go kuga wo pei tea viragi-
luaana pano punusi tea maraki
maga go nawota maga nalakena
kinau, naga kuga vei nanoasokiso-
kiana sikai paki da go paki tea ni
19 nalauna pota maga. Ma ragi waina
euga wo pitua ki mu, kuga ta
midoaki parati ki dapala waina kuga
wo pasa kite ki tea waina kuga wo
noa e : nalakena tea waina kuga wo
noa e ega wo pei tea vituakiana paki
20 mu aura wanogoe. Nalakena e da
pei nimu mau waina ku pasa, ma e
pei Naata ni Tamamu waina e pasa
21 napalaumu. Go taina ega wo pitua
ki taina paid namateana, go tamana
ega wo pitua ki natuna; go natuda
maga euga wo duleana dipa tamada
go pilada maga, po mari ra euga vei
22 tea maripunueana. Go kuga wo pei
tea vilosiana pae naatamoli maga
mamau puti nalakena nagisagu : ma
tea waina e sokidu pa pa paki
namata pagona edaku, nae ega wo
pei tea mautipauriana. Ma ragi 23
waina euga kopalele mu natokoana
waia, kuga sava pano paki natoko-
ana pota sikai: nalakena lomau a
noa Id mu, naga Kuga wo da
pa pule puti natokoana maga ki
Israel mau, pa pa naatamoli Natuna
ega wo umai.
Tea vasapiseikiana sikai e da 24
dapau tea vasapiseiki mau, go tea
suasua sikai e da dapau nawota
aneana mau. E pei tea lapa agi tea 25
vasapiseikiana naga ega tapala tea
vasapisei ki nia, go agi tea suasua
naga ega tapala nawota aneana. Eu
pe soso talakea ni nasuma ki Beel-
zebub eu pe wo da soso parua ki tea
maga ni nasuma aneana ki nia kite ?
Nalakena tea wanogoe kuga ta 26
matau ki da mau; nalakena te
navatuna sikai e da pei tea kova-
goroana mau, waina ega wo da pei
tea maripakasakiana mau, go te
navatuna sikai e da pei tea surukiana
mau, waina ega wo da pei tea ataeana
mau. Tea waina a noa ki mu asa 27
namaligo, kuga vasa asa namarama:
go tea waina ku dogo e paki nada-
ligamu, kuga rogorogo ki nia napau
ni nasuma maga. Go kuga ta 28
mataku mau patua ki tea maga
waina eu maripunue napatoko ni
naatamoli, ma eu marisapo mari-
punue naatada: ma kuga matau
ki parua ki tea waina e mari-
atae maripunue naatada go na
patokoda pokasi. Sparro dua ero 29
da do pei tea soriana raki larthig
sikai kite ? go sikai kakada ega w o
da dowo paki natano masale ki
Tamamu mau ; ma napati maga ni 30
nalolu ni napaumu ma eu mamau
puti pei tea veveana. Nalakena tea 31
wanogoe kuga ta mataku mau ;
nimu ku pia liu sparro lapa. Nala- 32
kena tea wanogoe sara naata waina


euga wo noasai au narae ni naata
moli maga, kinau ma aga wo noasai
naata wanogoe narae ni Tamagu
waina e doko nakoroatelagi maga.
33 Ma naata waina e pe wo pasagoro au
narae ni naatainoli maga, kinau ma
aga wo pasagoro naata wanogoe
narae ni Tamagu waina e doko
nakoroatelagi maga.
34 Kuga ta midoa ki nia mau naga a
umai naga aga nadi ki natamateana
paid maramana: ada umai naga
aga nadi ki natamateana mau, ma a
umai naga aga nadi ki lova sikai.
35 Nalakena a umai naga aga mari
tamatamada erogo vile, go tama-
-36 pilada, go tamatuada : go tea koko-
na ki naatainoli sikai euga' wo pei
37 tea maga ni nasurna aneana. Tea
waina e dodomi parua ki tamana
kite pilana ma e dodomi kiki ki nau,
e da pia ki nau mau ; go tea waina
e dodomi parua ki natuna naanoai
kite natuna nagoroi ma e dodomi
38 kiki ki nau, eda pia ki nau mau. Go
naata waina e da dape tea valada-
goto aneana mau po da dausi au
39 mau, e da pia ki nau mau. Tea
waina e papai namauriana aneana
ega wo dape puoli ki nia ; go tea
waina e dape puoli ki namauriana
aneana nalakena kinau ega wo
papai a.
40 Tea waina e piragi mu e piragi au,
go tea waina e piragi au e piragi tea
41 waina e dipakilua au umai. Tea
waina e piragi perofeta sikai nalake-
na e pei perofeta sikai ega wo dape
namoriana ki perofeta sikai; go tea
waina e piragi tea leana sikai na
lakena e pei tea leana sikai ega wo
dape namoriana ki tea leana sikai.
42 Go naata waina e pe wo dua tea kiri-
kiri maga waia sikai kakada lasa ni
noai maladi sikai e pe sikina naga
ega munugi a, nalakena e pei tea
vasapiseikiana sikai, lomau a noa
ki mu, naga ega wo da dape puoli
ki namoriana aneana mau.
Matele 11.
Go e pakilina, ragi waina Yesu e 1
dipaki sua teavasapiseikiana aneana
rualima sikai tamate dua, naga e
ineludua ki tokora wanogoe pano
naga ega vasapiseiki po dogorogo
natokoana adeada maga.
Go ragi waina Yoane, waina e doko 2
ekopu ni nasurna ni nasolisoliana, e
dogo nawosiana maga ki Kristo, e
dipakilua pae tea vasapiseikiana
aneana maga, po noa ki nia, e naga,
Nigo ku pei tea waina ega wo umai, 3
kite auga leogoro tea pota sikai ?
Go Yesu e pasadara po noa ki da, 4
e naga, Kuga vano po dogorogo paki
Yoane ki tea maga-waina ku dogo
ra po punusi ra : tea kesa maga eu 5
moro leosai, go tea vei pito maga eu
surata, go tea vei lepero maga eu pei
tea mariana eu dautau, go tea paro
maga eu dorogo, go tea mate maga
eu pei tea sikeana eu duleana, go tea
tika maga narogorogoana wia e pei
tea rogorogokiana paki da. Go na 6
ata waina e pe wo da dapilagona
nalo kakagu mau e maropa. Go ragi 7
waina nara eu do pano, Yesu e pae
asa noa ki taua maga ni naatainoli
maga nalo ni Yoane, e naga, Ku .
dave paki masopalo pano naga kuga
leopunusi nasava ? napati nau sikai
waina e pei tea tuleakiana ki nalagi
kite ? Ma ku dave pano naga kuga 8
vunusi nasava ? naatainoli sikai
waina e suni sugoro moinoa maga
kite % Kuga leo, tea maga waina eu
suni sugoro fnornoa maga eu doko
nasurna maga ki nawota maga. Ma 9
ekasana ku dave pano ? naga kuga
vunusi perofeta sikai kite 1 loro, a
noa ki mu asa, go tea waina e parua
liu perofeta sikai. Nae e pei tea 10
waina e pei tea midiriana nalo
kakana, e naga,
Pa leo, kinau a dipakilua tea
tautauana aginau e pea ki
naraema,


Waina ega wo marimata ki napua
anigo ega vea ki-go.
11 Lomau a noa ki mu, naga Tea
maga waina eu pei tea visolakiana ki
nagoroi maga sikai kakada e da
pakilina mau waina e parua liu
Yoane tea Bapetizo ; ma tea waina
e kiki namatakiana ni nakoroatelagi
12 maga e parua liu sa. Go pae
naaleatia maga ki Yoane tea Bapetizo
pa pa paki ragi waia namarakiana ni
nakoroatelagi maga e pei tea mari-
kasuakiana, go tea maga waina eu
marikasua eu dape pavakoto asa.
13 Nalakena per of eta maga mamau
puti go nawotaeana eu peanoasai pa
14 pa paki Yoane. Go ku pe masauna
naga kuga tape a nae e pei Eliyali
waina e one asa one naga ega umai.
15 Tea waina e pilake nadaliga maga
16 naga ega rogo, ega rogo. Ma aga
noa naga tagona waia eu dakiusi
nasava ? Eu dakiusi piakirikiri
maga waina eu do natano malo ni
navakokotoana maga, waina eu
17 pioso paki tada maga, po naga, Au
manimu sui lokore go ku da sale
mau; au lalagaarova, go ku da
18 dapagi narumamu mau. Nalakena
Yoane e umai e da ganikani mau go
e da munu mau, go eu naga, Epeani
19 dimon sikai. Naatamoli Natuna e
umai e ganikani po munu, go eu
naga, Kuga leo, naatamoli tuatua
liu, po do munu waine, tea dodo-
mi tea tape nasautoga maga go
tea mari naleo sa maga! Go na
manumatuaana e pei tea mari-
leanakiana pae nawosiana aneana
maga.
20 Ragi wanogoe e pae asa pasapinoa
ki natokoana maga waina nawosiana
kasua aneana maga tea lapa liu
kakada eu pei tea mariana ara,
nalakena eu da midoakidoa mau.
21 Ai ki-go, Korazin ! ai ki-go, Beth-
saida ! nalakena nawosiana kasua
maga waina eu pei tea mariana
mu, eu pe vei tea mariana Tair go
Sidon, ero pe midoakidoa tuai po
suni nakulukulu ni sak po doko
natanoapu. Ma a noa ki mu naga 22
navaratiana ni Tair go Sidon na
aleatia ni navasapotaeana ega
wo parua, ma navaratiana animu
ega wo parua liu sa. Go nigo, 23
Kapernaum, pa wo pei tea tapeana
sake paki nakoroatelagi kite ? pa
wo siwo paki Hades: nalakena
nawosiana kasua maga waina eu
pei tea mariana ako eu pe vei tea
mariana Sodom, e pe toko pa pa
paki naaleatia waia. Ma a noa ki 24
mu, naga navaratiana ni navanua ni
Sodom naaleatia ni navasapotaeana
ega wo parua, ma navaratiana anigo
ega wo parua liu sa.
Ragi wanogoe Yesu e pasadara 25
po naga, A pasadodomata ki-go,
Mama 0, Talakea ni nakoroatelagi
go maramana, nalakena ku dasuru
ki tea manumatua maga go ki tea
midoakiatae maga naleo maga wano-
goe, po magi pipia maga maripakasa
ki da: ioro, Mama, nalakena ku 26
midoakimata ki nia naga ega tapala
nogoe naraema. Naleo maga mamau 27
puti eu pei tea vituakiana paki nau
pae Tamagu : go te naata sikai e da
atae mata ki Natuna mau, ma
Tamagu e sikina atae mata ki nia ;
go te naata sikai e da atae mata ki
Tamagu mau, ma Natuna sikina e
atae mata ki nia, .go naata waina
Natuna e pe suasua naga ega
maneana maripakasa ki nia. Kuga 28
umai punusi au, tea maga mamau
puti waina ku do posiwosi-mawosa
po do dapetape tea madaga, go aga
wo dua mu namaromaroana. Kuga 29
tape rakati nakau ni nanoa aginau
ega toko mu, go kuga ataedogo
kiagu; nalakena a matemate go
napopogu e pakitano : go kuga wo
magi naatamu papai namaro-
maroana. Nalakena nakau ni na 30
noa aginau e manainai, go natape-
tapeana aginau e masalesale.


Matele 12.
1 Ragi wanogoe Yesu e surata dua-
duru vanua maga ni korn naaleatia
ni sabbath; go tea vasapiseiki-
ana aneana maga eu pitolo, po pae
asa lei fhokai maga ni korn, po gani-
-2 kani. Ma Farisi maga, ragi waina
eu punusi a, eu noa ki nia, eu naga,
Pa leo, tea vasapiseikiana anigo
maga eu mari tea waina e da pae
nawotaeana mau naga euga mari a
3 sabbath. Ma e noa ki da, e naga, Ku
da peve tea waina David e mari a,
ragi waina e pitolo, go tea maga
4 waina eu sikoti a doko; dapala
waina e paid roara ni nasuma ki
Supe, po gani bred tokorae, waina
e da pae nawotaeana mau naga
nae ega kani a, kite naga tea maga
waina eu sikoti a doko euga kania,
ma e pae nawotaeana naga tea
5 viri maga euga sikida gani a 1 Kite
ku da peve tusi ni nawotaeana, naga
naaleatia ni sabbath tea viri maga
nasuma tapu eu mari sabbath e pei
tea rnoli, go eu da pei taparo asa
6 mau. Ma a noa ki mu, naga tea
waina e parualiu nasuma tapuedoko
7 nea. Ma ku pe atae tea waia naga e
pei nasava, A masau nadodomiana,
go a da masau naviriana mau, ku pe
ta dipakotovi tea maga waina eu da
8 pei taparo mau. Nalakenanaatamoli
Natuna e pei nawota ni sabbath.
9 Go e meludua ki tokora wanogoe
pano, po paki ekopu ni nasuma ni
10 nasaisaiana adeada: go kuga leo, na
atamoli sikai e doko waina namele-
aruna e lologara. Go eu pusuusu
paki nia, eu naga, E pae nawotaeana
naga tuga maripauri naaleatia ni
sabbath kite ? naga euga vasadipa e.
11 Go e noa ki da, e naga, Nimu naata-
moli sei kakamu ega wo doko, waina
ega wo peani shiip sikai, go nae e pe
rowo paki inorutano sikai naaleatia
ni sabbath, e pe wo da puati a, po
12 dapedakatilua e kite ? Go naatamoli
sikai e paka visa pia liu shiip
sikai. Nalakena tea wanogoe e pae
nawotaeana naga tuga mari pia
naaleatia ni sabbath. Ragi wanogoe 13
e noa ki naatamoli wanogoe, e naga,
Pa sai ki namelearuma. Go e sai ki
nia; go e pei tea mariana e moro
pia dakiusi kerua. Ma Farisi maga 14
eu dave pano, po seke dipa e,
dapala waina euga maripunue a asa.
Ma Yesu e atae a po meludua ki 15
tokora wanogoe pano : go tea lapa
eu dausi a ; go e maripauri puti ra,
po pasasoki ra naga euga ta mari a 16
ega toko lina man : naga tea waina 17
e pei tea noaana pae profeta Isaiah
ega lolomana, e naga,
Kuga leo, tea suasua aginau waina 18
a matadoa e;
Tea dodomiana aginau waina
naatagu e midoakiinata ki nia :
Aga wo doro Naatagu ega wo doko
Go ega wo dogorogo ki navasa-
potaeana paki tea ni nalauna
pota maga.
Ega wo da pile mau, go ega wo da 19
pioso kasua mau;
Go te naata sikai ega wo da dogo
nadaleona napua maga ni na
tokoana mau.
Napati nau sikai waina e pei wola 20
ega wo da pori a mau,
Go wik sikai waina e asua ega wo
da suipunue a mau,
Pa pa ega tipakilua navasapotae-
ana paki namarimatuaana.
Go tea ni nalauna pota maga euga 21
wo leogora-pavatu nagisana.
Ragi wanogoe tea sikai waina e 22
pei dimon, waina e kesa go waina e
pusa, e pei tea viragiana umai punusi
a : go e maripauri a, dapala waina
pusa e pasa po leosai. Go taua maga 23
mamau puti ni naatamoli maga eu
saramakoto, po naga, Tea waia e pei
natu ni David kite % Ma ragi waina 24
Farisi maga eu dogo e, eu naga, Tea
waia e da mari dimon maga eu dave


pano mau, ma e mari ra eu dave
pano pae Beelzebub nawota ki di-
-25 mon maga. Go e atae namidodoana
adeada maga po noa ki da, e naga,
Sara namarakiana waina eu pei tea
tapotaeana dumada dipa ra eu pei
tea mariana eu pei masomaladi; go
sara natokoana kite nasuina waina
eu pei dumada dipa
26 ra, euga wo da du mau ; go Satan e
pe mari Satan e pe tave pano, e pe
vei tea tapotaeana duinana dipa e ;
go namarakiana aneana e pe wo du
27 dapale sava % Go kinau ape mari
dimon maga eu pe dave pano pae
Beelzebub, natumu naanoai maga
eu pe mari ra eu pe tave pano
pae sei ? nalakena tea wanogoe nara
28 euga wo pei tea vasapotae mu. Ma
kinau a pe mari dimon maga eu pe
tave pano pae Naata ni Supe,
namarakiana ki Supe e pe umai sua
29 pakilina ki mu. Kite te naata sikai
e mariatae paki ekopu ni nasuma ki
tea kasua, po dape pavakoto nalo
riki aneana maga dapale sava ? e pe
vea soli tea kasua, ragi wanogoe epe
wo dape pavakoto nasuina aneana.
30 Tea waina e da sikoti au doko mau
e maridipa au; go tea waina eda
dauaki sikoti au mau e mari e pei
31 daperavera. Nalakena tea wanogoe
a noa ki mu, naga Sara namarina-
leosaana go sara navasasakiana euga
wo magi naatainoli maga pei tea
midoakikorokoroana; ma navasa-
sakiana dipa Naatana ega wo da pei
32 tea midoakikorokoroana mau. Go
te naata sikai e pe noa te navasaana
sikai dipa naatainoli Natuna, e pe wo
maneana pei tea midoakikorokoro-
ana ; ma te naata sikai e pe vasa
dipa Naatana Tapu, e pe wo da
maneana pei tea midoakikorokoro-
ana mau, maramana waia, kite
maramana waina ega wo umai.
33 Kuga mari nakau ega wia, go na
wana ega wia; kite kuga mari
nakau ega sa, go nawana ega sa :
nalakeua nakau e pei tea ataeana ki
nawana. Maata sa natuda maga, ku 34
mariatae pasa tea wia maga dapale
sava ragi waina ku sa % nalakena
nawoka ni naatainoli e pasa pae tea
waina napopona e pura ki nia.
Naatainoli wia e dapelua tea wia 35
maga pae store wia aneana: go
naatainoli sa e dapelua tea sa maga
pae store sa aneana. Go a noa ki 36
mu, naga sara navasaana palo waina
naatainoli maga euga wo pasa ara,
euga wo atusi ra naaleatia ni na
vasapotaeana. Nalakena ki navasa- 37
ana anigo maga pa wo pei tea
marileanakiana, go ki navasaana
anigo maga pa wo pei tea tipakoto-
viana.
Ragi wanogoe tea midiri maga go 38
Farisi maga seara kakada eu pasa
dara e, eu naga, Tea Yasapiseiki, au
masauna naga auga vunusi navai-
vaiana sikai ega melu ako. Ma e 39
pasadara po noa ki da, e naga,
Tagona sa go maripele eu datago
navaivaiana sikai; go te navai-
vaiana sikai ega wo da pei tea vitua-
kiana paki da mau ma navaivaiana
ni perofeta Yonah ega sikina : nala- 40
kena dakiusi waina Yonak e one
napele ni naika warua one naaleatia
dolu go napogiana dolu, dapala
nogoe naatainoli Natuna ega wo one
napalau ni natano one naaleatia dolu
go napogiana dolu. Naatainoli maga 41
ni Nineveh euga wo duleana navasa-
potaeana sikoti tagona waia, go nara
euga wo dipakotovi tagona waia:
nalakena eu midoakidoa ragi waina '
eu dogo narogorogoana ki Yonah ;
go kuga leo, tea waina e parua liu
Yonah e doko nea. Nawota nagoroi 42
ni sauth ega wo duleana navasa-
potaeana sikoti tagona waia, go nae
ega wo dipakotovi tagona waia:
nalakena e pae namatapago ni mara-
mana umai naga ega rogo namanu-
matuaana ki Solomon ; go kuga leo,
tea waina e parua liu Solomon e doko


43 nea. Ma naatana loa, ragi waina e
e dave fneludua Id naatamoli pano,
e surata duaduru malo garagara
maga, e do laga namaromaroana, po
44 da papai a mau. Eagi wanogoe e
naga, Aga wo liliu paid ekopu ni
nasuma aginau waina a dave asa
umai; go ragi waina e nmai e papai
a e palo, e pei tea sasaraana, go tea
45 rikeikiana. Ragi wanogoe e pano, po
piragilua naatana pota larua eu sikoti
a umai waina eu sa liu sa, go eu sili
paki asa po doko asa doko : go tea
edaku maga ki naatamoli wanogoe
eu pei tea mariana eu sa liu tea vea
aneana maga. Go ega wo dapala
nogoe paki tagona sa waia.
46 Ragi waina nae eko do pasa paki
taua maga ni naatamoli maga, kuga
leo, pilana go taina maga eu lawodu
katama, eu laga naga euga vasa ki
47 nia. Go te naata sikai e noa ki nia,
e naga. Pa leo, pilama go taima
maga eu lawodu katama, eu laga
48 naga euga vasa ki-go. Ma e pasa
dara po noa ki tea waina e noa ki nia
asa, e naga, Sei e pei pilagu ? go sei
49 eu pei taigu maga ? Go e sai ki
namelearuna paki tea vasapiseikiana
aneana maga, po naga, Kuga leo,
50 pilagu go taigu maga ! Nalakena
naata waina e pe wo mari namasau-
ana ki Tamagu waina e doko na
koroatelagi maga, nae e pe vei
taigu, go goregu, go pilagu.
Matele 13.
1 Naaleatia wanogoe Yesu e dave
fnelu dua ki nasuma pano, po dasake
2 pisari nadigi ni natasi. Go taua
warua maga ni naatamoli maga eu
saisai punusi a, dapala e pagi rarua
sikai, po dasake ; go taua mamau ni
naatamoli maga eu lawodu elaugara-
-3 gara. Go e pasa ki da naleo lapa
pae naluluakia maga, e naga, Kuga
leo, tea sapuraki e dave pano naga
4 ega sapuraki; go ragi waina e do
sapuraki, te seara eu dowo pisari na
digi ni napua, go manu maga eu
rumai po dadinomi ra : go tea pota 5
seara eu do wo paki malo ni vatu maga,
waina natano e da parua asa mau :
go eu pisou maraverave, nalakena
natano eda matulu mau: go ragi 6
waina elo e sake eu pei tea tapara-
kiana ; go nalakena eu dika nako-
ada eu kokolo. Go tea pota seara eu 7
dowo paki tea makalikali maga ; go
tea makalikali maga eu ulua sake po
mari ra eu dodo : go tea pota seara 8
eu dowo paki natano wia, po pitua
ki nawa, sikai e dau ki ponotia sikai,
go sikai ki rualima latesa, go sikai
ki rualima dolu. Tea waina e pilake 9
nadaliga maga ega rogo.
Go tea vasapiseikiana maga eu 10
rumai, po noa ki nia, eu naga, Eka-
sana ku pasa ki da pae naluluakia
maga ? Go e pasadara po noa ki 11
da, e naga, E pei tea vituakiana paki
mu naga kuga atae paia maga ni na
marakiana ni nakoroatelagi maga,
ma e da pei tea vituakiana paki da .
mau. Nalakena naata waina e peani, 12
ega wo pei tea vituakiana paki nia,
go ega wo peani tea lapa : ma naata
waina e da peani mau, tea waina e
peani a ega wo pei tea tapelua-
ana kiana. Nalakena tea wanogoe a 13
pasa ki da pae naluluakia maga ;
nalakena eu do punusi po da punusi
mau, go eu do dogo po da dogo mau,
go eu da midoakiatae mau. Go na 14
veanoasaiana ki Isaiah e pei tea
vakavuroana ara, waina e naga,
Kuga wo dogo ki narogoana, go
kuga wo da midoakiatae mau ;
Go kuga wo punusi po punusi, go
kuga wo da leoatae mau :
Nalakena napopo ni narei waia e 15
manopunopu,
Go eu dogo madagadaga ki na
daligada maga,
Go eu puluti namatada maga ;
Naga euga ta punusi ki namatada
maga mau,


Po da dogo ki nadaligada maga
mau,
Po da midoakiatae ki napopoda
Go naga euga ta liliu umai mau,
Go naga aga ta maripauri ra mau.
16 Ma namatamu maga eu maropa,
nalakena eu punusi; go nadaligamu
maga eu maropa, nalakena eu dogo.
17 Nalakena lomau a noa ki mu, naga
perofeta lapa go naatamoli leana
lapa eu masauna naga euga vunusi
tea maga waina ku punusi ra, go
eu da punusi ra mau ; go naga euga
rogo tea maga waina ku dogo ra,
18 go eu da dogo ra mau. Nalakena
tea wanogoe nimu kuga dogo nalu-
-19 luakia ni tea sapuraki. Ragi waina
te naata sikai e dogo navasaana ni
namarakiana, po da midoakiatae a
mau, tea sa e umai, po putilua tea
waina e pei tea sapurakiana napo-
pona. Nae e pei tea waina e pei tea
sapurakiana pisari nadigi ni napua.
20 Go tea waina e' pei tea sapurakiana
paki malo ni vatu maga, nae e pei tea
waina e dogo navasaana, po dape a
21 fnaraverave pilake nalaelaeaana; ma
edika nakoana napalauna, ma edoko
ragi sikai; go ragi waina nariesoki-
ana kite nakopaleleana e pakilina
nalakena navasaana, e dapilagona
22 fnaraverave. Go tea waina e pei
tea sapurakiana maleoputo ni
tea makalikali maga, nae e pei
tea waina e dogo navasaana, go
namidoaki-paratiki-ana ni mara-
mana, go nasurueana ni nasogolapa-
ana, ero mari navasaana e dodo, go e
23 pei tea mariana eda dau mau. Go
tea waina epei tea sapurakiana paki
natano wia, nae e pei tea waina e
dogo navasaana, po midoakiatae a ;
waina e dau lomau ki nawana, sikai
e dau ki ponotia sikai, go sikai ki
rualima latesa, go sikai ki rualima
dolu.
24 Naluluakia pota sikai e pasa nadi
ki nia paki da, e naga, Namarakiana
ni nakoroatelagi maga e pei tea
mariana e dakiusi naatamoli sikai
waina e sapura ki napati wia
vanua aneana : ma ragi waina na 25
atamoli maga eu maturu, tea kokona
ki nia e umai po sapura ki whit sa e
sarisari whit wia, po pano. Ma ragi 26
waina e pisou ki nauluna, po dau ki
nawana, ragi wanogoe, whit sa ma
e pakilina. Go tea suasua maga ki 27
talakea ni nasuiha eu rumai po noa
ki nia, eu naga, Nawota, ku da
sapura ki napati wia vanua anigo
kite ? go whit sa waina e ulua asa e
pae esava % Go e noa ki da, e naga, 28
Naatamoli kokona sikai e mari tea
wanogoe. Go tea suasua maga eu
noa ki nia, eunaga, Ku masauna naga
kinami auga vano po pila daua ki da
kite % Ma nae e naga, Ee; mase ragi 29
waina ku pe vila daua ki whit sa
maga, ku pe vaku dakati whit wia
pilake tea sa maga. Kuga toro ra 30
eroga rua ulua pa pa paki nalolovae-
ana ; go ragi ni nalolovaeana aga
wo noa ki tea lolovae maga, Kuga
vea piladaua ki whit sa maga, po
otisoki ra euga vei napu maga naga
euga tapara ki da : ma kuga tape-
daua ki whit wia ega vaki ekopu ni
nasuina ni korn aginau.
Naluluakia pota sikai e pasa nadi 31
ki nia paki da, e naga, Namarakiana
ni nakoroatelagi maga e dakiusi
napati ni sinapi sikai, waina naata
iholi sikai e dape a, po lawo e vanua
aneana : waina e kiki sa lomau ni 32
napati maga mamau puti ni nawa
nakau maga ; ma ragi waina e ulua
sake, e parua liu tea lawoana
maga, po pei nakau sikai, dapala
waina manu maga ni nakoroatelagi
eu rumai po doko arana maga.
Naluluakia pota sikai e pasa ki da 33
asa; e naga, Namarakiana ni na
koroatelagi maga e dakiusi leven,
waina nagoroi sikai e dape a, po sum
ki nia totowo ni flaur dolu, pa pa tea
mamau e pei tea levenakiana.


34 Tea maga mamau puti wanogoe
Yesu e pasa ki taua maga ni naata-
inoli maga ara pae naluluakia maga;
go e da pasa ki date navatuna
35 masale ki naluluakia sikai mau :
naga tea waina e pei tea noaana
pae perofeta ega lolomana, e naga.
Aga wo polagati nawokagu pae
naluluakia maga ;
Aga wo lua ki naleo maga waina
eu pei tea surukiana pae ragi ni
nanadiki-laketano-ana ni mara-
mana pa pa.
36 Ragi wanogoe e doropusi taua
maga ni naatamoli maga po paki
ekopu ni nasuma : go tea vasapisei-
kiana aneana maga eu rumai punusi
a, po naga, Pa noakipotae garni
37 naluluakia ni whit sa ni vanua. Go
e pasadara po naga, Tea waina e
sapura ki napati wia e pei naata
moli Natuna ; go vanua e pei mara-
-38 mana ; go napati wia nara eu pei
namarakiana natuna maga ; go whit
sa maga eu pei tea sigisigileo natuna
39 maga; go tea kokona waina e
sapura ki da e pei diabolo : go nalo-
lovaeana e pei naaleatia edaku mau
ni maramana ; go tea lolovae maga
40 eu pei agelo maga. Go dakiusi
waina whit sa maga eu pei tea
viladauakiana po pei tea tapara-
kiana ki nakapu; ega wo dapala
nogoe naaleatia edaku mau ni mara-
-41 mana. Naatamoli Natuna ega wo
dipakilua agelo aneana maga, go
euga wo piladaua ki meludua ki
namarakiana aneana naleo tapila-
gonaana maga mamau puti, go tea
maga waina eu mari namarinaleo-
-42 tageleana, go euga wo nadi ki da
paki upu ni nakapu : tokora wa-
nogoe natagiana go nakati-pati-
-43 ana eroga wo doko asa. Ragi
wanogoe tea leana maga euga wo
maramalaga dapala elo namaraki-
ana ki Tamada. Tea waina e pilake
nadaliga maga ega rogo.
44 Namarakiana ni nakoroatelagi
maga e dakiusi naloriki tauakiana
sikai waina e pei tea surukiana
vanua; waina naatamoli sikai e
papai a, po dasuru ki nia ; go na
lakena e laelaea asa e pano po sori
puti sara naleo waina e peani ra,
po pakotovi vanua wanogoe.
Namarakiana ni nakoroatelagi 45
maga e moro dakiusi naatamoli
sorisori sikai waina e do laga napati
ni vilavila wia maga : go ragi waina 46
e papai napati ni vilavila sikai ni
naulu warua, e pano po sori puti
sara naleo waina e peani ra, po
pakotovi a.
Namarakiana ni nakoroatelagi 47
maga e moro dakiusi kupena rosagi-
ana sikai, waina e pei tea sivakiana
paki natasi, go waina e puagoro
naika visarasara maga seara kakada:
waina, ragi waina e pura, eu dosagi 48
a paki euta ; go eu do natano, po
piladaua ki tea wia maga paki lasa
maga, ma tea sa maga eu nadi ki
da pano. Ega wo dapala nogoe 49
naaleatia edaku mau ni maramana;
agelo maga euga wo dave umai,
po marimasale ki tea sigisigileo
maga meludua ki tea leana maga,
go euga wo nadi ki da paki upu
ni nakapu: tokora wanogoe natagi- 50
ana go nakati-pati-ana eroga wo
doko asa.
Ku midoakiatae tea maga ma- 51
mau puti wanogoe kite ? Eu noa ki
nia, eu naga, loro. Go e noa ki da, 52
e naga, Nalakena tea wanogoe sara
tea midiri waina eu pei tea vasapisei-
kiana namarakiana ni nakoroatelagi
maga eu dakiusi naatamoli sikai
waina e pei talakea ni nasuma, waina
e do dapelua pae store aneana naleo
vau maga go naleo tuai maga.
Go e pakilina, ragi waina Yesu e 53
pasa sua naluluakia maga wanogoe,
naga e meludua ki tokora wanogoe
pano. Go e umai paki navanua 54
aneana po pasapisei ki da ekopu
ni nasuma ni nasaisaiana adeada,


dapala waina eu saramakoto asa, po
naga, Naatamoli waia e peani na
manumatuaana waia, go nawosiana
kasua maga waia eu pae esava ?
55 Tea waia e da pei mataisau natuna
kite ? pilana e da pei tea sosoana
ki Maria kite % go taina maga,
Yakob, go Yosef, go Simon, go
56 Yuda kite ? Go gorena maga,
eu da mamu puti sikoti gida doko
kite ? Go naatamoli waia e peani
tea maga waia eu pae esava ?
57 Go eu dapilagona nalo kakana.
Ma Yesu e noa ki da, e naga,
Perofeta sikai e da dika nadodo-
madaganiana mau, ma e dika asa
navanua aneana, go nasuma aneana
58 sikida. Go e da mari nawosiana
kasua lapa tokora wanogoe mau
nalakena eu da saralomau mau.
Matele 14.
1 Ragi wanogoe Herod tetrarke e
dogo narogorogoana nalo ni Yesu,
2 go e noa ki tea suasua aneana maga,
e naga. Tea wanogoe e pei Yoane tea
Bapetizo ; nae e po duleana meludua
ki tea mate maga ; go nalakena tea
wanogoe tea kasua maga wanogoe
3eu do posiwosi asa. Nalakena
Herod e puati Yoane, po soli a, po
doropusi a e doko ekopu ni nasuma
ninavavaigoroana nalakena Herodia,
4 nagoroi ki taina Filipo. Nalakena
Yoane e do noa ki nia, e naga, B da
pae nawotaeana mau naga pa veani
sa. Go ragi waina e masauna naga
ega maripunue a, e matau ki taua
ni naatamoli maga, nalakena eu
. midoa ki nia naga nae e pei perofeta
6 sikai. Ma ragi waina naaleatia ni
navakilinaana ki Herod e umai,
Herodia natuna nagoroi e sale inale-
oputo kakada, go Herod e midoa ki
7 matakinia. Nalakena tea wanogoe
e sai paki nia pilake navivisaana
, sikai naga ega tua e tea waina e pe
wo tatago asa. Go nae, waina e pei 8
tea tigotigoana pae pilana, e naga,
Pa tua au nea ega toko plete warua
sikai napau ni Yoane tea Bapetizo.
Go nawota e susue asa ; ma na 9
lakena navivisaana aneana maga,
go tea maga waina eu kere one gani-
kani sikoti a, e pitipaki naga ega vei
tea vituakiana ; go e dipakilua, po 10
dakotovi napau ni Yoane ekopu ni
nasuma ni navavaigoroana. Go 11
napauna e pei tea tapeana umai e
doko plete warua sikai, po pei tea
vituakiana paki koroi kiki wanogoe :
go e dape a pano dua pilana asa. Go 12
tea vasapiseikiana aneana maga eu
rumai po dape-dakati-lua napato-
kona, po ova ki nia ; go eu pano
po dogorogo ki nia paki Yesu.
Go ragi waina Yesu e dogo e, e 13
meludua ki tokora wanogoe pano
pae rarua sikai, po masikina paki
masopalo sikai: go ragi waina taua
maga ni naatamoli maga eu dogo e,
eu dausi a eu surata pae natokoana
maga. Go e duasai pakilina, po 14
punusi taua warua sikai ni naata
fnoli maga, go e maritadodomi ra, go
e maripauri tea sasana adeada maga.
Go ragi waina e po pei ragi melu, tea 15
vasapiseikiana maga eu rumai pu-
nusi a, eu naga, Tokora waia e pei
masopalo, go naaleatia e po pano
sua ; pa tapera ki taua maga ni
naatamoli maga, naga euga vaki
natokoana kiki maga, po duinada
madeada pakotovi navinaga. Ma 16
Yesu e noa ki da, e naga, Nalakena
naga euga vano e dika ; nimu kuga
tua ra euga kanikani. Go eu noa ki 17
nia, eu naga, Am, dikanavinagatokora
waia, bred elima mau go naika edua
mau eu doko. Go e naga, Kuga 18
tape ra umai dua au ara. Go e dipa 19
ki taua maga ni naatamoli maga
naga euga kere one namenau ; go e
dape bred lima go naika dua wano-
goe, po leo sake paki nakoroatelagi,
po pasamataki, po dovaporae po dua


tea vasapiseikiana maga bred maga
wanogoe, go tea vasapiseikiana maga
eu dua taua maga ni naatamoli maga
20 ara. Go eu mamau puti ganikani,
po puka: go eu pilae tea waina e
dupele ni matele maga, po pai a e
pei nala rualima sikai tamate dua eu
21 pura puti. Go tea maga waina eu
ganikani eu pei naanoai eu alagoro
pei manu lima, masale ki nagoroi
maga go piakirikiri maga.
22 Go e maraverave pasadie tea vasa-
piseikiana maga naga euga vagi
rarua, go naga euga vea ki nia pano
paki taleva kerua, pa pa ega tapera
ki taua maga ni naatamoli maga.
23 Go ragi waina e dapera ki sua
taua maga ni naatamoli maga, e
sake paki tava e sikina naga ega
tapasavasa : go ragi waina e maligo,
24 e sikina doko tokora wanogoe. Ma
rarua e doko sua maleoputo ni
natasi, go napeao maga eu mari a e
datasoki po pakavakiei; nalakena
25 nalagi e sau pae kivea. Go nava-
vaigoroana kevati ni napogiana e
pano punusi ra asa, e surata natasi.
26 Go ragi waina tea vasapiseikiana
maga eu punusi a e surata natasi,
eu manaunau, po naga, E pei na-
atana sikai; go eu pioso ki nama-
-27 takuana. Ma Yesu e pasa ki da
maraverave, e naga,Kuga marasike;
e pei kinau ; kuga ta mataku mau.
28 Go Petero e pasadara po naga,
Nawota, e pe vei nigo, pa dipa ki
nau naga aga valoti punusi ko noai
29 maga. Go e naga, Pa umai, Go
Petero e siwo meludua ki rarua, po
surata noai maga naga ega umai
30 punusi Yesu. Ma ragi waina e
punusi nalagi, e mataku ; go e pae
asa diro, po pioso, po naga, Nawota,
31 pa mautipauri au. Go Yesu e sai ki
namelearuna maraverave, po puati
a, po noa ki nia, e naga. Tea sara-
lomau kiki, ekasana ku midoa-
-32 kisara ? Go ragi waina nara
ero pagi sua rarua, nalagi e maro.
Go tea maga waina eu doko rarna 33
eu lotu ki nia, eu naga, Lomau ku
pei Supe Natuna.
Go ragi waina eu duagoto sua, eu 34
rumai paki navanua, paki Cenne-
saret. Go ragi waina naatamoli 35
maga ni tokora wanogoe eu leoatae
a, eu dipakilua paki navanua wano-
goe mamau daliviri, po piragi puti
tea sasana maga eu rumai punusi a ;
go eu pavarani a naga euga kisidogo 36
narepu ni sugoro aneana: go tea
maga waina eu kisidogo eu pei tea
mariana eu pia lua.
Matele 15,
Ragi wanogoe Farisi seara go tea 1
midiri seara eu pae Yerusalem umai
punusi a, eu naga, Ekasana tea vasa- 2
piseikiana anigo maga eu dapiri na
vasana vituakiana ki tea ni tagona
tuai maga ? nalakena eu da pavano
ki nameleaduda maga mau ragi
waina eu naga euga kani navinaga.
Go e pasadara po noa ki da, e naga, 3
Ekasana nimu ma, ku dapiri natipa-
kiana ki Supe nalakena navasaana
vituakiana animu ? Nalakena Supe 4
e naga, Pa dodomadagani tamama
go pilama : go tea waina e pasasa ki
tamana kite pilana, ega mate ki
namateana kakana. Ma nimu ku 5
naga, Naata waina e pe noa ki
tamana kite pilana, e pe naga, Tea
wainh ku pe vei tea silaeana asa pae
au e pei navituaana sikai paki Supe ;

mau. Go ku mari navasaana ki

saana vituakiana animu. Nakalcpo 7

kakamu, e naga,

ki nagoleda maga :
Ma napopoda e madu uvea ki
Ma eu lotu ki palo ki nau. 9


Eu do pasapisei ki navasapisei-
kiana waina eu pei natipakiana
maga ki naatamoli maga.
10 Go e soso taua ni naatamoli maga
eu rumai punusi a, go e noa ki da, e
naga, Kuga rogo, po midoakiatae:
11 Tea waina e sili paid nawokana e da
mari naatamoli e loa, mau ; ma tea
waina e dave meludua ki nawokana,
tea wanogoe e mari naatamoli e loa.
12 Ragi wanogoe tea vasapiseikiana
maga eu rumai, po noa ki nia, eu
naga, Ku atae naga Farisi maga eu
dapilagona ragi waina eu dogo na
13 vasaana wanogoe kite % Ma e pasa
dara po naga, Sara tea lawoana,
waina Tamagu ni nakoroatelagi e da
lawo ra mau, euga wo pei tea vaku-
-14 dakatiana. Kuga toropusi ra euga
madoko: eu pei tea maraki kesa
maga pae napua. Go tea kesa epe
maraki tea kesa, ero pe wo dua dowo
15 paki morutano sikai. Go Petero e
pasadara po noa ki nia, e naga, Pa
noakipotae garni naluluakia wa-
-16 nogoe. Go e naga, Nimu ma ku ko
17 pei tea midoakisapo kite ? Ku da
midoakiatae mau naga sara naleo
waina eu sili paki nawoka ni naata
moli eu paki napelena pano s po moro
18 melu paki etaku ? Ma tea maga
waina eu dave nawokana pano eu
pae napopona umai; go nara eu
19 mari naatamoli e loa. Nalakena tea
maga waia eu pae napopona, nami-
dodoana sa maga, namaripunueana
maga, namaripeleana ki tea vitawiri
go tea laki maga, namaripeleana ki
tea pota maga, navanakoana maga,
nanoasokisokiana sorosoro maga,
20 navasasakiana maga : tea maga wa-
nogoe eu pei tea maga waina eu mari
naatamoli e loa : ma 'naatamoli e pe
kanikani go e pe ta pea pavano ki
namelearuna maga mau e pe ta loa
asa mau.
21 Go Yesu e dave meludua ki tokora
wanogoe, po melu paki tokora maga
22 ni Tair go Sidon pano. Go kuga
leo, nagoroi ni Kanaan sikai e dave
pae kokoi maga wanogoe umai, po
pioso, e naga, Nawota 0, natu ni
David, pa dodomi au; natugu
nagoroi e pei dimon pa te pa sa. Ma 23
e da pasadara e te navasaana sikai
mau. Go tea vasapiseikiana aneana
maga eu rumai po pavarani a, eu
naga, Pa tipakilua e; nalakena edo
pioso dausi gida. Ma e pasadara po 24
naga, A pei tea tipakiluaana umai
punusi shiip sasapo ni nasuma
ni Israel eu sikida. Ma e umai po 25
lotu ki nia, po naga, Nawota, pa
silae au. Ma e pasadara po naga, E 26
da pia mau naga euga tape navinaga
ki piakirikiri maga po nadi ki nia
dua koria maga asa. Ma e naga, 27
loro, Nawota, nalakena koria maga
ma eu do gani navero maga waina
eu pevera pae wede ki talakeada.
Ragi wanogoe Yesu e pasadara po 28
noa ki nia, e naga, Nagoroi 0, na
saralomauana anigo e parua, ega
manigo pei tea mariana ega tapala
waina ku masauna. Go natuna
nagoroi e pei tea maripauriana pae
aura wanogoe pa pa.
Go Yesu e meludua ki tokora 29
wanogoe pano, po umai paki mala-
digi ki natasi ni Calilea ; go e sake
paki tava pano, po dasake tokora
wanogoe. Go taua warua maga ni 30
naatamoli maga eu rumai punusi a,
eu piragi tea vei pito maga, tea kesa
maga, tea vei pusa maga, tea vei
gole maga, go tea pota lapa eu sikoti
ra umai, go eu doropusi ra pisari
namelena maga ; go e maripauri ra :
dapala waina taua ni naatamoli 31
maga eu maga, ragi waina eu punusi
tea vei pusa maga eu do pasa, tea vei
gole maga eu po pei tea mamau, go
tea vei pito maga eu do surata, go
tea kesa maga eu do leosai» go eu
samasamani Supe ki Israel.
Go Yesu e soso tea vasapiseikiana 32
aneana maga eu rumai punusi a, go
e naga, A maritadodomi taua ni


naatamoli maga, nalakena eu sikoti
sua au doko naaleatia dolu go eu da
peani te navatuna waina euga kani
a mau: go a da masauna mau
naga aga tapera ki da euga vali doko,
33 mase eu pe matekimala napua. Go
tea vasapiseikiana maga eu noa ki
nia, eu naga, Auga veani bred lapa
masopalo, dapala waina taua warua
ni naatamoli maga waia euga kani-
-34 kani po puka ega vae esava ? Go
Yesu e noa ki da, e naga, Ku peani
bred pisa ? Go eu naga Elarua, go
35 naikakirikiripisa maau. Goedipaki
taua ni naatamoli maga naga euga
36 to natano ; go e dape bred larua wa-
nogoe go naika maga wanogoe ; go e
dapasavasa dodomataki po dova
poraworae, po pitua paki tea vasa

kiana maga eu pitua paki taua maga
37 ni naatamoli maga. Go eu mamau
puti ganikani, po puka : go eu pilae

pai ra, eu pei nalasai larua eu pura
38 puti. Go tea maga waina eu gani-
kani eu pei naanoai manu pati,

-39 kiri maga. Go e dapera ki taua

Matele 16
1 Go Farisi maga go Sadduki maga
eu rumai po maridogo e, po data-
govi a naga ega visei ki da navai-
vaiana sikai ega vae nakoroatelagi
2 umai. Ma e pasadara po noa ki
da, e naga, Ragi waina e po pei
ragi melu ku naga, Elo ega wo dara :
nalakena nakoroatelagi e miala.
3 Go malipogi, ku naga, Usa ega wo
powo masoso; nalakena nakoro-
atelagi e miala loa. Ku leopotae
atae narae ni nakoroatelagi; ma
ku da leopotae atae navaivaiana
4 maga ni ragi maga mau. Tagona
sa go maripele eu datago navaivai-
ana sikai; go te navaivaiana sikai
ega wo da pei tea vituakiana paki
da mau, ma navaivaiana ni Yonali
ega sikina. Go e doropusi ra eu
madoko, po pano.
Go tea vasapiseikiana maga eu 5
rumai paki taleva kerua ni elau,
po malio ki natape-bred maga-ana.
Go Yesu e noa ki da, e naga. Kuga 6
vunusi po matamatua ki leven ki
Farisi maga go ki Sadduki maga.
Go eu durnada pusuinaki paki da, 7
po naga, Nalakena tu da dape te
bred seara mau. Go Yesu e atae 8
a po naga, Tea saralomau kiki maga,
ekasana ku dumamu pusuinaki
paki mu nalakena ku da peani te
bred seara mau ? Ku ko da midoa- 9
kiatae mau, po da midoa ki bred,
lima ni manu lima, go nala pisa
waina ku dape dakati ra ? go bred 1(
larua ni manu pati, go nalasai pisa
waina ku dape dakati ra ? Ekasana 1]
ku da midoakiatae mau naga
a da pasa ki mu nalo ni bred maga
mau ? Ma kuga matamatua ki
leven ki Farisi maga go ki Sadduki
maga. Ragi wanogoe eu midoa- 12
kiatae naga e da noa naga euga
matamatua ki leven ni bred maga
mau, ma naga euga matamatua ki
navasapiseikiana ki Farisi maga
go ki Sadduki maga.
Go ragi waina Yesu e umai paki 13
tokora maga ni Kaisarea Filippi, e
pusuusu paki tea vasapiseikiana
aneana maga, po naga, Naatamoli
maga eu noa naga naatamoli
Natuna e pei sei ? Go eu naga,
Te seara eu naga, Yoane tea Rape- 14
tizo ; te seara, Elijah : go tea pota
seara, Yeremiah, kite perofeta maga
sikai kakada. E noa ki da, e naga, 15
Ma nimu ku noa naga kinau a pei
sei ? Go Simon Petero e pasadara 16
po naga, Nigo ku pei Kristo, Natu
niSupemauri. Go Yesu e pasadara 17
po noa ki nia, e naga, Ku maro pa


Simon Bar-Yonah ; nalakena na
pokasi go nada ero da maripakasa
ki nia paki-go man, ma Tamagu
waina e doko nakoroatelaga maga
18 e mari a. Go kinau ma a noa ki-go,
naga nigo ku pei Petero, go vatu
laketoko wanogoe aga wo davagi
ekalesia aginau asa; go namata
pua maga ni Hades euga wo da
19 marimatua ki nia man. Aga wo
dua ko kii maga ni namarakiana
ni nakoroatelagi maga: go tea
waina pa wo solisoki a maramana
ega wo pei tea solisokiana nakoro-
atelagi maga : go tea waina pa wo
peresi a maramana ega wo pei
tea veresiana nakoroatelagi maga.
20 Ragi wanogoe e pasa parati ki tea
vasapiseikiana maga naga euga ta
noa kite naata mau naga nae e
pei Kristo.
21 Pae ragi wanogoe Yesu e atulake
naga ega visei ki tea vasapiseikiana
aneana maga, naga e one asa one
naga ega vaki Yerusalem pano, go
naga ega sua narogokitesaana lapa
pae tea matua maga go tea viri
warua maga go tea midiri maga, go
naga ega vei tea maripunueana, go
naga ega vei tea sikeana ega tuleana
22 naaleatia ketolu. Go Petero e puati
a, po atulake naga ega vasakasua ki
nia, po naga, Supe ega dodomi ko,
Nawota: tea wanogoe ega wo da
23 pakilina ki-go mau. Ma e dumana
doa e, po noa ki Petero, e naga, Pa
vaki natakugu pano, Satan, ku
, pei tea tapilagonaana aginau : na
lakena ku da midoa ki mata ki naleo
maga ki Supe mau, ma ku midoa
ki mata ki naleo maga ki naatamoli
24 maga. Ragi wanogoe Yesu e noa
ki tea vasapiseikiana aneana maga,
e naga, Te naata e pe masauna naga
ega edakugoro an umai, ega tuniana
pasagoro e, go ega tape dakati tea
valadagoto aneana, go ega rausi
25 au. Nalakena naata waina e pe
masauna naga ega mautipauri na
NGUNA-TONGOAN N.T.
mauriana aneana ega wo dape puoli
ki nia : go naata waina e pe wo
dape puoli ki namauriana aneana
nalakena kinau ega wo papai a.
Nalakena naatamoli sikai e pe 26
wo dalua maramana mamau, ma e
pe wo dape puoli ki namauriana
aneana, e pe wo pei tea silaeana
asa nasava ? kite naatamoli sikai
ega wo pitua ki nasava naga ega
taulua namauriana aneana asa.
Nalakena naatamoli Natuna ega 27
wo umai pilake nasamasamaana ki
Tamana nara ma agelo aneana maga
euga wo mamau umai; go ragi wa
nogoe ega wo lagati dua sara naata
rnoli euga sikasikai ega vae namari-
ana adeada. Lomau a noa ki mu, 28
naga Tea maga waina eu lawodu
nea te seara kakada eu doko, waina
euga wo da katidogo namateana
mau, pa pa euga wo punusi naata
rnoli Natuna ega to umai namara-
kiana aneana.
Matele 17.
Go edaku ki naaleatia latesa 1
Yesu e piragilua Petero, go Yakobo,
go taina Yoane, po piragi ra sake
pano paki tava varau pakilagi
sikai eu pei nara mau : go e pano 2
pota naraeda ; go naraena e mara-
malaga dapala elo, go sugoro aneana
maga eu dare dapala namarama.
Go kuga leo, Moses go Elijah ero 3
pakilina ki da ero pasa ki nia, nara
ma nae eu dumada pasa paki da. Go 4
Petero e pasadara, po noa ki Yesu,
e naga, Nawota, e pia naga tuga toko
nea : ku pe masauna, a pe wo mari
tapaupaueu pe tolu nea; anigo sikai,
go agi Moses sikai, go agi Elijah
sikai. Ragi waina e ko do pasa, 5
kuga leo, napopouru marama sikai
e melugoro ra: go, kuga leo,
nadaleo sikai waina e dave napo-
pouru wanogoe umai, e naga, Tea
waia e pei Natugu tea dodomiana


aginau, waina a midoa ki mata
6ki nia; kuga to dogo e. Go ragi
waina tea vasapiseikiana maga eu
dogo e, eu dowo dapolosiwo, po
7 mataku parua. Go Yesu e umai
po kisidogo ra, po naga, Kuga
tuleana, go kuga ta mataku mau.
8 Go ragi waina eu sike namatada
maga eu da punusi te naata mau, ma
Yesu e sikina.
9 Go ragi waina eu do siwo pae
tava umai, Yesu e pasa parati ki
da, po naga, Kuga ta noa kite
naata navunusiana waina mau, pa
pa naatamoli Natuna ega wo du
leana meludua ki tea mate maga.
10 Go tea vasapiseikiana maga eu
pusuusu paki nia, eu naga, Go eka-
sana tea midiri maga eu noa naga
e one Elijah one naga ega sopua
11 umai ? Go e pasadara po naga,
Elijah ega wo umai lomau, go ega
wo dape liliua ki naleo maga mamau
12 puti: ma a noa ki mu, naga Elijah
e umai sua, go eu da atae mata ki
nia mau, ma eu mari paki nia tea
maga waina eu masauna. Dapala
nogoe naatamoli Natuna ma ega
wo sua narogokitesaana pae ara.
13 Eagi wanogoe tea vasapiseikiana
maga eu midoakiatae naga e pasa
ki da nalo ni Yoane tea Bapetizo.
14 Go ragi waina eu rumai paki taua
ni naatamoli maga, naatamoli sikai
e umai punusi a, e ditipatua paki
15 nia, po naga, Nawota, pa dodomi
natugu naanoai: nalakena e doropa,
po sua narogokitesaana warua asa :
nalakena e paka lapa dowo paki
nakapu, go e paka lapa dowo paki
16 noai. Go a piragi a umai punusi
tea vasapiseikiana anigo maga, go
17 eu marisapo maripauri a. Go Yesu
e pasadara po naga, Tagona 0
waina ku da saralomau mau go
waina ku do marilolo pota, aga wo
sikoti mu doko pa pa paki seve
ragi ? aga wo sold mu pa pa paki
seve ragi ? Kuga viragi a umai
paki nea punusi au. Go Yesu elB
pasa kasua ki nia; go dimon e
dave meludua ki nia pano: go
piakiki naanoai wanogoe e pei tea
maripauriana pae aura wanogoe
pa pa. Eagi wanogoe tea vasa- 19
piseikiana maga eu rumai punusi
Yesu eu pei nara mau, po naga,
Kinami au marisapo mari a e
dave pano nalakena nasava ? Go 20
e noa ki da, e naga, Nalakena
nasaralomau-kiki-ana animu: na
lakena lomau a noa ki mu, naga
Ku pe veani nasaralomauana tapala
napati ni sinapi sikai, ku pe wo
noa ki tava waia, leu pe wo naga,
Pa meludua ki tokora waia paki
tokora wanana pano ; go e pe wo
fnelu pano; go ku pe wo da mari-
sapo mari te navatuna mau. [Ma
ku pe ta dapasavasa po da pali mau 21
tea tapala waia eu pe ta dave pano
mau.]
Go ragi waina eu doko Calilea 22
doko, Yesu e noa ki da, e naga,
Naatamoli Natuna ega wo pei tea
vituakiana paki namelearu maga ni
naatamoli maga ; go euga wo mari- 23
punue a, go naaleatia ketolu ega
wo pei tea sikeana ega wo duleana
asa. Go eu susue parua.
Go ragi waina eu rumai paki 24
Kapernaum, tea maga waina eu
dape shekel namagovai eu rumai
punusi Petero, po naga, Tea vasa-
piseiki animu e pitua ki shekel
namagovai kite ? E naga, loro. 25
Go ragi waina e umai paki ekopu
ni nasuma, Yesu e sopua pasa ki
nia, e naga, Ku midoa ki nasava,
Simon ? Nawota maga ni mara-
mana eu dape nasautoga kite keneso
ki sei maga ? ki natuda maga, kite
ki tea pota maga ? Go ragi waina 26
e naga, Ki tea pota maga, Yesu
e noa ki nia, e naga, Nalakena tea
wanogoe natuda maga eu madoko. N
Ma naga tuga ta mari ra euga tapi- 27
lagona mau, pa vaki uatasi, po uadi


Id tagau sikai, po dape dakati naika
waina ega wo pea sake; go ragi
waina pa wo polagati nawokana,
pa wo papai shekel sikai asa : pa
tape tea wanogoe, po maginau go
manigo dua ra asa.
Matele 18,
1 Aura wanogoe tea vasapiseikiana
maga eu rumai punusi Yesu, po
naga, Sei e.pei tea warua liu na
marakiana ni nakoroatelagi maga ?
2 Go e soso piakiki kiki sikai e umai
punusi a, go e lawo ki nia fnaleo-
-3 puto kakada, po naga, Lomau a
noa ki mu, naga Ku pe ta mada-
doa mau, po da pei tea tapala pia-
kiki kiki maga mau, ku pe ta sili
paki namarakiana ni nakoroatelagi
4 maga mau. Nalakena tea wanogoe
naata waina ega wo dumana doro
e pakitano ega tapala piakiki kiki
waia, nae e pei tea warua liu nama-
rakiana ni nakoroatelagi maga.
5 Go naata waina e pe wo piragi pia-
kiki kiki sikai tapala waia pae
6 nagisagu e pe viragi au ; ma naata
waina e pe wo mari tea kirikiri
maga wanogoe waina eu saralomau
au sikai kakada e pe tapilagona, e
pe wia ki nia naga vatu ma warua
sikai e pe vei tea sarakiana nanoana,
go naga e pe vei tea tiroakiana
7 natasi pua. Ai ki maramana na
lakena tea tapilagonaana maga ! na
lakena namarikasuakiana e doko
naga tea tapilagonaana maga euga
umai; ma ai ki naatamoli waina
tea tapilagonaana e pae asa umai!
8 Go namelearuma kite namelema e
pe mari ko ku pe tapilagona, pa
takotovilua e, po nadi ki nia ega
meludua ki-go pano: e pia ki-go
naga pa sili paki namauriana ku
pei gole kite ku pei pito, ma e sa
ki-go naga pa veani namelearuma
dua kite namelema dua naga pa
vei- tea nadikiana paki nakapu
waina e du mau du. Go nama- 9
tafna e pe mari ko ku pe tapilagona,
pa vakulua e, po nadi ki nia ega
meludua ki-go pano : e pia ki-go
naga pa sili paki namauriana ku
pei mata sikai, ma e sa ki-go naga
pa veani namatama dua naga pa
vei tea nadikiana paki napaloa ni
nakapu. Kuga vunusi naga kuga 10

wanogoe sikai kakada mau ; nala-
kena a noa ki mu, naga agelo adeada
maga waina eu doko nakoroatelagi
maga eu do leopunusi narae ni
Tamagu waina e doko nakoroate-
lagi maga. [Nalakena naatamoli 11
