pauri tea waina e sasapo puoli.]
Ku midoa ki nasava ? naatamoli 12
sikai e pe veani shiip ponotia sikai,
go sikai kakada e pe surata sasapo,
e pe ta doropusi rualima loveti
tamate loveti eu pe toko tava maga,
go e pe ta pano po laga tea waina e
surata sasapo kite ? Go epe vaki 13
lina naga e pe vapai a, lomau a
noa ki mu, naga e pe laelaea parua
nalo kakana, ma e pe laelaea kiki
nalo ni tea rualima loveti tamate
loveti waina eu da surata sasapo '
mau. Dapala nogoe e da pei tea 14
masauana mau narae ni Tamamu
waina e doko nakoroatelagi maga,
naga tea kirikiri maga wanogoe
sikai kakada ega mate puoli.
Go taifha e pe mari naleo sa 15
dipa ko, pa vano, pa vasa ki nia asa
koroga rua mau: epe rogo parati
ki-go, ku pe talua taima. Ma epe 16
ta dogo parati ki-go mau, pa va
piragilua tea pota sikai kite ega

navasaana euga vei tea lawokiana
pae nawoka ni tea noasokisoki dua
kite dolu. Go epe karai naga ega 17
rogo parati ki da, pa noa ki ekalesia
asa : go e pe moro karai naga ega
rogo parati ki ekalesia, ega vei tea
tapala tea m nalauna pota go tea

noa ki mu, naga Naleo maga

Tamagu waina e doko nakoroate-
-20 lagi maga. Nalakena tokora waina
edua kite edolu eu saisai asa paki
nagisagu, a doko tokora wanogoe

noa ki nia, e naga, Nawota, taigu

paka pisa, go aga wo maneana
midoakikorokoro e ? ega va pa
22 paka larua kite. Yesu e noa ki
nia, e naga, A da noa ki-go mau,
naga, Ega va pa paka larua; ma
naga, Ega va pa paka rualima larua
23 paka larua. Nalakena tea wanogoe
namarakiana ni nakoroatelagi maga
e pei tea mariana e dakiusi naata
fnoli sikai waina e pei nawota, go
waina e masauna naga ega vuausi
namariana ki tea suasua aneana
24 maga. Go ragi waina e atulake
naga ega vuausi, sikai e pei tea
viragiana umai punusi a, waina
talento tivilia sikai eu one asa one.
25 Ma nalakena e dika tea waina ega
lagati a asa dua e, nawota aneana e
pitipaki naga ega vei tea soriana,
nae go anagoroi, go natuna maga,
go naleo maga mamau puti waina
e peani ra, go naga tea waina e one
asa one ega vei tea lagatipituakiana.
26 Nalakena tea wanogoe tea suasua
. wanogoe e dowo pakitano po lotu
ki nia, po naga, Nawota, pa vei
maritasoki paki nau, go aga wo
27 lagati puti a dua ko. Go nawota ki
tea suasua wanogoe e maritadodomi
a, po peresilua e, po maneana
midoakikorokoro tea waina e one
asa one. Ma tea suasua wanogoe 28
e dave pano, po papai tea sikai
ni tea maga waina eu mamau
pei tea suasua, waina denario ane-
ana ponotia sikai eu one asa one;
go e puati a, po liko namanuna, po
naga, Pa lagatipitua ki tea waina
e one ako one. Go tea suasua 29
kerua wanogoe e dowo pakitano po
pavarani a, po naga, Pa vei marita
sold paki nau, go aga wo lagati dua
ko. Go e karai: ma e pano po 30
nadi ki nia paki ekopu ni nasuma ni
navavaigoroana, pa pa ega lagati-
pitua ki tea waina e one asa one.
Ma ragi waina tea maga waina eu 31
mamau pei tea suasua eu punusi
tea maga waina eu pei tea mariana,
eu susue parua, go eu rumai po
noakisai nawota adeada tea maga
mamau puti waina eu pei tea mari-
ana. Ragi wanogoe nawota ane- 32
ana e soso e umai punusi a, po noa
ki nia, e naga, Tea suasua sigisigileo,
a manigo midoakikorokoro puti
tea maga waina eu one ako one,
nalakena ku pavarani au asa : e da 33
one ako one naga pa dodomi tea
waina koro dua pei tea suasua, ega
tapala waina kinau a dodomi ke
kite ? Go nawota aneana e maeto, 34
po pitua ki nia paki tea varati
maga, pa pa ega lagati pitua ki
tea mamau waina e one asa one.
Dapala nogoe Tamagu ma ni na 35
koroatelagi ega wo mari paki mu,
ku pe ta midoakikorokoro mau
sara naata kakamu sikasikai magi
taida pae napopmu maga.
Matele 19.
Go e pakilina ragi waina Yesu e 1

naga e fneludua ki Calilea pano, po
umai paki kokoi maga ni Yudea

warua maga ni naatamoli maga eu

wanogoe.

a, eu maridogo e, po naga, E pae
nawotaiana naga naatamoli sikai ega

po naga, Ku da peve mau, naga tea

pa pa e mari ra ero pei naanoai go

doko, go ega vuluti anagoroi; go
nara dua eroga wo pei napokasi sikai
6 maau ? Nalakena tea wanogoe ero
da moro pei edua mau, ma ero pei
napokasi sikai maau. Nalakena
tea wanogoe tea waina Supe e pila-
sai ki nia, naatamoli ega ta mari a
7 ega vamawota mau. Eu noa ki nia,
eu naga, Go ekasana Moses e piti-
paki naga euga vitua ki tusi sikai ni
8 natoropusiana, po dipakilua e. E
noa kida, e naga, Moses nalakena na

ana paki da eu sikida dape atae a.
12 Nalakena te atavau seara eu doko,
waina eu pakilina dapala nogoe pae
napele ni pilada: go te atavau
seara eu doko, waina naatamoli
maga eu mari ra eu pei atavau :
go te atavau seara eu doko,
waina eu duinada mari ra eu
pei atavau nalakena namarakiana
ni nakoroatelagi maga. Naata
waina e mariatae dape a ega
tape a.
Ragi wanogoe piakirikiri kiki 13
maga eu pei tea viragiana umai
punusi a, naga ega toropusi namele-
aruna maga ara, po dapasavasa:
go tea vasapiseikiana maga eu
pasakasua ki da asa. Ma Yesu el 4
naga, Kuga suasua ki piakirikiri
kiki maga naga euga umai punusi
au, go kuga ta dipagoro ra mau:
nalakena namarakiana ni nakoro-
atelagi maga e pei tea ni tea tapa-
lada maga. Go e doropusi nafnele- 15
aruna maga ara, po meludua ki
tokora wanogoe pano.

a po naga, Tea vasapiseiki, aga
mari naleo wia nasava, naga aga
veani namauriana waina ega tu
mau du ? Go e noa ki nia, e naga, 17

ni tea waina e pia ? Sikai e doko
waina e pia: ma ku pe masauna
naga pa sili paki namauriana, pa
rogo parati ki natipakiana maga.

mau, Pa ta maripele mau, Pa ta

tamama go pilaina : go, Pa dodomi

waina ku dumama dodomi ko.

naga, A pavaigoro tea maga mamau
puti wanogoe : a ko dika nasava ?

Matele 20.
Nalakena namarakiana ni na 1
koroatelagi maga e dakiusi naata-
moli sikai waina e pei talakea ni
nasuina, waina e dave pano ragi ni
namakotokotoaria, naga ega vasa-
dapui tea wosiwosi maga paki roara
ni vaine aneana. Go ragi waina 2
nae go tea wosiwosi maga eu ma-
mau noa naga namoriana adeada
ega vei denario sikai naaleatia
sikai, e dipakilua ra paki roara ni
vaine aneana. Go e dave pano e 3
alagoro pei aura ketolu, po punusi
tea pota seara eu lawodu inoli du
malo ni navakokotoana; go e noa 4
ki da, e naga, Nimu ma kuga vaki
roara ni vaine pano, go tea waina
e pe leana a pe wo dua mu asa.
Go eu pano. E moro dave pano 5
e alagoro pei aura kelatesa go aura
keloveti, go e mari dapala nogoe.
Go e dave pano e alagoro pei aura 6
kerualima sikai tamate sikai, go e
pa pai tea pota seara eu lawodu; go
e noa ki da, e naga, Ekasana ku
lawodu moli du tokora waia naale-
atia mamau ? Eu noa ki nia, ew 1
naga, Nalakena te naata sikai e
da pasadapui garni mau. E noa
ki da, e naga, Nimu ma kuga vaki
roara ni vaine pano. Go ragi waina 8
e po maligo, talakea ni roara ni
vaine e noa ki tasiga aneana, e
naga, -Pa soso tea wosiwosi maga, go
pa tua ra nkmoriana adeada, pa
atulake pae tea edaku maga pa pa
paki tea vea maga. Go ragi waina 9
tea ni aura kerualima sikai tamate
sikai eu rumai, eu dape denario sika-
sikai sarasara ra. Go ragi waina 10
tea vea maga eu rumai, eu midoa
ki nia naga euga tape ega warua
rua; go nara ma eu dape denario
sikasikai sarasara ra. Go ragi 11
waina eu dape a eu dauruuru
dipa talakea ni nasuina, eu naga,
Tea edaku maga waia eu posiwosi 12


aura sikai maau, go ku mari ra eu
pataka garni, waina au posiwosi
naaleatia mamau go elo e dara garni.

20 Ragi wanogoe Zebedaio natuna
maga pilada e umai punusi a, nara
ma natuna maga eu mamau umai,
e lotu ki nia, po datagovi a kite
21 navatuna sikai. Go e noa ki nia,
e naga, Ku masau nasava ? E noa
ki nia, e naga, Pa vitipaki naga
natugu dua waia, sikai ega tasake
pisari namelearuma ni matua, go
sikai ega tasake pisari namelearuma
22 ni mawiri, nstmarakiana anigo. Ma
Yesu e pasadara po naga, Koro da
atae tea waina koro datago asa
mau. Koro mariatae munu lasa
munu waina kinau aga wo munugi
a kite 1 Ero noa ki nia, era naga,
Aro mariatae. E noa ki da, e naga, 23
Lasa munu aginau koroga wo
munugi a lomau : ma naga koroga
tasake pisari namelearugu ni matua,
go pisari namelearugu ni mawiri, e
da pei aginau naga aga vitua ki nia
mau, ma e pei agi tea maga waina e
madeada pei tea tawanakiana pae
Tamagu. Go ragi waina tea rua- 24
lima sikai eu dogo e, eu maeto
parua nalo ni taida dua wanogoe.
Ma Yesu e soso ra umai punusi a, 25
po naga, Ku atae naga tea maraki
maga ni nalauna pota maga eu
maraki kasua ki da, go tea warua
maga eu mari naveinawotaana da-
pau ra. Ega wo da dapala nogoe 26
maleoputo kakamu mau ; ma naata
waina e pe masauna naga ega vei
tea warua ni maleoputo kakamu
e pe wo pei tea suasua animu ; go 27
naata waina e pe masauna naga ega
vei tea vea ni maleoputo kakamu
e pe wo pei naviti animu : ega 28
tapala waina naatamoli Natuna e
da umai naga euga maneana suasua
mau, ma e umai naga ega madeada
suasua, go naga ega vitua ki namau-
riana aneana ega vei naulu ni natau-.
luaana magi tea lapa.
Go ragi waina eu surata melu 29
dua ki Yeriko pano, taua warua
sikai ni naatamoli maga eu dausi a.
Go kuga leo, naatamoli kesa dua 30
waina ero do natano pisari narigi ni
napua, ragi waina ero dogo naga
Yesu e do liu ra pano, ero pioso, po
naga, Nawota, pa dodomi garni,
natu ni David. Go taua ni naata 31
moli maga eu pasa kasua ki da,
naga eroga vunuta: ma ero moro
pioso parua liu po naga, Nawota,
pa dodomi garni, natu ni David.
Go Yesu e du dorogo, po soso ra, 32
po naga, Koro masauna naga aga
manimu mari nasava ? Ero noa ki 33
nia, ero naga, Nawota, naga nama-
tagami euga vei tea wolagatiana.


34 Go Yesu e maritadodomi ra, po
kisidogo namatada maga: go ero
moro leosai maraverave, po dausi a
pano.
Matele 21.
1 Go ragi waina eu rumai paki
fnaladigi ki Yerusalem, po umai

e naga,

7 e dip a ki da asa, ero piragi ass, go ass
natuna umai, po sawa ki sugoro

8 asa. Go taua ni naatainoli maga
tea lapa kakada eu pelesa ki sugoro
adeada maga napua ; go tea pota
seara eu daelua arii maga meludua
ki nakau maga, po pelesa ki da
9 napua. Go taua maga ni naata
moli maga waina eu pea ki nia,
go waina eu dausi a, eu pioso,
eu naga, Hosanna ki natu ni
David: Tea waina e umai pae
nagisa ni Yehovah e pei tea vasa-
giakiana; Hosanna tokora maga
ni elagi mau. Go ragi waina nae elO
umai sili Yerusalem, natokoana
mamau eu pari asa, po naga, Tea
waia e pei sei ? Go taua maga ni 11
naatainoli maga eu naga, Tea waia
e pei perofeta, Yesu, waina e pae
Nazareth ni Calilea umai.
Go Yesu e paki roara ni nasufna 12
tapu ki Supe, po kopasi paki etaku
tea maga mamau puti waina eu
do sorisori po pakokoto roara ni
nasufna tapu, go e dapolosiwo ki
wede maga ki tea maga waina eu
surupioli ki mone, go malo tasake
maga ki tea maga waina eu sori
tokopea maga; go e noa ki da, 13
e naga, E pei tea midiriana, naga
Nasufna aginau ega wo pei tea
sosoana ki nasufna ni natapasa-
vasaana: ma nimu ku do mari a e
pei valea sikai ki tea tapepavakoto
maga. Go tea kesa maga go tea 14
vei pito maga eu rumai punusi a
roara ni nasufna tapu: go e mari-
pauri ra. Ma ragi waina tea viri 15
warua maga go tea midiri maga eu
punusi tea ni namagaana maga
waina e mari ra, go piakirikiri maga
waina eu do pioso roara ni nasufna
tapu po naga, Hosanna ki natu ni
David ; eu maeto parua, po noa ki 16
nia, eu naga, Ku dogo tea waina
nara eu noa e kite ? Go Yesu e
noa ki da, e naga, loro: ku ko da
peve, naga Ku mari nasamasamani-
ana wia e dave nawoka ni pipia
maga go tea susu maga kite ? Go 17
e doropusi ra eu madoko, po dave
paki etaku ni natokoana paki
Bethania pano, go e menaki tokora
wanogoe.
Go malipogi ki nia ragi waina e 18
do liliu paki natokoana, e pitolo.
Go e punusi napuliva sikai nadigi 19
ni napau, po umai paid asa, po da
papai te navatuna asa mau, ma
nauluna maga eu sikida ; go e noa
ki nia, e naga, Te nawafha ega ta
moro pakilina melu ako mau pa


pa ega tu mau du. Go napuliva
20 wanogoe e kokolo maraverave. Go
ragi waina tea vasapiseikiana maga
eu punusi a, eu maga, po naga,
Napuliva e kokolo maraverave da-
-21 pale sava ? Go Yesu e pasadarapo
noa ki da, e naga, Lomau a noa ki
mu, naga Ku pe veani nasara-
lomauana, po da midoakisara mau,
ku pe wo mari tea ni napuliva
ega ta sikina mau, ma ku pe
noa ki tava waia, ku pe naga, Pa
vei tea tape-dakati-ana po pei tea
nadikiana paid natasi, e pe wo pei
22 tea mariana. Go naleo maga ma-
mau puti waina ku pe wo datago
ara natapasavasaana, ku pe sara-
lomau, ku pe wo dape ra.
23 Go ragi waina e umai sua paki
roara ni nasuina tapu, tea viri
warua maga go tea matua maga
ni narei eu rumai punusi a, ragi
waina e do pasapiseiki, go eu naga,
Ku mari tea maga waia pae
naveinawotaana nasava ? go sei e
dua ko naveinawotaana wanogoe ?
24 Go Yesu e pasadara po noa ki da,
e naga, Kinau ma aga vusuusu ki
navasaana sikai paki mu, waina ku
pe noa ki nau asa, kinau ma a pe
wo noa ki mu naveinawotaana
waina a mari tea maga waia asa.
25 Nabapetizoana ki Yoane, e pae
esava umai ? E pei tea ni na
koroatelagi kite tea ni naatamoli
maga ? Go eu dumada pusumaki
paki da, po naga, Tu pe naga, E
pei tea ni nakoroatelagi; epe wo
noa ki gida, e pe wo naga, Go ekasana
ku da saralomau navasaana aneana
26 mau ? Ma tu pe naga, E pei tea ni
naatamoli maga ; tu pe matau ki
taua ni naatamoli maga ; nalakena
eu mamau puti midoa ki nia naga
27 Yoane e pei perofeta sikai. Go
eu pasadara Yesu, po naga, Au da
atae a mau. Nae ma e noa ki da,
e naga, Go kinau a da noa ki mu
naveinawotaana waina a mari tea
maga waia asa. Ma ku midoa ki 28
nasava ? Naatamoli sikai e peani
natuna dua ; go e umai punusi tea
vea, po naga, Koto, pa va posiwosi
masoso roara ni vaine. Go e pasa- 29
dara po naga, Akarai: ma e edaku
midoakidoa, po pano. Go e umai 30
punusi kerua, po noa dapala nogoe.
Go e pasadara po naga, Kinau,
nawota : go eda pano mau. Nara 31
dua sei kakada e mari namasauana
ki tamana ? Eu naga, Tea vea.
Yesu e noa ki da, e naga, Lomau a
noa ki mu, naga tea tape nasautoga
maga go nagoroi masausara maga
eu pea ki mu sili paki namarakiana
ki Supe. Nalakena Yoane e pae 32
napua ni namarinaleoleanaana umai
punusi mu, go ku da saralomau
navasaana aneana mau: ma tea
tape nasautoga maga go nagoroi
masausara maga eu saralomau asa :
go nimu ku punusi a, ma ku da
edaku midoakidoa mau naga kuga
saralomau asa.
Kuga rogo naluluakia pota sikai: 33
Naatamoli sikai e doko talakea ni
nasuina, waina e lawo roara ni vaine
sikai, po marigoro e ki nakoro ulua
sikai, po kill mom ni nasua ni nawa
ni vaine asa, po davagi nasuina
varau pakilagi sikai, po suasua ki
nia paki tea wosiwosi natano maga,
po paki navanua pota sikai pano.
Go ragi waina pauna rago ni nawa 34
ni nakau maga e pei maladigi, e dipa-
kilua tea suasua aneana maga eu
pano punusi tea wosiwosi natano
maga, naga euga tape nawa ni nakau
aneana maga. Go tea wosiwosi 35
natano maga eu puati tea suasua
aneana maga, po parati sikai, po
maripunue sikai, po nadi sikai ki
vatu. E moro dipakilua tea sua- 36
sua pota maga eu lapa liu tea vea
maga: go eu mari dapala nogoe
paki da. Ma e edaku dipakilua 37
natuna e pano punusi ra, e naga,
Buga wo dodomadagani natugu.


38 Ma tea wosiwosi natano maga, ragi
waina eu punusi natuna, eu dumada
noa ki da, eu naga, Tea waia e pei
tea veanipioli ki paumaso ni tamana;
kuga umai, tuga maripunue a, go
tuga veani tea veanipiolikiana ane-
-39 ana. Go eu puati a, po nadi ki nia
paki etaku ni roara ni vaine, po
40 maripunue a. Nalakena tea wa-
nogoe ragi waina talakea ni roara
ni vaine ega wo umai, ega wo mari
nasava paki tea wosiwosi natano
41 maga wanogoe ? Eu noa ki nia, eu
naga, Ega wo maripunue sa ki
naatamoli sa maga wanogoe, go ega
wo suasua ki roara ni vaine paki tea
wosiwosi natano pota maga, waina
euga wo dua e nawa ni nakau maga
ragi ni pauna rago kakada maga.

da peve te naaleatia navasaana

kite ?

leodoa e,

ni naweloki:

pakilina,
Go e pei tea ni namagaana
namatagida.

naga Namarakiana ki Supe ega wo
pei tea tapeluaana ki-amu, go ega

sikai waina ega wo dau ki nawa

mariporoworosi a e pe vei na
45 motainota. Go ragi waina tea viri

laga naga euga vuasoki a, eu matau

perofeta sikai.
Matele 22.
Go Yesu e pasadara po moro pasa 1
ki da pae naluluakia maga, e naga.
Namarakiana ni nakoroatelagi maga 2
e pei tea mariana e dakiusi nawota
sikai, waina e magi natuna naanoai
mari nakaniana ni navitawiriana
sikai, po dipakilua tea suasua aneana 3
maga naga euga soso tea maga waina
eu pei tea vitautauana paki nakani-
ana ni navitawiriana : go eu karai
umai. E moro dipakilua tea suasua 4
pota seara, po naga, Kuga noa kitea
maga waina eu pei tea vitautauana,
kuga naga, Kuga leo, a po mari
fnata ki nakaniana aginau: ox
aginau maga go tea vaganiana ma-
nopunopu aginau maga eu pei tea
maripunueana, go sara naleo eu
nopu : kuga umai paki nakaniana
ni navitawiriana. Ma eu sara tea 5
palo asa, po pano, sikai e paki vanua
aneana, go sikai e paki navako-
kotoana aneana : go tea pota maga 6
eu puasoki tea suasua aneana maga,
po mari sa ki da, po maripunue ra.
Ma nawota e maeto; go e dipakilua 7
taua maga ni naatamoli navakalo
aneana maga, po maripunuvunue tea
maripunue maga wanogoe, po tokoni
natokoana adeada. Ragi wanogoe 8
e noa ki tea suasua aneana maga, e
naga, navitawiriana e pei tea mari-
matakiana lomau, ma tea maga
waina eu pei tea vitautauana eu
da pia ki nia mau. Nalakena tea 9
wanogoe kuga vaki malo rana
maga ni napua maga, go tea maga
waina ■ kuga wo papai ra, kuga
vitautau ara paki nakaniana ni na
vitawiriana. Go tea suasua maga 10
wanogoe eu dave pano paki napua
maga, po piragi saisai ki tea
maga mamau puti waina eu papai
ra, tea sa maga go tea wia maga : go
navitawiriana e pura ki tea maga
waina eu kere one ganikani. Ma 11
ragi waina nawota e umai paki


ekopu naga ega leopunusi tea maga
waina eu kere one ganikani, e punusi
naatamoli sikai asa waina e da suni

noa ki nia, e naga, Tagu, ku umai
paki e kopu nea ragi waina ku dika
sugoro ni navitawiriana dapale
13 sava ? Go e punuta. Ragi wano-
goe nawota e noa ki tea suasua

ni uvea ; tokora wanogoe natagiana
go nakati-pati-ana eroga wo doko
14 asa. Nalakena tea lapa eu pei tea
vitautauana, ma tea visa maau eu
pei tea matadoaana.

pano, po seke dapala waina euga soli

wanogoe kuga tua Kaisar naleo
maga ki Kaisar ; go kuga tua Supe

eu dogo e, eu maga, po doropusi a e

23 Naaleatia wanogoe Sadduki seara
eu rumai asa punusi a, waina eu noa
naga namoroduleanaana e dika : go
eu pusuusu paki nia, po naga, Tea
vasapiseiki, Moses e naga, Te naata
e pe mate ragi waina e da peani te 24
natuna seara mau, taina ega viragi
anagori, p o magi taina marina worana
euga vakilina. Go tamataida larua 25
eu sikoti garni doko : go takalapa e
pitawiri po mate, go e dika nawo-
rana po magi taina ligiraki anagoroi;
dapala nogoe kerua ma, go ketolu, 26
pa pa paki kelarua. Go edaku ki 27
puti ra nagoroi wanogoe e mate.
Nalakena tea wanogoe ragi ni na 28
moroduleanaana nae ega wo pei na
goroi ki sei ni tea larua wanogoe ?
nalakena eu mamau puti peani a.
Ma Yesu e pasadara po noa ki da, e 29
naga, Ku midoakipele, nalakena ku
da atae navasaana midiriana maga
mau, go nakasuaana ki Supe mau.
Nalakena ragi ni namoroduleanaana 30
eu da pitawiri mau, go eu da pei tea
vituakiana eu laki mau, ma eu
dapala agelo maga waina eu doko
nakoroatelagi. Ma nalo ni namoro- 31
duleanaana ni tea mate maga, ku da
peve tea waina e pei tea noaana paid
mu pae Supe kite ? e naga, Kinau
a pei Supe ki Abraham, go Supe ki 32
Isaak, go Supe ki Yakob. Supe eda
pei Supe ki tea mate maga mau, ma
e pei Supe ki tea mauri maga. Go 33
ragi waina taua maga ni naatamoli
maga eu dogo e, eu saramakoto na
vasapiseikiana aneana.
Ma Farisi maga, ragi waina eu 34
dogo naga e mari Sadduki maga eu
punuta doko, eu dumada saisai ki
da. Go sikai kakada, tea ni nawo- 35
taeana sikai, e pusuusu paki nia, e
maridogo e, e naga, Tea vasapiseiki, 36
seve natipakiana ni nawotaeana e
parua ? Go e noa ki nia, e naga, Pa 37
dodomi Yehovah Supe anigo ki
napopoma mamau, go ki naatama
mamau, go ki namidodoana anigo
mamau. Tea wanogoe e pei na 38
tipakiana warua go e pea. Go kerua 39


sikai waina e dakiusi a e pei tea
waia, Pa dodomi tea ni maladigi
ki-go ega tapala waina ku dumama
40 dodomi ko. Natipakiana dua wa-
nogoe nawotaeana mamau e dau
ara dau, go perofeta maga.

saisai one, Yesu e pusuusu paki da,
42 e naga, Nimu ku midoa ki nasava

ki Nawota, e naga,

e naga,

45 Go David e pe soso e ki Nawota, e pe
46 vei natuna dapale sava ? Go te
naata sikai e da mariatae pasadara e

Matele 23.
1 Ragi wanogoe Yesu e pasa paki
taua maga ni naatamoli maga go
paki tea vasapiseikiana aneana maga,
2 e naga, Tea midiri maga go Farisi
maga eu dasake malo tasake ki
3 Moses : nalakena tea wanogoe naleo
maga mamau puti waina eu pe noa
ki mu ara, kuga mari ra po pavaigoro
ra : ma kuga ta mari pae namariana
adeada maga mau; nalakena eu
4 noa, go eu da mari mau. Ma eu oti
sold natapetapeana madaga maga,
go waina eu pei tea tapetapeana kite
sa, po doropusi ra eu one napau ni
naatamoli maga; ma nara eu da
masauna mau naga euga risugi ra ki
5 nakinida sikai. Ma eu mari nawo-
siana adeada maga mamau puti
naga naatamoli maga euga vunusi
ra: nalakena eu mari fulakteri
adeada maga eu pelewelea, go narepu
ni sugoro adeada maga eu parua, go 6
eu masau malo kere one vea maga
ni nakaniana maga, go malo tasake
vea maga ni nasuma ni nasaisaiana
maga, go navasadodomiana maga 7
malo ni navakokotoana maga, go
naga naatamoli maga euga soso ra
ki Rabbi. Ma nimu kuga ta pei tea 8
sosoana ki Rabbi mau : nalakena
sikai e pei tea vasapiseiki animu, go
nimu maga ku pei tamataida puti.
Go kuga ta soso te naata sikai ki 9
tamamu maramana mau : nalakena
sikai e pei Tamamu, tea ni nakoro-
atelagi. Go kuga ta pei tea sosoana 10
ki tea maraki maga mau : nalakena
sikai e pei tea maraki animu, Kristo.
Ma nimu tea kakamu waina ell
parua liu, ega vei tea suasua animu.
Go naata waina ega wo dumana dape 12
a pakilagi, ega wo pei tea toroana
pakitano ; go naata waina ega wo
dumana doro e pakitano ega wo pei
tea tapeana pakilagi.
Ma ai ki mu, tea midiri maga go 13
Farisi maga, nakalepo maga ! na
lakena ku kokoro namarakiana ni
nakoroatelagi maga narae ni naata
moli maga : nalakena nimu ku da 14
sili paki asa mau, go tea maga waina
eu naga euga sili ku da suasua ki da
mau naga euga sili.
Ai ki mu, tea midiri maga go 15
Farisi maga, nakalepo maga ! na
lakena ku daliviri ki natasi go
navanua naga kuga mari proseluto
sikai; go ragi waina e pei tea
mariana sua, ku mari a e pei natu
ni pokasi paka rua parua liu mu.
Ai ki mu, tea maraki kesa maga 16
pae napua, waina ku naga, Te
naata sikai e pe vivisa pae nasuma
tapu, epe vei tea moli ; ma te naata
sikai e pe vivisa pae cold ni nasuma
tapu, epe one asa one. Tea manu- 17
mata vusa maga go tea kesa maga :


nalakena seve tea e parua liu, cold,
kite nasuma tapu waina e dapugoro
18 cold \ Go, Te naata sikai epe vivisa
pae wede ni naviriana, e pe vei tea
moli; ma te naata sikai epe vivisa
pae navituaana waina e doko asa, e
19 pe one asa one. Tea kesa maga: na
lakena seve tea e parua liu, navitua-
ana, kite wede ni naviriana waina e
20 dapugoro navituaana ? Nalakena
tea wanogoe tea waina e pivisa
pae wede ni naviriana, e pavisa
pae asa, go pae naleo maga mamau
21 puti waina eu one asa. Go tea
waina e pivisa pae nasuma tapu, e
pivisa pae asa, go pae tea waina e
22 doko asa doko. Go tea waina e
pivisa pae nakoroatelagi, e pivisa
pae malo tasake Id Supe, go pae tea
waina e dasake asa.
23 Ai Id mu, tea midiri maga go
Farisi maga, nakalepo maga! na
lakena ku pitua ki kekerualima ni
mint go anise go kumino, po doro-
pusi tea madaga liu maga ni nawotae-
ana eu madoko, navasapotaeana, go
nadodomiana, go nasaralomauana ;
ma tea edaku maga waia e one mu
one naga kuga mari ra, go tea vea
maga wanogoe naga kuga ta doro-
24 pusi ra euga madoko mau. Tea
maraki kesa maga pae napua,
waina ku do sarilua namu, po do
dinomi kamel.
25 Ai ki mu, tea midiri maga go
Farisi maga, nakalepo maga ! nala-
kena ku mari nataku ni lasa munu
go plete e dautau, ma nawokada e
pura ki natapepavakotoana go na
26 marisa-dumamu-soki-mu-ana. Fari-
si kesa, pa vea mari nawoka ni lasa
munu go plete ega tautau, naga na
takuda ma ega tautau.
27 Ai ki mu, tea midiri maga go
Farisi maga, nakalepo maga ! nala-
kena ku dakiusi matigo maga waina
eu pei tea vakasakiana eu dare,
waina pae etaku kakada eu pei tea
vunusiana eu pei tea leomatakiana,
ma pae ekopu kakada eu pura ki na
vatu maga ni naatamoli mate maga,
go ki sara naloaana. Nimu ma ku 28
dapala nogoe, pae etaku kakamu
naatamoli maga eu punusi mu ku
leana, ma pae napalaumu ku pura
ki naveinakalepoana go namari-
naleotageleana.
Ai ki mu, tea midiri maga go 29
Farisi maga, nakalepo maga! na
lakena ku davagi matigo maga Id
perofeta maga, po dikei ki vatu
maga ni matigo maga ni tea leana
maga, po naga, Au pe toko naaleatia 30
maga ki tamagami maga, au pe ta pei
tea saisai peani ma nara nalo ni nada
ni perofeta maga mau. Nalakena 31
tea wanogoe ku dumamu manimu
noasokisoki, naga ku pei natu maga
ni tea maga waina eu maripunue
perofeta maga. Nimu ma kuga 32
vakavuro totowo ki tamamu maga.
Maata maga, maata sa natuda maga, 33
kuga wo savadua ki navasapotaeana
ni pokasi ega tapale sava ? Nala- 34
kena tea wanogoe, kuga leo, kinau
aga dipakilua paloti punusi mu
perofeta maga, go tea manumatua
maga, go tea midiri maga : nara
seara kakada kuga wo maripunue ra
po turi ra nakau valadagoto; go
nara seara kakada kuga wo parati ra
ekopu ni nasuma ni nasaisaiana
animu maga, po kopalele ara pae
natokoana paki natokoana : naga 35
sara nada leana waina eu pei tea
takiana maramana euga wo umai
paki mu, pae nada ni Abel tea leana
pa pa paki nada ni Zakariah natu
ni Barakiali, waina ku maripunue a
namawota ni nasuma tapu go ni
wede ni naviriana. Lomau a noa ki 36
mu, naga Naleo maga mamau puti
wanogoe euga wo umai paki tagona
Yerusalem, Yerusalem 0, waina e 37
maripunue perofeta maga, po nadi
ki vatu tea maga waina eu pei
tea tipakiluaana umai punusi a ! a


paka visa masauna naga aga viragi
saisai ki natuiha maga, dakiusi waina
toa sikai e piragi saisai ki natuna
maga etano ki nalivaruna maga, go
38 ku karai! Kuga leo, nasuina animu
e manimu pei tea toropusiana e pei
39 maso maladi. Nalakena a noa ki
mu, naga Kuga wo da punusi au
mau, pae ragi waia pa pa kuga wo
naga, Tea waina e umai pae nagisa
ni Yehovah e pei tea vasapiakiana.
Matele 24.
1 Go Yesu e dave inelu dua ki roara
ni nasuina tapu, po surata pano ; go
tea vasapiseikiana aneana maga eu
rumai punusi a naga euga visei ki nia
natavagiana maga ni nasuina tapu.
2 Ma e pasadara po noa ki da, e naga,
Ku da punusi naleo maga mamau
puti waia kite % lomau a noa ki mu,
naga Yatu sikai ega wo da pei tea
toropusiana nea elagi ni vatu sikai
mau, waina ega wo da pei tea
rakaiana mau.
3 Go ragi waina edo natano tava ni
Oliva, tea vasapiseikiana maga eu
rumai punusi a eu pei nara mau, eu
naga, Pa noa ki garni, tea maga wa-
nogoe euga wo doko seve ragi ? go
navaivaiana ni naumaiana anigo, go
ni naaleatia edaku mau ni mara-
4 mana ega wo pei nasava ? Go Yesu
e pasadara po noa ki da, e naga,
Kuga vunusi naga te naata ega ta
5 piragi sasapo ki mu mau. Nalakena
tea lapa euga wo umai pae nagisagu,
po naga, Kinau a pei Kristo; go euga
6 wo piragi sasapo ki tea lapa. Go kuga
wo dogo navakalo maga go narogo-
rogoana maga ni navakalo maga:
kuga vunusi naga kuga ta mataku
mau: nalakena tea maga wanogoe
e one ara one naga euga vakilina;
ma namatapagona edaku e ko puoli.
7 Nalakena nalauna ega wo duleana
dipa nalauna, go namarakiana dipa
namarakiana : go navitoloana maga
go naruru maga euga wo doko toko-
ra sikasikai. Ma tea maga mamau 8
puti wanogoe eu pei naatulakeana
ni narogokitesaana maga. Eagi 9
wanogoe euga wo pitua ki mu paki
nariesokiana, go euga wo maripunue
mu: go kuga wo pei tea vilosiana
pae nalauna maga mamau puti na
lakena nagisagu. Ragi wanogoe tea 10
lapa euga wo pei tea mariana euga
tapilagona, go euga wo dumada
pitua ki da, po dumada pilosi ra.
Go perofeta sorosoro lapa euga wo 11
pakilina, po piragi sasapo ki tea lapa.
Go nalakena namarinaleotageleana 12
ega wo parua, nadodomiana ki tea
lapa ega wo maladi. Ma tea waina e 13
sokidu pa pa paki namata pagona
edaku, nae ega wo pei tea mautipau-
riana. Go naragorogoana wia waia 14
ni namarakiana ega wo pei tea
rogorogokiana maramana mamau,
naga ega vei nanoasokisokiana sikai
paki nalauna maga mamau puti ;
go ragi wanogoe namata pagona
edaku ega wo umai.
Nalakena tea wanogoe ragi waina 15
kuga wo punusi tea mamaragokiana
waina e mari e pei maso maladi,
waina e pei tea noaana pae perofeta
Daniel, e lawodu tokora tapu (tea
waina e peve ega midoakiatae), ragi 16
wanogoe tea maga waina eu doko
Yudea euga sava paki tava maga
pano : tea waina e doko napau ni 17
nasuina ega ta siwo mau naga ega
tapelua naleo maga waina eu doko
ekopu ni nasuina aneana : go tea 18
waina e doko vanua ega ta liliu mau
naga ega tape sugoro kovagoro
aneana. Ma ai ki tea maga waina 19
eu diena go ki tea maga waina eu
pitua ki susu naaleatia maga wano-
goe ! Go kuga tapasavasa naga ragi 20
ni nasavaduakiana animu ega ta pei
ragi ni namaladiana mau, go naga
ega ta pei sabbath sikai mau : na 21
lakena ragi wanogoe nariesokiana
warua ega wo doko asa, dapala


waina e da pakilina mau pae naatu-
lakeana ni maramana pa pa paki
ragi waia, go waina ega wo da moro
22 pakilina man. Go naaleatia maga
wanogoe eu pe ta pei tea sulakoto-
viana man, te napokasi sikai e pe
ta pei tea mautipauriana mau : ma
nalakena tea matadoaana maga
naaleatia maga wanogoe euga wo pei
23 tea sulakotoviana. Ragi wanogoe
te naata e pe noa ki mu, e pe naga,
Kuga leo, Kristo e dolco nea, kite e
doko nea; kuga ta saralomau asa
24 mau. Nalakena Kristo sorosoro
maga, go perofeta sorosoro maga
euga wo pakilina, po pitua ki navai-
vaiana warua maga, go tea ni na
magaana maga ; dapala waina e pe
vei tea mariataeana. eu pe viragi
sasapo ki tea matadoaana maga.
25 Kuga leo, a po pea noa ki mu asa.
26 Nalakena tea wanogoe eu pe noa ki
mu, eu pe naga, Kuga leo, e doko
masopalo, kuga ta tave pano mau :
Kuga leo, e doko efnago tukituki
maga, kuga ta saralomau asa mau.
27 Nalakena dapala waina navila e
dave pae ist umai, po pei tea vunu-
siana pa pa paki west; naumaiana ki
naatainoli Natuna ega wo dapala
28 nogoe. Tokora waina napatoko ni
tea mate e pe one asa, tokora wano-
goe icila maga eu pe wo saisai paki
29 Ma fnaraverave, edaku ki narie-
sokiana ni naaleatia maga wanogoe,
elo ega wo maligo, go atelagi ega wo
da pitua ki namarama kakana mau,
go fnasoe maga euga wo dowo pae
nakoroatelagi, go tea kasua maga ni
nakoroatelagi maga euga wo pei fea
30 varivariakiana : go ragi wanogoe na
vaivaiana ni naatainoli Natuna ega
wo pakilina nakoroatelagi: go ragi
wanogoe naworawora maga mamau
puti ni maramana euga wo lalaga-
arova, go euga wo punusi naatainoli
Natuna ega wo doko napopouru
maga ni nakoroatelagi do umai
pilake nakasuana go nasamasama-
ana warua. Go ega wo dipakilua 31
agelo aneana maga pilake nadaleo
kasua ni paiga sikai, go euga wo
piragi saisai ki tea matadoaana ane-
ana maga, ineludua ki nalagi pati,
pae namata pago sikai ni nakoro-
atelagi maga pa pa paki namata
pago kerua kakada.
Ma kuga atae ki napuliva nalulu- 32
akia kakana ; ragi waina arana epo
melumelu, go nauluna maga eu paki
lina, ku atae naga ragi ni navivi-
tinuana e pei inaladigi; dapala 33
nogoe nimu ma, ragi waina kuga
wo punusi naleo maga mamau puti
wanogoe, kuga atae naga e pei
inaladigi, naga e doko pisari namata
ni nasuina maga. Lomau a noa ki 34
mu, naga Tagona waia euga wo da
pano puoli mau, pa pa tea maga
mamau puti wanogoe euga wo paki
lina. Nakoroatelagi go maramana 35
eroga wo pano puoli, ma navasaana
aginau maga euga wo da pano puoli
mau. Ma nalo ni naaleatia go ni 36
aura wanogoe te naata e da atae a
mau, go agelo maga ni nakoroatelagi
maga eu da atae a mau, go Natuna
mau, ma Tamagu e sikina atae a. Go 37
dakiusi waina e doko naaleatia maga
ki Noah, naumaiana ki naatainoli
Natuna ega wo dapala nogoe. Nala- 38
kena dakiusi waina e doko naaleatia
maga wanogoe waina eu pea ki
natave, eu do ganikani po do munu,
eu do tawiri po do pitua eu laki, pa
pa paki naaleatia waina Noah e
paki ekopu ni areka asa, go eu da 39
atae mau pa pa natave e umai po
dapelua puti ra; naumaiana ki
naatainoli Natuna ega wo dapala
nogoe. Ragi wanogoe naatainoli 40
dua eroga wo doko vanua; sikai
e pei tea viragiluaana, go sikai
e pei tea toropusiana e madoko ;
nagoroi dua eroga wo mani vatu 41
ma ; sikai e pei tea viragiluaana go
sikai e pei tea toropusiana e madoko.


42 Nalakena tea wanogoe kuga to leleo-
goro; nalakena ku da atae seve
naaleatia man waina Nawota animu
43 ega wo umai asa. Ma kuga atae tea
waia, naga talakea ni nasufna e pe
atae seve navavaigoroana waina tea
vanako e pe umai asa, e pe leleogoro,
go e pe ta suasua ki nasufna aneana
mau naga ega vei tea kilidaraveana.
44 Nalakena tea wanogoe nimu ma
kuga vei tea marimata sua : nala-
kena aura waina ku da midoa ki nia
mau naatamoli Natuna ega wo umai
45 asa. Go sei e pei tea suasua lomau
go manumatua, waina nawota ane-
ana e lawo ki nia e dapau tea maga
ni nasufna aneana, naga ega tua ra
46 navinaga ragi kakana ? Tea suasua
wanogoe waina nawota aneana, ragi
waina ega wo umai asa, ega wo
papai a e do mari dapala nogoe, e
47 maropa. Lomau a noa ki mu, naga
ega wo lawo ki nia ega tapau naleo
maga mamau puti waina e peani ra.
48 Ma tea suasua sa wanogoe e pe noa
napopona, e g>e naga, Nawota aginau
49 e maridaliali; go epe atulake naga
ega wokati tea maga waina eu
mamau pei tea suasua, go e pe
kanikani po munu sikoti tea mata-
-50 maluku maga; nawota ki tea sua
sua wanogoe e pe wo umai naaleatia
sikai waina e da leogoro asa mau,
go aura sikai waina e da atae a mau,
51 go e pe wo parati parua ki nia, po
pasadawana ki matele veaniana ane-
ana ega sikoti nakalepo maga:
tokora wanogoe natagiana go na
kati-pati-ana eroga wo doko asa.
Matele 25.
1 Eagi wanogoe namarakiana ni
nakoroatelagi maga ega wo pei
tea mariana ega wo dakiusi na
goroi atara rualima sikai, waina eu
puati nasulu adeada maga, po dave
pano naga euga sua tea vitawiri.
Go elima kakada eu manumata- 2
vusa, go elima eu manumatua.
Nalakena tea manumatavusa maga, 3
ragi waina eu puati nasulu adeada
maga, eu da dape te naroro seara
e pilake ra mau; ma tea manu- 4
matua maga eu dape naroro e
doko lasa adeada maga pilake nasulu
adeada maga. Go ragi waina tea 5
vitawiri e maridaliali, eu mamau puti
maturu leleo po maturu daratara.
Ma pogi matua naviosoana sikai 6
e pakilina, eu naga, Kuga leo, tea
vitawiri! Kuga tave umai naga
kuga sua e. Eagi wanogoe nagoroi 7
atara maga wanogoe eu duleana
puti, po marimata ki nasulu adeada
maga. Go tea manumatavusa maga 8
eu noa ki tea manumatua maga, eu
naga, Kuga tua garni naroro animu
seara kakana; nalakena nasulu
aginami maga te euga mate. Ma 9
tea manumatua maga eu pasadara,
eu naga, Mase e pe wo da pataka-
gida mau; e pia kuga,va punusi tea
maga waina eu sorisori, go kuga
tumamu manimu pakotovi seara.
Go ragi waina nara eu pano naga 10
euga vakokoto, tea vitawiri e umai;
go tea maga waina eu marimata sua
eu sikoti a paki ekopu paid nakani-
ana ni navitawiriana : go namata
e pei tea kokoroana. Go nagoroi 11
atara pota maga wanogoe ma eu
edaku umai, po naga, Nawota,
Nawota, pa maginami polagati.
Ma e pasadara po naga, Lomau a 12
noa ki mu, naga A da atae mu
mau. Nalakena tea wanogoe kuga 13
to leleogoro, nalakena ku da atae na
aleatia mau go ku da atae aura
kakana mau.
Nalakena e dapala ragi waina 14
naatamoli sikai e naga ega vaki
navanua pota sikai, po soso tea
suasua aneana maga, po pitua ki
naleo aneana maga paki da. Go el 5
dua sikai talento lima, go e dua sikai
talento dua, go e dua sikai talento


sikai; e dua ra sarasara puti ra tea
waina e pataka ni namariataeana
adeada; go e paki navanua pota
16 pano. Tea waina e dape talento
lima e pano inaraverave po posiwosi
ara, po mari talento lima pota ara.
17 Go dapala nogoe tea waina e dape
dua nae ma e dalua tea rua pota.
18 Ma tea waina e dape sikai e pano po
kili natano, po suru ki mone ki
19 nawota aneana. Go edaku ki ragi
varau sikai nawota ki tea suasua
maga wanogoe e umai, po puausi
20 namariana adeada maga. Go tea
waina e dape talento lima e umai po
dape talento lima pota umai, po
naga, Nawota, ku pitua ki talento
lima paki nau: pa leo, a dalua
21 talento lima pota. Nawota aneana
e noa ki nia, e naga, E pia, tea suasua
wia go lomau : ku mari lomau ragi
waina ku dapau naleo pisa maau,
aga wo lawo ki-go pa wo dapau naleo
lapa : pa sili paki nalaelaeaana ki
22 nawota anigo. Go tea waina e dape
talento dua e umai, po naga,
Nawota ku pitua ki talento dua paki
nau; pa leo, a dalua talento dua
23 pota. Nawota aneana e noa ki nia,
e naga, E pia, tea suasua wia go
lomau ; ku mari lomau ragi waina
ku dapau naleo visa maau, aga wo
lawo ki-go pa wo dapau naleo lapa :
pa sili paki nalaelaeaana ki nawota
24 anigo. Go tea waina e dape talento
sikai e umai po naga, Nawota, a
atae ko naga ku pei naatanioli
kasua sikai, ku do tagaukotovi
tokora waina ku da sapuraki asa
mau, po do dauaki pae tokora waina
ku da mari a e pei daperavera asa
25 mau : go a mataku, po pano po suru
ki talento anigo natano ; pa leo, ku
26 peani tea anigo. Ma nawota aneana
e pasadara po noa ki nia, e naga,

atae naga a do tagaukotovi tokora
waina a da sapuraki asa mau, po do
dauaki pae tokora waina a da mari a
NGUNA-TONGOAN N.T.
e pei daperavera asa man: nala- 27
kena tea wanogoe e one ako one
naga pa nadi ki mone aginau dua tea
ni wede maga asa, go ragi waina a
pe umai a pe moro dape tea aginau
go narogoviana kakana. Nalakena 28
tea wanogoe kuga tapelua talento
kiana, po pitua ki nia paki tea waina
e peani talento rualima sikai. Nala- 29
kena sara naata waina eu peani, ega
wo pei tea vituakiana paki da, go
euga wo peani tea lapa : ma tea
waina e da peani mau, tea waina e
peani a ega wo pei tea tapelua-
ana kiana. Go kuga nadi ki tea 30
suasua palo wanae paki namaligo ni
etaku ni uvea: tokora wanogoe
natagiana go nakati-pati-ana eroga
wo doko asa.
Ma ragi waina naatanioli Natuna 31
ega wo umai nasamasamaana aneana,
go agelo maga mamau puti euga wo
sikoti a umai, ragi wanogoe ega wo
dasake malo tasake ni nasamasama-
ana aneana : go nalauna maga'32
mamau puti euga wo pei tea saisai-
kiana paki naraena: go ega wo
marimasale ki da duinada meludua
ki da pano, ega tapala waina tea leo
parati ki shiip e do marimasale ki
shiip eu meludua ki naninani maga
pano : go ega wo lawo ki skiip euga 33
wo doko pisari namelearuna ni
matu§, ma naninani maga pisari
namelearuna ni mawiri. Ragi wane- 34
goe Nawota ega wo noa ki tea maga
waina eu doko pisari namelearuna ni
matua, ega wo naga, Kuga umai, tea
vasamatakiana maga ki Tamagu,
kuga veani namarakiana waina
e manimu pei tea tawanakiana
pae ragi ni nanadi-ki-laketano-ana
ni maramana : nalakena a pitolo, go 35
ku dua au a ganikani: a madou, go
ku dua au a munu : a pei namenaki,
go ku piragi au paki ekopu; a 36
malamala, go ku sugoro au: a
sasana, go ku umai leoparati ki
nau : a doko ekopu ni nasuma ni


navavaigoroana, go ku umai punusi

euga wo pasadara e, po naga,

pitolo, go au pagani ko ? kite ku

naki, go au piragi ko paki ekopu ?
kite ku malamala, go au sugoro ko ?
39 Go seve ragi au punusi ko ku sasana,
kite ku doko ekopu ni nasuma ni
navavaigoroana, go au paloti punusi
40 ko ? Go Nawota ega wo pasadara
po noa ki da, ega wo naga, Lomau a
noa ki mu, naga Nalo ni waina ku
mari a paki taigu maga waia, tea
kiki sa maga sikai kakada, ku
41 mari a paki nau. Ragi wanogoe
ega wo noa ki tea maga waina eu
doko pisari namelearuna ni mawiri,
ega tvo naga, Kuga meludua ki
nau pano, tea vasasakiana maga,
paki nakapu waina e du mau du,
waina e magi diabolo go agelo
aneana maga pei tea tawanakiana :
42 nalakena a pitolo, go ku da dua au
a ganikani mau : a madou, go ku da
43 dua au a munu mau: a pei namenaki,

45 go au da manigo suasua mau ? Ragi

naga, Lomau a noa ki mu, naga

Matele 26.
Go e pakilina, ragi waina Yesu e 1
mari sua navasaana maga mamau
puti wanogoe, naga e noa ki tea
vasapiseikiana aneana maga, e naga,
Ku atae naga edaku ki naaleatia dua 2
go ega wo pei nasaisaiana ni nava-
kalauana, go naatamoli Natuna ega
wo pei tea vituakiana naga ega vei
tea turiana nakau valadagoto. Ragi 3
wanogoe tea viri warua maga, go tea
matua maga ni narei eu pei tea
saisaikiana paki namasopa ni nasuma
ki tea viri warua liu, waina e pei
tea sosoana ki Kaiafas ; go eu pei 4
tana seke naga euga vuasoki Yesu
ki nasorosoroana, po maripunue a.
Ma eu naga, Tuga ta mari a ragi ni 5
nasaisaiana mau, naga navasaparai-
ana sikai ega ta pakilina maleoputo
ni narei mau.
Go ragi waina Yesu e doko Beth- 6
ania, ekopu ni nasuma ki Simon
waina e pei lepero, nagoroi sikai e 7
umai punusi a, waina e dape napura
ni noai ni alabaster sikai ni naroro
1010 ni naulu lapa, go e da ki nia
napauna, ragi waina e kereone gani-
kani. Ma ragi waina tea vasapisei- 8
kiana maga eu punusi a, eu maeto,
po naga, Ekasana namaripuolikiana
waia ? Nalakena naroro 1010 waia e 9
mariatae pei tea soriana raid tea
warua, po pei tea vituakiana paki
tea tika maga. Ma Yesu e atae.a 10
po noa ki da, e naga, Ekasana ku
mari nagoroi waia e dogokitesa ?
nalakena e po mari namariana wia
sikai paki nau. Nalakena ku peani 11
tea tika maga eu sikoti mu doko
sara ragi; ma ku da peani au sara
ragi mau. Nalakena nae e da ki 12
naroro 1010 waia napatokogu, e mari
a naga ega marimata ki nau raid
naovakiana. Lomau a noa ki mu, 13
naga Tokora waina narogorogoana
wia waia e pe wo pei tea rogo-


rogokiana asa maramana mamau,
tea waina nagoroi waia e po mari a
tea wanogoe ma ega wo pei tea
noaana naga nae ega vei tea midoa-
kilagatiana asa.
11 Ragi wanogoe tea sikai ni tea
rualima sikai tamate dua, waina e
pei tea sosoana ki Yuda Iskariote,
e pano punusi tea viri warua maga,
15 po naga, Ku masauna naga kuga
tua an nasava, go aga wo pitua ki
nia paki mu ? Go eu maneana
dowogi matele ni silver rualima dolu.
16 Go pae ragi wanogoe pa pa e laga
ragi wia naga ega vitua ki nia paki
da asa.
17 Go naaleatia vea ni bred maga
waina leven e dika asa, tea vasapi-
seikiana maga eu rumai punusi
Yesu, po naga, Seve tokora ku
masauna naga auga manigo mari
inataki asa naga pa kani navakalau-
-18 ana asa. Go e naga, Kuga vaki
natokoana pano punusi te naata
sikai, go kuga noa ki nia, huga naga,
Tea Vasapiseiki e naga, Ragi aginau
e pei fnaladigi; aga mari navaka-
lauana nasuma anigo, kinami ma tea
vasapiseikiana aginau maga auga
19 mamau. Go tea vasapiseikiana maga
eu mari dapala waina Yesu e dipa
ki da asa ; go eu marimata ki nava-
-20 kalauana. Go ragi waina e maligo,
e kereone ganikani sikoti tea vasa-
piseikiana rualima sikai tamate dua;
21 go ragi waina eu do ganikani, e naga,
Lomau a noa ki mu, naga sikai
22 kakamu ega wo pitua ki nau. Go
eu susue parua, po pae asa noa ki
nia sara naata sikasikai, eu naga,
23 E pei kinau, Nawota, kite ? Go e
pasadara po naga, Tea waina e doko
nafnelearuna lasa sikoti au, nae ega
24 wo pitua ki nau. Naatamoli Natuna
e do pano lomau, dapala waina e
pei tea midiriana nalo kakana :
ma ai ki naatamoli waina naatamoli
Natuna e pei tea vituakiana pae
asa! naatamoli wanogoe e pe ta
pakilina mau epe wia ki nia. Go 25

dara po naga, E pei kinau, Rabbi,
kite ? E noa ki nia, e naga, Nigo ku
noae. Go ragi waina eu do ganikani, 26
Yesu e dape bred, po pasafnataki,
po dovaporae a; go e dua tea vasa-
piseikiana maga, po naga, Kuga
tape, kuga kanikani; tea waia e pei
napatokogu. Go e dape lasa munu 27
sikai, po pasadodomataki, po dua ra,
po naga, Kuga mamau puti munugi
a ; nalakena tea waia e pei nadagu 28
ni navasasokiana vau, waina e magi
tea lapa pei tea takiana paki na
midoakikorokoroana ni namarina-
leosaana maga. Ma a noa ki mu, 29

namarakiana ki Tamagu.

legaana sikai, eu dave paki tava
ni Oliva maga pano.
Ragi wanogoe Yesu e noa ki da, 31
e naga, Nimu kuga wo mamau puti
pei tea mariana kuga tapilagona nalo
kakagu pogi waia: nalakena e pei
tea midiriana, e naga, Aga wo atugi
tea leoparati ki shiip, go shiip ni
navata euga wo pei tea taperavera-
kiana. Ma edaku ki aga wo pei 32
tea sikeana duleana, aga wo pea ki
mu paki Calilea pano. Ma Petero e 33
pasadara po noa ki nia, e naga, Tea
maga mamau puti eu pe vei tea
mariana eu pe tapilagona nalo
kakama, kinau a pe wo da pei tea
mariana a pe tapilagona te ragi mau.
Yesu e noa ki nia, e naga, Lomau a 34
noa ki-go, naga pogi waia, ragi waina
toa ega ko da dare mau, pa wo paka
tolu pasagoro au. Petero e noa ki 35
nia, e naga, E pe one au one naga aga
mate sikoti ko, a pe wo da pasagoro
ko mau. Go tea vasapiseikiana maga
mamau puti eu noa dapala nogoe.

Matele 27.
Go ragi waina e po pei malipogi, 1
tea viri warua maga mamau puti go
tea matua maga ni narei eu seke
dipa Yesu naga euga maripunue a : 2
go eu soli a, po piragilua e, po pitua
ki nia paki Pilato tea maramara.
Eagi wanogoe Yuda, waina e 3
pitua ki nia, ragi waina e punusi
naga e pei tea tipakotoviana, e
midoakidoa, po dape liliua ki matele
ni silver rualima dolu wanogoe
umai paki tea viri warua maga go
tea matua maga, po naga, A mari 4
naleo sa, a pitua ki nada tautau.
Ma eu naga, Kinami auga kasa ki
nia ? nigo pa vunusi a. Go e nadi 5
ki matele ni silver maga wanogoe

pano; go e pano po dufnana soli
nanoana. Go tea viri warua maga 6
eu dape matele ni silver maga wano-
goe, po naga, E da pae nawotaeana
mau naga tuga nadi ki da paki nalia
ni mone ni nasuma tapu, nalakena


7 e pei naulu ni nada. Go eu pusu-
inaki, po pakotovi vanua ki tea

Go eu naga, Barabba. Pilato e noa 22
ki da, e naga, Go aga mari nasava
paki Yesu waina e pei tea sosoana
ki Kristo 1 Eu mamau puti naga,
Ega vei tea turiana nakau valada-
goto. Go e naga, Ekasana, e mari 23
naleo sa nasava % Ma eu pioso
parua liu, po naga, Ega vei tea
turiana nakau valadagoto. Go ragi 24
waina Pilato e punusi naga eu da
dogo parati ki nadaleona mau, ma

aruna maga narae ni taua ni naata

wanogoe po pokati napauna asa.

Matele 28.
1 Go napogiana ni naaleatia ni
sabbath, ragi waina e atulake naga
ega vei ragi ni namakotokotoana
paki naaleatia vea ni wiik, Maria ni
Macdala e umai go Maria kerua
naga eroga vunusi matigo. Go kuga 2
leo, naruru warua sikai e pakilina ;
nalakena agelo sikai ki Yehovali e
pae nakoroatelagi siwo, po umai po
malulua ki lua vatu wanogoe, po
dasake asa. Go navunusiana kaka- 3
na e dapala navila, go sugoro
aneana e dare dapala seno: go nala- 4
kena namatau-ki pja-ana tea vavai-
goro maga eu durururu, po pei tea
mariana eu dapala naatamoli mate
maga. Go agelo e pasadara po noa 5
ki nagoroi maga, e naga, Nimu koroga
ta mataku mau : nalakena a atae
naga koro laga Yesu, waina e pei
tea turiana nakau valadagoto. E 6
da doko nea mau; nalakena epo
duleana, dapala waina e noa e.
Koroga umai, koroga vunusi tokora
waina Nawota e one sua asa. Go 7
koroga vano maraverave, po noa ki
tea vasapiseikiana aneana maga,
naga E po duleana fneludua ki tea
mate maga; go koroga leo, e pea
ki mu paki Calilea pano; tokora
wanogoe kuga wo punusi a asa:
koroga leo, apo noa ki mu asa. Go 8
ero fneludua ki matigo pano marave-
rave pilake namatakuana go nalae-
laeaana warua, po sava naga eroga
rogorogo ki nia paki tea vasapisei-
kiana aneana maga. Go kuga leo, 9
Yesu e sua ra, po naga, Koroga
laelaea. Go ero umai po puati
nafnelena maga, po lotu ki nia. Ragi 10
wanogoe Yesu e noa ki da, e naga,
Koroga ta mataku mau: koroga
vano po dogorogo paki taigu maga
naga euga vaki Calilea pano, go euga
wo punusi au tokora wanogoe.
Go ragi waina ero do pano, kuga 11
leo, te seara ni tagona ni tea vavai-
goro maga eu rumai paki natokoana,
po dogorogo paki tea viri warua
maga ki naleo maga mamau puti
waina eu po pakilina. Go ragi 12


waina eu saisai sikoti tea matua
maga, po pusumaki sua, eu dua
naatamoli ni navakalo maga mone
13 lapa, po naga, Kuga noa, naga Tea
vasapiseikiana aneana maga eu
rumai pogi, po panako e pauo ragi
14 waina kinami au maturu. Go tea
wanogoe e pe vei tea rogorogokiana
narae ni tea maramara, kinami au pe
wo pasakorokoro e, po mari mu ku
15 pe wo da mataku mau. Go eu dape
mone wanogoe, po mari dapala waina
eu pei tea vasapiseikiana asa: go
navasaana wanogoe e pei tea vasa-
daperaverakiana maleoputo ni naka
ni Yudea pa pa paid naaleatia ni
masoso.
16 Ma tea vasapiseikiana rualima
sikaj tamate sikai eu paki Calilea
pano, paki tava waina Yesu e pea
madeada datuta Id nia. Go ragi 17
waina eu punusi a, eu lotu hi nia: ma
te seara eu midoakisara. Go Yesu elB
umai punusi ra, po pasa ki da, e
naga, Sara naveinawotaana eu pei
tea vituakiana paki nau nakoroate-
lagi go maramana. Nalakena tea 19
wanogoe kuga vano, po pasapisei
ki nalauna maga mamau puti, po
do bapetizo ra paki nagisa ni
Tamana go ni Natuna go ni
Naatana Tapu: po do pasapisei 20
ki da naga euga rogo parati ki tea
maga mamau puti waina a dipa ki
mu ara: go kuga leo, kinau aga
sikoti mu doko naaleatia maga
mamau puti pa pa paki naaleatia
edaku mau ni maramana.
NAROGOROGOANA WIA
MARKO.
Matele 1.
1 Naatulakeana ni narogorogoana
wia ki Yesu Kristo, Supe Natuna.
2 Dakiusi waina e pei tea midiriana
tusi ki perofeta Isaiah,
Kuga leo, kinau a dipakilua tea
tautauana aginau ega vea ki na
raefna,
Waina ega wo marimata ki napua
anigo ;
3 Nadaleo ni tea waina edo pioso
masopalo,
Kuga marimata ki napua ki
Yehovah,
Kuga mari napua tuniana ane-
ana maga euga leana;
Yoane e umai, waina e do bapetizo 4
masopalo po do dogorogo ki nabape-
tizoana ni namidoakidoaana paki
namidoakikorokoroana ni namari-
naleosaana maga. Go navanua ni 5
Yudea mamau, go tea maga mamau
puti ni Yerusalem, eu pano punusi a;
go e bapetizo ra noaisara Yordan,
eu noasai namarinaleosaana adeada
maga. Go Yoane e pei tea sugoro- 6
ana ki nainau ni kamel, go tasoki
sikai ni nawili e do namalona, go e
do gani midiri maga go honi mila.


7 Go e do dogorogo, po do naga, Tea
sikai waina e kasua liu au, e edaku-
goro au umai, a da pia mau naga
aga kolo po peresi natali ni namele-
-8 vasiana aneana maga. Kinau a
bapetizo mu ki noai; ma nae ega
wo bapetizo mu ki Naatana Tapu.
9 Go e pakilina naaleatia maga wa-
nogoe, naga Yesu e pae Nazareth ni
Calilea umai, po pei tea bapetizoana
10 pae Yoane Yordan. Go maraverave
ragi waina e do meludua ki noai sake
umai, e punusi nakoroatelagi maga
eu mawora pamawota, go Naatana
c do siwo daldusi tokopea sikai po
11 lawo asa : go nadaleo sikai e dave
nakoroatelagi maga umai, e naga,
Nigo ku pei Natugu tea dodomiana
aginau, waina a midoa ki inata
ki-go.
12 Go maraverave Naatana e kopasi
13 a paki masopalo pano. Go e doko
masopalo doko naaleatia rualima
pati, Satan edo maridogo e; go
e sikoti nalo mila maga; go agelo
maga eu maneana suasua hi navi-
naga.
14 Go edaku ki Yoane e pei tea
vituakiana, Yesu e umai paki
Calilea, po do dogorogo ki narogo-
-15 rogoana wia ki Supe, po do noa,
Ragi e pei tea vakavuroana, go
namarakiana ki Supe e pei maladigi:
kuga midoakidoa, po saralomau
narogorogoana wia.
16 Go e surata pae elau ni natasi ni
Calilea pano, po punusi Simon go
Anderea Simon taina ero siva ki
kupena sikai natasi: nalakena ero
17 pei tea ara ika. Go Yesu e noa ki
da, e naga, Koroga rausi au, go aga
wo mari mu koroga wo pei tea
18 ara ika ki naatamoli maga. Go
maraverave ero doropusi kupena
19 maga eu madoko, po dausi a. Go
e moro surata pano tokora kiki, po
punusi Yakobo natu ni Zebedaio,
go taina Yoane, go nara ma ero
doko rarua ero do olioli kupena
maga. Go maraverave e soso ra :20
go ero doropusi tamada Zebedaio e
doko rarua sikoti tea suasua vasa-
dapuiana maga, po dausi a pano.
Go eu sili paki Kaperenaum ; go 21
maraverave e paki ekopu ni nasuma
ni nasaisaiana naaleatia ni sabbath
po pasapisei ki. Go eu saramakoto 22
navasapiseikiana aneana : nalakena
e pasapisei ki da dapala e peani
naveinawotaana, go e da dapala
tea midiri maga mau. Go marave- 23
rave naatamoli sikai e doko / nasuma
ni nasaisaiana adeada waina e doko
naatana loa sikai; go e pioso, po,
naga, Kinami auga kasa ki-go, Yesu 24
ni Nazareth ? ku umai naga pa mari
punue garni kite ? a atae ko, ku pei
Tea Tapu ki Supe. Go Yesu e pasa 25
kasua ki nia, po naga, Pa vunuta, go
pa tave umai meludua ki nia pano.
Go naatana loa e puaporae a po 26
pioso ki nadaleo kasua, po dave
umai meludua ki nia pano. Go eu 27
mamau puti maga parua, dapala
waina eu dumada pusuusu paki da,
po naga, Tea waia e pei nasava ? na
vasapiseikiana vau! e dipaki na
atana loa maga ki naveinawota-
ana, go eu dogo parati ki nia. Go 28
narogorogoana kakana e sokapule
maraverave sara tokora paki na
vanua mamau ni Calilea daliviri.
Go maraverave, ragi waina eu 29
dave meludua ki nasuma ni nasai-
saiana, eu rumai paki ekopu ni
nasuma ki Simon go Anderea, nara
ma Yakobo go Yoane eu mamau.
Go Simon anagoroi pilana e one e 30
masaki; go maraverave eu noa ki
nia asa: go e umai po puati na 31
melearuna, po sike a; go nama-
sakia e marua ki nia, go e madeada
suasua hi navinaga.
Go ragimelu, ragi waina elo e 32
musu, eu piragi tea maga mamau
puti waina eu sasana, go tea maga
waina eu pei dimon umai punusi a.
Go natokoana mamau eu saisai 33


34 paki namata. Go e maripauri tea
lapa waina eu sasana nasasanaana
visarasara, po mari dimon lapa eu
dave pano; go e da suasua ki
dimon maga naga euga vasa mau,
nalakena eu atae a.
35 Go malipogi ni pogi parua, e
duleana asa po paki katama, po
paki maso maladi sikai pano, po
36 dapasavasa tokora wanogoe. Go
Simon go tea maga waina eu sikoti
37 a doko eu dausi a pano ; go eu
papai a, po noa ki nia, eu naga, Tea
maga mamau puti eu laga ako.
38 Go e noa ki da, e naga, Tuga vaki
tokora pota seara paki natokoana
maga ni maladigi, naga aga moro
dogorogo tokora maga wanogoe;
nalakena a melu umai nalakena
39 tea wanogoe. Go e paki ekopu ni
nasuma ni nasaisaiana adeada maga
usuraki Calilea mamau, e do dogo-
rogo po do mari dimon maga eu
dave pano.
40 Go lepero sikai e umai punusi a,
e pavarani a, po ditipatua ki nia,
po noa ki nia, e naga, Ku pe
suasua, ku pe mariatae mari au
41 ape tautau. Go e maritadodomi
a, po sai ki namelearuna, po kisi-
dogo e, po noa ki nia, e naga, A
suasua; pa vei tea mariana pa
42 tautau. Go maraverave naveilepe-
roana e marua ki nia, go e
43 pei tea mariana e dautau. Go e
pasasoki kasua ki nia, po marave-
-44 rave dipakilua e, po noa ki nia, e
naga, Pa vunusi naga pa ta noa ki
te naata te navatuna mau : ma pa
vano, pa tumama pisei ki tea viri
ako, po pitua nalakena ku pei tea
mariana ku dautau ki tea maga
waina Moses e pitipaki ara, naga ega
vei nanoasokisokiana sikai paki da.
45 Ma e dave pano, po pae asa dogo-
rogo ki parua ki nia, po pasa pera-
vera ki naleo wanogoe, dapala
waina Yesu e mari sa moro pae lina
sili paki te natokoana, ma e doko
etaku doko maso maladi maga : go
eu pae sara tokora umai punusi a.
Matele 2.
Go ragi waina e moro sili paki 1
Kapernaum edakuki naaleatia seara,
e pei tea rogorogokiana naga e doko
ekopu ni nasuma. Go tea lapa eu 2
saisai, dapala waina te namalopa
e da moro doko mau, go e da moro
doko pisari namata mau : go e pasa
ki da navasaana. Go eu rumai, eu 3
dape tea sarumate sikai umai punusi
a, waina e pei tea tapetapeana pae
tea vati. Go ragi waina eu marisa 4
umai paki maladigi ki nia nalakena
taua ni naatamoli maga, eu mari-
pakasa ki elagi ni nasuma tokora
waina e doko asa : go ragi waina eu
kililua sua e, eu doro pakitano
nawewele waina tea sarumate e one
asa one. Go Yesu e punusi nasara- 5
lomauana adeada po noa ki tea
sarumate, e naga, Koto, namari-
naleosaana anigo maga eu pei tea
midoakikorokoroana. Ma tea mi- 6
diri maga seara kakada eu dasake
tokora wanogoe, po midoakiusiusi
napopoda, Ekasana naatamoli waia 7
e pasa dapalana ? e pasa sa ki:
sei e mariatae midoakikorokoro
namarinaleosaana maga ma tea
sikai maau, Supe ? Go marave- 8
rave Yesu, ragi waina e atae pae
naatana naga eu midoakiusiusi na
palauda dapala nogoe, e noa ki da,
e naga, Ekasana ku midoakiusiusi
tea maga wanogoe napopomu ?
Seve tea e manainai pia, A pe noa 9
ki tea sarumate, Namarinaleosaana
anigo maga eu pei tea midoakikoro-
koroana ; kite ape noa, Pa tuleana,
po dape dakati nawewele anigo, po
surata ? Ma naga kuga atae naga 10
naatamoli Natuna e peani navei-
nawotaana maramana naga ega
midoakikorokoro namarinaleosaana
maga (e noa ki tea sarumate), e


11 naga, A noa ki-go, Pa tuleana, pa
tape dakati nawewele anigo, po
12 paki nasuma anigo pano. Go e
duleana, po maraverave dape dakati
nawewele, po paki katama narae ni
tea maga mamau puti; dapala eu
mamau puti sarafhakoto, po sama-
samani Supe, po naga, Au da punusi
tea tapalana sala vea man.
13 Go e moro dave pano po pae elan ;
go taua mamau ni naatamoli maga
eu rumai punusi a, go e pasapisei
14 ki da. Go ragi waina edo liu pano,
o punusi Levi natu ni Alefaio e do
dasake tokora ni nasautoga, go e
noa ki nia, e naga, Pa rausi au. Go
15 e duleana po dausia. Go e pakilina,
naga e kere one ganikani ekopu ni
nasuma aneana, go tea tape nasau-
toga lapa go tea mari naleo sa lapa
eu mamau kere one sikoti Yesu go
tea vasapiseikiana aneana maga:
nalakena tea lapa eu doko, go eu
16 dausi a. Go tea midiri maga ni
Farisi maga, ragi waina eu punusi
naga e ganikani sikoti tea marina
leo sa maga go tea tape nasautoga
maga, eu noa ki tea vasapiseikiana
aneana maga, eu naga, E ganikani
po munu sikoti tea tape nasautoga
maga go tea mari naleo sa maga.
17 Go ragi waina Yesu e dogo e, e noa,
ki da, e naga, Tea maga waina eu
kasua eu da dapala waina e pia naga
euga masau naatamoli sikai ni medi-
sine mau, ma tea waina eu sasana eu
dapala nogoe : a da umai naga aga
soso tea leana maga mau, ma a umai
naga aga soso tea mari naleo sa maga.
18 Go tea vasapiseikiana maga ki
Yoane go Farisi maga eu pali doko:
go eu rumai po noa ki nia, eu naga,
Ekasana tea vasapiseikiana maga
ki Yoane go ki Farisi maga eu pali,
ma tea vasapiseikiana anigo maga
19 eu da pali mau ? Go Yesu e noa ki
da, e naga, Tea vitawiri tana ri maga
eu mari atae susue, ragi waina tea
vitawiri e sikoti ra doko kite ? ragi
waina eu peani tea vitawiri e sikoti
ra doko, eu mari sa pali. Ma naale- 2C
atia maga euga wo umai, waina tea
vitawiri ega wo pei tea tapeluaana
kiada, go ragi wanogoe euga wo pali
naaleatia wanogoe. Te naata sikai 21
e da turi matele sikai ni nakulukulu
waina e ko da pei tea marimataki-
ana sugoro tuai mau ; eu pe turi a
asa nausuvakiana e pe meludua ki
nia, tea vau e pe meludua ki tea
tuai, go namaworaana e pe warua.
Go te naata sikai e da da ki waine 22
vau paki noai ni nawili tuai maga
mau : eu pe ta ki nia paki ara
waine e pe mari nawili maga eu pe
masai, go waine e pe vuoli, go nawili
maga : ma eu da hi waine vau paki
nawili vau maga.
Go e pakilina, naga e surata 23
duadura vanua maga ni korn na
aleatiani sabbath; go tea vasapisei-
kiana aneana maga eu pae asa
surata po lei mokai maga ni korn.
Go Farisi maga eu noa ki nia, eu 24
naga, Pa leo, ekasana eu marina
aleatia ni sabbath tea waina e da pae
nawotaeana mau ? Go e noa ki 25
da, e naga, Ku ko da peve tea waina
David e mari a, ragi waina e dika,
po pitolo, nara ma tea maga waina
eu sikoti a doko kite ? Dapala 26
waina e paki roara ni nasuma ki
Supe ragi waina Abiathar e pei tea
viri warua liu, po gani bred toko
rae maga, waina e da pae nawo-
taeana mau naga tea lapa euga kani
a, ma e pei tea waina tea viri maga
euga sikida gani a, po dua tea maga
waina eu sikoti a doko ? Go e noa 27
ki da, e naga, sabbath e magi naata
fnoli pei tea mariana, go naatamoli
e da magi sabbath pei tea mariana
mau : nalakena tea wanagoe naata- 28
moliNatuna e pei nawotani sabbath.
Matele 3.
Go e moro paki ekopu ni nasuma 1


ni nasaisaiana ; go naatamoli sikai
e doko asa waina nafnelearuna e
2 lologara. Go eu leo parati nia, epe
maripauri a naaleatia ni sabbath ;
3 naga euga vasadipa e. Go e noa
ki naatamoli waina nafnelearuna e
e lologara, e naga, Pa tuleana paki
4 ihaleoputo. Go e noa ki da, e naga,
E pae nawotaeana naga tuga mari
euga wia naaleatia ni sabbath, kite
naga tuga mari euga sa ? naga tuga
mautipauri namauriana sikai, kite
naga tuga maripunue ? Ma eu
5 punuta. Go e leo pilialia ra ki
namaetoana, e susue nalakena na
kasuaana ni napopoda, go e noa ki
naatamoli wanogoe, e naga, Pa sai
ki nafhelearufha. Go e sai ki nia :
go nafnelearuna e pei tea mariana e
6 moro pia. Go Farisi maga eu dave
pano, go fharaverave nara ma naata
fnoli maga ki Herod eu seke dipa e,
naga euga maripunue a.
7 Go Yesu go tea vasapiseikiana
aneana maga eu paki natasi pano :
go taua warua sikai ni naatamoli
maga waina eu pae Calilea eu dausi:
8 go tea maga waina eu pae Yudea, go
Yerusalem, go Idumea, go taleva
kerua ni Yordan, go tokora maga
daliviri Tair go Sidon, taua warua
sikai, ragi waina eu dogo tea warua
maga waina e mari ra, eu rumai
9 punusi a. Go e noa ki tea vasa-
piseikiana aneana maga, naga rarua
kiki sikai ega toko raid nia nalakena
taua ni naatamoli maga, naga euga
10 ta sogosogoni a mau : nalakena e
maripauri sua tea lapa ; dapala tea
maga waina eu sua tea ni navara-
tiana maga eu dietie a naga euga
U kisidogo e. Go naatana loa maga,
ragi waina eu leo punusi a, eu dowo
pakitano naraena, po pioso, eu naga,
12 Nigo ku pei Supe Natuna. Go e
pasasoki parua ki da naga euga
ta mari a ega vei tea ataeana mau.
13 Go e sake paki tava pano, po
soso tea maga waina nae e dumana
masau ra ; go eu pa punusi a. Go 14
e mari rualima sikai tamate dua,
naga euga sikoti a doko, go naga
ega tipakilua ra naga euga rogorogo,
po peani naveinawotaana naga euga 15
maridimon maga euga tave pano: go 16
Simon e salagisana ki Petero ; go 17
Yakobo natu ni Sebedaio, go Yoano
Yakobo taina ; go nara e salagisada
ki Boanerces, waina e pei, tovae
Natuna maga: go Anderea, go 18
Filipo, go Bartolomaio, go Mataio,
go Toma, go Yakobo natu ni
Alefaio, go Tadaio, go Simon Kana-
naio, go Yuda Iskariote, waina e 19
pitua ki nia.
Go e umai paki ekopu ni nasufha 20
sikai. Go taua ni naatamoli maga
eu moro saisai umai, dapala eu mari
sa gani navinaga. Go ragi waina 21
namatarau aneana maga eu dogo e,
eu pano naga euga vuasoki a : na
lakena eu naga, E daratara. Go tea 22
midiri maga waina eu pae Yerusalem
siwo umai eu naga, E peani Beelze-
bub, po mari dimon maga eu dave
pano pae nawota ki dimon maga.
Go e soso ra umai punusi a, po noa 23
ki da pae naluluakia maga, e naga,
Satan e mari atae mari Satan e dave
pano dapale sava ? Go nalauna 24
sikai e pe vei tea tapotaeana du-
mana dipa e, nalauna wanogoe e
pe mari sa du. Go nasufha sikai 25
e pe vei tea tapotaeana dumana
dipa e, nasufha wanogoe e pe wo
mari sa du. Go Satan e pe wo 26
duleana dumana dipa e, po pei tea
tapotaeana, e pe mari sa du, ma e
pe nopu. Ma te naata, epe ta soli 27
tea kasua mau, e pe mari sa paki
ekopu ni nasufha ki tea kasua,
po dape pavakoto naloriki aneana
maga ; ma e pe vea soli a, e pe wo
edaku dape pavakoto nasufha ane-
ana. Lomau a noa ki mu, naga 28
Namarinaleosaana adeada maga
mamau puti euga wo magi naatamoli
natuda maga pei tea midoakikoro-


koroana, go navasasakiana adeada
29 maga waina eu pe wo pasa sa ki ara :
ma naata waina e pe wo pasa sa
ki dipa Naatana Tapu e pe wo da
dape namidoakikorokoroana man
pa pa e pe tu man du, ma sogi
ni namarinaleosaana sikai waina e
30 du man du e pe wo doko asa : nala-
kena eu naga, E peani naatana
loa sikai.
31 Go pilana go taina maga eu
rumai; go eu lawodu katama, po
dipakilua pa punusi a, po soso e.
32 Go taua sikai ni naatamoli maga
eu do natano dalivirigoro e; go eu
noa ki nia, eu naga, Pa leo, pilama
go taiina maga katama eu laga ako.
33 Go e pasadara ra, po naga, Sei e
34 pei pilagu go taigu maga ? Go e
leopilialia tea maga waina eu do
natano dalivirigoro e, po naga, Kuga
35 leo, pilagu go taigu maga ! Nala-
kena naata waina e pe wo mari
namasauana ki Supe, nae e pe vei
taigu, go goregu, go pilagu.
Matele 4,
1 Go e moro atulake navasapisei-
kiana elau. Go taua warua sa
sikai ni naatafnoli maga eu saisai
punusi a, dapala waina e pagi rarua
sikai, po dasake natasi; go taua
mamau ni naatamoli maga eu doko
2 elau ni euta. Go e pasapisei ki da
pae naluluakia maga tea lapa, po
noa ki da navasapiseikiana aneana,
3 e naga, Kuga takidorogo: Kuga leo,
tea sapuraki e dave pano naga ega
4 sapuraki: go e pakilina, ragi waina
e do sapuraki, naga napati seara e
dowo pisari nadigi ni napua, go
manu maga eu rumai po dadinomi
sa. Go tea pota seara e dowo paid
malo ni vatu, waina natano e pisa-
mau asa ; go e pisou maraverave,
6 nalakena natano e da matulu mau :
go ragi waina elo e sake, e pei tea
taparakiana ; go e kokolo, nalakena
e dika nakoana. Go tea pota 7
seara e dowo maleoputo ni tea
makalikali maga, go tea makalikali
maga eu ulua sake, po mari a
e dodo, go e da pitua ki nawana
mau. Go tea pota seara e dowo 8
sili paid natano wia, po pitua ki na
wana, e do ulua sake po lavulavu ;
go e dau, ki rualima dolu, go ki
rualima latesa, go ki ponotia sikai.
Go e naga, Naata waina e pilake 9
nadaliga maga naga ega rogo, ega
rogo.
Go ragi waina e sikina doko, tea 10
maga waina eu doko dalivirigoro e
go tea rualima sikai tamate dua eu
pusuusu paki nia ki naluluakia
wanogoe maga. Go e noa ki da, ell
naga, Paia ni namarakiana ki Supe
e pei tea vituakiana paki mu : ma
tea maga waina eu doko etaku, naleo
maga mamau puti eu madeada pei
tea mariana pae naluluakia maga :
naga tea waina eu leosai euga 12
leosai, po da leoatae mau ; go naga
tea waina eu dogo euga rogo, po da
midoa ki atae mau; mase eu pe
liliu umai, go e pe madeada pei tea
midoakikorokoroana. Go e noa ki 13
da, e naga, Ku da atae naluluakia
wanogoe kite ? go kuga wo atae
naluluakia maga mamau puti dapale
sava ? Tea sapuraki e sapura ki 14
navasaana. Go tea maga waia eu 15
pei tea ni nadigi ni napua, waina na
vasaana e pei tea sapurakiana asa ;
go ragi waina eu dogo, Satan e umai
maraverave, po dapelua navasaana
waina e pei tea sapurakiana ara.

pei tea maga waina eu pei tea sapu-

waina, ragi waina eu dogo navasaana,

nariesokiana kite nakopaleleana e
pakilina nalakena navasaana, eu pei


tea mariana eu dapilagona inarave-
18 rave. Go tea pota seara eu pei

lima latesa, go ki ponotia sikai.

23 umai paki lina. Te naata sikai e
pe vilake nadaliga maga naga ega
24 rogo, ega rogo. Go e noa ki da, e

pe nadi ki napati ni nawa nakau

28 a mau. Natano e duinana dau ki
nawana; nauluna e pea, mokai e

maraki ni nasufna ni nasaisaiana ;

go tea maga waina eu dagi po lala-
gaarova parua. Go ragi waina e 39
paki ekopu, e noa ki da, e naga,

eda mate mau, ma e maturu. Go 40
eu muru ki nia. Ma nae, ragi waina e

Matele 6.
Go e meludua ki tokora wanogoe 1
pano; go e umai paki navanua
aneana ; go tea vasapiseikiana ane-
ana maga eu dausi a. Go ragi 2
waina e po pei sabbath, e atulake
navasapiseikiana ekopu ni nasufna
hi nasaisaiana : go tea lapa eu dogo
e po saramakoto, po naga, Naata-
moli waia e peani tea maga waia eu
pae esava ? go, Namanumatuaana
waina e pei tea vituakiana paki
naatamoli waia e pei nasava, go

ni Simon kite ? go gorena maga eu
da doko tokora waia sikoti gida kite?

Yesu e noa ki da, e naga, Prof eta
sikai e da dika nadodomadaganiana

kuga va punusi. Go ragi waina eu

Go e maraverave pasadie tea vasa- 45
piseikiana aneana maga naga euga
vagi rarua, go naga euga vea pano
paki taleva kerua paki Betbsaida,
ragi waina nae e dapera ki taua ni
naatamoli maga. Go ragi waina e 46
dule ki sua ra, e paki tava pano naga
ega tapasavasa. Go ragi waina e 47
maligo, rarua e doko maleoputo ni
natasi, go nae e sikina doko euta.
Go e punusi ra eu pitinutinu ki 48
navalosiana, nalakena nalagi e sau
pae kivea ki da, go e umai punusi ra,
e surata natasi, e alagoro pei nava-
vaigoroana kevati ni napogiana ; go
e naga ega liu ra pano; ma ragi 49
waina eu punusi a e surata natasi,
eu midoa ki nia naga e pei naatana
sikai, go eu pioso: nalakena eu
mamau puti punusi a, po manaunau
asa. Ma e pasa ki da maraverave, 50
po noa ki da, e naga, Kuga marasike:
Kinau nea ; kuga ta mataku mau.
Go e pagi rarua punusi ra ; go nalagi 51
e maro: go eu saramakoto parua


52 napalauda ; nalakena eu da midoa-
kiatae nalo ni bred maga wanogoe
mau, ma napopoda e kasua doko.
53 Go ragi waina eu duagoto sua, eu
rumai paki navanua paki Cennesa-
-54 ret, po diroa ki vatu. Go ragi waina
eu meludua ki rarua uruai, narei eu
55 leoatae a maraverave, po sava pasara
navanua mamau wanogoe daliviri,
po atulake dapetape pasara tea
sasana maga eu one naweweleda one,
tokora waina eu dogo naga e doko
56 asa. Go tokora waina e pe vaki
asa, natokoana kiki maga, kite na
tokoana warua maga, kite navanua
maga, eu doropusi tea sasana maga
malo ni navakokotoana maga, po
pavarani a naga euga kisidogo
narepu ni sugoro aneana ; go tea
maga waina eu kisidogo e eu pei tea
maripauriana.
Matele 7.
1 Go Farisi maga, go te seara ni tea
midiri maga, eu saisai punusi a, eu
2 pae Yerusalem umai, po punusi naga
seara ni tea vasapiseikiana aneana
maga eu gani navinaga adeada ki
nainelearuda loa, waina e pei, eu
3da pei tea vavanokiana mau. Na
lakena Farisi maga, go tea ni Yudea
maga mamau puti, eu pe ta pavano
inata ki nainelearuda maga mau, eu
pe ta ganikani mau, eu dapesoki
navasaana vituakiana ki tea ni
4 tagona tuai maga : go ragi waina eu
pae malo ni navakokotoana umai, eu
pe ta loloso mau, eu pe ta ganikani
mau : go tea pota lapa eu doko,
waina eu dape ra naga euga tapesoki
ra, nasarueana ni lasamunu maga, go
ni pot maga, go ni lasa ni bras maga.
5 Go Farisi maga go tea midiri maga
eu pusuusu paki nia, eu noa, Eka-
sana tea vasapiseikiana anigo maga
eu da surata pae navasaana vitua-
kiana ki tea ni tagona tuai maga
mau, ma eu gani navinaga adeada ki
nainelearuda loa ? Go e noa ki da, 6
e naga, Isaiab e peanoasai gara nalo
kakamu nakalepo maga, dapala
waina e pei tea midiriana,
Narei waia eu dodomadagani au
ki nagoleda,
Ma napopoda eu uvea ki nau.
Ma eu lotu ki palo ki nau, 7
Eu pasapiseiki navasapiseikiana
maga waina eu pei natipakiana
maga ki naatamoli maga.
Ku doropusi natipakiana ki Supe, 8
po dapesoki navasaana vituakiana
ki naatamoli maga. Go e noa ki da, 9
e naga, Ku dipa doa pia ki natipaki-
ana ki Supe, naga kuga rogo parati ki
navasaana vituakiana animu. Nala- 10
kena Moses e naga, Pa dodomadagani
tafnama go pilama ; go, Tea waina
e pasa sa ki tamana kite pilana, ega
mate namateana kakana : ma nimu 11
ku naga, Naatamoli sikai e pe noa ki
tamana kite pilana, e pe naga, Tea
aginau waina ku naga pa wo pia asa
e pei Korban, waina e pei, Tea
vituakiana paki Supe ; ku pe ta 12
moro suasua ki nia naga ega magi
tamana kite pilana mari te navatuna
mau ; ku mari navasaana ki Supe e 13
pei tea moli ki navasaana vituakiana
animu, waina ku pitua ki nia: go
tea tapala nogoe lapa ku mari ra.
Go e moro soso taua ni naatamoli 14
maga umai punusi a, po noa ki da,
e naga, Kuga mamau puti dogo au,
po midoakiatae : te navatuna sikai 15
waina e pae etaku ni naatamoli po
paki napalauna, e da mari atae mari
a e loa mau : ma naleo maga waina
eu dave naatamoli pano eu pei tea
maga waina eu mari naatamoli e loa.
[Te naata e pe vilake nadaliga maga 16
naga ega rogo, ega rogo.] Go ragi 17
waina e paki ekopu ni nasuina
meludua ki taua ni naatamoli maga,
tea vasapiseikiana aneana maga eu
pusuusu paki nia ki naluluakia
wanogoe. Go e noa ki da, e naga, 18
Nimu ma ku pei tea midoakisapo


dapalana kite ? Ku da midoaki-
atae man, naga sara naleo waina eu
pae etaku po paki napalau ni
naatamoli, eu mari sa mari a e loa ;
19 nalakena eu da sili paki napopona
mau, ma eu sili paki napelena, po
moro melu paki etaku ? e do mari
navinaga maga mamau puti eu dau-
-20 tau. Go e naga, Tea waina e dave
naatainoli pano, tea wanogoe e mari
21 naatamoli e loa. Nalakena namido-
doana maga waina eu sa, eu dave pae
napopo ni naatamoli maga, namari-
peleanamaga, navanakoana maga,
22 namaripunueana maga, namaripele-
ana ki tea vitawiri go ki tea laki
maga, namatamaguraana maga, na
sigisigileoana maga, nasorosoroana,
namasausauana, namatasaana, na
vasasakiana, nalomadagaana, na
23 manumatavusaana : tea sa maga
mamau puti wanogoe eu dave pae
napalauna; po mari naatamoli e loa.
21 Go e duleana fneludua ki tokora
wanogoe, po paki navanua ni Tair
go Sidon pano. Go e paki ekopu ni
nasuma sikai, po da masauna mau
naga te naata ega atae a : go e mari
25 sa doko loku. Ma maraverave na

kiki e peani naatana loa sikai, e dogo
nalo kakana, po umai, po dowo
26 pakitano pisari namelena maga. Go

go tea ni Sirofoinisia pae namatarau
aneana. Go e pavarani a naga ega
mari dimon ega tave meludua ki
27 natuna nagoroi pano. Go e noa ki

e da pia mau naga euga tape navi-
naga ki piakirikiri maga po nadi ki
28 nia dua kuria maga asa. Ma e pasa-
dara po noa ki nia, e naga, loro,
Nawota: kuria maga ma naruku-
ruku ni wede eu gani navero ni
29 navinaga ki piakirikiri maga. Go e

saana wanogoe pa vano ; dimon e po

pano. Go e paki nasuma aneana 30
pano, po papai piakiki e one nawe-

sua e pano.
Go e moro meludua ki navanua ni 31
Tair pano, po umai duaduru Sidon
paki natasi ni Calilea, duaduru
maleoputo ni navanua ni Dekapolis.
Go eu piragi tea paro sikai umai 32
punusi a, waina e pasa kite sa ; go

melearuna asa. Go e piragi a pano 33
fneludua ki taua ni naatamoli maga
paki malo daki sikai, po sai ki
nakinina paki nadaligana maga, go
e daniu, po kisidogo namenana ; go 34

dotorosova, po noa ki nia, e naga,
Effatha, waina e pei Pa masai. Go 35
nadaligana maga ero masai, go natali
ni namenana e pei tea veresiana, go
e pasa leana. Go e pasa parati ki 36
da naga euga ta noa kite naata asa
mau : nae e pasa parati ki parua ki
da asa, ma nara eu dogorogo ki
parua ki nia e parua liu sa. Go eu 37
saramakoto parua liu, po naga, E
po mari fnata ki naleo maga mamau
puti: edo mari tea paro eu dorogo,
go tea vei pusa eu pasa.
Matele 8.
Naaleatia maga wanogoe, ragi*l
waina taua warua sikai ni naatainoli
maga e moro doko, go eu da peani
te navatuna waina euga kani a mau,
e soso tea vasapiseikiana aneana
maga umai punusi a, po noa ki da,
e naga, A maritadodomi taua ni 2
naatamoli maga, nalakena eu po
sikoti au doko naaleatia dolu, go eu
da peani te navatuna waina euga
kani a mau : go a pe tipakilua ra eu 3
pe tamaladi paki nasuma adeada, eu
pe matekimala napua ; go te seara
kakada eu pae uvea umai. Go tea 4
vasapiseikiana aneana maga eu


pasadara e, eu naga, Te naata ega
wo mari atae mari naatainoli maga
waia euga vuka ki navinaga maso

paki da, e naga, Ku peani bred pisa 1

8 ra. Go eu ganikani, po puka ; go

umai pilake nasamasamaana ki
Tamana go agelo tautau maga euga

Matele 9.
Go edaku ki naaleatia latesa Yesu 1
e piragilua Petero, go Yakobo, go
Yoane, po piragi ra sake pano paid
tava varau pakilagi sikai, eu pei
nara mau : go e panopota naraeda : 2
go sugoro aneana maga eu lidalida, 3
eu dare parua liu ; dapala tea sarue
maga waina eu doko maramana eu
mari sa mari ra eu dare dakiusi ra.
Go Eliyah e pakilina ki da nae go 4
Moses : go ero pasa ki Yesu, nara go
nae eu duinada pasa paki da. Go 5
Petero e pasadara po noa ki Yesu, e
naga, Rabbi, e pia naga tuga toko
nea : go auga mari tapaupau euga
tolu ; anigo sikai, go agi Moses sikai,
go agi Eliyah sikai. Nalakena eda 6
atae tea waina ega vasadara asa mau ;
nalakena eu po mataku parua. Go 7
napopouru sikai e umai po melugoro
ra : go nadaleo sikai e dave pae
napopouru wanogoe umai, e naga,
Tea waia e pei Natugu tea dodomi-
ana aginau : kuga to dogo e. Go 8
maraverave, ragi waina eu leo pilia-
lia, eu da punusi te naata mau, ma
Yesu e sikina sikoti ra doko.
Go ragi waina eu do pae tave siwo 9
umai, e pasa parati ki da naga euga
ta noa kite naata tea maga waina
eu punusi ra mau, ma ragi waina
naatamoli Natuna ega wo duleana
sua iheludua ki tea mate maga euga
noa e. Go eu mauti navasaana 10
wanogoe, eu dumada pusuusu paki
da ki natuleanaana meludua ki tea
mate maga naga e pei nasava. Go 11
eu pusuusu paki nia, eu naga, Tea
midiri maga eu noa naga e one
Eliyah one naga ega vea umai. Go 12
e noa ki da, e naga, Eliyah e pea
umai lomau, po dape liliua ki naleo
maga mamau puti: go ekasana


e pei tea midiriana nalo ni naata-
moli Natuna, naga ega sua narogo-
kitesaana lapa po pei tea midoaki-
-13 daoana ? Ma a noa ki mu, naga
Eliyah e umai sua, go eu mari paki
nia dapala waina eu masauna, da-
pala waina e pei tea midiriana nalo
kakana.

wo pel tea edaku ni tea mamau puti,

36 Go e puati piakiki kiki sikai, po lawo

sikai kakada paenagisagu, e peviragi
au : go naata waina e pe viiagi au,

38 Yoane e noa ki nia, e naga, Tea
Vasapiseiki, au punusi naata sikai
e mari dimon maga eu dave pano
pae nagisama ; go au dipagoro e,
39 nalakena eda dausi gida mau. Ma
Yesuenaga, Kuga tadipagoroe mau;
nalakena te naata e da doko mau
waina ega wo mari nawosiana kasua
sikai pae nagisagu, go waina ega wo
mariatae pasa sa ki nau maraverave.
40 Nalakana naata waina e da pei walu
kokona ki gida mau e pei walu mami
41 ki gida. Nalakena naata waina epe
wo dua mu lasa sikai ni noai naga
kuga munugi a, nalakena ku pei tea
ki Kristo, lomau a noa ki mu, naga
ega wo da dape puoli ki namoriana
42 aneana mau. Go tea kirikiri maga
wanogoe waina eu saralomau au, te
naata e pe mari sikai kakada e pe
tapilagona, e pe wia ki naata wano-
goe vatu ma warua sikai e pe vei tea
sarakiana nanoana, go nae e pe vei
43 tea nadikiana paki natasi. Go na
melearuma e pe mari ko ku pe tapi-
lagona, pa takotovilua e : e pia ki-
go naga pa sili paki namauriana ku
pei gole, ma e sa ki-go naga pa veani
namelearufha dua naga pa vaki
cehenna pano, paki nakapu waina e
pe ta pei tea maripunueana mau;
44 tokora waina ula kakada e da mate
asa mau, go nakapu e da pei tea
45 maripunueana mau. Go nainelema
e pe mari ko ku pe tapilagona, pa
takotovilua e ; e pia ki-go naga pa
sili paki namauriana ku pei pito, ma
e sa ki-go naga pa veani nafhelema
dua naga pa vei tea nadikiana paki
cehenna; tokora waina ula kakada e 46
da mate asa mau, go nakapu e da
pei tea maripunueana mau. Go na 47
matama e pe mari ko ku pe tapila-
gona, pa vakulua e ega vano : e pia
ki-go naga pa sili paki namarakiana
ki Supe ku pei mata sikai, ma e sa
ki-go naga pa veani namatama dua
naga pa vei tea nadikiana paki
cehenna ; tokora waina ula kakada 48
e da mate asa mau, go nakapu e da
pei tea maripunueana mau. Nala- 49
kena sara naata euga wo pei tea
tasimenakiana ki nakapu, go sara
naviriana euga wo pei tea tasimena-
kiana ki natasimena. Natasimena 50
e pia : ma natasimena e pe iheta-
meta, ku pe wo mari a ega gagadi c
pe tapale sava ? Kuga veani natasi-
mena napalaumu, go kuga taihate
durnanu paki mu.
Matele 10.
Go e duleana iheludua ki tokora 1
wanogoe, po umai paki navanua ni
Yudea go taleva kerua ni Yordan ;
go taua maga ni naatamoli maga
eu moro saisai umai punusi a ; go,
e moro pasapisei ki da, dakiusi
waina e do mari a sal a vea. Go 2
Farisi seara eu rumai punusi a, po
pusuusu paki nia, eu naga, E pae
nawotaeana naga naatamoli sikai
ega nagoroi aneana kite ?
eu mari dogo e. Go e pasadara 3
po noa ki da, e naga, Moses e dipaki
mu nasava ? Go eu naga, Moses e 4
suasua naga auga midiri tusi ni
natoropusiana sikai, po dipakilua
e. Ma Yesu e noa ki da, e naga, 5

goe. Ma pae naatulakeana ni na 6
tawanakiana, E mari ra ero pei
naanoai go nagoroi. Nalakena tea 7
wanogoe naatamoli sikai ega toro-
pusi tamana go pilana eroga madoko.


Bgo ega vuluti anagoroi; go nara
dua eroga wo pei napokasi sikai
maau: nalakena tea wanogoe ero
da moro pei edua mau, ma ero
9 pei napokasi sikai maau. Nalakena
tea wanogoe tea waina Supe e
pilasai ki nia, naatamoli ega ta
10 mari a ega vamawota mau. Go
ragi waina eu doko ekopu ni nasuma

pusuusu paki nia ki tea wanogoe.

po tawiri tea pota, e pe maripele
12 dipa e: go nagoroi epe wo dipakilua
naanoai aneana, po laki tea pota,
e pe mari pele.
13 Go eu piragi piakirikiri kiki maga
umai punusi a naga ega kisidogo
ra : go tea vasapiseikiana maga eu
14 pasakasua ki da. Ma ragi waina
Yesu e punusi a, e maeto parua, po
noa ki da, e naga, Kuga suasua ki
piakirikiri kiki maga naga euga
umai punusi au ; kuga ta dipagoro
ra mau : nalakena namarakiana ki
Supe e pei tea ni tea dapalada maga.
15 Lomau a noa ki mu, naga Naata
waina e pe wo da dape namarakiana

16 ega wo da sili paki asa mau. Go e
dape ra eu doko naruna maga, po

aruna maga ara.

Go Yesu e leo pilialia, po noa ki 23

maga parua ki navasaana aneana.

rakiana ki Supe. Go eu sarama- 26

pauriana ? Yesu e leo punusi ra 27

maga mamau puti. Petero_e pae 28

Matele 11.
1 Go ragi waina eu rumai paki

2 naga, Koroga vaki natokoana kiki
waina e doko kivea ki mu : go ragi

maraverave papai ass tureai sikai,
waina e pei tea likotiana, waina te
naata e ko da sakesake asa mau;
koroga veresi a, po piragi a umai.
3 Go te naata e pe noa ki mu, e pe
naga, Ekasana koro mari tea waia ?
koroga naga, Nawota e masauna; go
ega wo dipakilua e liliu umai fnara-
-4 verave. Go ero pano, po papai ass
tureai sikai, waina e pei tea likotiana

goe eu noa ki da, eu naga, Koro mari

ero noa ki da dapala waina Yesu e
7 noa e : go eu suasua ki da asa. Go

punusi Yesu, po sawa ki sugoro

8 asa. Go tea lapa eu pelesa ki sugoro
adeada maga napua; go tea pota
seara ki ara ni nakau maga, waina
eu daelua ra melu vanua maga.
