maga waina eu dausi, eu pioso,
Hosanna ; Tea waina e umai pao
nagisa ni Yebovah e pei tea vasa-
piakiana: Namarakiana waina elO
umai e pei tea vasapiakiana, na

sanna tokora maga ni elagi mau.

ni nasufna tapu ; go ragi waina e leo

pae Betbania umai, e pitolo. Go 13

Go tea vasapiseikiana aneana maga
eu dogo e.

maga eu dogo e, po laga dapala

Matele 12.
Go e atulake pasa ki da pae nalu- 1
luakia maga. Naatafnoli sikai e
la wo roara ni vaine sikai, po mari-
goro e ki nakau ulua, po kili fnoru
ni nasua nawa ni vaine asa, po da vagi
nasuma varau pakilagi, po suasua

maga, po paki navanua pota sikai
pano. Go ragi ni pauna rago e 2

punusi tea wosiwosi natano maga,
naga tea wosiwosi natano maga euga
tua e ega tape nawa ni nakau ni

ra ; go nae eu mari a e pei wotu

ko peani tea sikai, natuna dodomi-
ana sikai: e dipakilua e edaku pa
punusi ra, e naga, Euga wo dodo-
madagani natugu. Ma tea wosi- 7
wosi natano maga wanogoe eu


dumada noa Id da, eu naga, Tea waia
e pei talakea ni paumaso ni tamana ;
kuga umai, tuga maripunue a, go
8 paumaso ega wo pei tea anigida. Go
eu puati a, po maripunue a, po nadi
ki nia paki etaku ni roara ni vaine.

ki roara ni viane paki tea pota maga.

ni naweloki:

pakilina,

kite, kite ega tika ? Tuga vitua, kite
15 tuga ta pitua mau ? Ma e atae na
kalepoana adeada, po noa ki da, e

16 umai. Go e noa ki da, e naga,

da, e naga, Kuga tua Kaisar naleo

Go Sadduki seara eu rumai punusi 18
a, waina eu noa naga namorodu-
leanaana e dika; go eu pusuusu paki 19
nia, eu naga, Tea Vasapiseiki, Moses
e midiri paki garni, naga Tea naata
taina e pe mate, po doropusi nagoroi
aneana e pe madoko, go e pe tika
natuna, taina ega viragi nagoroi
aneana, po magi taina mari nawora-
na euga vakilina. Tamataida larua 20
eu doko : go tea vea e piragi nagoroi
sikai, go e mate po da doropusi te
naworana mau; go kerua e piragi 21
a, po mate, e da doropusi te nawora-
na eu madoko mau ; go ketolu e 22
dapala nogoe : go_ tea larua eu da
doropusi te naworada mau. Edaku
mau nagoroi wanogoe ma e mate.
Ragi ni namoroduleanaana ega wo 23
pei nagoroi ki sei kakada ? nalakena
eu larua peani a epei nagoroi adeada.
Yesu e noa ki da, e naga, Ku da 24
midoakipele nalakena tea waia kite ?
ku da atae navasaana midiriana
maga mau, go nakasuana ki Supe
mau. Nalakena ragi waina euga wo 25
duleana meludua ki tea mate maga,
euga wo da pitawiri mau, go euga
wo da pei tea vituakiana euga laki
mau; ma euga wo dapala agelo
maga waina eu doko nakoroatelagi.
Ma nalo ni tea mate maga naga euga 26
wo pei tea sikeana duleana; ku ko
da peve tusi ki Moses, tokora ni
nakau makalikali, dapala waina
Supe e pasa ki nia, po naga, Kinau
a pei Supe ki Abraham, go Supe ki
Isaak, go Supe ki Yakobo ? Eda 27
pei Supe ki tea mate maga mau, ma
e pei Supe ki tea mauri maga : ku
midoakipele parua.
Go tea sikai ni tea midiri maga e 28
umai, po dogo ra eu dumada pululu
ki da, po atae naga e pasadara pia
ki da, e pusuusu paki nia, e naga,
Seve natipakiana e pei tea vea mau ?

pei, Pa rogo, Israel; Yehovah Supe
anigida, Yehovah e pei tea sikai

anigo ki napoporaa mamau, go ki

anigo mamau, go ki nakasuaana

ko. Te natipakiana pota sikai
waina e parua liu tea maga wanogoe

noa pae Naatana Tapu, e naga,

matua,

Go e pasapisei ki da, po naga, 38
Kuga leo padua ki tea midiri maga,
waina eu masauna naga euga suni
sugoro varau maga surata, go waina
eu masau navasadodomiana maga
malo ni navakokotoana maga, go 39
malo tasake vea maga ni nasufha ni
nasaisaiana maga, go malo kere one
vea maga ni nakaniana maga : waina 40
eu gani dinomi nasuma ki nagoroi
malepu maga, po dapasavasa parau
sorosoro ; nara euga wo dape na
tipakotoviana warua liu.
Go e dasake kivea ki nalia ni 41
mone, po punusi dapala waina taua
ni naatamoli maga eu nadi ki mone
paki nalia ni mone: go tea lapa
waina eu pei sogolapa eu nadi ki tea
warua paki asa. Go nagoroi malepu 42
sikai waina e pei tea tika e umai, po
nadi ki maite dua paki asa, waina e
pei farthing sikai. Go e soso tea 43
vasapiseikiana aneana maga umai
punusi a, po noa ki da, e naga,
Lomau a noa ki mu, naga Nagoroi
malepu waia, waina e pei tea tika,
e nadi ki tea waina e parua liu agi
tea maga mamau puti waina eu do
nadi paki nalia ni mone : nalakena 44
nara maga tea adeada e parau, go
eu nadi ki tea waina e du pele seara
kakana ; ma nae tea aneana e dika,
go e nadi ki puti tea waina e peani
a, tea mamau waina e mauri asa.

waina e pei namenaki atatoko,
waina e doropusi nasuma aneana e
madoko, po dua tea suasua aneana
maga naveinawotaana, e dua ra
nawosiana adeada e sarasara puti
ra, po dipa ki tea leoparati ki namata
naga ega leleogoro. Nalakena tea 35
wanogoe kuga to leleogoro : nalake
na ku da atae ragi waina nawota
ni nasuma ega wo umai asa mau,

matua, kite ragi ni toa e dare, kite
malipogi; naga epe umai marave- 36
rave ega ta papai mu ku pe maturu
mau. Go tea waina a noa ki mu asa 37
a noa ki tea maga mamau puti asa,

dakai nasuma tapu waia waina e pei
tea mariana ki namelearu maga, go
ragi ni naaleatia dolu aga wo davagi
tea pota sikai asa waina ega ta pei
tea mariana ki namelearu maga

fhaleoputo, po pusuusu paki Yesu,

Matele 16.
Go ragi waina sabbath e nopu, 1
Maria ni Macdala, go Maria Yakobo
pilana, go Salome, eu pakotovi tea
ni napo wia maga, naga euga umai
po puvurai ki nia. Go malipogi sa 2
ni naaleatia vea ni wiik, eu rumai
paki matigo ragi waina elo e sake
sua. Go eu do dumada noa Id da, 3
Sei ega wo manigida malulua ki vatu
iheludua ki namata ni matigo ? go 4
eu sike namatada, po punusi naga
vatu e pei tea maluluakiana liliu :
nalakena e parua sa. Go eu paki 5
ekopu ni matigo, po punusi natui-eai
sikai e do natano taleva ni matua, e
pei tea sugoroana ki sugoro tare
sikai; go eu maga parua. Go e n.oa 6
ki da, e naga, Kuga ta maga parua
mau: ku laga Yesu ni Nazareth,
waina e pei tea turiana nakau vala-
dagoto : e po duleana ; e da doko
nea mau : kuga leo, tokora waina eu
doropusi a e one asa ! Ma kuga 7
vano, kuga noa ki tea vasapiseikiana
aneana maga go Petero, naga E pea
ki mu paki Calilea pano : tokora
wanogoe kuga wo punusi a asa,
dakiusi waina e noa ki mu asa. Go 8
eu dave pano, po sava iheludua ki
matigo pano; nalakena narurururu-
ana go nasaramakotoana ero puati
ra : go eu da noa kite naata te
navatuna mau; nalakena eu mataku.
Go ragi waina e duleana malipogi 9
sa ni naaleatia vea ni wiik, e pea paki-
lina ki Maria ni Macdala, waina e
mari dimon larua eu dave iheludua
ki nia pano sala vea. Nae e pano po 10
dogorogo ki nia paki tea maga waina
eu sikoti a doko sala vea, eu do su-
sue po do dagi. Go nara, ragi waina 11
eu dogo naga e mauri, go naga nae e


punusi sua e, eu da saralomau mau.
Go edaku ki tea maga wanogoe e
pano pota pakilina ki tea rua kaka-
da, ragi waina ero surata paki na
vanua pano. Go nara ero pano po
dogorogo ki nia paki tea pota maga ;
go eu da saralomau navasaana
adeada mau.
Go e edaku pakilina ki tea rualima
sikai tamate sikai ragi waina eu kere
one ganikani; go e pasa kasua ki da
nasarateapaloana adeada go naka-
suaana ni napopoda, nalakena eu da
saralomau navasaana ki tea maga
waina eu punusi a edaku ki e du
leana mau. Go e noa ki da, e naga,
Kuga vaki maramana mamau, po
dogorogo ki narogorogoana wia paki
natawanaldana mamau. Tea waina
e saralomau po pei tea bapetizoana
ega wo pei tea mautipauriana ; ma
tea waina e da saralomau mau ega
wo pei tea tipakotoviana. Gonavai- 17
vaiana maga waia euga wo dausi
sikoti tea maga waina eu saralomau :
pae nagisagu euga wo mari dimon
maga euga tave fhelu pano ; euga
wo pasa ki namena vau maga ; euga 18
wo pua dakati maata maga, go eu pe
munu te navatuna ni namateana,
epewo da mari sa ki da mau; euga
wo pusake nainelearuda maga tea
sasana maga, go euga wo moro pia.
Go Nawota Yesu, edaku ki e pasa 19
ki sua ra, e pei tea tapeana sake
paki nakoroatelagi pano, po dasake
pisari namelearu ni matua ni Supe.
Go nara eu dave pano po dogorogo 20
sara tokora, Nawota e do posiwosi
sikoti ra, po do lawosoki navasaana
pae navaivaiana maga waina eu
dausi a. Amen.

Matele 1.
Nalakena tea lapa eu maridogo
naga euga midiri tusi sikai nalo ni
naleo maga waina eu pei tea saralo-
maupakavuroana maleoputo kaka
gida, dapala waina tea maga waina
eu punusi ra po pei tasiga maga ni
navasaana pae ragi ni naatulakeana
pa pa, eu pitua ki da paki gida,
kinau ma waina a puausi parati ki
naleo maga mamau puti pae naatu-
lakeana pa pa, a midoa ki nia naga
e pia naga aga midiri lawolawo ki da
paki-go, Theofilo wia liu ; naga pa 4
atae rnata ki naveilomauana ni tea
maga waina ku pei tea vasapisei-
kiana ara.

ni Yudea, tea viri sikai e doko,

Paki Abraham go nawofaworana
pa pa ega tu mau du.
Go Maria e doko sikoti a doko e 56
alagoro pei atelagi dolu, po moro
liliu paki nasuma aneana pano.
Go ragi ki Elisabeth e pei tea 57
vakavuroana naga ega visola ; go e
piragi natuna naanoai sikai. Go tea 58


ni maladigi ki nia maga go nama-
tarau aneana maga eu dogo naga
Yehovali e mari parua ki nadodo-
miana aneana paki nia : go eu lae-
-59 laea sikoto a. Go e pakilina naaleatia
kelatolu, naga eu rumai naga euga
tovadavivi piakiki wanogoe ; go eu
naga euga soso e ki Zakaria, pae
60 nagisa ni tamana. Go pilana e pasa-
dara po naga, Ee; ma ega wo pei tea
61 sosoana ki Yoane. Go eu noa ki
nia, eu naga, Namatarau anigo maga
tea sikai kakada e da pei tea sosoana
62 ki nagisa wanogoe mau. Go eu
dasoki paki tamana, e pe masauna
naga ega vei tea sosoana ki sei ?
63 Go e datago napapa midiriana sikai,
go e midiri, e naga, Nagisana Yoane.
64 Go eu maga puti. Go nawokana e
e pei tea wolagatiana maraverave,
go namenana e maviri, go e pasa, po
65 pasapia ki Supe. Go namataku-
ana e pakilina ki tea maga mamau
puti waina eu doko dalivirigoro ra :
go navasaana maga mamau puti
wanogoe. eu pei tea rogorogokiana
usuraki malo ni tava mamau ni
66 Yudea. Go tea maga mamau puti
waina eu dogo ra eu doropusi ra
napopoda, eu naga, Nalakena tea
wanogoe piakiki waia ega wo da-
pale sava ? Nalakena namelearu ni
Yehovali e sikoti a doko.
67 Go tamana Zakaria e pura ki
Naatana Tapu, -po pea noa sai, e
naga,
68 Yehovali, Supe ki Israel, ega vei
tea vaspiakiana ;
Nalakena e umai punusi narei
aneana po madeada marina
tauluaana,
69 Po manigida mari napati sikai ni
namautipauriana e pakilina
Nasuma ni tea suasua aneana
David
70 (Dapala waina e pasa pae nawoka
ni profeta tautau aneana maga
pae ragi vea ni maramana pa
pa pa),
Namautipauriana fneludua ki tea 71
kokona kigida maga, go melu
dua ki namelearu ni tea maga
mamau puti waina eu pilosi
gida;
Naga ega mari nadodomiana paki 72
tamagida maga,
Go naga ega midoa ki navasa-
sokiana tapu aneana;
Navivisaana waina e pivisa paki 73
Abrakam tamagida asa,
Naga ega tua gida naga tuga vei 74
tea vualuaana fneludua ki na
melearu ni tea kokona ki gida
maga,
Go naga tuga maneana suasua
po da mataku mau,
Doko natautauana go namari- 75
naleoleanaana naaleatia anigida
maga mamau puti.
lo go nigo, piakiki, pa wo pei 76
tea sosoana ki profeta ki Tea
Vakilagi Mau :
Nalakena pa wo surata pea ki
narae ni Yekovalx naga pa mari-
mata ki napua aneana maga ;
Naga pa tua narei aneana naatae- 77
ana ni namautipauriana
Pae namidoakikorokoroana ni na
marinaleosaana adeada maga,
Nalakena namaritadodomiana ki 78
Supe anigida,
Waina natola ega wo pae elagi
umai punusi gida asa,
Naga ega maramalaga paki tea 79
maga waina eu doko namaligo
go melu ni namateana ;
Naga ega viragi namelegida maga
paki napua ni natamateana.
Go piakiki wanogoe e do atumaki, 80
po do kasua ki naatana, po doko
masopalo maga doko pa pa paki
naaleatia ni navakilina-ki-Israel-ana
aneana.
Matele 2.
Go e pakilina naaleatia maga wa- 1
nogoe, natawanakiana sikai e melu


Kaisar Aucusto pano, naga mara-
mana mamau ega vei tea midiriana
2 tusi. Namidiriana wanogoe e pea
pei tea mariana ragi waina Kurenio
3 e pei tea maramara ni Siria. Go eu
pano puti naga euga vei tea midiri-
ana, sara naatamoli eu paki natoko-
-4 ana adeada sarasara ra. Go Yosef
ma e sake pae Calilea pano, meludua
Id natokoana ni Nazareth, paki Yu-
dea, paki natokoana ki David, waina
e pei tea sosoana Id Bethlehem,
nalakena nae e pei tea ni nasuma go
5 nawora ni David ; naga ega vei tea
midiriana sikoti Maria, waina e
maneana pei tea vasasokiana, go
6 waina e diena. Go e pakilina, ragi
waina ero doko tokora wanogoe,
naga naaleatia maga eu pei tea
vakavuroana naga nae ega visola.
7 Go e piragi natuna naanoai taka-
lapa; go e pivisi a ki nakulukulu,
po lesi a e one siloa sikai ni horse,
nalakena te tokora e da madeada
doko nasuma ni namenakiana mau.
8 Go tea leo parati ki shiip seara
eu doko navanua wanogoe eu doko
namalasi, po do pavaigoro navata
9 adeada pogi. Go agelo ki Yehovah
sikai e lawodu pisari ra, go nasama-
samaana ni Yehovah e laga dali-
virigoro ra: go eu mataku parua.
10 Go agelo e noa ki da, e naga, Kuga
ta mataku mau ; nalakena kuga leo,
a manimu dape narogorogoana wia
ni nalaelaeaana warua umai, waina
11 ega wo pei agi narei mamau : nala-
kena Tea Maumau-pauri sikai, waina
e pei Kristo Yehovah, e po manimu
pakilina masoso, natokoana ki David.
12 Go tea waia e manimu pei navaivai-
ana kakana ; Kuga wo papai pipia
sikai waina e pei tea vivisiana ki na
kulukulu, po one siloa sikai ni horse.
13 Go iharaverave taua sikai ni taua
ni nakoroatelagi eu sikoti agelo wa-
nogoe eu samasamani Supe,po naga,
14 Nasamasamaana agi Supe tokora
maga ni elagi mau.
Go natamateana maramana ma-
leoputo ni naatamoli maga
waina e midoakimata Id da.
Go e pakilina, ragi waina agelo 15
maga eu meludua ki da paki nakoro-
atelagi pano, tea leo parati ki shiip
maga wanogoe eu dumada noa ki da,
eu naga, Tuga vaki Bethlehem pano
ragi waia, po punusi naleo wanogoe
waina e po pakilkia, waina Yehovah
e mari a e pei tea ataeana paki gida.
Go eu rumai iharaverave, po papai 16
Maria go Yosef, go pipia e one siloa
sikai ni horse one. Go ragi waina 17
eu punusi sua e, eu noasai navasa-
ana waina e pei tea noaana paki da
nalo ni piakiki wanogoe. Go tea 18
maga mamau puti waina eu dogo e
eu maga tea maga waina eu pei tea
noaana paki da pae tea leo parati ki
shiip maga. Ma Maria e midoaki- 19
soki navasaana maga wanogoe, po
midoa ki usiusi ra napopona. Go 20
tea leo parati ki shiip maga eu liliu,
eu do samasamani po do-pasapia
ki Supe nalakena tea maga mamau
puti waina eu dogo ra po punusi
ra, dakiusi waina e pei tea noaana
paki da.
Go ragi waina naaleatia latolu eu 21
pei tea vakavuroana naga euga
tovadavivi asa, nagisana e pei tea
sosoana ki YESU, waina e pei tea
sosoana ki nia pae agelo e pea ki
pilana e diena ki nia.
Go ragi waina naaleatia maga 22
ni namari-dautau-ki-da-ana pae na
wotaeana ki Moses eu pei tea vaka-
vuroana, ero dape a sake paki Yeru-
salem, naga eroga lawo ki nia narae
ni Yehovah (dakiusi waina e pei tea
midiriana na wotaeana ki Yehovah,
e naga, Sara naanoai waina eu pei 23
takalapa euga wo pei tea sosoana ki
tea tapu ki Yehovah), go naga eroga 24
vitua ki naviriana sikai ega vae tea
waina e pei tea noaana nawotaeana
ki Yehovah, e naga, Taroa ega rua,
kite tokopea vusavusa ega rua. Go 25


kuga leo, naatamoli sikai e doko
Yerusalem, waina nagisana Simeon ;
go naatamoli wanogoe e leana po
matau ki Supe, e do leogoro nava-
kavakaleana ni Israel: go Naatana
26 Tapu e doko asa. Go e pel tea noa-
saiana paki nia pae Naatana Tapu,
naga ega ta punusi namateana man
pa pa ega vea punusi Kristo ki
27 Yeliovah. Go e doko Naatana umai
paki roara ni nasuma tapu : go
ragi waina tea matua maga ero dape
piakiki Yesu umai paki roara, naga
eroga mari nalo kakana ega vae
28 natomariana ni nawotaeana, nae e
dape a paki naruna maga, go e pasa-
pia ki Supe, po naga,
29 Ragi waia ku suasua ki tea suasua
anigo naga ega inelu, Talake-
agu 0,
Pae navaaaana anigo, doko nata-
mateana;
30 Nalakena namatagu ero punusi
namautipauriana anigo,
31 Waina ku marimata ki nia narae
ni narei maga mamau puti;
32 Namarama sikai naga ega marama
lagati nalauna pota maga,
Go nasamasamaana ki narei anigo
Israel.
33 Go tamana go pilana ero do maga
nalakena tea maga waina eu pei tea
31 noaana nalo kakana; go Simeon e
pasapia ki da, po noa ki pilana
Maria, e naga, Pa leo, piakiki waia
e pei tea lawokiana raki narowoana
go natuleanaana ki tea lapa ni
Israel; go naga ega vei navaivaiana
sikai waina ega wo pei tea vasadu-
-35 goroana; io go lova sikai ega wo
sasama natafna; naga namidodoana
maga ni napopo ni tea lapa euga vei
36 tea maripakasakiana. Go Anna e
doko, profeta nagoroi sikai, natu ni
Panuel, tea ni nawora ni Asher (nae
e pei tea ni naaleatia lapa, nara ma
anawota ero dua doko natau larua
pae ragi ni naveinaataraana aneana,
37 go e pei malepu natau rualima latolu
tamate pati), waina e da fheludua ki
nasuma tapu mau, e do magi Supe
suasua ki navaliana maga go nava-
varaniana maga pogi go aleati. Go 38
e lawodu pisari ra aura wanogoe, go
nae ma e pasadodomata ki Supe, po
pasa asa paki tea maga mamau puti
waina eu do leogoro natauluaana
ni Yerusalem. Go ragi waina 39
ero mari sua naleo maga mamau
puti waina eu pae nawotaeana ki
Yehovah, eu liliu paki Calilea pano,
paki natokoana adeada Nazareth.
Go piakiki wanogoe e do atumaki, 40
po do kasua, e do pei tea vakavuro-
ana ki namanumatuaana : go nasau-
piana ki Supe e doko asa doko.
Go tea matua aneana ero paki 41
Yerusalem pano sara natau ragi ni
nasaisaiana ni navakalauana. Go 42
ragi waina e pei tea ni natau rualima
sikai tamate dua, eu sake pano pae
natomariana ni nasaisaiana wano-
goe ; go ragi waina eu pakavuro sua 43
naaleatia maga kakana, go nara ero
do liliu, piakiki Yesu e madoko
Yerusalem; go tea matua aneana
ero da atae a mau; ma nalakena 44
ero midoa ki nia naga e sikoti
taua ni naatamoli maga waina eu
mamau surata, ero surata napua ni
naaleatia sikai; go ero laga asa
maleoputo ni namatarau adeada
maga go ni tea maga waina ero
atae ra : go ragi waina ero da papai 45
a mau, ero liliu paki Yerusalem, po
do laga asa. Go e pakilina, edaku 46
ki naaleatia dolu naga ero papai a
roara ni nasuma tapu, e do natano
maleoputo ni tea vasapiseiki maga,
e do dogo ra, po do pusuusu paki da :
go tea maga mamau puti waina eu 47
dogo e eu maga parua nalakena na
midoakiataeana aneana go navasa-
daraana aneana maga. Go ragi 48
waina ero punusi a ero saramakoto :
go pilana e noa ki nia, e naga,
Riakiki, e kasana ku mari dapalana
paki garni ? pa leo, tamaina go


kinau aro laga ako dogo kite sa.
49 Go e noa ki da, e naga, Ekasana koro
laga au ? koro da atae mau naga e
one au one naga aga toko nasuina
50 ki Tamagu kite ? Go ero da midoa
ki atae navasaana waina e noa
51 ki da asa mau. Go e siwo sikoti ra
pano, po umai paki Nazareth ; go e
doko etano paki da: go pilana e
midoa ki soki navasaana maga ma-
mau puti wanogoe doko napopona.
52 Go Yesu edo disu ki namanu-
matuaana go ki navarauana go ki
nasaupiaana sikoti Supe go naata-
moli maga.
Matele 3.
1 Go natau rualima sikai tamate
lima ni namarakiana ki Tiberio
Kaisar, ragi waina Pontio Pilato e
pei tea maramara ni Yudea, go
Herod e pei tetrarke ni Calilea, go
taina Filipo e pei tetrarke ni nava-
nua ni Iturea go ni Trakonitis, go
2 Lusania e pei tertarke ni Abeline, go
Annas go Caiafas ero pei tea viri
warua liu, navasaana ki Supe e umai
paki Yoane natu ni Zakaria maso-
-3 palo. Go e umai paki navanua
mamau waina e doko dalivirigoro
Yordan, e do dogorogo ki nabapeti-
zoana ni namidoakidoaana paki na
midoakikorokoroana ni namarina-
-4 leosaana maga ; dapala waina e pei
tea midiriana tusi ni navasaana maga
ki profeta Isaiah,
Nadaleo ni tea waina e pioso
masopalo,
Kuga marimata ki napua ki
Yehovah,
Kuga mari napua tuniana aneana
maga euga leana.
5 Sara napaloa euga wo pei tea
vakavuroana,
Go sara tava warua go sara tava
kiki euga wo pei tea tapeana
pakitano;
Go tea tagele maga euga wo leana,
Go napua ragoragoa maga euga
wo matemate ;
Go sara napokasi euga wo punusi 6
namautipauriana ki Supe.
Nalakena tea wanogoe e noa ki 7
taua maga ni naatainoli maga waina
eu dave pano naga euga vei tea
bapetizoana pae asa, e naga, Maata
sa natuda maga, sei e noa ki
sai mu naga kuga sava dua ki na
maetoana waina ega wo umai ? Na 8
lakena tea wanogoe kuga tau ki na
wamu maga waina eu pia ki namido-
akidoaana, go kuga ta pae asa noa
napalaumu, naga Abraham e pei
tamagami: nalakena a noa ki mu,
naga Supe e mari atae magi Abra-
ham mari natuna maga euga vakilina
melu vatu maga waia eu one. Go 9
ragi waia tagoto ma e pei tea toro-
pusiana e one nalake ni nakau maga
one: nalakena tea wanogoe sara
nakau waina eu da dau ki nawada
wia mau eu pei tea taeana dowo,
po pei tea nadikiana paki nakapu.
Go taua maga ni naatainoli maga eu 10
pusuusu paki nia, eu naga, Nalakena
tea wanogoe auga mari nasava ? Go 11
e pasadara po noa ki da, e naga, Tea
waina e peani sugoro dua, ega tua
tea waina e dika ; go tea waina e
peani navinaga, ega mari ega tapala
nogoe. Go tea tape nasautoga seara 12
ma eu rumai naga euga vei tea
bapetizoana, go eu noa ki nia, eu
naga, Tea Vasapiseiki, auga mari
nasava ? Go e noa ki da, e naga, 13
Tea waina e manimu pei tea tawana-
kiana kuga ta dape parua liu sa mau.
Go tea ni navakalq seara ma eu 14
pusuusu paki nia, eu naga, Go kina-
mi auga mari nasava ? Go e noa
ki da, e naga, Kuga ta mari sa kite
naata mau, go kuga ta dapepava-
koto te navatuna mau, go kuga maro
namoriana animu.
Go ragi waina narei eu do leogoro, 15
go naatainoli maga mamau puti eu
do midoakiusiusi napopoda nalo ni


16 Yoane, mase nae pei Kristo ; Yoane
e pasadara, po noa ki putira ,enaga.
Kinau a bapetizo mu ki noai lomau ;
ma tea waina e kasua liu au e umai,
waina natali ni namele vasiana
aneana maga a da pia mau naga aga
veresi a : nae ega wo bapetizo mu
17 ki Naatana Tapu go ki nakapu; tea
silaki aneana edo namelearuna, naga
ega mari malo wokalesue aneana ega
tautau puti, go naga ega saisai ki
wbit paki ekopu ni nasuma ni wbit
aneana; ma ega wo dapara ki
napolagana ki nakapu waina e pe ta
pei tea maripunueana mau.
18 Go edo pasa parati ki narei ki
navasaana pota lapa po dodogorogo
19 ki narogorogoana wia paki da ; ma
Herod tetrarke, ragi waina e pei
tea vasakasuakiana pae Yoane nalo
ni Herodia nagoroi ki taina, go nalo
ni tea sa maga mamau puti waina
20 Herod e mari ra, e moro sokari ra ki
tea waia dapaugoro puti ra,ekokoro
Yoane ekopu ni nasuma ni navavai-
goroana.
21 Go e pakilina, ragi waina narei
mamau eu pei tea bapetizoana sua,
go Yesu ma e pei tea bapetizoana
sua, go ragi waina e do dapasa-
-22 vasa, nakoroatelagi e pamawota, go
Naatana Tapu e siwo e suruoli napa-
toko ni tokopea sikai, e umai lawo
asa, go nadaleo sikai e dave na
koroatelagi umai, e naga, Nigo ku
pei Natugu tea dodomiana aginau ;
a midoakimata ki-go.

pei natu ni Yoda, waina e pei natu
ni Yoanan, waina e pei natu ni

waina e pei natu ni Neri, waina e pei
natu ni Melki, waina e pei natu ni

waina e pei natu ni Elmadam, waina

pei natu ni Matthat, waina e pei
natu ni Levi, waina e pei natu ni

waina e pei natu ni Yosef, waina e
pei natu ni Yonam, waina e pei natu
ni Eliakim, waina e pei natu ni 31
Melea, waina e pei natu ni Menna,
waina e pei natu ni Mattatha, waina
e pei natu ni Nathan, waina e pei
natu ni David, waina e pei natu ni 32

ni Nahshon, waina e pei natu ni Am- 33
minadab, waina e pei natu ni Arni,
waina e pei natu ni Hezron, waina e
pei natu ni Perez, waina e pei natu
ni Yudah, waina e pei natu ni Yakob, 34
waina e pei natu ni Isaak, waina e
pei natu ni Abraham, waina e pei
natu ni Terah, waina e pei natu ni 35
Nahor, waina e pei natu ni Seruc,
waina e pei natu ni Reu, waina e pei

waina e pei natu ni Kainan, waina e 36

waina e pei natu ni Enok, waina e -

Matele 4.
1 Go Yesu, waina e pura ki Naatana
Tapu, e liliu pae Yordan po pei tea
viragiana pae Naatana masopalo
2 naaleatia rualima pati, e do pei tea
maridogoana pae diabolo. Go eda
gani te navatuna naaleatia maga
wanogoe mau: go ragi waina eu
3 nopu, e pitolo. Go diabolo e noa
ki nia, e naga, Ku pe vei Supe
Natuna, pa tipa ki vatu waia naga
4 ega vei bred sikai. Go Yesu e pasa-
dara paki nia, e naga, E pei tea
midiriana, naga Naatamoli ega wo
sda mauri pae bred sikina mau. Go
e pixagi a sake, po pisei ki nia nama-
rakiana maga mamau puti ni mara-
mana namata makali sikai ni ragi.
6 Go diabolo e noa ki nia, e naga, Aga
wo dua ko naveinawotaana mamau
puti waia, go nasamasamaana kaka-
da; nalakena e pei tea vituakiana
paki nau ; go a dua tea waina a
7 masauna naga aga tua e asa. Nala-
kena tea wanogoe nigo ku pe lotu
naraegu, tea mamau puti eu pe wo
8 pei tea anigo. Go Yesu e pasadara
po noa ki nia, e naga, E pei tea
midiriana, naga Pa lotu ki Yehovah
Supe anigo, go pa maneana suasua
9 ega sikina. Go e piragi a paki
Yerusalem, po lawo ki nia e lawodu
tea varau pakilagi ni nasufna tapu,
po noa ki nia, e naga, Ku pe vei
Supe Natuna, pa tumama nadi ki-go
10 pae nea pakitano : nalakena e pei
tea midiriana, naga
Ega wo dipa ki agelo aneana maga
nalo kakama, naga euga vavai-
goro ko;
11 go.
* Euga wo dapetape ko doko na
melearuda maga,
Naga pa ta dapilagona te vatu
sikai mau.
Go Yesu e pasadara po noa ki nia, 12
e naga, E pea tea noaana, naga Pa
ta maridogo Yehovah Supe anigo
mau.
Go ragi waina diabolo e marisua 13
sara namaridogoana, e meludua ki
nia pano pa pa naga te ragi.
Go Yesu e liliu pilake nakasuaana 14
ni Naatana paki Calilea: go narogo-
rogoana sikai nalo kakana e soka
pule usuraki navanua mamau wano-
goe daliviri. Go e do pasapiseiki 15
ekopu ni nasufna ni nasaisaiana
adeada maga, e pei tea samasama-
niana pae tea maga mamau puti.
Go e umai paki Nazareth, waina e 16
pei tea vakaleana asa : go e paki
ekopu ni nasufna ni nasaisaiana
naaleatia ni sabbath, pae natomari-
ana aneana, po duleana naga ega
veve. Go tusi ki profeta Isaiah el 7
pei tea vituakiana paki nia. Go e
pukepiri tusi wanogoe, po papai
tokora waina e pei tea midiriana
asa, e naga,
Naata ni Yehovah e doko au, 18
Nalakena e puvurai ki nau naga
aga rogorogo ki narogorogoana
wia paki tea tika maga :
E po dipakilua au umai naga aga
rogorogo ki naveresiana paki
tea viragiluapavakotoana maga,
Go ki namoroleosaiana paki tea
kesa maga,
Naga aga tipakilua tea mariporo-
worosiana maga euga vei tea
veresiana pano,
Naga aga rogorogo ki natau ni 19
nasaupiaana ki Yehovah.
Go e lulu ki tusi po dua tasiga asa 20
liliu, po dasake: go namata maga
ni tea maga mamau puti waina eu
doko ekopu ni nasufna ni nasaisai-
ana eu leosoki a. Go e pae asa noa 21
ki da, e naga, Masoso navasaana
midiriana wanogoe e po lolomana
nadaligamu. Go tea maga mamau 22
puti eu maneana noasokiso ki, po
maga navasaana ni nasaupiaana


maga waina eu dave pae nawokana
pano : go eu naga, Tea waia e da pei
23 Yosef natuna kite ? Go e noa ki da,
e naga, Kuga wo alagoro noa ki nau
naluluakia waia, Naatamoli ni medi-
sine, pa tumafha maripauri ko : tea
maga waina an po dogo ra eu pei tea
mariana Kapernaum, pa moro mari
24 ra tokora waia navanua anigo. Go e
naga, Lomau a noa ki mu, naga Te
profeta sikai e da pei tea viragiana
25 navauua aneana mau. Ma a noa ki
mu tea waina e pei lomau, naga
Nagoroi malepu lapa eu doko Israel
naaleatia maga ki Eliyah, ragi waina
nakoroatelagi e pono doko natau
dolu go atelagi latesa, dapala navi-
toloana warua sikai e pakilina usu-
26 raki navanua mamau ; go Elijah e
da pei tea tipakiluaana pa punusi
sikai kakada mau, ma e pei tea
tipakiluaana paki Sarepta sikai-
maau, ni navanua ni Sidon, punusi
nagoroi sikai waina e pei malepu.
27 Go lepero lapa eu doko Israel ragi
ki profeta Elisha ; go sikai kakada
e da pei tea mariana e dautau mau,
ma Naaman tea ni Siria e sikina pei
28 tea mariana e dautau. Go tea maga
mamau puti waina eu doko ekopu
ni nasuiha ni nasaisaiana, ragi waina
eu dogo tea maga wanogoe, eupura ki
29 namaritausuana; go eu duleana, po
nadi ki nia paki etaku ni natokoana,
po piragi a paki narae ni tava waina
natokoana adeada e pei tea tavagi-
ana asa, naga euga nadi ki nia siwo
30 pae napatira sikai pakitano. Ma
nae e pa duaduru ihaleoputo kakada
po surata pano.
31 Go e siwo umai paki Kapernaum,
natokoana sikai ni Calilea. Go edo
pasapisei ki da naaleatia ni sabbath :
32 go eu saraihakoto navasapiseikiana
aneana ; nalakena navasaana ane-
-33 ana e pilake naveinawotaana. Go
naatamoli sikai e doko ekopu ni
nasuiha ni nasaisaiana, waina e
peani naata ni dimon loa sikai;
go e pioso ki nadaleo kasua sikai,
e naga, Ako ! kinami auga kasa 34
ki-go, Yesu ni Nazareth ? ku Umai
naga pa maripunue garni kite ? a
atae ko, ku pei Tea Tapu ki Supe.
Go Yesu e pasa kasua ki nia, po 35
naga, Pa vunuta, po dave umai
fheludua ki nia pano. Go dimon
wanogoe e nadi ki nia paki natano
ihaleoputo, po dave umai meludua
ki nia pano, po da mari sa ki nia
mau. Go namagaana warua e paki 36
lina ki tea maga mamau puti, go eu
saisai pasa duihada paki da, po naga,
Navasaana waia e pei nasava ? na
lakena ki naveinawotaana go ki na
kasuaana e dipa ki naatana loa
maga go eu dave umai pano. Go 37
roroaleo sikai nalo kakana e soka-
pule paki sara tokora ni navanua
wanogoe daliviri.
Go e duleana meludua ki nasuiha 38
ni nasaisaiana, po paki ekopu ni
nasuiha ki Simon. Go Simon ana-
goroi pilana e pei tea vuatiana ki
namasakiana warua sikai; go eu
maneana pavarani a. Go e lawodu 39
kolovagoro e, po pasa kasua ki
namasakiana wanogoe ; go e marua
ki nia : go e duleana fharaverave,
po madeada suasua ki navinaga.
Go ragi waina elo e do musu, 40
tea maga mamau puti waina eu
peani tea manainai seara ki nasa-
sanaana visarasara maga eu piragi
ra umai punusi a; go e pusake
naihelearuna maga ara mamau puti,
po maripauri ra. Go dimon maga 41
ma eu dave umai meludua Id
tea lapa, eu pioso, po naga, Nigo
ku pei Supe Natuna. Go e pasa
kasua ki da, po da suasua ki da
naga euga vasa mau, nalakena eu
atae naga nae e pei Kristo.
Go ragi waina e pei aleati, e dave 42
umai po paki maso maladi sikai: go
taua maga ni naatamoli maga eu
laga asa, po umai punusi a, po naga
euga mauti a, naga ega ta meludua


43 ki da pano mau. Ma e noa Id da,
e naga, E one an one naga aga rogo-
rogo ki narogorogoana wia ni nama-
rakiana ki Supe paki natokoana
pota maga: nalakena a pei tea
tipakiluana umai raki tea wanogoe.
44 Go e do dogorogo ekopu ni
nasuma ni nasaisaiana maga ni
Calilea.
Matele 5.
1 Go e pakilina, ragi waina taua ni
naatamoli maga eu sogosogoni a
po dogo navasaana ki Supe, naga
nae e lawodu pisari namarourou ni
2 Cennesaret; go e punusi rarua
dua ero du pisari namarourou:
ma tea ara ika maga eu meludua ki
sua ra, go eu do same kupena ade-
-3 ada maga. Go e pagi rarua wano-
goe sikai kakada, waina e pei tea
ki Simon, po pavarani a naga ega
sai ki nia ega risu kiki meludua ki
euta pano. Go e dasake po pasa-
pisei ki taua maga ni naatamoli
4 maga pae rarua. Go ragi waina e
makoto ki navasaana, e noa ki
Simon, e naga, Pa sai ki nia paki
namorua, go kuga tiroa ki kupena
animu maga raki navuagoroana
5 sikai. Go Simon e pasadara po
naga, Nawota, au posiwosi napogi-
ana mamau, po da dape te nava-
tuna mau : ma nalakena navasaana
anigo aga wo diroa ki kupena maga.
G Go ragi waina eu mari sua tea
wanogoe, eu puagoro navata warua
sikai ni naika maga ; go kupena
maga eu pae asa naga euga mawora ;
7 go eu alovi tada ri maga waina eu
doko rarua kerua, naga euga umai
po silae ra. Go eu rumai, po paka-
■vuro sokata ki rarua, dapala waina
8 ero pae asa naga eroga moru. Ma
Simon Petero, ragi waina e punusi
a, e dowo pakitano pisari napatua
ni Yesu maga, po naga, Pa meludua
ki nau pano; nalakena a pei naata-
NGUNA-TONGOAN N.T.
fnoli mari naleo sa, Nawota 0.
Nalakena e maga parua, nara ma 9
tea maga mamau puti waina eu sikoti
a doko, nalakena tea vuagoroana ni
naika maga waina eu puati ra ; go 10
e dapala nogoe nalo ni Yakobo
go Yoane, Zebedaio natuna maga,
waina ero pei tea saisaipeani sikoti
Simon. Go Yesu e noa ki Simon,
e naga, Pa ta mataku mau ; pae
ragi waia pa pa pa wo puati pule
mauri naatamoli maga. Go ragi 11
waina eu mari sua rarua adeada
maga paki euta, eu doropusi naleo
maga mamau puti eu madoko, po
dausi a.
Go e pakilina, ragi waina e doko 12
natokoana maga sikai kakada, go
kuga leo, naatamoli sikai waina e
pura ki naveileperoana: go ragi
waina e punusi Yesu, e dowo dapo-
losiwo, po pavarani a, e naga, Na
wota, ku pe suasua, ku pe mariatae
mari au ape tautau. Go e sai ki 13
namelearuna, po kisidogo e, po
naga, A suasua ; pa vei tea mariana
pa tautau. Go naveileperoana e
mama ki nia pano maraverave.
Go nae e pasasoki a naga ega ta noa 14
kite naata asa mau : ma pa vano,
po dumama pisei ki tea viri ako, po
pitua nalakena namari-dautau-ki-
go-ana, ega takiusi waina Moses e
pitipaki asa, naga ega vei nanoa-
sokisokiana sikai paki da. Ma na 15
rogorogoana nalo kakana e sokapule
parua liu : go taua warua maga ni
naatamoli maga eu saisai naga euga
rogo, go naga euga vei tea mari-
pauriana meludua ki nasasanaana
adeada maga. Ma nae e pano 16
panoko pano doko maso maladi
maga, po do dapasavasa.
Go e pakilina naaleatia maga 17
wanogoe sikai, naga e do pasapiseiki
asa ; go Farisi maga go tea vasa-
piseiki maga ni nawotaeana eu
do dasake, waina eu pae sara
natokoana kiki ni Calilea go ni


Yudea go Yerusalem umai: go
nakasuaana ki Yehovah e doko
18 naga nae ega maripauri. Go kuga
leo, naatamoli seara eu dape naata-
moli sikai umai waina e sarumate e
one nawewele one : go eu laga naga
euga tape a paki ekopu, po doro-
-19 pusi a naraena. Go ragi waina eu
da papai dapala waina euga tape a
paki ekopu mau nalakena taua ni
naatamoli maga, eu sake paki elagi
ni nasunia, po doro e pakitano
duaduru taile maga, nae go nawe-
welena, paki maleoputo narae ni
20 Yesu. Go e punusi nasaralomauana
adeada, po naga, Kanao, namarina-
leosaana anigo maga eu manigo pei
21 tea midoakikorokoroana. Go tea
midiri maga go Farisi maga eu pae
asa midoakiusiusi, po naga, Naata
waia e pei sei waina e pasa navasa-
sakiana maga ? Sei e mariatae
midoa ki korokoro namarinaleo-
saana maga, ma Supe sikina ?
22 Ma Yesu e atae namidoakiusiusiana
adeada maga, po pasadara po noa
ki da, e naga, Ku midoakiusiusi
23 napopomu nasava % Seve tea e
manainaipia, a pe naga, Namarina-
leosaana anigo maga eu manigo pei
tea midoakikorokoroana; kite a
24 pe naga, Pa tuleana po surata ? Ma
naga kuga atae naga naatamoli
Natuna e peani naveinawotaana
maramana naga ega midoakikoro-
koro namarinaleosaana maga (e noa
ki tea waina e sarumate, e naga),
A noa ki-go, Pa tuleana, po dape
dakati nawewelema, po paki na
25 suma anigo pano. Go e duleana
naraeda maraverave, po dape dakati
tea waina e one asa,po paki nasuma
aneana pano, po do samasamani
26 Supe. Go nasarainakotoana e puati
tea maga mamau puti, go eu sama-
samani Supe ; go eu pura ki na
matakuana, po naga, Au punusi tea
ni namagaana maga masoso.
27 Go edaku ki tea maga wanogoe e
dave pano, po punusi tea tape nasau
togo sikai, nagisana Levi, e dasake
pisari tokora ni nasautoga, go e
noa ki nia, e naga, Pa rausi au. Go 28
e doropusi naleo maga mamau puti
eu madoko, po duleana po dausi a.
Go Levi e maneana mari nakaniana 29
warua sikai ekopu ni nasuma ane-
ana : go taua warua ni tea tape
nasautoga maga go ni tea pota maga
eu doko waina eu kere one ganikani
sikoti ra. Go Farisi maga go tea 30
midiri adeada maga eu dauruuru
dipa tea vasapiseikiana aneana
maga, eu naga, Ekasana ku gani-
kani po munu sikoti tea tape
nasautoga maga go tea mari naleo
sa maga ? Go Yesu e pasadara po 31
noa ki da, e naga, Tea maga waina
eu kasua eu da dapala waina e pia
naga euga masau naatamoli ni
medisine mau ; ma tea maga waina
eu sasana eu dapala nogoe. Ada 32
umai naga aga soso tea leana maga
mau, ma a umai naga aga soso tea
mari naleo sa maga paki namidoa-
kidoaana. Go eu noa ki nia, eu 33
naga, Tea vasapiseikiana maga ki
Yoane eu paka lapa pali, po mari
navavaraniana maga ; go tea vasa-
fiseikiana maga ki Farisi maga eu
mamau mari dapala nogoe; ma
tea anigo maga eu do ganikani po
munu. Go Yesu e noa ki da, e naga, 34
Ku mariatae mari tea vitawiri tana
ri maga euga vali ragi waina tea vi-
tawiri ma nara eu mamau doko
kite ? Ma naaleatia maga euga wo 35
umai; go ragi waina tea vitawiri
ega wo pei tea tapeluaana ki ada,
ragi wanogoe euga wo pali naaleatia
maga wanogoe. Go e noa ki da 36
naluluakia sikai, e naga ; Te naata
sikai e da poralua matele sikai ni
sugoro vau po usuvaki sugoro tuai
asa mau ; e pe mari a e pe wo mari-
porae tea vau, go matele ni tea vau
e pe wo da pataka ni tea tuai mau.
Go te naata sikai e da da ki waine 37


vau paki noai ni nawili tuai mau ;
eu pe ta ki nfa paki ara waiue vau e
pe wo mari nawili maga eu pe masai,
go nae e pe wo doroa, ’go nawili
38 maga eu pe wo sa. Ma waine vau e
pei tea waina ega vei tea takiana
38 paki nawili vau maga. Go te naata
sikai waina e munu sua waine tuai
e da masau waine vau mau : nala-
kena e naga, Tea tuai e pia.
Matele 6.
1 Go e pakilina sabbath sikai, naga
e surata duaduru vanua maga ni
korn asa; go tea vasapiseikiana
aneana maga eu lei fnokai maga ni
korn, po ganikani, eu loari ra ki
2 namelearuda. Ma Farisi maga sea-
ra kakada eu naga, Ekasana ku mari
tea waina e da pae nawotaeana mau
naga kuga mari a naaleatia ni
3 sabbath? Go Yesuepasadara ra po
naga, Ku ko da peve tea waia, tea
waina David e mari a, ragi waina
e pitolo, nara ma tea maga waina
4eu sikoti a doko; dapala waina e
paki roara ni nasufha ki Supe, po
dape bred toko rae maga po gani
a, po dua tea maga waina eu sikoti
a asa ; waina e da pae nawotaeana
mau naga tea lapa euga kani a, ma
e pei tea waina tea viri maga euga
5 sikida gani a ? Go e noa ki da, e
naga, Naatainoli Natuna e pei
nawota ni sabbath.
6 Go e pakilina sabbath pota sikai,
naga e paki ekopu ni nasuma ni
nasaisaiana po pasapiseiki: go
naatainoli sikai e doko asa, go na
fnelearuna ni matua e lologara.
7 Go tea midiri maga go Farisi maga
eu leo parati ki nia, e pe wo mari-
pauri sabbath ; naga euga vapai
8 naga euga vasadipa e asa. Ma nae
e atae namidodoana adeada maga ;
go e noa ki naatainoli waina na
ffielearuna e lologara, e naga, Pa tule-
ana, go pa lawodu paki maleoputo.
Go e duleana po lawodu. Go Yesu 9
e noa ki da, e naga, A pusuusu paki
mu, E pae nawotaeana naga tuga
mari euga wia sabbath, kite naga
tuga mari euga sa ? naga tuga
mauti pauri namauriana sikai, kite
naga tuga maripunue a ? Go e leo 10
pilialia puti ra, po noa ki nia, e naga.
Fa sai ki namelearuma. Go e mari
a: go naihelearuna e pei tea mariana
e moro pia. Ma nara eu pura ki 11
naveilalasigisigileoana, po duinada
pusuihaki paki da tea waina euga
mari a paki Yesu.
Go e pakilina’ naaleatia maga wa- 12
nogoe sikai, naga e paki tava pano
naga ega tapasavasa; go e do
dapasavasa ki Supe napogiana ma-
mau. Go ragi waina e pei aleati 13
e soso tea vasapiseikiana aneana
maga : go e matadoa meludua ki
da rualima sikai tamate dua, waina
e salagisada ki apostolo maga;
Simon, waina e salagisana ki Petero, 14
go taina Anderea, go Yakobo go
Yoane, go Filipo go Bartolomaio,
go Mataio go Toma, go Yakobo 15
natu ni Alefaio, go Simon waina e
pei tea sosoana ki Zelote, go Yuda 16
natu ni Yakobo, go Yuda Iskariote,
waina e pei tea vitua ki nia; go el 7
siwo umai nae ma nara eu mamau,
po law'odu malo matemate sikai,
go taua warua sikai ni tea vasapi-
seikiana aneana maga, go tea lapa
ni narei waina eu pae Yudea mamau
go Yerusalem, go elau ni Tair go
Sidon, waina eu rumai naga euga
rogo e, go naga euga vei tea mari-
pauriana meludua ki nasasanaana
adeada maga ; go tea maga waina 18
naatana loa maga eu mari ra eu
pei tea maripauriana. Go taua 19
mamau ni naatainoli maga eu laga
naga euga kisidogo e: nalakena
nakasuaana e dave ihelu asa, po
maripauri puti ra.
Go nae e sike namatana maga 20
punusi tea vasapiseikiana aneana


maga, po naga, Ku maro pa, tea tika
maga: nalakena namaraldana ki
21 Supe e pei tea animu. Ku maro
pa, waina ku pitolo ragi waia:
nalakena kuga wo puka. Ku maro
pa waina ku dagi ragi waia : nalake-
-22 na kuga wo muru. Ku maro pa,
ragi waina naatamoli maga euga
wo pilosi mu, go ragi waina euga wo
marimasale ki mu meludua ki da
pano, po pasapinoa ki mu, po nadi
ki nagisamu dave dakiusi tea sa,
23 nalakena naatamoli Natuna. Kuga
laelaea naaleatia wanogoe, po soka-
midi: nalakena kuga leo, namori-
ana animu e parua nakoroatelagi:
nalakena tamada maga eu mari
dapala nogoe paki profeta maga.
24 Ma ai ki mu tea sogolapa maga !
nalakena ku dape sua navakavakale-
-25 mu-ana. Ai ki mu, waina ku
puka ragi waia ! nalakena kuga
wo pitolo. Ai ki mu, waina ku
muru ragi waia ! nalakena kuga wo
26 susue po dagi. Ai ki mu ragi
waina naatamoli maga mamau puti
euga wo pasa pia ki mu ! nalake-
na tamada maga eu mari dapala
nogoe paki profeta sorosoro maga.
27 Ma a noa ki mu waina ku dogo,
a naga, Kuga dodomi tea kokona
ki mu maga, kuga mari fnata ki
28 tea maga waina eu pilosi mu, kuga
vasa pia ki tea maga waina eu
pasa sa ki mu, kuga magi tea
maga waina eu mari dao mu da-
29 pasavasa. Tea waina e pokati ko
napupuma sikai pa roa paki nia
kerua; go tea waina e dapelua
sugoro kovagoro anigo pa ta mauti
30 a sugoro anigo mau. Pa tua sara
naata waina eu datagovi ko ; go
tea waina e dapelua naloriki anigo
maga, pa ta datagovi a liliua ki da
31 mau. Go dapala waina ku masauna
naga naatamoli maga euga mari
paki mu, nimu ma kuga mari paki
32 da ega takiusi a. Go ku pe dodomi
tea maga waina eu dodomi mu, ku
pe veani navasadodomatakiana na
sava ? nalakena tea mari naleo sa
maga ma eu dodomi tea maga
waina eu dodomi ra. Go ku pe 33
mari fnata ki tea maga waina eu
mari fnata ki mu, ku pe veani na
vasadodomatakiana nasava ? na
lakena tea mari naleo sa maga ma
eu mari dapala nogoe. Go ku pe 34
vitua ki tea seakiana paki tea maga
waina ku leogoro naga kuga tape ki
ada, ku pe veani navasadodomata-
kiana nasava ? tea mari naleo sa
maga ma eu pitua ki tea seakiana
paki tea mari naleo sa maga, naga
euga tape liliua ki tea vatakana.
Ma kuga dodomi tea kokona ki mu 35
maga, po mari fnata ki da, po pitua
ki tea seakiana, po da leogoro te
navatuna liliu mau ; go namoriana
animu ega wo parua, go kuga wo pei
Tea Vakielagi Mau natuna maga:
nalakena nae e pei tea vakale paki
tea maga waina eu da dodomataki
mau go tea sa maga. Kuga vei 36
tea marita dodomi, ega takiusi
waina Tamamu e pei tea marita
dodomi. Go kuga ta pasapotae 37
mau, go kuga wo da pei tea vasa-
potaeana mau : go kuga ta dipa-
kotovi mau, go kuga wo da pei tea
tipakotoviana mau; kuga veresi,
go kuga wo pei tea veresiana : kuga
vitua, go ega wo pei tea vituakiana
paki mu ; tea towogiana wia, tea 38
tosokiana pakitano, tea nuanua-
kiana, tea vura pevera, euga wo
pitua ki nia paki narumamu. Na
lakena totowo waina ku dowogi
asa ega wo moro manimu pei tea
towogiana asa.
Go e noa ki da naluluakia sikai, 39
e naga, Tea kesa eu mari atae
maraki tea kesa pae napua kite ?
eroga w t o da dua dowo paki moru ;
tano sikai kite ? Tea vasapisei- 40
kiana e da dapau tea vasapiseiki
mau : ma sara naata ragi waina
euga wo pei tea vasapiseikiana sua


euga wo dakiusi tea vasapisei ki
11 da. Go ekasana ku leo punusi na
motamota waina e doko namata ni
taima, ma ku da midoa ki natokai
mau waina e doko namatama doko ?
12 Kite ku mari atae noa ki taima
dapale sava, Taigu, pa suasua naga
aga tapelua namotamota waina e
doko namatama, ragi waina ku da
punusi natokai mau waina e doko
namatama doko ? Nakalepo, pa
•vea dapelua natokai waiua e doko
namatama, go ragi wanogoe pa wo
leosai pia naga pa tapelua na
motamota waina e doko namata ni
43 taima doko. Nalakena nakau wia
sikai e da doko mau waina e dau ki
nawana sa ; go nakau sa sikai e da
doko mau waina e dau ki nawana
44 wia. Nalakena sara nakau sika-
sikai eu pei tea ataeana ki nawada.
Nalakena eu da lei napuliva maga
melu nakau vividipa maga mau, go
eu da lei nawa ni vaine maga melu
45 namatagauta sikai mau. Naata
moli wia e dapelua tea wia melu
store wia ni napopona; go naata
moli sa e dapelua tea sa inelu store
sa: nalakena nawokana e pasa
inelu tea waina napopona e pura
ki nia.
46 Go ekasana ku soso au ki Nawota,
Nawota, po da mari tea maga
47 waina a noa ra mau ? Sara naata
waina eu rumai punusi au, po dogo
navasaana aginau maga, po mari
ra, aga wo pisei ki mu naata waina
48 eu dakiusi a: eu dakiusi naata
moli sikai waina e do davagi nasu-
ma sikai, waina e kili po pakipua,
po doropusi laketano sikai vatu
laketoko: go ragi waina natave

dipa nasuma wanogoe, po mari
sa mari a e parivari: nalakena
49 e pei tea tavagiinatakiana. Ma
tea waina e dogo, po da mari
mau, e dakiusi naatamoli sikai

laketano e dika ; waina noaisara e
nadi dipa e, go e dowo maraverave ;
go nasapurakiana ni nasuma wano-
goe e parua.

diesoki ko. Ma Yesu e naga, Te 46
naata sikai e kisidogo au : nalakena
kinau a atae naga nakasuaana e
dave meludua ki nau pano.
Go ragi waina nagoroi wanogoe e 47
punusi naga e ta doko loku mau,
e durururu umai, po dowo paki
tano naraena, po dogorogo narae
ni narei mamau ki tea waina e pei
nalakena e kisidogo e, go ki dapala
waina e pei tea maripauriana
maraverave. Go e noa ki nia, 48
e naga, Lei, nasaralomauana anigo
e po maripauri ko; pa vaki na
tamateana pano.
Ragi waina e ko do pasa, naata 49
sikai e pae nasuma hi tea maraki
wanogoe umai, e naga, Natuma
nagori e mate; pa ta mari navi-
tinuana paki Tea Vasapiseiki mau.
Ma Yesu e dogo e, po pasadara 50
e, e naga, Pa ta mataku mau; pa
saralomau sikai maau, go ega wo pei
tea maripauriana. Go ragi waina 51
e umai paki nasuma e da suasua ki
te naata mau naga ega sikoti a paki
ekopu, ma e suasua ki Petero, go
Yoane, go Yakobo, go koroi kiki
tamana go pilana eu sikida. Go tea 52
maga mamau puti eu do dagi, po do
lalagaarova asa : ma e naga, Kuga
ta dagi mau; nalakena eda mate
mau, ma e maturu. Go eu muru ki 53
nia, eu atae naga e mate. Ma nae e 54
puati namelearuna, po pioso, po
naga, Koroi kiki, pa tuleana. Go 55
naatana e liliu, go e duleana
maraverave: go e pitipaki naga
euga tua e ega kanikani. Go 56
tamana go pilana ero sarainakoto :
ma e pasa parati ki da naga eroga


ta noa kite naata mau tea waina
e pei tea mariana.

Matele 10.
1 Go edaku ki tea maga wanogoe,
Nawota e pasadawana ki tea pota
rualima lama, po dipakilua ra eu
dua rua eu pea ki naraena paki sara
natokoana go sara tokora, waina nae
e pei maladigi naga ega umai paki
2 ara. Go e noa ki da, e naga, Nalolo-
vaeana e parua, ma tea wosiwosi
maga eu pisa mau : nalakena tea
wanogoe kuga vavarani Nawota ni
nalolovaeana, naga ega tipakilua tea
wosiwosi maga paki nalolovaeana

kinau a dipakilua, mu ku dapala
shiip' natuda maga maleoputo ni
4 wulf maga. Kuga ta dape nala ni
mone mau, kite nala ni navinaga
mau, kite namelevasiana maga mau:
go kuga ta pasadodomi te naata

ku pe wo paki ekopu asa, kuga vea
naga, Natamateana ega vei agi na
6 suma waia. Go natamateana natuna
sikai e pe toko nasuma wanogoe,
natamateana animu e pe wo doko
asa doko : ma e pe tika, natamate-
ana animu e pe wo liliu paki mu.

po do gani po do munu tea maga

8 mau. Go natokoana waina ku pe
wo sili asa, go waina eu pe wo piragi
mu asa, kuga kani tea' maga waina

kuga maripauri tea sasana maga
waina eu doko asa, go kuga noa ki
da, Namarakiana ki Supe e po umai
10 paki maladigi ki mu. Ma natokoana
waina ku pe wo sili asa, go waina
eu pe wo da piragi mu asa mau, kuga
tave paki napua lappa maga kakana
po naga, Nainotamota ni natokoana 11
animu, waina e puluti nainelegami
maga, au kasilua e dipa mu : ma
kuga atae tea waia, naga namaraki-
ana ki Supe e po umai paki maladigi.
A noa ki mu, naga Navaratiana ni 12
Sodom naaleatia wanogoe ega wo
parua, ma navaratiana ni natokoana
wanogoe ega wo parua liu sa. Ai 13
ki-go, Korazin! ai ki-go, Bethsaida!
nalakena namariana kasua maga
waina eu pei tea mariana mu, eu pe
vei tea mariana Tair go Sidon, eu pe

suni nakulukulu ni sako go na
tanoapu. Ma navaratiana ni Tair 14
go Sidon navasapotaeana ega wo
parua, ma navaratiana animu ega

naum, pa wo pei tea tapeana sake
paki nakoroatelagi kite ? pa wo pei
tea tapeana siwo paki Hades. Tea 16
waina e dogo mu e dogo au ; go tea
waina e dipadoa mu e dipadoa au ;
go tea waina e dipadoa au e dipadoa
tea waina e dipakilua au umai.

Go tea viri sikai e siwo napua wano- 31
goe pano : go ragi waina e punusi a,

sikai, ragi waina e umai paki tokora
wanogoe, po punusi a, e liu sa pano
nadigi kerua ni napua. Ma naata 33

dodomi a, go e umai punusi a, po 34

kiana sikai, po leo parati ki nia. Go 35

dua, po dua talakea ni nasuma ni

naga, ra leo parati ki nia ; go ku pe
sori dua e tea waina e parua liu mone
waia, kinau, ragi waina aga wo moro
liliu umai, a pe wo lagati dua ko asa.

kakada e pei tea ni fnaladigi ki tea

koto maga ? Go e naga, Tea waina 37
e mari nadodomiana paki nia. Go
Yesu e noa ki nia, e naga, Pa vano,
go nigo pa mari ega tapala nogoe.

natokoana kiki sikai: go nagoroi
sikai nagisana Martha e piragi a paki
ekopu ni nasuma aneana. Go e 39
peani taina sikai waina e pei tea
sosoana ki Maria, go waina e do
natano pisari namele ni Nawota
maga, po dogo navasaana aneana.

nalo ni nasuasuana warua; go e
umai lawodu pisari a, po naga, Na
wota, ku dodoparoparo naga taigu
e doropusi au naga aga sikigu sua-
sua kite ? nalakena tea wanogoe pa
noa ki nia naga ega silae au. Ma 41
Nawota e pasadara po noa ki nia,
e naga, Martha, Martha, ku midoa


ki parati ki po pei tea ruruakiana
nalo ni naleo lapa : ma natikaana

Matele 11.
1 Go e pakilina, ragi waina edo
dapasavasa tokora sikai, naga ragi
waina e makoto ki nia, tea vasapi-
seikiana aneana maga sikai kakada
e noa ki nia, e naga, Nawota, pa
vasapisei ki garni naga auga tapasa-
vasa atae, ega takiusi waina Yoane
ma e pasapisei ki tea vasapiseikiana
2 aneana maga asa. Go e noa ki da,
e naga, Ragi waina ku dapasavasa
kuga naga, Mama aginami, Nagisama
ega tapu_. Namarakiana anigo ega
3 umai. Pa tua garni sara naaleatia
4 navinaga waina e pia ki garni. Go
pa maginami midoakikorokoro na
marinaleosaana aginami maga ; na
lakena kinami ma an do magi sara
naata waina naleo aginami e one ara
one an madeada midoakikorokoro e.
Go pa ta piragi garni paki namari-
dogoana man.
5 Go e noa ki da, e naga, Nimu sei
kakamu ega wo peani tana ri sikai,
go ega wo pa punusi a pogi matua,
po noa ki nia, Tagu ri, pa tua au tea
6 seakiana ni bred ega tolu ; nalakena
tagu ri sikai waina e surata, e po
umai punusi au, go a da peani te
navatuna man waina aga toropusi a
7 naraena ; go nae ega wo pasadara
dave a, po naga, Pa ta mari naviti-
nuana paki nau mau : namata e pei
tea kokoroana sua, go piakiki aginau
maga eu sikoti au nawewele doko ;
8 a mari sa duleana po dua ko ? A
noa ki mu, E pe ta duleana mau po
dua e nalakena e pei tana ri, e pe wo
duleana po dua e tea maga waina e
masauna nalakena natatagoana ane-
-9 ana. Go kinau a noa ki mu, Kuga
tatago, go ega wo pei tea vituakiana
paki mu; kuga laga, go kuga wo
papai; kuga wokawoka, go ega wo
manimu pei tea wolagatiana. Nala- 10
kena sara naata waina eu datago eu
dua ra eu dape ; go tea waina e laga
e papai; go tea waina e pokawoka
ega wo maneana pei tea wolagati-
ana. Go nimu sikai sei kakamu 11
waina e pei piakiki tamana, natuna
ega wo datagovi a ki bred sikai, go
ega wo dua e vatu sikai ? kite ki
naika sikai, go ega wo dua e oli naika
sikai fnaata sikai ? Kite epewo 12
datago atulu sikai, e pe wo dua
e mataloa sikai kite ? Go nimu, 13
waina ku sa, ku pe atae naga kuga
tua natumu maga navituaana wia
maga, Tamamu ni nakoroatelagi e
pe wo pitua e pe warua liu sa pa ki
Naatana Tapu paki tea maga waina
eu datagovi a asa.
Go e do mari dimon pusa sikai 14
e dave pano. Go e pakilina, ragi
waina dimon wanogoe e dave sua
pano, tea vei pusa e pasa ; go taua
maga ni naatamoli maga eu maga.
Ma te seara kakada eu naga, E 15
mari dimon maga eu dave pano
pae Beelzebub, nawota ki dimon
maga. Go tea pota seara eu 16
maridogo e, po datagovi a ki navai-
vaiana sikai waina ega vae nakoro
atelagi umai. Ma nae e atae nami- 17
dodoana adeada maga, po noa ki da,
e naga, Sara namarakiana waina eu
pei tea tapotaeana dufnada dipa ra
eu pei tea mariana eu pei maso
maladi; go nasufna waina e pei tea
tapotaeana dipa nasuma e dowo.
Go Satan e pe vei tea tapotaeana 18
dumana dipa e, namarakiana aneana
e pe wo du dapale sava ? nalakena
ku noa naga kinau a mari dimon
maga eu dave pano pae Beelzebub
Go kinau a pe mari dimon maga 19
eu pe tave pano pae Beelzebub,
natumu naanoai maga eu pe mari
ra eu pe tave pano pae sei ?
nalakena tea wanogoe nara


20 euga wo pei tea vasapotae mu. Ma
kinau a pe mari dimon maga eu
pe tave pano pae nakini ni Supe,
namarakiana ki Supe e pe umai sua
21 paid mu. Ragi waina tea kasua
waina e dape puti nalikau e pavai-
goro namasopa ni nasufna aneana,
naloriki aneana maga eu doko nata-
-22 mateana doko : ma ragi waina tea
waina e kasua liu sa e umai paki nia,
po mari matua ki nia, e dapelua
nalikau aneana maga mamau puti
waina e pavatu asa, po turipitua ki
tea tapepavakotoana aneana maga.
23 Tea waina e da sikoti au mau e
maridipa au ; go tea waina e da
, daua ki sikoti au mau e mari e pei
24 daperavera. Ragi waina naatana
loa e dave fneludua ki naatamoli
pano, e surata duaduru malo gara-
gara maga, po laga namaromaroana;
go nalakena e da papai a mau, e naga,
Aga wo liliu paki nasuma aginau,
25 waina a dave asa umai. Go ragi
waina e umai, e papai a e pei tea
26 sasaraana go tea rikeikiana. Ragi
wanogoe e pano, po piragi lua na
atana pota larua umai waina eu
sa liu sa ; go eu sili paki asa po
doko asa doko : go tea edaku maga
ki naatamoli wanogoe eu pei tea
mariana eu sa liu tea vea aneana
maga.

27 Go e pakilina, ragi waina e noa tea
maga wanogoe, nagoroi sikai ni taua
ni naatamoli maga e sike nadaleona,
po noa ki nia, e naga, Napele waina
e pilake ko, go susu maga waina ku
28 susu ara eu maropa. Ma nae e naga,
loro, ma tea maga waina eu dogo
navasaana ki Supe, po pavaigoro e,
eu maropa liu ra.
29 Go ragi waina taua maga ni naata
fholi maga eu do saisai punusi a, e
pae asa noa, naga Tagona waia eu
pei tagona sa ; eu laga navaivaiana
sikai; go te navaivaiana sikai ega
wo da pei tea vituakiana paki da
mau, ma navaivaiana ni Yonah ega
NGUNA-TONGOAN N.T.
sikina. Nalakena dakiusi waina 30
Yonali e magi naka ni Nine veil pei
navaivaiana, dapala nogoe naata
inoli Natuna ma ega wo magi tagona
waia pei navaivaiana. Nawota na 31
goroi ni sautli ega wo duleana na
vasapotaeana sikoti naataiiioli maga
ni tagona waia, go ega wo dipako-
tovi ra : nalakena e pae namata
pago ni maramana umai naga ega
rogo namanumatuana ki Solomon ;
go kuga leo, tea waina e parua liu
Solomon e doko nea. Naatamoli 32
maga ni Nineveh euga wo duleana
navasapotaeana sikoti tagona waia,
go euga wo dipakotovi ra : nalakena
eu midoakidoa ragi waina eu dogo
narogorogoana ki Yonah ; go kuga
leo, tea waina e parua liu Yonah e
doko nea.
Ragi waina te naata e tokoni 33
nasulu sikai, e da lawo ki nia efriago
ni etano mau, kite nawoka ni lasa
totowo waina e dapolo siwo doko
mau, ma e lawo ki nia naliana, naga
tea maga waina eu paki ekopu euga
vunusi namarama. Namataiha e 34
pei nasulu ni napatokoma; ragi
waina namataina e pia, napatokoma
mamau ma e marama ; ma ragi
waina e sa, napatokoma ma e ma-
ligo. tea wanogoe pa 35
vunusi naga namarama waina e
doko ako ega ta pei namaligo mau.
Nalakena tea wanogoe napatokoma 36
mamau e pe marama, go te tokora
sikai kakana e pe ta maligo mau, e
pe wo marama puti, dakiusi ragi
waina nasulu e sorolaga po mara-
malagati ko.
Go ragi waina e do pasa, Farisi 37
sikai e pavarani a naga ega kanikani
sikoti a : go e paki ekopu, po kere
one naga ega kanikani. Go ragi 38
waina Farisi wanogoe e punusi a, e
maga nalakena e da pea pavano mau
pea ki nakaniana. Go Nawota e 39
noa ki nia, e naga, Ragi waia nimu
Farisi maga ku mari nataku ni lasa


munu go plete e dautau; ma na
palaumu e pura Id natapepavakoto-
-40 ana go nasigisigileona. Tea manu-
matavusa maga, tea waina e mari
natakumu e da mari napalaumu
41 kite ? Ma kuga vitua ki tea ni na
palaumu maga euga vei nadodomi-
ana; go kuga leo, naleo maga
mamau puti eu manimu dautau.
42 Ma aiki mu Farisi maga ! nalake-
na ku pitua ki kekerualima ni mint
go reu go sara nakau lawoana, po
pa kalau navasapotaeana go nado-
domi-Supe-ana : ma tea maga waia
e one mu one naga kuga mari ra,
go tea maga waina naga kuga ta
43 doropusi ra euga madoko mau. Ai
ki mu Farisi maga ! nalakena ku
dodomi malo tasake vea maga ni
nasuma ni nasaisaiana maga, go
navasadodomiana maga malo ni
44 navakokotoana maga. Ai ki mu !
nalakena ku dakiusi matigo maga,
waina eu da doko lina mau, go
naatamoli maga waina eu surata pae
elagi ki da eu da atae a mu.
45 Go tea ni nawotaeana maga sikai
kakada e pasadara po noa ki nia, e
naga, Tea Vasapiseiki, ku noa tea
maga wanogoe ku pasa pinoa ki
46 garni maga. Go e naga, Ai ki mu tea
ni nawotaeana maga ! ku
duatua naatamoli maga natapetape-
ana maga waina eu pei tea tape-
tapeana kite sa, go nimu ku da kisi-
dogo natapetapeana maga wanogoe
ki nakinimu maga sikai kakada
47 mau. Ai ki mu! nalakena ku
davagi matigo maga ki profeta
maga, go tamamu maga eu mari-
-48 punue ra. Nalakena tea wanogoe
ku pei tea noasokisoki po suasua ki
namariana ki tamamu maga: na
lakena nara eu maripunue ra, go
nimu ku davagi matigo adeada maga.
49 Nalakena tea wanogoe namanu-
matuaana ki Supe e naga, Aga wo
dipakilua profeta maga go apostolo
maga euga vano punusi ra; go nara
seara kakada euga wo maripunue ra
po kopalele ara; naga nada ni 50
profeta maga mamau puti, waina e
pei tea takiana pae naatulakeana ni
maramana pa pa, ega vei tea sikoana
paki tagona waia ; pae nada ni Abel 51
pa pa paki nada ni Zakariah, waina
e pei tea maripunueana namawota
ni wede ni naviriana go ni nasuma
tapu : ioro, a noa ki mu, naga ega
wo pei tea sikoana paki tagona waia.
Ai ki mu tea ni nawotaeana maga! 52
nalakena ku dapelua kii ni naatae-
ana : nimu ku da sili mau, go tea
maga waina eu naga euga sili ku
dugoro ra asa.
Go ragi waina e dave sua nasuma 53
wanogoe, tea midiri maga go Farisi
maga eu pae asa diesoki parua ki
nia, po pusuusu ki tea lapa paki nia ;
eu kusugoro e, naga euga valako
dape te navatuna meludua ki
nawokana.
Matele 12,
Eagi wanogoe, waina taua ni 1
naatamoli maga tivilia maga kakada
eu saisai dapala eu dumada pasi ra,
e pae asa noa ki tea vasapiseikiana
aneana maga pea, e naga, Kuga
matamatua ki leven ki Farisi maga,
waina e pei nakalepoana. Ma te 2
navatuna e da pei tea tapaugoroana,
waina ega wo da pei tea maripaka-
sakiana mau: go tea surukiana,
waina ega wo da pei tea ataeana
mau. Nalakena tea wanogoe tea 3
maga waina ku noa ra namaligo
euga wo pei tea rogoana namarama ;
go tea waina ku pasa asa paki nada-
liga einago tukituki maga ega wo pei
tea rogorogokiana napau ni nasuma
maga. Go a noa ki mu tagu ri 4
maga, Kuga ta matau ki tea maga
waina eu maripunue napatokomu,
go edaku ki tea wanogoe eu da peani
te navatuna pota mau waina euga
mari a. Ma aga noa ki sai mu tea 5


waina kuga matau ki nia: Kuga
matau ki tea waina ragi waina e
maripunue sua e peani naveinawo-
taana naga ega nadi paki pokasi;
ioro, a noa ki mu, a naga, Kuga
6 matau ki tea wanogoe. Eu da sori
spare lima raki farthig dua kite ? go
sikai kakada e da pei tea maliokiana
7 namata ni Supe mau. Ma napati
maga ni nalolu ni napaumu eu pei
tea veveana puti. Kuga ta mataku
8 mau : ku pia liu sparo lapa. Go a
noa ki mu, naga Sara naata waina
eu pe wo noasai au narae ni naata

vasagoroaua narae ni agelo maga ki
10 Supe. Go sara naata waina euga
wo noa navasaana sikai dipa naata

tea midoakikorokoroana: ma tea
waina e pasa sa ki dipa Naatana
Tapu ega wo da maneana pei tea
11 midoakikorokoroana mau. Go ragi
waina euga wo piragi mu paki narae
ni nasaisaiana maga, go ni tea mara-
ki maga, go ni nawota maga, kuga
ta midoa ki parati ki dapala waina

kite tea waina kuga wo pasakoro-
koro asa, kite tea waina kuga wo
12 noa e ; nalakena Naatana Tapu ega
wo pasapisei ki mu aura wanogoe

kuga noa ra.

Yasapiseiki, pa noa ki taigu naga ega

11 au. Ma e noa ki nia, e naga, Kanao,
sei e mari au a pei tea vasapotae
15 kite tea tapotae dapau mu ? Go e
noa ki da, e naga, Kuga vunusi, po
dufnamu pavaigoro mu pa dua ki sara
namatamaguraana: nalakena nalo
riki lapa waina naatamoli sikai e
peani raeu dapeinamaurianaaneana
mau. Go e noa ki da naluluakia 16
sikai, e naga, Natano ki naatamoli
sogolapa sikai e dau parua ki
nawana : go e dumana midoa ki nia 17
napalauna, po naga, Aga wo mari
nasava, nalakena a dika tokora
waina aga wo daua ki nawa ni nakau
aginau maga asa ? Go e naga, Aga 18
wo mari tea waia: aga wo dakai
nasuma ni korn aginau maga, po
davagi oli ra euga warua liu ra ; go
tokora wanogoe aga wo daua ki puti
korn aginau go nalo riki wia aginau
maga asa. Go aga wo noa ki 19
naatagu, Naatagu, ku peani nalo
riki wia lapa, waina eu pei tea toro-
pusiana raki natau lapa ; pa maro-
maro, pa kanikani, pa munu, pa
mari katakata. Ma Supe e noa ki 20
nia, e naga, Tea manu mata vusa,
pogi waia eu datagovi ko ki naata-
ma; go naleo maga waina ku po
mari mata ki da, euga wo pei tea ki
sei ? Tea waina e dumana mane- 21
ana daua ki nalo riki maga, po da
pei sogolapa paki Supe mau, e
dapala nogoe.
Go e noa ki tea vasapiseikiana 22
aneana maga, e naga, Nalakena tea
wanogoe a noa ki mu, a naga, Kuga
ta magi namauriana animu midoa
ki parati ki mau, tea waina kuga wo
gani a ; go magi napatokomu mau,
tea waina kuga wo suni a. Nalakena 23
namauriana e parua liu navinaga, go
napatokomu e parua liu sugoro.
Kuga midoakiusiusi raven maga, 21
naga eu da lalawo mau, go eu da
kilikili mau; waina eu da peani
emago ni store mau kite nasuma ni
korn mau ; go Supe e pagani ra :
nimu ku da pia liu parua ki manu
maga kite ? Go nimu sei kakamu e 25
pe midoa ki parati ki e pe mari atae
sokari navarauana aneana kubit
sikai ? Nalakena tea wanogoe ku 26
pe mari sa mari tea waina e kiki sa,
ekasana ku midoa ki parati ki nalo

kiusiusi lili maga, dapala waina eu
ulua: eu da posiwosi mau, go eu da

Solomon doko nasamasamaana ma-
mau aneana, e da pei tea sugoroana
28 dapala nara sikai mau. Ma Supe e
pe sugoro nafnenau ni vanua e pe
dapala nogoe, waina e doko masoso,
go matamai e pei tea nadikiana paid
upu ; epe wo da sugoro mu epe liu
parua ki nia kite, tea saralomau kiki
29 maga ? Go nimu kuga ta laga tea
waina kuga wo gani a, go tea waina
kuga wo munugi a, go kuga ta
30 midoa ki putua ki mau. Nalakena
nalauna maga ni maramana eu laga
tea maga mamau puti wanogoe: ma
Tamamu e atae naga tea maga
31 wanogoe eu pia ki mu. Ma kuga
laga namarakiana aneana, go ega
wo dua mu tea maga wanogoe euga
32 wo sokari a. Kuga ta mataku mau,
navata kiki; nalakena Tamamu e
masauna naga ega tua mu namara-
-33 kiana. Kuga sori tea maga waina
ku peani ra, po pitua ki nadodomi-
ana ; kuga tumamu manimu mari
nala ni mone maga waina euga wo
da duai mau, nalo riki tauakiana
sikai nakoroatelagi maga waina ega
wo da nopu mau, tokora waina tea
vanako e da paki maladigi ki nia
mau, go waina tuluki e da mari sa
34 ki asa mau. Nalakena tokora waina
nalo riki tauakiana animu e doko
asa, tokora wanogoe napopomu ma
ega wo doko asa.
35 Namalomu ega vei tea tasokiana
doko, go nasulu animu maga euga
36 to soro; go nimu kuga takiusi
naatamoli maga waina eu do leogoro
nawota adeada, ragi waina ega wo
liliu pae navitawiriana ; naga ragi
waina ega wo umai po pokawoka,
euga maneana polagati maraverave.
37 Tea suasua maga wanogoe eu maro
pa, waina nawota ega wo umai po
papai ra eu do leleogoro : lomau a
noa Id mu, naga ega wo dumana
dasoki a, po mari ra euga kere one
naga euga kanikani, go ega wo umai
po madeada suasua. Go epe umai 38
navavaigoroana kerua, go e pe umai
navavaigoroana ketolu, po papai ra
eu pe tapala nogoe, tea suasua maga
wanogoe eu pe maro pa. Ma kuga 39
atae tea waia, naga talakea ni
nasuma e pe atae aura waina tea
vanako e naga ega umai asa, e pe
leleogoro, po da doropusi nasuma
aneana naga ega vei tea kilidarave-
ana mau. Nimu ma kuga mari- 40
fnataki sua : nalakena aura waina
ku da midoa ki nia mau naatamoli
Natuna ega wo umai asa.
Go Petero e naga, Nawota, ku noa 41
ki garni naluluakia wanogoe, kite ku
noa kitea maga mamau puti asa? Go 42
Nawota e naga, Go sei e pei tasiga
leoparatiki lomau go manumatua,
waina nawota aneana ega wo lawo
ki nia dapau tea ni nasuma aneana
maga, naga ega tua ra navinaga
adeada ragi kakana ? Tea suasua 43
wanogoe e maro pa, waina nawota
aneana ragi waina ega wo umai asa
ega wo papai a e do mari dapala
nogoe. Lomau a noa ki mu, naga 44
ega wo lawo ki nia dapau naleo
aneana maga mamau puti. Ma tea 45
suasua wanogoe e pe noa napopona,
Nawota aginau e mari daliali umai;
go e pe vae asa pokati tea suasua
naanoai maga go tea suasua nagoroi
maga, po ganikani po munu, po
matamaluku ; nawota ki tea suasua 46
wanogoe e pe wo umai naaleatia
sikai waina e da leogoro asa mau,
go aura sikai waina e da atae a mau,
go e pe wo parati parua ki nia, po
pasadawana ki matele veaniana
aneana ega sikoti tea maga waina eu
da pei lomau mau. Go tea suasua 47
wanogoe, waina e atae namasauana
ki nawota aneana, po da marimata-
ki mau, po da mari pae namasau-
ana aneana mau, ega wo pei tea


18 varatiana ki navaratiana lapa ; ma
tea waina e da atae mau, po mari
tea inaga waina e pia ki navaratiana,
ega wo pei tea varatiana ki nava-
ratiana pisa maau. Go sara naata
waina tea warua e pei tea vituakiana
paki da, euga wo pei tea ratagoviana
ki tea warua : go naata waina eu
pavatu asa ki tea warua, euga wo
datagovi a ki tea warua liu sa.
49 A umai naga aga nadi ki nakapu
vavaga paki maramana ; go a masau
nasava, e pe vei tea tokoniana sua ?
50 Ma a peani nabapetisoana sikainaga
aga vei tea bapetizoana asa ; go a
pei tea riesokiana warua pa pa pa
51 ega wo pei tea mariana sua ! Ku
midoa ki nia naga a umai naga aga
vitua ki natamateana maramana ?
A noa ki mu, a naga, Ee ; ma ega
52 wo pei natapotaeana ; nalakena tea
lima ni nasuma sikai euga wo pei
tea tapotaeana pae ragi waia pa pa,
dolu dipa dua, go dua dipa dolu.
53 Euga wo pei tea tapotaeana tama-
tamada dumada dipa ra ; go tama-
pilada dumada dipa ra ; go tama-
tuada dumada dipa ra.
54 Go e moro noa ki taua maga ni na
atamoli maga, e naga, Ragi waina ku
punusi napopouru sikai e sake west,
ku maraverave noa, naga Usa sikai
e umai; go e pakilina dapala nogoe.
65 Go ragi waina nalagi ni sauth e sau,
ku naga, Sui ega wo parua; go e
56 pakilina. Nakalepo maga, ku mi-
doakipotae atae narae ni maramana
go ni nakoroatelagi; ma ekasana ku
damidoakipotae atae ragi waia mau?
57 Go ekasana ku da dumamu midoa-
ki potae tea waina e leana mau ?
58 Nalakena ragi waina ku sikoti tea
vasadipa ko pano punusi tea maraki,
pa mari kasua ragi waina koro
surata napua naga pa vei tea toio-
pusiana ki ana ; mase e pe rosagi ko
pa punusi tea vasapotae, go tea
vasapotae e pe vitua ki-go paki
tasiga, go tasiga e pe nadi ki-go paki
ekopu ni nasuma ni navavaiana. A 59
noa ki-go, naga Pa wo da dave •
tokora wanogoe umai mau, pa pa
pa wo lagati pitua ki mait edaku.
Matele 13.
Go te seara eu mamau doko ragi 1
wanogoe waina eu dogorogo paki nia
ki nalo ni naka ni Calilea, waina
Pilato e mari nadada e sari naviriana
adeada maga. Go e pasadara po 2
noa ki da, e naga, Ku midoa ki nia
naga naka ni Calilea wanogoe eu pei
tea mari naleo sa parua liu naka ni
Calilea mamau puti, nalakena eu
sua tea maga wanogoe kite ? A noa 3
ki mu, a naga, Ee: ma ku pe ta
midoakidoa mau, ku pe wo mate sa
puti e pe tapala nogoe. Kite tea 4
rualima sikai tamate latolu waina,
waina nasuma varau pakilagi ni
Siloam e dowo ara, po maripunue
ra, ku midoa ki nia naga nara eu pei
tea mari naleo sa parua liu naata
fnoli maga mamau puti waina eu
doko Yerusalem doko kite ? A noa 5
ki mu, a naga, Ee : ma ku pe ta
midoakidoa mau, ku pe wo mate
sa puti e pe tapala nogoe.
Go e noa naluluakia waia ; Naata 6
fnoli sikai e peani napuliva sikai
Waina e pei tea lawoana roara ni
vaine aneana; go e umai laga
nawana asa, po da papai seara mau.
Go e noa ki tea waina e posiwosi 7
ki vaine maga, e naga, Pa leo, natau
dolu waia a do umai laga nawa ni
napuliva waia, po da papal seara
mau : pa tae a ega rowo ; ekasana
e mari sa ki natano ? Go e pasa- 8
dara po noa ki nia, e naga, Nawota,
ega ko moro doko natau waia, pa pa
aga wo kili daliviri ki nia, po nadi
ki natae asa : go e pe edaku mari 9
nawana, epe wia ; ma e pe tika,
pa wo dae a ega rowo.
Go e do pasapiseiki ekopu ni 10
nasuma ni nasaisaiana maga sikai


11 kakada naaleatia ni sabbath. Go

peani naatana ni namanainaiana
sikai natau rualima sikai tamate
latolu ; go e kolokolo doko, po mari

aruna maga asa: go e pei tea
mariana e leana maraverave, po
14 samasamani Supe. Go tea maraki
ni nasuma ni nasasaiana e maeto
nalakena Yesu e maripauri sabbath,
go e pasadara po noa ki taua ni
naatafnoli maga, e naga, Naaleatia
latesa eu doko waina e pia naga
naatafnoli maga euga wosiwosi ara :
nalakena tea wanogoe kuga umai

maripauriana, go kuga ta umai po
pei tea maripauriana naaleatia ni
15 sabbath mau. Ma Nawota e pasa-
dara e, po naga, Nakalepo maga,
sara naata kakamu eu da sikasikai

16 naga ega munu kite ? Go nagoroi
waia, waina e pei Abraham natuna

17 ni sabbath kite ? Go ragi waina e
noa tea maga wanogoe, tea maga
mamau puti waina eu kokona ki nia
eu maliere: go taua mamau ni
naatafnoli maga eu laelaea puti na

ana pae asa.
18 Nalakena tea wanogoe e naga,
Namarakiana ki Supe e dakiusi na
sava ? go aga noa naga e dakiusi
19 nasava ? E dakiusi napati ni si-
napi sikai, waina naatafnoli sikai e
dape a, po nadi ki nia roara aneana;
go e ulua, po pei nakau sikai;
go manu maga ni nakoroatelagi eu
doko arana maga. Go e moro naga, 20
Aga noa naga namarakiana ki Supe
e dakiusi nasava ? E dakiusi leven, 21
waina nagoroi sikai e dape a po suru
ki nia totowo ni flaur dolu, pa pa
tea mamau e pei tea levenakiana.
Go e surata duaduru natokoana 22
warua maga go natokoana kiki
maga, e do pasapiseiki, po do
surata paki Yerusalem pano. Go 23
naata sikai e noa ki nia, e naga,
Nawota, tea maga waina eu pei tea
mautipauriana eu pisa maau kite ?

matua kasua naga kuga sili pae
namata kiki: nalakena- tea lapa, a
noa ki mu asa, euga wo laga naga
euga sili, go euga wo mari sa sili.

duleana, po kokoro namata, go ku
pae asa lawodu katama, po poka-
woka namata, po naga, Nawota, pa
maginami polagati; go ega wo
pasadara po noa ki mu, A da atae
mu mau, ku pae esava umai ? Ragi 26
wanogoe kuga wo pae asa naga, Au
ganikani po munu naraefna, go ku
pasapiseiki napua welewelea maga
ni natokoana aginami; go ega wo 27

waina ku pae asa umai mau; kuga
meludua ki nau pano, tea maga
mamau puti waina ku pei tea
mari namarinaleotageleana. Tokora 28
wanogoe kuga wo dagi po kati
napatimu asa, ragi waina kuga wo
punust Abraham, go Isaak, go
Yakob, go profeta maga mamau
puti, doko namarakiana kiSupe, go
nimu tea nadikiana paki etaku. Go 29
euga wo pae ist go west, go euga
wo pae north go sauth umai, po kere
one namarakiana ki Supe. Go kuga 30
leo, tea edaku seara eu doko waina
euga wo pea, go tea vea seara eu
doko waina euga wo edaku.

rumai, po noa ki nia, eu naga. Pa


melu pano, po paki tokora pota
sikai: nalakena Herod e masauna
2 naga ega maripunue ko. Go e noa

go matamai, go nooleatia ketolu a pei

matamai go naaleatia waina e dausi

34 Yerusalem. Yerusalem, Yerusalem
0, waina e maripunue profeta
maga, po nadi ki vatu tea maga
waina eu pei tea tautauana umai
punusi a ! a paka visa masauna
naga aga viragi saisai ki natuma
maga, dakiusi waina toa sikai e
piragi saisai M natuna maga etano
ki nalivaruna maga, go ku karai!
35 Kuga leo, nasuma animu e manimu
pei tea toropusiana e maladi: go
a noa ki mu, naga Kuga wo da
punusi au mau, pa pa kuga wo naga,
Tea waina e umai pae nagisa ni
Yehovah e pei tea vasapiakiana.
Matele 14.
-1 Go e pakilina, ragi waina e paki
ekopu ni nasuma ki tea maraki
maga sikai kakada ni Farisi maga
sabbath sikainaga ega kaninavinaga,
2 naga eu do leo parati ki nia. Go kuga
leo, naatafholi sikai e doko naraena
3 waina e doputopu. Go Yesu e pasa-
dara po noa ki tea ni nawotaeana
maga go Farisi maga, e naga, E pae
nawotaeana naga tuga maripauri
4 sabbath, kite e dika 1 Ma eu punuta.
Go e puati a, po maripauri a, po
5 dipakilua e. Go e noa ki da, e
naga, Nimu sei kakamu waina ass
kite ox aneana ega wo dowo paki

da puati a sake maraverave naale-
atia ni sabbath mau ? Go eu mari 6
sa moro pasadara nalo ni tea maga
wanogoe.
Go e noa naluluakia sikai paki 7

e punusi dapala waina eu matadoa
malo kere one vea maga ; e noa ki
da, Ragi waina ku pei tea vitau- 8
tauana pae te naata paki navitawiri-
ana sikai, pa ta kere one malo kere
one vea mau; mase tea waina e
pei tea dodomadaganiana warua
liu ko e pe vei tea vitautauana pae
asa, go tea waina e pitautau mu ma 9
nae e pe umai po noa ki-go, Pa tua
naatamoli waia tokora; go ragi
wanogoe pa wo pae asa dape tokora
edaku mau po maliere. Ma ragi 10
waina ku pei tea vitautauana, pa
vano po kere one tokora edaku
mau ; naga ragi waina tea waina e
pitautau ako ega umai, ega noa
ki-go, Tagu ri, pa vaki elagi: ragi

maana narae ni tea maga mamau
puti waina eu kere one ganikani
sikoti ko. Nalakena sara naata 11
waina eu dufnada dape ra pakilagi
euga wo pei tea tapeana pakitano ;
go tea waina e duinana dape a paki
tano ega wo pei tea tapeana paki
lagi.
Go e moro noa ki tea waina e 12
pitautau sa, e naga, Ragi waina ku
mari nakaniana sikai ni aleati kite
ni ragi melu, pa ta soso tama ri
maga mau, go namatarau anigo
maga mau, go tea ni fhaladigi ki-go

ako, go navituadipaana sikai e pe

naatainoli maga waina eu pei tea

irioli maga eu surata sikoti a pano :
go e durnana doa e, po noa ki da, e

suaana kakana kite ? Mase e pe 29
nadi ki laketano sikai, po mari sa

asa mari saudoa ki nia, po naga,

ana, po mari sa mari sua. Kite 31

ragi waina tea pota e ko madu
uvea, e dipakilua tea tautauana
seara, po datago tea ni natamateana

pusi tea maga mamau puti waina
eu peani ra, eu man sa pei tea vasa-
piseikiana aginau. Nalakena tea 34

mau go e da pia Id taua ni natae

Tea waina e pilake nadaliga maga
naga ega rogo, ega rogo.
Matele 15.
1 Go tea tape nasautoga maga go

puti umai paki maladigi ki nia naga

4 e naga, Nimu naatamoli sei kakamu,

palo, po pano raki tea waina e puoli,
spapa e papai a ? Go ragi waina
e papai a, e lesi a e one pauna

7 waina e puoli. A noa ki mu, naga

parua nakoroatelagi nalo ni tea

kidoa, ma ega wo kiki nalo ni tea

waina eu dika tea waina euga
midoakidoa asa.

mu asa, nalaelaeana e doko narae
ni agelo maga ki Supe nalo ni tea
mari naleo sa sikai waina e midoa
ki doa.

natuna naanoai dua: go nara tea 12
takariki kakada e noa ki tamana,

sua ra, ragi ni navitoloana warua

go nae e pae asa dika sara naleo.

duleana, po umai punusi tamana.

Matele 16.
Go e moro noa ki tea vasapisei- 1
kiana maga, e naga, Naatamoli

ki nia, e naga, Nasava waia waina a

e naga, Go tea waina e one ako one
e pisa ? Go e naga, Totowo ni whit

ni namarinaleotageleana; naga, ragi

10 waina eu du mau du. Naata
waina e pei lomau nalo ni tea kiki
sa e moro pei lomau nalo ni tea
warua : go naata waina e dagele
nalo ni tea kiki sa e moro dagele
11 nalo ni tea warua. Nalakena tea
wanogoe ku pe ta pei lomau sua
nalo ni mammon tagele mau, sei
ega wo pavatu mu ki tea lomau ?
12 Go ku pe ta pei lomau sua nalo ni
tea ki naata pota mau, sei ega wo
13 dua mu tea animu 1 Tea suasua
sikai e mari sa magi nawota dua
suasua: nalakena ega wo pilosi
sikai, po dodomi kerua; kite ega
wo puluti sikai, po midoa ki palo
ki kerua. Ku mari sa magi Supe
go mammon suasua.
14 Go Farisi maga, waina eu pei
tea dodomi mone, eu dogo tea
maga mamau puti wanogoe; go
15 eu pasa piragisu paki nia. Go e
noa ki da, e naga, Nimu ku pei tea
wiana ku dufnamu pasa leana ki mu
namata ni naatamoli maga; ma
Supe e atae napopomu ; nalakena
tea waina e pakilagi inaleoputo
ni naatamoli maga e pei tea mama-
-16 ragokiana namata ni Supe. Na
wotaeana go profeta maga eu doko
pa pa paki Yoane ; pae ragi wanogoe
pa pa narogorogoana wia ni nama-
rakiana ki Supe e pei tea rogorogo-
kiana, go sara naatamoli eu mari
17 kasua naga euga sili asa. Ma e kasua
kiki ki nakoroatelagi go maramana
naga eroga vuoli, ma e kasua parua
ki namatapago ni letter sikai ni
18 nawotaeana naga ega rowo. Sara
naata waina eu dipakilua nagoroi
adeada, po tawiri tea pota eu mari
pele: go tea waina e tawiri tea
waina a pei tea tipakiluaana melu-
dua ki anawota e mari pele.
19 Ma naatamoli sogolapa sikai e
doko, go e pei tea sugoroana ki tea
miala kesakesa go linen wia, po do
gani navinaga wia sara naaleatia
po do mari katakata: go tea 20
tatago sikai nagisana Lazaro e pei
tea toropusiana e one pisari namata
pua ni nasuma aneana, waina e
pei namanuka mau, go waina e 21
masauna naga ega vuka ki matele
maga ni navinaga waina eu dowo
pae wede ni nakaniana ki naata
moli sogolapa wanogoe; go kuria
maga eu rumai po menae nama-
nuka aneana maga. Go e paki 22
lina, naga tea tatago wanogoe e
mate, go naga e pei tea tapeana pae
agelo maga paki naruma ni Abra-
ham pano : go tea sogolapa wanogoe
ma e mate, po pei tea ovakiana. Go 23
e sike namatana maga Hades, e
pitinu parua, go e punusi Abraham
uvea, go Lazaro e doko naruinana.
Go e pioso po naga, Mama Abraham, 24
pa dodomi au, po dipakilua Lazaro
umai, naga ega vupugi namata
pago ni nakinina noai, po mari
namenagu ega maladi; nalakena a
pitinu parua mena ni nakapu waia.
Ma Abraham e naga, Koto, pa 25
midoa ki nia naga ragi waina ku
mauri doko ku dape sua tea wia
anigo maga, go dapala nogoe Lazaro
e dape sua tea sa maga: ma ragi waia
nae e pei tea vakavakaleana nea,
go nigo ku pitinu parua. Go tea 26
waina e sokari tea maga wanogoe,
malo ni natiroana warua sikai e pei
tea lawosokiana namawota kakagida,
naga tea maga waina eu masauna
naga euga vae nea paloti punusi mu
euga mari sa paloti, go naga te seara
euga ta duagoto pae wanana umai
punusi garni mau. Go e naga, Na 27
lakena tea wanogoe a pavarani ko,
mama, naga pa tipakilua e ega vaki
nasuma ki tamagu; nalakena a2B
peani taigu lima ; naga ega noaso-
kisoki kasua paki da, naga nara
euga ta umai paki malo ni na
vitinuana waia mau, Ma Abraham 29


e naga, Eu peani Moses go profeta
maga; euga rogo parati Id da.
30 Go e naga, Ee, Mama Abraham :
ma te naata sikai e pe meludua ki
tea mate maga po pa punusi ra,
31 eu pe wo midoakidoa. Go e noa ki
nia, e naga, Eu pe ta dogo parati ki
Moses go profeta maga mau, go te
naata sikai e pe tuleana meludua
ki tea mate maga, eu pe wo ta
saralomau mau.
Matele 17.
1 Go e noa ki tea vasapiseikiana
aneana maga, e naga, E pei tea
mari-sapo-ana naga tea tapila-
gonaana maga euga ta umai mau :
ma ai ki naata waina eu rumai
2 pae asa ! Vatu ma sikai e pe vei
tea sarakiana nanoana, go nae e
pe vei tea nadikiana paki natasi,
e pe wia ki nia, liu w T aina naga e pe
mari tea kirikiri maga waia sikai
3 kakada ega tapilagona. Kuga tu-
fnamu leoparati ki mu : taifha e
pc mari naleo sa, pa vasa kasua ki
nia; go e pe midoakidoa, pa
4 maneana midoakikorokoro e. Go

lama naaleatia sikai, go e pe vaka
larua madadoa umai punusi ko,
po naga, A midoakidoa; pa maneana
midoakikorokoro e.

-6 lomauana aginami. Go Nawota e

lawoana natasi; go e pe rogo

kakamu, waina e peani tea suasua-
sikai waina e sisi natano kite leo-

umai, Pa umai maraverave po kere
8 one ganikani; go waina ega wo da
noa ki nia, Pa mari fhata ki tea
waina aga kani a, go pa tumama
otisoki ko, po maginau suasua, pa
pa aga kanikani po munu sua ; go
nigo pa wo edaku ganikani po munu?

kuga wo mari sua tea maga mamau
puti waina ku pei tea tipakiana
ara, kuga naga, Au pei tea suasua
moli; au po mari tea waina e one
garni one naga auga mari a.

paki Yerusalem pano, naga nae e
surata duaduru nialeoputo ni Sa-
maria go Calilea. Go ragi waina el 2

rualima sikai waina eu pei lepero
eu sua e, waina eu lawodu uvea :
go eu sike nadaleoda, po naga, Yesu, 13
Nawota, pa dodomi garni. Go ragi 14

ki tea viri maga mu. Go e pakilina,
ragi waina eu do pano, eu pei tea
mariana eu dautau. Go sikai ka- 15
kada, ragi waina e punusi naga e

po samasamani Supe ki nadaleo
kasua; go e dowo dapolosiwo 16

fnata ki nia : go nae e pei naata

sikai eu da pei tea mariana eu
dautau kite ? ma tea loveti wai ?

eu liliu umai naga euga tua Supe

pota waia ? Go e noa 19

vano : nasaralomauana anigo e po
maripauri ko.

maga, e naga, Naalaetia maga euga

. ki naatamoli Natuna sikai kakada,
go kuga wo da punusi a mau.
23 Go euga wo noa ki mu, Kuga leo,
tokora wanana ! Kuga leo, tokora
waia ! kuga ta pano mau, go kuga
24 ta dausi ra mau : nalakena dakuisi

melu tokora sikai etano ni nakoro-
atelagi, e marama laga paki tokora
kerua etano ni nakoroatelagi;
naatamoli Natuna ega wo dapala

one asa one naga ega vea sua na
rogokitesaana lapa po pei tea

dakiusi waina e pakilina naaleatia

goe naaleatia maga ki naatamoli

tave e umai, po maripunue puti ra.

lina naaleatia maga ki Lot; eu
