eu sorisori, eu lalawo, eu davagi
29 nasufna maga; ma naaleatia
waina Lot e ihelu dua ki Sodom
pano nakapu vavaga go brimstone
ero powo pae nakoroatelagi, po
30 maripunue puti ra : ega wo dapala
tea sikai maau wanogoe naaleatia
waina naatamoli Natuna ega wo
■ pei tea mari-pakasa-kiana asa.
31 Naaleatia wanogoe, naata waina
ega wo doko napau ni nasuiha, go
naloriki aneana maga eudoko ekopu,
ega ta siwo mau naga ega tapelua
ra : go tea waina e doko vanua
ega tapala nogoe ega ta liliu mau.
Kuga midoa ki Lot anagoroi. 32
Naata waina e pe wo laga naga ega 3.3
talua namauriana aneana ega wo
dape puoli ki nia : ma naata waina
e pe wo dape puoli ki namauriana
' aneana ega wo mautipauri a. A noa 34
ki mu, naga Napogiana wanogoe na
anoai dua eroga wo one naweweli
sikai; sikai ega wo pei tea viragi-
luaana, go kerua ega wo pei tea
toropusiana ega wo madoko.
Nagoroi dua eroga wo saisai 35
mani, sikai ega wo pei tea viragi-
luaana, go kerua ega wo pei
tea toropusiana ega wo madoko.
Go eu pasadara po noa ki nia, eu 36
naga, Seve tokora, Nawota ? Go e
noa ki da, e naga, Tokora waina
napatoko ni tea mate e one asa
tokora wanogoe icila maga euga wo
pei tea saisaikiana paki asa.

Go e noa ki da naluluakia sikai 1
nalo ni waina e one ara one naga
euga to. dapasavasa sara ragi, go
naga napopoda ega ta doro asa
mau ; e naga, Tea vasapotae sikai 2
e doko natokoana sikai, waina e
da matau ki Supe mau, po da

ma ragi edaku e dumana noa

Supe mau, go a da dodomadagani

goro e, epe to umai pitipatipa po

wiik ; a do pitua ki kekerualima ni

13 dalua ra. Ma tea tape nasautogo
e lawodu uvea, po da masauna mau
naga ega sike namatana paki
nakoroatelagi, ma e dumana dapagi
narumana, po naga, Supe, pa do-
ll domi au tea mari naleo sa. A noa
ki mu, naga Nae e siwo paki nasuma
aneana e pei tea marileanakiana,

leanakiana mau: nalakena sara

pakilagi euga wo pei tea toroana

doro e pakitano ega wo pei tea
tapeana pakilagi.

21 nalakena a matau ki-go, nalakena
ku pei naatafnoli kasua: ku dape

a mau, po tagaukotovi tea waina
ku da sapuraki nia mau. E noa ki 22
nia, e naga, Tea waina e po dave

asa, tea suasua sigisigileo. Ku
atae naga kinau a pei naatafnoli
kasua, waina a dape dakati tea
waina a da doropusi a mau, po
tagaukotovi tea waina a da sapura
ki nia mau ; go ekasana ku da pitua 23
ki mone aginau paki wede ni nasuma
ni mone, go kinau ragi waina a pe
umai a pe tape a go narogoviana
kakana ? Go e noa ki tea maga 24
waina eu lawodu pisari a, e naga,
Kuga tapelua mina kiana, po
pitua ki nia paki tea waina e peani
mina rualima sikai. Go eu noa 25
ki nia, eu naga, Nawota, e peani
mina rualima sikai. A noa ki mu, 26
naga sara naata waina eu peani ega
wo pei tea vituakiana paki da;
ma naata waina e da peani mau,
tea waina e peani a ma ega wo pei
tea tapeluaana kiana. Ma tea 27
kokona ki nau maga waia, waina
eu karai naga aga maramara dapau
ra, kuga viragi ra umai, po mari-
punue ra naraegu.

wanogoe, e surata pea pano, po do
sake paki Yerusalem.

po piragi a umai. Go te naata e3l

NGUNA-TONGOAN N.T.
Go e paki roara ni nasuma tapu, 45
po pae asa kopasi tea maga waina
eu sorisori paki etaku, po noa ki
da, e naga, E pei tea midiriana, Go 46
nasuma aginau ega wo pei nasuma
ni natapasavasaana; ma nimu
ku mari a e pei valea ki tea tape
pavakoto maga.
Go e do pasapiseiki sara naaleatia 47
nasuma tapu. Ma tea viri warua
maga go tea midiri maga go tea
warua maga ni narei eu laga naga
euga mari punue a: go eu da 48
papai tea waina euga mari a mau ;
nalakena narei eu mamau puti
dau asa dau, dakidorogo.
Matele 20.

naga naleo maga mamau puti
waina eu pei tea midiriana euga

maga waina eu diena go ki tea

bred sikai, go ragi waina e pasa-
dodomata ki sua, e dovaporae a,
po dua ra, po naga, Tea waia e pei
napatokogu waina e manimu pei
tea vituakiana: kuga mari tea
waia naga kuga midoa ki nau
20 asa. Go dapala nogoe lasa munu
edaku ki nakaniana, po naga, Lasa
munu waia e pei navasasokiana
vau ni nadagu, waina e manimu
21 pei tea takiana. Ma kuga leo,
nafnelearu ni tea waina e pitua ki
22 nau e sikoti au doko wede. Na
lakena naatamoli Natuna e pano

nakiana asa : ma ai ki naatamoli
waina e pei tea vituakiana pae asa !
23 Go eu pae asa duinada pusuusu
paki da ki sei kakada e pei tea
waina e naga ega mari tea wanogoe.
24 Go navululuana ma e pakilina
inaleoputo kakada, ki sei kakada
e alalagora pei tea warua liu.
25 Go e noa ki da, e naga, Nawota ni
nalauna pota maga eu maramara
dapau ra; go tea maga waina
eu peani naveinawotaana dapau
ra eu pei tea sosoana ki Tea Mari-
-26 mataki maga. Ma nimu kuga ta
dapala nogoe mau : ma tea waina
e parua inaleoputo ega vei
tea mariana ega tapala tea takariki ;
go tea waina e maraki, ega tapala
tea waina e suasua. Nalakena 27
sei e parua, tea waina e kere
one ganikani, kite tea waina e
suasua ? e da pei tea waina e kere
one ganikani kite ? ma kinau a
doko inaleoputo kakamu a dakiusi
tea waina e suasua. Ma nimu ku 28
pei tea waina ku sikoti au doko
namaridogo-au-ana maga ; go kinau 29
a manimu dawana ki namarakiana
sikai, dakiusi waina Tamagu e
maginau dawana ki nia, naga kuga 30

nau namarakiana aginau ; go kuga
wo dasake malo tasake maga po
do pasapotae naworawora ni Israel
rualitna sikai tarnate dua. Simon, 31
Simon, pa leo, Satan e datago mu,
naga ega nuanua ki mu dapala
whit: ma kinau a manigo pavara 32
naga nasaralomauana anigo ega
ta makoto mau; go nigo, ragi
waina pa wo moro madadoa, pa
mari taima maga euga kasua.

au.

1 Go taua mamau kakada eu
duleana, po piragi a pano punusi
2 Pilato. Go eu pae asa pasadipa

po dipagoro naga auga ta dua
Kaisar nasautoga mau, po noa

ni Yudea kite % Go e pasadara e
4 po naga, Nigo ku noa e. Go

e naga, A da papai te namariana
sa naatamoli waia mau. Ma eu 5
pasa kasukasua, po naga, E % pasa

pa pa pa paki tokora waia. Ma 6

waina nae ma e doko Yerusalem
naaleatia maga wanogoe.

ki navasaana lapa ; ma nae o da

ki nia. Go Herod nara ma naata 11

sikai asa, po dipakilua e liliu pa
punusi Pilato. Go Herod go 12

naaleatia wanogoe ; nalakena sala
vea ero duniada kokona ki da.

warua maga go tea maraki maga go

e ara : go Herod e da papai al5

TEA WAIA E PEI NAWOTA
KI NAKA NI YUDEA.

ero pei tea sarakiana sikai kakada

pauri ko, go pa mautipauri garni.

kotoviana sikai maau kite ? Go 41
e leana nalo kakagida lomau ;


nalakena toro dape liliua ki tea
waina e pia ki namariana anigida
maga: ma tea waia eda mari te

Paradeiso.

Matele 24.
Ma naaleatia vea ni wiik, ragi ni 1
namakotokotoana kiki kakana, eu
rumai paki matigo, eu dape tea ni
napo wia maga wangoe umai waina
eu marifnata ki sua e. Go eu papal
vatu e pei tea maluluakiana me- 2
ludua ki matigo pano. Go eu paki 3
ekopu, po da papai napatoko ni
Nawota Yesu mau. Go e pakilina, 4
ragi waina eu dodoputuaki asa,

po kolo ki naraeda paki natano, ero
noa ki da, Ekasana ku laga tea
mauri maleoputo ni tea mate
maga ? E da doko nea mau, ma 6
e po duleana : kuga midoa ki dapala
waina e pasa ki mu ragi waina e
ko doko Galileo doko, po noa naga 7
e one naatafnoli Natuna one naga
ega vei tea vituakiana paki na
melearu maga ni naatafnoli sigisigi-
leo maga, po pei tea turiana na
kau valadagoto, po moro duleana
naaleatia ketolu. Go eu midoaki 8
navasaana aneana maga, po liliu 9
pae matigo umai, po dogorogo ki
tea maga mamau puti wanogoe
paki tea rualima sikai tamate sikai,
go paki tea pota maga mamau puti.

nara ma nagoroi pota maga waina
eu sikoti ra eu noa ki apostolo

-21 dagoto. Ma kinami au leogoro

Israel. loro tea maga mamau puti
wanogoe, go e po pei naaleatia

Go nagoroi seara kakagami eu mari 22
garni au saramakoto, eu paki matigo
malipogi sa; go ragi waina eu da 23
papai napatokona mau, eu rumai
po noa naga eu punusi navunusiana
sikai ni agelo maga, waina eu noa
naga nae e mauri. Go seara ni 24
tea maga waina eu sikoti garni eu
paki matigo, po papai a e dapala
waina nagoroi maga eu noa e:
ma nae eu da punusi a mau. Go 25
nae e noa ki da, e naga, Ko tea
manu mata vusa maga, go tea mari
daliali napopomu naga kuga sara-
lomau tea maga mamau puti waina
profeta maga eu noa ra ! Bda one 26
Kristo one naga ega sua navitinuana
maga wanogoe, po paki nasama-
samaana aneana pano kite ? Go e 27
atulake pae Moses go pae profeta
maga mamau puti, po pasadoapisei
ki da melu navasana midiriana
maga mamau puti naleo maga
nalo kakana. Go eu paki mala- 28
digi ki natokoana kiki, waina ero
surata paki asa pano : go nae e
mari dapala ega surata liu sa pano.
Go ero pasadie a, po naga, Pa toko 29
sikoti garni doko; nalakena e
maladigi pei ragi melu, go naaleatia
e po kolo. Go e paki ekopu naga
ega toko sikoti ra doko. Go e3O
pakilina, ragi waina nae e kere one
sikoti ra naga euga kanikani, e
dape bred po pasapia ki nia, po
dovaporae, po dua ra. Go na 31
matada eu pei tea wolagatiana, go
ero leoatae a; go e puoli melu-
dua ki navunusiana adeada pano.
Go ero dumada noa ki da, ero naga, 32
Napopogida e da do soro napa-
laugida, ragi waina e do pasa ki
gida napua, ragi waina e do mani-
gida polagati navasaana midiriana
maga kite ? Go ero duleana aura 33
sikai maau wanogoe, po liliu umai
paki Yerusalem, po papai tea
rualima sikai tamate sikai eu saisai,


nara ma tea maga waina eu sikoti
34 ra doko, eu naga, Nawota e po
duleana lomau, go e po pakilina ki
35 Simon. Go nara ero dogorogo ki
tea maga waina eu pakilina napua,
go dapala waina e pei tea ataeana
paki da, natovaporae-bred-ana.
36 Go ragi waina ero do noa tea
maga wanogoe, nae e lawodu fna-
leoputo kakada, po noa ki da, Kuga
37 veani natamateana. Ma eu pilake
po mataku, po midoa ki nia naga
38 eu leo punusi naatana sikai. Go
e noa ki da, Ekasaua ku manau-
nau ? go nadodopusuusuana maga
eu pakilina napopomu nalakena
39 nasava 'I Kuga vunusi naiiielearu-
gu maga go namelegu maga, naga
e pei kinau : kuga tovidogo au, po
punusi ; nalakena naatana sikai e da
peani napokasi go na vatu magamau,
dakiusi waina ku leo pun.usi au a
40 peani ra. Go ragi waina e noa sua
tea wanogoe, e pisei ki da nafnele-
aruna maga go namelena maga.
41 Go ragi waina eu ko da saralomau
mau nalakena nalaelaeaana, po
do maga, e noa ki da, e naga, Ku
peani te navatuna kaniana nea
42 kite % Go eu dua e matele sikai
43 ni naika veniana sikai. Go e dape
a, po ganikani naraeda.
44 Go e noa ki da, e naga, Tea maga
waia eu pei navasaana aginau maga
waina a noa ki mu ara, ragi waina
a ko sikoti mu doko, naga tea maga
mamau puti waina eu pei tea
midiriana nawotaeana ki Moses,
go profeta maga, go Salamo maga,
nalo kakagu, e one ara one naga
euga lolomana. Ragi wanogoe e 45
polagati napopoda naga euga mi-
doakiatae navasaana midiriana
maga ; go e noa ki da, e naga, E 46
dapala waia pei tea midiriana, naga
Kristo ega sua navitinuana ni
namateana, po moro duleana inelu
dua ki tea mate maga naaleatia
ketolu ; go naga namidoakidoaana 47
go namidoakikorokoroana ni na
marinaleosaana maga eroga vei tea
rogorogokiana pae nagisana paki
nalauna maga mamau puti, po
atulake pae Yerusalem pa pa pa.
Nimu ku pei tea noasokisoki ni tea 48
maga wanogoe. Go kuga leo, kinau 49
a dipakilua paloti nasaiana ki
Tamagu ega toko mu doko ; ma
nimu kuga toko natokoana pa pa
kuga wo pei tea sugoroana ki na
kasuaana waina e pae elagi umai.
Go e piragilua ra pano pa pa eu 50
doko kivea ki Betliania : go e sike
namelearuna maga po pasapia ki
da. Go ragi waina e do pasapia 51
ki da, e padua ki da pano, po pei
tea tapeana sake paki nakoro-
atelagi pano. Go nara eu lotu ki 52
nia, po liliu umai paki Yerusalem
pilake nalaelaeaana warua ; go eu 53
doko roara ni nasurna tapu sara
ragi, eu do pasapia ki Supe.
TUSI NI NAROGOROGOANA WIA
YOANE.
MatAlo 1 sikoti Supe doko, go Navasaana e
pei Supe. Nae e doko ragi ni 2
1 Ragi ni naatulakeana Navasa- naatulakeana sikoti Supe doko.
ana e doko, go Navasaana e Naleo maga mamau puti eu pei 3


tea mariana pae asa ; go masale ki
nia te navatuna sikai e da pei tea
mariana man waina e pei tea
4 mariana. Narnauriana e doko asa ;
go narnauriana wanogoe e pei
5 namarama ki naatamoli maga. Go
namarama wanogoe e maramalaga
namaligo, go namaligo e da midoaki-
-6 atae a mau. Naatamoli sikai e paki
lina, e pei tea tipakiluaana melu
7 Supe umai, nagisana Yoane. Nae
e umai raki nanoasokisokiana, naga
ega noasokisoki nalo ni namarama
wanogoe, naga tea maga mamau
8 puti euga saralomau pae asa. Nae
e da pei namarama wanogoe mau,
ma e umai naga ega noasokisoki
9 nalo ni marama wanogoe. Nama-
rama lomau, waina e marama-
lagati sara naatamoli, e umai paki
10 maramana. E doko maramana,
go maramana e pei tea mariana
pae asa, go maramana e da atae a
11 mau. E umai paki kiana, go
tea aneana maga eu da piragi a
12 mau. Ma tea maga waina eu
piragi a e dua ra nakasuaana naga
euga vei Supe natuna maga, e dua
tea maga asa waina eu saralomau
13 nagisana: waina eu da pakiliua
melu nada mau, go eu da pakilina
fnelu namasauana ni napokasi mau,
go eu da pakilina melu namasauana
ki naatamoli mau, ma eu pakilina
14 fnelu Supe. Go Navasaana e pei
tea mariana e pei napokasi, go e
doko maleoputo kakagami (go au
leopunusi nasamasamaana aneana,
nasamasamaana dapala tea ni
Natuna sikedau waina e fnelu
Tamana umai), e pura ki nasau-
-15 piaana go nalomauana. Yoane e
do noasokisoki nalo kakana, po do
pioso, e naga, Tea waia e pei tea
waina a noa e, a naga, Tea waina e
edakugoro au umai e pei tea mari-
ana e pea ki nau : nalakena e doko
16 pea ki nau. Nalakena navuraana
aneana kinami mamau puti au dape
te seara kakana, go nasaupiaana
oli nasaupiaana. Nalakena nawo- 17
taeana e pei tea vituakiana pae
Moses; nasaupiaana go nalomau-
ana ero umai pae Yesu Kristo.
Te naata sikai e ko da punusi Supe 18
te ragi mau; Natuna sikedau,
waina e doko naruma ni Tamana,
nae e noapakasa ki nia.
Go tea waia e pei nanoasokisoki- 19
ana ki Yoane, ragi waina navara-
pule maga ni Yudea eu dipakilua
tea viri seara go tea ni nawora ni
Levi seara eu pae Yerusalem umai
punusi a naga euga vusuusu paki
nia, po naga, Nigo ku pei sei ? Go 20
e noasai, po da pasagoro mau ; go
e noasai, naga Kinau a da pei
Kristo mau. Go eu pusuusu paki 21
nia, eu naga, Go ku pei nasava ?
Ku pei Elijah kite ? Go e naga,
Ada pei Elijah mau. Nigo ku pei
profeta waina kite ? Go c pasa-
dara, e naga, Ee. Nalakena tea 22
wanogoe eu noa ki nia, eu naga,
Ku pel sei ? naga auga vitua ki
navasadaraana paki tea maga
waina eu dipakilua garni umai.
Ku noa nasava nalo kakama ?
E naga, Kinau a pei nadaleo ni tea 23
waina e do pioso masopalo, po naga,
Kuga mari napua ki Yehovah ega
leana, dakiusi waina profeta Isaiah
e noa e. Go eu pei tea tipakiluaana 24
melu Farisi maga umai. Go eu 25
pusuusu paki nia, po noa ki nia,
eu naga, Ku pe ta pei Kristo mau,
go ku pe ta pei Elijah mau, go ku
pe ta pei profeta waina mau, ma
ekasana ku do bapetizo ? Yoane 26
e pasadara ra, po naga, Kinau a do
bapetizo ki noai; sikai e lawodu
maleoputo kakamu waina nimu
ku da atae a mau, tea waina e 27
edakugoro au umai, waina kinau
a da pia mau naga aga veresi
natali ni nainelevasiana aneana.
Tea maga wanogoe eu pei tea 28
mariana Bethania, taleva kerua


ni Yordan, tokora waina Yoane e
do bapetizo asa.

umai punusi a, go e naga, Kuga
leo, Shiip Natuna ki Supe, waina e
dapelua namarinaleosaana ni mara-
-30 mana ! Tea waia e pei tea waina
kinau a noa nalo kakana, a naga,

umai waina e pei tea mariana e
pea ki nau : nalakena e doko pea

man ; ma naga ega vei tea mariana
ega toko lina ki Israel, nalakena
tea wanogoe kinau a umai a do
32 bapetizo ki noai. Go Yoane e noa-
sokisoki, po naga, A po leopunusi

sikai pae nakoroatelagi umai; go
33 e doko asa doko. Go kinau a da

kilua au naga aga bapetizo ki noai,

doko, nae e pei tea waina e do

soki naga nae e pei Supe Natuna.

go e naga, Koroga leo, Shiip

piseikiana dua wanogoe ero dogo

ra ero dausi a, go e noa ki da,

go koroga wo punusi. Nalakena
tea wanogoe ero umai po punusi

doko sikoti a naaleatia wanogoe:
e alagoro pei aura kerualima. Tea 40
rua wanogoe waina ero dogo

kakada e pei Anderea, Simon
Petero taina. Nae e pea papai 41
aneana taina Simon, po noa ki nia,
e naga, Au po papai Messiah (waina
e pei tea vasadoaana e pei Kristo).
E piragi a umai punusi Yesu. 42
Yesu e leosoki a, po naga, Nigo ku
pei Simon natu ni Yoane : nigo pa
wo pei tea sosoana ki Kefa (waina
e pei tea vasasadoaana e pei
Petero).

pei tea ni Bethsaida, natokoana ki

prof eta maga eu midiri a, Yesu ni

te nasorosoroana e da doko asa
mau! Nathanael e noa ki nia, 48
e naga, Ku atae au pae esava ?

e naga, Ragi waina Filipo e ko da
soso ko mau, go ku doko etano ki
napuliva, a punusi ko. Nathanael 49
e pasadara e, e naga, Rabbi, Nigo
ku pei Supe Natuna; nigo ku pei
Nawota ki Israel. Yesu e pasadara 50
po noa ki nia, e naga, Nalakena
a noa ki-go, naga A punusi ko
etano ki napuliva, ku saralomau
kite ? pa wo punusi tea maga waina
eu parua liu tea maga wanogoe.

lomau, a noa ki mu, naga Kuga


wo punusi nakoroatelagi ega wo
pa mawota, go agelo maga ki Supe

siwo pae naatamoli Natuna.
Matele 2.
1 Go naaleatia ketolu navitawiiiana
sikai e pei tea mariana asa Kana
ni Calilea; go Yesu pilana e doko
2 tokora wanogoe: go Yesu ma e
pei tea vitautauana, go tea vasa-
piseikiana aneana maga, paki navi-
-3 tawiriana wanogoe. Go ragi waina
waine e nopu, Yesu pilana e noa
ki nia, e naga, Eu da peani waine
4 mau. Go Yesu e noa ki nia, e naga,
Aga kasa ki-go, koroi ? aura aginau
5 e ko da umai mau. Pilana e noa
ki tea suasua maga, e naga, Tea
waina e pe noa ki mu asa kuga
6 mari a. Go noai ni vatu latesa
eu pei tea lawokiana tokora wa-
nogoe pae namaridautauana ki
naka ni Yudea, eu dape noai
ni buket latelatesa kite loveloveti
7 sarasara ra. Yesu e noa ki da, e
naga, Kuga vakavuro noai ni vatu
maga ki noai. Go eu pakavuro
8 ra pa pa paki nagoleda. Go e noa
ki da, e naga, Kuga vautu ragi
waia, po dape a pano dua tea
maraki nakaniana asa. Go eu
9 dape a pano. Go ragi waina tea
maraki nakaniana e munu dogo
noai waina e pei tea mariana e pei
waine, go e salupe a naga e pae
esava, (ma tea suasua maga waina
eu pautui noai eu atae a), tea
marakinakaniana esoso teavitawiri,
10 po noa ki nia, e naga, Sara naata
fnoli eu pea doropusi waine wia;
go ragi waina naatamoli maga eu
munu sua parua, eu edaku doropusi
tea sa marara: nigo ku mauti
waine wia pa pa paki ragi waia.
11 Naatulakeana wanogoe ni navai-
vaiana maga Yesu e mari a Kana
ni Calilea, po mari nasamasamaana
aneana e dokolina asa; go tea
vasapiseikiana aneana maga eu
saralomau .asa.
Edaku ki tea wanogoe e siwo 12
paki Kapernaum pano, nae, go
pilana, go taina maga, go tea vasa-
piseikiana aneana maga, eu mamau ;
go eu doko tokora wanogoe doko
naaleatia maga eu da lapa mau.
Go navakalauana ki naka ni 13
Yudea e pei maladigi, go Yesu e
sake paki Yerusalem pano. Go 14
e papai tea maga roara ni na
sunia tapu waina eu do sori ox
maga go sbiip maga go tokopea
maga, go tea surupioli ki mone
maga eu dasake : go e mari tea 15
varati sikai ni namea kiki maga,
po kopasi puti ra paki etaku ni
roara ni nasufna tapu, sbiip maga
go ox maga; go e da ki mone
ki tea surupioli ki mone maga,
po dapeda ki wede adeada maga;
go e noa ki tea maga waina eu sori 16
tokopea maga, e naga, Kuga tapelua
tea maga waia euga melu dua ki
tokora waia pano ; kuga ta mari
nasufna ki Tamagu ega vei nasufna
ni navakokotoana mau. Tea vasa- 17
piseikiana aneana maga eu midoa
ki nia naga e pei tea midiriana,
Nasuisuiana magi nasufna anigo
ega wo gani dinomi au. Nalakena 18
tea wanogoe navarapule maga ni
Yudea eu pasadara po noa ki nia,
eu naga, Seve navaivaiana ku
pisei ki garni asa, nalakena ku mari
tea maga waia ? Yesu e pasa 19
dara po noa ki da, e naga, Kuga
rakai nasufna tapu waia, go aga
wo sike a ega tuleana naaleatia.
dolu. Nalakena tea wanogoe na 20’
varapule ni Yudea eu naga, Natan
rualima pati tamate latesa nasufna
tapu waia e do pei tea tavagiana
ara, go nigo pa wo sike a ega tuleana
naaleatia dolu kite ? Ma nae e2l
noa e nalo ni nasufna tapu ni na
patokona. Nalakena tea wanogoe 22


ragi waina e pei tea sikeana dule-
ana meludua ki tea mate maga,
tea vasapiseikiana maga eu midoa
ki nia naga e noa tea wanogoe ;
go eu saralomau navasaana midiri-
ana wanogoe, go navasaana waina
Yesu e noa e.
23 Go ragi waina e doko Yerusalem
ragi ni navakalauana, ragi ni nasai-
saiana kakana, tea lapa eu sara-
lomau nagisana, eu do leo punusi
navaivaiana aneana maga waina
24 e mari ra. Ma Yesu eda dumana
pavatu ara asa mau, nalakena nae
e atae tea maga mamau puti,
25 go nalakena e da pei sapo mau naga
te naata sikai ega noasokisoki nalo
ni naatomoli; nalakena nae e
dumana atae tea waina e doko
napalau ni naatamoli.
Matele 3.
1 Ma naatamoli sikai ni Farisi
maga e doko, nagisana Nikodemo,
tea maraki sikai ki naka ni Yudea :
2 nae e umai punusi Yesu pogi, po
noa ki nia, e naga, Rabbi, au atae
naga ku pei tea vasapiseiki sikai
waina ku frielu Supe umai: na-
lakena to naata sikai, Supe e pe ta
sikoti a doko mau, e pe ta mariatae
mari navaivaiana maga mau waina
nigo ku do mari ra.
3 Yesu e pasadara po noa ki nia,
e naga, Lomau, lomau, a noa ki-go,
Te naata sikai e pe ta pakilina pau
mau, e pe ta mari atae punusi
namarakiana ki Supe mau.
4 Nikodemo e noa ki nia, e naga,
. Naatamoli sikai e mari atae paki
lina ragi waina e pei tea matua
dapale sava ? E mari atae sili
paki napele ni pilana sala kerua,
po pakilina kite ?
5 Yesu e pasadara, e naga, Lomau,
lomau, a noa ki-go, Te naata
sikai e pe ta pakilina inelu noai
go Naatana mau, e pe ta mari
atae sili paki namarakiana ki
Supe mau. Tea waina e paki 6
lina inelu napokasi e pei napokasi;
go tea waina e pakilina inelu
Naatana e pei naatana. Pa ta 7
maga mau nalakena a noa ki-go,
naga E one mu one naga kuga
vakilina pau. Nalagi e sau tokora 8
waina e masauna, go ku dogo na
daleona, ma tokora waina e pae asa
umai, go tokora waina e paki asa
pano ku da atae a mau ; Sara naata
waina eu pakilina inelu Naatana
eu dapala nogoe. Nikidemo e pasa 9
dara po noa ki nia, e naga, Tea maga
wanogoe eu mariatae pei tea mari-
ana dapale sava ? Yesu e pasadara 10
po noa ki nia, e naga, Nigo ku pei
tea vasapiseiki ki Israel, go ku da
midoakiatae tea maga wanogoe
kite ? Lomau, lomau, a noa ki-go, 11
naga Au do pasa tea waina au
atae a, po do noasokisoki tea waina
au punusi a ; go ku da dape nanoa-
sokisokiana aginami mau. A pe 12
noa ki sua mu tea maga ni mara-
mana, go ku pc ta saralomau mau,
a pe noa ki mu tea maga ni na
koroatelagi, ku pe wo saralomau
dapale sava ? Go te naata sikai 13
e da sake paki nakoroatelagi mau,
ma tea waina e pae nakoroatelagi
siwo umai e sikina sake paki asa,
naatamoli Natuna waina e doko
nakoroatelagi. Go dapala waina It
Moses e sike maata pakilagi maso-
palo, dapala nogoe e one naatamoli
Natuna one naga ega vei tea sikeana
pakilagi: naga sara naata waina eu 15
saralomau asa euga veani namauri-
ana waina e du mau du.
Nalakena Supe e dodomi mara- 16
mana dapala waina e pitua ki
Natuna sikedau, naga sara naata
waina eu saralomau asa euga ta
mate puoli mau, ma euga veani
namauriana waina e du mau du.
Nalakena Supe e da dipakilua 17
Natuna umai paki maramana naga


ega vasapotae maramana mau,
ma e dvpakilua e umai naga mara-
mana ega vei tea mautipauriana
18 pae asa. Tea waina e saralomau
asa e da pei tea vasapotaeana mau :
tea waina e da saralomau mau e po
pei tea vasapotaeana sua, nalakena
e da saralomau nagisa ni Supe
19 Natuna sikedau mau. Go tea waia
e pei navasapotaeana, naga nama-
rama e po umai paki maramana, go
naatamoli maga eu dodomi parua ki
namaligo, po dodomi kiki ki nama-
rama ; nalakena nawosiana adeada
20 maga eu sa. Nalakena sara naata
waina eu do mari naleo sa eu pilosi
namarama, go eu da umai paki
namarama mau, naga nawosiana
adeada maga euga ta pei tea ma-
-21 ramapaiana mau. Ma tea waina e
do mari nalomauana e umai paki
namarama, naga nawosiana aneana
maga euga vei tea mariana euga
toko lina, naga eu pei tea wosiwosi
kiana doko Supe.
22 Edaku ki tea maga wanogoe
Yesu go tea vasapiseikiana aneana
maga eu rumai paki navanua ni
Yudea, go e doko tokora wanogoe
sikoti ra doko, po do bapetizo.
23 Go Yoane ma e do bapetizo Ainon,
maladigi ki Salim, naJakena noai
lapa eu doko tokora wanogoe:
go eu rumai po pei tea bapetizoana.
24 Nalakena Yoane e ko da pei tea
nadikiana paki ekopu ni nasuma
25 ni navavaigoroana mau. Nalakena
tea wanogoe navusuusuana sikai
e pakilina melu tea vasapiseikiana
maga ki Yoane paki tea ni Yudea
sikai nalo ni namaridautauana.
26 Go eu rumai punusi Yoane, po noa
ki nia, eu naga, Rabbi, naata waina
e sikoti ko doko taleva kerua ni
Yordan, waina nigo ku maneana noa-
sokisoki, pa leo, nae e do bapetizo,
go tea maga mamau puti eu rumai
27 punusi a. Yoane e pasadara po
naga, Naatamoli sikai, te navatuna
KGUNA-TONGOAN N.T.
e pe ta pei tea vituakiana paki nia
melu nakoroatelagi mau, e pe ta
mariatae dape a mau. Nimu ku 28
dufnamu maginau noasokisoki naga
a noa, naga Kinau a da pei Kristo
mau, ma, naga A pei tea tipaki-
luaana pea ki nia umai. Tea 29
waina e peani nagoroi laid e pei
tea vitawiri: ma tea vitawiri tana
ri, waina e lawodu po dogo e, e
laelaea parua nalakena nadaleo ni
tea vitawiri: nalakena tea wanogoe
nalaelaeaana aginau waia e pei tea
vakavuroana. E one asa one naga 30
nae ega risu po parua, ma e one
au one naga aga risu po kiki.
Tea waina e pae elagi umai e 31
dapau tea maga mamau puti: tea
waina e pei tea ni maramana e pei
tea ni maramana, po do pasa tea ni
maramana: tea waina e pae na
koroatelagi umai e dapau tea maga
mamau puti. Tea waina e punusi 32
a po dogo e, tea wanogoe e do noa-
sokisoki a; go te naata sikai e
da dape nanoasokisokiana aneana
mau. Tea waina e dape sua na 33
noasokisokiana aneana, e pulusoki
naga Supe e pei lomau. Nalakena 34
tea waina Supe e dipakilua e umai
e do pasa navasaana maga ki Supe ;
nalakena Supe e da pitua ki
Naatana pae totowo paid nia mau.
Tamana e dodomi Natuna, go e 35
pitua ki naleo maga mamau puti
paki nainelearuna. Tea waina e 36
saralomau Natuna e peani namauri-
ana waina e du mau du ; ma tea
waina e da saralomau Natuna
mau ega wo da punusi namauri-
ana mau, ma namaetoana ki Supe e
doko asa doko.
Matele 4.
Nalakena tea wanogoe ragi 1
waina Nawota e atae naga Earisi
maga eu dogo naga Yesu e do mari
po do bapetizo tea vasapiseikiana


maga eu lapa liu tea maga ki Yoane ;

ma tea vasapiseikiana aneana maga
3 eu bapetizo), edoropusi Yudea e ma-
doko, po moro paki Calilea pano.
4 Ge e one asa. one naga ega surata

natokoana ni Samaria sikai waina

fnaladigi ki matele ni natano waina

wanogoe. Go Yesu waina e ma-
wosa ki nasurataana e dasake dapala
nogoe pisari namata noai wanogoe.

Matele 5.
1 Edaku ki tea maga wanogoe
nasaisaiana sikai ki naka ni Yudea
e doko ; go Yesu e paki Yerusalem
pano.
2 Go luku-noai-ava sikai e doko
Yerusalem pisari namata pua ni
shiip, waina e pei tea sosoana
pae Heberu ki Bethesda, waina e
3 peani natara-taupa lima. Taua sikai
ni naatamoli maga eu one natara
taupa maga wanogoe, waina eu
sasana, waina eu kesa, waina eu
pei pito, waina eu lologara, eu do
leogoro navarivariana ni noai:
4 nalakena te ragi seara agelo sikai
ki Yehovah e siwo paki luku-noai-
ava wanogoe, po mari noai e dule-
tule ; go naata waina e pea paki
asa edaku ki natuletuleakiana ni
noai e pei tea mariana e pia padua
ki nasasanaana waina e pei tea
vuatiana asa. Go naatamoli sikai 5
e doko tokora wanogoe, waina e
peani natau rualima dolu tamate
latolu nasasanaana aneana. Ragi 6
waina Yesu e punusi a e one, po
atae naga e dapala nogoe doko ragi
varau, e noa ki nia, e naga, Ku 7
masauna naga pa vei tea mariana
pa wia kite ? Tea sasana wanogoe
e pasadara e, e naga, Nawota, a
da peani te naatamoli sikai mau,
ragi waina noai e pei tea tuletulea-
kiana, waina ega nadi ki nau paki
luku-noai-ava: ma ragi waina
kinau a do umai, tea pota sikai e
pea ki nau siwo pano. Yesu e 8
noa ki nia, e naga, Pa tuleana, pa
tape dakati nawewele anigo, po
surata. Go fnaraverave naatamoli 9
wanogoe e pei tea mariana e pia,
go e dape dakati nawewele aneana
po surata.
Go e pei sabbath naaleatia wanogoe. 10
Nalakena tea wanogoe navarapule
maga ni Yudea eu noa ki tea waina
e pei tea maripauriana, eu naga,

ana mau naga pa tape dakati
nawewele anigo. Ma nae e pasa- 11
dara ra, e naga, Tea waina e mari
au a pia, nae e noa ki nau, e naga.
Pa tape dakati nawewele anigo,
po surata. Eu pusuusu paki nia, 12
eu naga, Naatamoli waina e noa
ki-go, naga Pa tape dakati, po ■
surata e pei sei ? Ma tea waina 13
e pei tea maripauriana e da atae
a mau: nalakena Yesu e moro
pano, go taua sikai ni naatamoli
maga eu doko tokoro wanogoe.

e papai a roara ni nasauma tapu,
po noa ki nia, e naga, Pa leo, ku
pei tea mariana ku pia, pa ta moro

e sa parua liu ega ta pakilina ki-go
15 mau. Naatamoli wanogoe e pano,

16 pia e pel Yesu. Go nalakena tea

eu kopalele Yesu, nalakena e mari
17 tea maga wanogoe sabbath. Ma

e do posiwosi pa pa paki ragi waia,
18 go kinau ado posiwosi. Nalakena

maripunue a, nalakena e dapiri
sabbath, tea wanogoe e da sikina
mau, ma e soso Supe ki Tamana
aneana, e durnana mari a e pitotowo
ma Supe.
19 Nalakena tea wanogoe Yesu e
pasadara po noa ki da, e naga,
Lomau, lomau, a noa ki mu,
a naga, Natuna e da mariatae
durnana mari te navatuna mau,
ma e mari tea waina e punusi
Tamana e do mari a. Nalakena
naleo maga waina nae e pe mari ra,
naleo maga wanogoe Natuna ma
20 e do mari ra dakiusi a. Nalake-
na Tamana e dodomi Natuna,
po pisei ki nia naleo maga mamau
puti waina nae e do mari ra: go
ega wo pisei ki nia nawosiana maga
waina eu parua liu tea maga waia,
21 naga nimu kuga maga. Nalake-
na dakiusi waina Tamana e do
sike tea mate maga eu duleana po
pakamauri ki da, dapala nogoe
Natuna ma e do pakamauri ki tea
22 maga waina e masauna. Nalakena
Tamana e da pasapotae te naata
mau, ma e dua Natuna navasa-
potaeana mamau ; naga tea maga
mamau puti euga dodomadagani
Natuna, ega tapala waina eu dodo-
-23 madagani Tamana. Tea waina e
da dodomadagani Natuna mau,
e da dodomadagani Tamana mau
24 waina e dipakilua e umai. Lomau,
lomau, a noa ki mu, naga Tea
waina e dogo navasaana aginau,
po saralomau navasaana ki tea
waina e dipakilua au umai, e peani

go ega wo da umai paki navasapo-
taeana mau, ma e po meludua ki
namateana po paki namauriana.
Lomau, lomau, a noa ki mu, naga 25
Aura ega wo umai, go e pei ragi
waia, waina tea mate maga euga
wo dogo nadaleo ni Supe Natuna
asa ; go tea maga waina eu dogo
euga wo mauri. Nalakena dakiusi 26
waina Tamana e peani namauriana
e doko asa, dapala nogoe e dua
Natuna naga nae ma ega veani na
mauriana ega toko asa : go e dua e 27
naveinawotaana naga ega mari
navasapotaeana, nalakena e pei
naatamoli Natuna. Kuga ta maga 28
tea wanogoe mau : nalakena aura
ega wo umai waina tea maga mamau
puti waina eu one matigo maga
one euga wo dogo nadaleona, po 29
dave umai; tea maga waina eu
mari naleo pia maga, euga wo dave
umai paki namoroduleanaana ni
namauriana; go tea maga waina
eu mari naleo sa maga, euga wo
dave umai paki namoroduleanaana
ni navasapotaeana.
Kinau a da mariatae duinagu 30
mari te navatuna sikai mau; a
pasapotae dapala waina a dogo:
go navasapotaeana aganau e leana ;
nalakena a da laga namasauana
aginau mau, ma a laga namasauana
ki tea waina e dipakilua au umai.
Kinauapenoasokisokinalokakagu, 31
nanoasokisokiana aginau e pe ta
pei lomau mau. Tea waina e do 32
noasokisoki nalo kakagu e pei tea
pota sikai; go a atae naga nanoa-
sokisokiana waina e do noasoki-
soki a nalo kakagu e pei lomau.
Nimu ku dipakilua pa punusi 33
Yoane, go e magi nalomauana
noasokisoki. Ma nanoasokisokiana 34
waina kinau a dape a e da melu


naatamoli mau: ma a noa tea
maga wanogoe naga nimu kuga vei
35 tea mautipauriana. Nae e pei
nasulu waina e soro po maramalaga;
go nimu ku masauna naga kuga
laelaea namarama aneana ragi sikai.
36 Ma nanoasokisokiana waina kinau
a peani a e parua liu tea ki Yoane :
nalakena nawosiana maga waina

marisua ra, nawosiana maga wano-
goe waina a do mari ra, eu do
noasokisoki nalo kakagu, naga
Tamagu e dipakilua au umai.
37 Go Tamagu waina e dipakilua au
umai, nae e noasokisoki nalo ka-
kagu. Ku da dogo nadaleona te
ragi mau, go ku da punusi navunu-
-38 siana kakana mau. Go ku da
peani navasaana aneana doko naj(a-
laumu doko mau; nalakena tea
waina nae e dipakilua e umai,
nimu ku da saralomau navasaana
39 aneana mau. Kuga veveusiusi na
vasaana midiriana maga, nalake-
na nimu ku midoa ki nia naga
ku peani namauriana ara waina
e du mau du; go nara eu pei
tea waina eu do noasokisoki nalo
40 kakagu ; go ku karai umai punusi
au, naga kuga veani namauriana.
41 A da dape nasamasamaana inelu
42 naatamole maga mau. Ma a atae
mu, naga ku da peani nadodomiana
paki Supe doko napalaumu mau.
43 Kinau a umai pae nagisa ni
Tamagu, go ku da piragi au mau :
tea pota sikai e pe umai pae
nagisana aneana, nae wanogoe ku
44 pe viragi a. Nimu ku mariatae
saralomau dapale sava, waina ku
do dufnamu dape nasamasamaana
kiamu, go nasamasamaana waina
e inelu Supe sikai maau umai ku
45 da laga asa mau ? Kuga da midoa
ki nia mau naga kinau aga wo pasa-
dipa mu paki Tamagu: sikai e
doko waina e do pasadipa mu,
Moses, waina nimu ku do leogoro
pavatu asa. Nalakena ku pe saia- 16
lomau navasaana ki Moses, ku pe
saralomau navasaana aginau ; na
lakena nae e midiri nalo kakagu. 47
Ma ku pe ta saralomau navasaana
midiriana aneana maga mau, ku
pe wo saralomau navasaana aginau
maga dapale sava ?
Matele 6.
Edaku ki naleo maga wanogoe 1
Yesu e duagoto pano paki taleva
kerua ni natasi ni Calilea, waina
e pei natasi ni Tiberia. Go taua 2
warua sikai ni naatamoli maga eu
dausi a, nalakena eu leopunusi
navaivaiana maga waina e mari ra
nalo ni tea sasana maga. Go Yesu 3
e sake paki tava pano, go e do na
tano tokora wanogoe sikoti tea
vasapiseikiana aneana maga. Go 4
navakalauana, nasaisaiana ki naka
ni Yudea, e pei maladigi. Nalakena 5
tea wanogoe, ragi waina Yesu e
sike namatana maga, po punusi
naga taua warua sikai ni naata
moli maga eu rumai punusi a, e
noa ki Filipo, e naga, Tuga vakotovi
bred maga esava, naga tea wanana
maga euga kanikani ? Ma e noa 6
tea wanogoe naga ega maridogo
e : nalakena nae e duinana atae
tea waina e naga ega mari a.
Filipo e pasadara e, e naga, Bred 7
maga ni denario ponotia dua e da
patakada mau, naga sara naata
euga tape tea kiki. Tea vasa- 8
piseikiana aneana maga sikai ka-
kada, Anderea, Simon Petero taina,
e noa ki nia, e naga, Natureai 9
kiki sikai e doko nea, waina e peani
bred ni barle elima, go naika dua ;
ma tea wanogoe eu magi tea lapa
waina eu doko pei nasava ? Yesu 10
e naga, Kuga mari naatamoli maga
euga to natano. Go nainenau lapa
e doko tokora wanogoe. Go naanoai
maga eu do natano, naveveana


kakada e alagoro pei manu lima.
11 Go Yesu e dape bred maga wanogoe ;
go ragi waina e dapasavasa dodo-
mataki sua, e turi dua tea maga
waina eu do natano; go dapala
nogoe e turi dua ra naika maga
12 pa pa eu karai. Go ragi waina eu
puka e noa ki tea vasapiseikiana
, aneana maga, e naga, Kuga viladaua
ki matele maga waina eu du pele,
naga te seara ega ta pei tea tape
13 puolikiana man. Nalakena tea wa-
nogoe eu pila daua ki da, po paka-
vuro nala rualima sikai tamate dua
ki matele maga ni bred ni barle
elima wanogoe, waina eu magi
tea maga waina eu ganikani dupele.
14 Nalakena tea wanogoe ragi waina
naatainoli maga wanogoe eu punusi
navaivaiana waina e man a, eu
naga, Tea waia e pei profeta lomau
waina ega wo nmai paki maramana.
15 Nalakena tea wanogoe ragi waina
Yesu e atae naga eu naga euga
nmai po puati pavakoto asa, naga
euga mari a ega vei nawota, e moro
inelu paki tava pano nae e sikina.
16 Go ragi waina e pei ragi mein, tea
vasapiseikiana aneana maga eu
17 siwo paki natasi pano ; go eu pagi
rarua sikai, po do porau duagoto
natasi paki Kapernaum pano. Go
e maligo sua, go Yesu e ko da nmai
18 punusi ra mau. Go natasi e do
parua nalakena nalagi wnrua waina
19 e sau. Go ragi waina eu palusi
sua e alagoro pei made dolu kite
pati, eu leopunusi Yesu e surata
natasi, po do umai paM maladigi
20 ki rarua ; go eu mataku. Ma e noa
ki da, e naga, E pei kinau; kuga
21 ta mataku mau. Nalakena tea
wanogoe eu masauna naga euga
viragi a paki rarua ; go inaraverave
rarua e paki navanua waina eu
naga euga vaki asa.
22 Matamai ki nia taua ni naatainoli
maga waina eu lawodu taleva kerua
ni natasi eu punusi naga rarua pota
sikai e da doko tokora wanogoe
mau, ma tea sikai maau, go naga
Yesu e da sikoti tea vasapiseikiana
aneana maga paki rarua mau, ma
naga tea vasapiseikiana aneana
maga eu sikida pano (ma rarua 23
seara eu pae Tiberia umai paki
maladigi ki tokora waina eu gani
bred asa ragi waina e dapasavasa
dodoinataki sua): nalakena tea 24
wanogoe ragi waina taua ni naata
inoli maga eu punusi naga Yesu e
da doko tokoro wanogoe mau, go
naga tea vasapiseikiana aneana
maga eu da doko asa mau, nara ma
eu pagi rarua maga, po umai paki
Kapernaum, eu do laga Yesu. Go 25
ragi waina eu papai a taleva kerua
ni natasi, eu noa ki nia, eU‘naga,
Kabbi, ku umai paki nea seve ragi ?
Yesu e pasdara ra po naga, Lomau, 26
lomau, a noa ki mu, naga Ku da
laga au mau nalakena ku punusi
navaivaiana maga, ma ku laga au
nalakena ku gani bred maga seara
kakada po puka asa. Kuga ta 27
posiwosi mau raki navinaga waina
e do sa puoli, ma kuga wosiwisi
raid navinaga waina e doko pa pa
paki namauriana waina e du mau
du, waina naatainoli Natuna ega
wo dua mu asa, nalakena nae
wanogoe Tamana, Supe, e pulusoki
a. Nalakena tea wanogoe eu noa 28
ki nia, eu naga, Auga mari nasava,
naga auga' wosiwosi ki nawosiana
maga ki Supe ? Yesu e pasadara po 29
noa ki da, e naga, Tea waia e pei na
wosiana ki Supe, naga kuga sara-
lomau tea waina nae e dipakilua e
umai. Nalakena tea wanogoe eu 30
noa ki nia, eu naga, Nigo ku do mari
nasava ega vei navaivaiana, naga
auga vunusi a po saralomau nava-
saana anigo % Ku do posiwosi ki
nasava ? Tamagami maga eu gani 31

e pei tea midiriana, naga E dua ra
navinaga waina e pae nakoroatelagi


32 umai naga euga kani a. Nalake-
na tea wanogoe Yesu e noa ki da,

33 umai. Nalakena navinaga ki Supe
e pei tea waina e do pae nakoro-
atelagi siwo umai, po do dua
34 maramana namauriana. Nalake-
na , tea wanogoe eu noa ki nia,
eu naga, Nawota, pa tua garni
35 navinaga wanogoe sara ragi. Yesu
e noa ki da, e naga, Kinau a pei
navinaga ni namauriana; tea
waina e do umai punusi au ega wo
da pitolo mau, go tea waina e do
saralomau au ega wo da madou
36 mau te ragi. Ma a noa ki sua mu,
naga ku po punusi au, go ku da
37 saralomau au mau. Tea mamau
waina Tamagu e dua asa ega wo
umai punusi au, go tea waina e do
umai punusi au aga wo da nadi
38 ki nia paki etaku mau. Nalakena
a pae nakoroatelagi siwo umai
naga aga ta mari namasauana
agmau mau, ma naga aga man
namasauana ki tea waina e dipaki
39 lua au umai. Go tea waia e pei
namasauana ki tea waina e dipa-
kilua au umai, naga tea mamau
waina e dua au asa aga wo ta dape-
puoli kite navatuna kakana mau,
ma aga wo sike a ega wo duleana
40 naaleatia edaku mau. Nalakena
tea waia e pei namasauana ki
Tamagu, naga sara naata waina
eu leopunusi Natuna, po saralomau
asa, euga veani namauriana waina
e du mau du ; go kinau aga wo sike
ra euga wo duleana naaleatia edaku
mau.
41 Nalakena tea wanogoe navara-
pule maga ni Yudea eu dauruuru
nalo kakana, nalakena e naga,
Kinau a pei navinaga waina a pae
nakoroatelagi siwo umai. Go eu 42
do naga, Tea waia e da pei Yesu
natu ni Yosef, waina nigida tu atae
tamana go pilana kite ? Ekasana e
noaragi waia, Apo pae nakoroatelagi
siwo umai ? Yesu e pasadara po 43
noa ki da, e naga, Kuga ta dauruuru
dumamu paki mu mau. Te naata, 44
Tamagu waina e dipakilua au umai
e pe ta puati a mau, epe ta m ari
atae umai punusi au mau; go kinau
aga wo sike a ega wo duleana
naaleatia edaku mau. E pei tea 45
midiriana profeta maga, e naga,
Go euga wo mamau puti pei tea
vasapiseikiana ki Supe. Sara
naata waina eu dogo ki Tamagu,
po ataedogo, eu do umai punusi
au. E da pei naga te naata e 46
punusi sua Tamagu mau, ma tea
waina e inelu Supe umai, nae
e punusi sua Tamagu. Lomau, 47
lomau, a noa ki mu, naga Tea
waina e saralomau e peani namau-
riana waina edu mau du. Kinau 48
a pei navinaga ni namauriana.
Tamamu maga eu gani manna 49
masopalo, go eu mate. Tea waia e5O
pei navinaga waina e do pae nakoro-
atelagi siwo umai, naga naatainoli
euga kani a seara kakana, po da

naga mauri waina e pae nakoroate-
lagi siwo umai: te naata epe kani
navinaga waia seara kakana, e
pe wo mauri pa pa e pe tu mau du :
ioro go navinaga waina aga wo
pitua Id nia e pei napokasigu magi
namauriana ni maramana.

pule maga ni Yudea eu duinada

ki da, e naga, Lomau, lomau, a
noa ki mu, naga Ku pe ta gani

peani namauriana doko napalaumu

55 Nalakena napokasigu e pei navi-
naga kaniana lomau, go nadagu
56 e pei noai munuana lomau. Tea
waina e do gani napokasigu po do
munu nadagu e doko au doko,
57 go kinau a doko asa doko. Dapala
waina Tamagu waina e do mauri
e dipakilua au umai, go kinau
a do mauri nalakena Tamagu,
dapala nogoe tea waina e do gani
au, nae ma ega wo mauri nalakena
58 kinau. Tea waia e pei navinaga
waina e pae nakoroatelagi siwo
umai: eda dapala waina tamamu
maga eu g'anikani, po mate: tea
waina e do gani navinaga waia ega
wo mauri pa pa ega tu mau du.
59 E noa tea maga wanogoe ekopu
ni nasufna ni nasaisaiana ragi
waina e do pasapiseiki Kaper-
naum.

piseikiana aneana maga tea lapa
kakada ragi waina eu dogo e, eu
naga, Navasaana wanogoe e kasua ;
61 sei e mariatae dogo e ? Ma Yesu,
waina e dumana atae naga tea
vasapiseikiana aneana maga eu
dauruuru nalo ni tea wanogoe, e
noa ki da, e naga, Tea wanogoe e
mari mu ku dapilagona kite ?
62 Mase ku pe leopunusi naatainoli
Natuna e pe to sake paki tokora
63 waina e doko asa sala vea ? Naatana
e pei tea waina e pakamauri;
napokasi e da silae kiki ki nia
mau: navasaana maga waina
kinau a po noa ki mu ara eu pei
naatana, go eu pei namauriana.
64 Ma te seara kakamu eu doko
waina eu da saralomau mau. Nala-
kena Yesu e atae pae naatulakeana
pa pa sei maga eu doko waina eu
da saralomau mau, go sei e doko
waina ega wo pitua ki nia. Go e 65
naga, Nalakena tea wanogoe a noa
ki sua mu, naga te naata sikai, e pe
ta pei tea vituakiana paid nia pae
Tamagu mau, e pe ta mariatae
umai punusi au mau.
Pae ragi wanogoe tea vasapisei- 66
kiana aneana maga tea lapa kakada
eu liliu pano, po ta moro surata
sikoti a mau. Nalakena tea wano- 67
goe Yesu e noa ki tea rualima sikai
tamate dua, e naga, Nimu ma ku
masauna naga kuga vano kite ?
Simon Petero e pasadara e, e naga, 68
Nawota, auga va punusi sei ? ku
peani navasaana maga ni namau-
riana waina e du mau du. Go 69
kinami au saralomau sua, go au
atae sua naga nigo ku pei Tea Tapu
Id Supe. Yesu e pasadara ra, 70
e naga, Kinau a da matadoa mu
tea rualima sikai tamate dua, go
sikai kakamu e pei diabolo sikai
kite ? Ma e noa Yuda natu ni 71
Simon Iskariote, nalakena nae e
pei tea waina ega wo pitua ki nia,
e pei sikai ni tea rualima sikai
tamate dua.
Matele 7
Go edaku ki tea maga wanogoe, 1
Yesu e surata Calilea: nalakena
e da masauna mau naga ega surata
Yudea, nalakena navarapule maga
ni Yudea eu do laga naga euga
maripunue a. Go nasaisaiana ki 2
naka ni Yudea, nasaisaiana ni na
mari-tapaupau-ana e pei maladigi.
Nalakena tea wanogoe taina maga 3
eu noa ki nia, eu naga, Pa ineludua
ki tokora waia pano, go pa vaki
Yudea pano, naga tea vasapisei-
kiana anigo maga ma euga leo
punusi nawosiana anigo maga
waina ku do mari ra. Nalakena 4
te naata sikai e da mari panako
te navatuna mau, go nae e dumana


laga naga ega toko lina. Ku pe
to mari naleo maga waina, pa
tufnama pisei ki maramana ako.
5 Nalakena taina maga ma eu da
6 saralomau asa mau. Nalakena tea
wanogoe Yesu e noa ki da e naga,
Ragi aginau e ko da umai mau;
ma ragi animu e doko pia doko
7 sara ragi. Maramana eda mariatae
pilosi mu mau; ma edo pilosi au,
nalakena kinau a do noasokisoki
nalo kakana naga nawosiana aneana
8 maga eu sa. Nimu kuga sake paki
nasaisaiana pano ; kinau aga ko
da sake paki nasaisaiana waia pano
mau ; nalakena ragi aginau e ko
9da umai sua mau. Go ragi waina
e noa ki sua ra tea maga wanogoe,
e ko doko Calilea doko.
10 Ma ragi waina taina maga eu
sake sua paki nasaisaiana pano,
ragi wanogoe nae ma e sake pano,
e da pae lina mau, ma e dapala
11 waina e pano panako pano. Na
lakena tea wanogoe navarapule
maga ni Yudea eu laga asa nasaisai-
-12 ana, po naga, Nae e doko esava ?
Go natauruuruana warua e doko
maleoputo ni taua maga ni naata
moli maga nalo kakana: te seara
eu do naga, E pei naatamoli wia;
ma tea pota seara eu do naga,
Ee, ma e do piragi-sasapo ki taua
13 ni naatamoli maga. Ma te naata
sikai e da pasa lina nalo kakana mau
nalakena namatakuana paki na-
varapule maga ni Yudea.
14 Ma ragi waina epo pei maleoputo
ni nasaisaiana Yesu e sake paki
nasurna tapu pano, po pasapiseiki.
15 Nalakena tea wanogoe navarapule
maga ni Yudea eu maga, po
naga, Naatamoli waia e atae
namidiriana dapale sava, waina e
da pei tea vasapiseikiana mau ?
16 Nalakena tea wanogoe Yesu e
pasadara ra, po naga, Navasa-
piseikiana aginau e da pei tea
aginau mau, ma e pei tea ki tea
waina e dipakilua au umai. Te 17
naata sikai e pe masauna naga
ega mari namasauana aneana, e
pe wo atae nalo ni navasapiseikiana,
e pe vei tea ki Supe, kite kinau a
pe tumagu pasa. Tea waina elB
duniana pasa e laga nasamasamaana
aneana: ma tea waina e laga
nasamasamaana ki tea waina e
dipakilua e umai, nae e pei lomau,
go te namarinaleotageleana e da
doko asa mau. Moses e da dua 19
mu nawotaeana kite ? go sikai
kakamu e da do mari nawotaeana
mau ? Ekasana ku laga naga kuga
maripunue au ? Taua ni naata 20
moli maga eu pasadara, eu naga,
Ku peani dimon sikai: sei e laga
naga ega maripunue ko ? Yesu e2l
pasadara po noa ki d.a, e naga,
A mari nawosiana sikai, go ku maga
puti. Nalakena tea waia Moses e dua 22
mu natovadaviviana (e da pei na
lakena e pei tea ni Moses mau, ma e
pei tea ni tamamu maga) ; go ku
dovadavivi naatamoli sikai sabbath.
Naatamoli sikai e pe tape natova- 23
daviviana sabbath,naga nawotaeana
ki Moses ega ta pei tea tapiriana
mau; ku kokona ki nau nalakena
a mari naatamoli sikai e pia usuraki
sabbath kite ? Kuga ta pasa- 24
potae pae tea vunusiana mau, ma
kuga vasapotae navasapotaeana
leana.
Nalakena tea wanogoe tea ni 25
Yerusalem maga seara kakada eu
naga, Tea waia e da pei tea waina
eu laga naga euga maripunue a
kite ? go kuga leo, e pasa lina, go 26
eu da noa ki nia te navatuna mau.
Tea maraki maga eu atae lomau
naga nae e pei Kristo kite ? Ma tu 27
atae naatamoli waia tokora waina
e pae asa umai; ma ragi waina
Kristo ega wo umai, te naata sikai
ega wo da atae tokora waina e pae
asa umai. Nalakena tea wanogoe 28
Yesu e pioso roara ni nasurna


tapu, ragi waina e do pasapiseiki,
po naga, Ku atae au, go ku atae
tokora waina a pae asa umai ;
go a da dufhagu umai mau, ma
tea waina e dipakilua au umai e pei
lomau, waina nimu ku da atae a
i mau. Ma kinau a atae a, nalakena
a fnelu asa umai, go nae e dipa-
-1 kilua au umai. Nalakena tea wa-
nogoe eu laga naga euga vuasoki
a: go te naata sikai e da nadi ki
namelearuna asa mau, nalakena
aura aneana e ko da umai mau.
[ Ma taua ni naatamoli maga tea
lapa kakada eu saralomau asa;
go eu naga, Ragi waina Kristo
ega wo umai, ega wo mari navaivai-
ana lapa liu tea maga waina naata
2 moli waia e mari ra kite ? Farisi
maga eu dogo taua ni naatamoli
maga eu do dauruuru tea maga
wanogoe nalo kakana ; go tea viri
warua maga go Farisi maga eu
dipakilua tasiga maga naga euga
3 vuasoki a. Nalakena tea wanogoe
Yesu e naga, Ragi kiki aga ko
sikoti mu doko, go aga wo pano
punusi tea waina e dipakilua au
4 umai. Kuga wo laga au, go kuga
wo da papai au mau: go tokora
waina kinau aga toko asa, nimu
ku da mariatae umai paki asa mau.
® Nalakena tea wanogoe navarapule
maga ni Yudea eu dumada noa
ki da, eu naga, Naatamoli waia e
naga ega vaki esava, naga nigida
tuga wo da papai a mau ? e naga
ega va punusi tea maga waina eu
pei daperavera sari naka ni Hellas,
po pasapisei ki naka ni Hellas kite ?
Navasaana wanogoe waina e noa
e e pei nasava, e naga, Kuga wo
laga au, go kuga wo da papai au
mau: go tokoro waina kinau aga
toko asa, nimu ku da mariatae
Umai paki asa mau %
■* Go naaleatia edaku, tea warua
ni nasaisaiana wanogoe, Yesu e
lawodu po pioso, e naga, Te naata
sakai e pe madou, ega umai punusi
au po munu. Tea waina e sara- 38
lomau au, noai sara maga ni noai
mauri euga wo sara dave napa-
launa pano, ega tapala waina
navasaana midiriana e noa e.
Ma e noa tea wanogoe nalo ni 39
Naatana, waina tea maga waina
eu saralomau asa euga wo dape
a : nalakena Naatana e ko da doko
mau; nalakena Yesu eko da pei
tea samasamaniana mau. Nalakena 40
tea wanogoe taua ni naatamoli maga
seara kakada, ragi waina eu dogo
navasaana maga wanogoe, eu naga,
Tea waia e pei profeta waina lomau.
Tea pota seara eu naga, Tea waia 41
e pei Kristo. Ma te seara eu naga,
Ee, nalakena Kristo e pae Calilea
umai kite ? Navasaana midiriana 42
e da noa naga Kristo e pei tea ni
nawora ni David, po pae Bethlehem
umai, natokoana kiki waina David
e doko asa kite % Nalakena tea 43
wanogoe natapotaeana sikai e paki
lina maleoputo ni taua ni naatamoli
maga nalakena nae. Go te seara 44
kakada eu masauna naga euga
vuasoki a; ma te naata sikai
e da nadi ki namelearuna maga
asa mau.
Nalakena tea wanogoe tasiga 45
maga wanogoe eu rumai punusi tea
viri warua maga go Farisi maga ;
go nara eu noa ki da, eu naga,
Ekasana ku da piragi a umai mau ?
Tasiga maga wanogoe eu pasadara, 46
eu naga, Naatamoli e da pasa
dapalana te ragi mau. Nalakena tea 47
wanogoe Farisi maga eu pasadara, eu
naga, Nimu ma ku pei tea viragisa-
sapokiana kite ? Tea maraki maga 48
sikai kakada e saralomau asa kite ?
kite Farisi maga sikai kakada ? Ma 49
taua waia ni naatamoli maga waina
eu da atae nawotaeana mau eu pei
tea vasasakiana. Nikodemo e noa 50
ki da (nae waina e umai punusi a
sala vea, e pei sikai kakada), e naga,


51 Nawotaeana anigida, e pe ta pea
dogo ki naatamoli sikai, go e pe ta
atae tea waina e do mari a mau, e
52 pe vasapotae a kite ? Eu pasadara
po noa ki nia, eu naga, Nigo ma
ku pci tea ni Calilea kite ? Pa
midoakiusiusi po punusi naga te
profeta sikai e da pakilina nielu
Calilea mau.
53 Go sara naatamoli eu sikasikai
paki nasufna adeada pano; ma
Yesu e paki tava ni Oliva pano.
Matele 8.
1 Go e moro umai ragi ni nama-
kotokotoana paki roara ni nasufna
tapu, go narei mamau eu rumai
2 punusi a ; go e dasake, po pasa-
-3 pisei ki da. Go tea midiri maga
go Farisi maga eu piragi nagoroi
sikai umai waina e pei tea vuasoki-
ana nalakena namaripeleana; go
eu lawo ki nia inaleoputo, po noa
iki nia, eu naga, Tea vasapiseiki,
nagoroi waia e pei tea vuasokiana
ragi waina e maripele, ragi kakana.
SGo Moses e dipa ki garni na
wotaeana naga auga nadi tea
tapala nogoe maga ki vatu: na
lakena tea wanogoe nigo ku noa
6 nasava nalo kakana ? Go eu noa
tea wanogoe, eu maridogo e, naga
euga veani tea waina euga vasadipa
e asa. Ma Yesu e kolo pakitano,
po midiri liatano ki nakinina.
7 Ma ragi waina eu do pusuusu paki
nia, e darasake po noa ki da, e
naga, Tea waina e dika namari-
naleosaana inaleoputo kakamu ega
8 vea nadi a ki vatu sikai. Go e
mqro kolo pakitano, po midiri
9 natano ki nakinina. Go ragi waina

Matele 10.
Lomau, lomau, a noa ki mu, 1
naga Tea waina e da sili pae
namata paki loga ni shiip mau,
ma e pagi pae tokora pota sikai,
nae e pei tea vanako go tea tape
pavakoto. Ma tea waina e sili 2
paki asa pae namata, e pei tea leo
parati ki shiip. Go tea waina 3
e doko raki namata e maneana
polagati; go shiip eu dogo na
daleona: go e soso shiip aneana
pae nagisada, po piragi ra paki
etaku pano. Eagi waina e 4
dipa ki sua puti tea aneana maga
paki etaku, e surata pea ki da,
go shiip eu dausi a: nalakena
eu atae nadaleona. Go euga wo 5
da dausi tea pota sikai mau, ma
euga wo sava dua ki nia pano ;
nalakena eu da atae nadaleo ni
tea pota maga mau. Naluluakia 6
wanogoe Yesu e noa ki da asa :


ma nara eu da midoakiatae tea
maga waina e pasa ki da ara
mau.
7 Nalakena tea wanogoe Yesu e
■ moro noa ki da, e naga, Lomau, lo-
mau, a noa ki mu, naga Kinau a pei
8 namata ki shiip. Tea maga mamau
puti waina eu rumai pea ki nau
eu pei tea vanako maga go tea
tape pavakoto maga : ma shiip
•9 eu da dogo ra mau. Kinau a pei
namata; te naata e pe vae au
paki loga, e pe wo pei tea mauti
pauriana go e pe wo paki loga
go e pe wo paki etaku, go e pe
10 wo papai nakaniana. Te vanako
e umai naga ega vanako, go naga
ega maripunue, go naga ega man
puoli: kinau a umai naga euga
veani namauriana, go naga euga
11 veani parua ki nia. Kinau a pei
tea leo parati ki wia ni shiip: tea
leo parati ki wia ni shiip e magi
shiip doropusi namauriana aneana
12 e madoko. Tea waina e pei tea
vasadapuiana, go e da pei tea leo
parati ki shiip mau, waina shiip eu
da pei tea aneana mau, e leopunusi
wulf e umai, go e doropusi shiip
eu madoko, po sava pano, go wulf
e katilua ra po daperavera ki da:
13 E sava pano nalakena e pei tea
vasadapuiana sikai, po da midoa
14 ki parati ki shiip mau. Kinau a
pei tea leo parati ki wia ni shiip ;
go a atae tea aginau maga, go tea
15 aginau maga eu atae au, dapala
waina Tamagu e atae au, go kinau
a atae Tamagu; go a magi shiip
doropusi namauriana aginau e ma-
le doko. Go a peani shiip pota, waina
eu da pei tea ni loga waia mau:
nara ma e one au one naga aga
viragi ra, go euga wo dogo nada-
leogu, go euga wo pei tea mariana
euga vei navata sikai maau, tea
leo parati ki sikai maau ni shiip.
17 Nalakena tea wanogoe Tamagu e
dodomi au, nalakena a doropusi
NGUNA-TONGOAN N.T.
namauriana aginau, naga aga moro
dape a. Te naata sikai eda dapelua 18
e ki agu mau, ma a dumagu doropusi
a e madoko. A peani naveina-
wotaana naga aga toropusi a
ega madoko, go a peani naveina-
wotaana naga aga moro dape a.
Natipakiana wanogoe a dape a ki
Tamagu.
Natapotaeana sikai e moro paki 19
lina maleoputo ni navarapule maga
ni Yudea nalakena navasaana maga
wanogoe. Go tea lapa kakada eu 20
naga, E peani dimon sikai, po
daratara; ekasana ku dogo e ?
Tea pota seara eu naga, Tea maga 21
wanogoe eu da pei nanoaana maga
ki tea waina dimon sikai e doko
asa mau. Dimon sikai e mariatae
polagati namata maga ni tea kesa
maga kite.
Go nasaisaiana ni naveakoto- 22
kotomauana e doko Yerusalem:
e pei ragi ni namaladiana ; go Yesu 23
e do surata roara ni nasuma tapu,
ekopu ni natara-taupa Id Solomon.
Nalakena tea wanogoe navarapule 24
maga ni Yudea eu rumai daliviri-
goro e, po noa ki nia, eu naga,
ku mari garni au midoakiputuaki
pa pa paki seve ragi ? Nigo ku
pe vei Kristo, pa noa ki garni asa
lina. Yesu e pasadara ra, e naga, 25
A noa ki sua mu asa, go ku da sara-
lomau mau : nawosiana maga waina
kinau a do mari ra pae nagisa ni
Tamagu, nara eu do noasokisoki
nalo kakagu. Ma nimu ku da 26
saralomau mau, nalakena ku da
pei shiip aginau seara kakada mau.
Shiip aginau eu dogo nadajeogu, 27
go kinau a atae ra, go eu dausi
au : go kinau a dua ra namau- 28
riana waina edu mau du; go euga
wo da mate puoli mau pa pa ega
tu mau du, go te naata sikai ega wo
da pualua ra fheludua ki namele-
arugu mau. Tamagu, waina e dua 29
au ara, e parua liu tea maga mamau


puti; go te naata sikai e da
mariatae pualua ra meludua ki
30 nainelearu ni Tamagu mau. Kinau
go Tamagu aro pei tea sikai maau.
31 Navarapule maga ni Yudea eu moro
dape dakati vatu maga naga euga
32 nadi a ara. Yesu e pasadara ra,
e naga, A pisei ki mu nawosiana
wia lapa waina eu inelu Tamagu
umai; ku nadi au ki vatu nalakena
nawosiana maga wanogoe seve tea
33 kakada ? Navarapule maga ni
Yudea eu pasadara e, eu naga, Au
da nadi ko ki vatu nalakena
nawosiana wia sikai mau, ma
au nadi ho nalakena navasasakiana ;
go nalakena nigo, waina ku pei
naatamoli sikai, ku dumaina mari
34 ko ku pei Supe. Yesu e pasadara
ra, e naga, E da pei tea midiriana
nawotaeana animu, naga Kinau
a naga, Ku pei supe maga, kite ?
35 E pe noa naga nara waina navasaana
ki Supe e umai paki da eu pei
supe maga (go navasaana midiriana
e da mariatae pei tea veresiana
36 mau), nimu ku noa nalo ni tea
waina Tamana e dapugoro e po
dipakilua e umai paki maramana,
Ku pasasaki; nalakena a naga, A
37 pei Supe Natuna, kite ? A pe ta
mari nawosiana maga ki Tamagu
mau, kuga ta saralomau navasaana
38 aginau mau. Ma ape mari ra,
go ku pe ta saralomau navasaana
aginau mau, kuga saralomau na
wosiana maga: naga kuga atae
po midoakiatae naga Tamagu e
doko au, go kinau a doko Tamagu.
39 Eu moro laga naga euga vuasoki
a: go e dave padua ki naineleaduda
pano.
40 Go e moro paki taleva kerua ni
Yordan pano paki tokora waina
Yoane e pea do papetizo asa ; go
e doko 'tokora wanogoe doko.
41 Go tea lapa eu rumai punusi a;
go eu naga, Yoane e da mari te
navaivaiana sikai mau: ma naleo
maga mamau puti waina Yoane e
noa ra nalo ni naatamoli waia eu
pei lomau. Go tea lapa eu sara-
lomau asa tokora wanogoe.
Matele 11.
Go naatamoli sikai e sasana, 1
Lazaro ni Betliania, ni natokoana
kiki ki Maria go ki taina Martha.
Go e pei Maria waina e puvurai 2,
ki Nawota ki naroro 1010, po kasi
naihelena maga ki naloluna, waina
gorena Lazaro e sasana. Nalakena 3
tea wanogoe gorena maga ero
dipakilua pa punusi a, po naga,
Nawota, pa leo, tea waina ku
dodomi a e sasana. Ma ragi waina 4
Yesu e dogo e, e naga, Nasasanaana
waia e da paki namateana mau,
ma e pakilina nalakena nasama-
samaana ki Supe, naga Supe natuna
ega vei tea samasamaniana asa.
Go Yesu e dodomi Martha, go taina, 5
go Lazaro. Nalakena tea wanogoe 6
ragi waina e dogo naga e sasaana,
ragi wanogoe e doko tokora waina
e doko asa naaleatia dua. Ma 7
edaku ki tea wanogoe e noa ki tea

moro paki Yudea pano. Tea vasa- 8
piseikiana maga eu noa ki nia,
eu naga, Rabbi, ragi waia navara-
pule maga ni Yudea eu do laga
naga euga nadi ko ki vatu ; go ku
naga pa moro paki tokoro wanogoe
kite ? Yesu e pasadara, e naga, 0
Aura maga ni naaleatia sikai eu
da pei rualima sikai damate dua
kite ? Te naata sikai e pe surata
aleati, e pe da dapilagona mau,
nalakena e punusi namarama ni
maramana waia. Ma te naata 10

doko asa mau. E noa tea maga 11
wanogoe : go edaku ki tea wanogoe
e noa ki da, e naga, Tagida ri
Lazaro e mataru; ma aga vano

tea wanogoe tea vasapiseikiana

pano, naga ega tagi tokora wanogoe.

nea, goregu e pe ta mate mau.

noa ki nia, eu naga, Nawota, pa

wanogoe, e noa ki da, e naga,

na mamau ega ta matepuoli mau.
Ma e da dufuana noa tea wanogoe 51
mau : ma e pei tea viri warua liu
natau wanogoe, po peanoasai naga
ega magi nalauna wanogoe mate;
go naga ega ta magi nalauna 52
wanogoe sikina mate mau, ma naga
ega viragi saisai ki Supe natuna
maga waina eu pei daperavera euga
vei tea sikai maau. Nalakena tea 53
wanogoe eu pae naaleatia wanogoe
pa pa seke naga euga maripunue a.

moro surata lina maleoputo ni

pano paki navanua waina e pei
fnaladigi ki inasopalo, paki natoko-
ana sikai waina e pei tea sosoana ki
Efraim ; go e doko tokora wanogoe
doko sikoti tea vasapiseikiana maga.

e pei fnaladigi: go tea lapa eu pae
navanua sake paki Yerusalem pano
pea ki navakalauana, naga euga
tuinada mari ra euga tautau.

tapu, eu naga, Nimu ku midoa ki
nasava 1 Naga ega wo da umai
paki nasaisaiana mau kite ? Go 57

euga vuasoki a.

kiana aneana maga, waina e naga

hoa tea wanogoe, ma e da noa e nala-

po dapelua tea maga waina eu pei

ass natuna sikai. Tea vasapiseiki- 16

naatamoli maga eu pa sua e, na

a pano.
Go Tea maga waina eu sake pano 20
naga euga lotu nasaisaiana wanogoe
seara kakada eu pei tea ni Hellas :
nalakena tea wanogoe nara eu 21
rumai punusi Filipo, waina e pei tea
ni Bethsaida ni Calilea, po pavarani
a, eu naga, Nawota, au masauna
naga auga vunusi Yesu. Filipo e 22
umai po noa ki Anderea asa: Anderea
e umai, go Filipo, go ero noa ki Yesu
asa. Go Yesu e pasadara ra, e naga, 23
Aura e po umai waina Naatamoli
Natuna ega vei tea samasamaniana
asa. Lomau, lomau, a noa ki mu, 24
naga Napati ni whit sikai e pe ta


dowo paki natano po ta mate mau,
e pe sikina doko ; ma e pe mate, e
25 pe tan parua ki nawaana. Tea
waina e dodomi namauriana aneana
e dapepuoli ki nia ; go tea waina e
pilosi namauriana aneana maramana
waia, ega wo pavaigoro e pa pa paki
26 namauriana waina e du mau du. Te
naata sikai e pe maginau suasua, ega
rausi au; go tokora waina kinau
a doko asa, tokora wanogoe tea
suasua aginau ma ega wo doko asa :
te naata sikai e pe maginau suasua,
Tamagu e pe wo dodomadagani a.
27 Ragi waia naatagu e dogo kite sa;
go aga noa nasava ? Mama, pa
mauti au ki aura waia. Ma na
lakena tea waia a umai paki aura
28 waia. Mama, pa samasamani nagi-
sama. Nalakena tea wanogoe na
daleo sikai e pae nakoroatelagi umai,
e naga, A samasamani sua e, go aga
29 wo moro samasamani a. Nalakena

eu noa naga tovae e kati: tea pota
seara eu naga, Agelo sikai e po pasa
30 ki nia. Yesu e pasadara po naga,
Nadaleo waia e da umai nalakena
kinau mau, ma e umai nalakena
31 nimu. Ragi waia e pei ragi ni na
vasapotaeana ni maramana waia:
ragi waia tea maraki ni maramana
waia ega wo pei tea nadikiana paki
32 etaku. Go kinau a pe vei tea
sikeana pakilagi meludua ki natano,

mau puti eu pe wo umai punusi au.
33 Ma e noa tea wanogoe, e paivai ki
namateana waina ega wo mate asa.
34 Nalakena tea wanogoe taua ni na
atamoli maga eu pasadara e, eu naga,

naga Kristo e doko pa pa ega tu
mau du : go ekasana nigo ku noa,
naga E one naatamoli Natuna one
naga ega vei tea sikeana pakilagi ?
naatamoli Natuna wanogoe e pei
35 sei ? Nalakena tea wanogoe Yesu
e noa ki da, e naga, Ragi kiki nama-
rama e ko doko inaleoputo kakamu.
Kuga surata ragi waina ku peani
namarama, naga namaligo ega ta pa
parati ki mu mau : go tea waina e
surata namaligo e da atae tokora
waina e paki asa pano mau. Ragi 36
waina ku peani namarama, kuga
saralomau namarama, naga kuga vei
namarama natuna maga.
Yesu e pasa tea maga wanogoe,
go e pano po dumana dasuru ki nia
paki da. E mari sua navaivaiana 37
lapa sa naraeda, ma eu da saralomau
asa mau : naga navasaana ki profeta 38
Isaiah ega lolomana, waina e noa e,
e naga,
Nawota, feel e saralomau narogo-
rogoana aginami ?
Go naru ni Yehovah e pei tea
mariana e doko lina ki sei ?
Nalakena tea wanogoe eu da mari 39
atae saralomau mau, . nalakena
Isaiah e moro noa, naga
E mari namatada eu kesa, go e 10
mari napopoda e kasua ;
Naga euga ta leosai ki namatada '
maga mau, po da midoakiatae
ki napopoda mau,
Po da madadoa mau.
Go naga aga ta maripauri ra mau. .
Isaiah e noa tea maga wanogoe, 41
nalakena e punusi nasamasamaana
aneana; go e pasa nalo kakana.
Ma tea maraki maga ma tea lapa 42
kakada eu saralomau asa; ma na
lakena Earisi maga eu da noasai a,
mau, naga euga ta pei tea mariana
euga toko etaku ni nasurna ni nasai-
saiana mau ; nalakena eu dodomi 43
nasamasamaana ki naatamoli maga
parua liu nasamasamaana ki Supe.
Go "Yesu e pioso po naga, Tea 44
waina e saralomau au, e da saralo-
mau au mau, ma e saralomau tea
waina e dipakilua au umai. Go tea 45
waina e leopunusi au, e leopunusi
tea waina e dipakilua au umai.
Kinau namarama sikai a umai paki 46


maramana, naga sara naata waina
eu saralomau au euga ta doko na
47 maligo mau. Go te naata sikai e
pe rogo nanoaana agmau maga, po
da pavaigoro ra mau, kinau a pe
ta pasapotae a mau: nalakena ada
umai naga aga vasapotae maramana
mau, ma a umai naga aga mauti
48 pauri maramana. Tea waina e dipa-
doa au po da dape nanoaana aginau
maga mau, e peani tea waina e do
pasapotae a: navasaana waina a
pasa sua e, tea wanogoe ega wo
pasapotae a naaleatia edaku mau.
49 Nalakena kinau a da dumagu pasa
mau ; ma Tamagu waina e dipaki-
lua au, nae e dua au natipakiana
sikai, tea waina aga noa e, go tea
50 waina aga vasa asa. Go a atae naga
natipakiana aneana e pei namauri-
ana waina edu mau du. Nalakena
tea wanogoe tea maga waina kinau
a do pasa ara, a do pasa ara dapala
waina Tamagu e noa ki nau ara.
Matele 13.
-1 Go pea ki nasaisaiana ni navaka-
lauana, Yesu e atae naga aura
aneana e po umai waina ega melu
dua ki maramana waia asa, po pa
punusi Tamana, e dodomi tea ane-
ana maga waina eu doko maramana,
e dodomi ra pa pa paki namata
2 pagona edaku mau. Go ragi waina
eu do kereone ganikani nakaniana ni
ragi melu, diabolo e nadi ki sua paki
napopo ni Yuda Iskariote, nalu ni
3 Simon, naga ega vitua ki nia, Yesu,
waina e ataenaga Tamana e dua suae
naleo maga mamau puti paki namele-
arunamaga, gonagaefneluSupedave
umai, go naga ega vano punusi Supe,
4 e duleana padua ki nakaniana, po
doropusi sugoro aneana maga eu
madoko ; go e dape tauel sikai, po
5 dumana dasoki a asa. E edaku da
ki noai paki tea vavano, po atulake
naga ega same namele ni tea vasa-
piseikiana maga, go naga ega kasi
ra ki tauel waina e pei tea tasokiana
asa. Nalakena tea wanogoe e umai 6
punusi Simon Petero. Nae e noa ki
nia, e naga, Nawota, nigo ku naga
pa same namelegu maga kite ?

naga, Tea waina kinau a mari a, nigo
ku da atae a mau ragi waia ; ma pa
wo midoakiatae a edaku ki tea
waia. Petero e noa ki nia, e naga, 8
Pa wo da same namelegu maga mau
pa pa ega tu mau du. Yesu e pasa-
dara e, e naga, A pe ta same ko
mau, ku pe ta peani te matele sikai
sikoti au mau. Simon Petero e noa 9
ki nia, e naga, Nawota, namelegu
maga eroga ta sikida mau, ma
namelearugu maga go napaugu euga
mamau. Yesu e noa ki nia, e naga, 10
Tea waina e loloso sua e pe sarue
namelena maga sikida, e pe tautau
usuraki: go nimu ku dautau, ma ku
da mamau puti dautau mau. Na 11
lakena e atae tea waina e naga ega
vitua ki nia; nalakena tea wanogoe e
naga, Ku da mamau puti dautau mau.
Go ragi waina e sarue sua name- 12
leda maga, po dape sugoro aneana
maga, po moro kereone, e noa ki da,
e naga, Ku atae tea waina a po mani-
mu mari a kite ? Nimu ku soso au, 13
ki Tea Vasapiseiki, go ki Nawota :
go ku noa pia ; nalakena a pei tea
wanogoe. Ma kinau, Nawota go Tea 14
Vasapiseiki, a pe same namelemu
maga, e pe one mu one naga nimu
ma kuga tumamu manimu sarue
namelemu maga. Nalakena a po 15
dua munaviseikiana sikai, naga nimu
makuga mari ega tapala waina kinau
apo manimu mari a. Lomau, lomau, 16
a noa ki mu, naga Tea suasua sikai

go tea tipakiluaana sikai e da
parua liu tea waina e dipakilua e
mau. Ku pe atae tea maga wano- 17
goe, go ku pe mari ra, ku pe maropa.

mau ; kinau a atae tea maga waina
a matadoa ra : ma naga navasaana

naga, Tea waina e gani navinaga
aginau e sike nafnago iii namelena

wanogoe Yesu e noa ki nia, e naga,

ki nia, nalakenaYuda e dape nala ni
nwne, naga Yesu e noa ki nia, naga

naga ega tua tea tika maga te nava-

waia naatamoli Natuna e pei tea
samasamaniana, go Supe e pei tea
samasamaniana asa ; go Supe ega 32
wo samasamani a ega sikoti a, go
ega wo samasamani a inaravrave.

doko. Kuga wo laga au : go dapala

mau: kuga saralomau Supe, go


2 kuga saralomau au. Nasuma ki

4 asa. Go tokora waina kinau a naga

ku naga, Pa visei ki

pae nagisagu, tea wanogoe aga wo

tatago te navatuna pae nagisagu,

dodomi au, ku pe wo dogo parati
ki natipakiana aginau maga. Go 16
kinau aga wo pavarani Tamagu,
go ega wo dua mu Tea Yasa-
pakavakale pota sikai, naga ega

du, Naatana ni nalomauana: 17
waina maramana e da mariatae

punusi a mau, go e da atae a mau :
nimu ku atae a ; nalakena e doko
sikoti mu doko, go ega wo doko
napalau mu. Aga wo da doropusi 18
mu naga kuga vei namatapisu maga
mau : aga umai punusi mu. Ragi 19
kiki e ko doko, go maramana ega
wo da moro leopunusi au mau ; ma

lakena kinau a mauri doko, nimu

wanogoe nimu kuga wo atae naga
kinau a doko Tamagu, go nimu ku
doko au, go kinau a doko mu. Tea 21
waina e peani natipakiana aginau
maga, po do dogo parati ki da, nae e
pei tea waina e dodomi au : go tea
waina e dodomi au ega wo pei tea
dodomiana pae Tamagu, go kinau
aga wo dodomi a, po dumagu pisei
ki nia au. Yuda (e da pei Iskariote 22
mau) e noa ki nia, e naga, Nawota,

mama pisei ki garni ako, go pa wo
da dumama pisei ki maramana ako
mau ? Yesu e pasadara po noa ki 23
nia, e naga, Te naata sikai e pe
dodomi au, e pe wo dogo parati ki
navasaana aginau ; go Tamagu epe
wo dodomi a, go aro pe wo umai
punusi a, po mari nasumatokoana
aginami e pe wo sikoti a. Tea waina 24
e da dodomi au mau e da dogo
parati ki navasaana aginau maga


mau; go navasaana waina ku dogo
e e da pei tea aginau mau, ma e pei
tea ki Tamagu waina e dipakilua au
umai.

ragi waina a doko sikoti mu doko.
26 Ma Tea Yasapakavakale, Naatana
Tapu, waina Tamagu ega wo dipa-
kilua e umai pae nagisagu, nae ega
wo pasapisei ki mu naleo maga
mamau puti, po mari mu kuga wo
moro midoa ki naleo maga mamau
puti waina a noa ki sua mu ara.
27 Natamateana a manimu ligira ki
nia ; natamateana aginau a dua mu
asa: kinau ada dua mu dapala
waina maramana e pitua mau.

28 mau, go ega ta mataku mau. Ku
dogo naga kinau a noa ki mu, naga
Aga vano, go aga umai punusi mu.
Ku ’ pe dodomi au, ku pe laelaea,
nalakena aga vano punusi Tamagu :
nalakena Tamagu e parua liu au.

pea ki ega vakilina, naga, ragi waina
ega wo pakilina, kuga saralomau.

mu mau, nalakena tea maraki ni
maramana e umai: go eda peani
te navatuna sikai napalaugu mau ;
31 ma naga maramana ega atae naga a
dodomi Tamagu, go dapala waina
Tamagu e dipa ki nau, a do mari
dapala nogoe. Kuga tuleana, tuga
vano ineludua ki tokora waia.
Matele 15.
1 Kinau a pei vaine lomau, go
Tamagu e pei tea wosiwosi natauo.
2 Sara ara waina eu lawo au waina eu
da dau ki nawada mau, e dapelua
ra : go sara ara waina eu dau ki
nawada, e mari-pakasa ki da, naga
3 euga dau parua ki nawada. Ragi
waia nimu ku dautau sua nalakena
navasaana waina a pasa ki mu asa.
4 Kuga toko au doko, go kinau aga
toko mu doko. Dapala waina ara e
pe ta doko vaine doko mau, e pe ta
mariatae dumana dau ki nawana
mau ; dapala nogoe nimu, ku pe ta
doko au doko mau, ku pe ta mari
atae tau mau. Kinau a pei vaine, 5
nimu ku pei arana maga: tea
waina e doko au doko, go kinau a
doko asa doko, nae e dau parua ki
nawana : nalakena ku pe masale ki
nau ku pe ta mariatae mari te
navatuna sikai mau. Te naata 6
sikai e pe ta doko au doko mau, e
pe vei tea nadikiana paid etaku
dapala ara sikai, go e kokolo ; go
eu piladaua ki da, po nadi ki da
paki nakapu, go eu pei tea tapara-
kiana. Ku pe toko au doko, go na 7
vasaana aginau maga eu pe toko mu
doko, kuga tatago tea waina ku pe
masauna, go ega wo manimu pei tea
mariana. Tea waia Tamagu e pei 8
tea samasamaniana asa, naga kuga
tau parua ki nawamu ; go kuga wo
pei tea vasapiseikiana aginau maga
asa. Dapala waina Tamagu e do- 9
domi au, kinau ma a dodomi mu;
kuga toko nadodomiana aginau
doko. Ku pe rogo parati ki natipa- 10
kiana aginau maga, ku pf wo doko
nadodomiana aginau doko ; dapala
waina kinau a dogo parati ki na
tipakiana maga ki Tamagu, po doko
nadodomiana aneana doko. A po 11
pasa ki mu tea maga wanogoe, naga
nalaelaeaana aginau ega toko mu,
go naga nalaelaeaana animu ega vei
tea vakavuroana. Natipakiana agi- 12
nau e pei tea waia, naga kuga
tumamu dodomi mu, ega tapala
waina a dodomi mu. Nadodomiana 13
waina e parua liu tea waia tea naata
sikai e da peani a mau, naga naata
sikai ega magi tana ri maga doropusi
namauriana aneana ega madoko.
Nimu ku pe mari tea maga waina H
kinau a dapaki mu ara, ku pe vei
tagu ri maga. Ada moro soso mu 15
ki tea suasua maga mau ; nalakena


tea suasua e da atae tea waina
nawota aneana e mari a mau ; ma
a soso mu ki tagu ri maga, nalakena
tea maga mamau puti waina a dogo
ra ki Tamagu a mari mu ku atae
16 ra. Nimu ku da matadoa au mau,
ma kinau a matadoa mu, po dawana
ki mu, naga nimu kuga vano po dau
ki nawa, go naga nawamu ega tu:
naga tea waina ku pe wo datagovi
Tamagu asa pae nagisagu, ega tua
17 mu asa. A dipa ki mu tea maga
wanogoe, naga kuga tufnamu dodo-
-18 mi mu. Maramana epe vilosi mu,
kuga atae naga e pilosi au pea ki e
19 filosi mu. Ku pe vei tea ni mara-
mana, maramana e pe dodomi tea
aneana : ma nalakena ku da pei tea
ni maramana mau, ma kinau a
matadoa mu meludua ki maramana,
nalakena tea wanogoe maramana e
20 pilosi mu. Kuga midoa ki navasa-
ana waina kinau a noa ki mu asa,
a naga, Tea suasua e da parua liu
nawota aneana mau. Bu pe kopa-
lele au, eu pe wo moro kopalele mu :
eu pe rogo parati ki navasaana
aginau, eu pe wo moro dogo parati ki
21 tea animu. Ma euga wo mari tea
maga mamau puti wanogoe paki mu
nalakena nagisagu, nalakena eu da
atae tea waina e dipakilua au umai
22 mau. Ape ta umai po pasa ki da
mau, eu pe ta peani namarinaleo-
saana mau: ma ragi waia eu da
peani nakokorokiana nalo ni na
23 marinaleosaana adeada mau. Tea
waina e pilosi au, e pilosi garni ma
24 Tamagu. Ape ta mari nawosiana
maga maleoputo kakada waina te
naata pota sikai e da mari ra mau, eu
pe ta peani namarinaleosaana mau ;
ma ragi waia eu punusi po pilosi garni
25 ma Tamagu. Ma e dajiala nogoe,
naga navasaana waina e pei tea
midiriana nawotaeana adeada ega
lolomana, waina e naga, Eu pilosi
26 fnoli ki nau. Ma ragi waina Tea
Yasapakavakale ega wo umai, waina
kinau aga wo dipakilua e melu

ni nalomauana waina e do melu

soki nalo kakagu : go nimu ma kuga 27
wo noasokisoki, nalakena ku sikoti
au doko pae naatulakeana pa pa.
Matele 16.
A pasa ki mu tea maga wanogoe, 1
naga kuga ta pei tea mariana kuga
tapilagona mau. Euga wo mari mu 2
kuga toko etaku ni nasuma ni nasai-
saiana maga : go aura ega wo umai,
waina sara naatamoli waina eu
maripunue mu euga wo midoa ki
nia naga eu pitua ki nasuasuaana
paki Supe asa. Go euga wo mari 3
tea maga wanogoe, nalakena eu da
atae Tamagu mau, go eu da atae au
mau. Ma a pasa ki mu tea maga 4
wanogoe, naga, ragi waina aura
kakada ega wo umai, kuga midoa ki
da, naga kinau a noa ki mu ara. Go
a da noac ki mu tea maga wanogoe
pae naatulakeana pa pa mau, na
lakena a sikoti mu doko. Ma ragi 5
waia a naga aga vano punusi tea
waina e' dipakilua au umai; go nimu
sikai kakamu e da pusuusu paki nau
mau, po naga, Ku naga pa vaki
esava ? Ma nalakena apo pasa ki 6
mu tea maga wanogoe, nasusueana
e pakavuro napopomu. Ma kinau 7
a noa ki mu nalomauana ; E pia ki
mu naga kinau aga vano ; nalakena
a pe ta pano mau, Tea Vasapaka-
vakale e pe wo da umai punusi mu
mau; ma ape vano, ape wo
dipakilua e umai punusi mu. Go 8
nae, ragi waina ega wo umai, ega
wo pasapai maramana nalo ni na
marinaleosaana, go nalo ni namari-
naleoleanaana, go nalo ni navasa-
potaeana: nalo ni namarinaleosaana, 9
nalakena eu da saralomau au mau ;
nalo ni namarinaleoleanaana, na 10
lakena a pano punusi Tamagu, go


ku da moro leopunusi au mau;

tea maraki ni maramana waia e pei
12 tea vasapotaeana. Ako peani tea
lapa waina a naga aga noa ki mu

. dogo ra : go ega wo noakisai mu tea

noa, naga e do dape tea ni aginau,
16 go ega wo noakisai mu asa. Ragi
kiki, go ku da moro leopunusi au

17 punusi au. Nalakena tea wanogoe

au : go, Nalakena a pano punusi
18 Tamagu \ Nalakena tea wanogoe
eu naga, Tea wanogoe waina e noa

19 Yesu e atae naga eu masauna naga
euga vusuusu paki nia, go e noa ki

20 kiki, go kuga wo punusi au ? Lomau,
lomau, a noa ki mu, naga nimu kuga
wo dagi po lalagaarova, ma mara-
mana ega wo laelaea : nimu kuga
wo susue, ma nasusueana animu ega
wo pei tea mariana ega vei nalaelae-
-21 aana. Nagoroi sikai ragi waina e
pisola e peani nasusueana, nalakena
aura aneana epo umai: ma ragi
waina e pisola ki sua piakiki, e da

nalakena nalaelaeaana nalakena na
atamoli sikai e pei tea visolakiana
paki maramana. Go nalakena tea 22
wanogoe nimu ku peani lomau ki
nasusueanana ragi waia : ma aga
wo moro punusi mu, go napopomu
ega wo laelaea, go nalaelaeaana
animu te naata sikai e da dape lua
e kiamu mau. Go naaleatia wano- 23
goe kuga wo da pusuusu paki nau
kite navatuna sikai mau. Lomau,
lomau, a noa ki mu, naga Ku pe
ratagovi Tamagu kite navatuna
sikai, e pe wo dua mu asa pae
nagisagu. Pa pa paki ragi waia ku 24
da datago te navatuna sikai pae
nagisagu mau; kuga ratago, go
kuga wo dape, naga nalaelaeaana
animu ega vei tea vakavuroana.
A pasa ki mu tea maga wanogoe 25
pae naluluakia maga : aura ega wo
umai waina aga wo da moro pasa ki
mu pae naluluakia maga mau, ma
aga wo noakisai mu lina nalo ni
Tamagu. Naaleatia wanogoe kuga 26
wo datago pae nagisagu: go ada
noa ki mu mau, naga kinau aga wo
pavarani Tamagu nalo kakamu;
nalakena Tamagu e dumana dodomi 27
mu, nalakena nimu ku dodomi au.
po saralomau naga kinau a fnelu
Tamagu dave umai. A melu Tama- 28
gu dave pano, po umai paki mara-
mana : aga moro doropusi maramana
ega madoko, po pano punusi Tama-
gu. Tea vasapiseikiana aneana maga 29
eu naga, Pa leo, ragi waia ku pasa
lina, po da noa te naluluakia sikai
mau. Ragi waia au atae naga ku 30
atae naleo maga mamau puti, po da
pei sapo mau naga te naata sikai
ega vusuusu paki-go : nalakena tea
wanogoe au saralomau naga ku fnelu
Supe dave umai. Yesu e pasadara 31
ra, e naga, Ku saralomau ragi waia
kite ? Kuga leo, aura ega wo umai, 32


go e umai sua, naga kuga vei
tea taperaverakiana, sara naata
sikasikai paki kiamu, po doro-
pusi au aga sikiga doko; go a
da sikigu doko man, nalakena
33 Tamagu e sikoti au doko. A pasa
ki mu tea maga wanogoe, naga kuga
veani natamateana au. Ku peani
nariesokiana maramana ; ma kuga
marasike, kinau a marimatua ki
maramana.
Matele 17.
1 Yesu e pasa tea maga wanogoe;
go e leosake paki nakoroatelagi, po
naga, Mama, aura epo umai; pa
samasamani Naturna, naga Naturna
2 ega samasamani ko ; dapala waina
ku dua e naveinawotaana dapau
sara napokasi, naga nolo ni sara
tea waina ku dua e ara, ega tua
ra namauriana waina e du mau
3 du. Go namauriana waina e du
mau du e pei tea waia, naga
euga atae ko Supe lomau sikai
maau, go tea waina ku dipaki-
-4 lua e umai, Yesu Kristo. Kinau a
samasamani ko maramana, a mari
sua nawosiana waina ku dua au asa
5 naga aga mari a. Go ragi waia,
nigo, Mama 0, pa samasamani au
aga sikoti ko ki nasamasamaana
waina a peani a sikoti ko pea ki
6 maramana e doko. A mari nagi-
sama e dokolina ki naatamoli maga
waina ku dua au ara meludua ki
maramana : eu pei tea anigo, go ku
dua au ara; go eu dogo parati ki
7 navasaana anigo. Ragi waia eu
atae naga naleo maga mamau puti
waina ku dua au ara eu melu ako
8 umai: nalakena navasaana maga
waina ku dua au ara a dua ra ara ;
go eu dape ra, po atae lomau naga a
melu ako dave umai, go eu saralo-
mau naga nigo ku dipakilua au umai.
9 Kinau a madeada pavara: a da
magi maramana pavara mau, ma a
magi tea maga waina ku dua au ara
pavara ; nalakena eu pei tea anigo :
go naleo maga mamau puti waina eu 10
pei tea aginau eu pei tea anigo,
go tea anigo maga eu pei tea aginau :
go a pei tea samasamaniana ara.
Go a da moro doko maramana 11
mau, go nara waia eu doko mara-
mana, go kinau a paloti punusi
ko. Mama Tapu, pa leo parati ki
da euga toko nagisama waina ku
dua au asa, naga euga vei tea sikai
maau, ega tapala waina nigida toro
pei tea sihai maau. Ragi waina al2
sikoti ra doko, kinau a leo parati ki
da eu doko nagisama waina ku dua
au asa : go a pavaigoro ra, go sikai
kakada e da matepuoli mau, ma
natu ni namatepuoliana e sikina ;
naga navasaana midiriana ega lolo-
mana. Ma ragi waia a paloti 13
punusi ko ; go a pasa tea maga
wanogoe maramana, naga euga
veani nalaelaeaana aginau ega vei
tea vakakuroana ara. Kinau a dua 14
ra navasaana anigo ; go maramana
e pilosi ra, nalakena eu da pei tea
ni maramana mau, dapala waina
kinau a da pei tea ni maramana
mau. A da pavara mau naga pa 15
tapelua ra meludua ki maramana,
ma naga pa to pavaigoro ra meludua
ki tea sa. Eu da pei tea ni mara- 16
mana mau, dapala waina kinau a da
pei tea ni maramana mau. Pa 17
tapugoro ra doko nalomauana:
navasaana anigo e pei nalomauana.

maramana, kinau ma a dipakilua ra '
paki maramana. Go kinau a ma- 19

doko nalomauana. Go a da magi 20

-24 domi au. Mama, tea waina ku dua

sama, go aga wo mari ra euga atae

ki-go paki nau: ku mari nasava ?

goe ragi waina Yesu e menadogo

naatana.
