rumai, po maripori natua maga m
tea vea, go ni tea pota waina e pei
tea turiana nakau valadagoto sikoti
33 a: ma ragi waina eu rumai paki
Yesu, po punusi naga e mate sua,
eu da maripori natuana maga mau :
34 ma naatainoli maga ni navakalo
sikai kakada e pori navidina ki naio
sikai, go nada go noai ero dave umai
35 maraverave. Go tea waina e punusi
e po noasokisoki, go nanoasokisoki-
ana aneana e pei lomau : go nae e
atae naga e noa tea lomau maga,
naga nimu ma kuga saralomau.
36 Nalakena tea maga wanogoe eu
pakilina, naga navasaana midiri-
ana ega lolomana, waina e naga,
Te navatuna sikai ega wo da pei tea
37 mariporiana mau. Go navasaana
midiriana pota sikai e moro naga,
Euga wo leopunusi tea waina
eu pun a.
38 Go edaku ki tea maga wanogoe
Yosef ni Arimathea, waina e pei tea
vasapiseikiana Sikai ki Yesu, ma e
doko loku nalakena e matau ki
navarapule maga ni Yudea, e pava-
rani Pilato naga ega tapelua napa-
toko ni Yesu; go Pilato e suasua
hi nia. Nalakena tea wanogoe e
39 umai po dapelua napatokona. Go
Nikodemo ma e umai, waina e umai
punusi a pogi ragi vea, e dapetape
murra go aloe sarisari umai, e
alagoro pei paund ponotia sikai.
40 Go ero dape napatoko ni Yesu,
po pivisi a ki namasia maga ni na
kulukulu ni linen go tea ni napo-
wia wanogoe e pilake a, dapala
waina naka ni Yudea eu do mari
naovakiana. Go tokora waina e pei 41
tea turiana asa nakau valadagoto
roara sikai e doko asa; go roara
wanogoe matigo van sikai e doko
asa, waina te naata sikai e ko da pei
tea toropusiana asa man. Tokora 42
wanogoe nalakena tea wanogoe eu
doropusi Yesu asa, nalakena naale-
atia ni Namarimatakiana ki naka ni
Yudea, nalakena matigo wanogoe e
pei maladigi.
Matele 20.
Go naaleatia vea ni wiik malipogi 1
sa kakana, ragi waina e ko maligo
doko, Maria ni Macdala e umai paki
matigo, po punusi vatu e pei tea
tapeluaana ki matigo. Nalakena 2
tea wanogoe e sava, po umai punusi
Simon Petero, go tea vasapiseikiana
pota waina Yesu e dodomi a, po
noa ki da, e naga, Eu dapelua
Nawota ineludua ki matigo, go au
da atae tokora waina eu doropusi a
asa mau. Nalakena tea wanogoe 3
Petero e dave pano, go tea vasapisei-
kiana pota wanogoe, go ero do pano
paki matigo. Go ero dua sava 4
dumada sikoti ra : go tea vasapisei-
kiana pota wanogoe e sava kasua
liu Petero, po pea umai paki matigo;
go e kolo po leo paki ekopu, po 5
punusi namasia maga ni nakulukulu
ni linen eu one ; ma eda paki ekopu
mau. Eagi wanogoe Simon Petero 6
ma e umai dausi a, po paki ekopu ni
matigo: go e leopunusi namasia
maga ni nakulukulu ni linen eu one,
go tea kasitoro, waina e doko napau- 7
na, e da one sikoti namasia maga
ni nakulukulu ni linen mau, ma
e pei tea lugiana e masale one
tokora sikai. Eagi wanogoe nalake- 8
na tea wanogoe tea vasapiseikiana


pota wanogoe waina e pea umai paid
matigo nae ma e paid ekopu, go e
9 punusi, po saralomau. Nalakena

moro duleana meludua ki tea mate
10 maga. Go tea vasapiseikiana dua

adeada pano.

asa, go kinau aga wo dapelua e.

vasapiseikiana maga eu doko asa,

nogoe Yesu e moro noa ki da, e naga,

Naatana Tapu. Tea maga waina 23

namarinaleosaana adeada maga, eu

rokoroana ; go tea maga waina ku

marisokiana.
Ma Toma, tea rualima sikai tamate 24
dua sikai kakada, waina e pei tea
sosoana ki Didimo, e da sikoti ra
doko mau ragi waina Yesu e umai.
Nalakena tea wanogoe tea vasapi- 25
seikiana pota maga eu noa ki nia,
eu naga, Au po punusi Nawota. Ma
e noa ki da, e naga, A pe ta punusi
malo masai ni tuturi maga namele-
aruna maga mau, go a pe ta doropusi
nakinigu paki malo masai ni tuturi
maga mau, go a pe ta doropusi
namelearugu paki navirina mau, a
pe wo da saralomau mau.
Go edaku ki naaleatia latolu tea. 26
vasapiseikiana aneana maga eu
moro doko ekopu, go Toma e sikoti
ra doko. Yesu e umai, namata
maga eu pei tea kokoroana, go e
lawodu maleoputo kakada, po naga,
Ruga veani natamateana. E edaku 27


noa Id Toma, e naga, Pa sai ki
nakinima paki nea, go pa vunusi
namelcarugu maga; go pa sai ki
namelearuma, po doropusi a paki
navirigu : go pa ta pei tea ta sara-
lomau man, ma pa saralomau.
28 Toma e pasadara po noa ki nia, e
naga, Nawota aginau go Supe aginau.

saralomau nalakena ku po punusi
au : tea maga waina eu da punusi
mau, go eu saralomau eu maropa.

pota lapa narae ni tea vasa-
piseikiana maga, waina eu da pei

tea maga wanogoe eu pei tea midi-
riana, naga kuga saralomau naga
Yesu e pei Kristo, Supe Natuna ; go
naga ragi waina kuga saralomau
kuga veani namauriana pae nagi-
sana.
Matele 21.
1 Edaku ki tea maga wanogoe
Yesu e moro dumana mari e doko-
lina ki tea vasapiseikiana maga
2 pisari natasi ni Tiberia; go e

waia. Simon Petero, go Toma
waina e pei tea sosoana ki Didimo,

dua ni tea vasapiseikiana aneana

e noa ki da, e naga, Aga va ara ika.

tuga mamau. Eu dave pano, po
pagi rarua ; go napogiana wanogoe
4eu da puati te navatuna mau. Ma

tokotoana, Yesu e lawodu elau gara-

5 Ragi wanogoe Yesu e noa ki da, e
naga, Piakirikiri, ku peani te nava-
tuna waina kuga kani a kite ? Eu
6 pasadara e, eu naga, Ee. Go e noa
ki da, e naga, Kuga siva ki kupena
paki taleva ni matua ni rarua, go
kuga wo papai. Nalakena tea wa-
nogoe eu siva ki nia, go eu da moro
mari atae puati a umai mau, nalake-
na navata ni naika maga wanogoe.
Nalakena tea wanogoe tea vasapisei- 7
kiana wanogoe waina Yesu e dodomi
a, e noa ki Petero, e naga, E pei
Nawota. Go ragi waina Simon

otisoki namalona ki sugoro aneana
(nalakena e malainala), po dumana
nadi ki nia paki natasi. Ma tea 8
vasapiseikiana pota maga eu rumai
rarua kiki (nalakena eu da uvea ki
euta mau, ma namalopa kakana

sikai), eu do dosagi kupena waina e
pura ki naika maga. Go ragi waina 9
eu paki euta, eu punusi nakapu
sikai ni namelevara maga e one, go
naika e pei tea toropusiana e one
asa, go bred. Yesu e noa ki da, 10
e naga, Kuga tape umai te naika
seara ni tea maga waina ku po puati
ra ragi waia. Nalakena tea wano- 11
goe Simon Petero e pagi rarua, po

naika warua maga, Ponotia sikai
rualima takuna lima tamate dolu :
eu lapa, ma kupena e da mawora
mau. Yesu e noa ki da, e naga, 12
Kuga umai kuga kanikani. Go tea
vasapiseikiana maga sikai kakada e
da piviari pusuusu paki nia mau, fo
naga, Nigu ku pei sei ? eu atae naga
e pei Nawota. Yesu e umai, po 13
dape bred wanogoe, po dua ra asa,
go dapala nogoe e dua ra naika.
Tea wanogoe e pei sala ketolu waina 14
Yesu e pakilina ki tea vasapiseikiana
maga asa, edaku ki e duleana melu
dua ki tea mate maga.
Go ragi waina eu ganikani sua, 15

au parua liu tea maga waia kite ?
E noa ki nia, e naga, loro, Nawota ;


nigo ku atae naga a dodomi ko. E
noa Id nia, e naga, Pa vagani shiip
16 natuda aginau maga. E moro noa ki
nia sala kerua, e naga, Simon, natu ni
Yoane, ku dodomi an kite ? E noa
ki nia, e naga, loro, Nawota ; nigo
ku atae naga a dodomi ko. E noa
ki nia, e naga, Pa leoparati ki shiip
17 aginau. E noa ki nia sala ketolu
enaga, Simon natu ni Yoane,* ku,
dodomi au kite ? Petero e susue
nalakena e noa ki nia sala ketolu, e
naga, Ku dodomi au kite ? Go e
noa ki nia, e naga, Nawota, nigo ku
atae naleo maga mamau puti;
nigo ku atae naga a dodomi ko.
Yesu e noa ki nia, e naga, Pa vagani
18 shiip aginau. Lomau, lomau, a
noa ki-go, naga Ragi waina ku pei
natureai ku dumafna dasoki ko,
po surata paki tokora waina ku
masauna naga pa vaki asa : ma ragi
waina pa wo pei tea matua, pa wo
sai ki namelearuma maga, go tea
pota sikai ega wo dasoki ko, po
piragi ko paki tokora waina pa
19 wo karai paki asa. Ma e noa tea
wanogoe, e paivai ki namateana
waina ega wo samasamani Supe
asa. Go ragi waina e noa sua tea
wanogoe, e noa ki nia, e naga, Pa
rausi au.
Petero e dufhana doa e, po punusi 20
tea vasapiseikiana waina Yesu e
dodomi a e dausi; go waina e pei
tea waina e kere one narufnana ragi
ni nakaniana ni ragi melu, po naga,
Nawota, tea waina e naga ega vitua
ki-go e pei sei ? Go ragi waina 21
Petero e punusi a e noa ki Yesu, e
naga, Nawota, go naatafholi waia,
nasava ? Yesu e noa ki nia, e naga, 22
A pe masauna naga nae ega toko pa
pa aga umai, nigo pa kasa ki nia ?
nigo pa rausi au. Nalakena tea 23
wanogoe navasaana wanogoe e soka-
pule inaleopuoto ni taigida maga,
naga tea vasapiseikiana wanogoe
ega ta mate man; ma Yesu e da
noa ki nia mau, naga ega ta mate
man ; ma, A pe masauna naga ega
toko pa pa aga umai, nigo pa kasa
ki nia ?
Nae e pei tea vasapiseikiana waina 21
e noasokisoki nalo ni tea maga wa-
nogoe, po midiri tea maga wanogoe:
go au atae naga nanoasokiana ane-
ana e pei lomau.
Go naleo pota lapa ma eu doko 25
waina Yesu e mari ra, waina eu pe
mamau puti pei tea midiriana sika-
sikai, a midoa ki nia naga maramana
nae e pe ta dape tusi maga waina eu
pe vei tea midirians.
NAWOSIANA
APOSTOLO MAGA.
Matele 1 Yesu e atulake mari ra po pasapisei
ki ara, pa pa paki naaleatia waina 2
1 A mari tusi vea waina, Theofilo, e pei tea tapeana sake asa, ragi
nalo ni tea maga mamau puti waina waina e dipa ki sua pae Naatana


Tapu apostolo maga waina e mata-
-3 doa ra : e moro lawo du naraeda e
mauri edaku ki e sua navitinumate-
ana aneana, navaivaiana kakana
eu lapa, e do pakilina ki da naaleatia
rualima pati, po do noa ki da naleo
maga nalo ni namarakiana ki
4 Supe : go ragi waina nae ma nara
eu mamau saisai, e pasa parati
ki da naga euga ta meludua ki
Yerusalem pano man, ma naga euga
toko raki nasaiana ki Tamana,
waina, e noa e, ku dogo e kiagu:
5 nalakena Yoane e bapetizo lomau ki
noai; ma naaleatia eu da lapa mau
eu ko puoli go nimu kuga wo pei tea
bapetizoana ki Naatana Tapu.
6 Nalakena tea wanogoe ragi waina
eu saisai doko, eu pusuusu paki nia,
eu naga, Nawota, pa wo magi
Israel dape namarakiana liliu ragi
7 waia kite ? Go e noa ki da, Eda
pei tea animu mau naga kuga atae
ragi maga kite sala maga waina
Tamagu e lawo ki da eu doko na
8 veinawotaana aneana. Ma kuga
wo dape nakasuaana ragi waina Na
atana Tapu ega wo umai doko mu :
go kuga wo pei tea noasokisoki
aginau maga Yerusalem, go Yudea
mamau, go Samaria, go pa pa paki
9 namata pago ni maramana. Go
ragi waina e noa sua tea maga
wanogoe, go nara eu do leo punusi,
e pei tea tapeana sake;. go napo-
pouru sikai e dapelua e ki nama-
-10 tada. Go ragi waina eu do leo
sokisoki paki nakoroatelagi, go nae
e do pano, kuga leo, naatamoli dua
ero lawodu pisari ra waina ero suni
11 sugoro tare maga; go waina ero
naga, Naatamoli ni Calilea maga,
ekasana ku lawodu po do leo paki
nakoroatelagi ? Yesu waia, waina
e pei tea tapeana sake meludua ki
mu paki nakoroatelagi pano, ega
wo umai dapala waina ku punusi
a e paki nakoroatelagi pano.
12 Bagi wanogoe eu liliu paki Yeru-
salem pae tava waina e pei tea
sosoana ki Oliva, waina e pei fnala-
digi ki Yerusalem, nasurataana ni
sabbath sikai. Go ragi waina eu 13
rumai sili asa, eu sake paki ekopu
ni emago ni tagona ni elagi, waina
eu doko asa doko; Petero go Yoane
go Yakobo go Anderea, Filipo go
Toma, Bartolomaio go Mataio,
Yakobo natu ni Alefaio, go Simon
Zelote, go Yuda natu ni Yakopo.

eu do dapasavasa pitipatipa, na
poporda sikai maau asa, nara ma
nagoroi seara, go Maria Yesu pilana,
go taina maga.

maga wanogoe inaleoputo ni tai-

takuna dua), e naga, Taigu maga, e 16
one navasaana midiriana one
naga ega lolomana, waina Naatana

David nalo ni Yuda, waina e maraki

soki Yesu. Nalakena e pei tea veve- 17
aha e pei sikai kakagida, po dape

pevera puti. Go tea wanogoe e pei 19

puti waina eu doko Yerusalem doko;

ana tusi ni Salamo maga,

ana ega vei maso maladi,

go,

tea pota sikai ega tape a.

maga waina eu sikoti gida doko

Matele 2.
1 Go ragi waina naaleatia ni Pente-
koste e do pei tea vakakavuroana,
eu mamau puti doko tokora sikai
2 maau. Go maraverave nasaruruana
sikai e pae nakoroatelagi umai, e
dakiusi nasurataana ni nalagi atu
sikai, go e pakavuro usura ki nasu-
3ma waina eu doko asa. Go namena
maga waina eu darana, dakiusi mena
ni nakapu, eu pakilina ki da ; go e
4 sake puti ara. Go eu pura puti ki
Naatana Tapu, po pae asa pasa ki
namena pota ■ maga, dakiusi waina
Naatana e dua ra naga euga vasalagi.
5 Go tea ni Yudea seara eu doko
Yerusalem, waina eu pei naatamoli
tape pia, waina eu pae sara nalauna
6 etano ni nakoroatelagi umai. Go
ragi waina nasaruruana wanogoe e
pei tea rogoana, taua ni naatamoli
maga eu saisai, go napopoda e
pinovinoi, nalakena sara naatamoli
eu dogo ra eu pasa pae navasaana
visarasara adeada. Go eu mamau 7
puti saramakoto po maga, po naga,
Kuga leo, tea maga mamau puti
waia waina eu pasa eu da pei naata
moli maga ni Galileo kite ? Go 8
ekasana nigida, sara naata ka-
kagida, tu dogo pae navasaana
waina tu pakilina asa ? Tea ni 9
Partbia go ni Media go ni Elam, go
tea maga waina eu doko Meso-
potamia, Yudea go Kapadokia,
Ponto go Asia, Eerucia go Pamfilia, 10
Ityipt go tokora maga ni Libue
maladigi ki Kurene, go namenaki-
atatoko maga waina eu pae Roma
umai, tea ni Yudea maga go prose-
luto maga, tea ni Krete go ni 11
Arabia, tu dogo ra eu pasa pae
namenagida maga nawosiana warua
maga ki Supe. Go eu saramakoto 12
puti, po midoakiputuaki, po du-
mada noa ki da, eu naga, Tea waia
e pei nasava ? Ma tea J>ota seara 13
eu mari saudoa ki nia, po naga, Eu
munu parua ki waine vau.
Ma Petero e duleana, nara ma 14
tea rualima sikai tamate sikai eu
mamau, go e sike nadaleona po
pasalagi paki da, e naga, Naata
moli ni Yudea maga, go tea maga
mamau puti waina ku doko Yeru-
salem, kuga atae tea waia, go kuga
takidorogo navasaana aginau maga.
Nalakena nara waia eu da mata- 15
maluku mau, dakiusi waina nimu
ku midoaki nia ; nalakena e ko pei
aura ketolu ni naaleatia; ma tea 16
waia e pei tea waina e pei tea noaana
pae prof eta Yoel;

maga, Supe e noa e,

mu nagoroi maga euga wo

ma tapu ki nadodomiana ; go ragi 3

Matele 4.
Go ragi waina ero do pasa paki 1
narei, tea viri maga go nawota hi tea

pano eu dufnada pusuusu paki da,

ra. Go nara, ragi waina eu sokari 21

da naga eroga vano, eu da papai tea
tapala waina euga varati ra mau,
nalakena narei; nalakena tea maga
mamau puti eu pasa samasamani

mariana. Nalakena naatamoli wai- 22

pati.

-31 ana warua e doko puti ara. Nala-

mau : nalakena tea maga waina eu

vei tea tika.

salagisana ki Barnaba (waina e pei

sori a, po dape mone kakana umai po

maga.
Matele 5.
Ma naatainoli sikai nagisana Ana- 1
nia, nara ma anagoroi Sapfeira, e

naulu kakana seara, anagoroi ma e
atae a, go e dape te namagovai sikai
kakana umai, po doropusi a pisari
namele maga ni apostolo maga. Ma 3
Petero e naga, Anania, ekasana
Satan e pakavuro napopoma naga
pa soro Naatana Tapu, go naga pa
lawogoro naulu ni natano seara
kakana ? Ragi waina e doko, eda 1
pei tea anigo kite ? go ragi waina e

nawotaana anigo kite ? Ekasana
ku doropusi naleo waia napopoma ?
ku da soro naatainoli maga mau, ma
ku soro Supe. Go Anania ragi 5
waina e dogo navasaana maga

waina eu dogo e. Go natureai maga 6
eu duleana po lulugoro e, go eu
dapetape a paki katama po ova ki
nia.

alagoro pei aura dolu, anagoroi,


waina e da atae tea waina e pei tea
mariana mau, e umai paki ekopu.

noa ki nia, e naga, Ekasana koro

maridogo Naata ni Yehovali % Pa
leo, nainele maga ni tea maga waina

katama, po ova ki nia pisari ana-
-11 wota. Go namatakuana warua e

ra eu one nawewele maga go napanu
maga, naga, ragi waina Petero ega

16 seara kakada. Go taua ni naata

virigoro Yerusalem, nara ma eu do
umai saisai, eu do dapetape tea
sasana maga, go tea maga waina

* go eu do pei tea maripauriana
puti.
17 Ma tea viri warua liu e duleana,
nara ma tea maga mamau puti
waina eu sikoti a doko eu mamau
(waina eu pei tagona ni Sadduki
maga), go eu pura ki nadoitoiana, 18
po nadi ki namelearuda apostolo
maga, po doropusi ra eu doko ekopu
ni nasuma ni navavaiana ki tea lapa.
Ma agelo ki Yehovah sikai e polagati 19
namata maga ni nasuma ni navavai-
ana pogi, po piragilua ra paki kata-
ma, po naga, Kuga vano, po lawodu 20
roara ni nasuma tapu po pasa ki
narei navasaana maga mamau puti
niNamauriana waia. Go ragi waina 21
eu dogo tea wanogoe, eu paki roara
ni nasuma tapu ragi ni namakoto-
kotoana, po pasapiseiki. Ma tea
viri warua liu e umai, nara ma tea
maga waina eu sikoti a doko eu
mamau, po soso saisai ki nasaisaiana
ni navasapotaeana, go ki tea matua
maga mamau puti ni Israel natuna
maga, po dipakilua paki nasuma ni
nasolisoliana naga euga viragi ra
umai. Ma tasiga maga waina eu 22
rumai eu da papai ra ekopu ni
nasuma ni navavaiana mau ; go eu
liliu, po dogorogo, po naga, Au papai 23
nasuma ni nasolisoliana e pono
kasua, go tea vavai maga eu lawodu
pisari namata maga : ma ragi waina
au polagati, au da papai te naata
ekopu mau. Go ragi waina nawota 24
hi tea vavai maga ni nasuma tapu go
tea viri warua maga eu dogo nava-
saana maga wanogoe, eu midoaki-
putuaki parua nalo kakada, tea
wanogoe ega vei nasava ? Go sikai 25
e umai po dogorogo paki da, e naga,
Kuga leo, naatamoli maga waina ku
doropusi ra ekopu ni nasunia ni
navavaiana eu doko roara ni nasuma
tapu, eu lawodu po do pasapisei ki
narei. llagi wanogoe nawota hi tea 26
vavai maga e pano, nara ma tasiga
maga eu mamau, po piragi ra umai,
ma eu da mari kasua ki da mau;
nalakena eu matau ki narei, eu pe
vei tea nadiana ki vatu. Go ragi 27
waina eu piragi sua ra umai, eu lawo


ki da name ni nasaisaiana ni na
vasapotaeana. Go tea viri warua liu
28 e pusuusu paki da, e naga, Au pasa
parati ki kasua ki mu naga kuga ta
pasapiseiki pae nagisa waina man ;
go kuga leo, ku pakavuro Yerusalem
ki navasapiseikiana animu, po midoa
ki nia naga kuga mari nada ni naata
29 frioli waina ega liko garni. Ma
Petero go apostolo maga eu pasa-
dara po naga, E one garni one naga
auga rogo parati ki parua ki Supe
go naga auga rogo.parati ki kiki ki
30 naatafnoli maga. Supe ki tamagida
maga e sike Yesu e duleana, waina
nimu ku maripunue'a, ku sara ki nia
31 nakau sikai. Nae Supe e dape a
pakilagi ki namelearuna ni matua
naga ega vei Nawota go Tea Maumau
pauri,naga ega tua Israel namidoaki-
doaana go namidoakikorokoroana ni
32 namarinaleosaana maga. Go kinami
au pei tea noasokisoki maga ni tea
maga wanogoe ; go Naatana Tapu,
waina Supe e dua tea maga asa
waina eu dogo parati nia.
33 Ma ragi waina eu dogo tea wano-
goe, eu maeto parua, po midoa ki
34 nia naga euga maripunue ra. Ma
tea sikai e du leana nasaisaiana ni
navasapotaeana, Farisi sikai, nagi-,
sana Gamaliel, tea vasapiseiki sikai,
ni nawotaeana, waina narei mamau
eu dodomadagani a, go e pitipaki
naga euga mari naatafnoli maga
35 waia euga tave pano ragi kiki. Go
e noa ki da, e naga, Naatafnoli ni
Israelmaga, kuga tufnamu leo parati
ki mu nalo ni naatafnoli maga waia,
tea waina ku naga kuga mari a.
36 Nalakena pea ki naaleatia maga
waia Teuda e duleana, po dumana
noa naga e pei te naata; waina
taua ni naatafnoli maga, eu alagoro
pei ponotia pati, eu puluti a : waina
e pei tea maripunueana, go tea maga
mamau puti waina eu dogo parati
ki nia eu pei daperavem, po pei tea
37 palo. Edaku ki naatafnoli wanogoe
Yuda ni Calilea e duleana naaleatia
maga ni namidiri-nagisada-ana, po
piragilua narei seara kakada eu
dausi a ; nae ma e mate ; go tea
maga mamau puti waina eu dogo-
parati ki nia eu pei dalagalaga. Go 38
ragi waia a noa ki mu, Kuga fnelu
dua ki naatafnoli maga waia, po
doropusi ra euga madoko : nalakena
namidoakipotaeana waia kite nawo-
siana waia e pe vei tea ni naatafnoli
maga, e pe wo pei tea rakaiana ; ma 39
e pe vei tea ni Supe, ku pe mari sa
dakai ra ; mase ku pe vei tea vapai-
ana ku pe marimari Supe. Go eu 40
dogo parati ki nia: go ragi waina
eu soso sua apostolo maga umai
punusi ra, eu parati ra, po pasa
dipagoro ra naga euga ta pasa pae
nagisa ni Yesu mau, go eu suasua ki
da naga euga vano. Nalakena tea 41
wanogoe eu iiielu dua ki name ni
nasaisaiana ni navasapotaeana pano,
po laelaea nalakena eu pei tea mi-
doakiana naga eu pei tea wia naga
euga sua namaridaoana nalakena
Nagisana. Go sara naaleatia, na 42
sufna tapu go nasuma adeada maga,
eu da makota ki nia mau, ma eu do
pasapiseiki po do dogorogo ki Yesu
naga e pei Kristo.
Matele 6.
Ma naaleatia maga wanogoe, ragi 1
waina tea vasapiseikiana maga eu do
disu po lapa, natauruuruana sikai e
pakilina maleoputo kakada, tea ni
Yudea maga waina eu pasa pae
Hellas eu dauruuru dipa tea maga
waina eu pasa pae Heberu, nalakena
nagoroi malepu adeada maga eu pei
tea leo kalauana nasuasuaana ni sara
naaleatia. Go tea rualima sikai 2
tamate dua eu soso taua ni tea
vasapiseikiana maga umai punusi
ra, po naga, E da pia mau naga
kinami auga toropusi navasaana ki
Supe ega madoko, po magi wede


3 maga suasua. Nalakena tea wano-
goe, tai maga, kuga tumamu leo
matadoa meludua ki mu naatamoli
larua, waina eu pei tea noasokisoki-
ana, waina eu pura ki Naatana go
ki namanumatuaana, waina auga
lawo ki da dapau nawosiana waia.
4 Ma kinami auga wo doko mau doko
natapasavasaana go nasuasuaana ni
5 navasaana. Go taua' mamau eu
dogo mata ki navasaana wanogoe :
go eu matadoa Stefano, naatamoli
sikai waina e pura ki nasaralomau-
ana go ki Naatana Tapu, go Filipo,
go Prokoro, go Nikanor, go Timon,
go Parmena, go Nikolao proseluto
6 sikai ni Antiokia : waina eu lawo
ki da narae ni apostolo maga : go
ragi waina eu dapasavasa sua, eu
pusake nainelearuda maga ara.
7 Go navasaana ki Supe e disu po
parua ; go naveveana ni tea vasapi-
seikiana maga e disu parua po lapa
sa Yerusalem ; go taua warua ni
tea viri maga eu dogo parati ki
nasaralomauana.
8 Go Stefano, waina e pura kinasau-
piaana go nakasuaana, e mari tea
ni namagaana warua maga go navai-
vaiana maga •maleoputo ni narei.
9 Ma tea ni nasuma ni nasaisaiana
waina e pei tea sosoana ki nasuma
ni nasaisaiana ki tea Libertini maga
seara kakada eu duleana, nara ma
tea ni Kurene seara kakada, go tea
ni Alexanderia seara kakada, go tea
ni Kilikia go Asia seara kakada, po
10 pululu ki Stefano. Go eu mari sa
lawodugoro namanumatuaana go
11 Naatana waina e pasa asa. Ragi
wanogoe eu dautau naatamoli seara
waina eu naga, Au po dogo e e
pasa navasaana sa dipa Moses go
12 Supe. Go eu pasadie narei, go tea
matua maga, go tea midiri maga, po
umai paki nia, po puasoki a, po
piragi a paki nasaisaiana ni navasa-
-13 potaeana, po mari tea noasokisoki
sorosoro seara eu lawodu, waina eu
naga, Naatamoli waia e da makoto ki
nia mau, ma e do pasa navasaana
maga dipa tokora tapu waia, go
nawotaeana : nalakena au po dogo 14
e e noa, naga Yesu ni Nazaretk waia
ega wo dakai tokora waia, po doa
natomariana maga waina Moses e
dua gida ara. Go tea maga mamau 15
puti waina eu doko nasaisaiana ni
navasapotaeana, eu leosoki a, po
punusi naraena e dakiusi narae ni
agelo sikai.
Matele 7.
Go tea viri warua liu e naga, Tea 1
maga wanogoe e dapala nogoe kite ?
Go e naga, Mariki maga, tai maga, 2
go tama maga, kuga takidorogo.
Supe ni nasamasamaana e pakilina
ki tamagida Abraham, ragi waina e
doko Mesopotamia doko, ragi waina
e ko da doko Haran mau, po noa ki 3
nia, e naga, Pa meludua ki navanua
anigo, go ki namatarau anigo maga
pano, po umai paki navanua waina
aga wo pisei ki-go asa. Ragi wano- 4
goe e meludua ki navanua ki naka
ni Kaldea, po umai doko Haran : go
ragi waina tamana e mate, Supe e
piragilua e pae tokora wanogoe umai
paki navanua waia, waina nimu ku
doko asa doko ragi waia: go eda 5
dua e te matele veaniana asa mau,
e da dua e te malo vasiana ni name-
lena mau : go e sai naga ega wo dua
e asa naga ega vei tea veaniana, go
naga ega tua naworaworaana asa,
waina euga wo edakugoro e, go ragi
wanogoe e ko dika natuna. Go 6
Supe e pasa dapala waia, naga nawo-
raworaana euga wo menaki-atatoko
navanua pota, go naga euga wo
mari ra euga vei naviti maga, po
mari sa ki da, natau ponotia pati.
Go nalauna waina euga wo madeada 7
pei naviti maga ag'a wo pasapotae
ra, Supe e noa e : go edaku ki tea
maga wanogoe euga wo meludua ki


nia umai, po maginau suasua tokora
8 waia. Go e dua e navasasokiana ni
natovadaviviana : go dapala nogoe
Abraham e pesi Isaak, po dovadavivi
asa naaleatia kelatolu; go Isaak e
pesi Yakob, go Yakob e pesi patri-
-9 arke rualima sikai tamate dua. Go
patriarke maga eu doitoi Yosef po
10 sori a paki Ityipt pano : go Supe e
sikoti a doko, po pualua e meludua
ki nariesokiana aneana maga ma-
mau puti.podua enasaupiaananarae
ni Faraoh nawota ni Ityipt; go nae
e mari a e pei tea maramara dapau
Ityipt go nasuma mamau aneana.
11 Go navitoloana sikai e umai usura
ki Ityipt mamau go Kanaan, go
nariesokiana warua : go tamagida
maga eu da papai te navinaga mau.
12 Ma ragi waina Yakob e dogo naga
korn e doko Ityipt, e dipakilua
13 tamagida maga sala vea. Go sala
kerua Yosef e dumana mari a e pei
tea ataeana paki taina maga, go
namatarau ki Yosef eu doko lina ki
14 Faraoh. Go Yosef e dipakilua, po
soso tamana Yakob naga ega umai
punusi a, nara ma namatarau ane-
ana jnaga mamau puti, naatamoli
15 rualima larua tamate lima. Go
Yakob e siwo paki Ityipt pano ; go
e mate, nara ma tamagida maga ;
16 go eu pei tea tapetapeluaana paki
Shekem, po pei tea toropusiana eu
one matigo waina Abraham e pako-
tovi a paki Hamor natuna maga ki
17 naulu ni silver Shekem. Ma dakiusi
waina ragi ni nasaiana, waina Supe
e sai paki Abraham asa, e pei mala-
digi, dapala nogoe narei eu disu po
18 parua po lapa Ityipt, pa pa nawota
pota sikai e pakilina dapau Ityipt,
19 waina eda atae Yosef mau. Nae e
mari manumatua paki namatarau
anigida maga, po mari sa ki tama-
gida maga, naga euga toropusi pipia
adeada maga etaku naga euga ta
20 mauri mau. Ragi wanogoe Moses e
paki lina, po pei rae wia parua liu ;
go e pei tea vakaleana atelagi dolu
nasuma ki tamana : go ragi waina 21
eu doropusi a etaku, Faraoh natuna
nagoroi e dape a, po pakale a naga
ega vei natuna aneana. Go Moses 22
e pei tea viseikiana sara namanu-
matuaana ki naka ni Ityipt; go e
kasua ki navasaana aneana maga go
ki nawosiana aneana maga. Ma ragi 23
waina natau aneana eu maladigi pei
rualima pati, napopona e midoa ki
nia naga ega va punusi taina maga
Israel natuna maga. Go ragi waina 24
e punusi tea sikai kakada e pei
tea maridagelekiana, e palugoro e,
po magi tea waina e pei tea marisa-
kiana mari nasikoana, po atugi tea
ni Ityipt: go e midoa ki nia naga 25
taina maga eu midoakiatae naga
Supe e dua ra namautipauriana pae
nanamelearuna aneana ; ma eu da
midoakiatae mau. Go matamai ki 26
nia e pakilina ki da ragi waina eu
duinada mari ra, po naga ega vuadoa
ra paki natamateana, e naga, Mariki
maga, ku pei tamataida maga,
ekasana ku dumamu maridagele ki
mu ? Ma tea waina e maridagele ki 27
tea ni maladigi ki nia, e dipatipa e,
po naga, Sei e mari ,ko ku pei tea
maraki sikai go tea vasapotae sikai
dapau garni ? Ku masauna naga 28
pa mari punue au, dakiusi waina ku
maripunue tea ni Ityipt nanova
kite ? Go Moses e sava pano na 29
lakena navasaana wanogoe, po pei
namenaki-atatoko sikai navanua ni
Midian, waina e pesi natuna naanoai
dua asa. Go ragi waina natau rua 30
lima pati eu nopu, agelo sikai e paki
lina ki nia masopalo ni tava Sinai,
doko mena ninakapuni nakau maka-
likali sikai. Go ragi waina Moses e3l
punusi a, e maga navunusiana
wanogoe : go ragi waina e umai paki
maladigi naga ega leopunusi, nada-
leo sikai ni Yehovah e umai, e naga,
Kinau a pei Supe ki tamama maga, 32
Supe ki Abraham, go ki Isaak, go ki


Yakob. Go Moses e durururu po
33 da piviari leopunusi mau. Go Ye-
hovah e noa ki nia, e naga, Pa
veresilua namelevasiana maga ni
namelema maga : nalakena tokora
waina ku lawodu asa e pei natano
34 tapu. A punusi lomau ki narogo-
kitesaana ki narei aginau waina eu
doko Ityipt doko, po dogo nagiana
adeada, go a po siwo umai naga aga
vualua ra : go ragi waia pa umai,
aga wo dipakilua ko paki Ityipt
35 pano. Moses wanogoe waina eu
pasagoro e, po naga, Sei e mari ko
ku pei tea maraki sikai go tea vasa-
potae sikai ? nae wanogoe Supe e
dipakilua e naga ega vei tea maraki
sikai go tea taulua sikai pae na
melearu ni agelo waina e pakilina
36 ki nia nakau makalikali. Nae wano-
goe e piragilua ra, e mari tea ni na
magaana maga go navaxvaiana maga
Ityipt, go natasi Miala, go masopalo
37 natau rualima pati. Nae wanogoe
e pei Moses waina e noa ki Israel
natuna maga, e naga, Supe ega
wo manimu mari profeta sikai ni
taimu maga ega vakilina, dakiusi
38 au. Nae wanogoe e pei tea waina
e doko ekkalesia masopalo sikoti
agelo waina e pasa ki nia tava Sinai,
go sikoti tamagida maga ; waina e
dape natipakiana mauri maga naga
39 ega tua gida ara: waina tamagida
maga eu karai naga euga rogo parati
ki nia, ma eu dipadoa e, go napo-
poda liliu paki Ityipt jano, eu noa
40 ki Aaron, eu naga, Pa maginami
mari supe seara waina euga wo pea
ki garni pano : nalakena Moses waia
waina e piragilua garni meludua ki
navanua ni Ityipt umai, au da atae
tea waina e pakilina ki nia mau.
41 Go eu mari kau natuna anoai
sikai naaleatia maga wanogoe, po
puati naviriana sikai umai dua
nasupe wanogoe asa, po laelaea
nawosiana ni namelearuda maga.
42 Ma Supe e madadoa, po pidua ki da

naga euga magi taua ni nakoroate-
lagi suasua ; dakiusi waina e pei tea
midiriana tusi ni profeta maga,

maga go naviriana maga paki

nasuma ni Israel, kite ?

Molok,
Go masoe ni supe Refan,
Nunuda maga waina ku mari ra
naga kuga lotu ki da ;
Go aga wo piragilua mu paki
taleva kerua ni Babelon.

ni nanoasokisokiana masopalo, da-
kiusi waina tea waina e pasa ki
Moses e pitipaki, naga ega mari a ega
vae naatulakeana waina e punusi
a. Waina tamagida maga ma eu 45
peani pioli ki nia, po dapetape a
umai sikoti Yosua paki tea veaniana
ni nalauna maga, waina Supe e
kopasi lua ra padua ki narae ni

nasaupiaana narae ni Supe, po pa-
vara nagk ega magi Supe ki Yakob

sikai. Ma Tea Yakilagi Mau e da 48
doko nasuma maga waina eu pei tea
mariana ki namelearu maga mau ;
dakiusi waina profeta e noa e,
Nakoroatelagi e pei malo tasake 49
aginau,,
Go maramana e pei malo vasiana
ni namelegu maga;
Nasuma waina kuga wo maginau
davagi a ega wo dapale sava 1
Yehovab e noa e :
Kite seve tokora e pei tokora ni
namaromaroana aginau ?
Namelearugu e da mari tea maga 50
mamau puti wanogoe kite ?
Tea noakasua maga go tea ta pei 51
tea tovadaviviana napopomu go na
daligamu maga mau, nimu ku do


dugoro dipa Naatana Tapu sara
ragi: dakiusi waina tamamu maga
eu mari a nimu ma ku do mari a.
52 Profeta maga sei kakada tamamu
maga eu da kopalele asa mau ? go
eu maripunue tea maga waina eu
pea noasai nalo ni naumaiana ki Tea
Leana ; waina nimu ku po pitua ki
nia po mari punue a ragi waia;
53 nimu waina ku dape nawotaeana
pae natawanakiana ki agelo maga,
go ku da pavaigoro e mau.
54 Go ragi waina eu dogo tea maga
wanogoe, eu maeto parua, go eu
55 kati napatida paki nia. Ma nae,
waina e pura ki Naatana Tapu, e
leosoki paki nakoroatelagi, po punu-
si nasamasamaana ki Supe, go Yesu
e lawodu pisari nainelearu ni matua
56 ni Supe, go e naga, Kuga leo, a
punusi nakoroatelagi maga eu pama-
wota, go naatamoli Natuna e lawodu
pisari nainelearu ni matua ni Supe.
57 Ma eu pioso ki nadaleo kasua sikai,
po kisi ponoti nadaligada maga, po
sava paki asa napopoda sikai maau
58 asa ; go eu nadi ki nia paki etaku
ni natokoana, po nadi a ki vatu
maga ; go tea noasokisoki maga eu
doropusi sugoro adeada maga eu
one pisari namele maga ni natureai
59 sikai nagisana Saulo. Go eu nadi
Stefano ki vatu maga, e pioso paki
Nawota, po naga, Nawota Yesu,
60 pa tape naatagu. Go e ditipatua,
po pioso ki nadaleo kasua sikai, e
naga, Nawota, pa ta mari namari-
naleosaana waia ega liko ara mau.
Go ragi waina e noa sua tea wanogoe,
e maturu. Go Saulo e suasua naga
euga maripunue a.
Matele 8.
1 Go naaleatia wanogoe nakopale-
leana warua sikai e pakilina asa dipa
ekkalesia waina eu doko Yerusalem;
go eu pei tea taperaverakiana puti
paki sara tokora ni Yudea go
Samaria, apostolo maga eu sikida
doko. Go naatamoli tapepia maga 2
eu ova ki Stefano, po mari natagisi-
ana warua asa. Ma Saulo e mari sa 3
sa ki ekalesia, e do paki ekopu ni
sara nasuma, po do dosagi naanoai
maga go nagoroi maga po pitua ki
da paki nasuma ni navavaiana.
Go tea maga waina eu pei tea 4
taperaverakiana eu surata duaduru
po do dogorogo ki navasaana wia.
Go Filipo e siwo paki natokoana ni 5
Samaria pano, po dogorogo ki Kristo
paki da. Go taua maga ni naata 6
moli maga eudogoparati ki tea maga
waina Filipo e noa ra napopoda
sikai maau asa, ragi waina eu dogo,
po punusi navaivaiana maga waina
e mari ra. Nalakena naatana loa 7
maga eu dave meludua ki tea lapa
waina eu peani ra, eu pioso ki na
daleo kasua sikai: go tea surumate
lapa, go tea lapa waina eu pei pito,
eu pei tea maripauriana. Go na 8
laelaeaana warua e doko natokoana
wanogoe.
Ma naatamoli sikai e doko, nagi- 9
sana Simon, waina e mari nakikita
natokoana wanogoe sala vea, po
mari naka ni Samaria eu sarafna-
koto, e durnana noa naga nae e pei
te naata warua sikai; waina eu 10
mamau puti dogo parati ki nia, pae
tea kiki pa pa paki tea warua kaka-
da, eu naga, Naatmaoli waia e pei
nakasuaana ki Supe waina e pei tea
sosoana ki Tea Warua. Go eu dogo 11
parati ki nia, nalakena ragi varau e
mari ra eu saramakoto ki nakikita
aneana maga. Ma ragi waina eu 12
saralomau narogorogoana wia waina
Filipo e dogorogo ki nia nalo ni na
marakiana ki Supe go nagisa ni
Yesu Kristo, eu pei tea bapetizoana,
naanoai maga go nagoroi maga. Go 13
Simon nae ma e sara lomau : go ragi
waina e pei tea bapetizoana sua e do
sikoti Filipo pitipatipa: go ragi
waina e do leopunusi navaivaiana


maga go namariana kasua warua
maga waina eu do pei tea mariana,
e saramakoto.
14 Go ragi waina apostolo maga
waina eu doko Yerusalem eu dogo
naga Samaria e dape navasaana ki
Supe, eu dipakilua Petero go Yoane
15 ero pa punusi ra : go nara, ragi
waina ero siwo umai sua, ero made-
ada dapasavasa, naga euga tape
16 Naatana Tapu: nalakena eko da
lawo tea sikai kakada mau : eu pei
tea bapetizoana sikai maau paki
17 nagisa ni Nawota Yesu. Ragi wano-
goe ero pusake namelearuda ara, go
18 eu dape Naatana Tapu. Go ragi
waina Simon e punusi naga Naatana
Tapu e pei tea vituakiana pae na
vusakeana ni namelearu ni apostolo
maga, e sai ki mone paki da, po
19 naga, Koroga tua au naveina-
wotaana waia, naga naata waina aga
vusake namelearugu maga asa, ega
20 tape Naatana Tapu. Ma Petero e
noa ki nia, e naga, Silver anigo ega
sikoti ko paki namatepuoliana pano,
nalakena ku midoa ki nia naga pa
talua navituamolikiana ki Supe pae
21 mone. Ku da peani te matele kite
te gole ni naleo waia mau : nalakena
napopoma e da leana narae ni Supe
22 mau. Nalakena tea wanogoe pa
midoakidoa meludua ki nasigisigi-
leoana anigo waia, po dapasavasa
pavarani Yehovah, mase namidodo-
ana ni napopoma e pe wo manigo
23 pei tea midoakikorokoroana. Na
lakena a punusi naga ku doko na
kokonae ni nakokonaana go napu
24 ni namarinaleotageleana. Go Simon
e pasadara po naga, Nimu koroga
maginau dapasavasa pavara paki
Yehovah, naga tea maga waina ku
po noa ra sikai kakada ega ta
pakilina ki nau mau.
25 Nalakena tea wanogoe nara, ragi
waina ero noa sokisoki kasua sua po
pasa sua navasaana ki Yehovah, ero
liliu paki Yerusalem, po dogorogo ki
narogorogoana wia paki natokoana
kiki lapa ki naka ni Samaria.
Ma agelo ki Yehovah sikai e pasa 26
ki Eilipo, po naga, Pa tuleana, po
surata paki sauth pano paki napua
waina e pae Yerusalem siwo paki
Caza: napua wanogoe e pei maso-
palo. Go e duleana po surata pano :27
go kuga leo, naatamoli ni Ethiopia
sikai, atavau ni naveinawotaana
warua sikai ki Kandake, nawota
nagoroi ki naka ni Ethiopia, waina
e leo parati ki naloriki tauakiana
aneana maga mamau puti, waina e
umai paki Yerusalem naga ega lotu ;
go e moro do liliu po dasake kariot 28
aneana, go e do peve profeta Isaiah.
Go Naatana e noa ki Eilipo, e naga, 29
Pa vaki fnaladigi, po prduti kariot
waia. Go Eilipo e sava pano punusi 30
a, po dogo e e peve Isaiah profeta,
go e naga, Ku midoakiatae tea
waina ku peve a kite ? Go e naga, 31
Te naata sikai e pe ta maraki au
mau, a pe mariatae midoakiatae
dapale sava ? Go e pavarani Eilipo
naga ega vagi sake po dasake sikoti
a. Go matele ni navasaana midiri- 32
ana waina e peve a e pei tea
waia,
E pei tea viragiluaana dakiusi
shiip sikai paki namaripunue-
Go dakiusi waina shiip natuna
sikai e pusa narae ni tea waina
e alati a,
Dapala nogoe nae e punuta doko :
E pei tea tapeluaana pae narie- 33
sokiana go navasapotaeana:
Tagona aneana sei ega wo dogo-
rogo ki nia %
Nalakena namauriana aneana e
pei tea tapeluaana meludua ki
maramana.

naga, A pavarani ko, profeta e noa

atulake pae navasaana midiriana

36 nia. Go ragi waina eu do surata pae
napua eu rumai paki noai sikai ■; go

nasava e dugoro au naga aga ta pei
37 tea bapetizoana man % Go e dipa

dua siwo paki noai, Filipo go atavau:
38 go e bapetizo e. Go ragi waina ero

Yebovah e pualua Filipo ; go ata-

Matele 9.
1 Ma Saulo, waina e do maromaro ki
navasadipakotoviana go ki namari-
punueana dipa tea vasapiseikiana
2 maga ki Nawota, e pa punusi tea
viri warua liu, po datagovi a ki tusi
maga paki Damaseko paki nasuma
ni nasaisaiana maga, naga e pe vapai
te naata seara waina eu pei tea ni
Napua, te naanoai kite te nagoroi,
ega viragi ra euga vei tea soliana
3 umaipaki Yerusalem. Go ragi waina
e do surata, e pakilina naga e umai
paki maladigi ki Damaseko: go na
marama sikai waina e pae nakoro
atelagi umai e maraverave marama-
-4 laga dalivirigoro e: go e dowo paki
natano, po dogo nadeleo sikai waina
e noa ki nia, e naga, Saulo, Saulo,
5 ekasana ku kopalele au ? Go e naga,
Ku pei sei, Nawota ? Go nae e
naga, Kinau a pei Yesu waina nigo
6 ku kopalele asa : ma pa tuleana, po
paki natokoana, go ega wo pei tea
noaana paki-go tea waina e one ako
7 one naga pa mari a. Go naatamoli
maga waina eu surata sikoti a eu
lawodu punuta du, eu dogo nadaleo
wanogoe, ma eu da punusi te naata
mau. Go Saulo e duleana pae 8
natano, go ragi waina e leleo, e da
punusi te navatuna mau: go eu
puati namelearuna surata, po piragi
a umai paki Damaseko. Go e kesa 9
doko naaleatia dolu, po da ganikani
po da munu mau.
Go tea vasapiseikiana sikai e doko 10
Damaseko, nagisana Anania; go
Nawota e noa ki nia pae navunusi-
ana sikai, e naga, Anania. Go nae
e naga, Pa leo, kinau nea, Nawota.
Go Nawota e noa ki nia, e naga, Pa 11
tuleana, po surata paki napua waina
e pei tea sosoana ki Leana, po pusu-
usu nasuma ki Yuda ki naatamoli
sikai nagisana Saulo, tea ni Tarso:
nalakena pa leo, e dapasavasa;
go e po punusi naatamoli sikai na- 12
gisana Anania e umai paki ekopu,
po pusake namelearuna maga asa,
naga ega moro leo sai. Ma Anania 13
e pasadara, e naga, Nawota, a dogo
pae tea lapa nalo ni naatamoli
wanogoe, dapala waina e mari sa
parua ki tea tautau anigo maga
waina eu doko Yerusalem: go tokora 14
waia e peani naveinawotaana fnelu
tea viri warua maga naga ega soli
tea maga mamau puti waina eu pioso
paki nagisaina. Ma Nawota e noa ki 15
nia, e naga, Pa surata pano: nalake-
na e maginau pei lasa matadoaana
sikai, naga ega tapetape nagisagu
paki narae ni tea ni nalauna pota
maga go ni nawota maga, go ni
Israel natuna maga; nalakena 16
kinau aga wo pisei ki nia naleo
lapa waina e one asa one naga
ega sua ra nalakena nagisagu. Go
Anania e pano, po paki ekopu ni 17
nasuma wanogoe; go e pusake
namelearuna maga asa, po naga,
Taigu Saulo, Nawota, Yesu, waina e
pakilina ki-go napua waina ku pae
asa umai, e po dipakilua au umai
naga pa moro leosai, go naga pa vei
tea vakavuroana ki Naatana Tapu.


18 Go tea tapala namuna maga eu
maraverave dowo mein namatana
maga, go e moro leosai; go e dule-
ana po pei tea bapetizoana ; go e
ganikani po kasua.
19 Go e doko sikoti tea vasapiseiki-
ana maga waina eu doko Damaseko
20 naaleatia seara. Go e maraverave
dogorogo ki Yesu ekopu ni nasuma
ni nasaisaiana maga, naga e pei Supe
21 Natuna. Go tea maga mamau puti
waina eu dogo e eu saramakoto, po
naga, Tea waia e da pei tea waina e
marisa sa sa ki tea maga waina eu
pioso paki nagisa waia Yerusalem
kite? go e umai paki nea nalakena tea
waia, naga ega viragilua ra euga vei
tea soliana euga vaki narae ni tea
22 viri warua maga. Ma Saulo edo disu
parua ki nakasuaana, po marina
popo ni tea ni Yudea maga waina eu
doko Damaseko doko e pinovinoi, e
do noa saisai ki naga nae e pei
Kristo.
23 Go ragi waina naaleatia lapa eu
nopu, tea ni Yudea eu seke naga
24 euga mari punue a ; ma nasekeaha
adeada e pei tea ataeana paki Saulo.
Go eu pavaigoro namata pua maga
aleati go pogi naga euga maripunue
25 a : ma tea vasapiseikiana aneana
maga eu puati a pogi, po doro e
pakitano darave nakoro, eu doro e
pakitano doko nalasai sikai.
26 Go ragi waina e umai paki Yeru-
salem, e maridogo naga ega vuluti
tea vasapiseikiana maga: go eu
mamau puti matau ki nia, eu da
saralomau mau naga e pei tea vasa-
-27 piseikiana sikai. Ma Barnaba e
puati a, po piragi a umai punusi
apostolo maga, po dogorogo paki da
dapala waina e punusi Nawota
napua, go naga e pasa ki nia, go
dapala waina e piviari pasa pae
28 nagisa ni Yesu Damaseko. Go e
sikoti ra doko e do paki ekopu po
29 do paki katama Yerusalem, e do
piviari pasa pae nagisa ni Nawota;
go e pasa po pululu dipa tea ni
Yudea waina eu pasa pae Hellas ;
ma eu maridogo naga euga mari
punue a. Go ragi waina taigida 30
maga eu atae a, eu piragi a siwo paki
Kaisarea, po dipakilua e paki Tarso.
Raga wanogoe ekkalesia usura ki 31
Yudea mamau go Calilea go Samaria
eu peani natamateana, po pei tea
tavagiana : go eu surata namatau-
ki-Yeliovab-ana go navakavaka-
leana ki Naatana Tapu, po disu po
lapa.
Go e pakilina, ragi waina Petero e 32
do surata duaduru sara tokora, e
siwo umai punusi tea tautau maga
waina eu doko Lidda doko. Go e 33
papai naatamoli sikai tokora wano-
goe nagisana Ainea, waina e one
nawewele one natau latolu ; nala-
kena e pei tea sarumate. Go Petero 34
e noa ki nia, e naga, Ainea, Yesu
Kristo e maripauri ko : pa tuleana, 35
po pelesa ki nawewelema. Go e
duleana maraverave. Go tea maga
mamau puti waina eu doko Lidda
go Saron doko eu punusi a, go eu
madadoa paki Nawota.
Go tea vasapiseikiana nagoroi 36
sikai e doko Yoppa, nagisana Tabi-
tlia, waina e pei tea vasadoaana
sosoana ki Dorka : nagoroi wanogoe
e pura ki nawosiana wia maga go ki
navituamolikiana maga waina e
mari ra. Go e pakilina naaleatia 37
maga wanogoe, naga e sasana, po
mate : go ragi waina eu sarue sua e,
eu doropusi a e one ernago sikai ni
tagona ni elagi. Go nalakena Lidda 38
e pei fnaladigi ki Yoppa, go tea vasa-
piseikiana maga eu dogo naga
Petero e doko asa, eu dipakilua na
atafnoli dua ero pajmnusi a, po pa-
varani a, eu naga, Pa ta mari daliali
surata umai punusi garni mau. Go 39
Petero e duleana po surata sikoti ra
pano. Go ragi waina e umai, eu
piragi a sake paki ekopu ni effiago
ni tagona ni elagi: go nagoroi


malepu maga eu mamau puti lawodu
pisari a eu dagi, po pisei ki sugoro
maga go sugoro kovagoro maga
waina Dorka e do mari ra ragi waina
40 e sikoti ra doko. Ma Petero e mari
puti ra eu paki katama, po ditipatua,
po dapasavasa ; go e dumana doa e
paki napatokona, po naga, Tabitha,
pa tuleana. Go nae e leleo; go
ragi waina e punusi Petero e doko
41 leana. Go e dua e namelearuna, po
sike a ; go e soso tea tautau maga,
go nagoroi malepu maga, po mari a
42 e lawodu naraeda e mauri. Go tea
wanogoe e pei tea ataeana usura ki
Yoppa mamau ; go tea lapa eu sara-
-43 lomau Nawota. Go e pakilina, naga
e doko Yoppa doko naaleatia lapa
sikoti te Simon sikai tea wosiwosi
nawili maga.
Matele 10.
1 Go te naatamoli sikai e doko
Kaisarea, nagisana Kornelio, sentu-
rio sikai ni taua ni naatamoli maga
ni navakalo, waina e pei tea sosoana
2 ki taua ni Italia, tea lotu pia sikai,
po matau ki Supe nara ma nasuma
mamau aneana eu mamau, waina e
magi narei mari navituamolikiana
lapa, po dapasavasa ki Supe sara
3 ragi. E punusi pae navunusiana
marama sikai, e alagoro pei aura
keloveti ni naaleatia, agelo ki Supe
sikai waina e umai paki ekopu
punusi a, po noa ki nia, Kornelio.
4 Go nae e leo soki a, go e mataku,
po naga, E pei nasava, nawota ?
Go e noa ki nia, Natapasavasaana
anigo maga go navituamolikiana
anigo maga eu sake paki narae ni
Supe naga pa vei tea midoakiana
5 ara. Go ragi waia pa tipakilua
naatamoli seara euga vaki Yoppa,
po pitautau te Simon sikai waina e
6 pei tea sosoana ki Petero : nae e
menaki sikoti te Simon sikai tea
wosiwosi ki nawili maga, waina
nasuma aneana e doko pisari natasi.
Go ragi waina agelo waina e pasa ki 7
nia e pano, e soso tea suasua maga
ni nasuma aneana edua kakada, go
naatamoli ni navakalo lotu pia sikai
ni tea maga waina eu do doko
raki nia pitipatipa ; go e dogorogo 8
paki da ki naleo maga mamau puti,
' po dipakilua ra paki Yoppa pano.
Go matamai ki nia, ragi waina 9
nara eu surata napua, po umai paki
maladigi ki natokoana, Petero e sake
paki napau ni nasuma naga ega
tapasavasa, e alagoro pei aura ke-
latesa: go epo pitolo, po masauna 10
naga ega kanikani; ma ragi waina eu
do marimata ki navinaga, nasarama-
kotoana sikai e pakilina ki nia; go ell
leopunusi nakoroatelagi e pa ma-
wota, go te lasa sikai e siwo, e dapala
nakulukulu welewelea warua sikai,
waina e pei tea toroana ki namata-
pagona pati paki maramana : waina 12
sara naleo visarasara eu doko asa,
tea tua vati maga go tea kakaravi
maga ni maramana go manu maga
ni nakoroatelagi. Go nadaleo sikai 13
e umai paki nia, e naga, Pa tuleana,
Petero ; pa maripunue po ganikani.
Ma Petero e naga, Ee, Nawota; 14
nalakena a ko da gani te navatuna
waina e pei tea fnoli go tea loa te
naaleatia mau. Go nadaleo sikai el 5
moro umai paki nia sala kerua, e
naga, Tea waina Supe e mari a
e dautau, nigo pa ta mari a e pei tea
nioli mau. Go tea wanogoe e pei 16
tea mariana paka tolu: go lasa
wanogoe e maraverave pei tea tape-
ana sake paki nakoroatelagi pano.
Go ragi waina Petero e midoaki- 17
putuaki parua napalauna, navunu-
siana waina e punusi a ega vei
nasava ? kuga leo, naatamoli maga
waina eu pei tea tipakiluana pae

ki Simon, go eu lawodu narae ni
namata pua, po pioso po pusuusu 18
ki Simon waina e pei tea sosoana


ki Petero, e menaki tokora waia
19 kite ? Go ragi waina Petero edo
midoa ki navunusiana wanogoe,
Naatana e noa ki nia, e naga, Pa leo,
20 naatamoli dolu eu laga ako. Ma pa
tuleana, po siwo, po surata sikoti ra
pano, po da midoakisara man : nala-
kena kinau a po dipakilua ra umai.
21 Go Petero e siwo punusi naatamoli
maga wanogoe, po naga, Kuga leo,
kinau a pei tea waina ku laga asa:
nasava e pei nalakena ku po umai
22 asa ? Go nara eu naga, Kornelio
senturio sikai, naatamoli leana go
waina e matau ki Supe, go waina e
pei tea noasokisokiana pae nalauna
mamau ki naka ni Yudea, Supe e

aneana, go naga ega rogo navasa-
-23 ana maga kiama. Nalakena tea
wanogoe e soso ra paki ekopu po
dua ra namenakiana.

dave sikoti ra pano, go taigida maga
ni Yoppa seara kakada eu mamau
24 pano. Go matamai ki nia eu sili
Kaisarea. Go Kornelio edo leogoro
ra, e soso saisai ki sua namatarau

25 Go ragi waina Petero e paki ekopu,
Kornelio e sua e, po dowo paki
26 namelena maga po lotu ki nia. Ma
Petero e sike a, po naga, Pa tuleana;
27 kinau ma a pei naatamoli sikai. Go
ragi waina ero dumara pasa ki da,
e paki ekopu, po papai tea lapa
waina eu saisai doko : go e noa ki
28 da, Nimu ku dumamu atae naga
naatamoli ni Yudea sikai e pe
ta puluti kite umai punusi tea ni
nalauna pota mau ; go Supe e pisei
ki nau naga aga ta soso te naatamoli
sikai ki tea moli kite ki tea loa mau ;
29 nalakena tea wanogoe a suasua umai
ragi waina a pei tea vitautauana.
Nalakena tea wanogoe a pusuusu ki
tea waina e pei nalakena ku pitau-
-30 tau au umai. Go Kornelio e naga,
Namogi pati, pa pa paki aura waia, a
do dapasavasa aura keloveti nasuina
aginau ; go pa leo, naatamoli sikai
e lawodu naraegu waina e suni sugoro
marama laga, po naga, Kornelio, 31
natapasavasaana anigo e pei tea
rogoana, go navituainolikiana anigo
maga eu pei tea midoakiana namata
ni Supe. Nalakena tea wanogoe pa 32
tipakilua paki Yoppa, po soso
Simon, waina e pei tea sosoana ki
Petero, ega umai punusi ko; nae
e menaki nasuina ki Simon tea
wosiwosi ki nawili maga, pisari
natasi. Nalakena tea wanogoe a 33
maraverave dipakilua punusi ko, go
nigo ku mari pia naga ku umai.
Nalakena tea wanogoe ragi waia au
mamau puti doko nea namata ni
Supe, naga auga rogo naleo maga
mamau puti waina eu pei tea tipa-
kiana paki-go pae Yehovak. Go 34
Petero e pologati nawokana, po
naga,
A midoakiatae lomau naga Supe
e da pei tea viragi narae mau: ma 35
sara nalauna naata waina e matau
ki nia, po mari namarinaleoleana-
ana, e pei tea viragiana aneana.
Navasaana waina e dipakilua e dua 36
Israel natuna maga asa, po dogorogo
ki narogorogoana wia ni natamate-
ana pae Yesu Kristo (nae e pei
Nawota ki tea maga mamau puti)—
nanoaana wanogoe nimu ku du- 37
mamu atae a, waina e pei tea rogo-
rogokiana usuraki Yudea mamau, e
atulakena pae Calilea, edaku ki
nabapetizoana waina Yoane e dogo-
rogo kinia; Yesu ni Nazareth, dapala 38
waina Supe e puvurai ki nia ki
Naatana Tapu go ki nakasuaana;
waina e surata duaduru po do mari-
ihataki, po do maripauri tea maga
mamau puti waina eu pei tea mari-
matuakiana pae diabolo ; nalakena
Supe e sikoti a doko. Go kinami 39
au pei tea noasokisoki maga ni tea
maga mamau puti waina e mari ra


navanua ki naka ni Yudea, go
Yerusalem ; go waina eu maripunue
40 a, eu sara ki nia nakau. Nae wano-
goe Supe e sike a e duleana naaleatia
ketolu, po pitua ki nia naga ega
41 vakilina, e da pakilina ki narei
mamau mau, ma e pakilina ki tea
noasokisoki seara waina eu pei tea
vea matadoaana pae Supe, kinami,
waina au ganikani po munu sikoti
a edaku ki e duleana fneludua ki tea
42 mate maga. Go e dipa ki garni naga
auga dogorogo paki narei, po noa-
sokisoki kasua naga nae e pei tea
waina e pei tea tawanakiana pae
Supe naga ega vei Tea Vasapotae
ni tea mauri go tea mate maga.
43 Nae wanogoe profeta maga mamau
puti eu maneana noasokisoki, naga
sara naata waina eu saralomau asa
euga wo dape namidoakikorokoro-
ana ni namarinaleosaana maga
pae nagisana.
44 Eagi waina Petero eko do pasa
navasaana maga wanogoe, Naatana
Tapu e lawo tea maga mamau puti
45 waina eu dogo navasaana. Go tea
ni natovadaviviana maga waina eu
saralomau eu saramakoto, tea maga
waina eu sikoti Petero umai, nala-
kena navituamolikiana ni Naatana
Tapu e pei tea takiana paki tea ni
46 nalauna pota maga. Nalakena eu
dogo ra eu pasa ki namena maga, po
47 pasasamasamani Supe. Eagi wano-
goe Petero e pasadara, e naga, Te
naata sikai e mariatae dipagoro noai
naga nara euga ta pei tea bapetizo-
ana mau, waina eu po dape Naatana
Tapu, dakiusi waina kinami ma au
48 dape a kite ? Go e dipa ki ra naga
euga vei tea bapetizoana pae nagisa
ni Yesu Kristo. Eagi wanogoe eu
pavarani a naga ega toko naaleatia
Matele 11.
1 Goapostolomagagotaigidamaga
waina eu doko Yudea doko eu dogo
naga tea ni nalauna pota maga eu
dape navasaana ki Supe. Go ragi 2
waina Petero e sake umai paki
Yerusalem, tea ni natovadaviviana
maga eu pululu ki nia, po naga, Ku 3
paki ekopu punusi naatamoli maga
waina eu da pei tea tovadaviviana
mau, go ku ganikani sikoti ra. Ma 4
Petero e atulake, po pasa lawolawo
ki nia paki da, po naga, Kinau a doko 5
natokoana ni Yoppa po dapasa-
vasa; go a saramakoto po punusi na
vunusiana sikai, te lasa sikai e siwo,
e dakiusi nakulukulu welewelea
warua sikai waina e pei tea toroana
ki namatapagona pati pae nakoro-
atelagi pakitano; go e umai paki
nau ; go ragi waina e leosoki a, a 6
leousiusi, po punusi tea tua vati
maga ni maramana go tea mila maga
go tea kakaravi maga go manu maga
ni nakoroatelagi. Go a dogo na 7
daleo sikai waina e noa ki nau, Pa
tuleana, Petero ; pa mari punue po
ganikani. Ma kinau a naga, Ee, 8
Nawota; nalakena te navatuna
waina e pei tea inoli kite tea loa e
ko da sili paki nawokagu te naaleatia
mau. Ma nadaleo sikai e pasadara 9
sala kerua pae nakoroatelagi, e naga,
Tea waina Supe e mari a e dautau,
nigo pa ta mari a e pei tea rnoli mau.
Go tea wanogoe e pei tea mariana 10
paka tolu ; go tea maga mamau
puti eu moro pei tea vuatiana sake
paki nakoroatelagi pano. Go Kuga 11
leo, naatamoli dolu eu maraverave
lawodu narae ni nasuina waina au
doko asa, eu pei tea tipakiluaana pae
Kaisarea umai punusi au. Go Na 12
atana e noa ki nau naga aga sikoti ra
pano, po da mari potawotae mau.
Go taigida latesa waia eu sikoti au
pano ; go au paki ekopu ni nasuina
ki naatamoli wanogoe : go e dogo- 13
rogo paki garni ki dapala waina e
punusi agelo e lawodu ekopu ni
nasuina aneana, po naga, Pa tipa-
kilua paki Yoppa, po pitautau


Simon waina e pei tea sosoana ki
14 Petero ; waina ega wo pasa paki-go
navasaana maga waina pa wo pei
tea mautipauriana asa, nimu ma
15 nasuma mamau anigo. Go ragi
waina, kinau a atulake navasaana,
Naatana Tapu e lawo ara, dakiusi
waina e lawo gida ragi ni naatulake-
-16 ana. Go a midoa ki navasaana ki
Nawota, dapala waina e naga, Yoane
e bapetizo lomau ki noai; ma nimu
kuga wo pei tea bapetizoana ki
17 Naatana Tapu. Go Supe epe tua
ra navituamolikiana e pe vataka
m tea waina e dua gida asa, ragi
waina tu saralomau Nawota Yesu
Kristo, kinau a pe vei sei naga
e pe mari atae dugoro Supe ?
18 Go ragi waina eu dogo tea maga
wanogoe, eu punuta, po pasasa-
masamani Supe, po naga, Go
Supe e dua tea ni nalauna pota
maga namidoakidoaana paki na
mauriana.
19 Go tea maga waina eu pei tea
taperaverakiana nalakena nariesoki-
ana waina e pakilina nalo ni Stefano
eu surata duaduru pa pa paki
Foinike, go Kupero, go Antiokia, eu
do pasa navasaana paki tea .ni
20 Yudea eu sikida. Ma seara kakada
eu pei naatamoli ni Kupero go ni
Kurene, go ragi waina eu rumai paki
Antiokia, eu pasa paki naka ni
Hellas, po dogorogo ki Nawota
21 Yesu. Go namelearu ni Nawota e
sikoti ra doko : go taua warua sikai
waina eu saralomau eu madadoa
22 paki Nawota. Go navasaana nalo
kakada e pei tea rogoana pa pa paki
nadaliga maga ni ekkalesia waina eu
doko Yerusalem; go eu dipakilua
Barnaba naga ega surata pano pa
23 pa paki Antiokia: go nae, ragi
waina e umai, po punusi nasaupia-
ana ki Supe, e laelaea; go e pasa
parati ki puti ra, naga euga vuluti
Nawota ki namidoakisokiana ni na
24 popoda : nalakena e pei naatamoli
wia sikai, po pura ki Naatana Tapu
go nasaralomauana : go tana wa-
rua sikai ni naatamoli maga eu
sokari Nawota. Go e surata paid 25
Tarso pano naga ega laga Saulo : go
ragi waina e papai a, e piragi a umai
paid Antiolda. Go e pakilina, naga 26
ero do saisai sikoti ekkalesia natau
mamau sikai po pasapisei ki taua
warua sikai ni naatamoli maga : go
tea vasapiseikiana maga eu pea pei .
tea sosoana ki Kristiano maga
Antiolda.
Go naaleatia maga wanogoe pro- 27
feta seara eu pae Yerusalem siwo
umai paki Antiokia. Go sikai kaka- 28
da e duleana, nagisana Acabo, po
paivai pae Naatana naga navitolo-
ana warua sikai e one asa one naga
ega wo doko usura Id maramana
mamau : waina e pakilina naaleatia
maga ki Klaudio. Go tea vasapisei- 29
kiana maga eu midoakidawanaki
naga euga mamau puti, ega takiusi
waina sara naata kakada eu peani
a, dipakilua nasilaeana dua taida
maga asa waina eu doko Yudea
doko : go eu mari a, eu dipakilua e 30
paki tea matua maga pae namelearu
ni Barnaba go Saulo.
Matele 12.
Go ragi wanogoe Herod nawota 1
e nadi ki namelearuna maga tea ni
ekkalesia seara kakada naga ega mari
sa ki da. Go e maripunue Yakobo 2
tai ni Yoane ki lova. Go ragi waina 3
e punusi naga e pia namata ni tea
ni Yudea, e sokari a po puasoki
PeterO. Go e pei naaleatia maga ni
bred waina leven e dika asa. Go ragi 4
waina e puasoki a, e doropusi a e
doko nasuma ni navavaiana, po
pitua ki nia paki tea ni navakalo eu
pati pa kavati naga euga vavaigoro
e; e midoa ki nia naga ragi waina
navakalauana ega nop.u ega wo
piragi a sake punusi narei. Nalakena 5


tea wanogoe Petero e pei tea vavai-
goroana ekopu ni nasuma ni nava-
vaiana : ma ekkalesia eu do mane-
6 ana dapasavasa kasua paki Supe. Go
ragi waina Herod e naga ega viragi
a dave, napogiana wanogoe Petero
e do maturu namawota ni tea ni
navakalo edua, e pei tea soliana ki
namori ni vatu edua : go tea vavai
maga narae ni namata ero do pavai-
-7 goro nasuma ni navavaiana. Go
kuga leo, agelo ki Yehovah sikai e
lawodu pisari a, go namarama sikai
e marama laga efnago ; go e poka
navidi ni Petero, po pulevule a, po
naga, Pa tuleana inaraverave. Go
namori ni vatu kakana maga ero
dowo marua ki namelearuna maga.
8 Go agelo wanogoe e noa ki nia, fa
tumafna dasoki ko, po otisoki na
melevasiana anigo maga. Go e mari
dapala nogoe. Go e noa ki nia, fa
sawa ki sugoro anigo ega taliviri-
-9 goro ko, go pa dausi au. Go e dave,
po dausi; go eda atae naga tea waina
e pei tea mariana pae agelo wanogoe
e pei lomau mau, ma e midoa ki nia
naga e punusi navunusiana sikai.
10 Go ragi waina ero surata duaduru
sua tea vavai vea go kerua, ero umai
paki namata pua ni vatu waina e
piragi paki natokoana; waina e
durnana madeada polagati a; go ero
dave pano, po surata pae napua
sikai; go agelo wanogoe e meludua
11 ki nia pano inaraverave. Go ragi
waina Petero e midodoa pia, e naga,
Ragi waia a atae lomau, naga Nawo-
ta e po dipakilua agelo aneana umai
po pualua au meludua ki nafnele-
aru ni Herod, go ki naleogoroana
mamau ki narei ni naka ni Yudea.
12 Go ragi waina e midoa ki sua e, e
umai paki nasuma ki Maria pila
ni Yoane waina e pei tea sosoana
ki Marko; tokora waina tea lapa
eu pei tea saisaikiana asa po do
13 dapasavasa. Go ragi waina e poka-
woka namata ni namata pua, na
goroi atara sikai e umai naga ega
takidorogo, nagisana Roda. Go M
ragi waina e dogoatae nadaleo ni
Petero, e da polagati namata pua
mau nalakena nalaelaeana, ma e
sava paki ekopu, po dogorogo naga
Petero e lawodu narae ni namata
pua. Go eu noa ki nia, Ku dara-15
tara. Ma e noa sokisoki kasua naga
e dapala nogoe. Go eu naga, E pei
agelo aneana. Ma Petero e do 16
pokawoka doko : go ragi waina eu
polagati sua, eu punusi a, po sara-
inakoto. Ma e alosoki paki da ki 17
namelearuna naga euga vunuta, go
e dogorogo paki da ki dapala waina
Nawota e piragi a dave meludua ki
nasuma ni navavaiana. Go e naga,
Kuga rogorogo ki tea maga wanogoe
paki Yakobo, go paki taigida maga.
Go e dave pano po paki tokora pota
pano. Go ragi waina e pei aleati, 18
namanaunauana e da kiki mau e
doko maleoputo ni tea ni navakalo
maga, eu naga Petero wai ? Go ragi 19
waina Herod e pusuusu ki nia, po
da papai a mau, e puausi tea vavai
maga, po pitipaki naga euga vei tea
viragiluaana paki namateana pano.
Gq e pae Yudea siwo paki Kaisarea
pano, po doko asa doko.
Go e maeto parua ki naka ni Tair 20
go Sidon: go eu rumai punusi ana
popoda e sikai maau asa, go eu pitua-
dua Blasto, tea suasua ni emago ni
namaturuana ki nawota, po datago
natamateana, nalakena navanua
adeada e pei tea vaganiana pae
navanua ki nawota. Go naaleatia 21
tatutakiana sikai Herod e suni
sugoro ki nawota, po dasake malo
tasake ni elagi, po pasa paki da.
Go narei eu pioso, po naga, Nadaleo 22
ni supe sikai, e da pei nadaleo ni
naatamoli sikai mau. Go agelo ki 23
Yebovab sikai e atugi a inaraverave,
nalakena e da dua Supe nasamasa-
maana mau: go e pei tea kaniana ki
ula maga, po maro dua ki namerona.


24 Ma navasaana ki Supe edo disu
po parua po lapa.
25 Go Barnaba go Saulo ero liliu pae
Yerusalem, ragi waina ero mari sua
nasuasuaana adeada,po piragi Yoane
sikoti ra waina e pei tea sosoana
ki Marko.
Matele 13,
1 Go profeta seara go tea vasapi-
seiki seara eu doko Antiokia, tea ni
ekkalesia kakana, Barnaba, go Sime-
on waina e pei tea sosoana ki Nicer,
go Lukio ni Kurene, go Manaen
waina e pei tea vakaleana sikoti
2 Herod tetrarke, go Saulo. Go ragi
waina eu magi Yebovab suasua, po
pali, Naatana Tapu e naga, Kuga
maginau marimasale ki Barnaba go
Saulo raid nawosiana waina a soso
3ra paki asa. Ragi wanogoe, ragi
waina eu pali po dapasavasa sua po
pusake sua nainelearuda ara, eu
dipakilua ra.
4 Dapala nogoe nara, waina ero pei
tea tipakiluaana pae Naatana Tapu,
ero siwo paki Seleukia pano ; go ero
porau pae tokora wanogoe paki
5 Kupero pano. Go ragi waina ero
doko Salami, ero dogorogo ki nava-
saana ki Supe ekopu ni nasuina ni
nasaisaiana maga ki tea ni Yudea :
go ero peani Yoane e pei tasiga
6 adeada. Go ragi waina ero surata
duaduru sua naure mamau paki
Pafo pano, ero papal naatainoli
sikai waina e pei munuai, profeta
sorosoro sikai, tea ni Yudea, nagi-
-7 sana Bar-Yesu ; waina e sikoti tea
maramara doko, Sercio Paulo, na
atainoli midoakiatae sikai. Nae e
soso Barnaba go Saulo ero umai
punusi a, po masauna naga ega rogo
8 navasaana ki Supe. Ma Elima
munuai wanogoe (nalakena nagi-
sana e pei tea vasadoaana dapala
nogoe) e lawo dugoro ra, e laga naga
ega vuadoa tea maramara padua ki
nasaralomauana. Ma Saulo, waina 9
ma e pei Paulo, e pei tea vakavuro-
ana ki Naatana Tapu, po leosoki a,
po naga, Tea vura kisara nasorosoro- 10
ana go sara nasigisigileoana, natu ni
diabolo, tea kokona ki sara namari-
naleoleanaana, pa wo da makoto
ki navuadoaana ni napua leana
maga ki Yehovah kite ? Go pa leo, 11
ragi waia nainelearu ni Yebovab e
doko ako, go pa wo kesa, pa wo da
punusi elo mau pa pa paki te ragi.
Go namavu sikai go namaligo sikai
ero dowo asa fnaraverave; go e
surata daliepu, e laga te seara waina
euga vuati namelearuna pano. Ragi 12
wanogoe tea maramara, ragi waina
e punusi tea waina e pei tea mariana,
e saralomau, e saramakoto navasa-
piseikiana ki Yebovab.
Go Paulo go tea maga waina eu 13
sikoti a doko eu porau pae Pafo po
umai paki Perea ni Pamfilia : go
Yoane e meludua ki da pano, po
liliu umai paki Yerusalem. Ma 14
nara, eu surata duaduru pae Perea,
po umai paki Antikoia ni Pisidia;
go ero paki ekopu ni nasunia ni
nasaisaiana naaleatia ni sabbatb, po
do natano. Go edaku ki naveveana 15
ni nawotaeana go profeta maga tea
maraki maga ni nasuina ni nasaisai-
ana eu dipakilua pa punusi ra, po
naga, Taigami maga, koro pe veani
te navasaana ni navasaparatikiana
paki narei, koroga noa e. Go Paulo 16
e duleana, po alosoki ki namelearuna
po naga,
Naatainoli ni Israel maga, go tea
maga waina ku matau ki Supe, kuga
takidorogo. Supe ki narei ni Israel 17
waia, e matadoa tamagida maga, po
sike narei eu pakilagi ragi waina eu
menaki-atatoko navanua ni Ityipt,
go e piragilua ra ki am sikeana sikai
meludua ki nia pano. Go e dape- 18
tape pakale ra ragi ni natau eu
alagoro pei rualima pati masopalo.
Go ragi waina e mari matua ki sua 19


nalauna larua navamia ni Kanaan,
e dua ra navamia adeada naga
euga veani a, e alagoro pei natau
ponotia pati rualima takuna lima :
20 go edaku Id tea maga wanogoe e dua
ra tea vasapotae maga pa pa paki
21 Samuel profeta. Go eu edaku da-
tago nawota sikai; go Supe e dua
ra Saulo natu ni Kish, naataiholi
sikai ni naworawora ni Benyamin,
22 natau rualima pati. Go ragi waina
e dapelua sua e, e mari David e
pakilina naga ega vei nawota ade-
ada ; waina e maneana noasokisoki,
po naga, A papai David natu ni
Yesse, naatamoli sikai waina e pae
napopogu, waina ega wo mari nama-
-23 sauana aginau mamau puti. Naata
iholi wanogoe naworaworana Supe e
piragi sikai kakada pae nasaiana e
magi Israel pei Tea Maumau pauri,
24 Yesu ; ragi waina eko da umai mau
Yoane e pea dogorogo ki nabape-
tizoana ni namidoakidoaana paki
25 narei ni Israel mamau. Go ragi
waina Yoane e do pakavuro nasava-
ana ni namalopa aneana, e naga,
Ku midoa ki nia naga kinau a pei
nasava ? Kinau ada pei nae mau.
Ma kuga leo, tea sikai e umai edaku
ki nau, waina a da pia mau naga aga
veresi namelevasiana ni nainelena
26 maga. Taigu maga, naworawora ni
Abraham natuda maga, go tea maga
waina eu sari mu waina eu matau ki
Supe, navasaana ni namautipauri-
ana waia e manigida pei tea tipaki-
-27 luaana umai. Nalakena tea maga
waina eu doko Yerusalem doko, go
tea maraki adeada maga, nalakena
eu da atae a mau, eu dipakotovi a,
po mari nadaleo ni profeta maga
waina eu pei tea veveana sara sab-
-28 bath eu lolomana. Go eu da papai te
nalakena ni namateana asa mau, ma
eu datagovi Pilato naga ega vei tea
29 maripunueana. Go ragi waina eu
mari sua tea maga mamau puti
waina eu pei tea midiriana nalo
kakana, eu dape a e siwo meludua ki
nakau, po doropusi a e one matigo
sikai. Ma Supe e sike a e duleana 30
meludua ki tea mate maga : go e3l
pakilina naaleatia lapa ki tea maga
waina eu sake sikoti a pae Calilea
umai paki Yerusalem, waina eu
pei tea noasokisoki aneana maga
paki narei ragi waia. Go kinami 32
aro dogorogo paki mu ki narogo-
rogoana wia ni nasaiana waina e pei
tea mariana paki tamagida maga,
naga Supe e magi natugida maga 33
mari a e lolomana, e sike Yesu e
duleana; dakiusi waina e pei tea
midiriana Salamo kerua, Nigo ku
pei Natugu, kinau a pesi ko masoso.
Go nalo ni waina e sike a e duleana 34
meludua ki tea mate maga, naga ega
wo da moro liliu paki namesoana
mau, e noa dapala waia, e naga, Aga
wo dua mu tea tautau maga go tea
lomau maga ki David. Nalakena e 35
moro noa doko Salamo pota sikai,
Pa wo da pitua ki Tea Tautau anigo
naga ega vunusi namesoana mau.
Nalakena David, ragi waina e magi 36
tagona aneana suasua sua ki nami-
doakipotaeana ki Supe, e maturu,
po pei tea toropusiana sikoti tamana
maga,popunusi namesoana: ma tea 37
waina Supe e sike a e duleana e da
punusi namesoana mau. Nalakena 38
tea wanogoe, taigu maga, ega vei tea
ataeana paki mu, naga namidoaki-
korokoroana ni namarinaleosaana
maga pae naatamoli wanogoe e pei
tea rogorogokiana paki mu : go sara 39
naata waina eu saralomau eu pei tea
marileanakiana pae asa meludua ki
naleo maga mamau puti, waina ku
mari sa pei tea marileanakiana
meludua ki da pae nawotaeana ki
Moses. Nalakena tea wanogoe kuga 40
vunusi, naga tea waina e pei tea
noaana tusi ki profeta maga, ega
ta pakilina ki mu mau ;
Kuga leo, tea midoakipalo maga, 41
go kuga maga, po puoli;


Nalakena kinau a posiwosi ki na
wosiana sikai naaleatia animu
maga,
Na wosiana sikai waina te naata e
pe rogorogo ki nia paki mu, ku
pe ta saralomau asa mau.
42 Go ragi waina ero do dave pano,
eu pavara naga navasaana maga
wanogoe ega vei tea vasaana paki
43 da sabbath mogi larua. Go ragi
waina nasaisaiana e peravera, tea
ni Yudea maga go proseluto lotu pia
maga tea lapa kakada eu dausi
Paulo. go Barnaba : waina ero do
pasa ki da, po pasadie ra naga euga
toko nasaupiaana ki Supe doko.
44 Go sabbath waina e dausi ana
tokoana wanogoe maladigi mamau
eu pei tea saisaikiana naga euga rogo
45 navasaana ki Supe. Ma ragi waina
tea ni Yudea eu punusi taua maga
ni naatainoli maga, eu pei tea vaka-
vuroana ki naroitoiana, po pasa
dugoro tea maga waina eu pei tea
46 vasaana pae Paulo, po pasasaki. Go
Paulo go Barnaba ero pasa piviari,
po naga, E one asa one naga navasa-
ana ki Supe ega vei tea vasaana
pea paki mu. Ma nalakena ku
dipadoa e, po dumamu pasapotae
mu naga ku da pia ki namauriana
waina e du mau du mau, kuga leo,
au maradoa paki tea ni nalauna pota
47 maga. Nalakena Yehovah e dipa
ki garni dapala nogoe, e naga,
A lawo ki-go naga pa vei na
marama agi tea ni nalauna
pota maga,
Naga pa vei namautipauriana pa
pa paki namata pago ni mara-
mana.
48 Go ragi waina tea ni nalauna pota
maga eu dogo tea wanogoa, eu lae-
laea, po pasasamasamani navasaana
ki Supe : go tea maga waina eu pei
tea tawanakiana paki namauriana
waina e du mau du eu saralomau.
49 Go navasaana ki Nawota e sokapule
usura ki navanua wanogoe mamau.
Ma tea ni Yudea eu pasadie nago- 50
roi lotu pia tea dodomadaganiana
maga, go naanoai yea maga ni na
tokoana po sike nakopaleleana sikai
dipa Paulo go Barnaba, po nadi ki
da ero meludua ki navanua adeada
pano. Ma ero meseura ki namota- 51
mota ni nameleda dipa ra po umai
paki Ikonio. Go tea vasapiseikiana 52
maga eu pei tea vakavuroana ki
nalaelaeaana go ki Naatana Tapu.
Matele 14.
Go e pakilina ragi waina ero doko 1
Ikonio naga ero dua paki ekopu ni
nasuma ni nasaisaiana ki tea ni
Yudea, po pasa dapala waina taua
warua sikai ni tea ni Yudea go ni
Hellas eu saralomau. Ma tea ni 2
Yudea waina eu da saralomau mau
eu sike naata maga ni tea ni nalauna
pota maga, po mari ra eu kokona ki
taigida maga. Nalakena tea wanogoe 3
ero doko parau doko tokora wanogoe,
po pasa piviari doko Nawota, waina
e magi navasaana ni nasaupiaana
aneana noasokisoki, e pitua ki na
vaivaiana maga go tea ni namaga-
ana maga naga euga vei tea mari-
ana pae namelearuda maga. Ma 4
taua ni naatainoli maga ni natoko-
ana wanogoe eu pei tea wotaeana;
go te seara eu sikoti tea ni Yudea,
go te seara eu sikoti apostolo maga.
Ma ragi waina nasavaumaiana sikai 5
ki tea ni nalauna pota maga go ki
tea ni Yudea maga nara ma tea
maraki adeada maga e paki lina,
naga euga mari sa ki da po nadi ra
ki vatu maga, ero atae a, po sava 6
paki natokoana maga ni Likaonia,
Listra go Derbe, go navanua waina
e one dahviri: go tokora wanogoe 7
ero dogorogo ki narogorogoana wia
asa..
Go naatainoli sikai e do natano 8
Listra, waina nafrielena maga ero
manainai, e pei pito pae napele ni


pilana, waina e da surata te naale-
-9 atia mau. Nae e dogo Paulo e do
pasa ; waiua e leo soki a, po punusi
naga e peani nasaralomauana naga
10 ega vea tea maripauriana, go e noa
ki nadaleo kasua sikai, e naga, Pa
tuleana du namelema maga. Go e
11 soka midi duleana po surata. Go
ragi waina taua ni naatainoli maga
eu punusi tea waina Paulo e mari a,
eu sike nadaleoda, po noa pae na
vasaana ni Likaonia, eu naga, Supe
maga eu po suruoli naatainoli maga
12 po siwo umai punusi gida. Go eu
soso Barnaba, ki Yupiter ; go Paul,
ki Merkurio, nalakena nae e pei tea
13 maraki ni navasaana. Go tea viri
ki Yupiter waina nasuma tapu
aneana e doko kivea ki natokoana,
e puati ox seara go vauvau seara
umai paki namata pua maga, po
masauna naga nara ma taua maga
ni naatainoli maga euga mari
14 naviriana. Ma ragi waina apostolo
maga, Barnaba go Paulo, ero dogo
e, ero pua porae sugoro adeada
maga, po soka midi dave paki male-
oputo ni taua ni natamoli maga,
15 ero pioso po naga, Mariki maga,
ekasana ku mari tea waia ? Kinami
ma aro pei naatainoli waina aro sua
narogoana maga dakiusi mu, go au
dogorogo paki mu ki narogorogoana
wia, naga kuga madadoa iiieludua ki
tea palo maga waia paki Supe mauri,
waina e mari nakoroatelagi go mara-
mana go natasi, go tea maga mamau
16 puti waina eu doko ara : waina ragi
ni tagona maga waina eu pano e
suasua ki nalauna maga mamau
puti naga euga surata napua adeada
17 maga. Ma e da dmuana doropusi
a naga ega tika nanoasokisokiana
mau, e do marifnataki, po do dua
mu usa maga pae nakoroatelagi umai
go ragi maga ni namasu warua, po
pakavuro napopomu ki navinaga go
18 ki nalaelaeana. Go ero noa tea
maga wanogoe po maladigi mari sa
atugoro taua maga ni natamoli maga
naga euga ta mari naviriana paki da
mau.
Ma tea ni Yudea seara eu pae 19
Antiokia go Ikonio umai: go eu
pasa die taua maga ni naatainoli
maga, po nadi Paulo ki vatu maga,
po dosagi a paki etaku ni natokoana,
eu midoa ki nia naga e mate. Ma 20
ragi waina tea vasapiseikiana maga
eu lawodu dalivirigoro e, e duleana
po sili paki natokoana pano : go
matamai ki nia nara ma Barnaba
ero paki Derbe pano. Go ragi 21
waina ero dogorogo ki' sua narogo-
rogoana wia paki natokoana wano-
goe, po mari sua tea vasapiseikiana
lapa, ero liliu paki Listra, go paki
Ikonio, go paki Antiokia, ero do lawo 22
soki naata maga ni tea vasapiseiki-
ana maga, ero do pasa parati ki da
naga euga toko nasaralomauana
doko, go naga waina e one gida one
naga tuga vae nariesokiana lapa po
sili paki namarakiana ki Supe. Go 23
ragi waina ero madeada pasadawana
ki sua tea matua seara sara ekka-
lesia, po dapasavasa po pali sua, ero
pitua ki da paki Nawota, waina eu
sara lomau sua asa. Go ero surata 24
duaduru Pisidia, po umai paki
Pamfilia. Go ragi waina ero pasa 25
sua navasaana Perea, ero siwo paki
Attalia pano; go ero porau pae 26
tokora wanogoe paki Antiokia pano,
waina ero pea pei tea vituakiana asa
paki nasaupiaana ki Supe raki na
wosiana waina ero pakavuro sua e.
Go ragi waina ero umai sua, po 27
saisai ki sua ekkalesia, ero dogorogo
ki naleo maga mamau puti waina
Supe e mari ra sikoti ra, go naga e
magi tea ni nalauna pota maga
polagati namata sikai ni nasara-
lomauana. Go ero doko sikoti tea 28
vasapiseikiana maga ragi e da puru
mau.


Matele 15.
1 Go te naatamoli seara eu pae
Yudea siwo umai po pasapisei ki
taigida maga, po naga, Ku pe ta pei
tea tovadaviviana mau dapala nato-
mariana ki Moses, ku pe mari sa pei
2 tea mantipauriana. Go ragi waina
Paulo go Barnaba ero peani sua
navululuana go navusuusuana paid
da e da kiki mau, taigida maga eu
dawanaki naga Paulo go Barnaba,
go tea pota seara kakada, euga sake
paki Yerusalem pano punusi apos-
tolo maga go tea matua maga nalo
3ni navusuusuana wanogoe. , Na
lakena tea wanogoe nara, waina eu
pei tea vusivusiana pae ekkalesia
pano, eu surata duaduru Foinike
go Samaria, eu do dogorogo ki na
madadoaana ki tea ni nalauna pota
maga: go eu mari taigida maga
4 mamau puti eu laelaea parua. Go
ragi waina eu rumai paki Yerusalem,
eu pei tea viragiana pae ekkalesia go
apostolo maga go tea matua maga,
go eu dogorogo ki naleo maga waina
5 Supe e mari ra sikoti ra. Ma te seara
ni tagona ni Farisi maga waina eu
saralomau eu duleana, po naga, E
one ara one naga euga tovadavivi

parati ki nawotaeana ki Moses.

usuana warua e doko sua, Petero e
duleana, po noa ki da, e naga,

rogorogoana wia pae nawokagu, po
8 saralomau. Go Supe, waina e atae

noasokisoki, e dua ra Naatana Tapu,

da maripotae gida go nara mau, e

nara en pei tea mantipauriana.

maga eu punuta ; go eu dakidorogo

ero punuta, Yakobo e pasadara,
po naga,

pa pa pa.
Nalakena tea wanogoe kinau a mi- 19
doakipotae, naga tuga ta mari


navitinuana paki tea ni nalauna pota
maga waina eu do madadoa paki
20 Supe; ma naga tuga midiri paki
da, naga euga atutaku ki tea loa
ni idolo maga, go ki namaripeleana,
go ki tea solipunueana, go ki nada.
Nalakena Moses e peani te seara sara
natokoana waina eu dogorogo ki nia
pae tagona tuai maga pa pa, e pei
tea veveana ekopu ni nasufha ni
nasaisaiana maga sara sabbath.
22 Ragi wanogoe apostolo maga go
tea matua maga, nara ma ekkalesia

naga euga matadoa naatainoli dua
kakada, po dipakilua ra paki Anti-

pano ; ero pei Yuda waina e pei tea
sosoana ki Barsaba, go Sila, naata-
fnoli maraki maga maleoputo ni
23 taigida maga : go eu midiri pae
naihelearuda dapala waia, Apostolo
maga go tea matua taimu maga au
noa ki taigami ni nalauna pota maga
waina ku doko Antiokia go Siria go
Kilikia, au naga, Kuga laelaea:
24 Nalakena au dogo naga te seara
waina eu inelu garni pano eu mari
mu ku dogo kite sa ki navasaana
maga, po mari sa ki naatamu;
waina au da dipa ki da asa mau ;
25 kinami au midoa ki nia naga e pia,
go napopogami e sikai maau asa,
nagaauga matadoa naataiholilduapo
dipakilua ra paloti punusi mu eroga
sikoti tea dodomiana aginami Bar-
-26 naba go Paulo, naatainoli waina ero
pitua ki namauriana adeada nalake-
na nagisa ni Nawota anigida Yesu
27 Kristo. Nalakena tea wanogoe au
po dipakilua Yuda go Sila paloti, go
nara eroga wo dogorogo paki mu pae
nawokada ki tea sikai maau maga
28 waia. Nalakena Naatana Tapu, go
kinami, au midoa ki nia naga e pia,
naga auga ta doropusi ega ta one
mu mau tea waina e madaga liu tea
29 wia maga waia : naga kuga atutaku
ki tea maga waina eu pei naviriana
paki idolo maga, go ki nada, go ki
tea solipunueana maga, go ki na
maripeleana ; ku pe dufnamu mauti
mu ki tea maga wanogoe ku pe mari
pia. Kuga rogo kite pia.
Nalakena tea wanagoe, ragi wai- 30
na eu pei tea tipakiluaana, eu siwo
umai paki Antiokia ; go ragi waina
eu saisai ki sua taua ni naatainoli
maga, eu pitua ki tusi wanogoe.
Go ragi waina eu peve sua e, eu 31
laelaea nalakena navasapakavakale-
ana wanogoe. Go Yuda go Sila, 32
waina nara ma ero pei profeta, ero
pasa parati ki taigida maga ki na
vasaana lapa, po lawosoki ra. Go 33
ragi waina ero doko sua pa pa te
ragi, ero pei tea tipakiluana pilake
natainateana meludua ki taigida
maga naga eroga va punusi tea
maga waina eu dautau ara pano.
Ma Paulo go Barnaba ero doko 34
Antiokia doko, ero do pasapiseiki
po do dogorogo ki navasaana
wia ki Nawota, nara ma tea pota
lapa.
Go edaku ki naaleatia seara Paulo 35
e noa ki Barnaba, e naga, Toroga
liliu ragi waia po pa punusi taigida
maga waina eu doko sara natokoana
waina toro dogorogo ki navasaana
ki Nawota ara, eu dapale sava ? Go 36
Barnaba e midoa ki nia naga eroga
moro piragi Yoane, waina e pei tea
sosoana ki Marko ega sikoti ra pano.
Ma Paulo e midoa ki nia naga e da 37
pia mau naga eroga viragi a ega
sikoti ra pano waina e inelu dua ki
da pae Pamfilia pano, po da sikoti
ra paki nawosiana mau. Go na 38
vululuana makali sikai e pakilina,
dapala ero pa mawota, go Barnaba
e piragilua Marku, po porau paki
Kupero pano ; ma Paulo e matadoa 39
Sila, po surata pano, taigida maga eu
pitua ki nia paki nasaupiaana ki
Nawota. Go e surata duaduru 40
Siria go Kilikia, e do lawo soki
ekkalesia maga.


Matele 16.
1 Go e moro umai paki Derbe go
Listra : go kuga leo, tea vasapisei-
kiana sikai e doko asa, nagisana
Timotheo, natu ni nagoroi ni Yudea

2na e pei tea ni Hellas. Go nae e pei
tea noasokisokiana pae taigida maga
waina eu doko Listra go Ikonio.
3 Go Paulo e masauna naga nae ega
sikoti a pano ; go e puati apo dova-
davivi asa nalakena naka ni Yudea
maga waina eu doko tokora maga
wanogoe ; nalakena eu mamau puti
atae naga tamana e pei tea ni Hellas.
4 Go ragi waina eu do surata duaduru
natokoana maga, eu pitua paki da

go tea matua maga waina eu doko
5 Yerusalem. Nalakena tea wanogoe
ekkalesia maga eu pei tea mariana
eu kasua ki nasaralomauana, go eu
disu ki nalapaana sara naaleatia.

Ferucia go ni Galatia, eu pei tea tipa-
goroana pae Naatana Tapu naga
euga ta pasa navasaana Asia mau ;
7 go ragi waina eu rumai paki nadigi
ni Misia eu maridogo naga euga
vaki Bitliinia ; go Naata ni Yesu
8 e da suasua ki da asa mau ; go eu
surata liu Misia, po siwo umai paki

pakilina ki Paulo pogi; Naatafnoli
ni Masedonia sikai e lawodu, po
pavarani. a, po naga, Pa tua goto
umai paki Masedonia, po silae
10 garni. Go ragi waina e punusi sua

donia pano, au midoaki saisai ki
nia naga Supe e soso garni naga
auga rogorogo ki narogorogoana wia
paki da.

NGUNA-TONGOAN N.T.
pae Troas, po sava leana paki Samo-
thrake, go matamai ki nia an paki
Neapolis ; go au pae tokora wano- 12
goe po paki Filippoi, waina e pei
natokoana sikai ni Masedonia, tea
vea ni navanua wanogoe, go kolonia
ni Roma sikai: go au toko natoko-
ana wanogoe naaleatia seara. Go 13
naaleatia ni sabbatk au paki etaku ni
namata pua paki nadigi ni napapa
ni noai sara sikai, waina au midoa ki
nia naga tokora ni natapasavasaana
sikai e doko asa; go au do natano, po
pasa ki nagoroi maga waina eu saisai
asa. Go nagoroi sikai nagisana 14
Lidia, tea sori tea miala kesakesa,
ni natokoana ni Tuateira, tea lotu
ki Supe, e dogo garni: waina Nawota
e polagati napopona, naga ega rogo
parati ki tea maga waina e pei tea
vasaana pae Paulo. Go ragi waina 15
e pei tea bapetizoana, nara ma tea
ni nasuma aneana maga, e pavarani
garni, po naga, Ku pe midoa ki potae
au naga a saralomau Nawota, kuga
umai paki ekopu ni nasuma aginau,
po doko asa doko. Go e pasadie
garni asa.
Go e pakilina, ragi waina au do 16
surata paki tokora ni natapasavasa-
ana, naga nagoroi atara sikai, waina
e peani naatana ni navasapuaana
sikai, e sua garni, waina e do pasa-
pua po magi talakena maga piragi
nataluaana warua asa. Nae e dausi 17
garni ma Paulo po pioso, po naga,
Naatainoli maga waia eu pei tea
suasua maga ki Supe VakilagiMau,
waina eu dogorogo paki mu ki napua
ni namautipauriana. Go e mari tea 18
wanogoe naaleatia lapa. Ma Paulo,
waina napopona e dogo kite sa asa,
e dumana doa e po noa ki naatana
wanogoe, e naga, A dipa ki-go pae
nagisa ni Yesu Kristo naga pa tave
umai fneludua ki nia pano. Go e
dave umai aura sikai maau wano-
goe.
Ma ragi waina talakeana maga eu 19


punusi naga naleogoroana ni na
taluaana adeada e dave pano, eu
puasoki Paulo go Sila, po dosagi ra
paid malo ni navakokotoana paki
20 narae ni tea maraki maga, go ragi

tea vasapotae maga, eu naga,

natomariana maga waina e da pia
naga nigida waina tu pei tea ni
Roma tuga tape ra, po mari ra mau.
22 Go taua ni naatamoli maga eu
mamau duleana dipa ra : go tea
maraki maga eu puaporae lua sugoro
adeada maga, po pitipaki naga euga

ni nasufna ni navavaiana, po dipa

soliana naga ega vavaigoro kasua ki
24 da : go nae, waina e dape natipaki-

efnago tukituki, po mari soki namele

fnaraverave ; go natali solisoli maga

vavai ni nasufna ni nasolisoliana e

nia naga tea soliana maga eu sava
28 pano. Ma Paulo e pioso ki nadaleo

mari sa ki-go mau : nalakena au
29 mamau puti doko nea. Go e pioso
