paki ekopu, go e durururu ki nama-
takuana, po dowo paki natano narae
ni Paulo go Sila, po piragi ra dave, 30
po naga, Nawota maga, nasava e
one au one naga aga mari a naga aga
vei tea mautipauriana ? Go ero 31
naga, Pa saralomau Nawota Yesu,
go pa wo pei tea mautipauriana,
nimu ma nasufna anigo. Go ero 32
pasa ki nia navasaana ki Nawota,
ero pasa ki tea maga mamau puti
asa waina eu doko nasufna aneana.
Go e piragilua ra aura sikai maau 33
wanogoe ni napogiana, po same wotu
ni nawokatiana kakada maga; po-
pei tea bapetizoana, nara ma tea
maga mamau puti aneana, marave-
rave. Go e piragi ra sake paki 34
ekopu ni nasufna aneana, po doro-
pusi navinaga naraeda, po laelaea
parua, nara ma tea maga mamau
puti ni nasufna aneana, eu sara-
lomau Supe.
Go ragi waina e pei aleati, tea 35
maraki maga eu dipakilua tea
varati maga, po naga, Pa suasua ki
naatamoli maga waina naga eroga
vano. Go tea vavai ni nasufna ni 36
nasolisoliana e dogorogo ki na
vasaana wanogoe paki Paulo, e
naga, Tea maraki maga eu po
dipakilua umai naga aga suasua ki
mu naga koroga vano ; nalakena
tea wanogoe koroga tave umai ragi
waia, po surata pano doko natama-
teana. Ma Paulo e noa ki da, c 37
naga, Eu parati garni lina, waina
aro da pei tea tipakotoviana mau,
go waina aro pei naatamoli maga
waina aro pei tea ni Roma, go eu
nadi ki garni paki ekopu ni nasufna
ni navavaiana; go ragi waia euga
nadi ki panako garni paki katama
kite ? ega ta dapala nogoe mau ;
ma euga tufnada umai po piragi
garni paki katama. Go tea varati 38
maga eu dogorogo ki navasaana
maga wanogoe paki tea maraki


maga : go eu mataku, ragi waina eu
39 dogo naga ero pei tea ni Roma ; go
eu rumai po pavaram ra ; go ragi
waina eu piragi sua ra paki katama,
eu pasa parati ki da naga ercjga fnelu

dave nasufna ni navavaiana po paki
ekopu ni nasufna ki Lidia ; go ragi

Matele 17.
1 Go ragi waina ero surata duaduru
sua Amfipolis go Apollonia, ero umai
paki Thessalonika, waina nasufna ni
nasaisaiana sikai ki tea ni Yudea
2 e doko asa ; go Paulo e paki ekopu
punusi ra, pae natomariana aneana,
go e do pululu ki da sabbath dolu pae
3 navasaana midiriana maga, e do
polagati po do pasa nadi ki nia paki
da, naga e one Kristo one naga ega
sua navitinumateana, po moro dule-
ana fnelu dua ki tea mate maga ;
go naga Yesu waia, waina kinau a
dogorogo ki nia paki mu, e pei Kristo.
4 Go seara kakada eu saralomau, po
puluti Paulo go Sila ; nara ma tea ni
Hellas waina eu pei tea lotu pia taua
warua kakada sikai, go nagoroi vea
maga tea ta pisa mau kakada mau.
5 Ma tea ni Yudea maga eu dogo na
roitoiana, go eu piragi naatafnoli
sigisigileo seara ni tea toko moli
po saisai ki taua sikai po mari
natokoana eu parai: go eu rumai
paki nasufna ki Yason, po laga naga
euga viragi ra dave punusi narei.
6 Go ragi waina eu da papai ra mau,
eu dosagi Yason go taigida seara
pano paki narae ni tea maraki maga
ni natokoana, eu pioso, naga Nara
waina eu mari maramana e dapolo
7 siwo eu po umai paki nea ; waina
Yason e po piragi ra : go nara ma-
mau puti eu do mari panopota ki
natawanakiana maga ki Kaisar, eu
noa naga nawota pota sikai e doko,
Yesu. Go eu mari taua ni naata 8
moli maga go tea maraki maga ni
natokoana eu manaunau, ragi waina
eu dogo tea maga wanogoe. Go ragi 9
waina eu dape navituakorokoroana
ki Yason go ki tea pota maga, eu
suasua ki da naga euga vano.
Go taigida maga eu maraverave 10
dipa ki lua Paulo go Sila pogi paki
Beroia pano : go ragi waina ero
umai paki asa ero paki ekopu ni
nasufna ni nasaisaiana ki tea ni
Yudea. Go nara eu pia liu tea 11
maga waina eu doko Thessalonika,
nalakena eu dape navasaana pilake
sara napoposuasuaana, eu do peve
usiusi navasaana midiriana maga
sara naaleatia, tea maga wanogoe eu
pe tapala nogoe kite ? Nalakena 12
tea wanogoe tea lapa kakada eu
saralomau ; nara ma nagoroi dodo-
madaganiana maga ni Hellas, go
naanoai maga, tea ta pisa mau
kakada mau. Ma ragi waina tea 13
ni Yudea ni Thessalonika eu atae
naga navasaana ki Supe e moro pei
tea rogorogokiana pae Paulo Beroia,
eu moro umai paki asa, po mari taua
maga ni naatafnoli maga eu pari po
manaunau. Go ragi wanogoe tai- 14
gida maga eu dipakilua Paulo mara-
verave naga ega surata pano pa pa
paki elau : go Sila go Timotheo ero
ko doko Beroia doko. Ma tea maga 15
waina eu pitana ki Paulo eu piragi
a pano pa pa paki Athenai: go ragi
waina eu dape sua natipakidfia sikai
paki Sila go Timotheo naga eroga
umai punusi a maraverave sa, eu
pano.
Go ragi waina Paulo e do leogoro 16
ra Athenai, naatana e pei tea
vakaliana napalauna, nalakena e
punusi natokoana e pura ki idolo
maga. Go e pululu ki tea ni 17
Yudea go ki tea lotu pia maga ekopu
ni nasufna ni nasaisaiana, go ki tea
maga waina eu sua e malo ni na
vakokotoana sara naaleatia. Go tea 18


dodomi namanumatuaana seara ni
tea maga waina eu sarausi Epikuro go
in Stoiko maga eu pululu ki nia. Go
te seara eu naga, Tea vasa palo waia
e masauna naga ega noa nasava ?
go te seara eu naga, E alagoro pei
tea rogorogo ki supe pota maga :
nalakena e do dogorogo ki Yesu go
19 namoroduleanaana. Go eu puati a,
po pragi a paki Areopaco, po naga,
Au mariatae atae navasapiseikiana
vau waia, waina ku pasa asa kite ?
20 Nalakena' ku dape tea vano pota
seara umai paki nadaligagami; go
au masauna naga auga atae tea
maga wanogoe eu pei nasava ?
21 Go (naka ni Athenai mamau puti go
tea ni navanua pota maga waina eu
menaki-atatoko asa eu do noa kite
eu do dogo te navatuna vau sikai
ragi ni natokoinoliana adeada, eu da
22 mari tea pota asa mau.) Ma Paulo
e lawodu maleoputo ni Areopaco, po
naga,
Naatamoli ni Athenai maga, a
punusi naga ku matau ki parua ki
supe maga nalo ni naleo maga
23 mamau puti. Nalakena ragi waina
a surata duaduru, po punusi tea
lotukiana animu maga, a papai wede
ni naviriana sikai waina namidiriana
waia e doko asa, AGI SUPE SALU-
PEANA. Tea waina ku salupe apo
lotu ki nia, tea wanogoe kinau a
24 dogorogo ki nia paki mu. Supe
waina e mari maramana go tea maga
mamau puti waina eu doko asa, nae,
waina e pei Nawota ni nakoroatelagi
go maramana, e da doko nasuma
tapu maga waina eu pei tea mariana
25 ki namelearu maga mau ; go e da
pei tea suasuakiana pae namelearu
maga in naatamoli maga mau,
dapala e pe tika kite navatuna, nae
e do dua tea maga mamau puti
namauriana, go nameroda, go naleo
26 maga mamau puti; go e mari sara
nalauna ni naatamoli maga ni
nada sikai maau eu doko narae ni
maramana mamau, e dawana ki sua
ragi tawanakiana adeada maga, go
kokoi maga ni natokoana adeada
maga ; naga euga laga Supe, mase eu 27
pe totodogo asa, po papai a, go e da
madu uvea kite naata sikai kaka-
gida mau : nalakena tu mauri asa, 28
po parivari asa, po pei natea asa ;
dakiusi waina aurea animu maga
seara kakada eu noa e, eu naga,
Nalakena tu pei naworaworana. Go 29
nalakena tu pei naworawora ni
Supe, e one gida one naga tuga ta
midoa ki nia naga Supe e dakiusi
cold, kite silver, kite vatu, waina e
pei tea taeana ki namataisauana go
ki namidoakipaiana ki naatamoli.
Go ragi maga ni nasalupeana Supe 30
e leo kalau ra ; ma ragi waia e dipa
ki naatamoli maga ni sara tokora
naga euga mamau puti midoakidoa :
nalakena e lawo ki naaleatia sikai, 31
waina ega wo pasapotae maramana
asa pae namarinaleoleanaana pae
naatamoli waina e dawana ki nia ;
go e magi tea maga mamau puti
pitua ki nasaralomauana kakana, e
sike a e duleana meludua ki tea •
mate maga.
Go ragi waina eu dogo namorodu- 32
leanaana ni tea mate maga, te seara
eu marisaudoa ; ma tea pota seara
eu naga, Auga wo moro dogo ko na
lo ni tea wanogoe te ragi. Dapala 33
nogoe Paulo e pa dua ki maleoputo
kakada pano. Ma naatamoli jeara 34
eu puluti a, po sara lomau : sikai
kakada e pei Dionisio tea ni Areo-
paco, go nagoroi sikai nagisana
Damari, nara ma tea pota seara eu
mamau.
Matele 18.
Ragi edaku ki tea maga wanogoe 1
e meludua ki Athenai pano, po umai
paki Korintho. Go e papai naata 2
moli ni Yudea sikai nagisana Akula,
tea ni Ponto pae namatarau aneana,


waina e p;\e Italia umai maladigi ki
ragi wanogoe, nara ma anagoroi
Priskilla, nalakena Klaudio e dipa
ki tea ni Yudea maga niamau puti
naga euga meludua ki Roma pano :
3go e umai pumisi ra ; go nalakena
nae go nara eu pei mataisau sikai
maau, e doko sikoti ra doko, go eu do
posiwosi nalakena eu pei tea mari
tapaupau ki naveimataisauana.
4 Go e pasa pisei ki pululu ekopu
ni nasuma ni nasaisaiana sara
sabbath, po pasadie tea ni Yudea
go tea ni Hellas naga euga sara-
lomau.
5 Ma ragi waina Sila go Timotheo
ero pae Masedonia siwo umai, Paulo
e pei tea puasokiana ki navasaana, e
do noasokisoki kasua paki tea ni
6 Yudea naga Yesu e pei Kristo. Go
ragi waina eu dugoro, po pasa-
saki, e meseura ki sugoro aneana
maga po noa paki da, Nadamu ega
toko napaumu ; kinau a dautau ;
aga wo pa punusi tea ni nalauna
pota maga pae ragi waia pa pa pa.
7 Go e meludua ki tokora wanogoe
pano, po paki ekopu ni nasuma ki
naatamoli sikai nagisana Tito Yusto,
tea lotu ki Supe, waina nasuma ane-
ana e dipa sokari nasuma ni nasai-
-8 saiana. Go Krispo, tea maraki ni
nasuma ni nasaisaiana, e saralomau
Nawota nara ma nasuma mamau
aneana ; go naka ni Korintho tea
lapa kakada eu dogo po saralomau,
9po pei tea bapetizoana. Go Nawota
e noa ki Paulo pae navunusiana sikai
pogi, e naga, Pa ta mataku mau, ma
pa to pasa, po da punuta mau:
10 nalakena kinau a sikoti ko doko, go
te naata sikai ega wo da lawodu dipa
ko naga ega mari sa ki-go mau :
nalakena a peani narei warua na
11 tokoana waia. Go e doko asa natau
sikai go atelagi latesa, e do pasapi-
seiki navasaana ki Supe ihaleoputo
kakada.
12 Ma ragi waina Callio e pei tea
maramara ni Akaia, tea ni Yudea
eu duleana sava pa raki Paulo napo-
pora sikai maau asa, po piragi a umai
paki malo tasake ni navasapotaeana,
po naga, Naatamoli waia e pasadie 13
naatamoli maga naga euga lotu ki
Supe ega va pele nawotaeana. Ma 14
ragi waina Paulo e naga ega vasa,
Callio e noa ki tea ni Yudea maga,
e naga, E pe vei te namarisakiana
kite te nasigisigileoana, tea ni
Yudea maga, e pe wia naga a pe
soki mu : ma epe vei navusuusuana 15
maga nalo ni navasaana go ni nagisa
maga go ni nawotaeana animu, kuga
tufhamu punusi a; kinau a da
masauna mau naga aga vei tea vasa-
potae sikai ni tea maga wanogoe. Go 16
e kopasi ra eu meludua ki malo
tasake ni navasapotaeana pano.
Go eu mamau puti pausoki Sos- 17
thene, tea maraki ni nasuma ni na
saisaiana, po pokawokati a narae ni
malo tasake ni navasapotaeana. Go
Callio e dodoparoparo ki tea maga
wanogoe.
Go Paulo, ragi waina e moro doko 18
sua naaleatia lapa, e pasa dule ki
taigida maga, po porau paki Siria
pano go Priskilla go Akula ero sikoti
a pano ; e alati napauna Kegekerea :
nalakena e peani nasaiana sikai. Go 19
eu rumai paki Efeso, go e doropusi
ra ero doko tokora wanogoe : ma
nae e paki ekopu ni nasuina ni
nasaisaiana, po pasa pisei ki pululu
ki tea ni Yudea. Go ragi waina 20
eu pavarani a naga ega toko ragi
varau sikai, e da suasua asa mau;
ma ragi waina e pasadule ki sua ra, 21
po naga, Supe e pe suasua, a pe wo
moro liliu umai punusi mu, e porau
pae Efeso pano. Go ragi waina e 22
paki euta Kaisarea, e sake po pasa
dodomi ekkalesia, po siwo paki
Antiokia pano. Go ragi waina e 23
doko sua ragi sikai asa, e ihelu pano,
po surata duaduru lawolawo ki
navanua ni Calatia go Ferucia, e


to mari tea vasapiseikiana maga eu
kasua puti.
24 Go naatamoli ni Yudea sikai nagi-
sana Apollo, tea ni Alexanderia pae
namatarau aneana, naatamoli vasa
pia sikai, e umai paki Efeso; go e atae
parua ki navasaana midiriana maga.
25 Naatamoli wanogoe e pei tea vasa-
piseikiana napua ki Nawota; go
nalakena e pei tea suisui ki naatana,
e pasa po pasapisei ki parati ki tea
maga nalo ni Yesu, e atae nabapeti-
-26 zoana ki Yoane sikina : go e atulake
navasa-piviari-ana ekopu ni nasufna
ni nasaisaiana. Ma ragi waina
Priskilla go Akula ero dogo e ero
piragi a pa punusi ra, po pasa lawo-
lawo ki parati ki napua ki Supe paki
27 nia. Go ragi waina e masauna naga
ega tuagoto paki Akaia pano, taigida
maga eu silae a asa, po midiri paki
tea vasapiseikiana maga naga euga
viragi soki a ; go ragi waina e umai,
e silae parua ki tea maga waina eu
saralomau sua pae nasaupiaana :
28 nalakena e pasapisei ki pululu ki doa
kasua ki tea ni Yudea maga lina,
e do pasapisei ki saisai ki nia pae
navasaana midiriana maga naga
Yesu e pei Kristo.

namelearuna maga ara, Naatana

eu mamau puti eu alagoro pei
naanoai rualima sikai tamate dua.

nasaisaiana, po pasa piviari atelagi

ko doko Asia doko ragi sikai.
23 Go ragi wanogoe navarivariana
waina e da kiki mau e pakilina nalo
24 ni Napua. Nalakena naatafnoli sikai
nagisana Demetrio, tea vei mataisau
ni, silver, waina e mari nasuma tapu
maga ni silver ki Diana, e magi
tea maga waina eu pei mataisau
kakana piragi nawosiana waina
25 eda kiki mau; go e saisai ki da,
nara ma tea wosiwosi maga nalo ni
tea tapala nogoe maga eu mamau,
go e naga, Mariki maga, ku atae
naga tu peani nasogolapaana anigida
pae nawosiana waia. Go ku punusi 26
po dogo, naga Paulo waia e pasadie
po puadoa taua warua ni natamoli
maga, e da mari a Efeso sikina mau,
ma e maladigi mari a usura ki Asia
mamau, e noa naga tea maga waina
eu pei tea mariana pae namelearu
maga, eu da pei supe maga mau : go 27
e pe tapala nogoe nawosiana anigida
e pe vei tea dododaoana ; go tea
wanogoe e pe ta sikina mau, ma
nasuma tapu ki supe nagoroi warua
Diana e pe vei tea sarateapaloana,
go nae e pe vei tea rakaiana fneludua
ki natatapauana aneana, waina Asia
mamau go maramana eu lotu ki nia.
Go ragi waina eu dogo tea wanogoe, 28
eu pura ki namaritausuana, po pioso,
po naga, Diana ki naka ni Efeso e
parua. Go natokoana e pei tea vaka- 29
vuroana ki navinovinoiana : go eu
sava paki ekopu ni nasuma ni na
leopunusiana napopoda sikai maau
asa, eu puasoki sua Caio go Aris-
tarko, naatafnoli dua ni Masedonia,
waina ero do surata sikoti Paulo.
Go ragi waina Paulo e masauna naga 30
ega vaki ekopu punusi narei, tea
vasapiseikiana maga eu da suasua
ki nia mau. Go naatafnoli warua 31
maga ni Asia seara kakada, waina eu
pei tana ri, eu dipakilua pa punusi
a, po pavarani a naga ega ta duinana
pitua ki nia paki ekopu ni nasuma
ni naleopunusiana mau. Go te 32
seara eu pioso tea sikai, go te seara
eu pioso tea pota; nalakena nasaisai-
ana e pinovinoi; go tea lapa kakada
eu da atae tea waina e pei nalakena
eu saisai mau. Go eu piragi Alex- 33
ander meludua ki taua ni naatafnoli
maga, tea ni Yudea eu do digotigo
e. Go Alexander e alosoki ki na
melearuna, po masauna naga ega
tumana maneana pasakorokoro e
paki narei. Ma ragi waina eu atae 34
naga e pei tea ni Yudea, eu mamau
puti pioso ki nadaleo sikai maau e


alagoro pei aura dua, eu naga, Diana
35 ki naka ni Efeso e parua. Go ragi
■jvaina tea midiri ni natokoana e
mari taua ni naatainoli maga eu
matadorogo, e naga, Naatainoli ni
Efeso maga, sei ni naatainoli maga
e doko waina e da atae naga natoko-
ana ki naka ni Efeso e pei tea leo
parati ki nasuina tapu ki Diana
warua, go ki nasupe waina e dowo
36 inelu Yupiter umai ? Go nalakena
tea maga wanogoe eu marisa pei tea
vasapaaruakiana, e one mu one naga
kuga matadorogo, po da mari para-
-37 goto te navatuna mau. Nalakena
ku po piragi naatainoli maga waia
umai, waina eu da pei tea tapepava-
koto nasuina tapu maga mau, go
waina eu da pasa sa ki supe nagoroi
38 anigida mau. Nalakena tea wano-
goe Demetrio, go tea vei mataisau
maga waina eu sikoti a doko, eu pe
veani te navatuna dipa te naata
sikai, naaleatia ni navasapotaeana
maga eu doko, go nawota vasapotac
maga eu doko ; euga tuiliada pasa-
-39 dipa ra. Ma ku pe laga te navatuna
nalo ni tea pota maga, ega vei tea
40 vasapotaeana nasaisaiana leana. Na
lakena tu pei tea waina tu pe vei
tea vasadipaana nalo ni natuleana-
ana ni masoso, nalakena kakana e
41 dika : go tuga wo mari sa atusi nalo
ni nasaisaiana waia. Go ragi waina
e pasa sua dapala nogoe e dapera ki
nasaisaiana.
Matele 20.
1 Go edaku ki navasaparaiana e
nopu, Paulo e dipakilua pa raki tea
vasapiseikiana maga euga umai, go
e pasa parati ki da, po pasadule ki
da, po inelu pano naga ega vaki
2 Masedonia pano. Go ragi waina e
surata duaduru sua tokora maga
wanogoe, po pasa parati ki parua ki
3 sua ra, e umai paki Hellas. Go ragi
waina e doko sua asa atelagi dolu,
go tea ni Yudea eu seke ki nia,
ragi waina e naga ega vorau paid
Siria pano, e midoakipotae naga ega
liliu duaduru Masedonia pano. Go 4
Sopater ni Beroia, natu ni Pirro, e
sikoti a pano pa pa paki Asia ; nara
ma Aristarko go Sekundo ni naka
ni Thessalonika ; go Caio ni Derbe,
go Timotkeo; go tea ni Asia, Tikiko
go Trofimo. Ma nara eu pea pano, 5
po do doko raki garni Troas. Go 6
kinami au porau pae Filippoi edaku
ki naaleatia maga ni bred waina
leven e dika asa, go au rumai paki
Troas punusi ra naaleatia kelima ;
go au doko tokora wanogoe naaleatia
larua.
Go naaleatia vea ni wiik, ragi 7
waina au pei tea saisaikiana naga
auga dovaporae bred, Paulo e pasa-
pisei ki pululu ki da, e midoa ki nia
naga ega vano matamai ki nia ; go
e pasa parau pa pa pogi matua. Go 8
nasulu lapa eu doko emago ni tagona
ni elagi, waina au pei tea saisaikiana
asa. Go natureai sikai nagisana 9
Eutiko e dasake namata leleo sikai,
waina e pei tea vuatiana ki namatu-
ruana taratara ; go ragi waina Paulo
e ko do pasapiseiki paraurau, e pei
tea vuatiana pakitano ki namaturu-
ana aneana po dowo pae tagona
ketolu siwo pakitano, po pei tea
tapedakatiana e mate. Go Paulo elO
siwo, po dowo asa, po doti a po
naga, kuga ta parai mau ; nalakena
naatana e doko asa. Go ragi waina 11
e moro sake, po dovaporae bred, po
ganikani, po pasa ki da ragi varau,
pa pa paki ragi ni namakotokotoana,
e dapala nogoe pano. Go eu piragi 12
natureai wanogoe e mauri, go eu pei
tea vakavakaleana e da kiki mau.
Ma kinami au pea paki rarua 13
pano, po porau naga auga vaki Asso,
waina au midoa ki nia naga auga
musagi Paulo asa : nalakena e da-
wanaki dapala nogoe, nae e midoa
ki nia naga ega vae euta. Go ragi 14


waina e sua garni Asso, au musagi a,
15 po umai paid Mitilene. Go au
porau pae tokora wanogoe, go ma-
tamai ki nia au rumai doko kivea
ki Kio ; go matamai ki nia au paki
euta Samo ragi kiki; go matamai
16 ki nia au rumai paki Mileto. Nala-
kena Paulo e midoakipotae naga ega
vorau liu Efeso, naga ega ta pakilina
ki nia mau naga ega toko parau doko
Asia ; nalakena e do mari marave-
rave, naga e pe mari atae, e pe toko
Yerusalem naaleatia ni Pentekoste.
17 Go e dipakilua pae Mileto paki
Efeso, po soso tea matua maga ni
ekkalesia naga euga umai punusi a.
18 Go ragi waina eu rumai punusi a, e
noa ki da, e naga,
Nimu ku dufnamu atae, dapala
waina a doko sikoti mu doko ragi
mamau, pae naaleatia waina a pea
19 umai pasi Asia asa, naga a do magi
Nawota suasua ki sara naveipopo-
vakitanoana, go ki naririmata maga,
go ki namaridogoana maga waina eu
pakilina ki nau nalakena nasekeana
20 maga ki tea ni Yudea ; naga a da
suka ki noakisai mu mau tea maga
waina eu pia ki mu, po pasapisei ki
mu lina, go pae nasuma animu maga,
21 po do noasikosoki kasua paki tea
ni Yudea go tea ni Hellas namidoaki-
doaana paki Supe, go nasaralomau-
ana paki Nawota anigida Yesu
22 Kristo. Go ragi waia, kuga leo,
kinau a pei tea soliana naatagu
paki Yerusalem pano, a da atae tea
maga waina euga wo pakilina ki nau
23 asa mau : ma a atae tea waia sikai-
maau, naga Naatana Tapu e do
noasokisoki kasua paki nau sara
natokoana, e noa naga natali solisoli
maga go nariesokiana maga eu doko
24 raki nau doko. Ma a mari namau-
riana aginau e pei tea inoli, e da
maginau pei tea lomau mau, naga
aga mari sua nasavaana ni namalopa
aginau, go nasuasuaana waina a
dape a ki Nawota Yesu, naga aga
noasokisoki kasua ki narogorogoana
wia ni nasaupiaana ki Supe. Go 25
, ragi waia, kuga leo, kinau a atae
naga nimu maga tea mamau puti,
waina a surata maleoputo kakamu
po dogorogo ki namarakiana, kuga
wo da moro punusi naraegu mau.
Nalakena tea wanogoe a noasokisoki 26
kasua paki mu naaleatia waia, naga
a dautau padua ki nada ni tea maga
mamau puti. Nalakena ada suka 27
ki noakisai mu namidoakipotaeana
mamau ki Supe mau. Kuga du- 28
fnamu leo parati ki mu, go ki navata
mamau, waina Naatana Tapu e mari
mu ku pei tea leo parati ki kakana,
naga kuga leo parati ki pakale
ekkalesia ki Supe, waina e dalua e ki
nadana aneana. Kinau a atae naga 29
edaku ki navanoana aginau wulf
maripavakoto maga euga wo umai
paki maleoputo kakamu, waina euga
wo da poposoki navata mau; go 30
nimu naatamoli seara kakamu euga
wo pakilina, po pasa tea sa maga,
naga euga viragilua tea vasapiseiki-
ana maga euga dausi ra. Nalake- 31
na tea wanogoe kuga to leleogoro, po
midoa ki nia naga natau dolu a do
dapavanau sara naatamoli sikasikai
pogi goaleatipilake naririmata maga
a da, makoto ki nia mau. Go ragi 32
waia a pitua ki mu paki Supe, go
paki navasaana ni nasaupiaana ane-
ana, waina e mariatae davagi mu,
po dua mu tea veaniana ma-
leoputo ni tea maga mamau puti
waina eu pei tea maridautaukiana.
A da matamagura ki silver, kite 33
cold, kite sugoro maga kite naata
sikai mau. Ku dufnamu atae naga 34
nainelearugu maga waia ero magi na
tikaana aginau maga suasua, go ero
magi tea maga waina eu sikoti au
suasua. Apiseikimupaenaleomaga 35
mamau puti naga e one mu one naga
kuga wosiwosi-mawosa ega tapala
nogoe, po silae tea manainaimaga, po
midoa ki n avasaana ki Nawota Yesu,


naga nae e noa, naga Namaropaana
ni navituaana e parua liu tea ni
natapeana.
36 Go ragi waina e noa sua tea maga
wanogoe, e ditipatua, po dapasavasa
nae ma nara mamau puti eu mamau.
37 Go eu mamau puti dagi parua, po
dowo nanoa ni Paulo, po dumili a,
38 eu dogo kite sa parua liu nalakena
navasaana waina e noa e, naga euga
ta moro leopunusi naraena mau.
Go eu pitana ki nia paki rarua pano.
Matele 21.
1 Go ragi waina e pakilina naga au
pa dua ki da po porau, au sava leana
umai paki Ko, go matamai ki nia
paki Rodo, go au pae tokora wano-
-2 goe po paki Patara : go ragi waina
au papai rarua sikai waina e do
duagoto paki Foinike, au pagi asa,
3po parau. Go ragi waina au paki
lina ki Kupero, au doropusi a e doko
namelearugami ni mawiri, po porau
paki Siria, po paki euta Tair:
nalakena rarua e naga ega lipa ki
naloriki musagiana kakana maga
4 tokora wanogoe. Go nalakena au
papai tea vasapiseikiana maga, au
doko asa doko naaleatia larua : go
nara eu noa ki Paulo pae Naatana,
naga ega ta pasi Yerusalem mau.
5 Go ragi waina e pakilina naga au
pakavuro naaleatia maga wanogoe,
au fnelu po surata pano; go eu
mamau puti pitana ki garni, nara
ma adagoroi maga go natuda maga,
pa pa au paki etaku ni natokoana :
go au diti patua elau garagara,
po dapasavasa, po dumagaini pasa
6 dule ki garni; go au pagi rarua, ma
nara eu liliu paki kiada.
7 Go ragi waina au marisua na
vorauana pae Tair, au rumai paki
Ptolemai; go au pasa dodomi tai-
gida maga, po doko sikoti ra naale-
-8 atia sikai. Go matamai ki nia au
mein pano, po umai paki Kaisarea :
go au paki ekopu ni nasuma ki
Filipo tea rogorogo ki narogorogo-
ana wia, waina e pei tea larua sikai
kakada, go au doko sokiti a doko.
Go naatamoli wanogoe e peani 9
natuna nagoroi pati, tea atara maga,
waina eu peanoasai. Go ragi waina 10
au doko tokora wanogoe naaleatia
lapa, tea veanoasai sikai e pae
Yudea siwo umai, nagisana Acabo.
Go e umai punusi garni, po dape 11
tasoki ki Paulo, po duinana soli na
fnelena go nainelearuna maga asa,
po naga, Naatana Tapu e noa dapala
waia, e naga, Naka ni Yudea waina
eu doko Yerusalem euga wo soli
dapala waia naatamoli waina e peani
tasoki waia, go euga wo pitua ki nia
paki nainelearu maga ni tea ni
nalauna pota maga. Go ragi waina 12
au dogo tea maga wanogoe, kinami
ma tea maga ni tokora wanogoe au
mamau puti pavarani a naga ega ta
sake paki Yerusalem pano mau.
Ragi wanogoe Paulo e pasadara, e 13
naga, Ku mari nasava, ku do dagi
po do mari poroworosi napopogu ?
nalakena kinau a mari inata sua
naga aga ta pei tea soliana sikina
mau, ma naga aga mate Yerusalem
nalakena nagisa ni Nawota Yesu.
Go ragi waina e karai pei tea 14
vasadieana, au punuta, po naga,
Namasauana ki Yehovabega vei tea
mariana.
Go edaku ki naaleatia maga 15
wanogoe au mari sokisoki naloriki
aginami maga, po sake paki Yerusa-
lem pano. Go tea vasapiseikiana ni 16
Kaisarea maga seara kakada eu
sikoti garni pano, eu piragi Mnason
ni Kupero, tea vasapiseikiana tuai
sikai e sikoti ra pano, waina auga
rnenaki sikoti a.
Go ragi waina au rumai paki 17
Yerusalem, taigida maga eu laelaea
piragi sold garni. Go matamai ki 18
nia Paulo e sikoti garni paki ekopu
punusi Yakobo; go tea matua maga


mamau puti eu mamau doko asa.

in tea ni nalauna pota maga pae
20 nasuasuaana aneana. Go nara, ragi
waina eu dogo e, eu samasa-
mani Supe; go eu noa ki nia, eu
naga, Ku punusi, tai, naga naka ni
Yudea tivilia lapa kakada eu sara
lomau ; go eu mamau puti pei tea
21 suisui magi nawotaeana: go e pei tea
rogorogokiana paki da nalo kakama,
naga ku pasapisei ki tea ni Yudea

ni nalauna pota maga naga euga
toropusi Moses ega madoko, ku noa
naga euga ta dovadavivi natuda ma-
ga mau, go naga euga ta surata pae
22 natomariana maga mau. Nalakena
tea wanogoe e pei nasava ? euga wo
23 dogo lomau naga ku po umai. Nala-
kena tea wanogoe pa mari tea waia
waina au noa ki-go asa : Naatamoli
pati kakagami eu doko waina eu
peani nasaiana sikai e one ara one :
24 pa viragilua naatamoli maga wano-
goe, po dumama mari ko pa tautau
sikoti ra, po madeada pitua ki na
ulu, naga euga masi napauda: go
tea maga mamau puti euga wo atae
naga naleo maga waina eu dogo
ra nalo kakama eu da pei te
navatuna mau; ma naga nigo ma
ku surata leana, po pavaigoro na
25 wotaeana. Ma nalo ni tea ni nalau-
na pota maga waina eu saralomau,
kinami au midiri paki da, po pasa
potae naga euga dumada pavaigoro
ra ki tea maga waina eu pei naviriana
paki idolo maga, go ki nada, go ki
tea solipunueana, go ki namaripele-
-26 ana. Ragi wanogoe Paulo e piragi-
lua naatamoli maga wanogoe, go
matamai ki nia e dumana mari a e
dautau sikoti ra po paki roara ni
nasuma tapu, eu noasai naga eu
naga euga vakavuro naaleatia maga
ninamaridautauana,pa pa naviriana
sikasikai sarasarq, ra ega madeada
pei tea vituakiana.
Go ragi waina naaleatia larua 27
eu maladigi nopu, tea ni Yudea
waina eu pae Asia umai, raga waina
eu punusi a roara ni nasuma tapu,
eu mari taua ni naatamoli maga eu
pari puti, go eu nadi ki nanamelea-
ruda asa, po pioso, eu naga, Naata 28
moli ni Israel maga, kuga silae garni ;
tea waia e pei naatamoli, waina e
pasapisei ki tea maga mamau puti
ni sara tokora dipa narei, go nawo-
taeana, go tokora waia : go e piragi
naatamoli ni Hellas seara eu rumai
paki roara ni nasuma tapu, po mari
tokora waia e pei tea moli. Nalakena 29
eu pea punusi Trofimo tea ni Bfeso
e sikoti a natokoana, go eu midoa ki
nia naga Paulo e piragi a umai paki
roara ni nasuma tapu. Go natoko- 30
ana mamau e pari, go narei eu sava
saisai; go eu puasoki Paulo, po
dosagi a paki etaku ni nasuma tapu :
go namata maga eu pei tea kokoro-
ana maraverave. Go ragi waina eu 31
laga naga euga mari punue a, na
rogorogoana e sake umai paki kili-
areko ni taua ni naatamoli maga ni
navakalo, naga Yerusalem mamau e
pinovinoi. Go e maraverave piragi 32
lua naatamoli seara ni navakalo go
senturio seara, po sava siwo paki da:
go nara, ragi waina eu punusi kiliar-
eko go naatamoli maga ni navakalo,
eu makoto ki nawokati-Paulo-ana.

maladigi, po puasoki a, po dipaki nia
naga ega vei tea soliana ki namori
dua ; po pusuusu ki e pei sei ? go
e mari nasava ? Go te seara ni taua 34
ni naatamoli maga eu pioso tea sikai,
go te seara eu pioso tea pota sikai:
go ragi waina e mari sa atae tea
waina e pei lomau nalakena na
vasaparaiana, e dipaki nia naga
ega vei tea viragiana paid ekopu
ni nasuma ni paka. Go ragi waina 35
e umai paki napua vavadu maga,


e pei tea tapetapeana pae natamoli
ninavakalo maga, nalakena namari-
kasuaana ki taua ni naatamoli maga;

po pioso, eu naga, Pa tapelua e.

Matele 22.
1 Taigu maga go mama maga, kuga
rogo navasakorokoroana waina a
maginau pasa paki mu asa ragi waia.
2 Go ragi waina eu dogo naga e pasa
paki da pae navasaana ni Heberu, eu
datafnate parua : go e naga,
3 Kinau a pei naatamoli sikai ni
Yudea, a pakilina Tarso ni Kilikia,
ma a pei tea vakaleana natokoana
waia, pisari narnele ni Gamaliel,
a pei tea viseikiana pae namari-
garaana ni nawotaeana ki tama-
gida maga, po magi Supe pei tea
suisui, dakiusi waina nimu ku mamau
4 puti doko masoso ; go a kopalele
Napua waia pa pa paki namateana,
a do soli po pitua ki naanoai maga
go nagoroi maga paki ekopu ni
5 nasurna ni navavaiana maga. Dapa-
la waina tea viri warua liu ma e
maginau noa sokisoki, go nasaisai-
ana mamau ni tea matua maga :
waina a dape tusi maga kiada paki
taigida maga, po surata paki Dama-
seko pano, naga aga viragi tea maga
waina eu doko asa euga vei tea
soliana umai paki Yerusalem, naga
euga vei tea varatiana. Go e paki 6
lina, naga, ragi waina a do surata, po
do paki maladigi ki Damaseko, e
alagoro pei aleati matua, namarama
warua sikai e maraverave marama
laga pae nakoroatelagi umai daliviri-
goro au. Go a dowo paki natano, 7
po dogo nadaleo sikai e noa ki nau,
e naga, Saulo, Saulo, ekasana ku
kopalele au ? Go kinau a pasadara, 8
a naga, Ku pei sei, Nawota ? Go e
noa ki nau, e naga, Kinau a pei Yesu
ni Nazareth, waina nigo ku kopalele
asa. Go tea maga waina eu sikoti 9
au eu punusi namarama lomau, ma
eu da dogo nadaleo ni tea waina e
pasa ki nau mau. Go a naga, Aga 10
mari nasava, Nawota ? Go Nawota
e noa ki nau, e naga, ra tuleana, po
paki Damaseko pano; go tokora
wanogoe ega wo pei tea vasa ki-go-
ana asa nalo ni tea maga waina eu
pei tea tawanakiana naga pa mari
ra. Go ragi waina ada leosai mau 11
nalakena nawarawaraana ni nama-
rama wanogoe, a pei tea vuatiana ki
namelearugu surata pae tea maga
waina eu sikoti au, po umai paki Da-
maseko. Go te Anania sikai, naata 12
fnoli tape pia, pae nawotaeana, tea
noasokisokiana pae tea ni Yudea
mamau puti waina eu doko tokora
wanogoe, e umai punusi au, po 13
lawodu pisari au po noa ki nau, e
naga, Taigu Saulo, pa moro leosai.
Go kinau a leosai punusi a aura
wanogoe. Go e naga, Supe ki tama- 14
gida maga e dawana ki-go naga pa
atae namasauana aneana, go naga
pa vunusi Tea Leana, go naga pa
rogo nadaleo sikai pae nawokana.
Nalakena pa wo maneana pei tea 15


noasokisoki sikai paki naatamoli
maga mamau puti ni tea maga waina
16 ku po punusi ra po dogo ra. Go ragi
waia ekasana ku mari daliali ? pa
tuleana, po pei tea bapetizoana, po
saruelua namarinaleosaana auigo
17 maga, po piosa paki nagisana. Go
e pakilina, naga, ragi waina a liliu
sua paki Yerusalem, go ragi waina
a do dapasavasa ekopu ni nasufna
tapu, nasaramakotoana sikai e paki
18 lina ki nau, go a punusi a e noa ki
nau, e naga, fa mari maraverave,
go pa fnelu dua ki Yerusalem pano
maraverave : nalakena euga wo da
dape nanoasokisokiana ki afna
19 nalo kakagu mau. Go kinau a naga,
Nawota, nara eu dumada atae naga
kinau a do kokoro tea maga waina
eu saralomau ako ekopu ni nasufna
ni navavaiana, po parati ra ekopu
20 ni sara nasufna ni nasaisaiana : go
ragi waina nada ni Stefano tea noa
sokisoki anigo e pei tea takiana,
kinau ma a lawodu pisari a, po sua-
sua, po pavaigoro sugoro maga ki
tea maga waina eu maripunue a.
21 Go e noa ki nau, e naga, fa vano :
nalakena kinau aga wo dipakilua ko
paki uvea punusi tea ni nalauna
pota maga.
22 Go eu do dogo epa pa paki nava-
saana wanogoe ; go eu sike naleoda,
po naga, fa tape lua tea tapalana
meludua ki maramana : nalakena e
da pia mau naga nae ega mauri doko.
23 Go ragi waina eu do pioso, po do
sawolua sugoro adeada maga, po do
nadi ki namotamota paki namalopa,
24 kiliareko e dipa ki nia naga ega vei
tea viragiana paki ekopu ni nasufna
ni paka, po noa naga ega vei tea
vnausiana ki navaratiana, naga ega
atae tea waina e pei nalakena eu
25 pioso dipa e dapalana. Go ragi
waina eu soli sua e ki natali maga,
Paulo e noa ki senturio waina e
lawodu, e naga, E pae nawotaeana
naga kuga varati naatamoli sikai
waina e pei tea ni Roma, go waina
e da pei tea tipakotoviana mau kite ?
Go ragi waina senturio e dogo e, e 26
pa punusi kiliareko, po noakisai a, e
naga, Ku naga pa mari nasava 1
nalakena naatamoli waia e pei tea
ni Roma. Go kiliareko e umai, po 27
noa ki nia, e naga, Pa noa ki nau,
nigo ku pei tea ni Roma kite ? Go
e naga, loro. Go kiliareko e pasa 28
dara, e naga, Kinau a pakotovi na
vei-naata-tokoana wanogoe ki taua
warua sikai ni mone. Go Paulo e
naga, Ma kinau a pakilina pei tea ni
Roma. Nalakena tea wanogoe tea 29
maga waina eu naga euga vuausi a
eu melu dua ki nia pano marave-
rave : go kiliareko ma e matako, ragi
waina e atae naga e pei tea ni Roma,
go nalakena e soli a.
Ma matamai ki nia, nalakena e 30
masauna naga ega atae tea waina e
pei nalakena lomau, waina naka ni
Yudea eu pasadipa e asa, e peresi a,
po dipa ki tea viri warua maga go
nasaisaiana ni navasapotaeana ma-
mau naga euga saisai umai, go e
piragi Paulo e siwo, po lawo ki nia
naraeda.
Matele 23.
Go Paulo e leosoki nasaisaiana, po 1
naga, Tai maga, kinau a magi Supe
mari dapala waina napopogu e
midoakipotae naga e pei tea wia pa
pa paki naaleatia waia. Go Anania 2
tea viri warua liu e dipa ki tea maga
waina eu lawo du pisari a naga euga
wokati nawokana. Ragi wanogoe 3
Paulo e noa ki nia, e naga, Supe ega
wo pokati ko, namalo pakasakiana
tare : go nigo ku dasake naga pa
vasapotae au pae nawotaeana, go ku
dipa ki nau naga aga vei tea woka-
tiana pa pele nawotaeana ? Go tea 4
maga waina eu lawodu pisari a eu
naga, Ku suori tea viri warua liu ki
Supe kite ? Go Paulo e naga, Ada 5


atae, tai magu, naga e pei tea viri
warua liu: ualakena e pei tea
midiriana, e naga, ra ta pasa sa ki
tea maraki sikai ki narei anigo mau.
6 Ma ragi waina Paulo e atae naga
namagovai kakada eu pei Sadduki
maga, go naga namagovai eu pel
Farisi maga, e pioso nasaisaiana ni
navasapotaeana, e naga, Tai maga,
kinau a pei Farisi sikai, natu ni
Farisi maga : nalo ni naleogoroana
go namoroduleanaana ni tea mate
maga kinau a pei tea vasapotaeana
7 asa. Go ragi waina e noa sua tea
wanogoe, navululuana sikai e paki
lina namawota ni Farisi maga go
ni Sadduki maga : go nasaisaiana eu
8 pamawota. Nalakena Sadduki maga
eu noa naga namoroduleanaana e
dika, go naga agelo e dika, go naata-
na ; ma Farisi maga eu noasai sokata
9ki da. Go naviosoana warua e paki
lina: go tea midiri maga seara
kakada ni namagovai ni Farisi maga
eu duleana, po pululu, po naga, Au
da papai te navatana sa naatamoli
waia mau : ma naatana sikai e pe
10 vasa ki nia, kite agelo sikai ? Go
ragi waina navululuana warua sikai
e pakilina, kiliareko, waina e mataku
Paulo e pe vei tea vuaporaworaeana
pae ara, e dipa ki tea ni navakalo
maga naga euga siwo po pualua
pavakoto asa meludua ki inaleoputo
kakada, po piragi a umai paki ekopu
ni nasurna ni paka.
11 Go pogi ki nia Nawota e lawo du
pisari a, po naga, Pa marasike:
nalakena dapala waina ku noasoki-
soki kasua ki tea maga nalo kakagu
Yerusalem, e one ako one naga pa
moro noasokisoki ega tapala nogoe
Roma.
12 Go ragi waina e pei aleati, naka
ni Yudea eu mari navilasaikiana
sikai, po dumada pasa sa ki da, eu
noa naga euga ta ganikani go naga
euga ta munu mau pa pa euga
13 maripunue sua Paulo. Go tea maga
waina eu man navivisaana wanogoe
eu lapa liu rualima pati. Go eu 14
rumai punusi tea viri warua maga
go tea matua maga, po naga, Au po
dumagami pasa sa ki parua ki garni,
naga auga ta katidogo te navatuna
mau pa pa auga maripunue sua
Paulo. Nalakena tea wanogoe nimu 15
ma nasaisaiana ni navasapotaeana
kuga mamau noa ki kiliareko ragi
waia naga ega viragi a siwo umai
punusi mu, dapala ku pe naga
kuga vuausi parati ki atae tea
kakana maga : go kinami au po
marimata sua naga auga maripunue
a, ragi waina ega ko da umai paki
fnaladigi mau. Ma pilemata ni 16
Paulo e dogo nakusugoroana ade-
ada, go e umai po paki ekopu ni
nasuina ni paka, po noakisai Paulo
asa. Go Paulo e soso senturio maga 17
sikai kakada umai punusi a, go e
noa ki nia, e naga, pa viragi natureai
waia pa punusi kiliareko : nalakena
e peani te navatuna naga ega noaki-
sai a asa. Nalakena tea wanogoe elB
piragilua e, po piragi a pa punusi
kiliareko, po naga, Paulo tea soliana
e soso au umai punusi a, po pavarani
au naga aga viragi natureai waia
umai punusi ko, waina e peani te
navatuna naga ega noa ki-go asa.
Go kiliareko e puati namelearuna, po 19
paki malo daki po pusuusu paki nia,
ero dua maau, e naga, Tea waina ku
peani a naga pa noakisai au asa e
pei nasava ? Go e naga, Navara- 20
pule maga ni Yudea eu po saisai ki
sua navasaana naga euga vavarani
ko naga pa viragi Paulo siwo paki
nasaisaiana ni navasapotaeana
matamai, dapala ku pe masauna
naga pa vusuusu ki parati kite
navatuna nalo kakana. Ma nigo pa 21
ta dogo parati ki da mau : nalakena
nara naatamoli rualima pati tamate
seara kakada eu kusugoro e, waina
eu po dumada pasa sa ki da, naga
euga ta ganikani go naga euga ta


munu mau pa pa euga manpunue
sua e: go ragi waia eu marimata
sua, po do leogoro nasaiana ki ama.

wanogoe po pasa soki a, e naga, Pa
ta noa kite naata mau naga ku po
23 noakisai au tea maga wanogoe. Go
e soso senturio maga edua kakada
umai punusi a, po naga, Koroga
marimata ki naatamoli ni navakalo
ponotia dua naga euga vano pa pa
paki Kaisarea, go tea maga waina
eu sake horse euga vei rualiiha larua,
go tea maga waina eu pua naio euga
vei ponotia dua, aura ketolu ni

eroga puati nalo tua vati seara, naga
euga mari Paulo ega sakesake ara,
po piragi a ega mauri pa punusi

maramara wia liu, e naga, Pa lae-

29 navasapotaeana adeada : go a papai
naga e pei tea vasadipaana nalo ni

31 Nalakena tea wanogoe tea ni nava-
kalo maga, pae tea waina e pei tea
tipakiana paki da, eu puati Paulo e
pagi, po piragi a pogi paki Antipatri.
Ma matamai ki nia eu doropusi tea 32
maga waina eu sakesake horse maga
naga euga'sikoti a pano, go eu liliu
paki nasuma ni paka : go nara, ragi 33
waina eu rumai paki Kaisarea, po
pitua ki tusi wanogoe paki tea mara-
mara, eu lawo ki Paulo ma naraena.

ki naga E pei tea ni seve navanua ?
go ragi waina e atae naga e pei tea
ni Kilikia, e naga, Aga wo dogo ko 35
ragi waina tea vasadipa ko maga
ma euga wo umai: go e dipa ki nia
naga ega vei tea vavaigoroana ekopu
ni pretorio ki Herod.

viri warua liu Anania e siwo nara

dapusukao ki Paulo paki tea mara-

sosoana umai, Tertullo e pae asa
pasadipa e, po naga,

warua pae ako, go tea sa maga eu
do magi nalauna waia pei tea mari-
leanakiana pae naveamidoakiana
anigo, au dape a sara ragi go sara

Ma Felix, waina e atae parati ki 22
naleo maga nalo ni Napua, e pasa
paarua ki da, po naga, Ragi waina
Lisia kiliareko ega wo si wo umai, aga
wo puausi parati ki atae naleo animu
maga. Go e dipa ki senturio naga 23
ega vei tea vavaigoroana, go naga

ega ta dipagoro tea aneana seara
kakada naga euga ta maneana
suasua mau.
Maedakuki naaleatia seara, Felix 24
e umai. nara ma nagoroi aneana
Brasilia, waina e pei nagoroi ni
Yudea, go e dipa ki lua pa raid Paulo
umai punusi a, po dogo e nalo ni
nasaralomauana paki Kristo Yesu.

nalo ni namarinaleoleanaana, go
natumanasokiana, go navasapotae-
ana waina ega wo umai, Felix e
mataku, po pasadara, e ,naga. Pa
vano ragi waia ; go ragi waina aga
veani ragi wia, aga wo soso ko umai.

vituakiana paki nia pae Paulo : na
lakena tea wanogoe e dipakilua pa
raki nia paka lapa umai, po pusu-
inaki paki nia. Ma ragi waina natau 27
dua ero nopu, Porkio Festo e umai


du oli Felix; go nalakena e masauna
naga ega talua nasaupianaa ki naka
ni Yudea, Felix e doropusi Paulo e
pei tea soliana doko.

na e umai paki navanua, edaku ki

nae e naga ega turnana pano paki

wanogoe, euga vasadipa e asa.

NGUHA-TONGOAN K.T.
Ma Paulo e naga, A lawodu narae 10
ni malo tasake ni na vasapotaeana ki
Kaisar, tokora waina e pia naga aga
vei tea vasapotaeana asa : a da mari
dagele paki naka ni Yudea mau, go
nigo ma ku atae mata ki nia. Ma all
pe vei tea mari dagele, po mari te •
navatuna waina e pia ki namateana,
a pe ta pavara naga aga ta mate
mau : ma te navatuna ni tea maga
wanogoe, waina nara waia eu pasa-
dipa au ara, e pe ta doko mau, te
naata e pe ta mariatae pitua ki
nau paki da mau. A soso Kaisar.
Eagi wanogoe Festo,_ ragi waina e 12
pusufnaki sua paki tea vasapotae
maga, e pasadara, e naga, Ku soso
Kaisar : pa wo pano punusi Kaisar.
Go ragi waina naaleatia seara eu 13
nopu, Acrippa nawota go Bernike
ero umai paki Kaisarea, po pasa do-
domi Festo. Go ragi waina ero doko 14
asa naaleatia lapa, Festo e noa ki
sai nawota naleo nalo ni Paulo, e
naga, Naatamoli sikai e doko waina
Felix e doropusi a e pei tea soliana
doko: waina, ragi waina a doko 15
Yerusalem, tea viri warua maga
go tea matua maga ni naka ni
Yudea eu dapusukao ki nia paki
nau, po datago naga ega vei tea
tipakotoviana. Go a pasadara paki 16
da, naga e da pei natomariana ki
naka ni Eoma mau naga euga vitua
kite naata, pa pa pa tea vasadipa-
ana ega veani tea vasadipa maga
euga lawodu naraena, go ega tape
ragi naga ega turnana pasakorokoro
e nalo ni navasadipaana. Go ragi 17
waina eu saisai umai paki nea, a da
mari daliali mau, ma matamai ki
nia a dasake malo tasake ni navasa-
potaeana,po dipa ki naatamoli wano-
goe naga ega vei tea viragiana umai.

duleana, eu da noa te navasadipaana
ni tea sa maga nalo kakana mau
dapala waina kinau a midoa ki nia ;
ma eu peani navusuusuana seara 19


dipa e nalo ni nalotuana adeada, go
nalo ni tea sikai Yesu, waina e mate,
waina Paulo e noasokisoki naga e

mau, e pe vei lake tika.

korokoro e tea maga wanogoe, Festo
