go ni namidodoapiaana. Nalakena 26
nawota, waina a pasa piviari paki
nia, e atae nalo ni tea maga wano-
goe : nalakena a saralomau kasua
naga tea maga wanogoe sikai kakada
eda doko loku ki nia mau; nalakena
tea wanogoe e da pei tea mariana
naweloki mau. Nawota Acrippa, 27


ku saralomau profeta maga kite ?
28 A atae naga ku saralomau. Go
Acrippa e noa ki Paulo, e naga, Ku
masauna naga pa mari au aga vei
Kristiano ki navasadie-kiki-kiana.
29 Go Paulo e naga, A masau paki
Supe, naga e pe vei ki tea kiki kite
e pe vei ki tea warua, nigo pa ta
sikima asa mau, ma naga tea maga
mamau puti waina eu dogo au ma-
soso, kuga mamau pei tea mariana
kuga dapala waina kinau a doko,
masale ki natalisolisoli maga waia.
30 Go nawota e duleana. nara ma
tea maramara, go Bernike, go tea
maga waina eu dasake sikoti ra, eu
31 mamau duleana : go ragi waina eu
paki malo daki eu duinada pasa paki
da, po naga, Naatamoli waia e da
mari te navatuna waina e pia ki
namateana kite ki natali solisoli
32 mau. Go Acrippa e noa ki Festo,
e naga, Naatanioli waia e pe ta soso
Kaisar mau, e pe mari atae pei tea
veresiana.
Matele 27.
1 Go ragi waina e pei tea midoaki-
potaeana naga auga vorau paki
Italia pano, eu pitua ki Paulo go tea
soliana pota seara paki senturio
sikai nagisana lulio, tea ni tagona
2 ki Aucusto. Go au pagi rarua ni
Adramittio sikai, waina e naga ega
sava paki tokora maga ni elau ni
Asia, po porau pano, Aristarko, tea
ni Thessalonika ni Masedonia sikai,
3 e sikoti garni pano. Go matamai
ki ilia au paki euta Sidon : go lulio
e saupia ki Paulo, po suasua ki nia
naga ega va punusi tana ri maga
4 naga ega sua nadodomiana. Go au
meludua ki tokora wanogoe, po
porau etano ki Kupero, nalakena
nalagi maga waina eu sau pae ki
5 vea. Go ragi waina au porau dua-
goto sua natasi waina e doko pai
Kilikia go Pamfilia, au rumai paki
Mira ni Likia. Go tokora wano- G
goe senturio e papai rarua sikai ni
Alexanderia waina e sava paki
Italia ; go e mari garni au pagi ki
nia. Go ragi waina au porau daliali 7
sua naaleatia lapa, po umai ki na
kasuaana paki kivea ki Knido, go,
nalakena nalagi e da moro suasua ki
garni mau, au porau etano ki Krete,
kivea ki Salmone; go au porau 8
orovi a ki nakasuana po umai paki
tokora sikai waina e pei tea sosoana
ki Nawora Wia maga ; waina na
tokoana Lasea e pei inaladigi ki nia.
Go ragi waina ragi varau e nopu, 9
go navorauana e po sa, nalakena
naaleatia ni Navaliana e po pano
sua, Paulo e pasa parati ki da, po 10
noa ki da, e naga, Mariki maga, a
punusi naga navorauana waia ega
wo pilake namarisakiana go natape-
puolikiana warua, nalo riki musagi-
ana go rarua eroga wo da sikida sua
e mau, ma namauriana anigida ma
ega wo sua e. Ma senturio e dogo 11
parati ki parua ki nawota ni
rarua go ni talakeana, ma e dogo
parati ki kiki ki tea maga waina eu
pei tea noaana pae Paulo. Go nala- 12
kena nawora wanogoe e da pia naga.
euga toko asa ragi ni namaladiana
mau, tea lapa kakada eu pitua ki
namidodoana adeada naga euga
vorau meludua ki nia pano, eu pe
alagoro mariatae umai paki Poinix,
po doko asa ragi ni namaladiana ; e
pei nawora sikai ni Krete waina e leo
paki nalagi tokolau wia go ruatu.
Go ragi waina nalagi ni sautli e sau 13
matemate, eu midoa ki nia naga eu
papai tea waina eu masauna, go eu
pua dakati agkora po porau orovi
Krete, maladigi ki euta. Ma edaku 14
ki ragi e da parau mau, nalagi atu
sikai e atu siwo pae asa umai, waina
e pei tea sosoana ki Eurakulo ; go 15
ragi waina rarua e pei tea vuatiana,
po mari sa punusi namata ni nalagi,
au pitua ki nia, po pei tea tapeana


16 pano. Go au sava paki etano ki
naure kiki sikai waina e pei tea soso-
ana ki Kauda, po mariatae ki naka-
-17 suaana mari soki boti: go ragi waina
eu puati sua e pakilagi, eu dape tea
silae maga, po soli soki rarua ara ;
go, nalakena eu mataku eu pe vei tea
nadikiana paki Sirti, eu doro natira
pakitano, po pei tea tapeana pano
18 dapala nogoe. Go nalakena nalagi
atu e mari garni au datasoki parua,
matamai ki nia eu pae asa nadi ki
19 naloriki musagiana paki natasi; go
wasa ki nia eu nadi ki naleo maga ni
20 rarua ki namelearuda. Go ragi
waina elo go masoe maga eu da
maramalaga mau naaleatia lapa, go
nalagi atu e da kiki mau e one garni
one, naleogoroana naga auga vei tea
mautipauriana e po pei tea tapelua-
-21 ana puti. Go ragi waina eu do pali
doko ragi varau, ragi wanogoe Paulo
e lawodu maleoputo kakadu, po
naga, Mariki maga, ku pe dogo
parati ki nau, po da porau pae
Krete mau, po da dalua namari-
sakiana go natapepuolikiana waia
22 mau, e pe wia. Go ragi waia a
pasa parati ki mu naga kuga
marasike : nalakena namauriana ki
te naata kakamu ega wo da puoli
mau, ma rarua ega wo sikina puoli.
23 Nalakena agelo sikai ki Supe waina
e peani au, go waina a maneana
suasua, e lawo du pisari au pogi
24 waia, po naga, Pa ta mataku mau,
Paulo ; e one ako one naga pa lawo
du narae ni Kaisar : go pa leo, Supe
e po dua ko tea maga mamau puti
25 waina eu porau sikotiko. Nalakena
tea wanogoe kuga marasike, mariki
maga : nalakena a saralomau nava-
saana ki Supe, naga ega wo pakilina
dapala waina e po pei tea noa ki
26 nau-ana. Ma e one gida one naga
tuga vei tea nadikiana paki euta
te naure sikai.
27 Ma ragi waina napogiana kerua-
lima sikai tamate kevati e umai, go
au pei tea tape dagiagikiana natasi
ni Adria, pogi matua natamoli ni
rarua eu midoa ki nia naga eu rumai
paki fnaladigi kite navanua sikai;
go eu nadidorogo, po papai tau 28
rualima rua : go edaku ki ragi kiki,
eu moro nadidorogo, po papai tau
rualima sikai tamate lima. Go 29
nalakena eu mataku mase eu pe vei
tea nadikiana paki euta malo ni
vatu, eu diroa ki agkora pati pae ki
edaku, po masau parua ki aleati. Go 30
ragi waina naatamoli ni rarua eu
laga naga euga sava meludua ki
rarua pano, po doro sua boti paki
natasi, ki nakokorokiana, dapala eu
pe naga euga tiroa ki agkora seara
pae ki vea, Paulo e noa ki senturio 31
go tea ni navakalo maga, e naga,
Nara eu pe ta doko rarua mau, ku
pe mari sa pei tea mautipauriana.
Ragi wanogoe tea ni navakalo maga 32
eu masi kotovi namea maga ni boti,
po doro e e sale pano. Go ragi 33
waina aleati e pei fnaladigi, Paulo e
pavarani puti ra naga euga kani
navinaga seara, e naga, Masoso e
pei naaleatia kerualima sikai tamate
kevati waina ku do leogoro po pali
doko, po da gani te navatuna mau.
Nalakena tea wanogoe a pavarani 34
mu naga kuga kani navinaga seara :
nalakena tea wanogoe e pei tea raki
namautipauri-mu-ana : nalakena
napati ni nalolu sikai ega wo da puoli
ki napau ni te naata sikai kakamu
mau. Go ragi waina e noa sua tea 35
wanogoe, po dape sua bred, e pasa
dodomata ki Supe narae ni tea
maga mamau puti: go e dovaporae
a, po pae asa ganikani. Ragi wano- 36
goe eu mamau puti marasike, go
nara ma eu gani navinaga seara. Go 37
au mamau puti waina au doko rarua
au pei naatamoli ponotia dua rua-
lima takuna larua tamate latesa.
Go ragi waina eu ganikani puka sua, 38
eu mari rarua e masalesale, eu nadi
ki korn paki natasi. Go ragi waina 39


e pei aleati, eu da atae navanua
man ; ma eu pumxsi naweloki
sikai waina e pei nawora sikai, go
eu pusumaki eu pe mariatae mari
40 rarua ega vaki euta asa. Go
eu peresilua agkora maga, po
doropusi ra eu madoko natasi, go
ragi sikai maau wanogoe eu peresi
namea maga ni nawose wowolau
dua ; go eu pua pakilagi ki nalae
ni kivea paki nalagi, po powolau
41 paki euta. Ma eu duapalausi
tokora sikai waina natasi dua
ero saisai asa, go eu man rarua e
paki euta; go kivea e gona po
kasua doko, ma kiedaku e pae asa
maworawora ki nakasuaana ni
42 napeao maga. Go namidoakipotae-
ana ki tea ni navakalo maga e pei
naga euga maripunue tea soliana
maga, naga te naata sikai kakada
ega ta ava paki euta, po sava pano
43 mau. Ma senturio, nalakena e ma-
sauna naga ega mautipauri Paulo, e
dipagoro ra namidoakimasauana
adeada ; po pitipaki naga tea maga
waina eu ava atae euga tumada nadi
ki da paki natasi, po pea paki euta
44 pea : go naga tea pota maga, seara
euga one napapa maga, go seara
euga one naleo pota maga ni rarua.
Go dapala nogoe e pakilina naga eu
mamau puti pei tea mautipauriana
paki'euta.
Matele 28.
1 Go ragi waina au pei tea mauti-
pauriana sua, au atae ragi wanogoe
naga naure wanogoe e pei tea sosoana
2 ki Melita. Go naatatoko maga eu
pisei ki garni nadodomi-naatamoli-
ana waina e da pei tea fnoli mau : na
lakena eu sui nakapu sikai, po piragi
soki puti garni, nalakena usa waina
e lawodu garni, go nalakena na
3 maladiana. Ma ragi waina Paulo e
piladaua ki taua ni nakau kokolo
sikai, po doropusi ra nakapu, ffiaata
sa sikai e dave umai nalakena navi-
vitinuana, po liko nainelearuna. Go 4
ragi waina natatoko maga eu punusi
nalo mauri wanogoe e dau pae
nainelearuna, eu dufnada noa ki da,
eu naga, Naatainoli waia e pei tea
maripunue lomau, waina e po pei tea
mautipauriana pa dua ki natasi, ma
Nasikoana e da suasua ki nia naga
ega mauri mau. Ma e polu ki nalo 5
mauri wanogoe paki nakapu, po da
sua te nasaana mau. Ma eu leogoro 6
naga ega topu, kite naga ega rowo
pakitano po mate maraverave : ma
ragi waina eu leogoro ragi varau, po
da punusi te navatuna sa e pakilina
ki nia mau, eu midoa ki doa, po noa
naga e pei supe sikai.
Go inaladigi ki tokora wanogoe 7
vanua seara eu doko waina eu pei
tea ki naatainoli vea ni naure wano-
goe, nagisana Poplio ; waina e piragi
soki garni, po pakale fnata ki garni
naaleatia dolu. Go e pakilina naga 8
Poplio tamana e sasana one, e sua
namasakiana go nasidomialaana : go
Paulo e paki ekopu punusi a, po
dapasavasa, go e pusake nainele-
aruna maga asa po maripauri a. Go 9
ragi waina tea wanogoe e pei tea
mariana sua, tea pota maga ni naure
wanogoe waina eu sua nasasanaana
maga nara ma eu rumai, po pei tea
maripauriana : go eu dodomadagani
garni ki nadodomadaganiana lapa ;
go ragi waina au porau pano, eu 10
maginami duatua rarua naleo maga
waina au dika ara.
Go edaku ki atelagi dolu au porau 11
rarua ni Alexanderia sikai, waina e
doko naure wanogoe ragi ni nama-
ladiana, waina navaivaiana kakana
e pei Nedue Naanoai. Go au paki 12
euta Sirakuse, po doko asa doko
naaleatia dolu. Go au meludua ki 13
tokora wanogoe, po daliviri umai
paki Recio : go edaku ki naaleatia
sikai nalagi ni sautli sikai e sau, go
wasa ki nia au rumai paki Puteoli:


14 waina au papai taigida seara asa,
po pei tea vavaraniana naga auga
toko sikoti ra naaleatia larua : go
au dapala nogoe umai paki Roma.
15 Go taigida naaga, ragi waina eu dogo
garni, eu pae asa umai naga ,euga
sua garni pa pa pa paki Malo ni
Navakokotoana id Appio, go Na
suma ni Namenakiana Dolu: go
ragi waina Paulo e punusi ra, e
pasadodomata ki Supe, po mara-
sike.
16 Go ragi waina au rumai paki
Roma, Paulo e pei tea suasuakiana
naga ega toko mamau sikoti naata-
fnoli ni navakalo sikai waina e do
pavaigoro e.
17 Go e pakilina, naga edaku ki na
aleatia dolu nae e soso saisai ki tea
maga waina eu pei tea vea ni tea ni
Yudea: go ragi waina eu saisai umai,
e noa ki da, e naga, Taigu maga,
kinau, waina a da mari te navatuna
dipa narei, kite natomariana maga ki
tamagida maga, a pei tea vituakiana
soliana meludua ki Yerusalem paki
namelearu maga ni tea ni Roma :
18 waina, ragi waina eu puausi sua au,
eu masauna naga euga veresi au,
nalakena te nalakena ni namateana
19 eda doko au mau. Ma ragi waina
tea ni Yudea eu pasa dugoro e, a
pei tea mariana a soso Kaisar ; ma
a da peani te navatuna mau waina
aga vasadipa nalauna aginau asa.
20 Go tea wanogoe e pei nalakena a
pitautau mu naga aga vunusi mu po
pusumaki paki mu; nalakena naleo-
goroana ki Israel e pei nalakena a pei
tea soliana ki namori ni vatu waia.
21 Go eu noa ki nia, eu naga, Kinami
au da dape te tusi pae Yudea nalo
kakama mau, go te naata sikai ni
taigida maga e da umai po dogorogo
kite pasa te navatuna sa nalo
22 kakama mau. Ma au masauna
naga auga rogo kiama tea waina ku
midoa ki nia: nalakena nalo ni
tagona waia e pei tea ataeana paki
garni naga e pei tea vasadugoroana
sara tokora.
Go ragi waina eu maneana datuta 23
ki naaleatia sikai, eu rumai punusi
a paki tokora waina e menaki asa,
eu lapa; go e pasa lawolawo hi
nia paki da, po noa sokisoki kasua
ki namarakiana ki Supe, po pasadie
ra nalo ni Yesu, pae nawotaeana ki
Moses go pae profeta maga, e pae
malipogi pa pa paki ragi melu. Go 24
te seara eu saralomau tea maga
waina eu pei tea noaana, go te seara
eu da saralomau mau. Go ragi 25
waina eu pasa pano pota durnada
paki da, eu pano, edaku ki Paulo e
noa sua navasaana sikai, e naga,
Naatana Tapu e pasa pia pae
Isaiak profeta paki tamamu maga,
e naga, 26
Pa va punusi narei waia, po naga,
Kuga wo dogo ki narogoana, po
da midoakiatae mau;
Go kuga wo leosai pe do leosai,
po da leoatae mau :
Nalakena napopo ni narei waia e 27
manopunopu,
Go eu dogo madagadaga ki nada-
ligada maga,
Go eu puluti namatada ;
Naga euga ta punusi ki namatada
Po da dogo ki nadaligada mau,
Po da midoakiatae ki napopoda
Po da liliu umai mau,
Go naga aga ta maripauri ra mau.
Nalakena tea wanogoe ega vei tea 28
ataeana paki mu, naga namauti-
pauriana waia ki Supe e pei tea tipa-
kiluaana paki tea ni nalauna pota -
maga : go nara euga wo dogo e.
[Go ragi waina e noa sua tea maga 29
wanogoe, tea ni Yudea eu pano,
po peani navusuusuana warua du-
mada paki da.]
Go e doko natau mamau dua 30
nasufna vasadapuiana aneana, po
piragi sold tea maga mamau puti


31 waina eu paki ekopu punusi a, edo ni Nawota Yesu Kristo ki sara
dogorogo ki namarakiana ki Supe, naviviariana, te naata eda dipagoro
po do pasapisei ki da tea maga nalo e asa mau.
EPISTOLE KI PAULO APOSTOLO
EA NI ROMA MAGA
Matele 1
1 Paulo, tea suasua sikai ki Yesu
Kristo, tea sosoana naga ega vei
apostolo sikai, tea marimasalekiana
paki narogorogoana wia ki Supe,
2 waina e pea sai a pae profeta aneana
maga doko navasaana midiriana
3 tapu maga, nalo ni Natuna, waina e
pakilina e pei nawora ni David pae
4 napokasina, waina e pei tea viseiki-
ana ki nakasuaana naga e pei Supe
Natuna pae naatana ni natapuana
ki namoroduleanaana ni tea mate
maga; Yesu Kristo Nawota anigida,
5 waina au dapenasaupiaanagonavei-
apostoloana pae asa paki narogo-
paratikiana ni nasaralomauana
maleoputo ni ualauna maga mamau
6 puti, nalakena nagisana : go nimu
ma ku pei tea sosoana maleoputo
kakada naga kuga vei tea ki Yesu
7 Kristo : a midiri paki tea maga
mamau puti waina ku doko Roma,
tea dodomiana ki Supe, tea sosoana
naga kuga vei tea tautau maga :
Nasaupiaana ega vei animu go na
taffiateana pae Supe Tamagida go
Nawota Yesu Kristo.
8 Tea vea, a pasadodoinata ki Supe
aginau pae Yesu Kristo nalo kakamu
mamau puti, nalakena nasaralomau-
ana animu e pei tea rogorogokiana
usuraki maramana mamau. Nala- 9
kena Supe e pei tea noasokisoki
aginau, waina a do maneana suasua
ki naatagu narogorogoana wia ki
Natuna, naga a do mari pitipatipa
ki namidoakinoa-mu-ana, sara ragi
doko natapasavasaana aginau maga,
a do pavara, mase a pe wo pei 10
tea suasuakiana ragi waia kite tea
ragi pae namasauana ki Supe naga
aga valoti punusi mu. Nalakena 11
a masau parua ki naga aga vunusi
mu, naga aga tua mu te navituaana
sikai ni naatana, naga kuga vei
tea lawosokiana ; tea .wanogoe e 12
pei, naga aga vei tea vakavaka-
leana sikoti mu maleoputo kakamu,
pae nasaralomauana waina e doko
gida doko, kinau pae tea animu,
go nimu pae tea aginau. Go ada 13
masauna mau naga nimu kuga vei
sapo, tai maga, naga a paka lapa
midoa ki nia naga aga valoti punusi
mu (po pei tea tugoroana asa pa pa
paki ragi waia), naga aga veani nawa
seara doko mu, ega tapala waina e
doko tea ni nalauna pota maga.
Naleo ki tea ni Hellas maga go ki 14
tea maga waina eu da pei tea ni Hellas
mau, naleo ki tea manumatua maga
go ki tea manumatavusa maga e one
au one. Dapala nogoe, dapala waina 15
a mariatae a dakaraka naga aga


rogorogo ki narogorogoana wia paki
16 mu waina ku doko Roma. Nalake
na a da maliere ki narogorogoana
wia man : nalakena e pei nakasua-
ana ki Supe paki namautipauriana
magi sara naata waina eu saralomau;
e magi tea ni Yudea pea, go e magi
17 tea ni Hellas. Nalakena namari-
naleoleanaana ki Supe e pei tea noa
pakasakiana asa pae nasaralomau-
ana paki nasaralomauana; dapala
waina e pei tea midiriana, e naga,
Ma tea leana ega wo mauri pae na
saralomauana.
18 Nalakena namaetoana ki Supe e
pei tea noapakasakiana pae nakoro-
atelagi umai dipa sara nasigisigileo-
ana go sara namarinaleotageleoana
ki naatamoli maga, waina eu puasoki
nalomauana pakitano ki namarina-
-19 leotageleana ; nalakena tea ataeana
ni Supe e doko lina ara ; nalakena
Supe e mari a e doko lina ki da.
20 Nalakena tea maga kakana waina
eu da pei tea vunusiana mau pae
ragi ni natawanakiana ni maramana
pa pa, eu pei tea leopaiana, eu pei
tea midoakiataeana pae tea maga
waina eu pei tea mariana, nakasua-
ana aneana waina e du mau du go
navei-Supe-ana kakana ; naga euga
21 tika navasakorokoroana : nalakena
ragi waina eu atae Supe eu da
samasamani a mau dapala e pei
Supe, go eu da pasadodofnataki
mau ; ma eu pei tea palo nalo ni
namidodoana adeada maga, go
napopoda waina e midoakisapo e po
22 maligo. Ragi waina eu do noa naga
eu manumatua, eu po pei tea manu
23 matavusa, po surupioli ki nasama-
samaana ni Supe waina e mate sapo,
raki natakiusiana ni nunu ni naata
inoli waina e mate, go ni manu
maga, go ni tea tuavati maga, go ni
tea kakaravi maga.
24 Nalakena tea wanogoe Supe e
pitua ki da nalo ni namasauana sa
maga ni napopoda paki naloaana,
naga napatokoda euga vei tea
maridaoana inaleoputo kakada : na 25
lakena eu surupioli ki nalomauana
ki Supe raki nasorosoroana, po lotu
ki tea tawanakiana po maneana
suasua po da lotu ki Tea Tawanaki
po da maneana suasua mau, waina
e pei tea vasapiakiana pa pa ega
tu mau du. Amen.
Nalakena tea wanogoe Supe e 26
pitua ki da paki narogoana maga ni
nadododaoana: nalakena nagoroi
adeada maga eu surupioli ki na
mariana waina e pae navakilina-
ana raki tea waina e panopota ki
navakilinaana: go dapala nogoe 27
naanoai maga ma, eu doropusi na
mariana ni nagoroi waina e pae
navakilinaana, po pavaga ki na
masausauana adeada dufnada paki
da, naanoai maga sikoti naanoai
maga po do mari tea leosakiana,
po do dumada dape doko ara na
moriana ni namaripeleana adeada
waina e one asa one.
Go dakiusi waina eu da midoaki- 28
mata ki nia mau naga euga veani
Supe doko naataeana adeada, Supe
e pitua ki-da paki namidodoana
tipadoaana, naga euga mari tea
maga waina eu da pia mau ; eu pei 29
tea vakavuroana ki sara namarina-
leotageleana, nasigisigileoana, na
maiainaguraana, navilosiana; eu
pura ki naroitoiana, namaripunue-
ana, navileana, nasorosoroana, na
kokonaana; tea vasa talakolako 30
maga, tea vasa pinoa maga, tea
vilosi Supe maga, tea marisaki maga,
tea leomadaga maga, tea vasapaka-
vakae maga, tea midoakipai tea sa
maga, tea rogopiri nadaleo ni tea
matua adeada maga, tea midoaki- 31
sapo maga, tea tapiri navasasokiana
maga, tea tika nadodomiana paki
tea adeada maga, tea dodo tika
maga : nara, waina eu atae nata- 32
wanakiana ki Supe, naga tea maga
waina eu do mari tea tapala nogoe


maga eu pia ki namateana, eu do
mari tea maga wanogoe e da sikina
mau, ma eu midoakimata ki tea
maga waina eu do mari ra.
Matele 2.
1 Nalakena tea wanogoe ku pei tea
tika navasakorokoroana, naatamoli
0, sara naata waina ku do pasa-
potae ; nalakena tea waina ku pasa-
potae tea pota asa, ku dumafna
dipakotovi ko asa ; nalakena ragi
waina ku do pasapotae ku do mari
2 tea sikai maau maga wanogoe. Go
tu atae naga navasapotaeana ki
Supe e doko pae nalomauana dipa
tea maga waina eu do mari tea
3 tapala nogoe maga. Go ku midoa
ki tea waia, naatamoli 0, waina ku
do pasapotae tea maga waina eu do
mari tea tapala nogoe maga, go
waina ku do mari tea sikai maau
maga wanogoe, naga nigo pa wo
sava dua ki navasapotaeana ki Supe
4 kite ? Kite ku midoakipalo ki na
sogolapaana ni navakaleana go ni
nasokiana go ni naveimaritasokiana
aneana, po da atae mau naga nava-
kaleana ki Supe e do piragi ko paki
5 namidoakidoaana ? ma pae nakasua-
ana anigo go popo ta midoakidoa
mau ku do manigo daua ki namae-
toana doko naaleatia ni namaetoana
go ni namaripakasakiana ni navasa-
-6 potaeana leana ki Supe ; waina ega
wo lagati dua sara naatamoli euga
sikasikai ega vae nawosiana adeada
7 maga : paki tea maga waina eu do
laga pae nasokiana ni nawosiana wia
nasamasamaana go nadodomadaga-
niana go namesosapoana, namauri-
-8 ana waina e du mau du : ma paki
tea maga waina eu pei tea maripu-
tuaki, po do dogopiri nalomauana,
ma eu dogo parati ki namarinaleo-
tageleana, namaetoana go namarita-
-9 usuana, nariesokiana go narogokite-
saana, paki sara naata ni naatamoli
waina eu do mari tea sa, ni tea ni
Yudea pea, go ni tea ni Hellas ; ma 10
nasamasamaana go nadodomadaga-
niana go natamateana agi sara naata
waina eu do mari tea wia, agi tea ni
Yudea pea, go agi tea ni Hellas ;
nalakena naviragi-narae-ana e da 11
sikoti Supe mau. Nalakena tea 12
maga waina eu dika nawotaeana po
mari naleo sa, euga wo dika nawotae-
ana matepuoli; go tea maga waina
eu mari naleo sa doko nawotae-
ana, euga wo pei tea vasapotaeana
pae nawotaeana : nalakena tea rogo 13
nawotaeana eu da leana narae ni
Supe mau, ma tea mari nawotaeana
euga wo pei tea marileanakiana;
nalakena ragi waina tea ni nalauna 14
pota maga waina eu dika nawotae-
ana eu mari pae navakilinaana tea
maga ni nawotaeana, nara, waina eu
dika nawotaeana, eu dufnada made-
ada pei nawotaeana ; waina eu pisei 15
ki nawosiana ni nawotaeana waina
e pei tea midiriana napopoda, natu-
madaataeana e do noasokisoki sikoti
a, go namidodoana adeada maga
dumada paki da eu do pasadipa kite
eu do pasakorokoro; naaleatia 16
waina Supe ega wo pasapotae tea
surukiana maga ki naatamoli maga
pae narogorogoana wia aginau pae
Yesu Kristo.
Ma nigo ku pe vei tea salagisaana 17
ki tea ni Yudea, po pavatu nawotae-
ana, po pakavakae Supe, po atae 18
namasauana aneana, po maridogo
tea maga waina eu panopota, po pei
tea vasapiseikiana pae nawotaeana,
po dufnama saralomau ako naga ku 19
pei tea maraki tea kesa maga pae
napua, namarama sikai agi tea maga
waina eu doko namaligo, tea vasa- 20
pisei ki tea vei sapo maga, tea
vasapisei ki pipia maga, waina ku
peani namaridawanakiana ni na
ataeana go ni nalomauana doko
nawotaeana ; nalakena tea wanogoe 21
nigo waina ku do pasapisei ki tea


pota, ku da dumama pasapisei ki-go
kite ? ku do dogorogo naga euga ta
panako mau, nigo ku pauako kite ?
22 ku do noa naga euga ta maripele
mau, nigo ku maripele kite ? ku do
mamarago ki nasupe maga, ku
dapepavakoto tea ui nasuma tapu
23 adeada maga kite ? waina ku paka-
vakae nawotaeana, ku dododao
Supe pae natapiriana ni nawotae-
-24 ana kite ? Nalakena nagisa ni Supe
e pei tea vasasakiana nalakena nimu
maleoputo ni tea ni nalauna pota
maga, dapala waina e pei tea midiri-
-25 ana. Nalakena ku pe to marina
wotaena, natovadaviviana e pe vei
tea silae lomau : ma ku pe vei
tea tapiri nawotaeana, natovada-
viviana anigo e pe vei tea mari-
ana e pe ta pei natovadaviviana
26 mau. Nalakena tea wanogoe naata
waina e da pei tea tovadaviviana
mau e pe vavaigoro natawanakiana
maga ni nawotaeana, natikaana
aneana ni natovadaviviana e pe wo
da pei tea midoakiana naga ega vei
27 natovadaviviana kite ? go natika-
ana ni natovadaviviana waina e pei
tea ni navakilinaana, e pe vakavuro
nawotaeana, e pe wo da pasapotae
ko, waina ku pei tea tapiri nawotac-
ana pae navasaana midiriana go
28 natovadaviviana kite ? Nalakena
tea waina e pei tea ni Yudea pae lina
e da pei tea ni Yudea mau ; go tea
waina e pei natovadaviviana pae
lina doko napokasi, e da pei natova-
-29 daviviana mau : ma tea waina e pei
tea ni Yudea pae tea sili e pei tea ni
Yudea ; go natovadaviviana e pei
tea ni napopo, doko naatana, e da
doko navasaana midiriana mau;
waina nasamasamani-a-ana e da pei
tea ni naatafnoli maga mau, ma e
pei tea ni Supe.
Matele 3.
1 Nalakena tea wanogoe navakilagi-
liu-ana ki tea ni Yudea e pei nasava ?
kite nasilaeana ni natovadaviviana
e pei nasava ? E parua pae sara 2
vatuna; tea vea, nalakena eu pei
tea vavatuana ki nanoaana maga ki
Supe. Nalakena te seara eu pe ta 3
saralomau mau e pe tapale sava ?
Natikaana adeada ni nasaralomau-
ana ega wo mari naveilomauana ki
Supe ega vei tea moli kite ? Ega ta 4
dapala nogoe mau: ma Supe ega
vei tea noa lomau, go sara naata-
moli euga vei tea sorosoro ; ega
tapala waina e pei tea midiriana,
e naga,
Naga pa vei tea marileanakiana
nalo ni navasaana anigo maga,
Po marimatua ragi waina pa wo
pei tea vasapotaeana.
Ma namarinaleotageleoana anigida 5
e pe mari namarinaleoleanaana ki
Supe e pe toko lina, tuga noa na
sava ? Supe e pei tea tagele waina
e do pilake namaetoana umai kite ?
(A pasa pae naatafnoli.) Ega ta 6
dapala nogoe mau ; nalakena e pe
tapala nogoe Supe e pe wo pasa-
potae maramana dapale sava ? Ma 7
nalomauana ki Supe e pe warua liu
nalakena nasorosoroana aginau paid
nasamasamaana aneana, ekasana
kinau ma a ko pei tea vasapotaeana
dapala tea marinaleosa sikai ? go 8
ekasana tuga ta noa (ega tapala
waina au pei tea vasasakiana asa, go
dapala waina seara eu noa naga au
noa e), Tuga mari tea sa maga, naga
tea wia maga euga umai; waina
natipakotovi-ra-ana e leana.
Nalakena tea wanogoe nasava ? 9
Tu pia liu ra kite ? Ee, e dika ; na
lakena au pea pasadipa tea ni Yudea
maga go tea ni Hellas maga, naga
eu mamau puti doko etano ki na
marinaleosaana ; dapala waina e pei 10
tea midiriana, e naga,
Tea leana sikai e da doko mau, ■
tea sikai maau edika ;
Tea waina e midoakiatae e da 11
doko mau,


Tea waina e do laga Supe e da
doko man;
12 Eu mamau puti dawasi, eu pei
' taua malasi;
Tea mari naleo pia e da doko
mau, tea sikai maau sa edika:
13 Namanuda e pei matigo wolagati-
ana sikai;
Eu sorosoro ki namenada :
Noai ni namateana ni adder maga
e doko etano ni nagoleda maga :
14 Waina nawokada e pura ki na
vasasakianago kinakokonaana:
15 Nameleda eusavakasua naga euga
ta ki nada ;
16 Namarisakiana gonarogokitesaana
ero doko napua adeada maga ;
17 Go napua ni natamateana eu da
atae a mau ;
18 Namatau-ki-Supe-ana eda doko
kivea ki namatada maga mau.
19 Ma tu atae naga tea maga waina
nawotaeana e noa ra, e pasa ki tea
maga waina eu doko nawotaeana ;
naga sara nawoka euga vunuta, go
maramana mamau euga tapala euga
20 vei tea vasapotaeana ki Supe : na
lakena te napokasi seara euga wo da
pei tea marileanakiana ki nawosiana
maga ni nawotaeana naraena mau :
nalakena naateana ni namarinaleo-
21 saana e pae nawotaeana umai. Ma
ragi waia namarinaleoleanaana sikai
ki Supe e pei tea mariana e dokolina
masale ki nawotaeana, e pei tea
noasokisokiana pae nawotaeana go
22 profeta maga ; namarinaleoleana-
ana ki Supe pae nasaralomau-Yesu
Kristo-ana paki tea maga mamau
puti waina eu saralomau ; nalakena
23 namawota e dika ; nalakena tea
maga mamau puti eu marinaleosa,
po da pa parati ki nasamasamaana
24 ki Supe mau; eu pei tea marileana-
kimolikiana ki nasaupiaana aneana
pae natauluaana waina e doko
25 Kristo Yesu : waina Supe e mari a
e dokolina, naga ega vei naviriana
sikai ki nadana,pae nasaralomauana,
naga ega visei ki namarinaleolea-
naana aneana, nalakena namidoa-
kikalauana ni namarinaleosaana
maga waina eu pei tea mariana sala
vea, doko nasokiana ki Supe; naga 26
ega visei ki namarinaleoleanaana
aneana ragi waia; naga nae ega vei
tea leana; po pei tea marileana ki
tea waina e saralomau Yesu. Na 27
lakena tea wanogoe tea vakavakae-
ana wai ? E pei tea kokoroana pano.
Pae nawotaeana tapale sava ? ni
nawosiana maga kite ? Ee: ma
pae nawotaeana ni nasaralomauana.
Nalakena tea wanogoe, tu midoa ki 28
nia naga naatainoli sikai e pei tea
marileanakiana ki nasaralomauana
masale ki nawosiana maga ni nawo-
taeana. Kite Supe e pei Supe ki tea 29
ni Yudea maga eu sikida ? e da pei
Supe ki tea ni nalauna pota maga
kite ? loro, e pei Supe ki tea
ni nalauna pota maga : Supe e pe 30
vei tea sikai maau, waina ega wo
marileana ki tea tovadaviviana
maga ki nasaralomauana, go ki tea
maga waina eu da pei tea tova-
daviviana mau pae nasaralomauana
adeada. Nalakena tea wanogoe tu 31
mari nawotaeana e pei tea moli
pae nasaralomauana kite ? Ega ta
dapala nogoe mau: ma tu lawo-
kilaketoko nawotaeana.
Matele 4,
Nalakena tea wanogoe tuga noa 1
nasava nalo ni Abraham, tamagida
vea pae napokasi ? Nalakena Abra- 2
ham e pe vei tea marileanakiana
ki nawosiana maga, e pe veani
tea vakavakaeana; ma e da peani
a narae ni Supe mau. Nalakena 3
navasaana midiriana e noa nasava ?
Go Abraham e saralomau navasaana
ki Supe, go e maneana pei tea midoa-
kiana naga ega vei namarinaleo-
leanaana. Ma tea waina e posiwosi, 4
namoriana e da maneana pei tea


midoakiana naga e pae nasaupia-
ana mau, ma e pae nateaoneana.
5 Ma tea waina e da posiwosi mau,
ma e saralomau tea waina e mari
leana ki tea sigisigleo, nasaralomau-
ana aneana e maneana pei tea midoa-
kiana naga ega vei namarinaleo-
-6 leanaana. Dakiusi waina David ma
e noa namaropaana ki naatamoli
waina Supe e maneana midoa ki
namarinaleoleanaana masale ki na
wosiana maga, e naga,
7 Ae namaropaana ki tea maga
waina natapiriana adeada maga
eu pei tea tapeluaana,
Go waina namarinaleosaana ade-
ada maga eu pei tea tapaugoro-
8 Ae namaropaana ki naatamoli
waina Yehovah ega wo da
midoakidipa e namarinaleosa-
ana mau!
9 Ma namaropaana wanogoe e pei tea
noaana naga e umai paki tea tova-
daviviana maga, kite e paki tea
maga waina eu da pei tea tova-
daviviana mau 1 Nalakena tu naga,
Nasaralomauana ki Abraham e
maneana pei tea midoakiana naga
10 ega vei namarinaleoleanaana. Ma
e pei tea midoakiana asa ragi waina
e dapale sava ? ragi waina e pei tea
tovadaviviana sua, kite ragi waina
e ko da pei tea tovadaviviana mau ?
E da pei ragi waina e pei tea tova-
daviviana sua mau, ma e pei ragi
waina e ko da pei tea tovadaviviana
11 mau: go e dape navaivaiana ni
natovadaviviana, wotu sikai ni na
niarinaleoleanaana ni nasaralomau-
ana aneana ragi waina e ko da pei
tea tovadaviviana mau : naga ega
vei tama ni tea maga mamau puti
waina eu saralomau, ragi waina eu
da pei tea tovadaviviana mau,
naga namarinaleoleanaana ega vei
tea midoakiana naga ega vei ade-
-12 ada ; go tama ni tea tovadaviviana
maga, tea maga waina eu da pei tea
ni natovadaviviana sikina mau, ma
waina eu surata pae naatuihele-
ana maga ni nasaralomauana ki
tamagida Abraham waina e pei
aneana ragi waina e ko da pei tea
tovadaviviana mau. Nalakena na 13
saiana paki Abraham kite paki na
woraworana, naga nae ega vei tea
veani pioli ki maramana, e da pae na
wotaeana mau, ma e pae namari-
naleoleanaana ni nasaralomauana
umai. Nalakena tea maga waina 11
eu pei tea ni nawotaeana eu pe vei
tea veani pioli maga, nasaralomau-
ana e pe vei tea mariana e pe vei
tea palo, go nasaiana e pe vei tea
mariana epe vei tea iholi: nalakena 15
nawotaeana e mari namaetoana;
ma tokora waina nawotaeana e da
doko asa mau, natapiriana e da doko
asa mau. Nalakena tea waia el 6
fei tea ni nasaralomauana, naga ega
vae nasaupiaana; naga nasaiana
ega magi naworaworana mamau
puti pei tea lawosokiana; ega ta
magi tea maga waina eu pei tea ni
nawotaeana eu masikida mau, ma
ega magi tea maga waina ma eu pei
tea ni nasaralomauana ki Abraham,
waina e pei tamagida mamau puti
(dapala waina e pei tea midiriana, e 17
naga, A po mari ko ku pei tama ni
nalauna lapa) narae ni tea waina e
saralomau asa, Supe, waina e do
pakamauri ki tea mate maga, po do
soso naleo maga waina eu da doko
mau, dapala waina eu pe toko.
Waina ragi waina ero pano pota ki 18
naleogoroana e saralomau naleogoro-
ana, naga ega vei tama ni nalauna
lapa', ega tapala tea waina e pei tea
noa-sua-ana, e naga, Naworaworama
euga tapalana. Go e da pei tea 19
mariana e manainai nasaralomauana
mau ragi waina e midoa ki napato-
kona naga e mate sua (e pei tea ni
natau ponotia sikai), go ki namate-
ana ni nasufha ni kanao ni Sarah ;
go nalo ni nasaiana ki Supe e da 20


midoakisara ki natikaana ni nasara-
lomauana mau, ma e pei tea mariana
e kasua ki nasaralomauana, po do
21 dua Supe nasamasamaana ; go e
saralomau pakavuro naga e mari-
-22 atae mari tea waina e sai a. Go
nalakena tea wanogoe e maneana pei
tea midoakiana naga ega vei namari-
-23 naleoleanaana. Ma e da pei tea
midiriana nalakena nae e masikina
mau, naga e maneana pei tea
24 midoakiana ; ma e pei tea midiriana
nalakena nigida, waina ega wo ma-
nigida pei tea midoakiana, waina
tu saralomau tea waina e sike Yesu
Nawota anigida e duleana meludua
25 ki tea mate maga, waina e pei tea
vituakiana nalakena natapiriaiia
anigida maga, go waina e pei tea
sikeana e duleana nalakena namari-
leana-ki-gida-ana.
Matele 5.
1 Nalakena tea wanogoe waina tu
pei tea marileanakiana ki nasara-
lomauana tuga veani natamataeana
paki Supe pae Nawota anigida Yesu
2 Kristo; waina tu peani pae asa
naviragiana ki nasaralomauana
paki nasaupiaana wanogoe waina tu
lawodu asa, go tu do pakavakae
nalakena naleogoroana ni nasama-
-3 samaana ki Supe. Go tea tvanogoe
e da sikina mau, ma tu pakavakae
nalakena nariesokiana maga : tu
atae naga nariesokiana _e mari
4 nasokiana ; go nasokiana e mari
namaridogoana; go namaridogoana
5 e mari naleogoroana: go naleo-
goroana e da mari gida tu maliere
mau; nalakena nadodomiana ki
Supe e pei tea takiana napopogida
pae Naatana Tapu waina e pei tea
6 vituakiana paki gida. Nalakena
ragi waina nigida tu ko manainai
doko, Kristo e magi tea sigisigileo
7 maga mate ragi kakana. Nalakena
e inaladigi mari sa pei tea mariana
naga te naata sikai ega magi tea
leana sikai mate: nalakena mase te
naata sikai e pe viviari magi tea
wia mate. Ma Supe e mari nadodo- 8
miana aneana paki gida e dokolina,
nalo ni, ragi waina nigida tu ko
pei tea mari naleo sa maga, Kristo e
manigida mate. Nalakena tea wano- 9
goe, waina tu pei tea marileanakiana
ragi waia ki nadana, tuga wo pei tea
mautipauriana pae asa rnelu dua ki
namaetoana hi Supe ega warua liu.
Nalakena ragi waina tu pei tea 10
kokona maga, tu pe vei tea mariana
tu pe vei popo wia paki Supe pae
namateana ki Natuna, ragi waina
tu pei tea mariana tu pei popo wia
sua, tu pe wo pei tea mautipauriana
pae namauriana aneana e pe warua
liu; go tea wanogoe eda sikina 11
mau, ma tu do pakavakae Supe pae
Nawota anigida Yesu Kristo, waina
tu dape navei-popo-wia-ana pae asa
ragi waia.
Nalakena tea wanogoe, dapala 12
waina namarinaleosaana e umai
paki maramana pae naatamoli sikai,
go namateana e umai pae namarina-
leosaana ; go dapala nogoe namate-
ana e umai paki naatamoli maga
mamau puti, nalakena tea maga
mamau puti eu mari naleo sa: —
nalakena namarinaleosaana e doko 13
maramana pa pa paki nawotaeana :
ma namarinaleosaana e da pei tea
midoakidipaana mau ragi waina
nawotaeana e da doko mau. Ma 14
namateana e maramara pae Adam
pa pa paki Moses, dapau tea maga
waina eu da mari naleo sa pae na
takiusiana ni natapiriana ki Adam
mau, waina e pei naatulakeana ni
tea waina e naga ega umai. Ma el 5
da dapala natapiriana, navituamoli-
kiana ma e da dakiusi a mau.
Nalakena tea lapa eu pe mate ki
natapiriana ki tea sikai, nasaupia-
ana ki Supe, go navituaana pae na
saupiaana ki naatamoli sikai, Yesu


Kristo, ero pe vei tea warua liu paki
16 tea lapa e pe warua liu. Go eda
dapala pae tea sikai waina e mari
naleo sa, navituaana e da dakiusi
a mau; nalakena navasapotaeana
e pae tea sikai umai paki natipako-
toviana, ma navituamolikiana e pae
natapiriana lapa umai paki namari-
-17 leanakiana. Nalakena namateana e
pe maramara ki natapiriana ki tea
sikai pae tea sikai; tea maga waina
eu dape nawarualiuana ni nasaupia-
ana go ni navituaana ni namarina-
leoleanaana eu pe wo maramara na
mauriana pae tea sikai, Yesu Kristo,
18 e pe warua liu. Nalakena tea wa-
nogoe dapala waina navasapotaeana
pae natapiriana sikai e umai paki
naatamoli maga mamau puti paki
natipakotoviana; dapala nogoe na
vituamolikiana ma pae namariana
leana sikai e umai paki naata
ffioli maga mamau puti paki namari -
19 leanakiana ni namauriana. Nalake-,
na dakiusi waina tea lapa eu pei tea
mariana eu pei tea mari naleo sa pae
narogopiriana ki naatamoli sikai,
dapala nogoe tea lapa euga wo pei tea
mariana euga wo leana pae narogo-
-20 paratikiana ki tea sikai. Go na
wotaeana e umai paki asa, naga na
tapiriana ega lapa; ma tokora waina
namarinaleosaana e lapa asa, nasau-
piaana e parua asa paruparua liu;
21 naga, dakiusi waina namarinaleosa-
ana e maramara doko namateana,
dapala nogoe nasaupiaana ma ega
maramara pae namarinaleoleanaana
paki namauriana waina e du mau
du pae Yesu Kristo Nawota anigida.
Matele 6.
1 Nalakena tea wanogoe tuga wo
noa nasava ? Tuga toko namarina-
leosaana doko naga nasaupiaana ega
2 lapa kite ? Ega ta dapala nogoe
mau. Nigida waina tu mate paki
namarinaleosaana tuga ko mauri
doko asa dapale sava ? Kite ku pei 3
sapo naga tea maga waina tu pei tea
bapetizoana paki Kristo Yesu tu pei
tea bapetizoana paki namateana
aneana ? Nalakena tea wanogoe tu 4
pei tea ovakiana sikoti a pae na
bapetizoana paki namateana : naga
dakiusi waina Kristo e pei tea
sikeana duleana melu dua ki tea
mate maga pae nasamasamaana ki
Tamana, dapala nogoe nigida ma
tuga surata pae naveiteavauana ni
namauriana. Nalakena tu pe saisai 5
ki nia natakiusiana ni namateana
aneana, tu pe wo moro saisai ki nia
natakiusiana ni namoroduleanaana
aneana; doko atae tea waia, naga 6
naatamoli tuai kakagida e pei tea
turiana sikoti a nakau valadagoto,
naga napatoko ni namarinaleosaana
ega vei tea maripuolikiana, naga
nigida tuga ta moro pei naviti ni
namarinaleosaana mau ; nalakena 7
tea waina e mate e pei tea marileana-
kiana melu dua ki namarinaleosa-
ana. Ma tu pe mate sikoti Kristo, 8
tu pe saralomau naga tuga wo moro
mauri sikoti a; doko atae naga 9
Kristo waina e pei tea sikeana dule-
ana melu dua ki tea mate maga ega
wo da moro mate mau ; namateana
e da moro maramara dapau sa mau.
Nalakena namateana waina e mate 10
asa, e paka sikai maau mate paki
namarinaleosaana: ma namauriana
waina e mauri asa e mauri paki
Supe. Dapala nogoe nimu ma kuga 11
tumamu midoa ki mu naga ku pei
tea mate paki namarinaleosaana,
ma tea mauri paki Supe doko
Kristo Yesu.
Nalakena tea wanogoe namarina- 12
leosaana ega ta maramara napato-
komu mau waina ega wo mate, naga
kuga rogo parati ki namasauana sa
kakana maga : go kuga ta pitua ki 13
naleo kakamu maga paki namarina-
leosaana mau, dapala naleo ni na
wosiwosiana maga ni namarinaleo


tageleana ; ma kuga tufnamu pitua
ki mu paki Supe, dapala tea mauri
maga melu dua ki tea mate maga, go
naleo kakamu maga euga tapala
naleo ni nawosiwosiana maga ni
14 namarinaleoleanaana paki Supe. Na
lakena namarinaleosaana ega wo da
maramara dapau mu mau; nalakena
ku da doko etano ki nawotaeana
mau, ma ku doko etano ki nasau-
piaana.
15 Nalakena tea wanogoe nasava ?
tuga mari naleo sa, nalakena tu da
doko etano ki nawotaeana mau, ma
tu doko etano ki nasaupiaana kite ?
16 Ega ta dapala nogoe mau. Ku da
atae naga tea waina ku dumamu
pitua ki mu paki asa dapala tea
suasua maga paki narogoparatiki-
ana, ku pei tea suasua maga ki tea
waina ku dogo parati ki nia ; tea
suasua maga ki namarinaleosaana
paki namateana, kite ki narogo-
paratikiana paki namarinaleoleana-
-17 ana ? Ma Supe ega vei tea vasado-
domatakiana, nalakena ku pei tea
suasua maga ki namarinaleosaana,
ma ku dogo parati ki pae napopomu
naatulakeana ni navasapiseikiana
waina ku pei tea vituakiana paki
18 asa; go ragi waina ku pei tea
veresiana melu dua ki namarinaleo-
saana, ku pei tea suasua maga ki
19 namarinaleoleanana. A pasa pae
naatamoli maga nalakena namanai-
naiana ni napokasimu: nalakena da-
kiusiwainaku pituaki naleo kakamu
maga naga euga vei tea suasua
maga ki naloaana go ki namarina-
leotageleana paki marinaleotagele-
ana, kuga vitua ki ega tapala nogoe
ragi waia naleo kakamu maga, naga
euga vei tea suasua maga ki nama-
rinaleoleanaana paki namaridautau-
-20 kiana. Nalakena ragi waina ku pei
tea suasua maga ki namarinaleosa-
ana, ku pei tea veresiana nalo ni
21 namarinaleolenaana. Nalakena tea
wanogoe ku peani nawa nasava ragi
wanogoe nalo ni tea maga waina
ku maliere ara ragi waia % nalakena
namatapago edaku ni tea maga
wanogoe e pei namateana. Ma ragi 22
waia waina ku pei tea veresiana asa
meludua ki namarinaleosaana, po
pei tea suasua maga ki Supe, ku
peani nawamu paki namaridautau-
kiana, go namatapago edaku kakana
namauriana waina e du mau du.
Nalakena namoriana ni namarina- 23
leosaana e pei namateana; ma
navituainolikiana ki Supe e pei
namauriana waina e du mau du doko
Kristo Yesu Nawota anigida.
Matele 7.
Kite ku pei sapo, tai maga (na 1
lakena a pasa ki tea maga waina eu
atae nawotaeana), naga nawotaeana
e maramara dapau natamoli sikai
ragi waina e mauri doko ? Nalake- 2
na nagoroi waina e peani anawota
e pei tea soliana ki nawotaeana paki
anawota ragi waina e mauri doko ;
ma anawota e pe mate e pe vei tea
veresiana melu dua ki nawotaeana
ki anawota. Nalakena tea wanogoe 3
epe laki naanoai pota sikai ragi waina
anawota e ko mauri doko, e pe vei
tea sosoana ki tea maripele sikai:
ma anawota e pe mate, e pe vei
tea veresiana melu dua ki nawotae-
ana, go e pe laki naanoai pota sikai
epe ta pei tea maripele mau. Nala- 4
kena tea wanogoe, taigu maga, nimu
ma ku pei tea mariana ku mate
paki nawotaeana pae napatoko ni
Kristo ; naga nimu kuga laki tea
pota, nae waina e pei tea sikeana
duleana inelu dua ki tea mate maga,
naga tuga magi Supe dau ki nawa.
Nalakena ragi waina tu doko na 5
pokasi, narogoana maga ni namari-
naleosaana maga, waina eu doko pae
nawotaeana, eu do posiwosi naleo
kakagida maga naga euga magi
namateana dau ki nawa. Ma ragi 6


waia tu pei tea veresiana sua mein
dua ki nawotaeana, tu mate sua
paki tea waina tu pei tea tapesoki-
ana doko asa ; dapala waina nigida
tu suasua pae navei-tea-vau-ana ni
naatana, go e ta pae navei-tea-tuai-
ana ni namidiriana mau.
7 Nalakena tea wanogoe tuga wo
noa nasava ? Nawotaeana e pei
namarinaleosaana kite ? Ega ta
dapala nogoemau. Ma nawotaeana
e pe ta doko mau, a pe ta atae na
marinaleosana mau : nalakena na
wotaeana e pe ta naga, Pa ta mata-
inagura mau, a pe ta atae namata-
-8 maguruana mau : ma namarinaleo-
saana e puati a, po posiwosi au pae
natipagoroana ki sara namatania-
guraana: nalakena namarinaleo-
saana masale ki nawotaeana e mate.
9 Go kinau a mauri masale ki na
wotaeana sala vea : ma ragi waina
natipagoroana e umai namarinaleo-
saana e darapa, go kinau a mate ;
10 go natipagoroana waina e paki na
mauriana, a papai a naga e paki
11 namateana; nalakena namarinaleo-
saana e puati a, po pilasurue au
pae natipagoroana, po maripunue
12 au pae asa. Nalakena tea wano-
goe nawotaeana e dautau, go
natipagoroana e dautau, go e leana,
13 go e pia. Nalakena tea wanogoe tea
waina e pia e pei tea mariana e pei
namateana paki nau kite ? Ega ta
dapala nogoe mau. Ma namarina-
leosaana, naga ega tokolina naga e
pei namarinaleosaana, e do posiwosi
ki namateana paki nau pae tea
waina e pia, naga namarinaleo-
saana ega vei tea mariana ega
sa parua liu pae natipagoroana.
14 Nalakena tu atae naga nawotaeana
e pei tea ni naatana, ma kinau a pei
tea ni napokasi, tea soriana paki
15 etano ki namarinaleosaana. Nala-
kena tea waina a mari a a da
atae a mau: nalakena tea waina a
masauna naga aga maria, tea
NUUNA-TONeOAN N.T.
wanogoe a da mari a mau ; ma tea
waina a pilosi a, tea wanogoe a
mari a. Ma ape mari tea waina al6
da masauna naga aga mari a mau,
a pe noa sikoti nawotaeana naga e
pia. Nalakena e dapala nogoe e da 17
moro pei kinau mau waina a maria,
ma e pei namarinaleosaana waina e
doko au doko. Nalakena a atae naga 18
te navatuna wia e da doko au mau,
tea wanogoe e pei, e da doko napo-
kasigu mau : nalakena namasauana
e sikoti au doko, ma namari-tea-
wia-ana eda doko mau. Nalakena 19
tea wia waina a masauna naga aga
mari a a da mari a mau : ma tea sa
waina a da masauna naga aga mari
a mau, tea wanogoe a mari a. Ma a2O
pe mari tea waina a da masauna
naga aga mari a mau, e pe ta moro
pei kinau mau waina a mari a,
ma e pe vei namarinaleosaana waina
e doko au doko. Nalakena tea 21
wanogoe a papai nawotaeana waia,
naga ragi waina a masauna naga aga
mari tea wia, tea sa e sikoti au doko.
Nalakena a maro nawotaeana ki 22
Supe pae naatafnoli ni napalaugu :
ma a punusi nawotaeana pota sikai 23
e doko naleo kakagu maga, waina e
do mari navakalo paki nawotaeana
ni namidodoana aginau, po do
piragilua-pavakoto au paki etano
ki nawotaeana ni namarinaleosaana
waina e doko naleo kakagu maga.
Kinau naatainoli rogokitesa ! sei 24
ega wo pualua au fiielu dua ki
napatoko ni namateana waia ? A 25
pasadodomata ki Supe pae Yesu
Kristo Nawota anigida. Nalakena
tea wanogoe kinau a magi nawotae-
ana ki Supe suasua ki namidodoaana
aginau; ma a magi nawotaeana
ni namarinaleosaana suasua ki na
pokasigu.
Matele 8.
Nalakena tea wanogoe te natipa- 1
kotoviana paki tea maga waina


eu doko Kristo Yesu e da doko
2 mau. Nalakena nawotaeaua ki
Naatana ni namauriana doko
Kristo Yesu e peresi au melu dua
ki nawotaeaua ni namarinaleosa-
3 ana go ni namateana. Nalakena
tea waina nawotaeaua e mari sa
mari a, nalakena e manainai pae
napokasi, Supe, waina e dipakUua
Natuna umai doko natakiusiana
ni napokasi ni namarinaleosaana,
go nalakena namarinaleosaana, e
dipakotovi namarinaleosaana doko
4 napokasi: naga natawanakiana ni
nawotaeana ega vei tea vakavuro-
ana nalo kakagida waina tu da
surata pae napokasi mau, ma tu
5 surata pae naatana. Nalakena tea
maga waina eu pei tea vae napokasi
eu midoa ki tea maga ni napokasi;
ma tea maga waina eu pei tea vae
naatana eu midoa ki tea maga ni
6 naatana. Nalakena namidodoana
ni napokasi e pei namateana, ma
namidodoana ni naatana e pei na
7 mauriana go natamateana: na
lakena namidodoana ni napokasi e
pei nakokonaana paki Supe ; nala-
kena e da doko etano paki nawotae-
ana ki Supe mau, go e mari sa doko
8 etano paki nia. Ma tea maga waina
eu doko napokasi eu mari sa pei tea
9 midoakiinatakiana ki Supe. Ma
nimu Naata ni Supe e pe toko mu
doko, ku pe ta doko napokasi mau,
ma ku pe toko naatana. Ma te
naata e pe tika ki Naata ni Kristo,
nae e pa ta pei tea aneana mau.
10 Ma Kristo e pe toko mu, napatokomu
e pe mate lomau nalakena marina-
leosaana; ma naatamu e pe vei
namauriana nalakena namarinaleo-
-11 leanaana. Ma Naata ni tea waina
e sike Yesu e duleana melu,dua ki tea
mate maga e pe toko mu doko, tea
waina e sike Kristo Yesu e duleana
melu dua ki tea mate maga e
pe wo pakamauri ki napatokomu
maga waina euga wo mate pae
Naatana aneana waina e doko mu
doko.
Nalakena tea wanogoe, tai maga, 12
naleo e one gida one, e da pei tea ni
napokasi mau, naga tuga mauri pae
napokasi: nalakena ku pe mauri 13
pae napokasi, e pe one mu one naga
kuga mate; ma ku pe maripunue
nawosiana maga ni napatokomu ki
naatana, ku pe wo mauri. Nalakena 14
tea maga waina eu pei tea maraki-
ana ki Naata ni Supe, nara eu
pei Supe natuna maga. Nalakena 15
ku da moro dape naatana ni
navei-naviti-ana paki namatakuana
mau; ma ku dape naatana ni
navakasereana, waina tu do pioso,
Abba, Mama asa. Naatana nae el 6
do noasokisoki sikoti naatagida,
naga tu pei Supe natuna maga : ma 17
tu pe vei natuna maga, tu pe vei
tea veanipioli maga, tea veanipioli
maga ki Supe, go tea veanipioli
maga sikoti Kristo; tu pe sua tea
sa maga sikoti a, naga tuga vei
tea samasamaniana sikoti a.
Nalakena a midoa ki nia naga 18
narogokitesaana maga ni ragi waia
eu pei tea fnoli ragi waina tu midoa
ki nasamasamaana waina ega wo
pei tea mari-pakasa-kiana nalo
kaka gida. Nalakena naleogoro- 19
parati-kiana ni tea tawanakiana e
do leogoro namari-pakasa-kiana ni
Supe natuna maga. Nalakena tea 20
tawanakiana e pei tea mariana e
doko etano paki napaloana, e da
suasua matt, ma nalakena tea waina
e mari a e doko etano paki nia, doko
naleogoroana ; nalakena tea tawa- 21
nakiana nae ma ega wo pei tea vere-
siana melu dua ki navei-naviti-ana
ni namadadaana paki naveresiana
ni nasamasamaana ki Supe natuna
maga. Nalakena tu atae naga tea 22
tawanakiana mamau e do saisai gi
po pitinu dakiusi tea visola pa pa
paki ragi waia.. Go tea wanogoe e 23
da sikina mau, ma nigida ma, waina


tu peani taka vea ni Naatana, nigida
ma tu do gi napalaugida, tu do
leogoro navakasereana, natauluaana
24 ni napatokogida. Nalakena tu pei
tea mautipauriana ki naleogoroana :
ma naleogoroana waina e pei tea
vunusiana e da pei naleogoroana
mau: nalakena sei e leogoro tea
25 waina e punusi a ? Ma tu pe leo-
goro tea waina tu da punusi a mau,
tu pe leogoro e pae nasokiana.
26 Go dapala nogoe Naatana ma e
silae namanainaiana anigida: na
lakena tu da dapasavasa atae mau
dapala waina e one gida one: ma
Naatana nae e manigida do pavara
ki nagiana maga waina eu marisa pei
27 tea vasaana; go tea waina edo
leousiusi napopo maga e atae tea
waina e pei namidodoana ni Na
atana, nalakena e magi tea tautau
maga do pavara pae namasauana hi
28 Supe. Go tu atae naga naleo maga
mamau puti eu magi tea nlaga
waina eu dodomi Supe do saisai
posiwosi paki tea wia, magi tea
maga waina eu pei tea sosoana
29 pae namidoakisokiana aneana. Na
lakena tea maga waina e pea atae
ra, e pea dawana ki da naga euga
vei tea maridawanakiana euga ta-
pala nunu ni Natuna, naga nae ega
vei takalapa maleoputo ni taina
30 lapa: ma tea maga waina e pea
dawana ki da, tea maga wanogoe
e soso ra: go tea maga waina e
soso ra, tea maga wanogoe e mari-
leana ki da: go tea maga waina e
marileana ki da, tea maga wanogoe
e samasamani ra.
31 Nalakena tea wanogoe tuga noa
nasava nalo ni tea maga wanogoe ?
Supe e pe vei tea anigida, sei e pe
32 vei tea tipa gida ? Nae waina eda
mauti Natuna aneana mau, ma e
manigida mamau puti pitua ki nia,
ega wo da dua moli ki gida rialeo
maga mamau puti euga sikoti a
33 kite ekasava ? Sei ega wo pasa-
dipa tea matadoaana maga ki Supe ?
Tea waina e marileana hi da e pei
Supe. Tea waina ega wo dipa- 34
kotovi ra e pei sei ? Tea waina
e mate e pei Kristo Yesu, ioro,
go waina e pei tea sikeana du-
leana inelu dua ki tea mate maga,
waina e doko pisari namelearu ni
matua ni Supe, go waina e do mani-
gida pavara. Sei ega wo mari gida 35
tuga va mawota inelu dua ki na
dodomiana ki Kristo ? nariesokiana
kite ? kite narogokitesaana ? kite
nakopaleleana ? kite navitoloana ?
kite namalainalaana ? kite namata-
kuana ? kite lova ? Dakiusi waina 36
e pei tea midiriana, naga
Au pei tea maripunueana naale-
atia mamau nalakena nigo ;
Au pei tea midoakiana naga au
dapala sliiip waina euga vei tea
manpunueana.
Ma nalo ni tea maga mamau puti 37
wanogoe tu pei tea marimatua parua
ara pae tea waina e dodomi gida.
Nalakena a saralomau kasua naga 38
namauriana, kite namateana, kite
agelo maga, kite tea vei nawota
maga, kite tea kasua maga, kite tea
maga waina eu doko ragi waia, kite
tea maga waina euga wo umai, kite 39
elagi, kite epua, kite tea tawanaki-
ana pota sikai, ega wo da mariatae
mari gida tuga va mawota inelu
dua ki nadodomiana ki Supe mau,
waina e doko Kristo Yesu Nawota
anigida.
Matele 9.
A noa nalomauana doko Kristo, a 1
da sorosoro mau, natumagu-atae-
ana e do maginau noasokisoki doko
Naatana Tapu, naga a peani na 2
susueana warua go navitinuana
pitipatipa napopogu. Nalakena a 3
mariatae masauna naga kinau aga
vei anathema meludua ki Kristo
magi taigu maga, namatarau aginau


4 maga pae napokasi: waina eu pei
naworawora ni Israel; waina na
vakasereanaepeiadeada.go nasama-
samaana, go navasasokiana maga,
go navituakina ni nawotaeana, go
5 nalotuana, go nasaiana maga; waina
tamagida maga eu pei adeada, go
waina Kristo e melu ara nalo ni
napokasina, waina e dapau tea maga
mamau - puti, Supe tea vasapiaki-
ana pa pa ega tu mau du. Amen.
6 Ma e da dapala navasaana ki Supe
epe rowo puoli mau. Nalakena tea
maga waina eu pei tea ni Israel eu
7 da mamau puti pei Israel mau : go
nalakena eu pei naworawora ni
Abraham eu da mamau puti pei
natuna maga mau : ma, Nawora-
woraina euga vei tea sosoana pae
8 Isaak. Tea wanogoe e pei, napokasi
natuna maga nara eu da pei Supe
natuna maga mau; ma nasaiana
natuna maga eu pei tea midoakiana
9 naga eu pei naworana sikai. Nala-
kena tea waia e pei navasaana sikai
ni nasaiana, Ragi wanogoe aga
wo umai asa, go Sarah ega wo dape
10 natuna naanoai sikai. Go tea wano-
goe e da sikina mau ; ma Rebekah
ma waina e diena pae sikai, tama-
-11 gida Isaak —nalakena ragi waina
pipia maga ero ko da pakilina mau,
go ero ko da mari te navatuna wia
kite sa mau, naga namidoakisokiana
ki Supe pae namatadoaana ega
lawodu, e da pei tea ni nawosiana
maga mau, ma e pei tea ni tea waina
12 e soso, e pei tea noaana paki nia, e
naga, Takalapa ega wo magi taka-
-13 riki suasua. Dapala waina e pei
tea midiriana, e naga, A dodomi
Yakob, ma a pilosi Esau.
14 Nalakena tea wanogoe tuga noa
nasava 1 Namarinaleotageleoana e
15 sikoti Supe kite ? Ega ta dapala
nogoe mau. Nalakena e noa ki
Moses, e naga, Aga wo saupia ki tea
waina aga saupia ki nia, go aga
wo maritadodomi tea waina aga
maritadodomi a. Nalakena tea wa-16
nogoe e da pei tea Id tea waina e ma-
sauna mau, go e da pei tea Id tea
waina e sava mau, ma e pei tea Id
Supe waina e saupia. Nalakena na 17
vasaana midiriana e noa ki Earaoh, e
naga, A mari ko ku lawodu nalakena
tea waia, naga aga visei ki nakasua-
ana aginau ako, go naga nagisagu
ega vei tea rogorogokiana usuraki
maramana mamau. Nalakena tea 18
wanogoe e saupia ki tea waina e
masauna, go tea waina e masauna e
mari a e kasua.
Nalakena tea wanogoe pa wo noa 19
ki nau, Ekasana e ko pasadipa ?
Nalakena sei e lawadugoro namasau-
ana aneana ? loro, naatamoli 0, ma 20
nigo ku pei sei waina ku pasadara-
dipa Supe 1 Tea maridawanakiana
ega wo noa ki tea maridawana ki,
Ekasana ku mari au dapala waia
kite ? Kite tea mari lasa ni natano 21
e da peani naveinawotaana dapau
naruku, naga ega mari tea ni taua
sikai maau seara kakana ega vei
lasa sikai paki nadodomadaganiana,
go tea pota sikai paki nadododao-
ana kite ? Ma Supe epe masauna 22
naga ega visei ki namaetoana ane-
ana, po mari nakasuaana aneana ega
vei tea ataeana, go e pe tapetape
pilake naveimaritasokiana warua
lasa maga ni namaetoana waina eu
pei tea maridawanakiana paki nama-
risakiana : go naga ega mari ega vei 23
tea ataeana nasogolapaana ni na
samasamaana aneana nalo ni lasa
maga ni nasaupiaana, waina e pea
marimata ki da paki nasamasama-
ana, nigida, waina e soso gida, tu 24
da pei tea ni Yudea maga sikida
mau, ma tu pei tea ni nalauna
pota maga. Dapala waina e noa e 25
Hosea, e naga,
Aga wo soso tea maga waina eu da
pei narei aginau mau, ki narei
aginau:
Go tea waina e da pei tea


dodomiana mau, ki tea dodo-
miana.
26 Go ega wo doko, naga tokora
waina e pei tea noaana paki da
asa, Nimu ku da pei narei
aginau mau,
Tokora wanogoe euga wo pei tea
sosoana asa ki Supe mauri
natuna maga.
27 Go Isaiah e pioso nalo ni Israel, e
naga, Naveveana ni Israel natuna
maga e pe tapala naworaone ni
natasi, e pe vei tea toropusiana
kakada waina euga wo pei tea mauti
28 pauriana : nalakena Yehovah ega
wo man navasaana aneana mara-
mana, ega wo mansua e po man a
29 ega vuru. Go, dapala waina Isaiah
e pea noa e, e naga,
Yehovah ni Taua maga e pe ta
manigida doropusi namagovai
kiki sikai mau,
Tu pe tapala Sodom, go tu pe
vei tea mariana tu pe tapala
Gomorrah.
30 Nalakena tea wanogoe tuga noa
nasava 1 Naga tea ni nalauna pota
maga, waina eu da sava dausi
namarinaleoleanaana mau, eu pua-
soki namarinaleoleanaana, namari-
naleoleanaana waina e pei tea ni
31 nasaralomauana : ma Israel waina
eu do sava dausi nawotaeana ni
namarinaleoleanaana, eu da paparati
ki nawotaeana wanogoe mau. Na
32 lakena nasava ? Nalakena eu da
laga asa pae nasaralomauana mau,
ma dapala e pe vei tea ni nawosiana
maga. Eu dapilagona vatu ni na
33 tapilagonaana ; dapala waina e pei
tea midiriana, e naga,
Kuga leo, a doropusi doko Zion
vatu sikai ni natapilagonaana,
go vatu laketoko sikai ni na
tapilagonadowoana :
Go tea waina e saralomau asa ega
wo ta pei tea mariana ega
maliere mau.
Matele 10.
Tai maga, namasauana ni napo- 1
pogu go navavaraniana aginau paki
Supe e madeada pei naga euga vei
tea mautipauriana. Nalakena a 2
madeada noasokisoki naga eu peani
nasuisuiana sikai magi Supe, ma e
da pae naataeana mau. Nalakena 3
eu pei sapo namarinaleoleanaana ki
Supe, po do laga naga euga lawoki-
laketoko tea adeada, go eu da doko
etano paki namarinaleoleanaana ki
Supe mau. Nalakena Kristo e pei 4
namarisuana ni nawotaeana paki
namarinaleoleanaana magi sara na
ata waina eu saralomau. Nala- 5
kena Moses e midiri naga naatamoli
waina e do mari namarinaleoleana-
ana waina e pei tea ni nawotaeana
ega wo mauri asa. Ma namari- 6
naleoleanaana waina e pei tea ni
nasaralomanana e noa dapala waia,
e naga, Pa ta noa napalau ni na
poporna mau, Sei ega wo sake paki
nakoroatelagi pano ? (tea wanogoe
e pei, naga ega viragi Kristo ega
siwo umai:) kite, Sei ega wo siwo 7
paki epua pano ? (tea wanogoe e pei,
naga ega viragi Kristo ega sake
fhelu dua ki tea mate maga umai.)
Ma e noa nasava ? Navasaana e 8
pei maladigi ki-go, e doko nawo-
kafha, go e doko napopoma : tea
wanogoe e pei, navasaana ni nasara-
lomauana, waina au do dogorogo ki
nia: nalakena ku pe noasai ki na 9
wokama Nawota Yesu,po saralomau
ki napopoma naga Supe e sike a e
duleana rnelu dua ki tea mate maga,
ku pe wo pei tea mautipauriana :
nalakena naatamoli e saralomau ki 10
napopona paki namarinaleoleana-
ana ; go e noasai ki nawokana paki
namautipauriana. Nalakena na 11
vasaana midiriana e naga, Sara naata
waina eu saralomau asa euga wo da
pei tea mariana euga maliere mau.
Nalakena namawota ni tea ni Yudea 12


go ni tea ni Hellas e da doko mau :
nalakena Nawota sikai maau e pei
Nawota ki tea maga mamau puti,
go e pei sogolapa paki tea maga
mamau puti waina eu piosa paki nia:
13 nalakena, Sara naata waina eu pe wo
pioso paki nagisa ni Yehovah euga
14 wo pei tea mautipauriana. Ma euga
wo pioso paki tea waina eu da sara-
lomau asa mau dapale sava ? Go
euga wo saralomau tea waina eu da

wo dogo masale ki tea rogorogo sikai

ana pa!

Matele 11.
Nalakena tea wanogoe a naga, 1
Supe e dipadoa narei aneana kite ?
Ega ta dapala nogoe mau. Nalakena
kinau ma a pei nawora ni Israel, ni
nawora ni Abraham, ni naworawora
ni Benjamin. Supe e da dipadoa 2
narei aneana mau waina e pea atae
ra. Kite ku da atae tea waina
navasaana midiriana e noa e nalo ni
Elijah ? dapala waina e pavarani
Supe dipa Israel, c naga, Yehovah, eu 3
maripunue profeta anigo maga, eu
kill dakai wede ni naviriana anigo
maga, go kinau a sikigu pei tea toro-
pusiana doko, go eu laga namauriana
aginau. Ma navasadaraana ki Supe 4
e noa ki nia nasava ? A maginau
doropusi naatamoli manu larua,
waina eu daditipatuapakißaal mau.
Go dapala nogoe ragi waia ma tea 5
toropusiana sikai e doko pae na
matadoaana ni nasaupiaana. Ma e 6
pe vae nasaupiaana, e pe ta moro pei
tea ni nawosiana maga mau : nala-
keua e pe vei tea ni nawosiana maga,
nasaupiaana e pe ta pei nasaupiaana
mau. Nalakena tea wanogoe na 7
sava ? Tea waina Israel e laga asa,

tea matadoaana maga eu papai a,
go tea pota maga eu pei tea mariaua
eu kasua : dapala waina e pei tea 8
midiriana, naga Supe e dua ra na
atana sikai ni namaturu-daratara-
ana, namata maga waina euga ta
leosai mau, go nadaliga maga waina
euga ta dorogo mau, pa pa paki
naaleatia ni masoso. Go David e 9
naga,

go vaivai sikai,


Go tea tapilagonaana sikai, go
navituacbpaana sikai paki-da:

ta leosai mail,

dapilagona naga euga rowo kite ?

umai, naga ega mari ra euga totowo-
-12 kasua. Ma natapiriana adeada epe

liu pa!

napokasigu euga totowo kasua, go

vei nalakena navcipopo-wia-ana ni

pei nasava, ma namauriana fnelu
16 dua ki tea mate maga ? Ma taka-
vea e pe tapu, taua ma e pe tapu: go
nakoa e pe tapu, ara maga ma eu
17 petapu. Ma ara maga seara kakada

vei tea lawokiana doko maleoputo
kakada, po mamau saisai peani
18 nakoa ni napeletia ni oliva ; pa ta

silae nakoa mau, ma nakoa e silae

naga, Araseara eu pei tea woriluaana,
naga - kinau aga vei tea lawokiana
20 doko asa. loro; eu pei tea worilua-
ana ki nasarateapaloana adeada,go
nigo ku lawodu ki nasaralomauana.
Pa ta pei tea popovakilagi mau, ma
pa mataku : nalakena Supe e pe ta 21
mauti ara maga waina eu pae na
visouana mau, e pe wo da mauti ko
mau. Nalakena tea wanogoe pa 22
vunusi navakaleana go namakaliana
ki Supe: paki tea maga waina eu
dowo, namakaliana; ma paki-go,
navakaleana ki Supe, ku pe toko
navakaleana aneana doko : ku pe
ta doko asa mau, nigo ma ku pe wo
pei tea taeluaana. Go nara ma, eu 23
pe ta doko nasarateapaloana ade-
ada doko mau, eu pe wo pei tea
lawokiana asa: nalakena Supe e
mariatae naga ega moro lawo ki da
asa. Nalakena nigo ku pe vei tea 24
taeluaana meludua ki tea waina e
pei oliva kau sikai pae navisouana,
po pei tea lawokiana pano pota ki
navisouana paki oliva wia sikai ;
nara, waina eu pei ara maga pae
navisouana, eu pe wo pei tea lawo-
kiana euga toko oliva adeada e pe
warua liu pa!

kuga vei sapo, tai maga, paia waia,
naga kuga ta dumamu midoa ki mu
mau naga ku pei tea manumatua,
naga nakasuaana pae namagovai e
pakilina ki Israel, pa pa navaka-
vuroana ni nalauna pota maga
ega wo sili umai; go dapala nogoe 26

mautipauriana : dapala waina e pei
tea miridiana, e naga,

pano:

aginau paki da,
Ragi waina aga wo dapelua na
marinaleosaana adeada maga.
Nalo ni narogorogoana wia, eu pei 28
tea kokona lomau nalakena nimu:
ma nalo ni namatadoaana, eu pei tea
dodomiana nalakena tamada maga.

go nasosoana Id Supe eu da pei tea
waina euga vei tea midoakipiriana

ragi waia, naga nara ma euga vei

kokoro tea maga mamau puti paki

maga mamau puti.

ni namanumatuaana go ni naatae-
ana ki Supe ! navasapotaeana ane-
ana maga eu pei tea leousiusi-sapo-
ana pa, go napua aneana maga eu man

naleo maga mamau puti eu melu
asa, go eu pae asa, go eu paki asa.

aneana pa pa ega tu mau du. Amen.
Matele 12.
1 Nalakena tea wanogoe a pavarani
mu, tai maga, pae namaritadodo-
miana maga ki Supe, naga kuga
vitua ki napatokomu maga euga vei
naviriana mauri sikai, tea tautau,
tea midoakimatakiana ki Supe,
waina e pei nasuasuaana midodoa
2 animu. Go kuga ta dumamu mari
mu kuga takiusi tea ni mara-
mana waia mau ; ma kuga vei tea
maridoaana kuga vano pota ki
namaripaukiana ni namidodoana
animu, naga kuga maridogo tea
waina e pei namasauana ki Supe tea
waina e pia go waina e pei tea
midoakimatakiana go waina e pia
lua.
3 Nalakena a noa, pae nasaupiaana
waina e pei tea vituakiana paki nau,
ki sara naatamoli waina eu doko
inaleoputo kakamu, naga euga ta
midodoa pakilagi mau liu tea waina
e one ara one naga euga midodoa ;
ma naga euga midodoa ega tapala
waina euga midodoa pia, ega tapala
waina Supe e magi sara naata sika-
sikai potawotae totowo sikasikai ni
nasaralomauana. Nalakena dakiusi 4
waina tu pilake naleo lapa doko
napatoko sikai maau, go naleo maga
eu da mamau puti peani nawosiana
sikai maau mau ; dapala nogoe 5
nigida, waina tu lapa, tu pei na
patoko sikai maau doko Kristo, go
tu sikasikai dumagida pei naleo ka-
kagida maga. Go waina tu peani 6.
navituamolikiana maga pisarasara
pae nasaupiaana waina e pei tea
vituakiana paki gida, e pe vei
naveanoasaiana, tuga veanoasai ega
vae totowo ni nasaralomauana ani-
gida; kite e pevei nasuasuaana, tuga 7
toJco raki nasuasuaana anigida ; kite
c pe vei tea waina e pasapiseiki, rjja
toko raki navasapiseikiana aneana ;
kite e pe vei tea waina e pasapara- 8
tiki, ega toko raki navasaparatikiana
aneana: tea waina e pitua, ega
vitua pae naveilomauana ; tea waina
e maraki ega maraki pae nainareka-
rekaana ; tea waina e mari nadodo-
miana, ega 'mari a pae nalaelaeana.
Nadodomiana ega ta pei nakalepo- 9
ana mau. Kuga mamarago ki tea
waina e sa ; kuga vuluti tea waina
e pia. Nadodomi-taigida-ana kuga 10
vei maritadodomi dumamu paki mu
asa ; nadodomadaganiana kuga tu-
mamu maraki mu asa ; namarekare- 11
kaana kuga ta mamale asa mau;
kuga vei tea vivitinu pae naatamu ;
tea magi Nawota suasua; tea 12
laelaea naleogoroana; tea soki
nariesokiana; tea to dapasavasa
pitipatipa; tea saisai peani na 13
tikaana maga ki tea tautau maga;
tea savadausi nadodomi-namenaki-
ana. Kuga vasapia ki tea maga 14


wdina eu kopalele mu ; kuga vasa
pia ki, go kuga ta pasa sa ki mau.
15 Kuga laelaea sikoti tea maga waina
eu laelaea; kuga tagi sikoti tea
16 maga waina eu dagi. Kuga vei tea
midoa ki tea sikai maau dumamu
paki mu. Kuga ta pei tea midoa Id
tea vakilagi maga mau, ma kuga vei
tea viragiluaana sikoti tea vakitano
maga. Kuga ta pei tea tumamu
midoa ki mu naga ku manumatua
17 mau. Kuga ta lagati dua te naata
tea sa dipa tea sa mau. Kuga vea
midoa ki tea dodomadaganiana
maga namata ni naatamoli maga
18 mamau puti. Epe vei tea mari-
ataeana, nalo ni tea animu, kuga
tamate paki naatamoli maga mamau
19 puti. Kuga ta dumamu manimu
sikosiko mau, tea dodomiana maga,
ma kuga tua namaetoana tokora :
nalakena e pei tea midiriana, naga
Nasikoana e pei aginau ; kinau aga
20 wo pituadipa, Yehovali e noa c. Ma
tea kokona ki-go e pe vitolo, pa tua
e ega kanikani; epe madou, pa tua
e ega munu : nalakena ku pe mari
tea wanogoe ku pe wo daua ki na
21 nielevara ni nakapu napauna. Pa
ta pei tea marimatuakiana pae tea
sa mau, ma pa marimatua ki tea sa
ki tea wia.
Matele 13.
1 Sara naata euga toko etano paki
naveinawotaana maga waina eu
pakilagi liu ra : nalakena te navei-
nawotaana sikai e da doko mau
waina e da pae Supe mau ; go tea
maga waina eu doko eu pei tea
' 2 tawanakiana pae Supe. Nalakena
tea wanogoe naata waina e du-
goro naveinawotaana e lawodugoro
natawanakiana ki Supe; go tea
maga waina eu lawodugoro euga wo
dufnada madeada dape navasa-
-3 potaeana. Nalakena tea maraki
maga eu da pei namatakuana paki
nawosiana wia mau, ma eu pei nama-
takuana paki tea sa. Go ku masauna
naga pa ta matau ki naveinawotaana
kite ? pa mari tea waina e pia, go
pa wo peani nasamasamaniana melu
asa : nalakena e manigo pei tea 4
suasua sikai ki Supe raki tea waina
e pia. Ma ku pe mari tea waina e
sa, pa mataku; nalakena e da
pilake moli ki lova mau : nalakena
e pei tea suasua sikai ki Supe,
tea sikosiko sikai raki namaetoana
paki tea waina e mari tea waina
e sa. Nalakena tea wanogoe 5
e one mu one naga kuga toko
etano, namaetoana e da masikina
pei nalakena mau, ma nalakena na
tumamu-atae-ana. Nalakena tea 6
wanogoe e moro pei nalakena ku
pitua ki nasautoga, nalakena eu pei
tea suasua maga ki Supe, waina
eu do doko raki tea wanogoe piti-
patipa. Kuga vitua paid tea maga 7
mamau puti ki natcaoneana adeada
maga: nasautoga paki tea waina
nasautoga c maneana one : duti paki
tea waina duti e meaneana one:
namatakuana paki tea waina na
matakuana e maneana one: na
dodomadaganiana paki tea waina na
dodomadaganiana e maneana one.
Te naleo sikai kite naata sikai ega 8
ta one mu one mau, ma naga kuga
tumamu dodomi mu sikai maau;
nalakena tea waina e dodomi tea
pota e pakavuro nawotaeana. Nala- 9
kena tea waia, Pa ta maripele mau,
Pa ta maripunue mau, Pa ta panako
mau, Pa ta matamagura mau, go to
natipakiana pota sikai e pe toko, e
pe vei tea_saisaildana doko navasa-
ana waia, Pa dodomi tea ni maladigi
ki-go ega tapala waina ku dumama
dodomi ko. Nadodomiana e da 10
mari tea sa paki tea ni maladigi
ki nia mau : nalakena tea wanogoe
nadodomiana e pei navakavuruoana
ni nawotaeana.
Go tea waia, ku atae ragi, naga e 11


pei aura ragi waia waina kuga tara-
pa asa melu dua ki namaturuana:
nalakena ragi waia namautipauri-
gida-ana e pei inaladigi liu dapala
waina e doko ragi waina tu pea sara-
-12 lomau. Napogiana e disu pano, go
naaleatia e pei inaladigi: nalakena
tea wanogoe tuga toropusi nawosi-
ana maga ni namaligo, go tuga suni
13 nalikau maga ni namarama. Tuga
surata pae tea waina e pei tea leo-
matakiana, dapala ragi waina e pei
aliati, tuga ta pae namaridaratara-
ana go namatamalokuana mau, tuga
ta pae namaripeleana maga go na
masausauana maga mau, tuga ta pae
14 navileana go naroitoiana mau. Ma
kuga suni Nawota Yesu Kristo, go
kuga ta magi napokasi mari navea-
midoakiana raki namasauana sa
kakana maga mau.
Matele 14.
1 Ma tea waina e manainai nasara-
lomauana kuga viragisoki a, masale
ki namidoakipotaeana maga ni
2 namidodoana maga. Naatafnoli
sikai e saralomau naga ega kani
sara naleo, ma tea waina e ma-
nainai e gani tea lawoana maga.
3 Tea waina e ganikani ega ta midoa
ki palo ki tea waina e da ganikani
mau; go tea waina e da ganikani
mau, ega ta pasapotae tea waina e
ganikani: nalakena Supe e piragi-
-4 soki a. Nigo ku pei sei waina ku
pasapotae tea suasua ki tea pota ?
e magi nawota aneana lawodu
kite e dowo. Ma ega wo pei tea
silaeana ega lawodu ; nalakena
Nawota e mariatae mari a ega
5 lawodu. Naatafnoli sikai e mi-
doakipotae naaleatia sikai naga e
parua liu naaleatia pota sikai:
tea pota sikai e midoakipotae sara
naaleatia naga eu patdkasikai. Sara
naatafnoli euga sikasikai saralo-
mau pakavuro doko namidodoaana
adeada. Tea waina e midoa ki 6
naaleatia, e magi Nawota midoa
ki nia; go tea waina e ganikani,
e magi Nawota ganikani, nalakena
e pasadodomata ki Supe; go
tea waina e da ganikani mau, e
magi Nawota da ganikani mau,
po pasadodomata ki Supe. Nala- 7
kena te naata sikai kakagida e da
dufnana maneana mauri mau, go te
naata sikai e da dufnana maneana
mate mau. Nalakena tu pe mauri, 8
tu pe magi Nawota mauri; kite tu
pe mate tu pe magi Nawota mate :
nalakena tea wanogoe tu pe mauri,
kite tu pe mate, tu pe vei tea ki
Nawota. Nalakena raki tea wa- 9
nogoe Kristo e mate, po moro mauri,
naga ega vei Nawota ki tea mate
maga go ki tea mauri maga. Ma 10
nigo, ekasana ku pasapotae taima ?
kite nigo ma, ekasana ku midoa
ki palo ki taima ? nalakena tuga
wo mamau puti lawodu narae ni
malo tasake ni navasapotaeana ki
Supe. Nalakena e pei tea midiriana, 11
e naga,
Kinau a mauri, Yehovali e noa e,
sara napatua euga wo ditipatua
paki nau,
Go sara namena euga wo pasa-
dodomata ki Supe.
Nalakena tea wanogoe sara naata 12
kakagida euga wo dumada atusi ra -
paki Supe.
Nalakena tea wanogoe tuga ta 13
moro dumagida pasapotae gida
mau : ma kuga vasapotae tea waia,
naga te naata sikai ega ta doropusi
tea tapilagonaana sikai narae ni
taina mau, kite tea waina ega rowo
asa. A atae, po saralomau kasua 14
doko Nawota Yesu, naga te nava-
tuna sikai e da dufnana loa mau:
ma te naata e pe midoa kite na
vatuna naga e loa, e pe loa paki na
ata wanogoe. Nalakena taima epe 15
susue nalakena navinaga, ku pe ta
moro surata pae nadodomiana mau.


Tea waina Kristo e maneana mate
pa ta mari sa ki nia ki navinaga
16 anigo mau. Nalakena tea wanogoe
tea wia anigo ega ta pei tea vasa-
-17 sakiana mau ; nalakena namaraki-
ana ki Supe e da pei nakaniana
go namunuana mau, ma e pei
namarinaleoleanaana go natamate-
ana go nalaelaeaana doko Naatana
18 Tapu. Nalakena tea waina e magi
Kristo suasua tea wanogoe e pei tea
midoakimatakiana ki Supe, go tea
maridogopiragiana ki naatainoli
19 maga. Nalakena tea wanogoe tuga
sava dausi naleo maga ni natama-
teana, go naleo maga ni natavagiana
20 dumagida paki gida. Pa ta dakai
nawosiana ki Supe nalakena na
vinaga mau. Naleo maga mamau
puti eu dautau lomau ; ma e sa ki
naatainoli waina e ganikani pae na
21 tapilagonaana. E pia naga pa
ta gani napokasi mau, go naga pa
ta munu waine mau, go naga pa ta
mari te navatuna mau waina taifiia e
22 dipalagona asa. Nasaralomauana
waina nigo ku peani a, pa veani a
ega sikoti ko narae ni Supe. Naata
waina e da dufnana pasapotae a
mau nalo ni tea waina e midoa ki
23 nia naga e pia e maropa. Ma tea
waina e midoakisara e pe kanikani
e pe vei tea tipakotoviana asa,
nalakena e da ganikani pae nasara-
lomauana mau; go sara naleo
waina eu da pei tea ni nasaralo-
mauana mau eu pei namarinaleosa-
ana.
Matele 15.
1 Ma nigida waina tu kasua e one
gida one naga tuga tapetape na
manainaiana maga ki tea maga
waina eu da kasua mau, go naga
tuga ta mari tea waina tu duma-
gida midoa ki mata ki nia mau.
2 Sara naata kakagida euga mari tea
waina tea ni inaladigi ki da eu
midoa ki inata ki nia raki tea waina
e pia, paki natavagiana. Nalakena 3
Kristo ma e da mari tea waina e
dufnana midoa ki fnata ki nia mau ;
ma dapala waina e pei tea midiriana,
Navasapinoaana maga ki tea maga
waina eu pasapinoa ki-go eu dowo
paki nau. Nalakena tea maga 4
waina eu pei tea midiriana sala
vea eu pei tea midiriana raki navasa-
piseiki-gida-ana, naga tuga veani
naleogoroana pae nasokiana go
pae navakavakaleana ni navasaana
midiriana maga. Ma Supe ni na 5
sokiana go ni navakavakaleana ega
tua mu naga kuga midoa ki tea
sikai maau dumamu sikoti mu, ega
vae Kristo Yesu; naga kuga 6
samasamani ki popo s'ikai maau
go ki nawoka sikai maau Supe go
Tama ni Nawota anigida Yesu
Kristo. Nalakena tea wanogoe 7
kuga tuinamu piragi soki mu, ega
tapala waina Kristo ma e piragisokx
mu, paki nasamasamani-Supe-ana.
Nalakena a noa naga Kristo e pei 8
tea mariana e pei tea suasua sikai
ni natovadaviviana nalakena na
lomauana ki Supe, naga ega lawo-
soki nasaiana maga paki tamagida
maga, go naga nalauna pota maga 9
euga samasamani Supe nalakena
nadodomiana aneana; dapala waina
e pei tea midiriana, e naga,
Nalakena tea wanogoe aga wo
pasadodomata ki-go maleoputo
ni nalauna maga,
Go aga wo lega-samasamani na
gisama.
Go e moro naga, 10
Kuga kolalaelaea, nalauna maga,
sikoti narei aneana.
Go e moro naga. 11
Kuga samasamani Yeliovah, na
launa maga mamau puti;
Go narei maga mamau puti euga
vasasamasamani a.
Go e moro naga, Isaiah e naga, 12
Nakoa ni Yesse ega wo doko,


Go tea waina e pakilina naga ega
maramara dapau nalauna
maga ;
Nalauna maga euga wo leogoro
pavatu asa.
13 Ma Supe ni naleogoroana ega vaka-
vuro mu ki sara nalaelaeana go
natamateana ragi waina ku do sara-
lomau, naga kuga veani parua ki
naleogoroana doko nakasuaana ki
Naatana Tapu.
14 Go a saralomau kasua, taigu
maga, kinau ma nalo kakamu, naga
nimu ma ku pura ki nawiaana, doko
pei tea vakavuroana ki sara naatae-
ana, po mariatae naga kuga dufna-
-15 mu dapavanau mu. Ma a piviari
parua midiri paid mu pae namago-
vai, dapala a mari mu kuga moro
midoa ki nia, nalakena nasaupiaana
waina e pei tea vituakiana pae
16 Supe paki nau, naga aga vei tea
suasua sikai ki Kristo Yesu paki
tea ni nalauna pota maga, doko
do mari nawosiana ki tea viri na
rogorogoana wia ki Supe, naga na
vituakiana ni nalauna pota maga
ega vei tea tapematakiana, tea
maridautaukiana pae Naatana
17 Tapu. Nalakena tea wanogoe a
peani navakavakaeana doko Kristo
Yesu nalo ni naleo maga waina
18 eu pei tea ki Supe. Nalakena aga
wo da piviari pasa te navatuna
sikai ni tea maga waina Kristo e
da mari ra pae au mau, raki
narogoparatikiana ki tea ni na
launa pota maga, ki navasaana go
19 ki nawosiana, doko nakasuaana ni
navaivaiana maga go ni tea ni
namagaana maga, doko nakasuana
ki Naatana Tapu ; dapala waina a
dorogogo pakavuro ki narogoro-
goana wia ki Kristo pae Yerusalem,
go daliviri pa pa paki Illirikon ;
20 ma dapala nogoe a midoa ki dutua
ki naga aga rogorogo ki narogorogo-
ana wia tokora maga waina nagisa
ni Kristo e da pei tea noaana ara
mau, naga aga da davagi doko
laketano ki naatamoli pota sikai
mau ; ma dapala waina e pei tea 21
midiriana, e naga,
Tea maga waina e da pei tea
rogorogokiana paki da nalo
kakana mau, euga wo punusi,
Go tea maga waina eu da dogo
mau, euga wo midoakiatae.
Nalakena tea wanogoe a pei 22
tea tugoroana paka lapa wanogoe
naga aga ta paloti punusi mu mau :
ma ragi waia, waina a da moro peani 23
tokora navanua maga wanogoe mau,
go waina a peani namasauana
warua natau lapa naga aga valoti
punusi mu, ragi waina a pe surata 24
paki Spania (nalakena a leogoro
naga aga vunusi mu ragi waina aga
surata duaduru, go naga aga vei
tea vusivusiana pae mu paki tokora
wanogoe, a pe vea pei tea vaka-
vuroana pae namagovai ki amu) —
ma ragi waia a surata paki Yeru- 25
salem pano, a magi tea tautau maga
suasua. Nalakena Masedonia go 26
Akaia eu midoa ki fnata ki nia naga
euga mari te navituamolikiana
sikai magi tea tika maga ni tea
tautau maga waina eu doko Yeru-
salem. Nalakena eu midoakimata 27
ki nia, go naleo adeada e one ara
one. Nalakena tea ni nalauna
pota maga eu pe saisai peani tea
ni naatana adeada maga, e pe one
ara one naga nara ma euga madeada
suasua nalo ni tea ni napokasi
maga. Nalakena tea wanogoe ragi 28
waina aga mari sua tea wanogoe,
po madeada pulusoki sua nawa
wanogoe, aga wo paloti pae mu
paki Spania pano. Go a atae naga, 29
ragi waina aga valoti punusi mu,
aga wo paloti pilake na vakavuroana
ni navasamatakiana ki Kristo.
Ma a pavarani mu, taigu maga, 30
pae Nawota anigida Yesu Kristo,
go pae nadodomiana ki Naatana,
naga kuga maginau mari kasua


sikoti au natapasavasaana animu
31 maga paki Supe ; naga aga vei tea
vualuaana melu dua ki tea maga ni
Yudea waina eu da saralomau mau,
go naga nasuasuaana aginau paki
Yerusalem ega vei tea tapemata-
32 kiana ki tea tautau maga ; naga
aga valoti punusi mu pilake nalae-
laeaana pae namasauana ki Supe
33 po maromaro sikoti mu. Ma Supe
ni natamateana ega sikoti puti mu.
Amen.
Matele 16.
1 A pasapiakinoa ki mu Foebe gore
gida, waina e pei tea suasua sikai
ki ekkalesia waina e doko Kegkerea ;
2 naga kuga viragisoki a doko Nawota
ega tapala waina e pia ki tea
tautau maga, go naga kuga silae a
nawosiana waina e pe wo masau mu
asa; nalakena nae ma e pei tea leo-
parati-ki-silaesua tea lapa, go kinau.
3 Kuga vasadodomi Priska go
Akula tea wosiwosi sikoti au doko
4 Kristo Yesu, waina ero magi namau-
riana aginau doropusi nanoada;
waina kinau a da sikigu pasadodo-
fnata ki da mau, ma ekkalesia
maga mamau puti ni nalauna pota
maga eu pasadadomata hi da :
5 go kuga vasadodomi ekkalesia ni na
suina adeada. Kuga vasadodomi
Epaineto tea dodomiana aginau,
waina e pei taka vea ni Asia paki
6 Kristo. Kuga vasadodomi Maria,
waina e maginami posiwosi parua.
7 Kuga vasadodomi Androniko go
Yunia, tea vei namatarau aginau
maga, go tea viragiluapavakotoana
maga sikoti au, waina ero pei tea
rogoana maleoputo ni Apostolo
maga, go waina ero doko Kristo
8 pea ki nau. Kuga vasadodomi
Ampliato tea dodomiana aginau
9 doko Nawota. Kuga vasadodomi
Urbano tea wosiwosi sikoti garni
doko Kristo, go Staku tea dodomiana
aginau. Kuga vasadodomi Apelle, 10
tea maridogoana doko Kristo.
Kuga vasadodomi tea maga waina
eu pei tea ni nasuma ki Aristobulo.
Kuga vasadodomi Herodion tea 11
vei namatarau aginau. Kuga vasa-
dodomi tea maga ni nasuma ki
Narkisso, waina eu doko Nawota.
Kuga vasadodomi Trifaina go 12
Trifosa, waina ero do posiwosi doko
Nawota. Kuga vasadodomi Persis
tea dodomiana, waina e posiwosi
parua doko Nawota. Kuga vasa- 13
dodomi Rufo tea matadoaana doko
Nawota, go pilana go pilagami.
Kuga vasadodomi Asugkrito, Flecon, 14
Herrae, Patroba, Herma, go tai-
gida maga waina eu doko sikoti
ra. Kuga vasadodomi Filoloco go 15
Yulia, Nereu go gorena, go Olimpa,
go tea tautau maga mamau puti
waina eu doko sikoti ra. Kuga 1G
tumamu pasadodomi mu ki na
tumiliana tautau sikai. Ekkalesia
maga mamau puti ki Kristo eu
pasadodomi mu.
Ma a paravani mu, tai maga, 17
kuga leopunusi tea maga waina
eu do mari natapotaeana maga
go tea tapilagonaana maga, waina
eu pano pota ki navasapiseikiana
waina nimu ku ataedogo sua e ;
go kuga tawasi melu dua ki da
pano. Nalakena tea maga waina eu 18
dapala nogoe eu da magi Nawota
anigida Kristo suasua mau, ma eu
magi napeleda suasua , go eu pila-
surue pae navasapakaleana go na
vasapiaana napopo maga ni tea
maga waina eu da sa mau. Na 19
lakena narogoparatikiana animu e
sokapule paki naatamoli maga
mamau puti. Nalakena tea wano-
goe a laelaea nalakena nimu: ma
a masauna naga kuga vei tea
manumatua nalo ni tea waina e
pia, go tea ta marisaki mau nalo ni
tea waina e sa. Go Supe ni na 20
tamateana ega wo mariporaworae


Satan etano ki namelemu maga
maraverave.
Nasaupiaana ki Nawota anigida
Yesu Kristo ega sikoti mu.
21 Timotheo, tea wosiwosi sikoti au
e pasadodomi mu; go Lukio go
Yason go Sosipater, tea vei nama-
-22 tarau aginau maga. Kinau Tertio,
waina a midiri epistole waia, a
23 pasadodomi mu doko Nawota. Caio
waina e piragi au, go ekkalesia
mamau au pei namenaki maga,
e pasadodomi mu. Erasto tasiga
leoprati ki mone ni natokoana e
pasadodomi mu, go Kuarto taigida.
24 [Nasaupiaana ki Nawota anigida
Yesu Kristo ega sikoti puti mu.
Amen.]
Ma agi tea waina e mariatae 21
lawosoki mu pae narogorogoana
wia aginau go narogorogo-ki-Yesu-
Kristo-ana, pae nanoapakasakiana
ni paia waina e pei tea mariana
e punuta ragi maga ni tuai
waina eu pano, ma ragi waia e 2(
pei tea mariana e doko lina, go
pae navasaana midiriana maga
ki profeta maga, pae natipaki-
ana ki Supe waina e du mau du,
e pei tea mariana e pei tea ataeana
paid nalauna maga mamau puti
paid narogoparatikiana ni nasara-
lomauana ; agi Supe waina e masi- 27
kina manumatua, nasamasamaana
ega vei aneana pae Yesu Kristo pa
pa ega tu mau du. Amen.
EPISTOLE YEA KI PAULO APOSTOLO
TEA NI KOEINTHO MAGrA
Matele 1
1 Paulo, tea sosoana naga ega vei
apostolo sikai ki Yesu Kristo pae
namasauana ki Supe, go Sostliene
2 taigida, aro midiri paki ekkalesia
ki Supe waina e doko Korintko, paki
tea maga waina eu pei tea mari-
dautaukiana doko Kristo Yesu,
tea sosoana naga euga vei tea tautau
maga, nara go tea maga mamau
puti ni sara tokora waina eu pioso
