paki nagisa ni Nawota anigida
Yesu Kristo, Nawota adeada go
3 anigida : nasaupiaana ega vei
animu go natamateana waina e
pae Supe Tamagida go Nawota
Yesu Kristo.
A pasadodomata ki Supe aginau 4
sara ragi nalo kakamu, nalakena
nasaupiaana ki Supe waina e pei
tea vituakiana paki mu doko Kristo
Yesu ; nalakena ku pei tea mariana 5
ku pei sogolapa doko asa, nalo ni
sara naleo, nalo ni sara navasaana
go ni sara naataeana; dapala 6
waina nanoasokisokiana ni Kristo
e pei tea lawosokiana doko mu : da- 7
pala waina ku da pei tea edaku
nalo ni te navituaana ni nasau-
piaana mau ; ku do leogoro naumai-
pakilinaana ki Nawota anigida


8 Yesu Kristo; waina ma ega wo
lawosoki mu pa pa paki namata-
pagona edaku mau, naga kuga ta
pei tea vasadipaana mau naaleatia
ki Nawota anigida Yesu Kristo.
9 Supe e pei lomau, waina ku pei
tea sosoana pae asa paki nasaisai-
peaniana ki Natuna Yesu Kristo
Nawota anigida.
10 Ma a pasa parati ki mu, tai maga,
pae nagisa ni Nawota anigida
Yesu Kristo, naga kuga mamau puti
noa tea sikai maau, go naga na
tapotaeana seara euga ta doko
maleoputo kakamu mau ; ma naga
kuga vei tei mariana kuga wia lua
nalo ni namidodoana sikai maau go
ni namidoakipotaeana sikai maau.
11 Nalakena e pei tea noasaiana paki
nau nalo kakamu, taigu maga, pae
tea maga ni nasuma ki Kloe, naga
navululuana maga eu doko maleo-
-12 puto kakamu. Ma a noa tea waia,
naga sara naata kakamu eu sikai-
sikai naga, Kinau a pei tea ki Paulo ;
go kinau a pei tea ki Apollo ; go
kinau a pei tea ki Kefa ; go kinau
13 a pei tea ki Kristo. Kristo e pei
tea tapotaeana kite ? Paulo e
manimu pei tea turiana nakau
valadagoto kite ? ku pei tea bape-
tizoana paki nagisa ni Paulo kite \
14 A pasadodomata ki Supe nalakena
a da bapetizo te naata sikai kakamu
mau, ma a hapetizo Krispo go
15 Caio ero sikida ; naga te naata ega
ta noa naga ku pei tea bapetizoana
16 paki nagisagu mau. Go a bapetizo
tea ni nasuma ki Stelana. Tea
pota, a da atae mau naga a bapetizo
17 te naata pota sikai. Nalakena
Kristo e da dipakilua au naga aga
bapetizo mau, ma naga aga rogo-
rogo ki narogorogoana wia: aga
ta mari a pae namanumatuaana ni
navasaana mau, naga nakau vala-
dagoto ki Kristo ega ta pei tea
mariana ega vei tea palo mau.
18 Nalakena navasaana ni nakau
valadagoto e magi tea maga waina
eu do mate puoli pei namanumata-
vusaana; ma e magi tea maga
waina eu do pei tea mautipauriana
e manigida pei nakasuaana ki Supe.
Nalakena e pei tea midiriana, 19
Aga wo mari puoli ki namanu-
matuaana ki tea manumatua
maga.
Go namidoakiataeana ki tea
midoakiatae maga aga wo
dipadoa e.
Tea manumatua wai ? tea midiri 20
wai ? tea vasapululu ni mara-
mana waia wai ? Supe e da mari
namanumatuaana ni maramana
e manumatavusa kite ? Nalakena 21
ragi waina e doko namanumatua-
ana ki Supe naga maramana e da
atae Supe pae namanumatuaana
kakana mau, Supe e midoakimata
ki nia naga ega mautipauri pae
namanumatavusaana ni narogo-
rogokiana tea maga waina eu sara-
lomau. Nalakena tea ni Yudea 22
maga eu datago navaivaiana maga,
go tea ni Hellas maga eu laga
namanumatuaana : ma kinami au 23
dogorogo ki Kristo tea turiana
nakau valadagoto, e magi tea ni
Yudea maga pei tea tapilagonaana,
go e magi tea ni nalauna pota maga
pei namanumatavusaana; ma e 24
magi tea maga waina eu pei tea
sosoana, tea ni Yudea maga go
tea ni Hellas maga, pei Kristo na
kasuaana ki Supe, go namanu-
matuaana ki Supe. Nalakena 25
namanumatavusaana ki Supe e
manumatua liu naatamoli maga;
go namanainaiana ki Supe e kasua
liu naatamoli maga.
Nalakena kuga vunusi nasoso-
mu-ana, tai maga, naga tea manu- 26
matua pae napokasi eu 1 da lapa
mau, tea kasua eu da lapa mau, tea
vakilina pia eu da lapa mau:
ma Supe e matadoa tea manumata- 27
vusa maga ni maramana, naga


ega mari tea manumatua maga
euga maliere ; go Supe e matadoa
tea manainai maga ni maramana,
naga ega mari tea kasua maga euga
28 maliere ; go tea vakilina sa maga
ni maramana, go ‘tea midoakipalo-
kiana maga, Supe e matadoa ra,
go tea maga waina eu da doko mau,
naga ega mari tea maga waina eu
29 doko euga vei tea moli: naga te
napokasi seara euga ta pakavakae
30 narae ni Supe mau. Ma e melu asa
umai naga nimu ku doko Kristo
Yesu, waina e pei tea mariana
e manigida pei namanumatuaana
waina e pae Supe umai, go namari-
naleoleanaana go namaridautau-
-31 kiana, go natauluaana: naga, da-
kiusi waina e pei tea midiriana,
Tea waina e pakavakae ega
vakavakae Yeliovah.
Matele 2.
1 Go kinau ragi waina a paloti
punusi mu, tai maga, a da paloti
pae nawialuaana ni navasaana mau
kite ni namanumatuaana mau,
doko do dogorogo paki mu ki paia
2 ki Supe. Nalakena a midoakipotae
naga aga ta atae te navatuna fnaleo-
puto kakamu mau, ma Yesu Kristo
aikina, go nae tea turiana nakau
3 valadagoto. Go kinau a sikoti
mu doko namanainaiana go nama-
takuana go narurururuana warua.
4 Go navasaana aginau go narogo-
rogokiana aginau ero da doko na
vasapuadoaana ni namanumatua-
ana mau, ma ero doko navasapisei-
kisokisokiana ki Naatana go ni
5 nakasuaana ; naga nasaralomauana
animu ega ta doko namanumatua-
ana ki naatainoli maga mau, ma
naga ega toko nakasuaana ki Supe.
6 Ma au do pasa namanumatuaana
maleoputo ni tea matua maga;
ma e pei namanumatuaana sikai
waina e da pei tea ni maramana
waia mau, go e da pei tea ki tea
maraki maga ni maramana waia
mau, waina eu do pei tea mari-
puolikiana : ma au do pasa namanu- 7
matuaana ki Supe doko paia sikai,
namanumatuaana waina e pei tea
tasurukiana, waina Supe e pea
dawana ki nia pea ki maramana
maga paid nasamasamaana anigida ;
waina tea maraki maga ni mara- 8
mana waia sikai kakada e da atae
a mau : nalakena eu pe atae a eu
pe ta turi Nawota ni nasamasama-
ana nakau valadagoto mau : ma 9
dapala waina e pei tea midiriana,
Naleo maga waina namata e da
punusi ra mau, go nadaliga e
da dogo ra mau,
Go waina eu da sili paid napopo ni
naatainoli mau,
Naleo maga waina Supe e magi
tea maga waina eu dodomi a
marifnata ki da.
Ma Supe e maripakasa ki da paki 10
garni pae Naatana : nalakena Na
atana e do leousiusi naleo maga
mamau puti, go tea vakipua maga
ki Supe. Nalakena sei ni naata 11
moli maga e atae naleo maga ki
naatainoli sikai, ma naata ni naata-
moli wanogoe, waina e doko asa,
e sikina ? go dapala nogoe naleo
maga ki Supe te naata e da atae
ra mau, ma Naata ni Supe e sikina
atae ra. Ma kinami au da dape 12
naatana ni maramana mau, ma
au dape naatana waina e pei tea
ni Supe; naga auga atae naleo
maga waina eu pei tea vituakisau-
piakiana paki gida pae Supe. Go 13
naleo maga wanogoe au do pasa ara,
au da pasa ara ki navasaana maga
waina eu pei tea vasapiseikiana
ni namanumatuaana ki naatainoli
mau, ma au pasa ara ki navasaana
maga waina eu pei tea vasapisei-
kiana ki Naatana : au do magi tea
maga ni Naatana saisaikinoapota-
wotae naleo maga ki Naatana.


14 Ma naatamoli waina e pei tea ni
namero e da dape naleo maga ki
Naata ni Supe man : nalakena eu
maneana pei namanumatavusa-
ana; go e da mariatae atae ra
man, nalakena eu pei tea midoaki-
15 potaeana pae Naatana. Ma naata
waina e pei tea ni Naatana e midoa-
kipotae naleo maga mamau puti,
ma nae e da pei tea midoakipotaeana
16 pae te naata mau. Nalakena sei e
atae .namidodoana ki Yehovah,
waina ega vasapisei ki nia ? Ma
kinami an peani namidodoana ki
Kristo.
Matele 3.
1 Go kinau, tai maga, a- mari sapo
pasa Id mu dapala ku pei tea ni
Naatana, ma a pasa ki mu dapala
ku pei tea ni napokasi, dapala ku
2 pei pipia maga doko Kristo. A dua
mu milk ku munu, a da dua mu
navinaga mau; nalakena ku ko
da mari atae mau : go ragi waia ku
3ko da mari atae mau; nalakena
ku ko pei tea ni napokasi; nalakena
waina naroitoiana go navululu-
ana ero doko maleoputo kakamu,
ku da pei tea ni napokasi, po surata
4 pae naatamoli maga kite ? Nala-
kena ragi waina sikai e naga, Kinau
a pei tea ki Paulo; go tea pota sikai
e naga, Kinau a pei tea ki Apollo,
ku da pei naatafnoli maga kite ?
5 Nalakena tea wanogoe Apollo e pei
nasava ? go Paulo e pei nasava 1
Tea suasua maga waina ku saralo-
mau pae ara ; go ero sikasikai da-
pala waina Nawota edua ra sarasara
6 ra. Kinau a lalawo, Apollo e pue;
7ma Supe e mari a e ulua. Nalakena
tea wanogoe naata waina e lalawo
e da pei te navatuna mau, go tea
waina e pue e da pei te navatuna
mau ; ma Supe sikma waina e mari
8 a e ulua. Ma tea waina e lalawo
go tea waina e pue ero pei tea sikai
nguna-tongoan n.t.
maau : ma eroga wo sikasikai dape
namoriana adeada sarasara ra ega
vae nawosi - mawosa - ana adeada.
Nalakena au pei tea wosiwosi sikoti 9
Supe: ku pei natano kiliana ki
Supe, nasufna tavagiana ki Supe.
Pae nasaupiaana ki Supe waina 10
e pei tea vituakiana paki nau,
dapala tea vei mataisau matua ni
nasufna a doropusi laketano sikai;
go tea pota sikai e do davagi paki
asa. Ma sara naata euga sikasikai
punusi dapala waina eu do davagi
paki asa. Nalakena laketano pota 11
sikai te naata e da mari atae
doropusi a mau, ma tea waina e
pei tea toropusiana sua e sikina,
waina e pei Yesu Kristo. Ma te 12
naata e pe tavagi paki laketano
cold, silver, vatu maga ni nava-
kokotoana warua, nakau, namenau,
stro ; nawosiana ki sara naatamoli 13
sikasikai ega wo pei tea mari-
ana ega tokolina: nalakena na
aleatia wanogoe ega wo mari a
ega toko lina, nalakena e pei tea
maripakasakiana ■ki nakapu ; go
nakapu nae ega wo mari dogo
nawosiana ki sara naatamoli sika-
sikai e dapale sana. Nawosi- 14
ana kite naata waina e davagi a
paki asa e pe toko, e pe wo dape
namoriana sikai. Nawosiana kite 15
naata epe wo pei.tea taparakiana,
e pe wo dika namoriana, ma nae
ega wo pei tea mautipauriana;
ma ega wo dapala waina e pe
vae nakapu.
Ku da atae naga ku pei nasufna 16
tapu ki Supe, go naga Naata ni
Supe e doko mu doko kite ? Te 17
naata e pe mari sa ki nasufna tapu
ki Supe, Supe e pe wo mari sa ki
naata wanogoe ; nalakena nasufna
tapu ki Supe e dautau, go nimu ku
dapala nogoe.
Te naata ega ta dumana pilasurue 18
a mau. Te naata e pe midoa ki
nia naga e pei tea manumatua


maleoputo kakamu maramana waia,
ega vei tea manumatavusa, naga
19 ega vei tea manumatua. Nalakena
namanumatuaana ni maramana
waia e pei namanumatavusaana
narae ni Supe. Nalakena e pei tea
midiriana, e naga, Nae waina e do
puasoki tea manumatua maga doko
20 namarimanumatuaana adeada : go
e moro naga, Yehovah e atae nami-
dodoana maga Id tea manumatua
21 maga naga eu pei tea palo. Nala-
kena tea wanogoe te naata ega ta
pakavakae naatamoli maga mau.
Nalakena naleo maga mamau puti
22 eu pei animu ; e pe vei Paulo, kite
Apollo, kite Kefa, kite maramana,
kite namauriana, kite namateana,
kite naleo maga waina eu doko
ragi waia, kite naleo maga waina
euga wo umai; tea maga mamau
23 puti eu pei animu ; go nimu ku pei
tea Id Kristo; go Kristo e pei tea
ki Supe.
Matele 4.
1 Naatamoli sikai ega midoa ki
garni ega tapala waia, ega tapala au
pei tea suasua maga ki Kristo, go
tasiga leo parati ki maga ni paia
2 maga ki Supe. Tokora waia, tea
pota sikai, e pei tea lagaana nalo
ni tasiga leo parati ki maga, naga
naata sikai ega vei tea vapaiana
3 ega vei lomau. Ma e maginau pei
tea kiki sa naga aga vei tea vasa-
potaeana pae mu, kite pae navasa-
potaeana ki naatamoli: ma ada
4 dumagu vasapotae au mau. Na
lakena a da atae te navatuna dipa
au mau; ma ada pei tea mari-
leanakiana pae tea wanogoe mau:
ma tea waina e pasapotae au e pei
5 Nawota. Nalakena tea wanogoe
kuga ta pasapotae te navatuna pea
ki ragi kakana mau, pa pa Nawota
ega wo umai, waina ega wo ma-
ramalagati tea tasurukiana maga
ni namaligo, po mari namidoaki-
potaeana maga ni napopo maga
euga toko lina; go ragi wanogoe
sara naatamoli euga wo sikasikai
dape nasamasamaniana fnelu Supe.
Ma tea maga wanogoe, tai maga, 6
a pasadoa ra paki garni ma Apollo
nalakena nimu, naga kuga ataedogo
pae garni naga kuga ta liu tea maga
waina eu pei tea midiriana mau;
naga sikai ega ta magi tea sikai pei
tea popo vuka dipa tea pota sikai
mau. Nalakena sei e mari ko ku 7
pano pota ? go ku peani nasava
waina ku da dape a mau ? ma ku
pe tape a, ekasana ku pakavakae,
dapala ku pe ta dape a mau ? Ragi 8
waia ku puka sua, ragi waia ku pei
sogolapa sua, ku maramara masale
ki garni: go a masau lomau ki nia
naga kuga maramara, naga kinami
ma auga maramara sikoti mu.
Nalakena, a midoa ki nia, Supe 9
e mari garni apostolo maga au
edaku pei tea viseikiana, dapala
tea tipakotoviana maga naga euga
mate ; nalakena au pei tea mariana
au magi maramana, go agelo maga,
go naatamoli maga, pei tea leo-
punusiana. Kinami au pei tea 10
manumatavusa nalakena Kristo,
ma nimu ku pei tea manu matua
doko Kristo; kinami au manai-
nai, ma nimu ku kasua; nimu
ku pei tea samasamaniana, ma
kinami au pei tea dododaoana.
Pa pa paki aura ni ragi waia au 11
pitolo, po madou, po malamala,
po pei tea tipaana, po dika ki
tokora waina auga toko asa; go 12
au do posiwosi mawosa, au do
posiwosi ki namelearugami maga:
tea suoriana, au do pasamataki;
tea kopaleleana, au do soki, a;
tea vasasakiana, au do pavara: 13
au pei tea mariana au dapala
nasogo ni maramana, go nasama
ni naleo maga mamau puti pa pa
paki ragi waia.


14 Ada midiri tea maga wanogoe
naga aga mari mu kuga maliere
mau, ma naga aga tapavanau mu
dapala natugu dodomiana aginau
15 maga. Nalakena ku pe veani tea
vasapiseiki tivilia sikai doko Kristo,
ma ku da peani tamamu lapa
mau: nalakena kinau a pesi mu
pae narogorogoana wia doko Kristo
16 Yesu. Nalakena tea wanogoe a
pasa parati ki mu, kuga vei tea
17 marioli au. Nalakena tea wanogoe
a dipakilua Tirnotheo paloti punusi
mu, waina e pel natugu dodomiana
go waina e pei lomau doko Nawota,
waina ega wo mari mu kuga moro
midoa ki napua aginau maga waina
eu doko Kristo, dapala waina a do
pasapiseiki sara tokora doko sara
18 ekkalesia. Ma seara eu pei tea popo
vuka dapala a naga aga ta paloti
19 punusi mu mau. Ma Nawota epe
suasua, a pe wo paloti punusi mu
maraverave; go aga wo da atae
navasaana ki tea maga waina eu
pei tea popo vuka mau, ma aga
20 wo atae nakasuaana adeada. Na
lakena namarakiana ki Supe e da
doko navasaana mau, ma e doko
21 nakasuaana. Ku masau nasava ?
Agavuati nakau varati sikai paloti
punusi mu kite ? kite aga vilake
nadodomiana go Naatana ni nama-
temateana ?
Matele 5.
1 E pei tea rogorogokiana usuraki
naga namaripeleana e doko nialeo-
puto kakamu, go namaripeleana
dapala waina tea takiusi a e da
doko maleoputo ni tea ni nalauna
maga mau, naga naata sikai kakamu
2 e peani nagoroi ki tamana. Go
nimu ku pei tea popo vuka, go ku
da susue mau, naga naata waina e
mari nawosiana wanogoe ega vei
tea tapeluaana rnelu dua ki maleo-
-3 puto kakamu. Nalakena kinau
lomau, waina a puoli ki mu ki
napatokogu, ma a sikoti mu ki
naatagu, a midoakipotae sua, dapala
a pe sikoti mu doko, naata waina e
mari tea wanogoe dapala nogoe,
doko nagisa ni Nawota anigida 4
Yesu, ragi waina nimu kuga saisai,
go naatagu, pilake nakasuaana ki
Nawota anigida Yesu, naga kuga 5
vitua ki tea waina e dapala nogoe
paki Satan, raki namari-sa-ki-napo-
kasina-ana, naga naatana ega vei
tea mautipauriana naaleatia ki
Nawota Yesu. Navakavakaeana 6
animu e da pia mau. Ku da atae naga
leven kiki e levena ki taua mamau
kite ? Kuga maripuoli ki leven 7
tuai, naga kuga vei taua vau sikai,
ega tapala waina ku da pei tea
levenakiana mau. Go nalakena
navakalauana anigida e pei tea mari-
punueana sua, Kristo : nalakena 8
tea wanogoe tuga mari nasaisaiana,
tuga ta mari a ki leven tuai mau,
go tuga ta mari a ki leven ni
navilosiana go ni nasigisigileoana
mau, ma tuga mari a ki bred waina
e da pei tea levenakiana mau ni
natautauana go ni nalomauana.
A midiri paki mu doko epistole 9
waina, naga kuga ta sikoti-sari tea
maripele maga mau; ada noa 10
naga ega tapala nogoe pae tea
mamau nalo ni tea maripele maga
ni maramana waia mau, kite tea
matamagura maga go tea tape-
pavakoto maga, kite tea lotu ki
nasupe maga; nalakena e pe
tapala nogoe e pe one mu one naga
kuga rnelu dua ki maramana pano :
ma a midiri paki mu naga kuga ta 11
sikoti-sari, te naata waina e pei tea
sosoana ki tai sikai, e pe vei tea
maripele, kite tea matamagura,
kite tea lotu ki nasupe maga, kite
tea vivisuori, kite tea matamaloku,
kite tea tapepavakoto ; tea tapala
nogoe kuga ta ganikani sikoti a
mau. Nalakena aga kasa ki naga 12


aga vasapotae tea maga ni etaku ?
Nimu ku da pasapotae tea maga ni
13 roara kite ? ma tea maga ni etaku
Supe e pasapotae ra ? Kuga mari
tea sigisigileo wanogoe ega melu
dua Id mu pano.
Matele 6.
1 Te naata sikai kakamu, waina e
peani te naleo sikai dipa tea pota,
e piviari pei tea vasapotaeana narae
ni tea tagele maga, go e da pei tea
vasapotaeana narae ni tea tautau
2 maga mau kite ? Kite ku da atae
mau naga tea tautau maga euga
wo pasapotae maramana ? go mara-
mana e pe vei tea vasapotaeana pae
mu, ku da pia mau naga kuga vasa-
-3 potae tea kiki sa maga kite ? Ku da
atae mau naga tuga wo pasapotae
agelo maga ? go tuga ta pasapotae
naleo maga ni namauriana waia kite ?
4 Nalakena tea wanogoe ku pe veani
navasapotaeana maga ni naleo maga
ni namauriana waia, ku lawo ki
tea maga waina eu pei tea
midoakipalokiana ni ekkalesia naga
5 euga vasapotae kite ? A noa tea
wanogoe naga kuga maliere. E
dapala tea manumatua sikai e da
doko fnaleoputo kakamu mau,
waina e mariatae midoa ki noa
6 potae namawota ni taina maga, ma
tai sikai e pei tea vasapotaeana
sikoti taina, go tea wanogoe narae
ni tea maga waina eu da saralomau
7 mau kite ? Nalakena tea wanogoe
e pei tea sa sua usuraki animu,
waina ku peani tea vasapotaeana
maga dumamu sikoti mu. Ekasana
kuga ta pei tea maridagelekiana ?
ekasana kuga ta pei tea vutiluaana ?
8 Ma nimu ku maridagele po putilua,
go tea wanogoe paki taimu maga.
9 Kite ku da atae naga tea mari-
naleo tagele maga euga wo da peani
namarakiana ki Supe mau ? Kuga
ta pei tea vilasurueana mau : tea
maripele maga waina eu pei naputu,
go tea lotu ki nasupe maga, go tea
maripele maga waina eu pitawiri,
go tea maga waina eu maripele oli
nagoroi, go tea maga waina eu
maripele paki tea marioli nagoroi,
go tea vanako maga, go tea mata- 10
inagura maga, go tea matamaloku
maga, go tea vivisuori maga, go
tea tape-pavakoto maga, euga wo
da peani namarakiana ki Supe mau.
Go nimu seara kakamu ku pei tea 11
tapala nogoe maga : ma ku dumamu
sarue mu, ma ku pei tea maridautau-
kiana, ma ku pei tea marileanakiana
doko nagisa ni Nawota Yesu Kristo,
go doko Naata ni Supe anigida.
Naleo maga mamau puti eu 12
pae nawotaeana paki nau; ma
naleo maga mamau puti eu da
marimataki mau. Naleo maga
mamau puti eu pae nawotaeana
paki nau; ma kinau aga ta pei
naviti ni te navatuna mau.
Navinaga maga agi napele, go 13
napele agi navinaga maga: ma
Supe ega wo maripuoli ki sokata ki
da. Ma napatoko e da pei agi
namaripeleana mau, ma e pei agi
Nawota, go Nawota e pei agi
napatoko ; ma Supe e sike Nawota 14
e duleana, go ega wo sike gida tuga
wo duleana pae nakasuaana aneana.
Ku da atae naga napatokomu maga 15
eu pei naleo maga ni Kristo kite ?
go aga tapelua naleo maga ni
Kristo, po mari ra euga vei naleo
maga ni nagoroi masausara sikai
kite ? Ega ta dapala nogoe mau.
Kite ku da atae naga tea waina e 16
puluti nagoroi masausara sikai e
pei napatoko sikai maau ma nae ?
nalakena e naga, Nara dua eroga wo
pei napokasi sikai maau. Ma tea 17
waina e puluti Nawota e pei
naatana sikai maau ma nae. Kuga 18
sava dua ki namaripeleana. Sara
namarinaleosaana waina naatainoli
sikai e mari ra eu pei tea ni etaku ni


napatokona; ma tea waina emari-
pele e marinaleosa dipa napatokona.
19 Kite ku da atae naga napatokomu
e pei nasufna tapu ki Naatana
Tapu waina e doko mu, waina ku
peani a fnelu Supe % go ku da du-
-20 fnamu peani mu mau ; nalakena
ku pei tea vakotoviana ki naulu
sikai: Nalakena tea wanogoe kuga
samasamani Supe doko napatokomu.
Matele 7.
1 Ma nalo ni naleo maga waina ku
midiri ra; E pia ki naatamoli sikai
naga ega ta kisidogo nagoroi sikai
2 mau. Ma, nalakena namaripeleana
maga, sara naatamoli euga sikasikai
peani nagoroi adeada ega sikasikai
sarasara ra, go sara nagoroi euga
sikasikai peani naanoai adeada ega
3 sikasikai sarasara ra. Naanoai ega
vitua paki anagoroi ki tea waina e
one asa one: go dapala nogoe
nagoroi ega vitua paki anawota.
4 Nagoroi e da peani naveinawotaana
ni napatokona mau, ma anawota e
;peani a : go dapala nogoe naanoai
ma e da peani naveinawotaana ni
napatokona mau, ma anagoroi e
5 peani a. Kuga ta dumamu dapelua
ki amu mau, ma koro pe rua sua-
sua ki nia te ragi, naga koroga
tumamu pitua ki mu paki nata-
pasavasaana, po moro dumamu
sikoti mu, e pe wia, naga Satan ega
ta maridogo mu mau nalakena sape
6na mari-dumamu-soki-mu-ana. Ma
a noa tea wanogoe e pei nasuasua-
kiana, e da pei natipakiana mau.
7Ma a masauna naga naatamoli
maga mamau puti euga tapala
waina kinau a doko. Ma sara
naatamoli eu sikasikai peani navi-
tuaana ni nasaupiaana adeada sika-
sikai sarasara ra fnelu Supe, sikai
e dapala nea, go sikai e dapalana.
8 Ma a noa ki naputu maga go ki
nagoroi malepu maga, naga eu pe
toko dapala waina kinau a doko
e pe wia ki da. Ma eu pe mari- 9
sapo dumada sold ra, euga vitawiri
go euga laid: nalakena eu pe
vitawiri go eu pe laid e pe wia liu
waina eu pe vavaga. Ma a dipa ki 10
tea vitawiri maga go tea laki maga,
e da pei kinau mau, ma e pei
Nawota, Naga nagoroi ega ta melu
dua ki anawota pano mau (ma go e 11
pe fnelu pano, ega vei naputu doko,
kite ega moro pei popo wia paki
anawota) ; go naga naanoai ega ta
doropusi anagoroi mau. Ma kinau 12
a noa ki tea pota maga, e da pci
Nawota mau; Te taigida sikai e
pe veani nagoroi sikai waina e da
saralomau mau, go nae e pe suasua
naga ega toko sikoti a doko, ega ta
doropusi a mau. Go nagoroi waina 13
e peani anawota waina e da sara-
lomau mau, go nae e pe suasua naga
ega toko sikoti a doko, ega ta doro-
pusi anawota mau. Nalakena na 14
anoai waina e da saralomau mau e
pei tea maridautaukiana pae ana-
goroi, go nagoroi waina e da
saralomau mau e pei tea mari-
dautaukiana pae anawota: epe
ta dapala nogoe mau natumu maga
eu pe loa doko; ma ragi waia eu
dautau. Ma tea waina e da sara- 15
lomau mau e pe fnelu pano, ega
melu pano : taigida kite goregida
e da pei tea soliana nalo ni
tea tapala nagoe maga mau : ma
Supe e soso gida doko natamateana.
Nalakena ku atae dapale sava, 16
nagoroi, naga pa wo mautipauri
amawota ? kite ku atae dapale
sava, naanoai, naga pa wo mauti-
pauri afnagoroi'? Ma dapala waina 17
Nawota e magi sara naatamoli
sikasikai potawotae, dapala waina
Supe e soso sara naatamoli sika-
sikai, euga surata ega tapala nogoe.
Go a do pasadawanaki dapala nogoe
doko ekkalesia maga mamau puti.
Te naatamoli sikai waina e pei 18


tea tovadaviviana sua e pei tea
sosoana kite ? ega ta maripuoli ki
natovadaviviana aneana man. Te
naata waina e da pei tea tovada-
viviana man e pei tea sosoana kite ?
ega ta pei tea tovadaviviana man.
19 Natovadaviviana e da pei te nava-
tuna man, go natikaana ni natovar
daviviana e da pei te navatuna
man ; ma narogoparatikiana ni na
tipakiana maga ki Supe e pei naleo
20 maga mamau puti. Sara naatamoli
euga sikasikai doko nasosoana waina
21 eu pei tea sosoana doko asa. Ku
pei naviti ragi waina ku pei tea
sosoana kite ? pa ta midoa ki
parati ki tea wanogoe man: ma
ku pe mariatae pei tea veresiana
dumama doko, e pe wia naga
22 pa mari a. Nalakena naviti waina
e pei tea sosoana doko Na
wota, e pei tea veresiana dumana
doko ki Nawota; tapala nogoe
tea tumana doko waina e pei tea
sosoana, e pei naviti ki Kristo.
23 Ku pei tea vakotoviana ki naulu
sikai; kuga ta pei naviti maga
24 ki naatamoli maga mau. Tai
maga, sara naatamoli euga si-
kasikai doko tea waina eu doko
asa ragi waina eu pei tea sosoana,
euga toko tea wanogoe doko sikoti
Supe.
25 Ma nalo ni nagoroi atara maga a
da peani te natipakiana ki Nawota
mau : ma a pitua ki namidoaki-
potaeana aginau, waina a dapala
tea waina e dape nadodomiana ki
26 Nawota naga ega vei lomau. Nala-
kena tea wanogoe a midoa ki nia
naga tea waia e pia nalakena
napalaasa waina e doko ragi waia,
naga e pia ki naatamoli naga ega
27 toko dapala waina e doko. Ku
pei tea soliana paki nagoroi sikai
kite ? pa ta laga naga pa vei tea
veresiana mau. Ku pei tea vere-
siana meludua ki nagoroi sikai
kite ? pa ta laga nagoroi sikai mau.
Ma go ku pe vitawiri, ku pe ta 28
mari naleo sa asa mau ; go nagoroi
atara sikai e pe laki, e pe ta mari
naleo sa asa mau. Ma tea tapala
nogoe maga euga wo peani narie-
sokiana doko napokasi: ma kinau
a marimalemale mu. Ma a noa 29
tea waia, tai maga, naga ragi waina
e ko doko e puru, naga tea maga
waina eu peani nagoroi maga
euga toko dapala eu pe ta peani ra
mau ; go tea maga waina eu dagi, 30
euga tapala eu pe ta dagi mau ; go
tea maga waina eu laelaea, euga
tapala eu pe ta laelaea mau; go
tea maga waina eu pakokoto, euga
tapala eu pe ta dapesoki mau ; go 31
tea maga waina eu marimaari mara-
tnana, euga tapala eu pe ta mari-
maari parua ki nia mau : nalakena
naleodawanakiana ni maramana
waia e do pano puoli. Ma a masau- 32
na naga kuga tika ki namidoaki-
paratikiana maga. Tea waina e
da pitawiri mau e midoa ki parati
ki naleo maga ki Nawota, dapala
waina Nawota ega midoa ki fnata
ki nia : ma tea waina e pitawiri e 33
midoa ki parati ki naleo maga ni
maramana, dapala waina anagoroi
ega midoa ki fnata ki nia. Go 34
natapotaeana sikai e doko nama-
wota ni nagoroi laki go ni nagoroi
atara. Tea waina e da laki mau
e midoa ki parati ki naleo maga ki
Nawota, naga ega tautau napa-
tokona go naatana : ma tea waina
e laki e midoa ki parati ki naleo
maga ni maramana, dapala waina
anawota ega midoa ki fnata ki nia.
Go a noa tea wanogoe naga kuga 35
vei tea marifnatakiana asa, a da
noa e naga aga nadi ki vaivai sikai
paki mu mau, ma naga kuga mari
tea waina e pei tea leofnatakiana,
go naga kuga toko raki Nawota
masale ki navaputuakiana. Ma te 36
naata e pe midoa ki nia naga e da
mari tea leofnatakiana paki naatara


aneana, e pe matua sua, go e pe
tapala nogoe one asa one naga ega
laki, ega mari tea waina e masauna
naga ega mari a; e da mari naleo
sa asa man; eroga tumada piragi
37 ra. Ma tea waina e lawodu kasua
doko napopona, waina e da pei tea
maridieana man, go waina e peani
naveinawotaana nalo ni namasauana
aneana, go waina e midoakipotae
tea wanogoe napopona, naga ega
mauti naatara aneana, ega wo mari
38 pia. Nalakena tea wanogoe tea
waina e pitua ki naatara aneana
naga ega laki e mari pia; go tea
waina e da pitua ki nia mau naga
ega laki ega wo mari pia liu sa.
39 Nagoroi sikai e pei tea soliana ragi
varau waina anawota e mauri
doko ; ma anawota e pe maturu, e
pe vei tea veresiana duinana doko
naga ega laki tea waina e masauna
naga ega laki asa; ma ega ta laki
tea waina e da doko Nawota mau.
40 Ma e pe toko dapala waina e doko
e pe maropa liu waina e pe laki, pae
namidoakipotaeana aginau: go a
midoa ki nia naga kinau ma a peani
Naata ni Supe.
Matele 8.
1 Ma nalo ni naleo maga waina eu
pei naviriana paki nasupe maga :
Tu atae naga tu mamau puti peani
naataeana. Naataeana e do mari
e pei tea popo vuka, ma nadodo-
-2 miana e do davagi. Te naata e pe
midoa ki nia naga e atae te nava-
tuna, e ko da atae mau dapala
waina e one asa one naga ega atae ;
3 ma te naata e pe dodomi Supe,
naata wanogoe e pe vei tea ataeana
4 pae asa. Go nalo ni nakaniana ni
naleo maga waina eu pei navi-
riana paki nasupe maga, tu atae
naga nasupe sikai e da pei te nava-
tuna maramana mau, go naga Supe
sikai e da doko mau ma tea sikai
maau. Nalakena tea maga waina eu 5
pei tea sosoana ki supe maga eu pe
toko, nakoroatelagi kite maramana;
dapala waina supe lapa eu doko, go
nawota lapa; ma anigida Supe 6
sikai mau e doko, Tamana, waina
naleo maga mamau puti eu fnelu
asa, go nigida tu maneana doko; go
Nawota sikai maau, Yesu Kristo,
waina naleo maga mamau puti eu
pae asa, go nigida tu pae asa. Ma 7
naataeana wanogoe e da doko tea
maga mamau puti mau: ma te
seara, nalakena natomariana ni na
supe pa pa paki ragi waia, eu gani
a dapala e pei naleo waina e pei
naviriana paki nasupe sikai; go
natuinada-atae-ana waina e manai-
nai e pei tea mariana e loa asa.
Ma navinaga ega wo da mari gida 8
tuga lawodu narae ni Supe mau: go
tu pe ta ganikani mau, tu pe ta sa
asa mau; go tu pe kanikani, tu pe
ta pia asa mau. Ma kuga vunusi 9
naga naveinawotaana animu wa-
nogoe ega ta pei tea tapilagonaana
sikai paki tea manainai maga mau.
Nalakena te naata e pe vunusi ko 10
waina ku peani naataeana ku pe
kere one ganikani ekopu ni nasurna
ni nasupe sikai, go e pe manainai,
natumana-atae ana e pe wo da pei
tea tavagiana naga ega kani naleo
maga waina eu pei naviriana paki
nasupe maga kite ? Go tea waina 11
e manainai e mate puoli nalakena
naataeana anigo, taigida waina
Kristo e mate nalakena nae. Go 12
dapala nogoe, ragi waina ku mari
naleo sa dipa taigida maga, po
pokati natumada - atae - ana ragi
waina e manainai, ku mari naleo
sa dipa Kristo. Nalakena tea wano-13
goe, navinaga e pe mari taigu e pe
tapilagona, a pe wo da gani te
napokasi seara mau pa pa e pe tu
mau du, naga aga ta mari taigu
ega tapilagona mau.


Matele 9.
1 Ada pei tea veresiana dumagu
doko kite ? a da pei apostolo
sikai kite ? a da punusi Yesu
Nawota anigida kite ? nimu ku
da pei nawosiana aginau doko
2 Nawota kite ? A pe ta magi tea
pota maga pei apostolo sikai mau,
ma a pe manimu pei sikai lomau;
nalakena nimu ku pei navulusokiana
ni navei-apostolo-ana aginau doko
3 Nawota. Navasakorokoroana agi-
nau paki tea maga waina eu puausi
4au e pei tea wanogoe. Au da
peani naveinawotaana naga auga
5 kanikani po munu kite ? Au da
peani naveinawotaana naga auga
maraki pasara nagoroi sikai waina
e saralomau, dapala apostolo pota
maga, go Nawota taina maga, go
6 Kefa kite ? Kite kinau a masikigu
go Barnaba aro da peani naveina-
wotaana naga aroga ta posiwosi
7 mau kite ? Sei e pano seve ragi
naga ega vei naatamoli ni navakalo
po duinana mori a ? sei e lawo
roara ni vaine sikai, po da gani
nawa kakana mau ? kite sei e
leo parati ki pakale navata ni shiip
sikai, po da gani tea ni milk ni
8 navata mau ? A pasa tea maga
wanogoe pae naatamoli kite ?
kite nawotaeana ma e noa tea
9 maga wanogoe ? Nalakena e pei tea
midiriana doko nawotaeana ki
Moses, e naga, Pa ta pauasi ox mau
ragi waina e do pasilesue korn.
Supe e midoa ki parati ki ox maga
kite, kite e noa e pae tea mamau
10 nalakena kinami ? loro, e pei tea
midiriana nalakena kinami: nala-
kena e one tea waina e do sisi
natano one naga ega sisi natano
doko naleogoroana, go e one tea
waina e do pokalesue naga ega
wohalesue doko naleogoroana ni
11 naveanipotaeana. Kinami au pe
manimu sapura ki naleo maga ni
Naatana, e pe vei tea warua kinami
au pe wo tagaukotovi naleo animu
maga ni napokasi kite ? Tea pota 12
maga eu pe veanipotae navei-
nawotaana wanogoe dapau mu,
kinami au pe ta peani parua ki nia
kite ? Ma au da marimaari navei-
nawotaana wanogoe mau ; ma au
do soki naleo maga mamau puti,
naga auga ta dugoro narogorogoana
wia ki Kristo mau. Ku da atae 13
naga tea maga waina eu do posi-
wosi ki tea tapu maga eu gani naleo
maga ni nasurna tapu, go naga tea
maga waina eu doko raid wede ni
naviriana eu peani potae naviriana
maga ma wede kite ? Dapala nogoc 14
ma Nawota e pitipaki naga tea
maga waina eu do dogorogo ki na
rogorogoana wia euga mauri nielu
narogorogoana wia. Ma kinau al5
da marimaari tea sikai ni tea maga
wanogoe mau : go a da midiri tea
maga wanogoe naga ega vei tea
mariana dapala nogoe nalo kakagu
mau : nalakena a pe mate e pe wia
ki nau, liu waina te naata e pe mari
tea vakavakaeana aginau e pevei tea
palo. Nalakena a pe rogorogo ki 16
narogorogoana wia, a pe ta peani
tea waina a pe vakavakae asa mau;
nalakena namaridieana e pei tea
toropusiana one au; nalakena a
pe ta dogorogo ki narogorogoana
wia mau, awe e pe vei aginau.
Nalakena a pe tufnagu mari tea 17
wanogoe, a pe veani namoriana
sikai, ma a pe ta dumagu mau, a pe
vei tea vavatuaana ki naveitasiga-
leo-parati-kiana sikai. Go namori- 18
ana aginau e pei nasava ? Naga,
ragi waina a dogorogo ki narogo-
rogoana wia, aga mari narogorogo-
ana wia ega vei naulu tika, naga
aga ta marimaari parua ki naveina-
wotaana aginau doko narogorogoana
wia mau. Nalakena ragi waina al9
pei tea veresiana dumagu doko
meludua ki tea maga mamau puti, a


dumagu mari au a pei naviti ki tea
maga mamau puti, naga aga talua
20 tea lapa liu. Go a magi tea ni Yudea
maga pei tea tapala tea ni Yudea
sikai, naga aga talua tea ni Yudea
maga ; a magi tea maga waina eu
doko etano ki nawotaeana, pei tea
tapala tea toko etano ki nawo-
taeana, waina kinau a da pei tea
toko etano ki nawotaeana mau,
naga aga talua tea maga waina eu
21 doko etano ki nawotaeana ; a magi
' tea maga waina eu dika nawotaeana,
pei tea tapala tea tika nawotaeana,
waina a da pei tea tika nawotaeana
paid Supe mau, ma a pei tea toko
etano ki* nawotaeana paki Kristo,
naga aga talua tea maga waina eu
22 dika nawotaeana. A magi tea
manainai maga pei tea manainai
sikai, naga aga talua tea manainai
maga: a magi naatamoli maga
mamau puti pei naleo maga mamau
’ puti, naga aga mautipauri pae sara
23 yatuna te seara. Go ado mari naleo
maga mamau puti nalakena na
rogorogoana wia, naga aga mamau
24 pei tea saisai peani a. Ku da atae
naga tea maga waina eu sava malo
ni nasavaana eu mamau puti sava,
ma tea sikai maau e dape praize.
Kuga sava ega tapala nogoe, naga
25 kuga vuasoki. Go sara naata waina
eu do pilele eu dufnada soki ra nolo ni
naleo maga mamau puti. Go nara
eu mari a naga euga tape vauvau
sikai waina ega wo madada, ma
nigida naga tuga tape tea waina ega
26 wo da madada mau. Nalakena tea
wanogoe kinau a do sava, dapala
waina a da sava paroparo mau ; a
do dipa dapala waina a da dipa
27 namalopa mau : ma a dipa napa-
tokogu e loa, po mari a e pei naviti
aginau: naga, ragi waina a dogorogo
ki sua paki tea pota maga, kinau aga
ta pei tea tipadoaana mau.
Matele 10.
Nalakena a da masauna naga 1
nimu kuga vei sapo, tai maga, naga
tamagida maga eu mamau puti
doko etano ki napopouru, po mamau
puti surata duagoto duaduru natasi,
po mamau puti pei tea bapetizoana 2
paki Moses napopouru go natasi,
po mamau puti gani navinaga 3
sikai maau ni naatana ; po mamau
puti munu noai munuana sikai
maau ni naatana: nalakena eu 4
munu fnelu vatu laketoko sikai
waina e dausi ra : go vatu laketoko
wanogoe e pei Kristo. Ma Supe e 5
da midoa ki mata ki tea lapa
kakada mau, nalakena eu pei tea
welesakiana masopalo. Ma tea 6
maga wanogoe eu pei tea mariana
eu manigida pei naatulakeana
maga, naga nigida tuga ta pei tea
masau naleo sa maga mau, dapala
waina nara ma eu masau ra. Go 7
kuga ta pei tea lotu ki nasupe maga
mau, dapala waina nara seara
kakada ; dakiusi waina e pei tea
midlriana, Narei eu do natano naga
euga kanikani po munu, go eu
duleana naga euga waro. Go tuga 8
ta maripele mau, dapala waina
nara seara kakada eu maripele, po
dowo naaleatia sikai tivilia dua go
manu dolu. Go tuga ta maridogo 9
Nawota mau, dapala waina nara
seara kakada eu maridogo e| po
pei tea maripunueana pae maata
maga. Go kuga ta dauruuru 10
mau, dapala waina nara seara
kakada eu dauruuru. po pei tea
maripunueana pae tea mari-sa-ki.
Ma tea maga wanogoe eu pakilina 11
ki da pae naatulakeana ; go eu pei
tea midiriana raki natapavanau-
gida-ana, waina namatapago edaku
maga ni ragi varau maga eu po
umai pa parati ki gida. Nalakena 12
tea wanogoe naata waina e midoa
ki nia naga e lawodu ega vunusi


13 naga ega ta dowo man. Te namari-
dogoana e da puati mu mau waina
e da pataka ni naatamoli mau : ma
Supe e pei lomau, waina ega wo da
suasua ki mu mau naga kuga vei
tea maridogoana parua liu tea
waina ku mariatae; ma ega wo
mari napua ni nameluana ega vilake
namaridogoana, naga kuga mariatae
soki a.
14 Xalakena tea wanogoe, tea dodo-
miana aginau maga, kuga sava dua
15 ki nalotu-ki-nasupe-ana. A pasa ki
mu dapala ku pei tea manumatua
maga; nimu kuga midoakipotae
16 tea waina a noa e. Lasa munu ni
navasapiakiana waina tu pasa-
pia ki nia, e da pei nasaisaipeani-
ana sikai ni nada ni Kristo kite ?
Bred waina tu dovaporae a, e da pei
nasaisaipeaniana sikai ni napatoko
17 ni Kristo kite ? Nalakena nigida,
waina tu lapa, tu pei bred sikai
maau, napatoko sikai maau : na
lakena tu mamau puti dapepotae
18 bred sikai maau. Kuga vunusi
Israel pae napokasi: tea maga
waina ■eu gani naviriana nSaga
eu da pei tea saisaipeani ma wede
19 ni naviriana kite ? Nalakena tea
wanogoe a noa nasava ? naga tea
waina e pei tea mariana e pei
naviriana paki nasupe maga e pei
te navatuna, kite naga nasupe
20 sikai e pei te navatuna kite ? Ma
a noa naga naleo maga waina tea
ni nalauna maga eu mari ra eu pei
naviriana, eu man ra eu pei naviri-
ana paki dimon maga, go eu da mari
ra paki Supe mau : go a da masau-
na mau naga nimu kuga vei tea
21 saisaipeani ma dimon maga. Ku
mari samunu lasa munu kiNawota,
go lasa munu ki dimon maga: ku
mari sa dapepotae pae wede ki
Nawota, go wede ki dimon maga.
22 Kite tu mari Nawota e dotowo
kasua ? tu kasua liu sa kite ?
23 Naleo maga mamau puti eu pae
nawotaeana; ma naleo maga ma-
mau puti eu da marimataki mau.
Naleo maga mamau puti eu pae
nawotaeana ; ma naleo maga ma-
mau puti eu da davagi mau. Te 24
naata ega ta laga tea aneana mau,
ma sara naata euga sikasikai laga
nawiaana ki tea pota. Sara naleo 25
waina eu pei tea soriana malo ni
navakokotoana ni napokasi, kuga
kani ra, po da pusuusupotae mau
nalakena natumamu-atae-ana ; na 26
lakena maramana e pei tea ki
Yebovab, go navakavuroana ka-
kana. Te naata sikai ni tea maga 27
waina eu da saralomau mau e pe
vitautau mu, go ku pe suasua naga
kuga vano; kuga kani sara naleo
waina eu pei tea toropusiana narae-
mu, doko da pusuusupotae mau
nalakena natumamu-atae-ana. Ma 28
te naata e pe noa ki mu, e pe naga,
Tea waia e pei tea mariana e pei
naviriana, kuga ta gani a mau, '
nalakena nae waina e noakisai ko
asa, go nalakena natumana-atae-
ana : a naga, Natumana-atae-ana, 29
a da noa tea anigo mau, ma tea ni
tea pota; nalakena ekasana nave-
resi-au-ana e pei tea midoakipo-
taeana pae natumana-atae-ana pota
sikai ? Kinau ape tapepotae, ki 30
nasaupiaana, ekasana a pe vei tea
vasasakiana nalakena tea waina
kinau a pasadodomataki asa ? Nala- 31
kena tea wanogoe ku pe kanikani,
kite ku pe munu, kite ku pe mari te
navatuna, kuga mari naleo maga
mamau puti paki nasamasamaana
ki Supe. Kuga ta pei nalakena 32
ni natapilagonaana mau, paki tea
ni Yudea maga, kite paki tea ni
Hellas maga, kite paki ekkalesia ki
Supe ; ega tapala waina kinau ma 33
nalo ni naleo maga mamau puti a
do mari dapala waina naatamoli
maga mamau puti eu midoa ki fnata
ki nia, doko da laga namarimata-
ki-nau-ana mau, ma a do laga


namarimatakiana ni tea lapa, naga
euga vei tea raautipauriana.
Matele 11.
1 Kuga vei tea mari oli au, ega
tapala waina kinau ma a mari oli
Kristo.
2 Ma a pasasamasamani mu nala-
kena ku midoa ki nau nalo ni naleo
maga mamau puti, po dapesoki
navasaana vituakiana maga, dapala
3 waina a pitua ki da paki mu. Ma
a masauna naga kuga atae naga
Kristo e per napau ni sara naata
moli; go naga naanoai e pei napau
ni nagoroi; go naga Supe e pei
4 napau ni Kristo. Sara naanoai
waini eu suni kalupau, ragi waina
eu dapasavasa kite ragi waina eu
5 peanoasai, eu dododao napauda. Ma
sara nagoroi waina napauda eu da
pei tea kovagoroana mau ragi
waina eu dapasavasa kite ragi
waina eu pea noasai eu dododao
napauda; nalakena e pei tea sikai
6goe pe vei tea karoana. Nalakena
nagoroi sikai e pe ta pei tea kova-
goroana mau, go ega vei tea
alatiana : ma e pe vei tea maliere-
kiana ki nagoroi sikai naga ega vei
tea alatiana kite tea karoana, ega
7 vei tea kovagoroana. Nalakena e
one naanoai sikai one lomau naga
napauna ega ta pei tea kovagoroana
mau, nalakena e pei nunu go
nasamasamaana ni Supe, ma nagoroi
e pei nasamasamaana ni naanoai.
8 Nalakena naanoai e da melu nagoroi
mau ; ma nagoroi e melu naanoai.
9 Go nalakena naanoai e da pei tea
tawanakiana nalakena nagoroi mau ;
ma nagoroi e pei tea tawanakiana
10 nalakena nanoai. Nalakena tea
wanogoe e one nagoroi one naga
ega veani naveinawotaana doko
11 napauna, nalakena agelo maga. Ma
nagoroi e da doko masale ki naanoai
mau, go naanoai e da doko masale
ki nagoroi mau, doko Nawota.
Nalakena dakiusi waina nagoroi 12
e melu naanoai, dapala nogoe
naanoai ma e pae nagoroi; ma
naleo maga mamau puti eu melu
Supe. Kuga midoakipotae napa- 13
laumu: e pataka ni nagoroi sikai
naga ega ta pei tea kovagoro-
ana mau dapasavasa ki Supe
kite ? Navakilinaana nae e da 14
pasapisei ki mu, naga, naanoai sikai
e pe vilake naloluna varau, e pe
maneana pei namaliereana kite ?
Ma nagoroi sikai e pe vilake naloluna 15
varau, e pe maneana pei nasama-
samaana : nalakena naloluna e pei
tea vituakiana paki nia naga ega
vei tea kovagoro sikai. Ma te 16
naata e pe alagoro pei tea masau
navululuana, kinami au da dape
natomariana tapala nogoe mau, go
ekkalesia maga ki Supe eu da dape
a mau.
Ma ragi waina a dipa ki mu tea 17
wanogoe, a da pasasamasamani mu
mau, nalakena ragi waina ku saisai
ku da pia asa mau, ma ku sa asa>
Nalakena tea vea mau, ragi waina 18
ku saisai doko ekkalesia, a dogo
naga natapotaeana maga eu doko
maleoputo kakamu; go a sara-
lomau magovai asa. Nalakena el 9
one asa one naga tagona pota maga
euga toko maleoputo kakamu, naga
tea maridogopiragiana maga euga
vei tea mariana euga toko lina
maleoputa kakamu. Nalakena tea 20
wanogoe ragi waina 1 ku saisai paki
tokora sikai, e da pei naga kuga
kani nakaniana ki Nawota mau:
nalakena ragi waina ku ganikani 21
sara naatamoli eu sikasikai dape
nakaniana adeada pea ki tea pota,
go tea sikai e pitolo, go tea pota
sikai e matamaloku. Nasava ? ku 22
da peani nasuma maga waina kuga
kanikani po munu ara 1 kite ku
midoakipalo ki ekkalesia ki Supe,
po mari tea maga waina eu da


peani mau eu maliere ? Aga noa
ki mu nasava ? Aga vasasama-
samani mu tea wanogoe kite ?
A da pasasamasamani mu mau.
23 Nalakena kinau a dape ki Nawota
tea waina a moro pitua ki nia paki
mu, naga Nawota Yesu, nopogiana
> ina e pei tea vitua kiana asa, e
24 dape bred ; go ragi waina e pasa-
dodomataki sua, e dovaporae a, po
naga, Tea waia e pei napatokogu,
waina e manimu pei tea mariporae-
ana: kuga mari tea waia naga
25 kuga midoa ki nau asa. Dapala
nogoe lasa munu, edaku ki nakani-
ana, po naga, Lasa munu waia e
pei navasasokiana vau ni nadagu :
kuga mari tea waia, ragi maga
waina ku pe munugi a, naga kuga
26 midoa ki nau asa. Nalakena ragi
maga waina ku pe kani bred waia,
po munu lasa munu, ku do dogo-
rogo ki namateana ki Nawota asa
27 pa pa ega wo umai. Nalakena
tea wanogoe naata waina e pe kani
sa ki bred wanogoe kite munu sa
ki lasa munu ki Nawota, sogi ni
napatoko ni Nawota go ni nadana
28 e pe wo liko asa. Ma naatamoli
ega tumana midoakiusiusi a, go
dapala nogoe ega kani bred wano-
goe, po munu lasa munu wanogoe.
29 Nalakena tea waina e ganikani po
munu, e pe ta midoakipotae napa-
toko ni Nawota mau, e pe kani po
munu navasapotaeana dumana paki
30 nia. Nalakena tea wanogoe tea lapa
maleoputo kakamu eu manainai go
31 eu sasana, go tea lapa eu maturu. Ma
tu pe tumagida midoakipotae gida,
tu pe ta pei tea vasapotaeana mau.
32 Ma ragi waina tu pei tea vasapo-
taeana, tu pei tea varatiana pae
Nawota, naga tuga ta pei tea
tipakotoviana sikoti maramana
33 mau. Nalakena tea wanogoe, taigu
maga, ragi waina ku saisai naga
kuga kanikani, kuga tumamu leo-
34 goro mu. Go te naata e pe vitolo,
ega kanikani sufna ni kiana ; naga
kuga ta saisai paki navasapotaeana
mau. Ma naleo pota maga ragi
waina aga valoti aga wo pasa-
dawana Id da.
Matele 12.
Ma nalo ni navituamolikiana 1
maga ni naatana, tai maga, a da
masauna naga nimu kuga vei sapo
mau. Ku atae naga ragi waina ku 2
pei tea ni nalauna maligo maga ku
pei tea viragiluaana paki nasupe
maga waina eu pei pusa, dapala
waina ku pe vei tea viragiana.
Nalakena tea wanogoe a mari mu 3
kuga atae, naga te naata sikai
waina e pasa pae Naata ni Supe e
da naga, Yesu e pei anathema ; go
te naata sikai e pe ta pasa pae
Naatana Tapu mau, e pe ta mariatae
naga, Yesu e pei Yehovab.
Ma navituamolikiana visarasara 4
maga eu doko, ma Naatana sikai
maau. Go nasuasuaana visarasara 5
maga eu doko, go Nawota sikai
maau. Go nawosiana visarasara 6
maga eu doko, ma Supe sikai maau,
waina e do posiwosi ki naleo maga
mamau puti doko tea maga mamau
puti. Ma namaridokolinaana ki 7
Naatana e pei tea vituakiana paki
sara naata sikasikai, naga euga
marimataki asa. Nalakena nava- 8
saana ni namanumatuaana e pei tea
vituakiana paki tea sikai pae
Naatana ; go navasaana ni naatae-
ana paki tea pota sikai pae
Naatana sikai maau: nasaralo- 9
mauana paki tea pota sikai pae
Naatana sikai maau; go navi-
tuamolikiana maga ni namaripauri-
ana maga paki tea pota sikai pae
Naatana sikai maau wanogoe; go 10
nawosiana maga ni nakasuaana
maga paki tea pota sikai; go
naveanoasaiana paki tea pota sikai;
go namidoakipotaeana ni naatana


maga paid tea pota sikai; namena
pota maga paki tea pota sikai; go
navasadoaana ni namena maga
11 paki tea pota sikai. Ma tea 'maga
mamau putiwanogoe Naatana sikai
maau wanogoe e do posiwosi ki da,
po do magi sara naata sikasikai da-
potawotae dapala waina e masauna.
12 Nalakena dakiusi waina napatoko
e sikai maau, po pilake naleo lapa,
go naleo maga mamau puti ni
napatoko, waina eu lapa, eu pei
napatoko sikai maau; Kristo ma
13 e dapala nogoe. Nalakena nigida
maga mamau puti tu pei tea
bapetizoana doko Naatana sikai
maau paki napatoko sikai maau, tu
pe vei tea ni Yudea maga kite tea
ni Hellas maga, tu pe vei naviti
maga kite tea veresiana maga
dumagida doko; go tu mamau
puti pei tea mariana tu ' munu
11 Naatana sikai maau. Nalakena
napatoko e da pei naleo sikai maau
15 mau, ma e pei naleo lapa. Natuana
e pe naga, Nalakena a da pei narne-
learunamau, a dapei tea ni napatoko
mau; eda pei tea ni napatoko
mau nalakena tea wanogoe kite ?
16 Go nadaligana e pe naga, Nalakena a
da pei namatana mau, a da pei tea ni
napatoko mau; eda pei tea ni
napatoko mau nalakena tea wa-
-17 nogoe kite ? Napatoko mamau e
pe vei namata sikai, narogoana e pe
toko esava ? Tea mamau epe vei
narogoana, nasidogoana e pe toko
18 eseva ? Ma ragi waia Supe e lawo
ki naleo maga eu sikasikai puti
doko napatoko, dapala waina e
19 masauna. Go eu pe mamau puti
pei naleo sikai maau, napatoko e
20 pe toko esava ? Ma ragi waia eu
pei naleo lapa, ma napatoko sikai
21 maau. Go namatana e mari sa noa
ki nainelearuna, Aga kasa ki-go ? Go
napauna e mari sa noa ki natuana
22 maga, Aga kasa ki mu ? Ma e pano
pota ki nia, naleo maga ni napatoko
waina eu alagoro manainai parua
eu pei tea lomau ni napatoko:
go tokora maga ni napatoko, waina 23
tu midoa ki nia naga eu da pei tea
dodomadaganiana mau, tu doro-
pusi nadodomadaganiana warua liu
e doko tokora maga wanogoe ; go
tokora maga kakagida waina eu da
pei tea leomatakiana mau eu peani
naleomatakiana warua liu; ma 24
tokora leomatakiana kakagida maga
eu da peani natikaana mau: ma
Supe e marisarisari napatoko, po
pitua ki nadodomadaganiana warua
liu paki tokora waina e dika ; naga 25
te natapotaeana sikai ega ta doko
napatoko mau ; ma naga naleo
maga euga veani namidoakiparati-
kiana sikai maau dumada paki da.
Go naleo sikai e pe rogokitesa, 26
naleo maga mamau puti eu pe
rogokitesa sikoti a ; kite naleo
sikai e pe vei tea dodomadagani-
ana, naleo maga mamau puti eu
pe laeleaa sikoti a. Ma nimu ku 27
pei napotoko ni Kristo, go ku
sikasikai pei naleo maga kakana.
Go Supe e lawo kite seara doko 28
ekkalesia, tea vea apostolo maga,
kerua profeta maga, ketolu tea
vasapiseiki maga, edaku ki tea
wanogoe nawosiana kasua maga,
edaku ki tea wanogoe navitua-
molikiana maga ni namaripauriana
maga, tea silae maga, tea maraki
maga, namena visarasara maga.
Eu mamau puti *pei apostolo 29
maga kite ? eu mamau puti pei
profeta maga kite ? eu mamau
puti pei tea vasapiseiki maga
kite ? eu mamau puti pei tea
mari nawosiana kasua maga kite ?
eu mamau puti peani navitua- 30
molikiana maga ni namaripauriana
maga kite 1 eu mamau puti
pasa ki namena maga kite ? eu
mamau puti pasadoa kite ? Ma 31
kuga masau parua ki navitua-
fnolikiana warua liu maga. Go


napua sikai waina e pia parua liu
aga ko pisei ki mu asa.
Matele 13.
1 Ape vasa ki namena maga ni
naatamoli maga go ni agelo maga,
go a pe tika nadodomiana, a pe
vei brass sikai waina e saruru, kite
simbal sikai waina e daparapara.
2 Go a pe veani navituamolikiana ni
naveanoasaiana, po atae paia maga
rpamau puti go naataeana mamau ;
go a pe veani nasaralomauana
mamau, dapala waina a pe risua ki
tava maga, ma a pe tika nadodo-
miana, a pe ta pei te navatuna mau.
3Go a pe vitua ki naleo maga
mamau puti waina a peani ra naga
aga vagani tea tika maga ara, go a
pe vitua ki napatokogu naga ega
vei tea taparakiana, ma a pe tika
nadodomiana, a pe ta pei tea
silaeana te navatuna asa mau.
4 Nadodomiana e pei maritasoki
parau, go e pakale ; nadodomiana
eda doitoi mau; nadodomiana e
da dumana pakavakae a mau, e da
5 pei tea popo vuka mau, e da mari
dapala e pei tea leosakiana mau, e
da laga tea aneana mau, e da pei
tea mariana e maeto mau, e da
6 midoa ki dipa tea sa mau; eda
laelaea nalakena namarinaleotage-
leana mau, ma e do laelaea sikoti
7 nalomauana ; e do dapaugoro naleo
maga mamau* puti, e do saralomau
naleo maga mamau puti, e do leo-
goro naleo maga mamau puti, e
do soki naleo maea mamau puti.
8 Nadodomiana e da do wo te ragi
mau : ma naveanoasaiana maga eu
pe toko, eu pe wo pei tea mari-
puolikiana; namena maga eu pe
toko, eu pe wo makoto ; naataeana
e pe toko, e pe wo pei tea mari-
-9 puolikiana. Nalakena tu atae ma-
govai, go tu pea noasai magovai:
10 ma ragi waina tea waina e matua
ega wo umai, tea waina e pei
namagovai ega wo pei tea mari-
puolikiana. Ragi waina a pei pia- 11
kiki, a pasa dapala piakiki, a
midodoa dapala piakiki, a midoa-
kipotae dapala piakiki: ragi waina
a po pei tea matua, a po maripuoli
ki naleo maga ki piakiki. Nalakena 12
ragi waia tu punusi pae titiro sikai,
maligoligo ; ma ragi wanogoe narae
ega wo paki narae : ragi waia a
atae magovai; ma ragi wanogoe aga
wo atae mataki ega tapala waina a
pei tea ataemataki-sua-ana. Maragi 13
waia nasaralomauana e doko, go
naleogoroana, go nadodomiana, nara
eu dolu ; ma tea warua liu ni tea
maga wanogoe e pei nadodomiana.
Matele 14.
Kuga savadausi nadodomiana ; 1
ma kuga masau parua ki navitua-
molikiana maga ni naatana, ma
parua liu naga kuga veanoasai.
Nalakena tea waina e pasa ki 2
namena sikai e da pasa ki naata
moli maga mau, ma e pasa ki
Supe; nalakena te naata sikai e ■
da dogoatae mau; ma e, pasa
paia maga ki naatana. Ma tea 3
waina e peanoasai e pasa ki na
atamoli maga natavagiana, go na
vasaparatikiana, go navasapaka-
vakaleana. Tea waina e pasa ki 4
namena sikai e dumana davagi a;
ma tea waina e peanoasai e davagi
ekkalesia. Ma a masauna naga 5
kuga mamau puti pasa ki namena
maga, ma a masau parua ki nia
naga kuga veanoasai: go tea waina
e peanoasai e parua liu tea waina e
pasa ki namena maga, e pe ta
pasadoa mau, naga ekkalesia ega
tape natavagiana. Ma ragi waia, 6
tai maga, a pe valoti punusi mil po
pasa ki namena maga, ma a pe •
ta pasa ki mu pae nanoapakasa-
kiana, kite pae naataeana, kite


pae naveanoasaiana, kite pae
navasapiseikiana mau, a pe silae
7mu nasava asa ? Go ualeo maga
waina eu da mauri mau, waiua eu
pitua ki nadaleo, e pe vei lokore
kite harp, eu pe ta pitua ki nama-
wota ni nasaruruaua maga mau,
tea waina e pei tea noaana lokore
kite harp ega wo pei tea ataeana
8 dapale sava ? Nalakena paiga e
pe vitua ki nadaleo waina e da
noapotae mau, sei ega wo dumana
marimata ki nia raki navakalo ?
9 Dapala nogoe nimu ma, ku pe ta
pitua pae namenamu ki navasaana
rogoataematakiana mau, tea waina
e pei tea noaana ega wo pei tea
ataeana dapale sava ? Nalakena ku
pe wo pei tea vasa paki namalopa.
10 Nadaleo lapa visarasara eu alagoro
doko maramana, go te navatuna
11 e da pei tea daleo tika mau. Na
lakena tea wanogoe a pe ta atae
namidoakipotaeana ni nadaleo mau,
a pe vei tea ni navanua pota sikai
paki tea waina e do pasa, go tea
waina e do pasa e pe vei tea ni
navanua pota sikai nalo kakagu.
12 Dapala nogoe nimu ma, nalakena
ku pei tea masau parua ki navitua-
molikiana maga ni naatana, kuga
laga naga kuga mari parua ki
nia paki natavagiana ni ekkalesia.
13 Nalakena tea wanogoe naata waina
e pasa ki namena sikai ega tapasa-
-14 vasa naga ega vasadoa. Nalakena
a pe tapasavasa ki namena sikai,
naatagu e pe tapasavasa, ma na
midoakiataeana aginau e pe vei
15 tea oro. Nalakena tea wanogoe e
pei nasava? Aga wo dapasavasa
ki naatagu, go aga wo dapasavasa
ki namidoakiataeana aginau : aga
wo lega ki naatagu, go aga wo
lega ki namidoakiataeana aginau.
16 Nalakena ku pe vasapia ki na
atafha, tea ni nasaisaiana waina e
pei natamoli moli ega noa Amen
sokari navasadodomatakiana anigo
dapale sava, ragi waina e da atae
tea waina ku noa e mau ? Na 17
lakena nigo ku pasadodoihataki
pia lomau, ma tea pota e da pei tea
tavagiana asa mau. A pasadodo- 18
mata ki Supe, nalakena a pasa ki
namena maga parua liu puti mu:
ma a masauna naga aga vasa 19
navasaana lima ki mamidoakia-
taeana aginau doko nasaisaiana,
naga aga vasapisei ki tea pota
maga, parua liu naga aga vasa na
vasaana tivilia sikai pae namena
sikai.
Tai maga, kuga ta pei piakiki 20
maga ki namidodoana mau, ma
kuga vei pipia maga nalo ni navi-
losiana, ma kuga vei tea matua
maga ki namidodoana. E pei tea 21
midiriana doko nawotaeana, naga
Aga wo pasa ki narei waia pae naata
moli maga ni namena pota maga
go pae nagole maga ni naatamoli
pota maga; go euga wo da dogo
parati ki nau dapala nogoe mau,
Yehovah e noa e. Nalakena tea 22
wanogoe namena maga eu pei navai-
vaiana sikai, eu da magi tea sara-
lomau maga pei navaivaiana mau,
ma eu magi tea ta saralomau maga
pei navaivaiana: ma naveanoa-
saiana e da magi tea ta saralomau
maga pei navaivaiana mau, ma e
magi tea saralomau maga pei
navaivaiana. Nalakena tea wano- 23
goe ekkalesia mamau eu pe vei tea
saisaikiana paki tokora sikai, go tea
maga mamau puti eu pe vasa ki
namena maga, go naatamoli moli
maga kite tea waina eu da saralomau
mau eu pe umai paki ekopu, eu pe
wo da noa naga ku daratara kite ?
Ma tea maga mamau puti eu pe 24
veanoasai, go tea sikai waina e da
saralomau mau kite naatamoli moli
sikai e pe umai paki ekopu, e pe
vei tea vasapaiana pae tea maga
mamau puti, e pe vei tea vasa-
potaeana pae tea maga mamau


25 puti; tea surukiana maga ni
napopona eu pe vei tea mariana
eu pe toko lina ; go dapala nogoe
c pe wo dowo dapolo siwo po lotu
Id Supe, po dogodogo naga Supe e
doko maleoputo kakamu lomau.
26 Nalakena tea waongoe e pei
nasava, tai maga ? Ragi waina
ku saisai, sara naata eu sikasikai
peani salamo sikai, eu peani navasa-
piseikiana sikai, eu peani nanoa-
pakasakiana sikai, eu peani namena
sikai, eu peani navasadoaana sikai.
Naleo maga mamau puti euga vei
27 tea mariana paki natavagiana. Te
naata e pe vasa ki namena sikai,
tea ruarua eroga vasa, kite euga ta
liu dolutolu mau, go euga dumada
dua olioli ra; go sikai ega vasa
28 doa; ma tea vasadoa epe tika,
ega vunuta doko nasaisaiana; go
ega tumana pasa ki nia, go paki
29 Supe. Go profeta maga edua kite
edolu euga vasa, go tea pota maga
30 euga midoakipotae. Ma te na-
vatuna e pe vei tea noapakasa-
kiana paki tea pota sikai waina
31 e doko, tea vea ega vunuta. Na
lakena ku mamau puti mariatae
sikasikai peanoasai, naga tea maga
mamau puti euga ataedogo, go naga
tea maga mamau puti euga vei tea
32 vasapakavakaleana ; go naatana
maga ni profeta maga eu doko etano
33 paki profeta maga ; malakena Supe
e da pei Supe ni navariana mau, ma
e pei Supe ni natainateana ; dapala
waina e doko ekkalesia maga mamau
puti ni tea tautau maga.
34 Nagoroi maga euga vunuta doko
nasaisaiana maga: nalakena eda pei
tea suasuakiana paki da mau naga
euga vasa ; ma euga toko etano,
ega tapala waina nawotaeana ma
35 e noa e. Go eu pe masauna naga
euga ataedogo te navatuna, euga
vusuusu paki adawota maga, suma
ni kiada: nalakena e pei tea
malierekiana ki nagoroi sikai naga
ega vasa nasaisaiana. Kite na
sava ? navasaana Id Supe e 'melu
mu pano ? kite e umai paki mu
sikimu ?
Te naata e pe duiiiana midoa ki
nia naga e pei profeta sikai, kite
teaniNaatana, ega ataemata ki tea
maga waina a midiri paki mu ara,
naga eu pei natipakiana maga ki
Nawota. Ma te naata e pe vei
sapo ega vei sapo.
Nalakena tea wanogoe, taigu
maga, kuga masau parua ki naga
kuga veanoasai, go kuga ta dipagora
mau naga euga ta pasa ki namena
maga. Ma naleo maga namau puti
euga vei tea mariana pae naleo-
matakiana go pae namarimatana-
kiana.
Matele 15.
Ma a mari mu kuga atae, tai
maga, narogorogoana wia waina
a dogorogo ki sua e paki mu, go
waina ku dape a, go waina ku
lawodu asa, go waina ku do pei tea
mautipauriana pae asa, ku pe
midoakisoki navasaana waina a
dogorogo ki narogorogoana wia
paki mu asa, go ku pe ta saralomau
palo mau.. Nalakena a pea pitua
paki mu ki tea waina ku dape a,
naga Kristo e mate nalakena na
marinaleosaana anigida maga pae
navasaana midiriana maga; go
naga e pei tea ovakiana ; go naga
e pei tea sikeana duleana naaleatia
ketolu pae navasaana midiriana
maga ; go naga e pakilina ki Kefa ;
edaku ki nia ki tea rualima sikai
tamate dua; edaku ki nia e paki
lina ki taigida lapa liu ponotia
lima paka sikai, waina tea lapa
kakada eu doko pa pa paki ragi
waia, ma te seara eu po maturu ;
edaku ki nia e pakilina ki Yakob ;
edaku ki nia ki apostolo maga
mamau puti; ma sala edaku mau e


pakilina ki nau, waina a dapala tea
9 solapesiana sikai. Nalakena kinau
a pel tea kiki sa ni apostolo maga,
waina a da pia man naga aga vei
tea sosoana ki apostolo sikai, nala-
kena a kopalele ekkalesia ki Supe.
10 Ma ki nasaupiaana ki Supe a doko
dapala waina a doko : go nasaupia-
ana aneana waina e pei tea vitua-
kiana paki nau e da pei tea palo
mau ; ma a posiwosi-mawosa parua
liu puti ra: ma eda pei kinau mau,
ma epeinasaupiaana ki Supe waina e
11 sikoti au. Nalakena tea wanogoe
e pe vei kinau kite e pe vei nara, au
do dogorogo dapala nogoe, go ku
saralomau dapala nogoe.
12 Ma Kristo epe vei tea rogorogo-
kiana naga e pei tea sikeana duleana
inelu dua ki tea mate maga, ekasana
te seara ni maleoputo kakamu eu noa
naga namoroduleanaana ki tea
13 mate maga e da doko mau ? Ma
namoroduleanaana ki tea mate
maga e pe ta doko mau, Kristo e
pe ta pei tea sikeana duleana mau :
14 go Kristo e pe ta pei tea sikeana
duleana mau, narogorogoana agi-
nami e pe vei tea palo, go nasara-
lomauana animu e pe vei tea palo.
16 loro, go au pe vei tea vapaiana pei
tea noasokisoki sorosoro maga nalo
ni Supe ; nalakena au noasokisoki
nalo ni Supe nap. e sike Kristo e
duleana: waina e da sike a e
duleana mau, tea mate maga eu
pe ta pei tea sikeana duleana lomau
16 mau. Nalakena tea mate maga eu
pe ta pei tea sikeana duleana mau,
Kristo e pe ta pei tea sikeana dule-
-17 ana mau ; go Kristo e pe ta pei
tea sikeana duleana mau, nasara-
lomauana animu e pe vei tea palo ;
ku pe ko doko namarinaleosaana
18 animu maga. Go tea maga ma
waina eu po maturu doko .Kristo
19 eu pe mate puoli. Tu pe leogoro-
pavatu Kristo ragi ni namauriana
waia sikai maau, tu pe vei tea rogo-
NGUNA-TONGOAN N.T.
kite-sa parua liu naatamoli maga
mamau puti.
Ma ragi waia Kristo e pei tea 20
sikeana duleana meludua ki tea
mate maga, e pei taka vea ni tea
maturu maga. Nalakena dapala 21
waina namateana e pae naatamoli
umai, namoroduleanaana ki tea
mate maga e pae naatamoli umai.
Nalakena dakiusi waina tea maga 22
mamau puti eu mate doko Adam,
dapala nogoe tea maga mamau puti
euga wo pei tea vakamaurikiana
doko Kristo. Ma sara naatamoli 23
euga wo sikasikai doko tagona
adeada : taka vea Kristo ; edaku
ki nia tea maga waina eu pei tea
ki Kristo, ragi ni naumaiana aneana.
Edaku ki nia tea edaku mau, ragi 24
waina ega wo pitua ki namara-
kiana paki Supe, Tamana; ragi
waina ega wo maripuoli ki sua sara
namarakiana go sara naveina-
wotaana go sara nakasuaana. Nala- 25
kena e one asa one naga ega mara-
mara pa pa ega wo doropusi sua
tea kokona ki nia maga mamau
puti euga toko etano ki namelena
maga. Tea kokona edaku mau waina 26
ega wo pei tea maripuolikiana e pei
namateana. Nalakena, E doro- 27
pusi naleo maga mamau puti eu
doko etano ki namelena maga. Ma
ragi waina e naga, Naleo maga
mamau puti eu pei tea toropusiana
eu doko etano, e dokolina naga nae
e doko waina e doropusi naleo maga
mamau puti eu doko etano paki
nia. Ma ragi waina naleo maga 28
mamau puti euga wo doko etano
sua paki nia, ragi wanogoe nae ma,
Natuna, ega wo doko etano paki
tea waina e doropusi naleo maga
mamau puti eu doko etano paki
nia, naga Supe ega vei naleo maga
mamau puti doko tea maga mamau
puti.
Nalakena e pe ta dapala nogoe 29
mau, tea maga waina- eu do pei tea


bapetizoana oli tea mate maga euga
wo mari nasava ? Tea mate maga
eu pe ta pei tea sikeana duleana
dika sa man, ekasana te seara eu
30 do pei tea bapetizoana oli ra ? Go
ekasana kinami au sua namata-
31 kuana sara aura ? A pivisa pae
navakavakaeana aginau nalo ka-
kamu, tai maga, waina a peani a
doko Kristo Yesu Nawota anigida,
32 naga a mate sara naaleatia. Ape
marimari dipa nalo mila maga
Efeso pae naatainoli, a pe veani
nasava asa ? Tea mate maga eu
pe ta pei tea sikeana duleana mau,
tuga kanikani po munu, nalakena
33 matamai tuga wo mate asa. Kuga
ta pei tea vilasurueana mau:
Nasikotiana sa maga eu mari sa
34 Id natomariana wia maga. Kuga
atusake ega vae namarinaleoleana-
ana, go kuga ta mari naleo sa mau;
nalakena te seara eu da peani
naatae-Supe-ana mau. A pasa tea
wanogoe naga kuga maliere.
35 Ma te naata ega wo naga, Tea
mate maga eu pei tea sikeana dule-
ana dapale sava ? go euga wo
pilake napatoko tapale sava umai ?
36 Tea manumatavusa, tea waina nigo
ku sapura ki nia e pe ta mate mau,
e pe ta pei tea vakamaurikiana
37 mau : go tea waina ku sapura ki
nia, ku da sapura ki napatoko
waina ega wo pakilina mau, ma
napati fnalu sikai, mase e pei tea
ni whit, kite tea ni tea pota maga
38 sikai; ma Supe e dua e napatoko
sikai dapala waina e masauna, go
e dua sara napati sikasikai puti
39 adeada napatokoda. Sara napo-
kasi eu da pei napokasi sikai maau
mau: ma tea sikai ni naatmoli
maga e doko, go napokasi pota
sikai ni nalo-tua-vati maga e doko,
go napokasi pota sikai ni manu
maga e doko, go tea pota sikai ni
40 naika maga e doko. Go napatoko
rnaga ni nakoroatelagi eu doko, go
napatoko maga ni maramana eu
doko ; ma natawarawaraana ni tea
ni nakoroatelagi maga e pei tea
sikai, go natawarawaraana ni tea
ni maramana maga e pei tea pota
sikai. Natawarawaraana sikai ni 41
elo e doko, go natawarawaraana
pota sikai ni atelagi e doko, go
natawarawaraana pota sikai ni
fnasoe maga e doko: nalakena
masoe sikai e pano pota ki fnasoe
pota sikai nalo ni natawarawaraana.
Go namoroduleanaana ni tea mate 42
maga e dapala nogoe. E pei tea
lawoana doko namesoana; e pei
tea sikeana duleana doko nameso-
sapoana : e pei tea lawoana doko 43
nadododaoana; e pei tea sikeana
duleana doko nasamasamaana : e
pei tea lawoana doko namanainai-
ana ; e pei tea sikeana duleana doko
nakasuaana: e pei tea lawoana e 44
pei napatoko ni namero ; e pei tea
sikeana duleana e pei napatoko
ni naatana. Napatoko ni namero
e pe toko, tea ni naatana ma e pe
toko. Dapala nogoe e pei tea midi- 45
riana, Naatainoli vea, Adam, e pei
tea mariana e pei naatana mauri.
Adam edaku epei tea mariana e pei
naatana vakamauri. Ma tea waina 46
e pei tea ni naatana e da pea mau,
ma tea waina e pei tea ni namero e
pea ; edaku ki ni*. tea waina e pei
tea ni naatana. Naatainoli vea e 47
fneiu maramana, e pei tea ni natano :
naatainoli kerua e melu nakoroate-
lagi. Dapala waina tea waina e4B
pei tea ni natano e doko, dapala
nogoe tea maga ma waina eu pei
tea ni natano eu doko : go dapala
waina tea ni nakoroatelagi e doko,
dapala nogoe tea maga ma waina
eu pei tea ni nakoroatelagi eu doko :
go dapala waina t« pilake nunu 49
ni tea ni natano, tuga wo pilake
nunu ni tea ni nakoroatelagi.
Ma a noa tea waia, tai maga, 50
naga napokasi go nada ero marisapo


peani namarakiana ki Supe, go
namesoana e da peani nameso-

wo mamau puti pei tea mariana tuga

pei tea sikeana duleana po pei tea

kena e one tea mesoatae waia one

ana, go e one tea mate atae waia
one naga ega suni navei-tea-mate-

atae waia ega wo suni navei-tea-
meso-sapoana, go tea mate atae

pei tea tinomiana paki namari-

kena tea wanogoe, taigu dodo-

mau, kuga to mari parua ki nawo-
siana ki Nawota sara ragi, ku atae

da pei tea palo mau doko Nawota.
Matele 16.
1 Ma nalo ni navilaesaisaikiana
magi tea tautau maga, dapala
waina a dipa ki ekkalesia maga ni
Calatia asa, nimu ma kuga mari ega
2 tapala nogoe. Naaleatia vea ni
wiik sara naata kakamu euga sika-
sikai doropusi daua ki ega toko
pisari ra, tea waina e pe talua e,
naga ragi waina aga valoti navilae-
saisaikiana seara euga ta pei tea
mariana ragi wanogoe mau. Go 3
ragi waina aga valoti doko sikoti
mu, tea maga waina ku pe wo
midoakipotae ra naga eu pia, aga
wo dipakilua tea maga wanogoe pae
tusi maga naga euga tape nasau-
piaana animu paki Yerusalem pano :
go e pe vataka ni waina kinau ma 4
aga vano, eu pe wo sikoti au pano.
Ma aga wo paloti punusi mu, ragi 5
waina aga wo surata duaduru sua
Masedonia; nalakena a naga aga
surata duaduru Masedonia ; ma 6
mase a pe wo doko sikoti mu, kite
a pe wo doko sikoti mu ragi ni
namaladiana, naga nimu kugu vusi-
vusi au naga aga vaki tokora waina
ape wo paki asa pano. Nalakena 7
a da masauna naga aga vunusi mu
pae napua ragi waia mau ; nalakena
a leogoro naga aga toko sikoti mu
doko te ragi, Nawota e pe suasua.
Ma aga toko Efeso doko pa pa 8
Pentekoste; nalakena namatawarua 9
sikai go , marimatua e maginau
dapolaga doko, go tea tugoro maga
eu lapa.
Ma Timotheo e pe valoti, kuga 10
vunusi naga ega ta mataku doko
sikoti mu mau; nalakena e do
posiwosi nawosiana ki Nawota da-
pala waina kinau ma a maria:
nalakena tea wanogoe te naata ega 1,1
ta midoa ki palo ki nia mau.
Ma kuga vusivusi a doko nata-
fnateana pano, naga ega umai
punusi au : nalakena a do leogoro
asa ega sikoti taigida maga umai.

pavarani parua ki nia naga ega

mu: go e da pei namasauana
aneana mau naga ega valoti ragi
waia ; ma ega wo paloti ragi waina


ega wo peani ragi waina e pia ki
nia.

dodomi mu. Akula go Priska ero
pasadodomi parua ki mu doko
Nawota, nara ma ekkalesia ni

natufniliana tautau sikai.

ki aginau namelearugu. Te naata 22

wo umai. Nasaupiana ki Nawota 23
Yesu Kristo ega sikoti mu. Nado- 24
domiana aginau ega sikoti puti
mu doko Kristo Yesu. Amen.
BPISTOLE KERUA KI PAULO APOSTOLO
TEA NI KORINTHO MAGA
Matele 1.
-1 Paulo, apostolo sikai ki Kristo
Yesu pae namasauana ki Supe, go
Timotheo taigida, aro midiri paki
ekkalesia ki Supe waina e doko
Korintho, nara go tea tautau maga
mamau puti waina eu doko Akaia
2 mamau: nasaupiaana ega vei
animu go natamateana rnelu Supe
Tamagida go Nawota Yesu Kristo.
3 Supe ega vei tea vasapiakiana
go Tama ni Nawota anigida Yesu
Kristo, Tama ni namaritadodo-
miana maga go Supe ni sara na
vakavakaleana; waina e do paka- 4
vakale garni doko nariesoki-gami-
ana mamau, naga kinami auga
mariatae pasapakavakale tea maga
waina eu doko te nariesoki-
ana, pae navakavakaleana waina
kinami au pei tea vakavakaleana
asa pae Supe. Nalakena dapala 5
waina narogokitesaana maga ki
Kristo eu lapa paki garni, dapala
nogoe navakavakale-gami-ana ma
eu lapa pae Kristo. Ma au pe vei 6
tea riesokiana, e pe magi navaka


vakale-mu-ana go namautipauri-
mu-ana; kite au pe vei tea vaka-
vakaleana, e pe magi navakavakale-
mu-ana, waina e do posiwosi doko
nasokiana ni narogokitesaana maga
sikai maau waina kinami ma au sua
7 ra : go naleogoroana aginami mani-
mu e kasua ; au atae naga dapala
waina ku pei tea saisaipeani narogo-
kitesaana maga, dapala nogoe ku
moro pei tea saisaipeani navaka-
-8 vakaleana maga. Nalakena au da
masauna mau naga nimu kuga vei
sapo, tai maga, nalo ni nariesoki-
gami-ana, waina e pakilina Id garni
Asia, naga au pei tea sokiana paki-
tano parua liu ki tea madaga, liu
nakasuaana aginami, dapala waina
au midoakiputua ki parua ki
9 namauriana : ma kinami au peani
navasadaraana ni namateana doko
napalaugami, naga auga ta durna-
gami pavatu garni mau, ma auga
vavatu Supe waina e sike tea mate
10 maga eu duleana : waina e pualua
garni fnelu dua ki namateana
warua tapala nogoe, go ega wo
pualua garni ; waina au do leogoro-
pavatu asa naga ega wo do
11 pualua garni; nimu ma ku do
maginami saisai silae ki navavara-
niana animu; naga navasadodo-
fnatakiana ega maginami pei tea
vituakiana fnelu naatamoli lapa,
nalakena navituafnolikiana paki
garni pae tea lapa.

nami e pei tea waia, nanoasokisoki-

kasigami mau, ma e doko nasau-
-13 piaana ki Supe. Nalakena au da
midiri naleo pota maga paki mu
mau, ma tea sikai maau waina ku
peve a kite waina ku ataemata ki
nia, go a leogoro naga kuga wo
ataemata ki nia pa pa paki namata-
pago edaku : dapala waina ku atae- 14
