naga au pei tea vakavakaeana
animu, dakiusi waina nimu ma ku
pei tea vakavakaeana aginami, na
aleatia ki Nawota anigida Yesu.
Go a peani navavatuana wanogoe 15
po midoa ki nia naga aga yea paloti
punusi mu, naga kuga veani nasau-
piaana kerua ; go naga aga surata 16
duaduru pae mu paki Masedonia
pano, go naga aga moro pae Mase-
donia paloti punusi mu, go naga aga
vei tea morimoriana pae mu naga
aga vaki Yudea pano. Nalakena 17
tea wanogoe ragi waina a midoa ki
tea wanogoe a mari pae namaga-
daraana’ kite naleo maga waina a
midoa ki da, a midoa ki da pae
napokasi, naga io io go ei ei eroga
sikoti au doko kite ? Ma Supe elB
pei lomau, naga navasaana aginami
paki mu e da pei io go ei mau.
Nalakena Supe Natuna, Yesu Kristo, 19
waina e pei tea rogorogokiana fnaleo-
puto kakamu pae garni, pae au go
Silvano go Timotheo, e da pei io go
ei mau, ma io e doko asa doko.
Nalakena nasaiana maga ki Supe, 20
waina eu lapa, eupei iodoko Kristo :
nalakena tea wanogoe Amen ma e
doko pae asa raki nasamasamaana
agi Supe pae garni. Ma tea waina 21
e do lawosoki garni sikoti mu doko
Kristo, go waina e puvurai ki gida,
e pei Supe; go waina e pulusoki 22
gida, po dua gida nanadisokiana ni
Naatana doko napopogida.
Ma kinau a soso Supe ega vei tea 23
noa sokisoki dipa naatagu, naga
nalakena a do marimalemale mu,
a ko da moro paloti paki Korintho
mau. E da pei naga au peani 24
naveinawotaana dapau nasaralo-
mauana animu mau, ma au pei tea
wosiwosi sikoti mu silae nalaelaea-
ana animu : nalakena ku lawodu
ki nasaralomauana.


Matele 2.
1 Ma a maginau midoakipotae tea
waia, naga aga ta moro paloti
punusi mu pilake nasusueana mau.
2 Nalakena kinau a pe mari mu ku
susue, go tea waina e mari au a
laelaea e pe vei sei, ma tea sikai
maau waina e pei tea mariana e
3 susue pae au ? Go a midiri
tea wanogoe, naga, ragi waina aga
valoti, aga ta peani nasusueana
mau pae tea maga waina e one au
one naga aga laelaea ara; nalakena
a saralomau kasua nalo ni puti mu,
naga nalaelaeaana aginau e pei na
laelaeaana animu mamau puti.
4 Nalakena a midiri paki mu inelu
nariesokiana warua go nSrogoki-
tesaana ni napopogu pae nariri-
mata lapa ; a da midiri naga kuga
vei tea mariana kuga susue mau,
ma naga kuga atae nadodomiana
waina a peani a parua liu paki mu.
5 Ma te naata epe mari nasusue-
ana, e pe ta mari au a susue mau,
ma e pe mari puti mu pae nama-
govai (naga navasaana aginau ega
6ta kasua mau) ku susue. Tea ta-
pala nogoe navaratiana wanogoe
7 pae tea lapa e patakana; dapala
waina pano pota ki nia e one
mu one naga kuga maneana
midoakikorokoro e, po pasapaka-
vakale a, naga tea tapala nogoe ega
ta pei tea tinomiana ki nasusueana
8 warua liu mau. Nalakena tea wa-
nogoe a pavarani mu naga kuga
lawosoki nadodomiana animu paki
9 nia. Nalakena tea waia e moro
pei nalakena a midiri, naga aga
atae namaridogo-mu-ana, ku pe vei
tea rogoparatiki nalo ni sara naleo
10 kite. Ma naata waina ku maneana
midoakikorokoro te navatuna, ki-
nau ma n maneana midoakikorokoro
e : nalakena tea waina kinau ma a
midoakikorokoro e, a pe midoaki-
korokoro te navatuna, a pe midoaki-
Tcorolcoro e nalakena nimu, doko
narae ni Kristo; naga tuga ta pei 11
tea maukaroluaana pae Satan mau :
nalakena au da pei sapo tea mido-
akiana aneana maga mau.
Ma ragi waina a umai paki Troas 12
raki narogorogoana wia ki Kristo,
go namata sikai e maginau pei tea
wolagatiana doko Nawota, a da 13
peani te namaromaroana agi na-
atagu mau, nalakena a da papai
Tito taigu mau; ma a pasadule
ki da po paki Masedonia pano. Ma 14
navasadodofnatakiana ega vei agi
Supe waina e mari garni au mari-
matua doko Kristo sara ragi, po
mari napo ni naatae-a-ana e toko
lina pae garni sara tokora. Nala- 15
kena au magi Supe pei napo wia
sikai ni Kristo, maleoputo ni tea
maga waina eu do pei tea mauti-
pauriana, go maleoputo ni tea maga
waina eu do matepuoli; au magi 16
sikai pei napo sikai inelu namateana
paki namateana; au magi kerua
pei napo sikai inelu namauriana
paki namauriana. Go sei e pataka
ni tea maga wanogoe ? Nala- 17
kena au da dapala tea lapa mau,
waina eu do lipaki sari sori na-
vasaana ki Supe : ma dapala naata
iiioli maga ni namaruana, ma da-
pala tea maga waina eu inelu Supe,
au do pasa narae ni Supe doko
Kristo.
Matele 3
Au atulake naga auga moro du- 1
magami pasapiakinoa garni? kite
au dapala waina auga masau, dapala
te naata seara, epistole maga ni na
vasapiakinoaana paki mu kite inelu
mu kite ? Nimu ku pei epistole 2
aginami; tea midiriana doko na
popogami maga, tea ataeana go tea
veveana pae naatainoli maga ma-
mau puti; tea mariana ku doko 3
lina naga ku pei epistole sikai ki


Kristo, tea suasuakiana pae garni,
tea midiriana ki tea waina e da pei
noai loa mau, ma ki Naata ni Supe
mauri; eda doko tea welewelea
maga ni vatu mau, ma e doko tea
welewelea maga waina eu pei na
4 popo maga ni napokasi. Go au
peani navavatuana tapala nogoe
6 pae Kristo paki Supe : au da noa
naga au dumagami pataka ni waina
auga midoa kite navatuna dap ala
epe rnelu garni mau; ma navata-
-6 kaana aginami e melu Supe; wai-
na ma e mari garni au pataka ni
waina auga vei tea suasua maga ni
navasasokiana vau; au da pei tea
suasua maga ni namidiriana mau,
ma au pei tea Suasua maga ni Na-
atana; nalakena namidiriana e mari-
punue, ma Naatana e pakamauri.
7Ma nasuasuaana ni namateana,
waina e pei tea midiriana, go tea
taemidiriana doko vatu maga, e pe
vilake nasamasamaana umai, da-
pala waina Israel natuna maga eu
mari sa leosoki narae ni Moses na
lakena natawarawaraana ni narae-
na ; waina e do pei tea maripuoli-
-8 kiana : nasuasuaana ni Naatana epe
wo da pilake nasamasamaana waina
9 e parua liu sa kite eka sava ? Nala-
kena nasuasuaana ni natipakoto-
viana e pe vei nasamasamaana,
nasuasuaana ni namarinaleoleana-
ana e pe vei tea ni nasamasamaana
10 e pe warua liu. Go nalakena tea
waina e pei tea mariana e pei tea ni
nasamasamaana e da pei tea ni na-
samasamaana mau nalo ni tea waia,
nalakena nasamasamaana waina e
H parua liu sa. Nalakena tea waina
e pei tea maripuolikiana e pe vae
nasamasamaana, tea waina e pei
tea toko e pe toko nasamasamaana
e pe warua liu.
12 Nalakena tea wanogoe go waina
au 'peani naleogoroana tapala nogoe,
13 au do mari navasapiviariana warua,
go au da dapala Moses mau, waina e
doropusi tea taugoro-rae sikai doko
naraena, naga Israel natuna maga
euga ta leosoki paki namatapago
edaku ni tea waina e do pei tea
maripuolikiana ; ma namidodoana 14
adeada maga eu pei tea mariana eu
kasua: nalakena tea taugoro-rae sikai
maau wanogoe e doko pa pa paki
naaleatia ni masoso ragi ni nave-
veana ni navasasokiana tuai, e da
pei tea tapeluaana mau, nalakena e
pei tea maripuolikiana doko Kristo.
Ma ragi waina Moses e pei tea ve- 15
veana, tea taugoro-rae e one na
popoda pa pa paki masoso. Ma 16
ragi waina e pe wo maradoa paki
Nawota, tea taugoro-rae e pe wo
pei tea tapeluaana. Ma Nawota el 7
pei Naatana: go tokora waina
Naata ni Nawota e doko asa, na
veresiana e doko asa. Ma nigida 18
maga mamau puti, waina naraegida
e pei tea maripakasakiana, tu do
ditiro ki nasamasamaana ki Na
wota, po pei tea maridoaana tu
pano pota paki nunu sikai maau
pae nasamasamaana paki nasama-
samaana, dapala tu melu Nawota
waina e pei Naatana..
Matele 4
Nalakena tea wanogoe waina au 1
peani nasuasuaana waia, dapala au
pei tea dodomiana, au da pei tea
popotoro mau: ma au pasagoro 2
naleo surukiana maga ni namali-
ereana, au da surata pae namari-
manumatuaana mau, go au da pasa
sorosoro ki navasaana ki Supe mau ;
ma au dumagami pasapiakinoa
garni ki namaridokolinaana ni nalo-
mauana paki sara natumada-atae-
ana ni naatamoli maga narnata in
Supe. Ma go narogorogoana wia 3
aginami e pe vei tea kovagoroana, e
pe vei tea kovagoroana nalo ni tea
maga waina eu do mate puoli;
waina supe ni maramana waia e 4


mari namidodoana maga ki tea
maga waina eu da saralomau mau
eu kesa, naga namarama ni narogo-
rogoana wia ni nasamasamaana ki
Kristo, waina e pei nunu ni Supe,
5 ega ta dola ara mau. Nalakena
' an da dumagami dogorogo ki garni
mau, ma au dogorogo ki Kristo
Yesu Nawota, go au dumagami dogo-
rogo ki garni tea suasua anitnu
6 maga nalakena Yesu. Nalakena e
pei Supe, waina e naga, Namarama
ega wo maramalaga meludua ki
namaligo, waina e maramalaga na
popogida, naga ega vitua ki nama-
rama ni naataeana ni nasamasama-
ana ni Supe doko narae ni Yesu
Kristo.
7 Ma au peani naloriki tauakiana
wia waia doko lasa maga ni naruku,
naga nawarualiuana ni nakasuaana
ega vei tea ni Supe, go naga ega ta
8 fnelu garni mau ; au pei tea riesoki-
ana nalo ni sara naleo, ma au da
pei tea riesokipulutiana mau ; au
midoakiputuaki, ma napopogami e
9 da pelepele mau ; au pei tea kopa-
leleana, ma au da pei tea toropusi-
ana au madoko mau; au pei tea
nadikiana pakitano, ma au da pei
10 tea maripuolikiana mau ; sara ragi
au do dapetape pasara doko napa-
tokogami namateana ki Yesu, naga
namauriana ki Yesu ega vei tea
mariana ega tokolina napatoko-
-11 garni. Nalakena kinami waina au
mauri au pei tea vituakiana paki
namateana sara ragi nalakena Yesu,
naga namauriana ma ki Yesu ega
vei tea mariana ega toko lina na
pokasigami waina ega wo mate.
12 Dapala nogoe namateana e posi-
wosi doko garni, ma namauriana e
13 posiwosi doko mu. Ma au peani
Naatana sikai maau ni nasaralomau-
ana, pae tea waina e pei tea midi-
riana, A saralomau, nalakena tea
wanogoe a pasa; kinami ma au
saralomau, go nalakena tea wanogoe
au pasa ; au atae naga tea waina e 14
sike Nawota Yesue duleana ega wo
sike garni ma auga wo duleana
sikoti Yesu, go ega wo mari garni
auga wo lawodu naraena sikoti mu.
Nalakena naleo maga mamau puti 15
eu doho nalakena nimu, naga nasau-
piaana, waina e lapa pae tea lapa,
ega mari navasadodomatakiana ega
lapa paid nasamasamaana ki Supe.
Nalakena tea wanogoe au da pei 16
tea popotoro mau; ma naatamoli
ni natakugami e pe to madada, ma
naatamoli ni napalaugami e do
pei tea maripaukiana naaleatia go
naaleatia. Nalakena nariesoki- 17
gami-ana, waina e masalesale, go
waina e pei tea ni ragi kiki, e do
maginami posiwosi paruparua liu
ki nasamasamaana waina e madaga
go waina e du mau du ; ragi waina 18
au da do leopunusi naleo maga
mau waina eu pei tea vunusiana,
ma au do leopunusi naleo maga
waina eu da pei tea vunusiana mau :
nalakena naleo maga waina eu pei
tea vunusiana eu pei tea ni ragi
sikai; ma naleo maga waina eu da
pei tea vunusiana mau eu du mau
du.
Matele 5.
Nalakena au atae naga nasufna 1
ni tapaupau aginami ni maramana
e pe vei tea rakaiana, au pe veani
nasufna tavagiana sikai waina e
fnelu Supe, nasufna sikai waina e
da pei tea mariana ki namelearu
maga mau, waina e du mau du,
doko nakoroatelagi maga. Nalakena 2
lomau au do gi doko tea waia, au
do masau parua ki naga auga vei
tea sugorokovagoroana ki natoko-
ana aginami waina e fnelu nakoro-
atelagi : nalakena au pe vei tea 3
sugoroana au pe ta pei tea vapai-
ana pei tea malafnala mau. Nala- 4
kena lomau kinami waina au doko


tapaupau waia au do gi, nalakena
au pei tea sokiana pakitano ki tea
madaga ; au da masauna nalakena
tea wanogoe naga auga sawolua e
mau, ma au masauna naga auga
vei tea sugorokovagoroana, naga
tea waina e mate atae ega vei tea
5 tinomiana pae namauriana. Ma
tea waina e marimata ki garni raki
tea wanogoe e pei Supe, waina e
dua garni nanadisokiana ni Naata-
-6 na. Nalakena tea wanogoe au do
marasike sara ragi, go au atae naga,
ragi waina au doko kiagami ni na
patokogami-, au puoli ki kiagami
7 sikoti Nawota (nalakena au surata
pae nasaralomauana, au da surata
8 pae tea vunusiana mau); ma au
marasike, go au suasua naga auga
va dua ki kiagami ni napatoko-
gami, go naga auga va doko kiagami
9 sikoti Nawota. Go nalakena tea
wanogoe au do maridutuaki naga,
au pe toko kiagami kite au pe vuoli
ki nia, auga vei tea midoakimataki-
-10 ana aneana. Nalakena e one gida
maga mamau puti one naga tuga
vei tea mariana tuga tokolina narae
ni malo tasake ni navasapotaeana
ki Kristo ; naga sara naata euga
sikasikai dape naleo maga waina eu
pei tea mariana pae napatokoda,
ega vae tea maga waina eu mari ra,
e pe vei tea wia kite tea sa.
11 Nalakena tea wanogoe go waina
au ataenamatau-ki-Nawota-ana, au
do pasadie naatamoli maga, ma au
pei tea mariana au dokolina ki
Supe ; go a pavatu naga au pei tea
mariana au dokolina natuinamu-
12 atae-ana. Au da moro duinagami
pasapiakinoa garni paki mu mau, ma
au pasa dapala au dua mu tea ni
navakavakaeana nalo kakagami,
naga kuga veani a dipa tea maga
waina eu pakavakae tea ni naraeda,
ga eu da pakavakae tea ni napo-
-13 poda mau. Nalakena au pe tara-
tara, e pe magi Supe; kite au pe
midodoa pia, e pe manimu. Nala- 14
kena nadodomiana ki Kristo e do
diedisua ki garni; nalakena au
midoakipotae dapala waia, naga
sikai e mate oli tea maga mamau
puti, nalakena tea wanogoe tea
maga mamau puti eu mate; go 15
e mate oli tea maga mamau puti,
naga tea maga waina eu mauri euga
fa moro dufnada madeada mauri
mau, ma euga magi tea waina e
mate oli ra po moro duleana mauri.
Nalakena tea wanogoe au da atae 16
pae ragi waia pa pa te naata pae
napokasi mau; go au pe atae sua
Kristo pae napokasi, ma ragi waia ®
au da moro atae a dapala nogoe
mau. Nalakena tea wanogoe te 17
naata e pe toko Kristo e pe vei tea
tawanakiana vau : naleo tuai maga
eu pano puoli; kuga leo, eu po pei
tea vau. Ma naleo maga mamau 18
puti eu inelu Supe, waina e mari
gida tu pei popo wia paki nia pae
Kristo, po dua garni nasuasuaana
ni namaripopowiaana ; nalakena 19
Supe doko Kristo e do mari mara-
mana eu pei popo wia paki nia, e
da midoa ki dipa ra natapiriana
adeada maga mau, go e doropusi
doko garni navasaana ni namari-
popowiaana.
Nalakena tea wanogoe au pei 20
tea tautauana maga oli Kristo,
dapala Supe e do pasa parati ki
mu pae garni, au pavarani mu oli
Kristo, kuga vei popo wia paki
Supe. E mari tea waina eda atae 21
te namarinaleosaana mau, e pei
namarinaleosaana oli gida, naga
nigida tuga vei namarinaleoleana-
ana ki Supe doko asa.
Matele 6.
. Ma au do posiwosi sikoti a go 1
au pasa parati ki mu naga kuga ta
dape palo ki nasaupiaana ki Supe
man (nalakena e naga, 2


Ragi ni nasaupiaana a dogo ko
Go naaleatia ni namautipauriana
a silae ko asa ;
kuga leo, ragi waia e pei ragi
ni nasaupiaana; kuga leo, ragi
waia e pei naaleatia ni namauti-
-3 pauriana) : doko da pitua kite
nalakena sikai ni natapilagonaana
nalo ni te navatuna mau, naga na
suasuaana aginami ega ta pei tea
4 vasadipaana mau ; ma nalo ni sara
naleo, dapala tea suasua maga
ki Supe, au do dumagami mari
garni au doko lina, ki nasokiana
warua, doko nariesokiana maga,
doko namarisogiana maga, doko
5 nariesoki-puluti-ana maga, doko na
varatiana maga, doko nasuma ni
navavaigoroana maga, doko nava-
riana maga, doko nawosi-mawosa-
ana maga, doko naleleogoroana
6 maga, doko navaliana maga ; ki na
tautauana, ki naataeana, ki navei-
maritasoki-parau-ana, ki navakale-

mau, ki navasaana ni nalomauana,

kau maga ni namarinaleoleanaana
waina eu doko napirikiagami ni
matua go napirikiagami ni mawiri,
8 pae nasamasamaana go nadodo-
daoana, pae navasasakiana go na
vasapiakiana; dapala tea vila-
surue maga, go au pei tea noalo-
-9 mau maga ; dapala tea salupeana

maga; dapala tea to mate maga,

pala tea varatiana maga, go au da
10 pei tea maripunueana mau; dapala

sara ragi; dapala tea tika maga, ma
au do mari tea lapa eu pei sogolapa ;
dapala tea ta peani te navatuna
mau, go au pei talakea ni naleo maga
mamau puti.
11 Nawokagami e dapolaga doko
paid mu, tea ni Korintko maga,
napopogami e pei tea mariana e
pelewelea. Ku da pei tea riesoki- 12
pulutiana garni mau, ma ku pei
teariesoki-puluti-ana namaritadodo-
miana amimu maga. Ma namori- 13
dipaana ni tea sikai-maau wanogoe
(a pasa dapala a -pasa ki natugu
maga), nimu ma kuga vei tea mari-
ana kuga welewelea.
Kuga ta pei tea vilasaikiana 14
nimu ma tea ta saralomau maga
mau; nalakena namarinaleoleana-
ana go namarinaleotageleana ero
peanipotae nasava ? kite na
marama go namaligo ero saisai-
peani nasava ? Go Kristo go Belial 15
ero saisai ki nadaleoda noa nasava ?
kite tea saralomau e peani seve
matele sikoti tea waina e da sara-
lomau mau ? Go nasuma tapu ki 16
Supe e peani seve nasuasuakiana
sikoti nasupe maga ? nalakena nimu
ku pei nasuma tapu ki Supe mauri;
dakiusi waina Supe e naga, Aga
wo doko ara, go aga wo surata
ara, go aga wo pei Supe adeada, go
nara euga wo pei narei aginau.

marimasalekiana,

Matele 7.
Nalakena tea wanogoe waina tu 1
peani nasaiana maga wanogoe, tea
dodomiana maga, tuga tumagida
mari gida tuga tautau melu dua


ki sara naloaana ni napokasigida go
ni naatagida, doko do mari sua na
tautauana doko namatau-ki-Supe-
ana.
2 Kuga maginami pologati napo-
pomu maga : an da mari dagelegele
paki te naata mau, au da mari sa
kite naata nan, au da maukarolua
.3 te naata mau. Ada noa e raki na
tipakotovi-wM-ana mau: nalakena
au pea noa sua, naga ku doko napo-
pogami naga auga mate sikoti mu
4go naga auga mauri sikoti mu. Na
viviariana aginau paki mu e parua,
navakavakaeana aginau nalo ka-
kamu e parua: a pei tea vakavu-
roana ki navakavakaleana, a pura
sarasarape ki nalaelaeaana doko
nariesokiana mamau aginami.
5 Go nalakena ragi waina au rumai
paki Masedonia, napokasigami e da
peani te namaromaroana mau, ma
au pei tea riesokiana pisarasara;
namarimariana maga natakugami,
namatakuana maga napalaugami.
6Ma tea waina e do pakavakale
tea vakitano maga, Supe, e paka-
vakale garni pae naumaiana ki
7 Tito ; go e da pae naumaiana ane-
ana sikina mau, ma e pae navaka-
vakaleana waina nae e pei tea vaka-
vakaleana asa nalo kakamu, ragi
waina e dogorogo paki garni ki na
masau-parua-ana animu, nalalaga-
arovaana animu, nasuisuiana animu
maginau; dapala waina a laelaea
8 parua asa. Nalakena a pe mari
mu ku pe susue ki epistole aginau,
a pe ta midoakidoa mau, go a pe
vea midoakidoa; nalakena a pu-
nusi naga epistole wanogoe e mari
mu ku susue, go e pe vei ragi sikai.
9 Ragi waia a laelaea, a da laelaea
nalakena ku pei tea mariana ku
susue mau, ma nalakena ku pei tea
mariana ku susue paki namidoaki-
doaana : nalakena ku pei tea mari-
ana ku susue pae namasauana ki
Supe, naga kuga ta pei tea tape-
puolikiana nalo ni te navatuna na
lakena kinami mau. Nalakena na 10
susueana waina e pae namasauana
hi Supe e do posiwosi ki namidoaki-
doaana paki namautipauriana, waina
ega ta pei tea ni namidoakidoaana
mau: ma nasusueana ni mara-
mana e do posiwosi ki namateana.
Nalakena kuga leo, tea sikai maau 11
wanogoe, waina ku pei tea mari-
ana ku susue pae namasauana ki
Supe, e manimu posiwosi ki nafnare-
karekaana warua pa, io, go na
vasakorokoroana warua pa, io,
go pamaetoana warua pa, io, go
namatakuana warua pa, io, go
namasauana warua pa, io, go
nasuisuiana warua pa, io, go na
sikosikoana warua pa ! Nalo ni sara
ualeo ku dumamu mari mu ku
doko lina naga ku dautau nalo ni
naleo wanogoe. Nalakena tea wa- 12
nogoe go a pe midiri paki mu, a da
midiri nalakena naata waina e mari
dagele mau, go a da midiri na
lakena naata waina e pei tea mari-
dagelekiana mau, ma a midiri na
lakena tea waia, naga namarekare-
kaana aginami manimu ega vei tea
mariana ega tokolina paki mu na
mata ni Supe. Nalakena tea wa- 13
nogoe au pei tea vakavakaleana :
ma ragi ni navakavakale-gami-ana
au laelaea paruparua pa nalakena
nalaelaeaana ki Tito, nalakena na
atana e pei tea vakamaromaroki-
ana pae mu mamau puti. Nala- 14
kena a pe vakavakae te navatuna
paki nia nalo kakamu, a pe ta pei tea
mariana ape maker e mau; ma dapala
waina au pasa tea maga mamau puti
paki mu pae nalomauana, dapala
nogoe navakavakaeana aginami
ma narae ni Tito e pei nalomauana.
Go namaritadodomiana aneana paki 15
mu e parua liu, ragi waina e midoa
ki narogoparatikiana animu maga
mamau puti, dapala waina ku pi-
ragi soki a pilake namatakuana go


16 narurururuana. A laelaea nalakena
a marasike nalo ni sara naleo nalo
kakamu.
Matele 8.
1 Ma au mari mu kuga atae, tai
maga, nasaupiaana ki Supe waina
e pei tea vituakiana doko ekkalesia
2 maga ni Masedonia; naga ragi
waina eu doko namaridogoana wa-
rua ni nariesokiana, nawarua-liu-
ana ni nalaelaeaana adeada go na
tikaana pakipua adeada ero parua
liu paid nasogolapaana ni navitua-
-3 parua-ana adeada. Nalakena pae
nakasuaana adeada, a noasokisoki
a, go parua liu nakasuaana adeada,
4 eu dufnada pitua, doko do pavarani
garni ki navasaparatikiana warua
nasaupiaana wanogoe go nasai-
saipeaniana ni nasuasuakiana paki
5 tea tautau maga : go e da dapala
waina au leogoro asa mau, ma eu
dufnada pitua ki da paki Nawota
pea, go paki garni pae namasauana
6ki Supe. Dapala waina au pasa
parati ki Tito, naga dakiusi waina
e pea atulake asa, ega mari sua
ega tapala nogoe nasaupiaana wano-
-7 goe fnaleoputo kakamu. Ma dapala
waina ku pei tea veani parua
nalo ni sara naleo, nasaralomauana,
go navasaana, go naataeana, go
sara namarekarekaana, go nadodo-
miana animu paki garni, kuga vu-
nusi naga kuga vei tea veani parua
8 nalo ni nasaupiaana wanogoe. A
da noa e pae natipakiana mau, ma
a maridogo pae namarekarekaana
ki tea pota maga naveilomauana
9ni nadodomiana animu. Nalakena
ku atae nasaupiaana ki Nawota
anigida Yesu Kristo, naga, ragi
waina e pei sogolapa e durnana
mari a e pei tea tika nalakena nimu,
naga nimu kuga vei sogolapa ki
10 natikaana aneana. Go a pitua ki
namidoakipotaeana aginau nalo ni
tea wanogoe : nalakena tea wano-
goe e pia ki mu, waina ku pei tea
waina ku pea atulake, namariana
e da masikina mau, ma ku atulake
namasauana pae natau waina o
pano. Ma ragi waia kuga marisua 11
namariana; naga dakiusi waina
napoposuasuaana ni namasauana e
doko, namarisuaana ma ega tapala
nogoe doko pae tea waina ku peani
a. Nalakena napoposuasuaana el 2
pe toko, e pe vei tea tapemata-
kiana ega vae tea waina te naata e
peani a, go ega ta pae tea waina e
da peani a mau. Nalakena a da 13
noa naga tea pota maga euga veani
namaromaroana, go nimu nariesoki-
ana mau : ma ega vae navataka- 14
sikaiana ; ragi waia nawarualiuana
animu ega vaki natikaana adeada,
naga nawarualiuana adeada ma
ega vaki natikaana animu; naga
navatakasikaiana ega toko : ega 15
tapala waina e pei tea midiriana,
Tea waina e piladaua ki tea warua
e dika ki tea tu pele ; go tea waina e
piladaua ki tea kiki e da dika mau.
Ma navasadodomatakiana ega vei 16
agi Supe, waina e pitua ki namare-
karekaana sikai maau wanogoe e
manimu doko napopo ni Tito. Na 17
lakena e dape soki lomau ki navasa-
paratikiana aginami; ma e fna-
rekareka parua po durnana melu
pano paloti punusi mu. Go au di- 18
pakilua sikoti a taigida waina na
samasamani-a-ana nalo ni narogo-
rogoana wia e doko usuraki ek-
kalesia maga mamau puti; go tea 19
wanogoe e da sikina mau, ma e pei
tea matadoaana pae ekkalesia maga
naga ega surata sikoti garni nalo
ni nasaupiaana wanogoe, waina e
pei tea suasuakiana pae garni paki
nasamasamaana ki Nawota go na
poposuasuaana aginami: doko do 20
daleledao ki tea waia, naga te naata
sikai ega ta vasadipa garni mau
nalo ni navitua-parua-ana wanogoe


waina e pei tea suasuakiana pae
21 garni; nalakena au pea midoa ki
naleo dodomadaganiana maga, e
da doko namata ni Nawota sikina
mau, ma e doko namata ni naata-
22 fnoli maga. Go au dipakilua sikoti
ra taigida, waina au paka lapa mari-
dogo e naga e marekareka nalo ni
naleo lapa, ma ragi waia e mare-
kareka parua liu,' nalakena nava-
vatuaana warua waina e peani
23 a paki mu. Eu pe vusuusu nalo ni
Tito, e pei tea waina aro saisaipeani
go tea wosiwosi sikoti au paki mu;
kite nalo ni taigida maga, ero pei
tea tautauana maga ki ekkalesia
maga, ero pei nasamasamaana ki
24 Kristo. Nalakena tea wanogoe
kuga visei ki da narae ni ekkalesia
maga naviseikiana ni nadodomiana
animu, go ni navakavakaeana agi-
nami nalo kakamu.
Matele 9.
1 Nalakena nalo ni nasuasuaana
paki tea tautau maga, naga aga
midiri paki mu asa e pei tea warua
2 liu tea waina e patakana : nalakena
a atae napoposuasuaana animu,
waina a do pakavakae asa nalo ka-
kamu paki tea ni Masedonia maga,
naga Akaia e pei tea marimata-
ki-sua-ana pae natau waina e pano ;
go nasuisuiana animu e pulevule
3 tea lapa kakada. Ma a dipa-
kilua taigida maga paloti, naga
navakavakaeana aginami nalo ka-
kamu ega ta pei tea mariana ega
vei tea palo mau nalo ni naleo
wanogoe ; naga, ega tapala waina
a noa sua e, kuga vei tea mari-
-4 mataki-sua-ana : mase te seara ni
Masedonia eu pe sikoti au paloti, po
papai mu ku pe ta pei tea mari
mataki-sua-ana mau, kinami, (naga
auga ta noa mu mau), au pe vei tea
mariana au pe maliere nalo ni na
5 vavatuana wanogoe. Nalakena tea
wanogoe a midoa ki nia naga e one
au one naga aga vavarani taigida
maga, naga euga vea paloti pu-
nusi mu, po pea mari navasapia-
kiana animu ega soko waina e
pei tea saiana sala vea, naga tea
sikai maau wanogoe ega vei tea
marimataki-sua-ana, ega tapala na
vasapiakiana sikai, go ega ta
dapala namatamaguraana mau.
Ma a noa tea waia, Tea waina e 6
sapuraki pae namatagoroana ega
wo tagaukotovi pae namatagoro-
ana ; go tea waina e sapuraki pae
navasapiakiana maga ega wo
tagaukotovi pae navasapiakiana
maga. Sara naatamoli euga si- 7
kasikai mari ega tapala waina eu
midoa ki nia napopoda, ega ta pae
nasusueana, kite pae navasadieana
mau : nalakena Supe e dodomi tea
vitua laelaea. Go Supe e mariatae 8
mari sara nasaupiaana euga lapa
liu paki mu ; naga, ragi waina kuga
veani sara nasokoana sara ragi nalo

liu paki sara nawosiana wia : da- 9
pala waina e pei tea midiriana,
E daperavera, e dua tea tika
maga;

du mau da.

ni nawa ni nakau paki tea sapuraki
go ki navinaga kaniana, ega wo

eu doko naraemu 1 Te naata sikai

Matele 11.
1 A masauna naga kuga soki au
nalo ni namanumatavusaana tea
kiki kakana: ma ku do soki au.

5 nia. Nalakena a midoa ki nia

mu fnoli ki mu kite ? A dapepava- 8
koto tea ki ekkalesia pota maga,

ada dodomi mu mau kite ? Supe

nogoe maga eu pei apostolo sorosoro

do dumada mari ra eu oli apostolo

ni namagaana mau ; nalakena Satan
nae e dumana mari a e oli agelo
sikai ni namarama. Nalakena tea 15
wanogoe e da pei tea warua mau

dumada mari ra eu pe tapala tea
suasua maga ni namarinaleolea-
naana; waina ragi edaku adeada
ega wo dapala nawosiana adeada
maga.

(A pasa dapala tea taratara sikai)
kinau a parua liu ra ; ki nawosi-
mawosa-ana maga parua liu, ki
nasuma ni navavaiana maga parua
liu, ki navaratiana maga paruparua

24 A paka lima dape ki tea ni Yudea
maga navaratiana rualima pati
25 sikai e puoli ki nia. A paka tolo
pei tea varatiana ki nakau varati,

maga, paka tolu rarua waina a porau
asa e mawora, a doko epua napogi-
-26 ana sikai go naaleatia sikai: ki

maga, ki namatakuana maga ni tea

namaladiana go namalafnalaana.
Naga aga ta noa tea pota maga mau, 28,
tea waina e diesoki au sara naale-
atia e doko, namidoakiparatikiana
ni ekkalesia maga mamau puti. Sei 29
e manainai go a da manainai mau ?

go kinau a da soro mau ? E pe 30
one au one naga aga vakavakae,
aga wo pakavakae naleo maga ni
namanainaiana aginau. Supe go 31
Tama ni Nawota Yesu, nae waina e
pei tea vasapiakiana pa pa ega
tu mau du, e atae naga a da soro- .
soro mau. Ragi waina a doko 32
Damaseko doko tea maramara ki .

ana ki tea ni Damaseko maga, naga
ega vuasoki au : go a pei tea toro- 33
ana pakitano duaduru windo sikai
doko nala sikai pae nakoro, po sava
meludua ki namelearuna maga.
Matele 12.
E one au one naga aga vakavakae, 1
e da marimataki mau ; ma aga wo
umai paki navunusiana maga go
nanoapakasakiana magaki Nawota.
A atae naatafnoli sikai waina e 2
doko Kristo pea ki natau rualima
sikai tamate pati waina eu pano
(e pe toko napatokona, a da atae
a mau ; kite e pe toko etaku ni na
patokona, ada atae a mau; Supe
e atae a), tea tapala nogoe sikai e
pei tea vualuaana pa pa paki na
koroatelagi ketolu. Go a atae na 3


atamoli tapala nogoe sikai (e pe
doko napatokona, kite e pe toko
masale ki napatokona, a da atae
4 a man ; Supe e atae a), naga waina
e pei tea vualuaana paki Paradeiso
pano, po dogo navasaana maga
waina eu marisa pei tea noaana,
waina e da pei tea suasuakiana mau
paki te naatainoli sikai naga ega
5 vasa ara. Aga wo pakavakae nalo
ni tea tapala nogoe: ma aga wo
da pakavakae nalo kakagu mau,
ma nalo ni namanainaiana aginau
€ maga aga wo pakavakae. Nala-
kena a pe masauna naga aga vaka-
vakae, a pe wo da pei tea manu-
matavusa mau; nalakena ape wo
noa nalomauana: ma a dufiiagu
dugoro au asa, naga te naata sikai

tea waina e punusi au, kite waina
7 e dogo e kiagu mau. Go naga na
popogu ega ta pakilagi parua mau

sakiana maga, natipa sikai doko

8 pakilagi parua mau. Nalo ni tea
wanogoe a pavarani Nawota paka
tolu, naga ega meludua ki nau pano.

nau e patakama : nalakena naka-

lakena tea wanogoe a laelaea parua

10 au. Nalakena tea wanogoe a mi-
doakifnata ki namanainaiana maga,

kasua.
11 A po pei tea manumatavusa:
Nimu ku maridie au; nalakena e one
nguna-tongoan n.t.
an one naga aga vei tea vasapia-
kinoaana pae mu: nalakena ada
edaku te navatuna ki tea warua liu
ni apostolo maga, go a pe ta pei
te navatuna man. Navaivaiana 12
maga Id apostolo sikai eu pei
tea mariana lomau maleoputo ka-

doko waina ku pei tea mariana ku

nau midoakikorokoro namarinaleo-
tageleana wanogoe.

aga valoti punusi mu sala ketolu
waia; go aga wo da pei tea ma-
daga one mu mau: nalakena ada
laga te navatuna animu sikai mau,
ma a laga mu: nalakena eda one
natu maga one mau naga euga
magi tea matua adeada maga doro-
pusi dauaki, ma e one tea matua
maga naga euga magi natuda maga
mari a. Go kinau aga wo laelaea 15
parua naga aga magi naatamu sori
po pei tea soriana nopu. Ape do- ■
domi paruparua ki mu, a pe vei tea
dodomiana kiki asa kite ? Ma ega 16
tapala nogoe, kinau a da pei tea
madaga one mu mau; ma, ku pe
noa naga, a pei tea marimanuma-
tua po puati mu ki nasorosoroana.
A pei maukarolua mu pae te naata 17
sikai ni tea maga waina a dipaki-
lua ra paloti punusi mu kite ? AlB
pavarani Tito, go a dipakilua tai-
gida e sikoti a paloti. Tito e pei
maukarolua mu te navatuna kite ?
Aro da surata pae Naatana sikai
maau kite ? aro da surata pae na
atumeleana maga sikai maau kite ?
Ku midoa ki nia pae tuai naga 19
au to dumagami maginami pasa
korokoro garni paki mu. Au do
pasa narae ni Supe doko Kristo.


Ma naleo maga mamau puti, tea
dodomiana maga, eu magi nata-
-20 vagi -mu - ana doko. Nalakena a
mataku, mase ragi waina aga va-
loti a pe vapai mu ku pe ta dapala

pe vei tea vapaiana pae mu dapala
waina ku da masauna mau ; mase

usuana maga, namariputuakiana

vasadalakolakoana maga, naveipo-

21 eu pe toko ; mase ragi waina aga
moro paloti, Supe aginau e pe mari
au a pe vakitano naraemu, go a pe
susue tea lapa ni tea maga waina
eu pea mari naleo sa, po da midoa-
kidoa mau nalo ni naloaana go
namaripeleana go namasausauana
waina eu mari a.
Matele 13.
1 Sala ketolu waia a naga aga va-
loti punusi mu. Sara navasaana
euga wo pei tea lawosokiana pae
nawoka ni tea noasokisoki dua kite
2 dolu. A pea noa sala vea, go a pea
noa ragi waia, dapala ragi waina a
doko sikoti mu sala kerua, go ragi
waia waina a puoli ki mu, a pea
noa ki tea maga waina eu pea mari
naleo sa, go ki tea pota maga ma-
mau puti, naga, a pe moro paloti, a
3pe wo da mari malemale mau ; na
lakena ku laga navaivaiana sikai
ki Kristo waina e doko au pasa;
waina e da manainai paki mu mau,
ma e kasua maleoputo kakamu:
4 nalakena e pei tea turiana nakau
valadagoto melu namanainaiana,
ma e mauri melu nakasuaana ki
Supe. Nalakena kinami ma au
manainai doko asa, ma auga wo
mauri sikoti a melu nakasuaana
5 ki Supe paki mu. Kuga tumamu
maridogo mu, ku pe toko nasaralo-
mauana ; kuga tumamu maridogo-
atae mu. Kite ku da dumamu
atae mu mau, naga Yesu Kristo e
doko mu ? ku pe ta pei tea
maridogo-dipadoa-ana lomau mau
epe toko mu. Ma a leogoro naga 6
kuga wo atae naga kinami au da
pei tea maridogo-dipadoa-ana mau.
Ma au dapasavasa paki Supe naga 7
nimu kuga ta mari te naleo sa mau ;
e da pei naga kinami auga tokolina
naga au pei tea maridogo-piragi-ana
mau, ma naga nimu kuga mari tea
waina e pei tea dodomadaganiana,
go naga kinami auga tapala tea
maridogo-dipadoa-ana maga. Na 8
lakena au da mariatae mari te na
vatuna dipa nalomauana mau, ma
au do magi nalomauana mari a.
Nalakena au laelaea, ragi waina 9
kinami au manainai, go nimu ku
kasua : go au do masau parua ki tea
waia, namaripialua-ki-mu-ana. Na 10
lakena tea wanogoe a midiri tea
maga waia ragi waina a puoli, naga
ragi waina aga toko sikoti mu aga
ta mari makalikali mau, pae na
veinawotaana waina Nawota e dua
au asa raki natavagiana, go e da
raki narakai-pakitano-ana mau.
Tea pota sikai, tai maga, kuga 11
laelaea. Kuga vei tea mariana
kuga wia lua ; kuga vei tea vaka-
vakaleana; kuga midoa ki tea
sikai maau ; kuga tafnate doko :
go Supe ni nadodomiana go ni na
tamateana ega wo doko sikoti mu.
Kuga turnanu pasadodomi mu ki 12
natumiliana tautau sikai.
Tea tautau maga mamau puti 13
eu pasadodomi mu.
Nasaupiaana ki Nawota Yesu 14
Kristo, go nadodomiana ki Supe,
go nasaisaipeaniana ni Naatana
Tapu, euga sikoti puti mu.


EPISTOLB KI PAULO APOSTOLO
PAKI
TEA NI GALATIA MAGA
Matele 1.
1 Paulo, apostolo sikai (e da melu
naatafnoli maga mau, go e da pae na
atamoli sikai mau, ma e pae Yesu
Kristo, go Supe Tamana, waina e
sike a e duleana melu dua ki tea
2 mate maga), go taigida maga ma-
mau puti waina eu sikoti au doko,
au midiri paki ekkalesia maga ni
3 Galatia : Nasaupiaana ega vei ani-
mu gouatafnateana melu Supe Tama,
4 go Nawota anigida Yesu Kristo, wai-
na e dumana pitua ki nia nalakena
namari-naleo-sa-ana anigida maga,
naga ega vualua gida meludua ki
maramana waina e doko ragi waia
waina e sa, pae namasauana ki Supe
sgo Tamagida; waina nasamasama-
ana ega vei aneana pa pa ega tu mau
du. Amen.
6 A maga nalakena ku maraverave
dapalana do meludua ki tea waina e
soso mu doko nasaupiaana ki
Kristo paki narogorogoana wia
7 vanopota sikai; waina eda pei na
rogorogoana wia pota mau; ma te
seara eu doko waina eu do durua ki
mu, go waina eu masauna naga euga
roa sa ki narogorogoana wia ki
8 Kristo. Ma kinami, kite agelo
sikai melu nakoroatelagi, e pe rogo-
rogo paki mu kite narogorogoana
wia sikai waina e panopota ki tea
waina au dogorogo ki sua e paid mu,
9 ega vei tea vasasakiana. Dapala
waina au pea noa sua e, go ragi waia
a moro noa e, Te naata sikai e pe
rogorogo paki mu kite narogoro-
goana wia sikai waina e panopota ki
tea waina ku dape sua e, ega vei tea
vasasakiana. Nalakena ragi waia 10
a do pasadie naatafrioli maga, kite
Supe ? kite a do laga naga aga vei
tea midoakimatakiana ki naatafnoli
maga ? a pe to pei tea midoaki-
matakiana ki naatafnoli maga, a pe
ta pei tea suasua ki Kristo mau.
Nalakena a mari mu kuga atae, 11
I tai maga, nalo ni narogorogoana wia
waina e pei tea rogorogokiana pae au,
naga e da pae naatafrioli maga mau.
Nalakena kinau a da dape a ki na 12
atamoli mau, go a da pei tea vasa-
piseikiana asa mau, ma e umai paki
nau pae nanoapakasakiana ki Yesu
Kristo. Nalakena ku dogo natomari- 13
ana aginau sala vea doko nalotuana
ki tea ni Yudea maga, naga a kopa-
lele parua liu ki ekkalesia ki Supe,
po mari sa sa ki nia : go a disu pano 14
doko nalotuana ki tea ni Yudea maga
liu tea lapa ni natau aginau maga
maleoputo ni tea ni nalauna aginau
maga, a magi navasaana vituakiana
maga ki tea matua vea aginau maga
suisui paruparua liu ra. Ma ragi 15
waina Supe, waina e marimasale ki
nau, pae napele ni pilagu pa pa, po
soso au pae nasaupiaana aneana, e
midoakimata ki nia, naga ega mari-16
pakasa ki Natuna napalaugu, naga


aga rogorogo ki nia maleoputo ni
tea ni nalauna pota maga, a mari
maraverave a da pusumaki paki na
17 pokasi go nada man : go a da sake
paki Yerusalem pano man punusi
tea maga waina eu pea kinau pei
apostolo maga : ma a paki Arabia
pano ; go a moro liliu paki Dama-
seko.
18 Ragi edaku ki natau dolu a sake
paki Yerusalem pano naga aga vu-
nusi po atae Kefa, go a doko sikoti a
doko naaleatia rualima sikai tamate
19 lima. Ma ada punusi tea pota sikai
ni apostolo maga mau, ma a punusi
20 Yakobo sikina Nawota taina. Ma
nalo ni tea maga waina a midiri ra
paki mu, kuga leo, narae ni Supe, a
21 da sorosoro mau. Edaku ki nia a
umai paki tokora maga ni Siria go
22 ni Kilikia. Go ako da pei tea atae-
ana ki naraegu mau paki ekkalesia
maga ni Yudea waina eu doko
23 Kristo : ma tea sikai maau eu do
dogo e, naga Tea waina e do kopa-
lele gida sala yea, ragi waia e do
dogorogo ki nasaralomauana waina
24 e mari sa sa ki nia sala vea ; go eu
samasamani Supe nalo kakagu.
Matele 2.
1 Ragi edaku ki natau rualima sikai
tamate pati a moro sake paki Yeru-
salem pano, kinami ma Barnaba, go
2 a piragi Tito e sikoti an pano. Go
a sake pae nanoapakasakiana pano ;
go a noakisai ra narogorogoana wia
waina a dogorogo ki nia maleoputo
ni tea ni nalauna pota maga, ma a
mari panako e paki tea maga waina
eu pei tea midoakiparuakiana, mase
a pe to sava fnoli, kite a pe sava
3 moli sua. Ma Tito waina e sikoti
au, waina e pei tea ni Hellas, e da
pei tea maridieana mau naga ega vei
4 tea tovodaviviana : ma e dapala
nogoe nalakena taigida sorosoro
maga, tea viragi-panako-ana umai
sili, waina eu pano panako umai sili
naga euga leo pavaraka naveresi-
gida-ana waina tu peani a doko
Kristo Yesu, naga euga mari gida
tuga vei naviti maga; waina au da 5
padua ki da ki natoko-etano-ana,
aura sikai mau ; naga nalomauana
ni narogorogoana wia ega toko si-
koti mu doko. Ma ki tea maga 6
waina eu pei tea midoakiparuakiana
naga eu pei te navatuna (dapala
waina eu doko, e da mari a e pano
pota paki nau nau : Supe eda piragi
narae ni te naatamoli sikai mau),
tea maga waina eu pei tea midoaki-
paruakiana eu da pasapisei ki nau
te navatuna mau : ma e panopota ki 7
nia, ragi waina eu punusi naga a pei
tea vavatuana ki narogorogoana wia
paki tea maga waina eu da pei tea
tovadaviviana mau, dapala waina
Petero epei tea vavatuana ki narogo-
rogoana wia paki tea tovadaviviana
maga (nalakena tea waina e magi 8
Petero posiwosi paki navei-apostolo-
ana paki tea tovadaviviana maga e
maginau ma posiwosi paki tea ni
nalauna pota maga); go ragi waina 9
eu atae nasaupiaana waina e pei tea
vituakiana paki nau, Yakobo go
Kefa go Yoane, waina eu pei tea
midoakiparuakiana naga eu pei tipa
maga, eu dua garni ma Barnaba na
melearuda ni matua ni nasaisaipe-
aniana, naga kinami auga va punusi
tea ni nalauna pota maga, ma nara
euga va punusi tea tovadaviviana
maga ; tea sikai maau eu masauna 10
naga aroga midoa ki tea tika maga ;
waina a dufnagu marekareka naga
aga mari tea wanogoe.
Ma ragi waina-Kefa e umai paki 11
Antiokia, a lawodugoro e paki na
raena, nalakena e pei tea tipakoto-
viana. Nalakena pea kite naata 12
seara eu melu Yakob umai, e gani-
kani sikoti tea ni nalauna pota
maga : ma ragi waina eu rumai, e
dumana sukasuka ki nia po du-


fhana marimasale ki nia, e matau ki
13 tea ni natovadaviviana maga. Go
tea ni Yudea pota maga ma eu mari
pae nakalepoana sikoti a ; dapala
waina Barnaba ma e pei tea viragi-
-14 luaana ki nakalepoana adeada. Ma
ragi waina a punusi naga eu da
surata leana pae nalomauana ni
narogorogoana wia mau, a noa ki
Kefa narae ni tea maga mamau puti,
Nigo, waina ku pei tea ni Yudea, ku
pe mauri pae nalauna pota maga,
go ku pe ta mauri pae Yudea mau,
ekasana ku maridie tea ni na
launa pota maga naga euga mauri
15 pae Yudea 1 Nigida waina tu pei
tea ni Yudea maga pae navakilina-
ana, go tu da pei tea mari naleo sa
maga ni nalauna pota maga mau,
16 ma tu atae naga te naatamoli sikai
e da pei tea marileanakiana ki
nawosiana maga ni nawotaeana
mau, ma e pae nasaralomau-Yesu
Kristo-ana, nigida ma tu saralomau
Kristo Yesu, naga tuga vei tea mari-
leanakiana ki nasaralomau-Kristo-
ana, go tu da pei tea marileana kiana
ki nawosiana maga ni nawotaeana
mau; nalakena te napokasi sikai
ega wo da pei tea marileanakiana ki
nawosiana maga ni nawotaeana mau.
17 Ma ragi waina tu do laga naga tuga
vei tea marileanakiana doko Kristo,
tu pe vei tea vapaiana naga nigida
ma tu pei tea mari naleo sa maga,
Kristo e pe vei tea suasua sikai ni
namarinaleosaana kite ? Ega ta
18 dapala nogoe mau. Nalakena ape
moro davagi naleo maga waina a
dakaira, a pe tufnagu mari au a pe
tokolina naga a pei tea tapiri sikai.
19 Nalakena kinau a pae nawotaeana
mate paki nawotaeana, naga aga
20 mauri paki Supe. A pei tea turiana
nakau valadagoto sikoti Kristo;
ma a mauri; eda moro pei kinau
mau, ma Kristo e mauri doko au ;
go namauriana waina a mauri asa
doko napokasi ragi waia, a mauri
asa doko nasaralomauana, waina e
paki Supe Natuna, waina e dodomi
au, po maginau duffiana pitua ki nia
oli au. Ada mari palo ki nasaupia- 21
ana ki Supe mau; nalakena na
marinaleoleanaana e pe vae nawo-
taeana umai, nalakena tea wanogoe
Kristo e pe mate inoli.
Matele 3.
Tea ni Galatia manumatavusa 1
maga, sei e maridoa mu, waina
Yesu Kristo e pei tea vea midiriana
narae ni namatamu maga tea turi-
ana nakau valadagoto 1 Tea sikai 2
maau waia a masauna naga aga
ataedogo e ki amu, Ku dapeNaatana
pae nawosiana maga ni nawotaeana,
kite pae narogoana ni nasaralo-
mauana ? Ku pei tea manumata- 3
vusa dapala waia kite ? waina ku
atulake sua pae Naatana, ku do
pei tea marisuaana pae napo-kasi
ragi waia kite ? Ku sua palo ki 4
narogokitesaana lapa dapalana kite ?
ku pe sua palo ki da lomau. Nala- 5
kena tea wanogoe nae waina e do
pitua ki Naatana paki mu, po do
posiwosi ki nawosiana kasua maga
maleoputo kakamu, e do mari a pae
nawosiana maga ni nawotaeana, kite
pae narogoana ni nasaralomauana ?
Dapala waina Abrakam e sara- 6
lomau navasaana ki Supe, go e
maneana pei tea midoakiana naga
ega vei namarinaleoleanaana. Nala- 7
kena tea wanogoe kuga atae naga
tea maga waina eu pei tea ni na
saralomauana, nara eu pei Abraham
natuna maga. Ma navasaana midi- 8
riana, waina e pea punusi naga Supe
e do marileana ki tea ni nalauna pota
maga ki nasaralomauana, e pea
dogorogo ki narogorogoana wia paki
Abraham, e naga, Nalauna maga
mamau puti euga wo pei tea
vasapiakiana ako. Nalakena tea 9
wanogoe tea maga waina eu pei


tea ni nasaralomauana eu pei tea
vasapiakiana sikoti Abraham waina
10 e saralomau. Nalakena tea maga
waina eu pei tea ni nawosiana maga
ni nawotaeana eu doko etano ki na
vasasakiana sikai:. nalakena e pei
tea midiriana, Sara naata waina eu
da doko naleo maga mamau puti
mau waina eu pei tea midiriana
tusi ni nawotaeana, naga euga mari
11 ra, eu pei tea vasasakiana. Ma
naga te naata sikai e da pei tea
marileanakiana ki nawotaeana na
mata ni Supe mau, e doko lina: nala-
kena, Tea leana ega wo mauri ki
12 nasaralomauana ; ma nawotaeana e
da pei tea ni nasaralomauana mau ;
ma, Tea waina e mari ra ega wo
13 mauri ara. Kristo e daulua gida
meludua ki navasasakiana ni na
wotaeana, e pei tea mariana e pei
navasasakiana oli gida : nalakena e
pei tea midiriana, Sara naata waina
eu daU nakau dau eu pei tea vasa-
-11 sakiana ; naga navasapiakiana ki
Abraham ega umai paki tea ni na
launa pota maga doko Kristo Yesu ;
naga tuga tape nasaiana ni Naatana
pae nasaralomauana.
15 Tai maga, a pasa pae naatamoli:
Navasasokiana ki'naatamoli sikai,
ragi waina e pei tea lawosokiana,
te naata e da mari palo ki nia mau,
16 kite sokari a mau. Ma nasaiana
maga eu pei tea noaana paki Abra-
ham, go paki naworana. Eda naga,
Go paki naworaworana mau, da-
pala e pe noa tea lapa, ma dapala e
pe noa sikai maau, Go paki nawora-
-17 ma, waina e pei Kristo. Ma a noa
tea waia ; Navasasokiana waina e
pea pei tea lawosokiana pae Supe,
nawotaeana, waina e umai natau
ponotia pati rualima takuna dolu
edaku ki nia, e da mari puoli ki nia
mau, naga ega mari nasaiana ega
18 vei tea iholi. Nalakena tea veani-
ana e pe vei tea ni nawotaeana, e
pe ta moro pei tea ni nasaiana mau:
ma Supe e dua fholi ki Abraham
asa pae nasaiana. Nalakena tea 19
wanogoe nawotaeana e pei nasava ?
E pei tea lawokiana sokari tea vea
nalakena natapiriana maga, pa pa
naworana ega*umai waina nasaiana
e pei tea saiana paki nia ; go e pei
tea tawanakiana pae agelo maga
doko namelearu ni tea vae nama-
wota sikai. Ma tea vae namawota 20
sikai e da pei tea vae namawota
sikai ni tea sikai maau mau ; ma
Supe e pei tea sikai maau. Nala- 21
kena tea wanogoe nawotaeana e pei
tea tipa nasaiana maga ki Supe
kite ? Ega ta dapala nogoe mau :
nalakena nawotaeana sikai e pe vei
tea vituakiana waina e mariatae
pakamauri, namarinaleoleanaana e
pe vei tea ni nawotaeana lomau.
Ma navasaana midiriana e kokoro 22
tea maga mamau puti etano ki na
marinaleosaana, naga nasaiana ki
nasaralomau-Yesu Kristo-ana ega
vei tea vituakiana paki tea maga
waina eu saralomau.
Ma ragi waina nasaralomauana 23
wanogoe e ko da umai mau, tu pei
tea vavaigoroana etano ki nawo-
taeana, tea kokoroana raki nasara-
lomauana waina ega edaku pei tea
noapakasakiana. Nalakena tea wa- 24
nogoe nawotaeana e pei tea viragi-
pasapiseiki anigida paki Kristo,
naga tuga vei tea marileanakiana
ki nasaralomauana. Ma ragi wai- 25
na nasaralomauana wanogoe e umai
sua, tu da moro doko etano ki tea
viragipasapiseiki sikai mau. Nala- 26
kena ku mamau puti pei Supe na
tuna maga pae nasaralomauana
doko Kristo Yesu. Nalakena tea 27
maga waina ku pei tea bapetizoana
paki Kristo ku suni Kristo. Tea ni 28
Yudea sikai e da doko ihaleoputo
kakada mau go tea ni Hellas mau,
naviti sikai e da doko mau go tea
dumana doko mau, naanoai sikai
go nagoroi sikai ero da doko mau :


nalakena nimu ku mamau puti pei
tea sikai maau doko Kristo Yesu.
29 Ma nimu ku pe vei tea ki Kristo, ku
pe vei naworawora ni Abraham
nalakena tea wanogoe, go tea veani-
pioli maga pae nasaiana.
Matele 4.
1 Ma a noa naga ragi varau wain a
tea veanipioli e pei piakiki, e da
pano pota te navatuna ki naviti
sikai mau, go e pei talakea ni tea
2 maga mamau puti; ma e doko
etano ki tea leo parati ki maga go
tasiga leo parati ki maga pa pa paki
naaleatia tatutakiana ki tamana.
3 Dapala nogoe nigida ma, ragi waina
tu pei piakiki maga, tu pei naviti
maga etano ki tea vea maga ni
4 maramana : ma ragi waina navaka-
vuroana ni ragi e umai, Supe e
dipakilua Natuna umai, e pakilina
melu nagoroi sikai, e pakilina etano
5 ki nawotaeana, naga ega taulua tea
maga waina eu doko etano ki nawo-
taeana, naga tuga tape navakasere-
-6 ana ni navei-natuna-ana. Go nala-
kena ku pei natuna maga, Supe e
dipakilua Naata ni Natuna umai
paki napopogida, e do pioso, Abba,
7 Mama. Nalakena tea wanogoe ku
da moro pei naviti sikai mau, ma ku
pei natuna sikai; ma ku pe vei na-
tuna sikai, go ku pe vei tea veani-
pioli sikai pae Supe.
8 Ma ragi wanogoe, wainaku da atae
Supe asa mau, ku pei naviti maga
ki tea maga waina eu da pei supe
9 maga pae navakdlinaana mau : ma
ragi waia waina ku atae Supe asa,
go parua ki nia, waina ku pei tea
ataeana asa pae Supe, ekasana
ku moro liliu paki tea vea maga
waina eu pei tea manainai go tea
tika, waina ku masauna naga kuga
10 moro pei naviti kakada pau ? Ku
do midoa ki parati ki naaleatia
maga, go atelagi maga, go ragi maga,
gonataumaga. Amataku nalo ka- 11
kamu, mase a pe wosiwosi-mawosa
moli paki mu.
A pavarani mu, tai maga, kuga 12
vei tea tapala au, nalakena kinau
ma a pei tea tapala mu. Ku da 13
maridagele paki nau te navatuna
mau: ma ku atae naga nalakena
namanainaiana sikai ni napokasi a
dogorogo ki narogorogoana wia paki
mu ragi vea ; go namaridogo-mu- 14
ana doko napokasigu ku da midoa-
kipalo ki nia mau, go ku da mama-
rago ki nia mau ; ma ku piragi au
dapala a pe vei agelo sikai ki Supe,
dapala ape vei Kristo Yesu. Go 15
namaropaana animu waina ku noa e
wai ? nalakena a manimu noasoki-
soki, naga, e pe vei tea mariatae-
ana, kupe asirilua namatamu maga
po dua au ara. Nalakena tea wa- 16
nogoe a po pei tea kokona ki mu, na
lakena a do noa ki mu nalomauana
kite ? Eu marisuisui paki mu da 17
pia mau ; ma eu masauna naga euga
kokoro mu pano naga kuga mari-
suisui paki da. Ma e pia naga kuga 18
vei tea marisuisuipakiana nalo nitea
wia sara ragi, go ega ta pei ragi
waina a doko sikoti mu sikina mau.
Piakirikiri aginau maga, waina a 19
moro pitinu ki mu pa pa Kristo ega
vei tea maridawanakiana doko mu,
ma a mariatae masauna naga aga 20
toko sikoti mu ragi waia, po doa na
daleogu ega vano pota ; nalakena a
midoakiputuaki nalo kakamu.
Kuga noa ki nau, nimu waina ku 21
masauna naga kuga toko etano ki
nawotaeana, ku da dogo nawotaeana
kite ? Nalakena e pei tea midiriana, 22
naga Abraham e peani natuna dua,
sikai e melu nagoroi atara suasua, go
sikai e melu nagoroi waina e du-
mana doko. Ma tea waina e melu 23
nagoroi atara suasua e pakilina
pae napokasi; ma tea waina e melu
nagoroi waina e dumana doko e
pakilina pae nasaiana. Naleomaga24


wanogoe tea pota sikai e pei tea
noaana ara ; nalakena nagoroi dua
wanogoe ero pei navasasokiana dua ;
sikai e inelu tava Sinai, e do pisola
ki natuna maga paki naveinavitiana,
25 nae e pei Hacar. Ma Hacar wano-
goe e pei tava Sinai ni Arabia, go e
lawodu pitata ma Yerusalem waina
e doko ragi waia: nalakena e pei
26 naviti nara ma natuna maga. Ma
Yerusalem ni elagi e dumana doko,
27 go nae e pei pilagida. Nalakena e
peiYca midiriana, e nag a.
Pa laelaea, tea difno waina ku da
pisola mau;
Pa mapua po pioso, waina ku da
dogo navitinuana ni navisola-
ana mau:
Nalakena natu maga ni tea ma-
sikina doko eu lapa liu tea ni
tea veani anawota.
28 Ma nigida, tai maga, dapala Isaak,
29 tu pei natu maga ni nasaiana. Ma
dapala waina e doko ragi wanogoe
tea waina e pakilina pae napokasi e
kopalele tea waina e pakilina pae
Naatana, e moro dapala nogoe ragi
30 waia. Ma navasaana midiriana e
noa nasava ? Pa tipakilua nagoroi
atara suasua go natuna : nalakena
natu ni nagoroi atara suasua ega ta
peanipioli sikoti natu ni nagoroi
31 waina e dumana doko mau. Na
lakena tea wanogoe, tai maga, tu
da pei natu maga ni nagoroi atara
suasua sikai mau, ma tu pei natu
maga ni nagoroi waina e dumana
doko.
Matele 5.
1 Kristo e peresi gida ki navere-
siana : nalakena tea wanogoe kuga
lawodu asa, po da pei tea soliana
mau ki nakau ni nanoa ni navei-
naviti-ana.
2 Kuga leo, kinau Paulo a noa ki
mu, naga, ku pe tape natovadavi-
viana, Kristo e pe wo da silae
mu te navatuna mau. Go a 3
moro noasokisoki kasua paki sara
naatamoli waina eu dape natova-
daviviana, naga e one ara one naga
euga mari nawotaeana mamau.
Ku pei tea maripuolikiana meludua 4
ki Kristo, nimu waina ku do pei tea
marileanakiana doko nawotaeana ;
ku dowo meludua ki nasaupiaana.
Nalakena kinami au do leogoro ki 5
Naatana naleogoroana ni namarina-
leoleanaana melu nasaralomauana.
Nalakena natoko-Kristo Yesu-ana 6
natovadaviviana e da mari te na
vatuna asa mau, go natikaana ni na
tovadaviviana mau; ma nasara-
lomauana waina e do posiwosi pae
nadodomiana. Ku pea do sava 7
pia ; sei e dugoro mu naga kuga ta
dogo parati ki nalomauana mau ?
Navasadieana wanogoe e da fnelu 8
tea waina e soso mu mau. Leven 9
kiki e levena ki taua mamau. Ki- 10
nau a saralomau kasua nalo kakamu
doko Nawota, naga kuga wo da
midoa kite navatuna pota mau:
ma tea waina e do durua ki mu ega
wo dapetape navasapotaeana, e pe
vei te naata. Ma kinau, tai maga, 11
a pe ko dogorogo ki natovadavivi-
ana, ekasana a ko pei tea kopalele-
ana 1 go tea tapilagonaana ni na
kau valadagoto e pe vei tea mari-
puolikiana. A masauna naga tea 12
maga waina eu mari mu ku duleana
pano euga tuinada daelua ra.
Nalakena nimu, tai maga, ku pei 13
tea sosoana raki naveresiana ; ma
kuga ta mari naveresi-mu-ana ega
magi napokasi pei tea vuatiana
sikai mau, ma kuga tumamu mani-
mu pei tea suasua maga pae na
dodomiana. Nalakena nawotaeana 14
mamau e pei tea vakavuroana doko
navasaana sikai maau, doko tea
waia; fa dodomi tea ni maladigi
ki-go ega tapala waina ku dumama
dodomi ko. Ma ku pe tumamu kati 15
mu po dumamu dinomi mu, kuga


vunusi naga kuga ta pei tea mari-
ana kuga manopu dumamu pae mu
mau.
16 Ma a naga, Kuga surata pae Na
atana, go kuga wo da pakavuro na
17 masauana ni napokasi mau. Nala-
kena napokasi e masau dipa Naata-
na, go Naatana e masau dipa napo-
kasi ; nalakena nara ero dumada
kokona ki da ; naga kuga ta mari
tea maga waina ku masauna naga
18 kuga mari ra mau. Ma ku pe vei
tea marakiana ki Naatana, ku pe ta
doko et'ano ki nawotaeana mau.
19 Ma nawosiana maga ni napokasi eu
dokolina, waina eu pei namaripele-
-20 ana, naloaana, namasausauana, na
lotu-ki-nasupe-ana, nawosidoaana,
nakokonaana maga, navileana, nato-
towokasuaana maga, namaritausu-
ana maga, namariputuakiana maga,
natapotaeana maga, tagona pota
21 maga, naroitoiana maga, namari-
punueana maga, namatamalokuana,
namaridarataraana maga, go tea ta-
pala nogoe maga : waina a pea noa
ku mu asa, dapala waina a pea noa
ki mu asa sala vea, naga tea maga
waina eu mari tea tapala nogoe
maga euga wo da peani namarakiana
22 ki Supe mau. Ma nawa ni Naatana
e peinadodomiana, nalaelaeaana, na
tamateana, naveimaritasokiparau-
ana, navakaleana, nawiaana, na
23 saralomauana, namatemateana, na
tumanasokiana : nawotaeana waina
e dipagoro tea tapala nogoe maga e
24 da doko mau. Go tea maga waina
eu pei tea ki Kristo Yesu eu turi na
pokasi nakau valadagoto go narogo-
ana kakana maga go namasauana
kakana maga.
25 Tu pe mauri ki Naatana, go tuga
26 surata pae Naatana. Tuga ta pei
tea samasama palo mau, doko du-
magida soso lua gida, doko durna-
gida doitoi gida mau.
Matele 6.
Tai maga, naatamoli sikai e pe vei 1
tea vea puasokiana te natapiriana
sikai, nimu waina ku pei tea ni Na
atana, kuga moro piragi tea tapala
nogoe ega liliu doko Naatana ni na
matemateana; doko do dumama
punusi ko, naga nigo ma pa ta pei
tea maridogoana mau. Kuga tu- 2
mamu manimu dapetape natape-
tapeana animu maga, go kuga vaka-
vuro ega tapala nogoe nawotaeana ki
Kristo. Nalakena te naata sikai e 3
pe tumana midoa ki nia naga e pei
te navatuna, ragi waina e pei tea
fnoli, epe tumana soro e. Ma sara 4
naatamoli euga sikasikai maridogo
nawosiana adeada, go ragi wanogoe
euga wo dumada peani tea vaka-
vakaeana nalo kakada sikida, go
euga ta peani a nalo ni tea pota mau.
Nalakena sara naatamoli euga wo 6
sikasikai dapetape natapetapeana
adeada.
Ma tea waina e pei tea vasapiseiki- 6
ana navasaana ega tua tea waina e
pasapisei ki nia namagovai ni naleo
wia aneana maga mamau puti.
Kuga ta midoakipele mau; Supe e 7
da pei tea marisaudoakiana mau:
nalakena tea waina naatamoli sikai
e pe sapura ki nia, tea wanogoe e pe
wo tagaukotovi a. Nalakena tea 8
waina e do sapuraki pakinapokasina
ega wo tagaukotovi fnelu napokasi
namesoana ; ma tea waina e do
sapuraki paki Naatana ega wo
tagaukotovi melu Naatana namau-
riana waina edu mau du. Ma tuga 9
ta pei tea popotoro mari tea wia
mau: nalakena tu pe ta dodosua
mau, tu pe wo dagaukotovi ragi ka-
kana. Nalakena tea wanogoe, da- 10
pala wana tu peani ragi tuga to
mari tea waina e pia paki tea
maga mamau puti, go ega warua
liu paki tea maga waina eu pei tea
ni nasaralomauana.


11 Kuga vunusi litera warua maga
waina a midiri paki mu ara ki na
12 melearugu. Tea maga waina eu
masauna naga euga man naveirae-
wiaana nalo ni napokasi, eu do
maridie mu naga kuga vei tea tova-
daviviana ; nalakena tea sikai maau
naga euga ta pei tea kopaleleana
mau nalakena nakau valadagoto ki
13 Kristo. Nalakena tea maga waina
eu do pei tea tovadaviviana nara
eu da pavaigoro nawotaeana mau ;
ma eu masauna naga nimu kuga vei
tea tovadaviviana, naga euga vaka-
-14 vakae nalo ni napokasimu. Ma ega
ta pakilina ki nau mau naga aga
vakavakae, ma aga vakavakae nalo
ni nakau valadagoto ki Nawota ani-.
gida Yesu Kristo ega sikina, waina
maramana e pei tea turiana nakau
valadagoto pae asa paki nau, go
kinau paki maramana. Nalakena 15
natovadaviviana e da pei te nava-
tuna mau, go natikaana ni natova-
daviviana mau, ma tea tawanakiana
vau. Go tea maga waina euga wo 16
surata pae totowo wanogoe, nata-
mateana ega toko ara, go nadodomi-
ana, go eroga toko Israel ki Supe.
Te naata ega ta mari navitinuana 17
paki nau mau pae ragi waia pa pa ;
nalakena kinau a do pilake wotu
maga ki Yesu doko napatokogu.
Nasaupiaana ki Nawota anigida 18
Yesu Kristo ega sikoti naatamu, tai
maga. Amen.
APOSTOLO
1 Paulo, Apostolo sikai ki Kristo
Yesu pae namasauana ki Supe, a
midiri paki tea tautau maga waina eu
doko Efeso, go paki tea saralomau
maga waina eu doko Kristo Yesu:
2 Nasaupiaana ega vei animu go nata-
fnateana melu Supe Tamagida go
Nawota Yesu Kristo.
3 Supe go Tama ni Nawota anigida
Yesu Kristo ega vei tea vasapia-
kiana, waina e pasapia ki gida ki
sara navasapiakiana ki Naatana
doko tokora maga ni nakoroatelagi
doko Kristo : dapala waina e mata- 4
doa gida doko asa pea ki nanadiki-
laketano-ana ni maramana, naga tuga
vei tea tautau go tea mamaau narae-
na doko nadodomiana : e pea da- 5
wana ki gida paki navakasereana ni
navei-natuna-ana pae Yesu Kristo
duinana paki nia, pae namidoaki-
inatakiana ni namasauana aneana,
paki nasamasamaniana ni nasama- 6
samaana ni nasaupiaana aneana,
waina e saupia ki gida asa doko Tea
Dodomiana : waina tu peani natau- 7
luaana asa pae nadaana, namidoa-
kikorokoroana ni natapiriana own/icto
TEA M EFESO MAGA


maga, pae nasogolapaana ni nasau-
-8 piaana aneana, waina e mari a e
parua liu paki gida doko sara na
manumatuaana go sara namidoaki-
-9 ataeana, e mari gida tu atae paia
m namasauana aneana, pae nami-
doakimatakiana aneana waina e

paratikiana sikai ni navakavuroana
ni ragi maga, naga ega saisai ki naleo
maga mamau puti doko Kristo, naleo

maga, go naleo maga waina eu doko

pei tea mariana tu pei tea veani-

asa, ragi waina ku dogo navasaana

ni namautipauri-mu-ana—waina,

14 nasaiana, Tea Tapu, waina e pei na-
nadisokiana nitea veaniana anigida,
raki natauluaana ni tea veaniana ta
luaana aneana, paki nasamasamani-
ana ni nasamasamaana aneana.
15 Nalakena tea wanogoe kinau ma,
ragi waina a dogo nasaralomauana
waina e doko maleoputo kakamu
doko Nawota Yesu, go nadodomiana
16 paki tea tautau maga mamau puti, a
da makoto ki navasadodomatakiana
nalakena nimu mau, a do marina
midoakinoa-mu-ana doko natapasa-
-17 vasaana aginau maga ; naga
Supe ki Nawota anigida Yesu
Kristo, Tama ni nasamasamaana,
ega tua mu Naatana ni namanu-
matuaana go ni nanoapakasaki-
ana doko naataemataki-nia-ana;
18 namata maga ni napopomu euga vei
tea maramalagatiana, naga kuga
atae naleogoroana ni nasosoana
aneana e pei nasava, go nasogolapa-
ana ni nasamasamaana ni tea vea-
niana aneana nalo ni tea tau-
tau maga e pei nasava, go nawarua- 19
ana warua liu ni nakasuaana aneana
paki gida waina tu saralomau e pei
nasava, pae nawosiwosiana ni na
maridagaragaraana ni nakasuaana
aneana, waina e posiwosi ki nia doko 20
Kristo ragi waina e sike a e duleana
meludua ki tea mate maga, po mari
a e dasake pisari namelearuna ni
matua tokora maga ni nakoroatelagi,
pakilagi dapau sara namarakiana go 21
sara naveinawotaana go sara na
kasuaana go sara naveinavarapule-
ana, go sara nagisa waina e pei
tea noaana, waina eu doko mara-
mana waia e da masikina mau, ma
waina eu doko maramana waina ega
wo umai: go e mari naleo maga 22
mamau puti eu doko etano ki na
fnelena maga, po pitua ki nia e pei
napau dapau naleo maga mamau
puti paki ekkalesia, waina e pei na 23
patokona, tea vakavuroana ki tea
waina e do pakavuro naleo maga
mamau puti ki naleo maga mamau
puti.
Matele 2.
Go e pahamauri Jd mu, ragi waina 1
ku pei tea mate ki natapiriana ani-
mu maga go ki namarinaleosaana
animu maga, waina ku surata doko 2
ara sala vea pae natomariana ni
maramana waia, pae tea maraki
ni nakasuaana ni namalopa, ni na
atana waina e do posiwosi ragi waia
doko narogopiriana natuna maga;
go nigida maga tu mamau puti 3
mauri doko maleoputo kakada sala
vea doko namasauana sa maga ni
napokasigida, tu do mari namasau-
ana maga ni napokasi go ni nami-
dodoana maga, go tu pei namaetoana


natuna maga pae navakilinaana,
4 dakiusi tea pota maga : —ma Supe,
waina e pei sogolapa nalo ni nado-
domiana, nalakena nadodomiana
warua aneana waina e dodomi gida
5 asa, go ragi waina nigida tu pei tea
mate ki natapiriana anigida maga, e
pakamauri ki gida sikoti Kristo (ku
pei tea mautipauriana ki nasaupia-
-6 ana), po sike gida tu duleana sikoti
a, po mari gida tu dasake sikoti
a doko tokora maga ni nakoroate-
-7 lagi, doko Kristo Yesu: naga ega
visei ki nasogolapaana warua
liu ni nasaupiaana aneana ragi
varau maga waina euga wo umai
doko navakaleana paki gida doko
8 Kristo Yesu : nalakena ku pei tea
mautipauriana ki nasaupiaana pae
nasaralomauana ; go tea wanogoe
e da rnelu mu mau : e pei navitua-
-9 molikiana ki Supe : e da melu na
wosiana maga mau, naga te naata
10 sikai ega ta pakavakae mau. Na
lakena tu pei tea mariana aneana,
tea tawanakiana doko Kristo Yesu
raid nawosiana wia maga, waina
Supe e pea marimata ki da naga
tuga surata pae ara.
11 Nalakena tea wanogoe kuga midoa
ki nia, naga sala vea nimu,. tea ni
nalauna pota maga nalo ni napokasi,
waina eu pei tea sosoana ki Tea tika
natovadavivianapae tea maga waina
eu pei tea sosoana ki Tea tovada-
viviana, nalo ni napokasi, tea mari-
-12 ana ki namelearu maga ; naga ragi
wanogoe ku doko masale ki Kristo,
ku pei tea vanopota maga paki na
launa ni Israel, go namenaki maga
paki navasasokiana maga ni nasai-
ana, ku da peani te naleogoroana
mau go ku pei tea tika ki Supe doko
13 maramana. Ma ragi waia doko
Kristo Yesu nimu waina ku madu
uvea sala vea ku pei tea mariana ku
pei maladigi doko nada ni Kristo.
14 Nalakena nae e pei natainateana
anigida, waina e mari sokata ki gida
toro pei tea sikai maau, go e porae
lua napukoro ni namawota, e mari- 15
puoli doko napokasina ki nakoko-
naana, nawotaeana ni natipakiana
maga doko natawanakiana maga;
naga ega maridawana ki tea
rua doko asa eroga vei naatamoli
vau sikai maau, po mari natamate-
ana ; go naga ega mari sokata kida 16
doko napatoko sikai maau eroga
moro pei popo wia paki Supe pae
nakau valadagoto, e maripunue na
kokonaana asa : go e umai po dogo- 17
rogo ki natainateana paki mu waina
ku madu uvea, go ki natainateana
paki tea maga waina eu pei mala-
digi: nalakena toro dua peani na 18
viragiana pae asa doko Naatana
sikai maau paki Tamana. Nala-19
kena tea ku da moro pei
namenaki maga go namenaki-ata-
toko maga mau, ma ku pei tea ni
natokoana sikoti tea tautau maga,
go tea ni nasuina ki Supe, tea tava- 20
giana doko laketano ni apostolo
maga go profeta maga, Kristo Yesu
nae e pei vatu laketano warua ni
naweloki; waina natavagiana ma- 21
mau, tea tasokatakiinatakiana doko
asa, e do disu paki naveinasuma-
tapu-ana doko Nawota ; waina ni- 22
mu ma ku pei tea saisaidavagiana
doko asa, naga kuga vei nasufna-
tokoana sikai ki Supe doko Naatana.
Matele 3.
Nalakena tea wanogoe kinau 1
Paulo, tea soliana ki Kristo Yesu
manimu tea ni nalauna pota maga,
• —ku pe rogo lomau ki naleoparati- 2
kiana ni nasaupiaana ki Supe waina
e pei tea vituakiana paki nau raki
mu; naga paia e pei tea mariana e 3
pei tea ataeana paki nau pae nanoa-
pakasakiana, dapala waina a pea
midiri a ki navasaana vuru, waina 4
ragi waina kuga veve a kuga wo
mariatae pae asa midoakipunusi


namidoakiataeana aginau doko paia
5 ki Kristo ; waina e da pei tea mari-
ana e pei tea ataeana paki naatamoli
natuda maga tagona pota maga mau,
dapala waina e pei tea noapakasa-
kiana ragi waia paki apostolo tautaU
aneana maga go profeta maga pae
6 Naatana; naga tea ni nalauna
pota maga eu pei tea mamau peani,
go tea mamau pei tea ni napatokona,
go tea mamau pei tea veanipotae
nasaiana doko Kristo Yesu pae na

mariana a pei tea suasua sikai ka-
kana,paenavituamolikiananinasau-
piaana ki Supe waina e pei tea vitua-
kiana paki nau pae nawosiwosiana
Bni nakasuaana aneana. Nasaupia-
ana wanogoe e pei tea vituakiana
paki nau, waina a pei tea kiki ni tea
kiki sa ni tea tautau maga mamau
puti, naga aga rogorogo paki tea ni na
launa pota maga ki nasogolapaana
9 usisapoana ki Kristo ; go naga aga
mari tea maga mamau puti euga
vunusi naleoparatikiana ni paia e
pei nasava waina e pei tea tasuru-
kiana pae ragi varau maga pa pa
doko Supe waina e dawana ki naleo

matuaana visarasara ki Supe ega

ana ragi waia pae ekkalesia paki
tea maraki maga go tea kasua maga

namidoakisokiana waina e du mau
du waina e mari a doko Kristo Yesu
12 Nawota anigida : waina tu peani
naviviariana asa go navaki-maladigi
ana doko navavatuana pae nasara-
-13 lomau - asa - ana. Nalakena tea
wanogoe a pavarani mu naga kuga ta
pei tea popotoro mau nalo ni narie-
