eu pei nasamasamaana aniriiu.
14 Nalakena tea wanogoe a ditipatua
15 paki Tamagida, waina sara nawora-
wora waina eu doko nakoroatelagi go
waina eu doko maramana eu pei tea
salagisaana inelu asa, naga ega tua 16
mu, ega vae nasogolapaana ni na
samasamaana aneana, naga kuga
vei tea mariana kuga tagaragara ki
nakasuaana pae Naatana aneana
paki naatamoli ni napalaumu ; naga 17
Kristo ega toko napopomu doko pas
nasaralomauana ; naga, ragi waina
kuga vei tea koakoa go tea laketano-
Mana doko nadodomiana, kuga 18
kasukasua naga kuga midoakiatae
sikoti tea tautau maga mamau puti
naweleweleana e pei nasava go na
varauana go navakilagiana go na
vakipuaana, go naga kuga atae nado- 19
domiana ki Kristo waina e parua liu
naataeana, naga kuga vei tea vaka-
vuroana pa pa paki navakavuroana
mamau ki Supe.
Ma agi tea waina e mariatae mari 20
parua liu naleo maga mamau puti
paruparua liu tea maga waina tu
datago ara kite waina tu midoa ki
da, pae nakasuana waina e do posi-
wosi napalaugida, nasamasamaana 21
ega vei aneana doko ekkalesia go
doko Kristo Yesu pa pa paki tagona
maga mamau puti pa pa ega tu du
po du mau du. Amen.
Matele 4.
Nalakena tea wanogoe kinau, tea 1
soliana doko Nawota, a pasa parati
ki mu naga kuga surata ega tapala
waina e pataka ni nasosoana waina
kupei tea sosoana asa, egavilake sara 2
naveipopovakitanoana go na ma-
temateana, pilake naveimaritasoki-
parauana, doko do dumamu soki mu
doko nadodomiana ; doko do mare- 3
kareka naga kuga vavaigoro navei-
tea-sikai-maau-ana ni Naatana doko
natali ni natamateana. Napatoko 4
sikai maau e doko, go Naatana sikai-
maau, dapala waina ku pei tea soso-
ana doko naleogoroana sikai maau ni
nasoso-mu-ana ; Nawota sikai maau, 5
nasaralomauana sikai maau, nabape-


6 tizoana sikai maau, Supe sikai maau
go Tama ni tea maga mamau puti,
waina e dapau tea maga mamau
puti, po pakapule tea maga mamau
puti, po doko tea maga mamau puti.
7 Ma nasaupiana e pei tea vituakiana
paki sara naata kakagida sikasikai
pae totowo ni navituamolikiana ki
8 Kristo. Nalakena tea wanogoe e
naga,
Ragi waina e sake paki tokora ni
elagi, e piragiluapavakoto tea
vuapavakotoana maga,
Po dua naatamoli maga navitua-
ana maga.
9 (Ma tea wanogoe, E sake, e pei
nasava ma naga e pea siwo paki
tokora maga ni etano ni maramana ?
10 Tea waina e siwo nae e pei tea waina
e sake pakilagi liu nakoroatolagi
maga mamau puti, naga ega vaka-
-11 vuronaleo maga mamau puti). Go
nae e pitua kite seara eu pei apostolo
maga, go te seara eu pei profeta
maga, go te seara eu pei tea rogorogo
maga ki narogorogoana wia, go te
seara eu pei tea leo parati ki maga
12 go tea vasapiseiki maga ; raki na
maripialuaana ni tea tautau maga,
paki nawosiana ni nasuasuaana,
paki natavagiana ni napatoko ni
13 Kristo : pa pa tuga mamau puti pa
parati ki naveitea-sikai-maau-ana ni
nasaralomauana, go ni naataeinata-
kiana ni Supe Natuna, paki navei-
naatamoli-matua-ana, paki totowo
ni navarauana ni navakavuroana ki
14 Kristo : naga tuga ta moro pei pipia
maga mau, tea salesaleakiana dapala
napeao mkga go tea tapetapeana
pasara ki sara nalagi ni navasapisei-
kiana, doko namarisoreana ki na
atamoli maga, doko namarimanu-
matuaana, pae namidoakipaiana ni
15 namidoakipeleana ; ma tuga vei tea
mari lomau doko nadodomiana, po
do disu atumakilavulavu paki nia
nalo ni naleo maga mamau puti,
waina e pei napaugida, Kristo;
waina melu asa napatokona mamau ]6
tea tasokatakimatakiana go tea
marisaisaikiana pae tea waina sara
kolopu eu pitua ki nia, pae na
wosiwosiana doko totowo ni sara
tokora sikasikai hakana, e do mari
narisuatuinakilavulavuana ni napa-
tokona paki natumanatavagi-a-ana
doko nadodomiana.
Nalakena tea wanogoe a noa tea 17
waia, po noasokisoki kasua ki nia
doko Nawota, naga nimu kuga ta
moro surata dapala waina tea ni na
launa pota maga eu do surata, na
paloana ni namidodoana adeada, eu 18
maligo nalo ni namidoakiataeana
adeada, tea vanopota maga paki
namauriana ki Supe nalakena na
salupeana waina e doko ara, na
lakena nakasuaana ni napopoda;
waina eu pei mataku dika po 19
dufnada pitua ki da paki namasau-
sauana, naga euga wosiwosi ki sara
naloaana pilake namatamaguraana.
Ma nimu ku da ataedogo Kristo da- 20
pala nogoe mau ; ku pe rogo e lomau, 21
po pei tea vasapiseikiana doko asa,
dapala tea waina e pei nalomauana
doko Yesu ; naga nimu nalo ni na 22
tomariana vea animu, kuga toropusi
naatamoli tuai, waina e do meso pae
namasauana sa maga ni nasurueana ;
go naga kuga vei tea maripaukiana 23
ki Naatana ni namidodoana animu,
po suni naatamoli vau, waina e pei 24
tea tawanakiana pae Supe doko na
marinaleoleanaana go natautauana
ni nalomauana.
Nalakena tea wanogoe, kuga toro- 25
pusi nasorosoroana, go kuga vasa
nalomauana, sara naata sikasikai
paki tea ni maladigi ki da: nala-
kena tu duinagida pei naleo kaka-
gida maga. Kuga maeto, po da 26
mari naleo sa mau : elo ega ta musu
goro namaritausuana animu mau ;
go kuga ta pitua ki tokora paki 27
diabolo mau. Tea waina e panako 28
ega ta moro panako mau : ma e pia


naga ega wosiwosi-mawosa, doko do
posiwosi ki nainelearuna maga tea
waina e pia, naga ega veani naga ega
29 vitua dua tea waina e dika. Te na
vasaana sa sikai ega ta melu nawo-
kamu man, ma tea waina e pia raki
natavagiana ni tea waina e dika,
naga ega vitua ki nasaupiaana paki
30 tea maga waina eu dogo. Go kuga
ta mari Naatana Tapu ni Supe ega
susue man, waina ku pei tea vulu-
sokiana asa raki naaleatia ni natau-
31 luaana. Sara nakokonaana, go sara
namaritausuana, go sara namaeto-
ana, go sara navasaparaiana, go
sara navasasakiana, euga vei tea
toropusiana fneludua ki mu pano,
32 go sara navilosiana : ma kuga vei
tea vakale dumamu paki mu, tea
vei maritadodomi, doko do dumamu
manimu midoakikorokoro, ega ta-
kiusi waina Supe doko Kristo e
manimu midoakikorokoro.
Matele 5.
1 Nalakena tea wanogoe kuga vei
tea marioli Supe, ega tapala natuna
2 dodomiana maga ; go kuga surata
nadodomiana, ega takiusi waina
Kristo ma e dodomi mu, po mani-
gida dufnana pitua ki nia oli gida,
navituaana sikai go naviriana sikai
paki Supe naga ega vei napo ni na
3 loloana sikai. Ma namaripeleana,
go sara naloaana, kite namatama-
guraana, ega ta pei tea noaana
maleoputo kakamu mau, ega takiusi
waina e pataka ni tea tautau maga ;
4 go tea ni namaliereana, go navasa-
olilalaana, kite navasakalakalaana,
waina eu da patakamu mau : ma
5 ega vei navasadodomatakiana. Na
lakena ku atae mata ki tea waia,
naga te naata sikai waina e maripele,
kite waina e da dautau mau, kite
waina e matafnagura, waina e pei
tea lotu ki nasupe maga, e da peani
te tea veaniana sikai naxnaraki-
ana ki Kristo go ki Supe mau. Te 6
naata sikai ega ta vilasurue mu ki
naavasaana palo maga mau : nala-
kena tea maga wanogoe eu pei nala-
kena namaetoana ki Supe e umai
paki narogopiriana natuna maga.
Nalakena tea wanogoe kuga ta pei 7
tea veanipotae sikoti ra mau; na- 8
lakena sala vea ku pei namaligo,
ma ragi waia ku pei namarama
doko Nawota; kuga to surata da-
pala namarama natuna maga (nala- 9
kena nawa ni namarama e doko sara
nawiaana go sara namarinaleolea-
naana go sara nalomauana), doko do 10
maridogo tea waina e pei tea midoa-
kimatakiana ki Nawota ; go kuga 11
ta mamau saisaipeani nawosiana
oro maga ni namaligo mau, ma kuga
vasa kasua ki da; nalakena naleo 12
maga waina eu pei tea mariana pae
ara doko loku nanoa-ra-ana e pei
tea malierekiana. Ma naleo maga 13
mamau puti ragi waina eu pei tea
vasakasuakiana eu pei tea mariana
eu doko lina pae namarama ; nala-
kena sara naleo waina eu pei tea
mariana eu dokolina eu pei nama-
rama. Nalakena tea wanogoe e naga, 14
Pa tarapa, tea maturu, go pa tuleana
fneludua ki tea mate maga, go
Kristo ega wo maramalagati ko.
Nalakena tea wanogoe kuga vu- 15
nusi mata ki nia dapala waina ku do
surata, ega ta dapala tea manu-
matavusa maga mau, ma ega tapala
tea manumatua maga ; doko do 16
daulua ragi, nalakena naaleatia
maga eu sa. Nalakena tea wanogoe 17
kuga ta pei tea midoakisapo mau,
ma kuga midoakiatae namasauana
ki Nawota e pei nasava. Go kuga 18
ta matamaloku ki waine mau, waina
namaridarataraana e doko asa, ma
kuga vei tea vakavuroana ki Na
atana ; doko do dumamu pasa ki 19
mu ki salamo maga go liumno maga
go nalegaana maga ki Naatana,
doko do lega po do mari nalegaana


20 napopomu ki Nawota; doko do
pasadodomata ki Supe, Tama, sara
ragi nalakena naleo maga mamau
puti doko nagisa ni Nawota anigida
21 Yesu Kristo ; po do doko etano
dufnamu paki mu doko namatau-
ki-Kristo-ana.
22 Nagoroi maga, kuga toko etano
paki naanoai animu maga, ega
23 tapala waina epe vaki Nawota. Na
lakena naanoai e pei napau ni na
goroi, dapala waina Kristo e pei
napau ni ekkalesia, go nae e pei
24 tea mautipauri napatokona. Ma
dapala waina ekkalesia e doko etano
paki Kristo, dapala nogoe nagoroi
maga euga toko etano paki naanoai
adeada maga nalo ni sara naleo.
25 Naanoai maga, kuga dodomi na
goroi animu maga, ega tapala waina
Kristo e dodomi ekkalesia, po mane-
-26 ana dumana pitua ki nia ; naga ega
tapugoro e, po mari a ega tautau ki
nasarueana ni noai pae navasaana,
27 naga ega tumana mari ekkalesia ega
lawodu naraena ega vei tea sama-
samaniana, ega ta pilake te naloa-
ana kite te nasakurukuruana kite te
navatuna tapala nogoe mau; ma
naga ega vei tea tautau go tea ma-
-28 maau. Dapala nogoe e one naanoai
maga one naga euga dodomi nagoroi
adeada maga ega tapala waina eu
dodomi napatokoda. Tea waina e
dodomi anagoroi e dumana dodomi
29 a : nalakena te naata e da pilosi na
pokasina te ragi mau ; ma e do pa-
kale a po kulugoro e, dakiusi waina
30 Kristo e do pakale ekkalesia. Nala-
kena tu pei naleo maga ni napato-
-31 kona. Nalakena tea wanogoe na
atamoli sikai ega toropusi tamana
go pilana, go ega vuluti anagoroi;
go nara dua eroga wo pei napokasi
32 sikai maau. Paia wanogoe e pa-
rua ; ma kinau a noa e nalo ni
33 Kristo go nalo ni ekkalesia. Ma
nimu sara naata kakamu euga sika-
sikai dodomi nagoroi adeada ega
tapala waina eu dumada dodomi ra ;
go nagoroi naga ega matau Id ana-
wota.
Matele 6.
Natu maga, kuga rogo parati Id 1
nadaleo ni tea matua animu maga
doko Nawota: nalakena tea wa-
nogoe. e leana. Pa dodomadagani 2
tamama go pilarna (tea wanogoe
e pei natipakiana vea waina e pilake
nasaiana), naga pa wia doko, go 3
naga pa mauri doko parau doko
maramana. Go tama maga kuga 4
ta mari natumu maga euga maeto
man : ma kuga vakalepisei ki da
doko navasapiseikiana go natapa-
vanauana ki Nawota.
Tea suasua maga, kuga rogo parati 5
ki nadaleo ni tea maga waina eu pei
nawota animu nalo ni napatokomu,
ega vilake namatakuana go naruru-
ruruana, doko nasikaimaauana ni
napopomu, ega tapala ku pe magi
Kristo mari a ; ega ta pae nasuasua- 6
ana ni namata mau, dapala tea mari
namasauana ki naatamoli maga, ma
kuga tapala tea suasua maga ki
Kristo, doko do mari namasauana
ki Supe melu naatamu ; doko do 7
dakaraka suasua, ega tapala ku pe
magi Nawota suasua, po da magi na
atamoli maga suasua mau : ku atae 8
naga tea wia waina sara naata sika-
sikai eu pe mari a, tea wanogoe eu
pe wo dape a ki Nawota, eu pe vei
naviti maga kite eu pe vei tea
tumada doko. Go nawota maga 9
kuga mari tea sikai maau maga wa-
nagoe paki da, go kuga toropusi na
vasadipakotoviana : ku atae naga
Nawota adeada ma animu e doko
nakoroatelagi, go naviraginaraeana
e da doko sikoti a mau.
Tea edaku, kuga vei tea mariana 10
kuga kasua doko Nawota, go doko
namaridagaragaraana ni nakasuaana
aneana. Kuga suni puluma Id na 11


likau maga ki Supe, naga kuga mari-
atae lawodu dipa namidoakipaiana
12 maga ki diabolo. Nalakena napau-
ana anigida e da dipa napokasi go
nada mau, ma e dipa namarakiana
maga,,dipa naveinawotaana maga,
dipa tea maraki maga ni namaligo
ni maramana waia, dipa taua maga
ni naatana sa maga tokora maga ni
13 nakoroatelagi. Nalakena tea wa-
nogoe kuga tape dakati puluma ki
nalikau maga ki Supe, naga kuga
mariatae lawodugoro naaleatia sa,
go naga kuga mari sua tea maga
14 mamau puti, po lawodu. Nalakena
tea wanogoe kuga lawodu, doko ta-
soki sua namalomu ki nalomauana,
po suni sua kororuma ni namarina-
-15 leoleanaana, po pasi sua narnele-
vasiana ni namarimatakiana ni
narogorogoana wia ni natamateana ;
16 doko tape dakati sua sokari tea maga
mamau puti nakokoro ni nasaralo-
mauana, waina kuga wo mariatae
maripunue puti natipa waina eU
17 soro ki tea sigisigileo asa. Go kuga
tape kalupau ni vatu ni namauti-
pauriana, go lova ki Naatana, waina
18 e pei navasaana ki Supe : doko do
dapasavasa sara ragi pae sara nata-
pasavasaana go sara navavaraniana
doko Naatana, po do leleogoro paid
asa doko sara nanoadalikiana go
sara navavaraniana nalo ni tea tau-
tau maga mamau puti, go maginau, 19
naga navasaana ega vei tea vitua-
kiana paki nau ragi waina aga vasa,
naga aga viviari dogorogo Id paia
ni narogorogoana wia, waina a mane- 20
ana pei tea tautauana sikai doko
namori ni vatu; naga aga viviari
pasa asa, ega tapala waina e one
au one naga aga vasa.
Ma naga nimu kuga atae naleo 21
aginau maga, dapala waina a doko,
Tukiko, taigida dodomiana go
minister lomau doko Nawota, ega
wo noakisai mu tea maga mamau
puti: waina a dipakilua e paloti 22
punusi mu nalakena tea waia, naga
kuga atae naleo maga nalo kaka-
gami, go naga ega vasapakavakale
napopomu.
Natamateana ega vei agi taigida 23
maga, go nadodomiana pilake na
saralomauana, melu Supe Tamana
go Nawota Yesu Kristo. Nasau- 24
piaana ega sikoti tea maga mamau
puti waina eu dodomi Nawota
anigida Yesu Kristo doko na
madadasapoana.
EPISTOLE KI PAULO APOSTOLO
TEA NI FILIPPOI MAGA.
Matele 1.
1 Paulo goTimotlieo,tca suasuamaga
ki Kristo Yesu, aro midiri paki tea
tautau maga namau puti doko
Kristo Yesu waina eu doko Filippoi,
nguna-tongoan n.t.
nara ma tea leo parati ki maga go
diakono maga : nasaupiaana ega 2
vei animu go natamateana melu
Supe Tamagida go Nawota Yesu
Kristo.
A pasadodoniata ki Supe aginau 3


doko namidoaki-mu-ana mamauagi-
-4 nau, sara ragi doko sara navavara-
niana aginau manimu mamau puti
a do mari navavaraniana aginau
5 pilake nalaelaeaana, nalakena na
saisaipeaniana animu paki narogo-
rogoana wia pae naaleatia vea pa
6pa paki ragi waia ; a saralomau
kasua ki tea waia, naga tea waina
e atulake mari nawosiana wia doko
mu ega wo marisua e pa pa paki
7 naaleatia ki Yesu Kristo : dakiusi
waina e leana ki nau naga aga
manimu mamau puti midoa ki
tea wanogoe, nalakena a pilake
mu doko napopogu, go ku mamau
puti pei tea saisaipeani sikoti au
nasaupiaana, doko natali solisoli
aginau maga, go doko navasakoro-
koroana go nalawosokiana ni na-
-8 rogorogoana wia. Nalakena Supe e
pei tea noasokisoki aginau, dapala
waina a do dodomi parua ki mu
maga mamau puti doko namarita-
-9 dodomiana ki Kristo Yesu. Go
a do dapasavasa tea waia, naga
nadodomiana animu ega to disu
po parua po paruparua doko na
ataeinatakiana go sara namidoaki-
-10 ataeana ; naga kuga ' maridogo
naleo maga waina eu pia lua ; naga
kuga vei lomau go tea ta dapila-
gona mau pa pa paki naaleatia ki
11 Kristo ; doko pei tea vakavuroana
ki nawa ni namarinaleoleanaana,
waina e pae Yesu Kristo paki na
samasamaana ki Supe go nasama-
samani-a-ana.
12 Ma a masauna naga nimu kuga
atae, tai maga, naga naleo maga
waina eu pahilina ki nau eu rumai
raki narisuaki-parua-kiana ni na
13 rogorogoana wia ; dapala waina na
tali solisoli aginau maga eu pei tea
mariana eu dokolina doko Kristo
usuraki pretorio mamau, go ki tea
14 pota maga mamau puti; go waina
taigida maga tea lapa kakada doko
Nawota eu pavatu pae natali soli-
soli aginau maga, po piviari paru-
parua naga euga vasa navasaana ki
Supe po da mataku mau. Te naata 15
seara eu dogorogo ki Kristo nala-
kena nadoitoiana go navileana
lomau ; go te naata seara nalakena
namidoakimatakiana ; Te seara eu 16
mari a fnelu nadodomiana, doko
atae naga a pei tea lawokiana raki
navasakorokoroana ni narogorogo-
ana wia; ma te seara eu dogorogo 17
ki Kristo melu namariputuakiana,
eu da pei lomau asa mau, eu midoa
ki nia naga euga sike nariesokiana
ega sokari natali sulisuli aginau
maga. Nasava nalakena tea wano- 18
goe ? ma pae sara vatuna, e pe
vae nakokoiokiana kite e pe vae
nalomauana, Kristo e pei tea rogo-
rogokiana ; go a laelaea tea wano-
goe, ioro, go aga wo laelaea. Nala- 19
kena a atae naga tea wanogoe ega
wo maginau pei namautipauriana,
pae navavaraniana animu go navi-
tuakiana ni Naata ni Yesu Kristo,
pae naleogoroana go navavatu- 20
ana aginau, naga aga ta pei tea
mariana aga maliere nalo ni te
navatuna mau, ma naga doko sara
naviviariana, dapala sara ragi, go
ragi waia Kristo ega wo pei tea sama-
samaniana nalo ni napatokogu, e pe
vae namauriana kite e pe vae na-
mateana. Nalakena nalo kakagu 21
naga aga mauri e pei Kristo, go naga
aga mate e pei nataluaana. Ma 22
naga aga mauri doko napokasi,—
tea wanogoe e pe maginau pei nawa
ni nawosiana aginau, go tea waina
aga matadoa e a pe ta atae a mau.
Ma a doko napalaasa ni tea rua, 23
doko do peani namasauana paki na
meluana go natoko-sikoti-Kristo-
ana; nalakena tea wanogoe e pia
parua liu : ma naga aga toko na 24
pokasi doko e pei tea waina e one
au one parua nalakena nimu. Go 25
nalakena a saralomau kasua ki tea
wanogoe, a atae naga aga wo doko,


go naga aga wo doko sikoti puti mu
doko, raki narisuaki-mu-ana, go na
26 laelaeaana ni nasaralomauana; naga
tea vakavakaeana animu ega warua
liu doko Kristo Yesu doko au pae
na-moro-doko-sikoti-mu-ana aginau.
27 Tea sikai maau waia kuga to mari
ega tapala waina e pataka ni na
rogorogoana wia ki Kristo : naga, a
pe valoti punusi mu kite a pe vuoli,
aga rogo naleo maga nalo kakamu,
naga, ku do lawodu doko Naatana
sikai maau, doko do magi nasaralo-
mauana m narogorogoana wia mari-
-28 pilele ki naatamu sikai maau ; po
da pei tea mariana ku mataku nalo
ni te navatuna mau pae tea kokona
maga: waina e madeada pei
naviseikiana sikai ni namate-puoli-
ana, ma ni namautipauri-mu-ana,
go tea wanogoe e melu Supe:
29 nalakena e magi Kristo pei tea
vituakiana paki mu, naga kuga ta
saralomau asa sikina mau, ma naga
kuga maneana sua narogokitesa-
-30 ana : ku peani namaripileleana
sikai maau waina ku punusi a e
doko au, go waina ku dogo e ragi
waia naga e doko au.
Matele 2.
1 Nalakena tea wanogoe te navasa-
paratikiana e pe toko Kristo, te
navasapakavakaleana ni nadodo-
miana, te nasaisaipeaniana ni Na
atana, te namaritadodomiana go na
2 popododomiana, kuga vakavuro na
laelaeaana aginau, naga kuga midoa
ki tea sikai maau, doko do peani
nadodomiana sikai maau, po pei tea
popo sikai maau, doko do midoa ki
3 tea sikai maau; doko da midoa kite
navatuna pae namariputuakiana
kite pae nasamasamaana palo mau,
ma ki napopovakitanoana kuga
tumamu midoa ki mu naga ku
4 dumamu pia liu mu; doko da
mamau puti sikasikai leopunusi
naleo animu maga mau, ma kuga
mamau puti sikasikai leopunusi
naleo maga ki tea pota mag'a.
Kuga midoa ki tea waia ega 5
toko mu, waina e doko Kristo
Yesu : waina e doko namaridawa- 6
nakiana ni Supe, po da midoa ki
nia mau naga navataka-ni-Supe-ana
e pei tea waina ega vei tea vuatiana,
ma e dumana mari a e palo, po 7
dape namaridawanakiana ni tea
suasua sikai, po pei tea mariana e
doko natakiusiana ni naatamoli
maga; go e pei tea vapaiana e 8
dapala naatamoli sikai ki naleoda-
wanakiana, po dumana doro, e
pakitano, po pei tea rogo parati ki
pa pa paki namateana, namateana
ni nakau valadagoto. Go nalakena 9
tea wanogoe Supe e mari a e paki-
lagi parua liu, po dua e nagisa
waina e dapau sara nagisa ; naga 10
sara napatua euga titipatua doko
nagisa ni Yesu, ni tea maga ni
nakoroatelagi go ni tea maga ni
maramana go ni tea maga ni etano
ni maramana, go naga sara namena 11
euga noasai naga Yesu Kristo e pei
Nawota paki nasamasamaana ki
Supe Tamana.
Nalakena tea wanogoe, tea dodo-12
miana maga, dakiusi waina ku
dogo parati ki sara ragi, ega ta
dapala ragi waina a sikoti mu asa
sikina mau, ma ega warua liu sa
ragi waia waina a puoli ki mu asa,
kuga to posiwosi ki namautipauri-
mu-ana pilake namatakuana go
narurururuana ; nalakena e pei 13
Supe waina e do posiwosi doko mu
naga kuga masauna go naga kuga
wosiwosi, nalakena namidoakimata-
kiana aneana. Kuga mari naleo 14
maga mamau puti masale ki natau-
ruuruana go navululuana; naga 15
kuga ta pei tea vasadipaana mau,
go naga kuga ta pei tea mari
sa ki mau, ma naga kuga vei
Supe natuna maga waina tea sa e


dika ara maleoputo ni tagona
tagele sikai waina eu do marilolo
poto, waina ku pei tea vunusiana
maleoputo kakada dapala nasulu
16 maga doko maramana, doko do
dapesai ki navasaana ni namauri-
ana ; naga aga veani tea waina aga
vakavakae asa raki naaleatia ki
Kristo, naga a da sava palo man go
naga a da posiwosi-mawosa palo
17 mau. 10, go ape vei tea takiana
sokari naviriana go nasuasuaana
ni nasaralomauana animu, a pe
laelaea, po laelaea sikoti puti mu :
18 go nalakena tea sikai maau wanogoe
nimu ma kuga laelaea, po laelaea
sikoti au.
19 Ma a leogoro doko Nawota Yesu
naga aga tipakilua Timotheo ega
valoti punusi mu maraverave, naga
kinau ma aga marasike, ragi waina
aga atae naleo maga nalo kakamu.
20 Nalakena a da peani te naata pota
sikai mau waina napopona e pataka
ni napopogu, waina ega wo midoa-
ki parati ki lomau ki naleo maga
21 nalo kakamu. Nalakena eu ma-
mau puti laga naleo adeada maga,
eu da laga naleo maga ki Yesu
22 Kristo mau. Ma ku atae namari-
dogo-e-ana, naga, dapala waina
naatainoli natuna sikai e magi
tamana suasua, dapala nogoe nae e
suasua sikoti au raki narogorogoana
23 wia. Dapala nogoe nae wanogoe
a leogoro naga aga tipakilua e
paloti ragi waia, ragi waina aga
vunusi sua naleo maga nalo kakagu :
24 ma a pavatu doko Nawota naga
kinau ma aga valoti maraverave.
25 Ma a midoa ki nia naga e one au
one naga aga tipakilua Epafrodito
paloti punusi mu, taigu go tea
wosiwosi sikoti au, go tea mari
navakalo sikoti au, ma tea tautau-
ana animu go tea suasua paki nati-
-26 kaana aginau; nalakena e do
dodomi parua ki mu maga mamau
puti, po dogokitesa nalakena ku
dogo naga e sasana : nalakena e 27
sasana lomau fnaladigi ki namate-
ana : ma Supe e dodomi a; go e
da dodomi a sikina mau, ma e
dodomi au, naga aga ta peani
nasusueana sokari nasusueana mau.
Nalakena tea wanogoe a marekareka 28
parua dipakilua e paloti, naga, ragi
waina kuga moro punusi a, kuga
laelaea, go naga kinau aga da
suSue parua mau. Nalakena tea 29
wanogoe kuga viragisoki a doko
Nawota pilake sara nalaelaeaana ;
go kuga midoa ki tea tapala nogoe
maga naga euga vei tea dodoma-
daganiana ; nalakena e umai paki 30
fnaladigi nki namateana nalakena
nawosiana ki Kristo, e da dodo-
parati ki namauriana aneana mau,
naga ega vakavuro tea waina e
puoli ki nasuasuaana animu paki
nau.
Matele 3.
Tea edaku, taigu maga, kuga 1
laelaea doko Nawota. Naga aga
midiri naleo sikai maau maga paki
mu e da pei navitinuana paki nau
mau, ma e pei nasilaeana paki mu.
Kuga vunusi kuria maga, kuga 2
vunusi tea wosiwosi sa maga, kuga
vunusi tea tovakotoviana maga :
nalakena nigida tu pei tea tovada- 3
viviana maga waina tu do suasua
pae Naata ni Supe, po do pakavakae
Kristo Yesu, po da do pavatu
napokasi mau : go kinau ado peani 4
tea ni napokasi waina eu pavatu asa:
te naata pota sikai e pe midoa ki
nia naga e peani tea ni napokasi
waina ega vavatu asa, kinau a
peani a parua liu : a pei tea tova- 5
daviviana naaleatia kelatolu, tea ni
naworawora ni Israel, tea ni nawora
ni Benjamin, a pei Heberu sikai ni
Heberu maga ; nalo ni nawotaeana,
a pei Farisi sikai; nalo ni nasuisui- 6
ana, a pei tea kopalele ekkalesia;


nalo ni namarinaleoleanaana waina
e doko nawotaeana, a da pei tea
7 vasadipaana man. Ma naleo maga
waina eu maginau pei tea taluaana,
jialeo maga wanogoe a midoa ki da
naga eu pei tea tapepuolikiana
8 nalakena Kristo. loro lomau, go
nalakena tea wanogoe a do midoa
ki naleo maga mamau puti naga eu
pei tea tapepuolikiana nalakena
navakilagiliuana ni naataeana ni
Kristo Yesu Nawota aginau : waina
a sua natapepuolikiana ni naleo
maga mamau puti nalakena nae,
go a midoa ki da naga eupeinasama,
9 naga aga talua Kristo, po pei tea
vapaiana doko asa, doko da peani
namarinaleoleanaana aginau mau,
waina e pei tea ni nawotaeana, ma
naga aga veani tea waina e pae
nasaralomau-Kristo-ana, namarina-
leoleanaana waina e pei tea ni Supe
10 pae nasaralomauana. Naga aga
atae a, go nakasuaana ni namoro-
duleanaana aneana, go nasaisai-
peaniana ni narogokitesaana aneana
maga, doko do pei tea maridawana-
kiana aga tapala namateana ane-
-11 ana: mase a pe va parati ki na-
moroduleanaana melu dua ki tea
12 mate maga. Ada noa naga a dape
sua e mau, kite naga a pei tea
mariana a pialua sua mau : ma a do
savadausi, a pe vuasoki tea waina e
pei nalakena a pei tea vuasokiana
13 pae Kristo Yesu. Tai maga, kinau
a da dumagu midoa ki nau naga a
puasoki sua mau ; ma a do mari tea
sikai, a do malio ki naleo maga ni
kiedaku, po do dumagu sai ki nau
14 paki naleo maga ni kivea, a do sava
kasua paki laketoko raki praize ni
nasosoana ni elagi ki Supe doko
15 Kristo Yesu. Nalakena tea wano-
goe, tea maga waina tu pia lua tuga
midoa ki tea wanogoe: go ku pe
midoa ki pano pota kite navatuna,
tea wanogoe ma Supe e pe wo mari
16 pakasa ki nia paki mu: ma tea
waina tu pa parati ki sua e, kuga
surata pae tea sikai maau wanogoe.
Kuga vei tea saisai marioli au, 17
tai maga, go kuga leopunusi tea
maga waina eu do surata dapala
nogoe dakiusi waina ku peani garni
au pei naatulakeana sikai. Nala- 18
kena tea lapa eu surata, waina a
paka lapa noa ki sua mu ara,
go ragi waia a dagi noa ki mu ara,
naga eu pei tea kokona ki nakau
valadagoto ki Kristo : waina na 19
matapago edaku adeada e pei
namatepuoliana, waina napeleda e
pei supe adeada, waina nasama-
samaana adeada e doko namaliere-
ana adeada, waina eu do midoa ki
naleo maga ni maramana. Nala- 20
kena nalauna anigida e doko na
koroatelagi; waina tu do leogoro Tea
Maumau-pauri, Nawota Yesu Kristo
ega wo pae asa unai: waina ega 21
wo mari napatoko ni navakitano-
ana anigida ega wo pano pota,
naga ega vei tea maridawanakiana
ega tapala napatoko ni nasamasa-
maana aneana, pae nawosiwosiana
ni namariataeana aneana naga ega
mari naleo maga mamau puti euga
toko etano paki nia.
Matele 4.
Nalakena tea wanogoe, taigu 1
dodomiana maga go tea popomasau-
ana maga, nalaelaeaana aginau go
vauvau aginau, kuga lawodu doko
Nawota ega tapala nogoe, tea
dodomiana maga.
A pasa parati ki Euodia, go a 2
pasa parati ki Suntuke, naga eroga
midoa ki tea sikai maau doko
Nawota. loro, go a pavarani ko, 3
tea vei lomau waina toro saisai ova
nakau ni nanoa, pa silae nagoroi
dua wanogoe, nalakena ero posi-
wosi sikoti au doko narogorogoana
wia, nara ma Klemens, go tea wosi-
wosi sikoti au pota maga, waina


nagisada eu doko tusi ni namauri-
ana.
4 Kuga laelaea doko Nawoto sara
ragi: aga moro noa e, Kuga laelaea.
5 Namarimatemateana animu ega vei
tea ateaana paki naatamoli maga
mamau puti. Nawota e pei inaladigi.
6 Kuga ta midoaki parati kite nava-
tuna mau; ma nalo ni sara naleo
ki natapasavasaana go ki nava-
varaniana pilake navasadodomata-
kiana ,tea tatagoana animu maga
euga vei tea mariana euga vei tea
7 ataeana paki Supe. Go natamate-
ana ki Supe, waina e pakilagi liu
sara namidoakiataeana, ega wo
pavaigoro napopomu maga go na
midodoana animu maga doko Kristo
Yesu.
8 Tea edaku, tai maga, naleo maga
waina eu pei lomau, naleo maga
waina eu pei tea dodomadaganiana,
naleo maga waina eu leana, naleo
maga waina eu dautau,. naleo maga
waina eu pei tea masauniana, naleo
maga waina eu pei tea vasapiakiana;
te namariana wia e pe toko, go te
nasamasamaniana e pe toko, kuga
midoa ki naleo maga wanogoe.
9 Naleo maga waina ku ataedogo ra
po dape ra po dogo ra po punusi
ra doko au, naleo maga wanogoe
kuga do mari ra : go Supe ni nata-
inateana ega wo doko sikoti mu.
10 Ma a laelaea parua doko Nawota,
nalakena ragi waia edaku ki ragi
varau ku moro siria naga kuga
maginau midodoa ; go ku midodoa
sala vea nalo ni tea wanogoe, ma
11 ku dika ki ragi kakana. A da noa
e nalakena natikaana mau : nala-
kena kinau a ataedogo sua, naga
naleo maga waina a doko ara aga
12 maro ara. A atae naga aga vei
tea mariana aga vakitano, go a atae
naga aga vei sogolapa : nalo ni sara
naleo go nalo ni naleo maga mamau
puti a pei tea vasapiseikimatakiana
naga aga vuka go naga aga vitolo,
naga aga vei sogolapa go naga aga
vei tea tika. ' A mariatae mari 13
naleo maga mamau puti doko tea
waina e mari au a kasua. Ma ku 14
mari pia naga ku mamau saisai-
peani nariesokiana aginau. Ma 15
nimu ma ku atae, tea ni Filippoi
maga, naga ragi vea ni narogorogo-
ana wia, ragi waina a inelu dua ki
Masedonia pano, te ekkalesia sikai
e da saisaipeani sikoti au nalo ni
napuku ni navituaana go ni na
tapeana mau, ma nimu ku sikimu ;
nalakena ragi waina a ko doko 16
Thessalonika ku paka sikai go ku
paka kerua dipakilua umai paki
natikaana aginau. A da laga na- 17
vituamolikiana mau; ma a laga
nawa waina e do disu po lapa paki
napuku animu. Ma a peani naleo 18
maga mamau puti, go a pei sogo-
lapa : a pei tea vakavuroana, a
dape ki Epafrodito naleo maga
waina eu inelu mu umai, napo
ni naloloana sikai, naviriana tape-
ana sikai, tea midoakimatakiana
ki Supe. Go Supe aginau ega 19
wo pakavuro sara natikaana animu,
ega vae nasogolapaana aneana
doko nasamasamaana doko Kristo
Yesu. Ma nasamasamaana ega vei 20
agi Supe anigida go Tamagida ega
tu du po du mau du. Amen.
Kuga vasadodomi sara tea tautau 21
doko Kristo Yesu. Taigida maga
waina eu sikoti au eu pasadodomi
mu. Tea tautau maga mamau 22
puti eu pasadodomi mu, ma parua
liu ki nia tea maga waina eu pei
tea ni nasuina ki Kaisar.
Nasaupiaana ki Nawota Yesu 23
Kristo ega sikoti naatamu. Amen.


EPISTOLE KI PAULO APOSTOLO
TEA NI KOLOSSE MAGA.
Matele 1.
1 Paulo, apostolo sikai ki Kristo
Yesu pae namasauana ki Supe, go
2 Timotheo taigida, aro midiri paki tea
tautau maga go taigida saralomau
maga doko Kristo waina eu doko
Kolosse: nasaupiaana ega vei auimu
go natamateana melu Supe Tama-
gida.
3 Axo pasadodoina taki Supe Tama
ni Nawota anigida Yesu Kristo,
doko do manimu dapasavasa sara
4 ragi, aro dogo nasaralomauana
auimu doko Kristo Yesu, go nado-
doxniana waina ku peani a paki tea
5 tautau maga mamau puti, nalakena
naieogororoana waina e manimu
pei tea toropusiana doko nakoro-
atelagi maga, waina ku pea dogo e
doko navasaana ni nalomauana ni
6 narogororogoana wia, waina e umai
paki mu; dakiusi waina e doko
maramana mamau e do dau ki
nawana po do disu po parua,
dakiusi waina e mari a doko mu,
pae naaleatia waina ku dogo e
po atae nasaupiaana ki Supe doko
7 nalomauana pa pa; dakiusi waina
ku ataedogo e melu Epafra tea dodo-
miana aginami waina au mamau
pei tea suasua, waina e manimu pei
8 minister lomau sikai ki Kristo, go
waina e noakisai garni nadodomiana
animu doko Naatana.
9 Nalakena tea wanogoe kinami ma,
pae naaleatia waina aro dogo e asa
pa pa, aro do manimu dapasavasa
po pavara, aro da makoto ki nia
mau, naga kuga vei tea vakavuro-
ana ki naataematakiana ni nama-
sauana aneana doko sara namanu-
matuaana go sara namidoaki-
ataeana ni Naatana, naga kuga 10
surata ega tapala waina e pataka ni
Nawota paid sara namidoakiinata-
kiana, doko do dau ki nawamu
doko sara nawosiana wia, po do
disu po parua ki naataemataki-
Supe-ana ; doko do pei tea mariana 11
kuga kasua ki sara nakasuaana,
pae namaridagaragaraana ni na
samasamaana aneana, paki sara na
sokiana go sara naveimarita-soki-
parauana pilake nalaelaeaana; 12
doko do pasadodomata ki Tamana,
waina e mari gida tu pataka ni waina
tuga veani matele ni tea veaniana
ki tea tautau maga doko namarama ;
waina e pualuagida melu dua ki 13
nakasuaana ni namaligo, po piragi
gida duagoto paid namarakiana ki
Natuna ni nadodomiana aneana;
waina tu peani natauluaana doko 14
asa, namidoakikorokoroana ni na
marinaleosaana anigida maga: waina 15
e pei nunu ni Supe waina e da pei
tea vunusiana mau, takalapa ni
sara tea tawanakiana; nalakena 16
naleo maga mamau puti eu pei tea
tawanakiana doko asa, naleo maga
waina eu doko nakoroatelagi maga


go naleo maga waina eu doko mara-
mana, naleo maga waina eu pei tea
vunusiana go naleo maga waina eu
da pei tea vunusiana mau, eu pe
vei malo tasake maga kite naveina-
wotaana maga, kite namarakiana
maga, kite nakasuaana maga :
naleo maga mamau puti eu pei tea
tawanakiana pae asa, go maneanaf;
17 go nae e pea ki naleo maga mamau
puti, go naleo maga mamau puti
18 eu saisai du asa. Go nae e pei
napau ni napatokona, napau ni
ekkalesia : go e pei naatulakeana,
takalapa melu dua ki tea mate
maga; naga nalo ni naleo maga
mamau puti nae ega vei tea vea.
19 Nalakena lainana e midoa ki inata
ki nia naga navakavuroana mamau
20 ega toko asa doko ; go naga ega
mari naleo maga mamau puti euga
moro pei popo wia paki nia pae asa,
e mari natainateana pae nada ni
nakau valadagoto aneana; pae
asa, eu pe vei naleo maga waina eu
doko maramana, kite naleo maga
waina eu doko nakoroatelagi maga.
21 Go nimu, waina sala vea ku pei tea
vanopota go tea kokona maga nalo
ni namidoakiataeana animu doko
22 nawosiana sa animu maga, ma ragi
waia e mari mu ku pei popo wia
doko napatoko ni napokasina pae
namateana, naga ega mari mu kuga
lawodu naraena kuga vei tea tautau
gotea mamaau go teata pei tea vasa-
-23 dipaana mau : ku pe toko nasara-
lomauana doko lomau, tea laketano-
kiana go tea toko kasua, doko da pei
tea risuakiana mau melu dua ki na
leogoroana ni narogorogoana wia
waina ku dogo e, waina e pei tea
rogorogokiana doko tea tawana-
kiana mamau etano ki nakoroate-
lagi ; waina kinau Paulo a pei tea
mariana a pei tea suasua sikai
kakana.
24 Eagi waia a laelaea doko narogo-
kitesaana aginau maga waina eu
manimu, go a do pakavuro tea
maga waina eu ko puoli ki narie-
sokiana maga ki Kristo doko
napokasigu magi napatokona, waina
e pei ekalesia ; waina kinau a pei 25
tea mariana a pei tea suasua sikai
kakana, pae naveitasigaleoparati-
kiana ki Supe waina e manimu pei
tea vituakiana paki nau, naga aga
vakavuro navasaana ki Supe, paia 26
waina e pei tea tasurukiana pae
ragi varau maga go pae tagona
maga pa pa: ma ragi waia e pei
tea mariana e dokolina paki tea
tautau aneana maga, waina Supe 27
e masauna naga ega mari ra euga
atae nawaruaana ni nasogolapaana
ni nasamasamaana ni paia wanogoe
maleoputo ni tea ni nalauna maga,
waina e pei Kristo maleoputo ka-
kamu, naleogoroana ni nasamasama-
ana : waina kinami au do dogorogo 28
ki nia, doko do dapavanau sara
naatamoli po do pasapisei ki sara
naatamoli doko sara namanumatua-
ana, naga auga mari sara naatamoli
euga lawodu naraena euga wia lua
doko Kristo ; waina a do posiwosi 29
mawosa paki asa, doko do mari-
pilele pae nawosiwosiana aneana,
waina e do posiwosi doko au ki
nakasuaana.
Matele 2.
Nalakena a masauna naga nimu 1
kuga atae nawaruaana ni namari-
pileleana waina a manimu peani a,
go magi tea ni Laodikeia maga, go
magi tea maga waina eu da punusi
naraegu doko napokasi mau; naga 2
napopoda euga vei tea vakavaka-
leana, nara euga vei tea marisaisai-
kiana doko nadodomiana, go paki
nasogolapaana mamau ni nasara-
lomaupakavuroana ni namidoaki-
ataeana, naga euga atae mata ki
paia ki Supe, Kristo, waina tea 3
tauakiana maga mamau puti ni


namanumatuaana go ni naataeana
eu pei tea tasurukiana doko asa.
4 A noa tea wanogoe naga te naata
sikai ega ta soro mu mau ki navasa-
-5 ana ni navuadoaana. Nalakena a
pe vuoli ki mu nalo ni napokasigu,
ma a pe doko sikoti mu nalo ni
naatagu, doko do laelaea po do
punusi namarimatanakiana animu,
go naveilaketokoana ni nasaralo-
mauana animu doko Kristo.
6 Nalakena tea wanogoe dapala
waina ku piragi KristoYesu Nawota,
7 kuga surata doko asa, tea koakoa
maga go tea to davagiana maga
doko asa, go tea lawosokiana maga
nalo ni nasaralomauana animu,
dakiusi waina ku pei tea vasapi-
seikiana, doko do mari parua ki
navasado domatakiana.
8 Kuga vunusi naga te naata sikai
ega ta doko mau waina e do pira-
gilua pavakoto mu pae filosofia
aneana go nasurueana palo, pae
navasaana vituakiana ki naatamoli
maga, pae tea vea maga ni mara-
mana, go e da pae Kristo mau:
9 nalakena navakavuroana mamau
ni navei-Supe-ana e doko asa
10 doko pilake napatoko, go ku pei
tea vakavuroana doko asa, waina e
pei napau ni sara namarakiana go
11 ni sara naveinawotaana : waina ku
pei tea tovadaviviana doko asa ki
natovadaviviana sikai waina e da
pei tea mariana ki namelearu maga
mau, doko nasawoluaana ni napa-
toko ni napokasi, doko natovada-
-12 viviana ki Kristo; ku pei tea
ovakiana sikoti a doko nabape-
tizoana, waina ku pei tea sikeana
duleana sikoti a asa pae nasara-
lomauana ni nawosiwosiana ki
Supe, waina e sike a e duleana
13 melu dua ki tea mate maga. Go
nimu, ragi waina ku pei tea mate
doko natapiriana animu maga go
natikaana ni natovadaviviana ni
napokasimu, e pakamauri ki mu
sikoti a, e manigida midoakikoro-
koro natapiriana anigida maga
mamau puti; e kasilua namidiiiana 14
ni namelearu waina e dipa gida ki
natawanakiana kakana maga, waina
e kokona ki gida: go e dapelua e
melu dua ki maleoputo, e turi a
paki nakau valadagoto aneana ; el 5
sawolua namarakiana maga go na
veinawotaana maga meludua ki nia
pano, po mari ra eu pei tea viseiki-
ana Id naviviariana, e marimatua ki
da doko asa.
Nalakena tea wanogoe te naata 16
ega ta pasapotae mu mau nalo ni na
kaniana kite namunuana, kite nalo
ni naaleatia ni nasaisaiana sikai, kite
nalo ni atelagi vau sikai, kite nalo
ni naaleatia ni sabbath sikai: waina 17
eu pei melu sikai ni naleo maga
waina euga wo umai, ma napato-
koda e pei tea ki Te naata 18
sikai waina e masauna ega ta dape-
lua ki amu praize animu mau ki
napopovakitanoana go ki nalotu-
ki-agelo-maga-ana, po do sili paki
naleo maga waina e da punusi ra
mau, po pei tea popo vuka palo
pae namidodoana ni napokasina,
go e da do puasoki Napauna mau, 19
waina napatokona mamau e do
dape ki ana po pei tea marisaisai-
kiana pae kolopu maga go natali
maga, e do disu po parua ki nari-
suana ni nawaruaana ki Supe.
Ku pe mate sikoti Kristo meludua 20
ki tea vea maga ni maramana,
ekasana, dapala ku pe mauri doko
maramana, ku doko etano paki
natawanakiana maga. Pa ta dape 21
dogo mau, go pa da katidogo mau,
go pa ta kisidogo mau (naleo maga 22
wanogoe eu mamau puti doko raki
namesoana ki namanmaariana),
pae natipakiana maga go navasa-
piseikiana maga ki naatamoli
maga. Naleo maga wanogoe eu 23
peani lomau ki narogorogoana sikai
ni namanumatuaana doko nalotu-


■ ana tapala namasauana adeada,
go napopovakitanoana, go namari-
kasua-ki-napatokoda-ana; eu da
doko te nadodomadaganiana dipa
navukaana ni napokasi man.
Matele 3.
1 Nalakena tea wanogoe ku pe vei
tea sikeana duleana sikoti Kristo,
kuga laga naleo maga ni elagi,
tokora waina Kristo e doko asa,
waina e dasake pisari namelearu ni
2 matua ni Supe. Kuga midoa ki
naleo maga ni elagi, kuga ta midoa
ki naleo maga waina eu doko mara-
-3 mana mau. Nalakena ku mate, go
namauriana animu e pei tea tasu-
rukiana sikoti Kristo doko Supe.
i Ragi waina Kristo, waina e pei
namauriana anigida, ega wo paki-
lina, ragi wanogpe nimu ma kuga
wo pakilina sikoti a doko nasama-
samaana.
5 Nalakena tea wanogoe kuga mari-
punue naleo kakamu maga waina
eu doko maramana; namaripele-
ana, naloaana, namasausauana, na
masauana sa, go namatamaguraana,
waina e pei nalotu-ki-nasupe-ana ;
6 nalakena tea maga wanogoe na
maetoana ki Supe e umai paki
7 narogopiriana natuna maga ; waina
nimu ma ku surata doko ara sala
vea, ragi waina ku mauri doko tea
8 maga wanogoe. Ma ragi waia
.nimu ma kuga toropusi tea maga
mamau puti waia, namaetoana, na
maritausuana, navilosiana, navasa-
sakiana, navasaana ni namalieri-
ana euga ta melu nawokamu mau :
9 kuga ta sorosoro dumamu paki mu
mau; nalakena ku sawolua sua
naatainoli tuai go namariana ane-
-10 ana maga, po suni sua naatainoli
vau, waina e do pei tea maripauki-
ana paki naataematakiana pae
nunu ni tea waina e dawana ki
11 nia: waina tea ni Hellas ge tea ni
Yudea ero da doko asa mau, tea
tovadaviviana go tea tika natova-
davaviviana mau, tea vasa pae na
vasaana pota, Skuthc, naviti, tea
tumana doko mau; ma Kristo
e pei tea maga mamau puti, go e
doko tea maga mamau puti.
Nalakena tea wanogoe kuga suni I.‘
dapala tea mataroaana maga ki
Supe, tea tautau go tea
dodomiana maga, kuga suni na
marita ni nadodomiana, navakale-
ana, napopovakitanoana, namate-
mateana, naveimaritasoki - parau-
ana; doko do dumamu soki mu, po do II
dumamu manimu midoakikorokoro,
te naata e pe veani te nalakena ni
navasadipaana dipa te naata; da-
kiusi waina Nawota e manimu
midoakikoro, nimu ma kuga mari
ega tapala nogoe: go kuga suni 1'
nadodomiana ega tapaugoro tea
maga mamau puti wanogoe, waina
e pei natali ni nawialuaana. Go II
natamateana ki Kristo ega to
marakipotae doko napopomu, waina
ku pei tea sosoana paki asa doko
napatoko sikai maau ; go kuga vei
tea dodoinataki. Navasaana ki K
Kristo ega toko mu doko ega vae
nasogolapaana ega vilake sara na
manumatuaana; doko do dumamu
pasapisei ki mu po do dumamu
dapavanau mu ki salamo maga ki
liurnno maga ki nalegaana maga ki
Naatana, doko do lega ki nasaupia-
ana doko napopomu paki Supe. Go II
sara naleo waina ku pe mari ra, nalo
ni navasaana kite nalo ni nawo-
siana, kuga to mari naleo maga
mamau puti doko nagisa ni Nawota
Yesu, doko do pasadodomata ki
Supe Tamana pae asa.
Nagoroi maga, kuga toko etano If
paki naanoai animu maga, ega
tapala waina e patakamu doko
Nawota. Naanoai maga, kuga do- H
domi nagoroi animu maga, go kuga
ta pei tea kokona dipa ra mau.


20 Piakiiikiri kuga rogo parati ki
nadaleo ni tea matua animu maga
nalo ni naleo maga mamau puti,
nalakena tea wanogoe e pei tea
midoakimatakiana doko Nawota.
21 Tamada maga kuga ta mari natumu
maga euga maeto mau, naga napo-
-22 poda euga ta dodosua mau. Tea
suasua maga, kuga rogo parati ki
nalo ni naleo maga mamau puti
nadaleo ni tea maga waina eu pei
nawota animu nalo ni napatcrkomu;
ega ta pae nasuasuaana ni namata
mau, dapala tea mari namasauana
ki naatamoli maga, ma ega vae
nasikaimaauana ni napopomu, doko
23 do matau ki Nawota: tea waina
ku pe mari a, kuga wosiwosi pae
naatamu, ega tapala ku pe magi
Nawota mari a, po da magi naata-
-24 moli maga mari a mau; ku atae
naga kuga wo dape ki Nawota
navituadipaana ni tea veaniana:
ku do magi Nawota Kristo suasua.
25 Nalakena tea waina e mari dagele
ega wo dape liliua ki tea tagele
waina e man a: go naviragma-
-26 raeana e da doko mau. Nawota
maga, kuga tua tea suasua animu
maga tea waina e leana go napata-
kaana; ku atae naga nimu ma
ku peani Nawota sikai nakoro-
atelagi.
Matele 4.
1 Kuga to dapasapasa pitipatipa,
po do leleogoro doko asa ega vilake
2 navasadodomatakiana ; go kuga
3 to maginami ma dapasavasa, naga
Supe ega maginami polagati namata
sikai ni navasaana, naga aroga vasa
paia ni Kristo, waina e pei nalakena
4 a pei tea soliana ; naga aga mari a
ega toko lina ega tapala waina e
5 one au one naga aga vasa. Kuga
surata pae namanumatuaana paki
tea maga ni etaku, doko do daulua
6 ragi. Navasaana animu ega vilake
nasaupiaana sara iagi, ega vei tea
mariana ega gagadi ki natasimena,
naga kuga atae dapala waina e one
mu one naga kuga vasadara saia
naata sikasikai.
Naleo aginau maga mamau puti 7
Tukiko ega wo noakisai mu ara,
waina e pei taigida dodomiana
go minister lomau go tea suasua
sikoti garni doko Nawota : waina a 8
dipakilua e paloti punusi mu na
lakena tea waia, naga kuga atae
naleo maga nalo kakagami, go naga
ega vasapakavakale napopomu;
sikoti Onesimo, taigida lomau go 9
dodomiana, waina e pei sikai ka-
kamu. Eroga wo noakisai mu
naleo maga mamau puti waina eu
pei tea mariana tokora waia.
Aristarko tea viragiluapavakoto- 10
ana sikoti au e pasadodomi mu,
go Marko, pilemata ni Barnaba
(waina ku dape sua natipakiana
maga nalo kakana; epe valoti
punusi mu, kuga viragi a), go Yesu, 11
waina e pei tea sosoana ki Yusto,
waina eu pei tea ni tea tovadavi-
viana maga : nara eu sikida pei tea
wosiwosi sikoti au paki namaia-
kiana ki Supe, naatamoli maga
waina eu pei navakavakaleana sikai
paki nau. Epafra, waina e pei 12
sikai kakamu, tea suasua sikai ki
Kristo Yesu, e pasadodomi mu,
doko do manimu pilele natapasa-
vasaana aneana maga sara ragi,
naga kuga lawodu tea wialua go
tea saralomaupakavuro doko sara
namasauana ki Supe. Nalakena al3
maneana noasokisoki naga e ma-
nimu pei awa parua, go magi tea
maga waina eu doko Laodikeia, go
magi tea maga waina eu doko
Hierapoli. Luka, tea maripauri do-14
domiana, go Dema ero pasadodomi
mu. Kuga vasadodomi taigida 15
maga waina eu doko Laodikeia, go
Numfa, go ekkalesia waina eu doko
nasuma adeada. Go ragi waina 16


epistole waia ega vei tea veveana
sua maleoputo kakamu, kuga mari
naga ega moro pel tea veveana paid
ekalesia ni tea ni Laodikeia maga ;
go naga nimu ma kuga veve epistole
17 waina e melu Laodikeia. Go kuga
noa ki Arkippo, huga naga. Pa leo
parati ki nasuasuaana waina ku
dape a doko Nawota, naga pa
vakavuro e.

ki namelearugu. Kuga midoa ki
natali solisoli aginau maga, Nasau-
piaana ega sikoti mu.
EPISTOLE YEA KI PAULO APOSTOLO
TEA NI THESSALONIKA MAGA
Matele 1.
1 Paulo, go Silvano, go Timotlieo,
au midiri, paid ekkalesia ni tea ni
Thessalonika maga waina eu doko
Supe Tama go Nawota Yesu Kristo :
nasaupiaana ega vei animu go
natamateana.
2 Au do pasadodomata ki Supe
sara ragi nalo kakamu mamau puti,
doko do mari namidoakinoa-mu-
ana doko natapasavasaana aginami
3 maga ; au do midoa ki pitipatipa
ki nawosiana animu ni nasara-
lomauana go nawosimawosaana
animu ni nadodomiana go na
sokiana animu ni naleogoroana
doko Nawota anigida Yesu Kristo,
4 narae ■ni Supe go Tamagida ; au
atae, tai maga, tea dodomiana maga
5 pae Supe, namatadoa-mu-ana, na
lakena narogorogoana wia aginami
e da umai paki mu doko navasaana
sikina mau, ma e umai doko na
kasuaana, go doko Naatana Tapu,
go nasaralomaupakavuroana warua;
dakiusi waina ku atae naga au pei
naatafuoli tapale maleoputo kaka-
-6 mu nalakena nimu. Go nimu ku
pei tea mari oli garni go Nawota,
ku dape sua navasaana doko narie-
sokiana warua, pilake nalaelaeaana
ki Naatana Tapu ; dapala waina 7
nimu ku pei naatulakeana sikai
magi tea saralomaU maga mamau
puti waina eu doko Masedonia go
waina eu doko Akaia. Nalakena 8
navasaana ki Nawota e melu mu
saruru pano, e da doko Masedonia
go Akaia sikida mau, ma narogo-
rogoana ni nasaralomauana animu
paki Supe e doko sara tokora pano ;
dapala waina kinami au da peani
te nalakena naga auga vasa te
navatuna mau. Nalakena nara eu 9
dufnada dogorogo nalo kakagami
ki nasiliana waina au peani a paloti
punusi mu naga e dapale Sana ; go
dapala waina ku maradoa melu dua
ki nasupe maga paki Supe, naga
kuga magi Supe mauri go lomau
suasua, go naga kuga leogoro 10
Natuna pae nakoroatelagi umai,
waina e sike a e duleana melu dua
ki tea mate maga, Yesu, waina e
do pualua gida melu dua ki namae-
toana waina ega wo umai.


Matele 2.
1 Nalakena ku dufnamu atae, tai
maga, nasiliana aginami paloti pu-
nas i mu, naga e da pei tea palo
2 mau : ma ragi waina an pea sua
narogokitesaana, po pei tea mari-
sakiana Filippoi, dakiusi waina ku
atae a, au piviari doko Supe anigida
naga auga vasa paki mu narogo-
rogoana wia ki Supe doko narnari-
-3 pileleana warua. Nalakena navasa-
paratikiana aginami e da pei tea
ni namidoakipeleana mau, go e da
pei tea ni naloaana mau, go e da
4 doko nasorosoroana mau : ma da-
kiusi waina au pei tea midoakipo-
taeana pae Supe naga au pia naga
auga vei tea vavatuana ki narogo-
rogoana wia, au do pasa dapala
nogoe ; e da dapala au do mari

maga mau, ma au do mari tea
midoakimatakiana ki Supe waina
5 e maridogo napopogami. Nalakena
au da noa navasaana ni nasorosoro-
kiana te ragi mau, dakiusi waina
ku atae a, go au da noa nakokoroki-
ana ni namatamaguruana mau,
6 Supe e pei tea noasokisoki; go
au da laga nasamasamaana waina
e fnelu naatainoli maga mau, au
da laga tea waina e pae mu mau, go
au ta laga tea waina e pae tea pota
maga man, ragi waina au mariataef
pei tea madaga dapala apostolo
7 maga ki Kristo. Ma au pei tea
matemate doko maleoputo kakamu,
dapala waina nagoroi vakale sikai
8 e pakale natuna maga : dapala
nogoe, nalakena au masau parua ki
mu, au midoakimata ki nia naga
auga dua mu narogorogoana wia
ki Supe ega ta sikina mau, ma
naatagami ma euga vilake a, nala-
kena ku pei tea dodomiana warua
9 aginami. Nalakena ku midoa ki,
tai maga, nawosimawosaana agi-
nami go nawosipitinuana aginami;
au do posiwosi pogi go aleati, naga
auga ta pei tea madaga one te naata
kakamu mau, po dogorogo paki mu
ki narogorogoana wia ki Supe. Nirnu 10
ku pei tea noasokisoki, go Supe,
naga namariana aginami paki mu
waina ku saralomau e dautau go e
leana go e da pei tea vasadipaana
mau : dakiusi waina ku atae dapala 11
waina au mari paki sara naata
kakamu sikasikai, dapala waina
tama sikai e mari paki natuna maga,
au do pasa paiati ki mu, po do
pasapakavakale mu, po do pasasoki-
soki parati ki, naga kuga surata 12
ega tapala waina e pataka ni Supe,
waina e do soso mu paki namara-
kiana aneana go nasamasamaana
aneana.
Go nalakena tea wanogoe kinami 13
ma au do pasadddoinata ki Supe,
au da makoto ki nia mau, nalakena,
ragi waina ku dape navasaana ni
narogoana fnelu garni, navasaana
ki Supe, ku dape soki a waina e da
pei navasaana ki naatainoli maga
mau, ma, dakiusi waina e doko
lomau, navasaana ki Supe, go waina
e do posiwosi doko mu waina
ku saralomau. Nalakena nimu, tai 14
maga, ku pei tea mari oli ekkalesia
maga ki Supe waina eu doko Yudea
doko Kristo Yesu ; nalakena nimu
ma ku sua tea sikai maau maga
pae tea ni navanua animu maga,
dakiusi waina nara ma eu sua ra
pae tea ni Yudea maga ; waina eu 15
maripunue Nawota Yesu go profeta
maga, po kopalele garni au fnelu
pano, go eu da pei tea midoaki-
matakiana ki Supe mau, go eu mari
dipa naatainoli maga mamau puti;
eu do dugoro garni naga auga ta 16
pasa ki tea ni nalauna pota maga
mau naga euga vei tea mauti-
pauriana ; naga euga do pakavuro
namarinaleosaana adeada maga sara
ragi; ma namaetoana epo umai paki
da pa pa paki namatapagona edaku.

pei tea mariana au puoli ki mu ragi

1 Nalakena tea wanogoe ragi waina

toropusiana auga toko Athenai auga

paloti, taigami go tea suasua ki

Kristo, naga ega lawosoki mu, go
naga ega magi nasaralomauana

naata ega ta pei tea varivariakiana
mau doko nariesokiana maga wano-
goe ; nalakena ku duinamu atae
naga tu pei tea lawokiana paki

noa ki mu naga .tuga wo sua na
riesokiana; dakiusi waina e paki-

maridogo mu, go nawosimawosa-
-6 ana aginami e pe vei tea palo. Ma
ragi waina Timotheo e ihelu mu

ana wia ni nasaralomauana ani-
mu go ni nadodomiana animu, go
naga ku peani namidoaki-gami-ana

ki naga kuga vunusi garni, dakiusi

gida ; pogi go aleati au do pavara 10
parua liu naga auga vunusi narae
mu, go naga auga vakavuro tea
maga ni nasaralomauana animu
waina eu puoli ?
Ma Supe go Tamagida nae go 11
Nawota anigida Yesu, eroga mari
napua aginami ega leana paki mu :
ma nimu Nawota ega mari mu kuga 12
risu po parua po sarasarape ki

mari a paki mu ; naga ega lawosoki 13

dipaana mau doko natautauana na

naumaiana ki Nawota anigida Yesu
nara ma tea tautau aneana maga
mamau puti.

tai maga, au pavarani mu po pasa

waina ku do surata, —naga kuga to

atae natipakiana maga waina au dua

tea waia e pei namasauana ki Supe,
namaridautau-ki-mu-ana, waina
nirnu kuga tumamu mauti mu ki

na tea wanogoe tea waina e dipadoa,

kiana paki tea ni etaku maga, go

kuga vei sapo, tai maga, nalo ni
tea maga waina eu maturu ; naga
kuga ta susue mau, dakiusi tea
pota maga, waina eu da peani
naleogoioana mau, Nalakena tu 14
pe saralomau naga Yesu e mate po
moro duleana, dapala nogoe tea
maga waina eu maturu pae Yesu

sikoti a umai. Nalakena au noa 15
ki mu tea waia doko navasaana ki

mauri, waina tu madoko pa pa
paki naumaiana ki Nawota, tuga
wo da pea ki tea maga waina eu
maturu mau. Nalakena Nawota 16
nae ega wo pae nakoroatelagi siwo
umai, pilake naviosoana sikai, pilake
nadaleo ni agelo warua liu, go pilake
paiga ki Supe: go tea mate maga
doko Kristo euga wo pea duleana :
edaku ki nia nigida waina tu mauri, 17
waina tu madoko, tuga wo mamau
pei tea tapeana sake sikoti ra
doko napopouro maga, naga tuga
sua Nawota namalopa ; go dapala
nogoe tuga wo doko sikoti Nawota
sara ragi. Nalakena tea wanogoe 18
kuga tumamu pasapakavakale mu
ki navasaana maga wanogoe.
Matele 5.
Ma nalo ni ragi maga go sala 1
maga, tai maga, ku da pei sapo
mau naga te navatuna ega vei
tea midiriana paki mu asa. Na 2
lakena ku dumamu atae rnata ki
nia naga naaleatia ki Nawota ega
wo umai dapala waina tea vanako
sikai e umai pogi. Ragi waina 3
euga wo do naga, Natamateana go
natokopiaana, ragi wanogoe namari-
sakiana maraverave ega wo paki
lina ki da, dakiusi waina navitinu-
ana ni navisolaana e pakilina ki
nagoroi waina*e diena ; go euga wo
da sava pano mau. Ma nimu, tai 4
maga, ku da doko namaligo mau,


naga naaleatia wanogoe ega va
parati ki mu dapala tea vanako
5 sikai. Nalakena nimu mamau puti
ku pei namarama natuna maga, go
aleati natuna maga : tu da pei tea
ni pogi mau, go tu da pei tea ni
6 namaligo mau ; nalakena tea wa-
nogoe tuga ta maturu mau, dapala
tea pota maga, ma tuga to leleogoro
7po midodoa pia. Nalakena tea
maga waina eu maturu eu maturu
pogi; go tea maga waina eu mata-
-8 maloku eu matamaloku pogi. Ma
nigida, waina tu pei tea ni aleati,
tuga to midodoa pia, doko suni sua
kororuma ni nasaralomauana go ni
nadodomiana ; go kalupau ni vatu,
naleogoroana ni namautipauriana.
9 Nalakena Supe e da dawana ki gida
paki namaetoana mau, ma e da-
wana hi-gida paki nataluaana ni
namautipauriana pae Nawota ani-
-10 gida Yesu Kristo, waina e mate oli
gida, naga, tu pe leleogoro kite
tu pe maturu, tu pe mamau mauri
11 sikoti a. Nalakena tea wanogoe
kuga tumamu pasapakavakale
mu, go kuga tumamu davagi mu
sikai ega tavagi sikai, ega takiusi
waina ku do mari a.
12 Ma au pavarani mu, tai maga,
naga kuga atae tea maga waina
eu do posiwosi-mawosa inaleoputo
kakamu, po do lawotu naraemu
doko Nawota, po do dapavanau
13 mu ; go naga kuga midoa ki da
naga eu pia parua ki nadodomiana
nalakena nawosiana adeada. Kuga
14 tamate dumamu paki mu. Ma au
pasaparati ki mu, tai maga, kuga
tapavanau tea noginogi maga, kuga
vasapakavakale tea popotoro maga,
kuga silae tea manainai maga, kuga
vei maritasoki-parau paki tea maga
mamau puti. Kuga vunusi naga te 15
naata ega ta lagati dua te naata tea
sa dipa tea sa mau ; ma sara ragi
kuga sava dausi tea waina e pia,
dumamu paki mu, go paki tea maga
mamau puti. Kuga laelaea sara 16
ragi; kuga tapasavasa ega ta 17
makoto mau ; kuga vasadodomata 18
ki nalo ni sara naleo : nalakena
tea wanogoe e pei namasauana ki
Supe doko Kristo Yesu paki mu.
Kuga ta puepunue Xaatana mau ; 19
kuga ta midoa ki palo ki naveanoa- 20
saiana maga mail; kuga maridogo 21
naleo maga mamau puti; kuga
tapesoki tea waina e pia ; kuga 22
tumamu mauti mu ki sara namari-
naleosaana visarasara.
Go Supe ni natamateana nae ega 23
maridautau ki mu usuraki; go
naatamu go namauriana animu go
napatokomu euga vei tea vavaigoro-
ana euga vei tea mamau, euga ta
pei tea vasatipaana mau ragi ni na
umaiana ki Nawota anigida Yesu
Kristo. Tea waina e soso mu e pei 24
lomau, go nae ega wo mari a.
Tai maga, kuga maginami da- 25
pasavasa.
Kuga vasadodomi taigida maga 26
mamau puti ki natumiliana t’autau
sikai. A maripivisa ki mu pae 27
Nawota naga epistole waia ega vei
tea veveana paki taigida maga
mamau puti.
Nasaupiaana ki Nawota anigida 28
Yesu Kristo ega sikoti mu.


EPISTOLE KERUA KI PAULO APOSTOLO
TEA NI THESSALONIKA
Matele 1.
1 Paulo, go Silvano, go Timotheo,
au midiri paki ekkalesia ni tea ni
Thessalonika maga waina eu doko
Supe Tamagida go Nawota Yesu
2 Kristo ; nasaupiaana ega vei animu
go natamateana melu Supe Tama
go Nawota Yesu Kristo.
3 E one garni one naga auga vasa-
dodomata ki Supe sara ragi nalo
kakamu, tai maga, dakiusi waina
e pia, nalakena nasaralomauana
animu e do disu ki nawaruana parua
liu, go nadodomiana ki sara naata
kakamu mamau puti dumamu paki
4 mu e lapa ; dapala waina kinami au
do pakavakae mu doko ekkalesia
maga ki Supe nalakena nasokina
animu go nasaralomauana animu
doko nakopalele-mu-ana maga ma-
mau puti go nariesokiana maga
5 waina ku soki ra; waina e pei
navaivaiana lina sikai ni navasa-
potaeana leana ki Supe ; naga kuga
vei tea midoakiana naga ku pia
ki namarakiana ki Supe, waina ku
6 sua tea sa nalakena kakana ; e pe
vei tea leana lomau sikoti Supe naga
ega vitua dipa ki nariesokiana paki
7 tea maga waina eu diesoki mu, go
paki mu waina ku pei tea riesokiana
ki nanamaromaroana sikoti garni,
ragi ni navakilinaana ki Nawota
Yesu pae nakoroatelagi umai nara
ma agelo maga ni nakasuana aneana
8 pilake soro ni nakapu, doko do pitua
NGUNA-TON&OAN N.T.
MAGA.
ki nasikosikoana paki tea maga
waina eu da atae Supe mau, go paki
tea maga waina eu da dogo parati
ki narogorogoana wia ki Nawota
anigida Yesu mau : naatamoli maga 9
waina euga wo sua nasikoana, na
marisakiana waina ega wo du mau
du padua ki narae ni Nawota go
padua ki nasamasamaana ni naka-
suaana aneana, ragi waina ega wo 10
umai naga ega vei tea samasamani-
ana doko tea tautau aneana maga,
go naga ega vei tea ni namagaana
doko tea maga mamau puti waina
eu saralomau (nalakena nanoasoki-
sokiana aginami paki mu e pei
tea saralomauana) naaleatia wano-
goe. Go naga ega tapala nogoe 11
au do manimu dapasavasa sara
ragi, naga Supe anigida ega midoa
ki mu naga ku |Sia ki nasoso-mu-
ana, go naga ega vakavuro sara
namidoakimatakiana ni nawiaana
go sara nawosiana ni nasaralomau-
ana, ki nakasuaana ; naga nagisa 12
ni Nawota anigida Yesu ega vei tea
samasamaniana doko mu, go naga
nimu kuga vei tea samasamaniana
doko asa, ega vae nasaupiaana ki
Supe anigida go ki Nawota Yesu
Kristo.
Matele 2.
Ma au pavarani mu, tai maga, 1
nalo ni naumaiana ki Nawota ani-
gida Yesu Kristo, go ni nasaisaiana


2 anigida paki nia, naga kuga ta pei
tea varivariakiana maraverave fne-
ludua ki namidodoana animu mau,
go naga kuga ta mataku mau, pae
naatana, kite pae navasaana, kite
pae epistole dapala e pae garni,
dapala naga naaleatia ki Nawota
3 e doko ragi waia ; te naata ega
ta pilasurue mu dapala vatuna mau;
nalakena ega wo da umai mau pa
pa namelupanoana ega wo pea umai,
go naatamoli ni namarinaleosaana
ega wo pei tea maripakasakiana,
4 natu ni namatepuoliana, tea waina
e dugoro po dumana dape a pakilagi
dapau tea maga mamau puti waina
eu pei tea sosoana ki Supe kite
waina eu pei tea lotukiana ; dapala
waina nae e dasake ekopu ni nasufna
tapu ki Supe, e dumana pisei ki nia
5 naga e pei Supe. Ku da midoa ki
nia, naga, ragi waina a ko doko
sikoti mu, a noa ki mu tea maga
6 wanogoe kite 1 Go ragi waia ku
atae tea waina e do puagoro, naga
nae ega vei tea maripakasakiana
7 ragi aneana. Nalakena paia ni
nasigisigileoana e do posiwosi sua :
ma sikai e doko waina e do puagoro
ragi waia pa pa ega wo pei tea
tapeluaana meludua ki maleoputo.
8 Go ragi wanogoe tea sigisigileo ega
wo pei tea maripakasakiana, waina
Nawota Yesu ega wo maripunue a
ki namero ni nawokana, po mari-
puoli ki nia ki navakilinaana ni
9 naumaiana aneana; nae, waina
naumaiana aneana e pae nawosi-
wosiana ki Satan doko sara naka-
suaana go sara navaivaiana go sara
tea ni nanamagaana ni nasoroso-
-10 roana, go doko sara nasurueana ni
namarinaleotageleana magi tea maga
waina eu do mate puoli; nalakena
eu da dape nadodomiana ni nalo-
mauana mau, naga euga vei tea
11 mautipauriana. Go nalakena tea
wanogoe Supe e do dipakilua paki
da nawosiwosiana sikai ni namidoa-
kipeleana, naga euga saralomau
nasorosoroana : naga euga mamau 12
puti pei tea vasapotaeana waina
eu da saralomau nalomauaua mau,
ma eu midoakimata ki namarinaleo
tageleana.,
Ma e one garni one naga auga 13
vasadodomata ki Supe sara ragi
nalo kakamu, tai maga tea dodomi-
ana pae Nawota, nalakena Supe e
matadoa mu pae ragi vea pa pa
paki namautipauriana doko namari-
dautaukiana ki Naatana go nasara-
lomauana ni nalomauana ; waina 14
e soso mu paki asa pae narogo-
rogoana wia aginami, paki natalua-
ana ni nasamasamaana ki Nawota
anigida Yesu Kristo. Nalakena 15
tea wanogoe, tai maga, kuga lawo-
du, go kuga tapesoki navasaana
vituakiana maga waina ku pei tea
vasapiseikiana ara, e pe vae navasa-
ana, kite e pe vae epistole aginami.
Ma Nawota anigida Yesu Kristo 16
nae, go Supe Tamagida waina e
dodomi gida po dua gida navakava-
kaleana waina e du mau du go na
leogoroana wia doko nasaupiaana,
eroga vasapakavakale napopomu 17
po lawosoki ra doko sara nawosiana
wia go sara navasaana wia.
Matele 3.
Tea edaku, tai maga, kuga to 1
maginami dapasavasa, naga nava-
saana ki Nawota ega sava po pei
tea samasamaniana, ega takiusi
waina e doko sikoti mu; go naga 2
auga vei tea vualuaana inelu dua
ki naatamoli maga waina eu midoa-
kisapo go waina eu sigisigileo ; nala-
kena tea maga mamau puti eu da
peani nasaralomauana mau. Ma 3
Nawota e pei lomau, waina ega wo
lawosoki mu, po pavaigoro mu
meludua ki tea sigisigileo. Go au 4
pavatu doko Nawota nalo kakamu,
naga ku do mari go naga kuga wo


do mari tea maga waina an dipa
ski mu ara. Go Nawota ega viragi
napopomu euga vaki nadadomi-
Supe-ana, go paki nasokiana ki
Kristo.
6 Ma au dipa ki mu, tai maga, doko
nagisa ni Nawota anigida Yesu
Kristo, naga kuga tumamu suka ki
mu melu dua ki sara taigida waina
eu surata noginogi, go e da pae
navasaana vituakiana mau waina
7eu dape aki agami. Nalakena ku
dumamu atae dapala waina e one
mu one naga kuga mari oli garni:
nalakena au da mari noginogi
8 maleoputo kakamu mau; go au
da gani moli ki navi naga melu te
naata mau, ma doko nawosima-
wosaana go nawosipitinuana, au do
posiwosi pogi go aleati, naga auga
ta pei tea madaga one te naata
9 kakamu mau: eda pei nalakena
au da peani naveinawotaana kaka-
na mau, ma naga auga tumagami
mari garni auga manimu pei naatu-
lakeana sikai, naga kuga mari oli
10 garni. Go nalakena ragi waina au
doko sikoti mu au dipa ki mu tea
waia, naga Te naata e pe ta
masauna naga ega wosiwosi mau,
11 ega ta ganikani mau! Nalakena
au dogo te naata seara waina eu
surata noginogi maleoputo kakamu,
waina eu da posiwosi te navatuna
mau, ma eu do pasapinoa ki nawosi-
ana ki tea pota maga. Ma tea maga 12
waina eu dapala nogoe au dipa ki
da po pasa parati ki da doko Nawota
Yesu Kristo, naga euga to posiwosi
ega vilake natatamateana, go naga
euga to gani navinaga adeada. Ma 13
nimu, tai maga, kuga ta pei tea
popotoro mari tea wia mau. Go 14
te naata sikai e pe ta dogo parati
ki navasaana aginami pae epistole
waia mau, kuga vaivai ki naata
wanogoe naga kuga ta sikoti-sari a
mau, naga ega maliere. Go kuga 15
ta midoa ki nia dapala e pei tea
kokona sikai mau, ma kuga ta-
pavanau sa dapala e pei taigida
sikai.
Ma Nawota ni natamateana nae 16
ega tua mu natamateana sara ragi
pae sara vatuna. Nawota ega
sikoti mu.
Navasadodomiana aginau Paulo 17
ki namelearugu, waina e pei navai-
vaiana doko sara epistole : a do
midiri dapala nogoe. Nasaupiaana 18
ki Nawota anigida Yesu Kristo ega
sikoti puti mu.
EPISTOLE® YEA KI PAULO APOSTOLO
TIMOTHEO.
Matele E
1 Paulo, Apostolo sikai ki Kristo
Yesu pae natipakiana ki Supe Tea
Maumau pauri anigida, go ki
Kristo Yesu naleogoroana anigida ;
paki Timotlieo, natugu lomau 2
doko nasaralomauana : Nasaupia-
ana, nadodomiana, natamateana,
melu Supe Tama go Kristo Yesu
Nawota anigida.
Dapala waina a pavarani ko 3


naga pa toko Efeso doko, ragi waina
a surata paki Masedonia pano, naga
pa tipagoro te naata seara naga euga
4 ta pasapisei ki pano pota man, go
naga euga ta dogo parati ki nava-
saana sorosoro maga man go nanoa-
ana ni navakilinaana maga waina
nanopuana kakada e dika, waina eu
pitua ki navusuusuana maga, ma
eu da pitua ki naleoparatikiana
sikai ki Supe mau waina e doko
5 nasaralomauana. Ma namarisua-
ana ni natipakiana e pei nadodo-
miana mclu popo tautau go nadu-
fnada-atae-ana wia go nasaralomau-
ana waina e da pei nakalepoana
6 mau : waina te seara eu papele ara
po dawasi paki navasapaloana:
7 eu masauna naga euga vei tea vasa-
piseiki maga ni nawotaeana, go eu
da midoakiatae tea maga waina eu
do noa ra mau, go tea maga waina
eu do noasokisoki nalo kakada
8 mau. Ma tu atae naga nawotaeana
e pia, te naata e pe marimaari a pae
9 nawotaeana, doko atae tea waia,
naga nawotaeana e da magi Muta-
nt oli leana pei tea tawanakiana mau,
ma e magi tea tapiri maga go tea
vei pauluulu maga, magi tea maga
waina eu da matau ki Supe mau go
tea maga waina eu mari naleo sa,
magi tea maga waina eu da dautau
mau go tea marisaudoa maga, magi
tea wokati tamada maga go tea
wokati pilada maga, magi tea mari-
-10 punue naatamoli maga, magi tea
maripele maga, magi tea maga
waina eu maripele paki tea marioli
nagoroi, magi tea vanako naata-
moli maga, magi tea sorosoro maga,
magi tea vivisa sorosoro maga, go
te navatuna pota e pe toko waina e
mari panopota ki navasapiseikiana
11 ni namauiiana ; pae narogorogoana
wia ni nasamasamaana ki Supe
maropa, waina kinau a pei tea
vavatuana asa.
12 A pasadodoinata ki tea waina e
mari au a kasua, Kristo Yesu
Nawota anigida, nalakena e midoa
ki nau naga a pei lomau, doko
dawana ki nau raki nasuasuaana
aneana ; waina sala vea a pei tea 13
vasasaki, go tea kopalele, go tea
marisaki; ma a pei tea dodomiana,
nalakena a pei sapo ragi waina a
mari a, a ko da saralomau mau;
go nasaupiaana ki Nawota anigida 14
e parua paruparua liu pilake nasara-
lomauana go nadodomiana waina e
doko Kristo Yesu. Navasaana waia 15
e pei lomau, go e pia ki sara na
tapesokiana, naga Kristo Yesu o
umai paki maramana naga ega
mautipauri tea mari naleo sa maga ;
waina kinau a pei tea warua liu
kakada : ma a pei tea dodomiana 16
nalakena tea waia, naga Yesu
Kristo ega visei ki naveimaritasoki-
parau-ana mamau aneana doko au
tea vea, naga ega vei naatulakeana
sikai agi tea maga waina euga edaku
saralomau pavatu asa paki namau-
riana waina edu mau du. Ma agi 17
Nawota ni ragi varau maga, waina
e mari sapo mate, waina e da pei
tea vunusiana mau, Supe sikai
maau, nadodomadaganiana go
nasamasamaana eroga vei aneana
pa pa ega tu du po du mau du.
Amen.
Natipakiana waia a pitua ki nia 18
paki-go, natugu Timotheo, pae na-
veanoasaiana maga waina eu pea
pano nalo kalftffia, naga pa mari na-
vakalo ara namarinavakaloana wia;
doko do peani nasaralomauana go 19
natumama-atae-ana wia ; waina te
seara eu dipadoa ra po mari rarua
mawora nalo ni nasaralomauana :
waina Humenaio go Alexander ero 20
pei seara kakada; waina a pitua
ki da paki Satan, naga eroga vei tea .
varati-piseikiana naga eroga ta
pasa sa ki mau.


Matele 2.
1 Nalakena tea wanogoe a pasa
parati ki, pea ki tea maga mamau
puti, naga kuga mari natarotaroana
maga, natapasavasaana maga, na
vavaraniana maga, navasadodoma-
takiana maga, magi naatamoli maga
2 mamau puti; magi nawota maga
go tea maga mamau puti waina eu
pakilagi; naga tuga viragi duaduru
namauriana matemate go tatainate
sikai doko sara namatau-ki-Supe-
ana go' sara navunutaana wia.
3 Tea wanogoe e pia go e pei tea
viragiana namata ni Supe Tea
4 Maumau pauri anigida ; waina e
masauna naga naatamoli maga
mamau puti euga vei tea mautipau-
riana, po umai paki naataemataki-
-5 ananinalomauana. Nalakena Supe
sikai maau e doko, go tea vae na
mawota sikai maau e doko nama-
wota ni Supe go ni naatamoli maga,
nae me pei naatamoli sikai, Kristo
6 Yesu, waina e dufnana pitua ki nia,
e pei naulu ni natauluaana magi tea
maga mamau puti; nanoasokisoki-
ana kakana ega wo pei tea mariana
7 ragi kakana maga; waina kinau a
pei tea tawanakiana raki nia tea
rogorogo sikai go Apostolo sikai
(a noa nalomauana, a da sorosoro
mau), tea vasapiseiki sikai ki tea ni
nalauna pota maga doko nasara-
lomauana go nalomauana.
8 Nalakena tea wanogoe a masauna
naga naanoai maga euga to dapa-
savasa sara tokoro, doko do dara-
sike namelearu tautau maga, masale
ki namaetoana go navululuana.
9 Dapala nogoe, naga nagoroi maga
euga tufnada dikei ki da ki tea
suniana mariusiana, pilake namali-
ereana go namidodoapiaana; ega
ta doko viria maga ni naloluda, go
cold kite napati ni vilavila maga
kite sugoro maga waina navakoko-
-10 toana kakada e parua mau; ma
(tea waina e pataka ni nagoroi
maga waina eu lagasai namatau-
ki-Supe-ana) ega vae nawosiana
wia maga. Nagoroi ega ataedogo 11
doko natatamateana doko Sara
natoko-etano-ana. Ma ada suasua 12
ki nagoroi sikai naga ega vasapiseiki
mau, kite naga ega maramara
dapau naanoai mau, ma naga ega
toko natatamateana. Nalakena 13
Adam e pei tea marklawanakiana
pea, Eva e edaku; go Adam eda 14
pei tea vilasurueana mau, ma
nagoroi e pei tea vilasurueana po
dowo paki natapiriana: ma ega 15
wo pei tea mautipauriana pae
naviragi-pipia-ana, eu pe toko na
saralomauana doko go nadodomiana
go namaridautaukiana pilake na
midodoapiaana.
Matele 3.
Navasaana waia e pei lomau, Te 1
naata e pe laga naveitealeoparati-
kiana e pe masau nawosiana wia
sikai. Nalakena tea wanogoe e one 2
tea leo parati ki one naga ega tapala
ega ta pei tea vasadipaana mau, ega
vei anawota ki nagoroi sikai maau,
ega ta pei tea matamaloku mau,
ega vei tea midodoa pia, tea
tumana mariusi a, tea dodomi na
fnenaki maga, tea mariatae pasa-
piseiki; ega ta pei tea vasapuka 3
mau, ega ta pei tea vividipa mau ;
ma ega vei tea marimatemate, ega
ta pei tea vululu mau, ega ta pei
tea dodomi mone mau; ega vei 4
tea maraki mata ki nasuma aneana,
doko peani natuna maga euga toko
etano paki nia pilake sara naveina-
vunutawiaana ; (ma te naata e pe 5
ta atae naga ega maraki nasuma
aneana mau, e pe wo leo parati ki
ekkalesia ki Supedapale sava ?) ega 6
ta pei tea saralomau vau mau, naga
napopona ega ta pakilagi mau, go
naga ega ta dowo paki natipakoto


7 viana ni diabolo mau. Go e one
asa one naga ega veani nanoasoki-
sokiana wia melu tea ni etaku maga;
naga ega ta dowo paki navasapinoa-
kiana go vaivai ki diabolo mau.
8 Dapala nogoe e one diakono maga
one naga euga vei navunuta wia,
euga ta pei tea daleo dua mau, euga
ta pei tea munu parua ki waine
mau, euga ta pei tea masau nata-
-9 luaana sa niau; euga to dapesoki
paia ni nasaralomauana doko natu-
10 mada-atae-ana tautau. Go nara ma
euga vei tea maridogoana pea;
edaku ki nia eu pe ta pei tea vasa-
dipaana mau, euga mari nawosiana
ki diakono.
11 Dapala nogoe e one nagoroi maga
one naga euga vei navunuta wia,
euga ta pei tea vasadipa mau,
euga ta pei tea matamaloku mau,
euga vei lomau nalo ni naleo maga
mamau puti.
12 Diakono maga euga vei adawota
ki nagoroi sikasikai sarasara ra, tea
maraki inata ki natuda maga go
13 nasuma adeada maga. Nalakena
tea maga waina eu mari inata ki
nawosiana ki diakono eu dumada
madeada dalua malo vaduana wia,
go naviviariana warua doko nasara-
lomauana waina e doko Kristo
Yesu.
14 A midiri tea maga wanogoe
paki-go, doko do leogoro naga aga
15 valoti punusi ko inaraverave ; ma
a pe mari daliali, naga pa atae
dapala waina e one ako one naga
pa to mari a doko nasuma ki Supe,
waina e pei ekkalesia ki Supe mauri,
tipa go laketano ni nalomauana.
16 Go pae nanoasaiana paia ni nama-
tau-ki-Supe-ana e parua ; nae waina
e pakilina doko napokasi, waina e
pei tea marileanakiana doko naata-
na, waina e pei tea vunusiana ki
agelo maga, waina e pei tea rogo-
rogokiana maleoputo ni nalauna
magi, waina e pei tea saralomauana
doko maramana, waina e pei tea
virgiana sake paki nasamasamaana.
Matele 4.
Ma Naatana e noa ki nanoaana 1
naga ragi edaku maga te naata
seara euga wo ineludua ki nasaralo-
mauana pano, doko do dogo parati
ki naatana vila surue maga, go
navasapseikiana maga ki dimon
maga, pae naveinakalepoana ki tea 2
maga waina eu do pasasorosoro,
doko aso natumadaataeana ki airon
vivitinu sikai; doko do dipagoro 3
naga euga ta pitawiri mau, po do
dipaki naga euga vali ki navinaga
maga, waina Supe e dawana ki da
naga euga vei tea tapepotaeana
pilake navasadodomatakiana magi
tea maga waina eu saralomau po
atae inata ki nalomauana. Nala- 4
kena sara nalo tawanakiana ki
Supe eu pia, go te navatuna sikai
ega ta pei tea tipadoaana mau, e pe
vei tea tapeana pilake navasado-
domatakiana : nalakena e pei tea 5
maridautaukiana pae navasaana ki
Supe go navavaraniana.
Ku pe mari taigida maga euga 6
midoa ki tea maga wanogoe, pa wo
pei tea suasua wia sikai ki Kristo
Yesu, tea tumarna pisei ki-go ki
navasaana maga ni nasaralomauana,
go ni navasapiseikiana wia waina ku
dausi sikoti a : ma navasaana soro- 7
soro moli maga go ki nagoroi matua
maga pa tipadoa ra. Go pa to
dufnama posiwosi ako paki nama-
tau-ki-Supe-ana : nalakena nawo- 8
siwosi-napatoko-ana e silae raki tea
kiki, ma namatau-ki-Supe-ana e
silae raki naleo maga mamau puti,
e peani nasaiana ni namauriana
waina e doko ragi waia, go ni tea
waina ega wo umai. Navasaana 9
wanogoe e pei lomau, go e pia ki
sara natapesokiana. Nalakena tu 10
do posiwosi-mawosa raki tea wano-


goe po pei tea vasapinoakiana, nala-
kena tu do leogoro-pavatu Supe
rnauri, waina e pei Tea Maumau
pauri ki naatamoli maga mamau
puti, parua liu ki nia ki tea maga
11 waina eu saralomau. fa to dipa ki
da naleo maga wanogoe po do pasa-
-12 pisei ki da ara. Te naata sikai ega
ta midoakipalo ki navei-natureai-
ana anigo man ; ma pa vei naatula-
keana sikai ni tea saralomau maga,
nalo ni navasaana, nalo ni nato-
mariana, nalo ni nadodomiana, nalo
ni nasaralomanana, nalo ni natau-
-13 tauana. fa to mari, pa pa aga
valoti, naveveana, navasaparatiki-
-14 ana, navasapiseikiana. fa ta mi-
doakikalau navituamolikiana waina
e doko ako, waina e pei tea vitua-
kiana paki-go pae naveanoasaiana,
pilake navusakeana ni namelearu
maga ni nasaisaiana ni tea matua
15 maga. fa midoa ki parati ki tea
maga wanogoe, pa toko tea maga
wanogoe, naga narisuana anigo ega
toko lina ki tea maga mamau puti.
16 fa tumama leo parati ki-go go ki
navasapiseikiana anigo. fa toko
mau doko tea maga wanogoe;
nalakena pa to mari tea wanogoe,
go pa wo dufnama mautipauri ko
asa go tea maga waina eu do dogo
ko.
Matele 5.
-1 fa ta pasapokati tea matua sikai
mau, ma pa vasa parati ki nia ega
tapala tama sikai; natureai maga
2 euga tapala tai maga; nagoroi
matua maga euga tapala pila maga ;
nagoroi atara maga euga tapala
gore maga doko sara natautauana.
3 fa dodomadagani nagoroi malepu
maga waina eu pei malepu lomau.
4 Ma te nagoroi malepu sikai e pe
veani natuna seara kite natu ni
natuna seara, euga vea ataedogo
naga euga mari pae namatau-ki-
Supe-ana paki tea ni nasurna adea-
da, go naga euga lagati dua tea
matua adeada maga : nalakena tea
wanogoe e pei tea viragiana namata
ni Supe. Ma tea waina e pei 5
nagoroi malepu lomau, po masikina
doko, e do leogoro-pavatu Supe, po
doko mau doko navavaraniana
maga go natapasavasaana maga
pogi go aleati. Ma tea waina edo 6
ganikani po do munu po do sori
paragoto e mate ragi waina e mauri
doko. Tea maga wanogoe ma pa 7
to pitipaki ara, naga euga tapala
euga ta pei tea vasadipaana mau.
Ma te naata sikai e pe ta pea midoa 8
ki tea aneana ma'ga mau, go parua
liu ki nia ki tea maga ni nasurna
aneana mau, e pe vasagoro nasara-
lomauana, go e pe sa liu tea waina
e da saralomau mau. Te naata 9
sikai ega ta pei tea midiriana naga
e pei malepu waina e ko da pei tea
ni natau rualima latesa mau, ana-
goroi ki naanoai sikai maau, tea 10
noasokisokiana nalo ni nawosiana
wia maga ; e pe vakale sua piakiki
seara, e pe viragi sua namenaki
maga, e pe same sua namele ni tea
tautau maga, e pe silae sua tea
riesokiana maga, e pe rausi sua
sara nawosiana wia. Ma nagoroi 11
malepu kasua maga pa tipadoa ra :
nalakena ragi waina euga marilagi-
lagi dipa Kristo, euga wo masauna
naga euga laki; eu peani navasa 12
potaeana nalakena eu marimalau-
weluki paki nasaralomauana vea
adeada. Go eu ataedogo ragi sikai 13
maau wanogoe naga euga toko
moli, doko do surata pa sara nasurna
maga; go eu da doko moli sikina
mau, ma eu pei tea vasasarasarape
maga go tea vasapinoa maga, po do
pasa tea maga waina e da pia mau
naga euga vasa ara. Nalakena tea 14
wanogoe a masauna naga tea
malepu kasua maga euga laki, euga
viragi pipia maga, euga maraki


nasuina, euga ta dua tea kokona te
nalakena sikai ni nasuoriana mau :
15 nalakena ragi waia te seara eu
16 dawasi sua dausi Satan. Te na
goroi saralomau sikai e pe veani
tea malepu seara, ega silae ra, go
ekkalesia ega ta pei tea mariana ega
maraga ki da mau ; naga ega silae
tea maga waina eu pei malepu
lomau.
17 Tea matua maga waina eu maraki
pia euga vei tea midoakiana naga
eu pia ki nadodomadaganiana dua-
rua, parua liu ki nia tea maga
waina eu do posiwosi mawosa
navasaana go navasapiseikiana.
18 Nalakena navasaana midiriana e
naga, Pa ta pauasi ox mau ragi
waina e do pasilesue korn. Go,
Tea wosiwosi e pia ki namoriana
19 aneana. Navasadipaana sikai dipa
tea matua sikai, e pe ta pei tea
noasokisokiana pae tea noasokisoki
dua kite dolu mau, pa ta dape a
20 mau. Tea maga waina eu mari
naleo sa pa vasakasua ki da
namata ni tea maga mamau puti,
naga tea pota maga ma euga
mataku.
21 A noasokisoki kasua paki-go na
mata ni Supe go ni Kristo Yesu,
go ni agelo matadoaana maga, naga
pa vavaigoro tea maga wanogoe
masale ki naveapasapotaeana, doko
da marPte navatuna pae nakereana
22 mau. Pa ta pusake namelearu
maga inaraverave te naata sikai
mau, go pa ta saisaipeani namari-
naleosaana maga ki naatamoli pota
maga mau : pa tumafna mauti ko
23 pa tautau doko. Pa ta moro pei
tea mununoai mau, ma pa munu
waine ega kiki nalakena napaloa-
lapafna go nasasanaana paka lapa
24 anigo. Namarinaleosaana maga ki
naatamoli seara eu dokolina, eu do
pea ki da paki navasapotaeana
pano; ma tea ki naatamoli seara
25 eu dausi ra pano. Dapala nogoe
nawosiana maga waina eu pia eu
dokolina ; go tea maga waina eu
pano pota eu mari sa pei tea
tasurukiana.
Matele 6.
Tea maga waina eu pei naviti 1
etano ki nakau ni nanoa euga
midoa ki nawota adeada maga naga
eu pia ki sara nadodomadaganiana,
naga nagisa ni Supe go navasapisei-
kiana eroga ta pei tea vasasakiana
mau. Go tea maga waina eu 2
peani nawota saralomau maga, euga
ta midoakipalo kida mau, nalakena
eu pei taida maga; ma euga
madeada suasua ega warua rua, na-
lakena tea maga waina eu mamau
dape namarimatakiana eu pei tea
saralomau go tea dodomiana. Tea
maga wanogoe pa to pasapisei ki
da ara go pa to pasa parati ki da
ara.
Te naata sikai e pe vasapiseiki 3
pano pota, po da umai paki nava-
saana maga ni namauriana mau,
navasaana maga ki Nawota anigida
Yesu Kristo, go navasapiseikiana
waina e pae namatau-ki-Supe-ana ;
e pe vei tea popo vakilagi, doko da 4
atae te navatuna mau, ma e sasana
nalo ni navusuusuana maga go
navululuana maga ni navasaana
maga, waina tea maga waia eu
melu ara paki lina, naroitoiana,
navileana, navasasakiana maga, na
midodoana sa maga, navululuana 5
kasua varau maga ki naatamoli
maga waina namidodoana adeada
e madada, go waina nalomauana e
pei tea vutiluaana ki ada, waina eu
do midoa ki nia naga namatauki-
Supe-ana e pei napua sikai ni na-
taluaana. Ma namatauki-Supe-ana 6
pilake namaroana e pei nataluaana
warua : nalakena tu da dape te 7
navatuna umai paki maramana
mau, go nalakena tu da mariatae


dape te navatuna meludua ki nia
8 pano mau ; ma tu pe veani navinaga
go nakovagoroana maga tuga wo
peani tea lapa tea maga wanogoe.
9 Ma tea maga waina eu masauna
naga euga vei sogolapa eu dowo
paki namaridogoana go vaivai sikai
go namasauana sa lapa tea manu-
matavusa maga go tea marisaki
maga, tea tapala waina eu diioa ki
naatamoli maga paki namarisakiana
10 go namatepuoliana. Nalakena na
dodomi-mone-ana e pei nakoa ni
sara nasaana maga mamau puti:
waina te seara eu-dumada sai ki da
paki asa po sasapo pano meludua
ki nasaralomauana, po dumada
lawosasama ara ki narogokitesaana
lapa.
11 Ma nigo, naatamoli ki Supe 0,
pa savadua ki tea maga wanogoe ;
go pa sava dausi namarinaleolea-
naana, namatauki-Supe-ana, nasara-
lomauana, nadodomiana, nasokiana,
12 namatemateana. Pa maripilele na
vileleana wia ni nasaralomauana,
pa vuasoki namauriana waina e du
mau du, waina ku pei tea sosoana
paki asa, go ku noasai nanoasaiana
wia namata ni tea noasokisoki lapa.
13 A pasa parati ki-go namata ni
Supe, waina e do paka mauri ki
naleo maga mamau puti, go ni
Kristo Yesu, waina e noasokisoki
narae ni Pontio Pilato nanoasai-
14 ana wia; naga pa vavaigoro
natipakiana, ega ta loa mau, ega ta
pei tea vasadipaana mau, pa pa paki
navakilinaana ki Nawota anigida
15 Yesu Kristo : waina ega wo pisei
ki da asa ragi aneana maga, waina
e pei tea maropa go waina e sikina
pei Nawota Kasua mau, Tea Mara-
mara ki tea maramara maga, go
Nawota ki nawota maga ; waina e 16
sikina peani namatesapoana, po
doko namarama waina te naata e
da mariatae paki asa mau ; waina
naatamoli maga sikai kakada e ko
da punusi a mau, go e da mariatae
punusi a mau: waina nadodoma-
daganiana ega vei tea aneana go
namarakiana waina e du mau du.
Amen.
Pa tipa ki tea maga waina eu pei 17
sogolapa doko maramana waia, naga
euga ta pei tea popovakilagi mau,
go naga euga ta leogoro-pavatu
natikaana ni nalomauana ni nasogo-
lapaana mau, ma naga euga leogoro
pavatu Supe, waina e do dua gida
pae nasogolapaana naleo maga ma-
mau puti naga tuga maxo ara;
naga euga to marimataki, naga euga 18
