vei sogolapa nalo ni nawosiana wia
maga, naga euga vei tea vitua fnoli-
ki pia, tea suasua mari polosi;
doko do dumada madeada doropusi 19
daua ki laketano wia sikai raki
ragi waina ega wo umai, naga euga
vuasoki namauriana waina e pei
namauriana lomau.
Timotlieo 0, pa vavaigoro tea 20
waina e pei tea vituakiana pahi-go,
go pa to maradoa meludua ki
nadaleo palo moli maga, go ki
natugoronana maga ni tea waina
e pei tea sosoana sorosoro ki
naataeana; waina te seara eu 21
lagasai a po papele nalo ni na-
saralomauana. Nasaupiaana ega
sikoti ko.


EPISTOLB KERUA KI PAULO APOSTOLO
TIMOTHEO.
Matele 1
1 Paulo, apostolo sikai ki Kristo
Yesu pae namasauana ki Supe,
dapala nasaiana ni namauiiana
2 waina e doko Kristo Yesu, paki
Timotheo, natugu dodomiana : Na
saupiaana, nadodomiana, nata-
mateana, fnelu Supe Tama go
Kristo Yesu Nawota anigida.
3 A pasadodomata ki Supe, waina
a maneaua suasua pae tea matua
vea aginau maga pa pa doko
natumaguataeana tautau, dapala
waina a peani namidoakiana nalo
kakama pitipatipa doko navava-
-4 raniana aginau maga, pogi go
aleati a do masau parua ki naga
aga vunusi ko, a do midoa ki na
ririmatama maga, naga aga vei tea
5 vakavuroana ki nalaelaeana ; a
dape namidoakiana ni nasaralomau-
ana waina e da pei nakalepoana
mau waina e doko ako; waina
e pea doko atenama Lois, go
pilaina Eunike; go a saralomau
6 kasua naga e doko ako. Tea
wanogoe e pei nalakena a mari ko
pa midoa ki naga pa suipugoni
navituamolikiana ki Supe, waina
e doko ako pae navusakeana
7ni namelearugu maga. Nalakena
Supe e da dua gida naatana ni
napilakeana mau; ma e dua gida
naatana ni nakasuaana go ni na
dodomiana go ni namarimidodoa-
piaana. Nalakena tea wanogoe 8
pa ta maliere ki manoasokisokiana
ni Nawota anigida mau, go pa ta
maliere ki nau tea soliana aneana
mau : ma pa magi narogorogoana
wia soki tea sa sikoti au ega vae na
kasuaana ki Supe ; waina e mauti- 9
pauri gida, po soso gida ki nasosoana
tautau sikai, e da pae nawosiana
anigida maga mau, ma e pae na
midoakisokiana aneana go nasau-
piaana, waina e pei tea vituakiana
paki-gida doko Kristo Yesu pea
ki ragi maga ni tuai mau, ma ragi 10
waia e pei tea mariana e dokolina
pae navakilinaana ki Tea Maumau
pauri anigida Kristo Yesu, waina e
maripuoli ki namateana, po ma-
ramalagati namauriana go nameso-
sapoana pae narogorogoana wia,
waina kinau a pei tea tawanakiana 11
raki nia tea rogorogo sikai, go
apostolo sikai, go tea vasapiseiki
sikai. Go tea wanogoe e.pei nala- 12
kena a sua tea sa maga waia ; ma
a da maliere mau; nalakena a
atae tea waina a pavatu asa, go a
saralomau kasua naga e mariatae
pavaigoro tea waina a pitua ki nia
paki nia raki naaleatia wanogoe.
Pa tapesoki naatulakeana ni 13
navasaana maga ni namauriana
waina ku dogo e ki-agu, doko
nasaralomauana go nadodomiana
waina e doko Kristo Yesu. Tea 14
wia wanogoe waina e pei tea


vituakiana paki-go pa vavaigoro e
pae Naatana Tapu waina e doko
gida doko.
15 Ku atae tea waia, naga tea maga
mamau puti waina eu doko Asia
eu maradoa meludua ki nau pano ;
Fucelo go Hermocene ero pei seara
16 kakada. Nawota ega vitua ki na
dodomiana paki nasuina ni One-
siforo : nalakena e paka lapa paka
maromaro ki nan, go e da maliere
17 ki namori ni vatu aginau man ; ma
ragi waina e doko Eoma, e mareka-
-18 reka laga au, po papai an (Nawota
ega tua e naga ega vapai nadodo-
miana melu Nawota naaleatia
wanogoe); go naleo lapa waina e
maginau suasua ara Efeso, nigo ku
atae fnata ki nia.
Matele 2.
1 Nalakena tea wanogoe, natugu,
pa vei tea mariana pa kasua doko
nasaupiana waina e doko Kristo
2 Yesu. Go tea maga waina ku
dogo ra ki-agu narae ni tea noasoki-
soki lapa, pa vitua ki tea maga
wanogoe paki naatamoli lomau
maga, waina euga wo mariatae
gasapisei ki tea pota maga am.
3 Pa soki tea sa sikoti au, ega tapala
naatamoli ni navakalo wia sikai
4ki Kristo Yesu. Te naata waina
e pei tea mari navakalo e da
dumana soli a ki nawosiana maga
ni namauriana waia mau; naga
ega vei tea wia namata ni tea
waina e soso e naga ega vei tea ni
5 navakalo. Go te naata epe vilele,
e pe ta pilele pae nawotaeana mau,
e pe ta pei tea vauvaukiana mau.
6 Tea wosiwosi natano waina e do
posiwosi-mawosa e one asa one
naga ega vea tapepotae nawa
7 maga. Pa midoakiatae tea waina
a noa e ; nalakena Nawota ega wo
dua ko namidoakiataeana nalo ni
8 naleo maga mamau puti. Pa
midoa ki Yesu Kristo, waina e
duleana meludua ki tea mate maga,
waina e pei tea ni nawoia ni David,
pae narogorogoana wia aginau:
waina a sua tea sa asa pa pa paki 9
natali solisoli maga, dapala tea
mari naleo sa sikai; ma navasaana
ki Supe e da pei tea soliana mau.
Nalakena tea wanogoe a soki na 10
leo maga mamau puti nalakena
tea matadoaana maga, naga nara
ma euga tape namautipauriana
waina e doko Kristo Yesu pilake
nasamasamaana waina e du mau
du. Navasaana waia e pei lomau :11
Nalakena tu pe mate sikoti a, tu
pe wo mauri sikoti a : tu pe soki 12
tea sa, tu pe wo maramara sikoti a ;
tu pe wo pasagoro e, nae e pe wo
pasagoro gida : tu pe ta saralomau 13
mau, nae e pe vei lomau doko ;
nalakena e marisapo dumana pasa-
goro e.
Pa mari ra euga midoa ki tea 14
maga wanogoe, doko do noasokisoki
kasua paki da namata ni Nawota,
naga euga ta pululu nalo ni nava-
saana maga mau, waina e da pia ki
te navatuna mau, ma e dapolosiwo
ki tea maga waina eu dogo. Pa mari 15
inarekareka naga pa tumaina lawo
ki-go narae ni Supe pei tea mari-
dogopiragiana sikai, tea wosiwosi
sikai waina ega ta maliere mau,
waina e do dovapotae leana ki
navasaana ni nalomauana. Ma pa 16
lawodu uvea ki nadaleo palo fnoli
maga: nalakena euga wo disu
parua ki nasigisigileoana pano, go 17
navasaana adeada ega wo ganikani
dapala namanuka meso sikai; nara
Humenaio go File to ero pei seara
kakada; naatamoli waina ero pa- 18
pele nalo ni nalomauana, doko do
noa naga namoroduleanaana e pei
tea mariana sua, po do dapolo siwo
ki nasaralomauana kite naata
seara. Ma laketano kasua ki Supe 19
e lawodu, doko peani navulusokiana


waia, Nawota e atae tea maga
waina eu pei tea aneana: go, Sara
naata waina eu do noa nagisa ni
Nawota euga ineludua ki namari-
20 naleodageleana pano. Ma nasuma
warua sikai naleo maga ni cold go
ni silver eu da sikida doko asa mau,
ma tea ni nakau go ni naruku ma
eu doko asa ; go te seara eu pei
tea ni nadodomadaganiana, go te
seara eu pei tea ni nadododaoana.
21 Go te naata e pe tufnana mari a ega
tautau ineludua ki tea maga wa-
nogoe, e pe wo pei naleo ni nadodo-
madaganiana, tea tapugoioana, tea
wia ki Nawota, tea marimatakiana
22 raid sara nawosiana wia. Ma pa
sava dua ki namasauana sa maga
ni naveinatureaiana, go pa sava
dausi namarinaleoleanaana, nasara-
lomauana, nadodomiana, natainate-
ana, sikoti tea maga waina eu
pioso paki Nawota fnelu popo tau-
-23 tau. Ma navusuusuana maga ni
namanumatavusaana go ni navei-
nalopaloana pa tipadoa ra, ku atae
naga eu pei nalakena ni navululuana
24 maga. Go e one tea suasua ki
Nawota one naga ega ta pululu mau,
ma naga ega vei tea manainai paki
tea maga mamau puti, tea mari-
atae pasapiseiki, tea soki tea sa,
25 doko do paratipisei ki pae namate-
mateana tea maga waina eu lawo-
dugoro : mase Supe e pe wo dua ra
namidoakidoaana paki naataeinata-
-26 kiana ni nalomauana te ragi, go
naqa euga atusake ineludua ki
vaivai ki diabolo, waina eu pei tea
vuapavakotoana pae asa, naga euga
mari namasauana Aneana.
Matele 3.
1 Ma pa atae tea waia, naga ragi
kasua maga euga wo umai doko
2 naaleatia edaku maga. Nalakena
naatainoli maga euga wo pei tea
tufnada dodomi ra, tea dodomi mone,
tea vasapakavakae, tea leomadaga,
tea vasasaki, tea rogo piri nadaleo
ni tea matua adeada maga, tea ta
dodomataki mau, tea ta dautau
mau, tea tika ki nadodomiana paki 3
tea adeada maga, tea ta doropusi
namaetoana mau, tea vasadipa, tea
marisapo dufnada soki ra, tea mila,
tea ta dodomi tea wia mau, tea 4
vituaki, tea mari paragoto, tea
popo vakilagi, tea dodomi parua
ki namaropaana po dodomi kikx
ki Supe, waina eu peani naleo- 5
dawanakiana ni namatauki-Supe-
ana, ma eu pasagoro nakasuaana
kakana ; go tea maga wanogoe pa
maradoa ineludua ki da pano.
Nalakena nara seara kakada eu pei 6
tea maga waina eu do sili pana-
ko paki ekopu ni nasuma maga,
po do piragilua pavakoto nagoroi
manumatavusa maga, tea vei taua
ni namarinaleosaana maga, tea
viragiluaana ki namasauana sa
pisarasara maga, tea ataedogo 7
sara ragi, po da mariatae umai paki
naataeinatakiana ni nalomauana
te ragi mau. Ma dakiusi waina 8
Yanne go Yambre ero lawodugoro
Moses, dapala nogoe nara ma eu do
lawodugoro nalomauana; naata-
inoli maga waina namidodoana
adeada e madada, tea tipadoaana
maga nalo ni nasaralomauana. Ma 9
euga wo da moro disu parua mau ;
nalakena naveilalasigisigileoana ade-
ada ega wo dokolina ki tea maga
mamau puti, dapala waina tea ki
naatainoli dua wanogoe e pei tea
mariana e dokolina.
Ma nigo ku dausi sua aginau na 10
navasapiseikiana, natomariana, na
midoakisokiana, nasaralomauana,
naveimaritasokiparauana, nadodo-
miana, nasokiana, nakopaleleana 11
maga, narogokitesaana maga, tea
maga waina eu pakilina ki nau
Antiokia, Ikonio, Listra; nakopa-
leleana warua maga waina a sua ra:


go Nawota e pualua au meludua ki
12 puti ra. loro, go tea maga mamau
puti waina eu masauna naga euga
mauri pae namatauki-Supe-ana
doko Kristo Yesu euga wo pei tea
13 kopaleleana. Ma naatamoli sa
maga go tea surue maga euga wo
disurisu po sa parua, doko do piragi
sasapo po do pei tea viragi-sasapoki-
-14 ana. Ma nigo pa toko naleo maga
waina ku ataedogo sua ra po
ataemata ki da, ku atae tea maga
15 waina ku ataedogo ra ki ada ; go
naga ku atae navasaana midiriana
tapu maga pae ragi waina ku pei
pipia, waina eu mariatae mari ko
pa manumatua paki namautipauri-
ana pae nasaralomauana waina
16 e doko Kristo Yesu. Sara navasa-
ana midiriana eu pei tea maro-
pituakiana pae Supe, go eu pia ki
navasapiseikiana, ki natapavanau-
ana, ki namarimatakiana, ki na
varatipiseikiana waina e doko na
17 marinaleoleanaana : naga naatamoli
ki Supe ega vei tea wia lua, tea
mari matakiluaana raki sara nawosi-
ana wia.
Matele 4.
1 A noasokisoki kasua faki-go na
mata ni Supe go ni Kristo Yesu,
waina ega wo pasapotoe tea mauri
go tea mate maga, go pae navaki-
linaana aneana go namarakiana
2 aneana ; pa to dogorogo ki navasa-
ana ; pa lawodu asa ragi wia, ragi
sa ; pa tapavanau, pa vasa kasua,
pa vasa parati ki, doko sara navei-
maritasokiparauana go sara navasa-
-3 piseikiana. Nalakena ragi ega wo
umai waina euga wo da soki na-
vasapiseikiana ni namauriana asa
mau, ma pae namasauana sa adeada
euga wo dumada madeada daua ki
tea vasapiseiki maga, eu makalakala
4 nadaligada ; go euga wo doa nada-
ligada meludua ki nalomauana, go
euga wo madadoa paki navasaana
sorosoro maga. Ma nigo pa vei tea 5
midodoa pia nalo ni naleo maga
mamau puti, pa soki tea sa, pa
mari nawosiana ki tea rogorogo ki
naiogorogoana wia, pa vakavuro
nasuasuaana anigo. Nalakena ki- 6
nau a do pei tea takiana ragi waia,
go ragi ni naineluana aginau e pei
maladigi. A marimari sua namari- 7
mariana wia, a marisua nasavaana,
a pavaigoro nasaralomauana ; vau- 8
vau ni namarinaleoleanaana e
maginau pei tea toropusiana pae
ragi waia pa pa, waina Nawota, tea
vasapotae leana, ega wo dua au asa
naaleatia wanogoe : go ega wo da
dua au sikigu asa mau, ma ega wo
dua tea maga mamau puti asa
waina eu dodomi navakilinaana
aneana.
Pa mari marekareka naga pa 9
umai punusi au maraverave : nala- 10
kena Dema e doropusi au, e dodomi
maramana waia, go e paki Thessalo-
nika pano; Kreske e paki Galatia,
Tito e paki Dalmatia. Luka sikina ll
e doko sikoti au. Pa vuati Marko,
po piragi a ega sikoti ko umai :
nalakena e pia ki nau raki nasua-
suaana. Ma a dipakilua Tukiko 12
paki Efeso pano. Sugoro kovagoro 13
waina a doropusi a Troas nasufna
ki Karpo, pa tape a umai ragi
waina pa wo umai, go tusi maga,
parua liu ki nia nawili maga.
Alexander tea vei mataisau ni kopper 14
e mari tea sa lapa paki nau : Na
wota ega wo lagati dua e ega vae
nawosiana aneana maga ; go nigo 15
ma pa tumama pavaigoro ko padua
ki nia: nalakena e lawodugoro
parua ki navasaana aginami maga.
Ragi ni navasakorokoroana vea 16
aginau te naata sikai e da umai silae
au asa mau, ma tea maga mamau
puti eu doropusi au : ega ta pei tea
midoakiana dipa ra mau. Ma Na 17
wota e lawodu sikoti au, po mari


au a kasua; naga navitaua ega
vei tea rogorogokipakavuroana pae
au, go naga tea ni ni nalauna pota
maga euga mamau puti dogo; go
a pei tea vualuaana meludua ki
18 nawoka ni laion. Nawota ega wo
pualua au meludua ki sara nawo-
siana sa, po mautipauri au paki
namarakiana aneana ni nakoroate-
lagi: waina nasamasamaana ega
vei aneana pa pa ega tu du po du
mau du. Amen.
Pa vasadodomi Priska go Akula, 19
go nasuma ni Onesifeio. Erasto e2O
doko Korintho: ma a doropusi
Trofimo doko Mileto e sasana.
Pa mari marekareka naga pa umai 21
ega vea ki ragi ni namaladiana.
Eubulo e pasadodomi ko, go Pudens,
go Lino, go Klaudia, go taigida
maga mamau puti.
Nawota ega sikoti naatama. Na 22
saupiaana ega sikoti mu.
EPISTOLE KI PAULO
TITO.
Matele 1.
1 Paulo, tea suasua sikai ki Supe,
go apostolo sikai ki Yesu Kristo,
pae nasaralomauana ki tea mata-
doaana maga ki Supe, go naatae-
inatakiana ni nalomauana waina e
2 pae namatau-ki-Supe-ana, doko na
leogoroana ni namauriana waina e
du mau du, waina Supe, waina e
marisapo sorosoro, e sai a pea ki
3 ragi maga ni tuai mau; ma e mari
navasaana aneana e dokolina ragi
kakana maga doko navitaua, waina
kinau a pei tea vavatuana asa pae
natipakiana ki Supe Tea Maumau-
-4 pauri anigida ; paki Tito, natugu
lomau pae nasaralomauana wolo-
siana : Nasaupiaana go natamate-
ana nielu Supe Tama go Kristo Yesu
Tea Maumau-pauri anigida.
5 Tea waia e pei nalakena a doro-
pusi ko ku doko Krete, naga pa
marileana ki ki tea maga waina eu
ko puoli, po lawo ki tea matua
maga doko sara natokoana, ega
tapala waina kinau a dipa ki sua ko
asa ; te naata e pe ta pei tea vasa- 6
dipaana mau, anawota ki nagoroi
sikai maau, doko peani natuna
maga waina eu saralomau, waina eu
da doko navasadipaana ni namari-
darataraana mau kite waina eu da
pei pauluulu mau. Nalakena e one 7
tea leo parati ki one naga ega ta
pei tea vasadipaana mau, ega tapala
tasiga leo parati ki ki Supe ; ega ta
pei tea to mari namasauana aneana
mau, ega ta pei tea maeto marave-
rave mau, ega ta pei tea vasapuka
mau, ega ta pei tea vividipa mau,
ega ta pei tea masau nataluaana sa
mau; ma ega vei tea dodomi 8
namenaki maga, tea dodomi tea
wia, tea midodoa pia, tea leana, tea
tautau, tea tumana soki a ; doko 9
do dape soki navasaana lomau
waina e pae navasapiseikiana, naga
ega mariatae pasa parati ki doko
navasapiseikiana ni namauriana, po


pasa kasua ki tea vasadugoro maga.
10 Nalakena tea vei pauluulu lapa
eu doko, tea vasapalo maga, go tea
poposurue maga, parua liu ki nia
tea ni natovadaviviana maga, waina
e one ara one naga nawokada euga
11 vei tea wogoroana ; naatamoli maga
waina eu do dapolo siwo ki nasurna
mamau maga, doko do pasapisei
ki da tea maga waina e one ara one
naga euga ta pasapiseiki da ara man,
12 nalakena nataluaanasa. Nara sikai
kakada, teaveanoasai adeada sikai,
e naga, Naka rti Krete eu pei tea
sorosoro sara ragi, nalo mila sa
maga, tea tuatua liu mamale maga.
13 Nanoasokisokiana wanogoe e pei
lomau. Nalakena tea wanogoe pa
vasakasua makali ki da naga euga
vei tea ni namauriana nalo ni na
14 saralomauana, doko da dogo parati
ki navasaana sorosoro maga ki naka
ni Yudea mau, go ki natipakiana
maga ki naatamoli maga mau,
waina eu maradoa nielu dua ki
15 nalomauana. Naleo maga mamau
puti eu magi tea tautau maga pei
tea tautau ; ma tea maga waina eu
loa po da saralomau mau te nava-
tuna sikai e da madeada pei tea
tautau mau; ma namidodoana
adeada go natumadaataeana ero loa.
16 Eu do noasai naga eu atae Supe;
ma eu do pasagoro e ki nawosiana
adeada maga, eu pei tea mama-
ragokiana, go tea rogopiri, go
paki sara nawosiana wia tea
tipadoaana.
Matele 2.
1 Ma nigo pa to pasa tea maga
waina eu pataka ni navasapisekiana
2 ni namauriana : naga mariki maga
euga ta pei tea matamaloku mau,
• euga vei navunuta wia, tea midodoa
pia, tea ni namauriana nalo ni
nasaralomauana, nadodomiana, na
3 sokiana : naga vitariki maga euga
tapala nogoe pei tea vataka ni tea
tapu maga nalo ni namariana, euga
ta pei tea vasadipa mau, euga ta
pei naviti ni waine warua mau,
euga vei tea vasapiseiki maga ni
tea wia; naga enga sekula ki nagoroi 4
atara maga naga euga vei tea dodomi
adawota maga, tea dodomi natuda
maga, tea midodoa pia, tea tautau, 5
tea wosiwosi doko nasurna adeada
maga, tea vakale, tea toko etano
paki adawota maga, naga navasaana
ki Supe ega ta pei tea vasasakiana
mau : dapala nogoe pa vasa parati 6
ki natureai maga naga euga vei tea
midodoapia : nalo ni naleo maga 7
mamau puti pa tumama pisei ki da
ako naatulakeana sikai ni nawosi-
ana wia maga; navasapiseikiana
anigop® visei ki da natautauana asa,
naveinavunutawiaana, navasaanani 8
namauriana, waina e marisa pei tea
tipakotoviana, naga tea waina e pei
tea maridipa ega maliere, ragi
waina e da peani te navatuna sa
mau waina ega noa e nalo kakagida.
Pa vasa parati ki tea suasua maga 9
naga euga toko etano paki nawota
adeada maga, go naga euga vei tea
midoakimatakiana nalo ni naleo
maga mamau puti; naga euga ta
pasa dugoro mau ; euga ta lawogoro 10
mau, ma euga to pisei ki da sara
naveilomauana wia; naga euga
rikei ki navasapiseikiana ki Supe
Tea Maumau pauri anigida nalo ni
naleo maga mamau puti. Nalakena 11
nasaupiana ki Supe e pakilina, e
magi naatamoli maga mamau puti
piragi namautipauriana, doko do 12
paratipisei ki gida, naga tuga to
pasagoro nasigisigileoana go nama-
sauana sa maga ni maramana, go
naga tuga mauri pae namidodoa-
piaana go namarinaleoleanaana go
namatauki-Supe-ana doko mara-
mana waia ; doko do leogoro na 13
leogoroana maropa go navakilina-
ana ni nasamasamaana ki Supe


warua go ki Tea Maumau pauri
14 anigida Yesu Kristo; waina e
manigida, dumana pitua ki nia naga
ega taulua gida meludua ki sara
namarinaleotageleana, po dumana
maneana mari narei sikai euga tau-
tau euga vei tea aneana, tea suisui
paki nawosiana wia maga.
15 Pa to pasa tea maga wanogoe, go
pa to pasa parati ki go pa to pasa
kasuaega vilake sara natipakiana.
Te naata sikai ega ta midoakipalo
ki-go mau.
Matele 3.
1 Pa mari ra euga midoa ki nia naga
euga toko etano paki tea maraki
maga, paki naveinawotaana maga,
naga euga rogo parati ki da, naga
euga vei tea marimata sua paki
2 sara nawosiana wia, naga euga ta
pasa sa kite naata mau, naga euga
ta pei tea vululu mau, naga euga
mari matemate, doko do pisei ki
sara namatemateana paki naata-
-3 moli maga mamau puti. Nalakena
nigida ma tu pei tea manumatavusa
sala vea, tea rogopiri, tea sasapo,
naviti ni namasauana sa maga
go m namaroana maga pisarasara,
doko do piragi namauriana doko
navilosiana go naroitoiana, tea ma-
maragokiana, doko do dumagida
4 pilosi gida. Ma ragi waina navaka-
leana go nadodomi-naatamoli-ana
ki Tea Maumau pauri anigida Supe
5 ero pakilina, nawosiana maga ni
namarinaleoleanaana waina nigida
tu mari ra eu da pei nalakena mau,
ma nadodomiana aneana e pei
nalakena e mautipauri gida, pae
nasarueana ni namoropakilinaana
go namaripaukiana ki Naatana
6 Tapu, waina e da ki parua ki nia
paki gida, pae Yesu Kristo Tea
Maumau pauri anigida ; naga, waina 7
tu pei tea marileanakiana ki nasau-
piaana aneana, tuga vei tea mariana
tuga vei tea veanipioli maga pae na
leogoroana ni namauriana waina e
du mau du. Navasaana wanogoe e 8
pei lomau, go nalo ni tea maga
wanogoe a masauna naga pa to
noasokisoki kasua, naga tea maga
waina eu saralomau navasaana ki
Supe euga midodoa naga euga to
mari nawosiana wia maga. Tea
maga wanogoe eu pia go eu pei tea
silae naatamoli maga: ma pa .9
lawodu uvea ki navusuusuana maga
ni namanumatavusaana, go nanoa-
ana ni navakilinanaana maga, go na
vileana maga, go navululuana maga
nalo ni nawotaeana; nalakena eu
da silae mau go eu pei te palo.
Naatamoli waina e mari tagona pota 10
edaku ki natapavanauana sikai go
kerua pa tipadoa e ; ku atae naga 11
tea tapala nogoe e pei tea limadoa-
ana, po do mari naleo sa, doko
dumana pei tea tipakotoviana.
Eagi waina aga wo dipakilua 12
Aitema paloti punusi ko, kite
Tukiko, pa mari marekareka naga
pa umai paki Nikopoli punusi au :
nalakena a midoakipotae naga aga
toko tokora wanogoe ragi ni nama-
ladiana. Pa vusivusi pae namare- 13
karekaana Zena tea ni nawotaeana
go Apollo pano, naga te navatuna
ega ta puoli ki da mau. Go tea 14
anigida maga ma euga ataedogo
naga euga to mari nawosiana wia
maga nalo ni natikaana maga waina
eu one ara one, naga euga ta pei
tea oro mau.
Tea maga mamau puti waina eu 15
sikoti au doko eu pasadodomi ko.
Pa vasadodomi tea maga waina eu
dodomi gida doko nasaralomauana.
Nasaupiaana ega sikoti puti mu.


BPISTOLB KI PAULO
FILEMON.
Matele 1
1 Paulo, tea soliana sikai ki Kristo
Yesu, go Timotbeo taigida, paki
Pilemon tea dodomiana aginami go
2 tea wosiwosi sikoti garni, go paki
Apfia goregami, go paki Arkippo
tea ni navakalo sikoti garni, go paki
3 ekkalesia ni nasuma anigo : nasau-
piaana ega vei animu go natamate-
ana melu Supe Tamagida go
Nawota Yesu Kristo.
4 A pasadodofnata ki Supe aginau
sara ragi, doko do mari namidoa-
kinoa -ko - ana natapasavasaana
5 aginau maga, a do dogo nadodo-
miana anigo, go nasaralomauana
waina ku peani a pakiNawota Yesu,
go paki tea tautau maga mamau
6 puti; naga nasaisaipeaniana ni
nasaralomauana anigo ega vei tea
marimatua doko naataematakiana
ni sara naleo wia waina eu doko
7mu paki Kristo Yesu. Nalakena
a peani nalaeleaana warua go nava-
kavakaleana nalakena nadodomiana
anigo, nalakena namarita ni tea
tautau maga eu pei tea vakamaro-
marokiana pae ako, taigu.
8 Nalakena tea wanogoe, waina a
peani naviviariana warua doko
Kristo naga aga dipa ki-go tea waina
9 e patakama, ma nalakena nadodo-
miana a pavara, waina a pei tea
tapala Paulo tea matua, go ragi
waia tea soliana sikai ki Kristo
ngtjna-tongoan n.t.
Yesu: a pavarani ko nalakena 10
natugu, waina a pesi a doko natali
solisoli maga, Onesimo, waina sala 11
vea e da pia ki-go mau, ma ragi
waia e pia ki-go go e pia ki nau ;
waina a dipakilua e liliu paloti 12
punusi ko, nae, tea wanogoe e pei
namaritagu : waina kinau a masau- 13
na naga aga mauti a ega sikoti au,
naga ega maginau suasua oli ko
doko natali solisoli maga ni narogo-
rogoana wia : ma masale ki namido- 14
doana anigo a da masauna naga aga
mari te navatuna mau, naga nawia-
ana anigo ega ta dapala e pe vac
navasadieana mau, ma ega vae
naxakarakaana. Nalakena mase el 5
meludua ki-go pano ragi sikai nala-
kena tea waia, naga pa veani a ega
tu mau du; eta moro dapala tea 16
suasua sikai mau, ma e parua liu
tea suasua sikai, e pei tai dodomiana
sikai, e parua liu ki nia paki nau,
ma e parua liu ki nia dapale
paki-go, doko napokasi go doko
Nawota. Nalakena tea wanogoe 17
ku pe midoa ki nia naga kinau a
pei tea saisaipeani, pa viragi soki
a ega tapala epe vei kinau. Ma elB
pe maridagele paki-go te navatuna,
kite te navatuna anigo e pe one
asa one, pa midoa ki tea wanogoe
dipa au ; kinau Paulo a midiri a ki 19
namelearugu, kinau aga wo lagati
pitua ki nia: naga aga ta noa ki-go
naga ku dumama pei naleo aginau


20 waina e one ako one. loro, taigu,
kinau aga veani nalaelaeaana ako
doko Nawota : pa vakamaromaro
21 Id namaritagu doko Kristo. Na
lakena a pavatu narogoparatikiana
anigo a midiri paki-go, doko atae
naga pa wo mari tea waina e parua
22 liu tea maga waina a noa ra. Ma
ragi sikai maau wanogoe pa maginau
marimata ki tokora sikai ni naine-
nakiana; nalakena a do leogoro
naga aga vei tea vituakiana paki
mu pae natapasavasaana animu
maga.
Epafra, tea viragiluapavakotoana 23
sikoti an doko Kristo Yesu e pasado-
domi ko ; go M arko, go Aristarko, 24
go Dema, go Luka, tea wosiwosi
maga sikoti au.
Nasaupiaana ki Nawota anigida 25
Yesu Kristo ega sikoti naatamu.
Amen.
EPISTOLE KI PAULO APOSTOLO
HBBERU MAGA.
Matele 1
1 Supe, waina e pasa ki tamagida
maga tuai doko profeta maga noa
matele ni navasaana lapa go dapala
2 vatuna lapa, ragi edaku ni naaleatia
maga waia e pasa ki gida doko
Natuna, waina e dawana ki nia
naga ega vei tea veani naleo
maga mamau puti, go waina e
mari maramana maga pae asa;
3 waina e pei namaramalagaana ni
nasamasamaana aneana, go na
maridawanakiana ni naveinateaana
kakana, go waina e do silae naleo
maga mamau puti ki navasaana ni
nakasuaana aneana, ragi waina e
mari sua namaridautauana ni na
marinaleosaana maga, e dasake
pisari namelearu ni matua niNata-
-4 tapauana elagi; e pei tea mariana
e pia liu agelo maga, dapala waina
e peani nagisa sikai waina e pia liu
5 adeada. Nalakena e noa ki agelo
maga sei kakada te ragi,
Nigo ku pei Natugu,
Kinau a pesi ko masoso ?
go e moro naga,
Kinau aga wo maneana pei .
Tamana,
Go nae ega wo maginau pei
Natugu ?
Go ragi waina e moro piragi taka- 6
lapa umai paki maramana e naga.
Go agelo maga mamau puti ki
Supe euga lotu ki nia. Go nalo ni 7
agelo maga e naga,
Waina e do mari agelo aneana
maga eu pei nalagi maga,
Go tea suasua aneana maga cu
pei soro sikai ni nakapu :
ma nalo ni Natuna e naga, 8
Malo tasake anigo, Supe 0, e du
du po du mau du ;
Go tiko ni naleanaana e pei tiko
ni namarakiana anigo.
Ku dodomi namarinaleoleanaana, 9
po pilosi nasigisigileoana;
Nalakena tea wanogoe Supe,
Supe anigo, e puvurai ki-go
Ki naroro ni nalaelaeaana parua
liu tama ri maga.


10 Go,
Nigo, Nawota, ragi ni naatulake-
ana ku lawo ki laketano ni
maramana,
Go nakoroatelagi maga eu pei na
wosiana ni namelearuma maga:
11 Nara euga wo puoli; ma nigo
ku 'doko man doko :
Go euga wo mamau puti disu
dual dapala sugoro sikai;
12 Go dapala sugoro kovagoro sikai
pa wo lulu ki da,
Dapala sugoro sikai, go euga wo
pano pota :
Ma nigo ku pei tea sikai maau
doko,
Go natau anigo maga euga wo da
nopu mau.
13 Ma nalo ni agelo maga sei kakada
te ragi e naga,
Pa toko pisari namelearugu ni
matua,
Pa pa aga wo mari tea kokona
ki-go maga euga vei malo
vasiana ni namelema maga ?
14 Eu da mamau puti pei naatana
suasua maga, tea tipakiluaana raki
nasuasuaana nalakena tea maga
waina euga wo peani namautipauri-
ana kite ?
Matele 2.
1 Nalakena tea wanogoe e one gida
one naga tuga rogoparati ki parua
liu ki tea maga waina eu pei
tea rogoana, naga tuga ta sale
2 meludua hi da pano mau. Nala-
kena uavasaana waina e pei tea
vasaana pae agelo maga e pe vei
tea mariana e pe kasua, go sara
natapiriana go sara narogopiriana
eu pe tape namoriana ni navitua-
-3 dipaana leana sikai; nigida tu pe
wo sava fdelu pano dapale sava,
tu pe sarateapalo namautipauriana
warua tapala nogoe ? waina e pea
pei tea vasaana pae Nawota, po
pei tea lawosokiana paki gida pae
tea maga waina eu dogo ; Supe ma 4
e do noasokisoki a sikoti ra, ki
navaivaiana maga go ki tea ni
namagaana maga, go ki namariana
kasua visarasara maga, go ki na
vituapotawotaeana maga ni Naata-
na Tapu, pae namasauana aneana.
Nalakena e da mari maramana 5
waina ega wo umai, waina au do
pasa nalo kakana, e doko etano
paki agelo maga mau. Ma te naata 6
sikai e noasokisoki te tokora sikai,
e naga,
Naatamoli e pei nasava, naga pa
midoa ki nia 1
Kite naatamoli natuna, naga pa
umai punusi a ?
Ku mari a e pakitano kiki ki 7
agelo maga ;
Ku pauvau ki nia ki nasamasa-
maana go ki nadodomadagani-
Go ku lawo ki nia dapau na wo-
siana maga ni namelearuma
maga:
Ku doropusi naleo maga mamau 8
puti eu doko etano ki namele-
na maga.
Nalakena nalo ni waina e doropusi
naleo maga mamau puti eu doko
etano paki nia, e da doro te nava-
tuna mau waina e da doko etano
paki nia mau. Ma ragi waia tu
ko da punusi naleo maga mamau
puti eu pei tea mariana eu doko
etano paki nia mau. Ma tu leo- 9
punusi tea waina e pei tea mariana
e pakitano kiki ki agelo maga, Yesu,
nalakena nasua-navitinumate-ana e
pei tea vauvaukiana ki nasama-
samaana go ki nadodomadaganiana,
naga ega magi sara naatamoli kati-
dogo namateana ki nasaupiaana ki
Supe. Nalakena e pataka ni nae, 10
waina naleo maga mamau puti eu
doko nalakena nae, go waina naleo
maga mamau puti eu pae asa doko,
waina e piragi natuna lapa paki
nasamasamaana, naga ega mari


Nawota ni namautipauri-ra-ana
ega wialua pae narogokitesaana
11 maga. Nalakena tea waina e do
maridautau go tea maga waina eu
do pei tea maritautaukiana eu
mamau puti pei tea ni tea sikai
maau : nalakena tea wanogoe e da
maliere mau naga ega soso ra ki
12 taina maga, e naga,
Aga wo dogodogo ki nagisama
paki taigu maga,
Aga wo lega samasamani ko
maleoputo ni nasaisaiana.
13 Goemoronaga,Kinauagawopavatu
asa. Go e moro naga, Kuga leo, kinau
go piakiki maga waina Supe e dua
14 an ara. Nalakena tea wanogoe nala-
kena piakiki maga eu saisai peani
napokasi go nada, dapala nogoe nae
ma e peanipotae tea sikai maau
maga wanogoe; naga ega man-
puoli pae namateana ki tea waina
e peani namaiakiana ni namateana,
15 tea wanogoe e pei diabolo ; go naga
ega vualua tea maga waina eu pei
tea ni naveinavitiana ki namatau-
ki-namateana-ana pae ragi ni na
16 mauriana mamau adeada. Nala-
kena lomau e da puati agelo maga
mau, ma e puati nawora ni Abra-
-17 ham. Nalakena tea wanogoe e one
asa one naga ega takiusi taina maga
nalo ni naleo maga namua puti,
naga ega vei tea viri warua liu
dodomi go lomau sikai nalo hi
naleo maga waina eu pei tea ki
Supe, naga ega mari naviriana nala-
kena namarinaleosaana maga ki
18 narei. Nalakena nalo ni tea waina
nae e sua navitinuana asa ragi waina
e pei tea maridogoana, e mariatae
silae tea maga waina eu do pei tea
maridogoana.
Matele 3.
1 Nalakena tea wanogoe, tai tau-
tau maga, tea veanipotae nasoso-
ana ni elagi, kuga midoakiusiusi
Apostolo go Tea Viri Warua liu ni
nanoasaiana anigida, Yesu; waina 2
e pei lomau paki tea waina e mari
a, dapala waina Moses ma e pei
lomau doko nasuma aneana ma-
mau. Nalakena nae e pei tea 3
midoakiana naga e pia ki nasama-
samaana warua liu agi Moses,
dapala waina tea waina e davagi
nasuma e peani nadodomadagani-
ana warua liu agi masuma. Na- 4
lakena sara nasuma eu pei tea tava-
giana pae te naata seara, ma tea
waina e davagi naleo maga mamau
puti e pei Supe. Go Moses e pei 5
lomau lomau doko nasuma aneana
mamau dapala tea suasua sikai,
naga ega vei nanoasokisokiana
sikai ni tea maga waina euga
edaku pei tea vasaana; ma 6
Kristo dapala natuna sikai, dapau
nasuma aneana ; go nigida tu pei
nasuma aneana, tu pe tapesoki
naviviariana anigida go tea vaka-
vakaeana ni naleogoroana anigida
ega kasua pa pa paki namata
pago edaku. Nalakena tea wa- 7
nagoe, dapala waina Naatana Tapu
e noa e, e naga,
Masoso ku pe wo dogo nada-
leona,
Kuga ta mari napopomu euga 8
kasua mau, dapala waina eu
mari a ragi waina eu maripau-
luulu,
Dapala waina eu mari a na
aleatia ni namaridogoana
masopalo,
Tokora waina tamamu maga eu 9
maridogo au asa, eu maridogo-
ataepotae au,
Po punusi nawosiana aginau
maga natau rualima pati.
Nalakena tea wanogoe a mama- 10
rago ki tagona wanogoe,
Po naga, Eu do sasapo ki napo-
poda sara ragi;
Ma eu da atae napua aginau
maga mau;


] l Dapala waina a pivisa namaeto- j
ana agmau,
Naga enga wo da umai sidi paki
namaromaroana agmau mau.
12 Kuga vunusi, tai maga, naga popo
sa waina e da saralomau mau,
waina e do melu dua ki Supe
mauri pano, ega ta doko te naata
13 sikai kakamu mau: ma kuga
tufnamu pasa parati ki mu sara
naaleatia, ragi waina e do pei tea
sosoana ki Masoso ; naga te naata
sikai kakamu ega ta pei tea mari-
ana ega kasua ki nasurueana ni
14 namarinaleosaana mau : nalakena
tu pei tea veanipotae Kristo, tu pe
tape soki naatulakeana ni nava-
vatuana anigida ega kasua pa
15 pa paki namatapago edaku : ragi
waina e pei tea noaana,
Masoso ku pe wo dogo nadaleona,
Kuga ta mari napopomu euga
kasua mau, dapala waina eu
man a ragi waina eu man-
pauluulu.
16 Nalakena sei, ragi waina eu dogo,
eu mari pauluulu ? Ma tea maga
mamau puti waina eu melu dua ki
Ityipt umai pae Moses eu da mari
17 a kite ? Go e mamarago ki sei
maga natau rualima pati ? e da
pei ki tea maga waina eu mari
naleo sa, waina napatokoda eu dowo
18 masopalo kite ? Go e pivisa paki
sei maga naga euga wo da umai sili
paki namaromaroana aneana mau,
e pe ta pei e paki tea maga waina
19 eu dogopiri'? Go tu punusi naga
eu marisapo umai sili paki asa na
lakena eu da saralomau mau.
Matele 4.
1 Nalakena tea wanogoe tuga ma-
taku, mase ragi waina nasaiana
sikai e pei tea toropusiana naga
tuga sili paki namaromaroana ane-
ana, te naata sikai kakamu e pe
alagoro da pa parati ki nia mau.
Nalakena narogorogoana wia e pei 2
tea rogorogokiana paki gida, da-
pala waina e pei tea rogorogokiana
paki da : ma navasaana ni narogo-
ana e da marimata ki da mau,
nalakena eu da pei tea marisari-
sariana mau ki nasaralomauana
sikoti tea maga waina eu dogo.
Nalakena nigida waina tu sara- 3
lomau sua tu sili paki namaro-
maroana wanogoe, dakiusi waina
e naga,
Dapala waina a pivisa namaetoana
agmau,
Naga euga wo da umai sili paki
namaromaroana agmau mau:
go nawosiana maga eu pei tea
marisuaana pae nanadiki-laketano-
ana ni maramana. Nalakena enoa 4
sua doko te tokora sikai nalo
ni naaleatia kelarua dapala waia,
Go Supe e maromaro doko na
aleatia kelarua meludua ki na
wosiana aneana maga mamau puti;
go tokora waia e moro naga, 5
Naga euga wo da umai sili paki
namaromaroana agmau mau.
Nalalakena tea wanogoe nalakena 6
e peitea toropusiana madoko naga te
naata seara euga sili paki asa, go
tea maga waina narogorogoana wia
e pea pei tea rogorogokiana paki
da eu da sili paki asa mau nalakena
narogopiriana, e moro dawana ki 7
te naaleatia sikai, Masoso, e noa
doko David, edaku ki ragi varau
dapala nogoe, dapala waina e pea
pei tea noaana, e naga,
Masoso ku pe wo dogo nadaleona,
Kuga ta mari napopomu euga
kasua mau.
Nalakena Yosliua e pe dua sua ra 8
namaromaroana, e pe ta edaku ki
tea wanogoe pasa nalo ni naaleatia
pota sikai mau. Nalakena tea 9
wanogoe namaromaroana sikai ni
sabbath e magi narei ki Supe pei
tea toropusiana madoko. Nalakena 10
tea waina e sili paki namaromaro-


ana aneana nae ma e maromaro
melu dna ki nawosiana aneana
maga, dakiusi waina Supe e maro-
maro meludua ki aneana maga.
11 Nalakena tea wanogoe tuga mari
marekareka naga tuga sili paki
namaromaroana wanogoe, naga te
naata sikai ega ta dowo man paki
naviseikiana sikai maau wanogoe
12 ni narogopiriana. Nalakena nava-
saana ki Supe e mauri, go e pei
toro kasua, go e makali liu sara
lova waina nawokada e dua, go e
do puri pa pa paki natapotaeana
ni namauriana anigida go ni na
ata gida, ni kolopuda maga go ni
namaraeda, go e do midoakipotae
mamidodoarogoana maga go nami-
dodoaleoana maga ni napopo gida.
13 Go tea tawanakiana sikai e da doko
man waina e da dokolina naraena
mau: ma naleo maga mamau
puti eu malamala go eu dokolina
ki namata maga ni tea waina tu
peani naatusi-gida-ana paki nia.
14 Nalakena tea wanogoe waina tu
peani tea viri warua liu warua sikai,
waina e pa duaduru nakoroatelagi
maga, Yesu Natu ni Supe, tuga
tape soki nanoasaiana anigida.
15 Nalakena tu da peani tea viri
warua liu sikai waina e marisapo
dogo sikoti gida namanainaiana
anigida maga mau, ma tu peani
sikai waina e pei tea maridogo-
ana sua nalo ni naleo maga
mamau puti pae natakiusi-gida-
ana, masale ki namarinaleosaana.
16 Nalakena tea wanogoe tuga vivi-
ari umai paki maladigi ki malo-
tokoana ni nasaupiaana, naga
tuga tape nadodomiana, po papai
nasaupiaana raki nasilaeana ragi
kakana.
Matele 5.
1 Nalakena sara tea viri warua liu,
waina eu pei tea viragiana meludua
ki naatainoli maga, eu magi na
atamoli maga pei tea tawanakiana
nalo ni naleo maga waina eu pei
tea ki Supe, naga euga vitua ki na-
vituaana maga go naviriana maga
nalakena namarinaleosaana maga:
waina eu mariatae marimalemale 2
tea maga waina eu pei sapo go tea
maga waina eu sasapo, nalakena
nara ma eu pei tea taligoroana ki
namanainaiana ; go nalakena tea 3
wanogoe e one ara one naga, da-
kiusi waina eu magi narei, dapala
nogoe euga tumada madeada
pitua ki naviriana maga nalakena
namarinaleosaana maga. Go te 4
naata sikai e da dumana maneana
dape nadodomadaganiana wanogoe
mau, ma ragi waina e pei tea
sosoana pae Supe, dakiusi waina
Aaron e pei tea sosoana. Dapala 5
nogoe Kristo ma e da dumana
samasamani a mau naga ega vei
tea mariana ega vei tea viri warua
liu sikai, ma tea waina e pasa
paki nia, e naga,
Nigo ku pei Natugu,
Kinau a pesi ko masoso :
dapala waina e noa e tolcora pota 6
sikai, e naga,
Nigo ku pei tea viri sikai pa pa
ega tu mau du
Pae natakiusiana ni Melkizedek.
Waina naaleatia maga ni napo- 7
kasina, ragi waina e pitua ki sua
natapasavasaana maga go nava-
varaniana maga pilake naviosoana
kasua maga go naririniata maga
paki tea waina e mariatae mauti-
pauri a melu dua ki namateana, go
ragi waina e pei tea rogosuaana na
lakena natapepiaana aneana, go nae 8
e pei Natuna sikai, ma e ataedogo na
rogoparatikiana pae tea sa maga
waina e sua ra ; go ragi waina e 9
pei tea mariana e pia lua sua, e
magi tea maga mamau puti waina
eu dogo parati ki nia pei nalakena
ni namautipauriana waina e du


10 mau du; e pei tea sosoana pae
Supe ki tea viii warua liu sikai
pae natakiusiana ni Melkizedek.
11 Waina nalo kakana au peard
naleo lapa waina auga noa ra,
go waina nanoapotaeana kakada
e kasua. Nalakena ku po pei tea
12 taliali ki nadaligamu. Nalakena
ragi waina e one mu one naga kuga
vei'tea vasapiseiki maga nalakena
ragi, ku moro pei sapo dapala te
naata sikai ega vasapisei ki mu
tea vea maga ni naatulakeana ni
navasaana maga ki Supe, go ku
po pei tea waina milk e pia ki mu,
go navinaga kasua e da pia ki mu
13 mau. Nalakena sara naata waina
eu munu milk e pei navinaga
adeada, eu da atae parua ki na
vasaana ni namarinaleoleanaana
mau ; nalakena eu pei pipia maga.
14 Ma navinaga kasua e pei agi tea
matua maga, agi tea maga waina
nalakena natomariana eu peani
namidoaldataeana adeada maga eu
pei tea marimauana naga euga
midoakipotae tea wia go tea sa.
Matele 6.
1 Nalakena tea wanogoe tuga toro-
pusi navasaana ni naatulakeana ki
Kristo ega madoko, go tuga valoti
paki nawialuaana ; tuga ta moro
nadi ki laketano sikai ni namidoa-
kidoaana inelu dua ki nawosiana
mate maga, go ni nasaralomau-
-2 ana paki Supe, ni navasapisei-
kiana ni nabapetizoana maga,
go ni navusakeana ni namelearu
maga, go ni namoroduleananaana
ki tea mate maga, go ni navasa-
-3 potaeana waina e du mau du. Go
Supe e pe suasua, tuga wo mari tea
4 wanogoe. Nalakena nalo ni tea
maga waina eu paka sikai pei tea
maramalagatiana po katidogo na
vituamolikiana ni nakoroatelagi,
po pei tea mariana eu peanipotae
Naatana Tapu, po katidogo nava- 5
saana wia ki Supe, go namariana
kasua maga ni ragi varau waina
ega wo umai, go waina eu dowo 6
pano, e marisapo pei tea mariana
naga te naata seara euga moro
maripau ki da paki namidoaki-
doaana; waina eu moro dufnada
madeada turi Natu ni Supe nakau
valadagoto, po mari a e pei tea
malierekiana lina. Nalakananatano 7
waina e munu sua usa waina e
paka lapa umai paki asa, go waina
e do pitua ki natapntea waina e
pia ki tea maga waina e pei tea
kiliana nalakena nara, e dape
navasamatakiana inelu Supe : ma 8
tea waina e do pitua ki tea ma-
kalikali maga go tea vivitipa maga,
e pei tea tipadoaana po pei rnala-
digi ki navasasakiana, waina na
matapago edaku kakana e pei naga
ega vei tea taparakiana.
Au pasa dapala nogoe, ma au 9
saralomau kasua nalo kakamu, tea
dodomiana maga, naleo maga
waina eu pia liu tea maga wanogoe,
go naleo maga waina eu pilake
namautipauriana : nalakena Supe 10
e da pei tea tagele mau naga ega
malio ki nawosiana animu go
nadodomiana waina ku pisei ki
nia paki nagisana, ku magi tea
Jautau maga suasuapitua sua go
ku do madeada suasuapitua. Ma 11
au masau parua ki nia naga sara
naata kakamu euga viseiki nafhare-
karekaana sikai maau wanogoe nalo
ni nasaralomaupakavuroana ni na-
leogoroana pa pa paki namatapago
edaku: naga kuga ta pei tea 12
mamale mau, ma naga kuga vei
tea mari oli tea maga waina eu
peani nasaiana maga pae nasara-
lomauana go naveimaritasoki-pa-
rau-ana.
Nalakena ragi waina Supe e mari 13
nasaiana paki Abraham, nalakena
e da peani naga ega vivisa pae tea


waina e parua liu sa, e pivisa
14 dufnana pae asa, e naga, Lomau
aga wo pasapia po pasapia
ki-go, go aga wo mari ko pa wo
15 lapa po lapa. Go dapala nogoe,
ragi waina e pei maritasoki ragi
16 varan, e papai nasaiana. Nala-
kena naataiiioli maga eu pivisa
pae tea waina e parua liu ra : go
navivisaana e madeada pei na
nopuana ni sara navululuana raki
17 nalawosokiana. Nalakena tea wa-
nogoe Supe, waina e midoa ki nia
naga ega visei ki parua liu ki tea
maga waina eu pei tea veani
nasaiana navanopotasapoana ni
namidoakipotaeana aneana, e pae
namawota ki navivisaana sikai:
18 naga pae naleo rua waina ero pe ta
panopota man, waina e mari sapo pei
tea mariana naga Supe ega sorosoro
ara, tuga veani navakavakaleana
kasua, waina tu sava sili sua naga
tuga vuasoki naleogoroana waina
e pei tea toropusiana e one kivea
19 ki gida; waina tu peani a e dapala
agkora sikai ni naatagida, e pei
laketoko go e kasua, go e sili paki
tea waina e doko ekopu ni tea
20 taugoropotae : waina Yesu dapala
tea sava pea sikai e manigida sili
paka asa, waina e pei tea mariana
e pei tea viri warua liu sikai pae
natakiusiana ni Melkizedek.
Matele 7.
1 Nalakena Melkizedek wanogoe,
nawota ni Salem, tea viri ki Supe
Yakilagi mau, waina e sua Abraham
ragi waina e do liliu pae naatugi-
ana ni nawota maga, po pasa
2 pia ki nia, go waina Abraham e
maneana potawotae kekerualima
sikai ni naleo maga mamau puti
(e pea pei Nawota ni namarina-
leoleanaana pae navasadoaana, go
e aku ki tea wanogoe e pei
Nawota ni Salem, waina e pei
Nawota ni natamateana; tamana e 3
dika, pilana e dika, pauna maga
eu dika, e da peani naatulake-
ana ni naleatia maga mau, go
e da peani nanopuana ni namau-
riana mau, ma e pei tea mariana
e dakiusi Supe Natuna), e pei tea
viri doko pa pa e du mau du.
Ma kuga midoakipunusi naatamoli 4
wanogoe e parua pa, waina Abra-
ham, patriarke, e dua e kekerua-
lima sikai ihelu naleo tapepava-
kotoana wia liu maga. Go tea 5
maga ni Levi natuna maga waina
eu dape naveiteaviriana eu peani
natipakiana naga euga kekerua-
lima ki narei pae nawotaeana, tea
wanogoe e pei ki taida maga, go
nara eu dave fhelu naware ni
Abraham ; ma tea waina pauna 6
maga eu da pei tea veveana fnelu
ara mau e kekerualima ki Abraham,
go e pasapia ki tea waina e
peani nasaiana maga. Ma ma- 7
sale kite navululuana, tea kiki e
pei tea vasapiakiana pae tea wia
liu sa. Go nalo ni tokora waia na 8
atamoli maga waina eu mate eu
dape kekerualima maga ; ma nalo
ni tea wanogoe tea sikai, waina e
pei tea noasokisokiana naga e
mauri doko. Go dapala waina 9
aga noa e, Levi ma, waina e do
dape kekerualima maga, e pei tea
kekerualimakiana pae Abraham; na 10
lakena e ko doko naware ni tamana,
ragi waina Melkizedek e sua e.
Ma nawialuaana e pe toko pae 11
naveiteaviriana ni naworawora ni
Levi (nalakena narei eu dape
nawotaeana doko asa), natikaana
ni nasava e ko doko naga tea viri
pota sikai ega vakilina pae na
takiusiana ni Melkizedek, go naga
ega ta pei tea noaana pae na
takiusiana ni Aaron mau ? Nala- 12
kena ragi waina naveiteaviriana e
pei tea mariana e pano pota,
navanopotaana sikai ni nawotaeana


ma e one asa one naga ega vei tea
13 mariana. Nalakena tea waina tea
maga wanogoe eu pel tea noaana
nalo kakana e pei tea ni nawora-
woia pota sikai, waina te naata
kakada e da doko raki wede ni
14 naviriana man. Nalakena e doko
lina naga Nawota anigida e
fnelu Yudali pakilina; nalo ni
naworawora wanogoe Moses e da
noa te navatuna nalo ni tea viri
15 maga man. Go tea waina au noa e
e dokolina parua liu, nalakena tea
viri pota sikai pae natakiusiana ni
16 Melkizedek e pakilina, waina e
pei tea mariana, e da pae nawotae-
ana ni natipakiana sikai ni na
pokasi man, ma e pae nakasuana
ni namauriana sikai waina ega wo
17 da makota man: nalakena e pei
tea noasokisokiana nalo kakana.
Nigo ku pei tea viri sikai pa pa
ega tu man du
Pae natakiusiana ni Melkizedek.
18 Nalakena namaripuolikiana ni na
tipakiana sikai waina e pea e doko
nalakena namanainaiana kakana go
19 natikaana ni nasilaeana (nalakena
nawotaeana e da mari te nava-
tuna e pia lua man), go naviragi-
ana umai paki asa ni naleogoroana
wia liu sa sikai, waina tu pae asa
20 paki maladigi ki Supe. Go dapala
waina e da doko masale ki navivi-
21 saana mau (nalakena nara eu pei
tea mariana eu pei tea viri maga
masale ki navivisaana, ma nae e
pilake navivisaana pae tea waina
e noa ki nia, e naga,
Yeliovah e pi visa go ega wo da
midoakidoa mau,
Nigo ku pei tea viri sikai pa pa
ega tu mau du);
22 dapala nogoe ma Yesu e pei tea
mariana e pei tea tu oli ni navasa-
-23 sokiana wia liu sikai. Go nara
eu pei tea mariana eu pei tea
viri lapa, nalakena eu pei tea tu-
goroana k i namateana naga euga ta
doko mau doko mau: ma nae, 24
nalakena e du mau du, e peani
naveiteaviriana waina e pe ta pano
pota mau. Nalakena tea wanogoe 25
e mariatae mautipauri pa pa paki
namatapago edakii mau tea maga
waina eu pae asa paki maladigi
ki Supe, nalakena e mauri doko sara
ragi naga ega madeada pavara.
Nalakena tea viri warua liu 26
dapala nogoe e pataka gida, tea
tautau, tea ta mari sa ki mau, tea
ta loa mau, tea marimasalekiana
meludua ki tea mari naleo sa maga,
go tea mariana e pakilagi liu
nakoroatelagi maga ; waina e da 27
one asa one sara naaleatia mau,
dakiusi waina e one tea viri warua
liu wanogoe maga, naga ega vitua
ki naviriana maga, pea nalakena
namarinaleosaana aneana maga,
go edaku ki tea wanogoe nalakena
namarinaleosaana maga ki narei;
nalakena e paka sikai maau mari
tea wanogoe ragi waina e dumana
pitua ki nia. Nalakena nawo- 28
taeana e dawana ki naatamoli
maga waina eu pilake namanai-
naiana, naga euga vei tea viri warua
liu maga; ma navasaana ni na
vivisaana, waina e edakugoro na
wotaeana, e dawana ki Natuna
waina e pei tea mariana e pia lua
pa pa e du mau du.
Matele 8.
Ma tea warua liu ni tea maga 1
waina eu do pei tea noaana e pei
tea waia: Au peani tea viri warua
liu dapala waia, waina e dasake
pisari namelearu ni matua ni
malo tasake ni Natatapauana doko
nakoroatelagi maga, tea suasua 2
sikai ni tokora tapu, go ni tapau-
pau lomau waina Yeliovah e sike
a, waina naatamoli e da sike a mau.
Nalakena sara tea viri warua liu 3
eu pei tea tawanakiana naga euga


vitua ki navituaana maga go na
viriana maga: nalakena tea wa-
nogoe e one tea viri warua liu
waia one naga nae ma ega veani
4 tea waina ega vitua ki nia. Ma e
pe toko maramana, e pe ta pei tea
viri mau, nalakena tea maga
waina eu pitua ki navituaana
maga pae nawotaeana eu doko;
5 naatamoli maga waina eu do magi
tea waina e pei naviseikiana sikai go
melu sikai ni naleo maga ni na
koroatelagi suasua, dapala waina
Moses e pei tea tipakiana pae Supe
ragi waina e naga ega mari ta-
paupau : nalakena, Pa vunusi, e
noa e, naga pa mari naleo maga
mamau puti euga vae naatulake-
ana waina e pei tea viseiki-
-6 ana paki-go tava. Ma ragi waia
e dape nasuasuaana sikai waina e
pia liu tea wanogoe, dapala waina
ma e pei tea vae namawota ni
navasasokiana wia liu sikai, waina
e pei tea tawanakiana doko na
7 saiana wia liu maga. Nalakena
navasasokiana vea wanogoe e pe ta
pei tea vasadipaana mau, tokora
sikai agi kerua e pe ta pei tea
8 lagaana mau. Nalakena e pasa-
dipa ra, po naga,
Kuga leo, naaleatia maga euga
wo umai, Yehovali e noa e,
Go aga wo mari navasasokiana
vau sikai paki nasuma ni
Israel go paki nasuma ni
Yudah ;
9 Ega wo da pae navasasokiana
waina a magi tamada maga
man a mau
Naaleatia waina a puati na
fnelearuda asa naga aga viragi-
lua ra meludua ki navanua
ni Ityipt;
Nalakena nara eu da doko mau
doko navasasokiana aginau
mau,
Go kinau a dipadoa ra, Yehovali
e noa e.
Nalakena tea waia e pei navasa- 10
sokiana waina aga wo magi
nasuma ni Israel mari a
Edaku ki naaleatia maga wano-
goe, Yeliovah e noa e ;
Aga wo pitua ki nawotaeana
aginau maga paki namido-
doana adeada,
Go aga wo midiri ra doko
napopoda :
Go aga wo madeada pei Supe
sikai,
Go nara euga wo maginau pei
narei sikai:
Go euga wo da pasapisei ki mau 11
sara naata sikasikai ki tea ni
maladigi ki da,
Go sara naata sikasikai ki taida,
po naga, Kuga atae Yeliovali;
Nalakena euga wo mamau puti
atae au,
Pae tea kiki kakada pa pa paki
tea warua kakada.
Nalakena aga wo pei saupia paki 12
namarinaleotageleana adeada
maga,
Go aga wo da moro midoa
ki namarinaleosaana adeada
maga mau.
Nalo ni e naga, Navasasokiana vau 13
sikai, e mari tea vea e duai. Ma
tea waina e do duai po do matua e
pei maladigi ki navuoliana.
Matele 9.
Ma navasasokiana vea ma el
peani natawanakiana maga ni na
lotuana go tokora tapu kakana,
tokora tapu ni maramana waia. Na 2
lakena tapaupau sikai e pei tea
mariana, tea vea, waina nakau ni
nasulu e doko asa, go wede, go
bred tokorae maga; tapaupau
wanogoe e pei tea sosoana ki
tokora Tapu. Go nataku ni tea 3
taugoro kerua, tapaupau waina e
pei tea sosoana ki tokora Tapu


4 parua liu ; waina e peani pan ni
tea ni napo wia ni cold sikai, go
areka ni navasasokiana, tea vuluti-
goroana sara tokora kakana ki
cold, waina lasa ni cold sikai
waina e pai manna e doko asa, go
tiko ki Aaron waina e do siria, go
tea welewelea dua ni navasasoki-
5 ana; go elagi ki nia kerub dua
ni nasamasamaana waina ero do
melugoro tea tapaugoro; nalo ni
naleo maga wanogoe an marisapo
noa sikasikai ki da ragi waia.
6 Ma ragi waina naleo maga wanogoe
eu pei tea marifnatakisuaana da-
pala nogoe, tea viri maga eu do
paki ekopu ni tapaupau vea sara
lagi, eu do mari nasuasuaana
7 maga; ma tea viri warua liu e
sikina paki ekopu ni kerua, paka
sikai natau sikai, e da masale ki
nada mau, waina e do pitua ki
nia nalakena nae, go nalakena
8 nasasapoana maga ki narei. Na
atana Tapu e do" paivai ki tea
waia, naga napua paki tokora tapu
e ko da pei tea mariana e dokolina
mau, ragi waina tapaupau vea e
9 e ko lawodu; waina e pei nalu-
luakia sikai raki ragi waina e doko
ragi waia ; waina pae asa navitua-
ana maga go naviriana maga eu do
pei tea vituakiana, waina eu mari
sapo mari tea lotu e pialua nalo
10 ni natumana-atae-ana, eu pei na-
tawanakiana maga ni napokasi
sikai maau, doko navinaga maga
go noai munuana maga go nasarue-
ana visarasara maga, waina eu
pei tea toropusiana doko ara pa
pa paki ragi sikai ni namarileana-
kiana.
11 Ma Kristo waina e umai tea
viri warua liu sikai ni naleo wia maga
waina euga wo umai, e pae tapau-
pau waina e parua liu go waina e
pia liu tea vea, waina e da pei tea
mariana ki namelearu maga mau,
tea wanogoe e pei, e da pei tea ni
natawanakiana waia mau, go e da 12
pae nada ni naninani anoai maga
go ni kau natuda anoai maga mau,
ma e pae nadana, paka sikai maau
sili paki ekopu ni tokora tapu, po
papai natauluaana waina e du mau
du. Nalakena nada ni naninani 13
anoai maga go ni kau natuda tureai
maga, go natanoapu ni kau ataara
sikai waina e pei tea meseurakiana
paki tea maga waina eu pei tea
mariana eu loa, e pe maridautau
paki natautauana ni napokasi:
e pe warua liu ki nia pa naga nada 14
ni Kristo, waina e pae Naatana
waina e du mau du dumana pitua
ki nia tea mamaau paki Supe,
ega mari natumamu-atae-ana ega
tautau meludua ki nawosiana mate
maga naga kuga magi Supe mauri
suasua ! Go nalakena tea wanogoe 15
e pei tea vae namawota ni navasa-
sokiana vau sikai, naga, pae na
mateana sikai raki natauluaana
ni natapiriana maga waina eu
doko ragi ni navasasokiana tuai,
tea maga waina eu pei tea soso-
ana euga tape nasaiana ni tea
veaniana waina e du mau du.
Nalakena tokora waina naporoa-16
kiana sikai e doko asa e one asa
one naga namateana ki tea waina
e poroa ki ega vei tea viragi-
ana umai. Nalakena naporoakiana 17
sikai e kasua nalo ni tea mate:
nalakena e da kasua te ragi mau
ragi waina tea poioaki e ko mauri
doko. Go nalakena tea wanogoe 18
navasasokiana vea e da pei tea
veakotokotomauana masale ki
nada mau. Nalakena ragi waina 19
sara natipakiana eu pei tea vasa-
suaana pae Moses paki narei ma-
mau pae nawotaeana, e dape nada
ni kau natuda anoai maga wa-
nogoe go ni naninani anoai maga
wanogoe, pilake noai go namau
ni shiip miala kalakala go hussop,
po meseura ki nia paki tusi nae,


20 go paki narei mamau, po naga,
Tea waia e pei nada ni navasasoki-
ana waina Supe e pitipaki asa
21 paki mu. Go tapaupau go na
loriki maga mamau puti ni na
suasuaana e meseura ki nada paki
22 da dapala nogoe. Go maladigi
naleo maga mamau puti eu pei
tea maridautaukiana ki nada pae
nawotaeana, go masale ki nataki-
nada-ana namidoakikorokoroana e
da doko mau.
23 Nalakena tea wanogoe e one asa
one naga tea viseikiana maga ni
naleo maga waina eu doko nakoro-
atelagi maga euga vei tea mari-
dautaukiana ki tea maga wanogoe,
ma naleo maga ni nakoroatelagi
nara euga vei tea maridautaukiana
ki naviriana maga waina eu pia
24 liu tea maga wanogoe. Nalakena
Kristo e da sili paki tokora tapu
sikai waina e pei tea mariana ki
namelearu maga mau, waina e da-
kiusi naatulakeana ni tea lomau;
ma e sili paki nakoroatelagi nae,
naga ega manigida pakilina narae
25 ni Supe ragi waia : go e da sili
paki asa naga ega vaka lapa du-
inana pitua ki nia mau; dakiusi
waina tea viri warua liu e sili paki
ekopu ni tokora tapu sara natau
pilake nada ni tea pota maga;
26 nalakena e pe tapala nogoe e pe
one asa one naga ega vaka lapa
sua navitinumateana pae nanadi-
ki-laketano-ana ni maramana pa
pa; ma ragi waia e paka sikai
maau pakilina ragi' edaku ni ragi
varau maga naga ega maripuoli ki
namarinaleosaana pae naviriana ni
27 nae. Go dakiusi waina e magi
naatamoli maga pei tea tawanaki-
ana naga euga vaka sikai mate, go
edaku ki tea wanogoe navasapo-
-28 taeana; dapala nogoe Kristo ma,
waina e paka sikai pei tea vitua-
kiana sua naga ega tapetape na
marinaleosaana maga ki tea lapa,
ega wo pakilina sala kerua, masale
ki namarinaleosaana, ki tea maga
waina eu do leogoro asa, paki
mamautipauriana.
Matele 10
Nalakena nawotaeana waina e 1
peani melu sikai ni naleo wia
maga waina euga wo umai, e da
peani nunu lomau ni naleo maga
wanogoe mau, e da mariatae te
ragi sikai ki naviriana maga sikai
maau sara natau, waina eu do
pitua ki da pitipatipa, mari tea
maga waina eu rumai paki mala-
digi eu pia lua mau. Nalakena e 2
pe tapala nogoe eu pe ta makoto ki
naga euga vei tea vituakiana
kite ? nalakena tea lotu maga,
ragi waina eu pe vaka sikai pei tea
maridautaukiana, eu pe ta moro
peani te natuinada-atae-ana ni na
marinaleosaana maga mau. Ma na 3
viriana maga Wanogoe namidoa-
kiana ni namarinaleosaana maga
e pei tea mariana ara sara natau.
Nalakena e marisapo pei tea mari- 4
ana naga nada ni kau natuda tureai
maga go ni naninani anoai maga
ega tapelua namarinaleosaana maga.
Nalakena tea wanogoe ragi waina 5
e umai paki maramana, e naga,
Naviriana go navituaana ku da
masau ra mau,
Ma ku maginau maridawana ki
napatoko sikai;
Naviriana taparakiana mamau G
maga go naviriana maga na
lakena namarinaleosaana ku
da midoa ki mata ki da
Ragi wanogoe a naga, ?a leo, a 7
(E pei tea midiriana nalo kakagu
doko naluluakiana ni tusi)
Naga aga mari namasauana anigo,
Supe 0.
Elagi e naga, Naviriana maga go 8


navituaana maga go naviriana ta-
parakiana mamau maga go navi-
riana maga nalakena mamarina-
leosaana ku da masau ra man, go
ku da midoa ki fnata ki da man
(tea maga waina eu pel tea vitua-
-9 kiana pae nawotaeana), ragi wano-
goe e naga, Pa leo, a umai naga aga
mari namasauana anigo. E dape
lua tea vea naga ega lawo ki
10 kerua. Namasauana wanogoe tu
pei tea maridautaukiana asa pae
navituaana ni napatoko ni Yesu
11 paka sikai maau. Go sara tea viri
eu do lawodu sara naaleatia eu
do suasua po do paka lapa pitua
ki naviriana maga sikai maau,
naviriana maga waina eu da mari-
atae dapelua namarinaleosaana
12 maga te ragi mau: ma nae, ragi
waina e pitua ki sua naviriana
sikai nalakena namarinaleosaana
maga pa pa e du mau du, e da-
sake pisari nafnelearu ni matua
13 ni Supe; edo leogoro pae ragi
wanogoe pa pa tea kokona ki nia
maga euga vei tea mariana euga vei
It malo vasiana ni namelena maga. Na
lakenaki navituaana sikai e mari tea
maga waina eu pei tea maridautauki-
ana eu pia lua pa pa e du mau du.
15 Go Naatana Tapu ma e do mani-
gida noasokisoki: nalakena edaku
ki e naga,
16 Tea waia e pei navasasokiana
waina aga wo mari a paki da
Edaku ki naaleatia maga wa-
nogoe, Yeliovah e noa e ;
Aga wo pitua ki nawotaeana
aginau maga doko napopoda,
Go aga wo midiri ra doko na
midodoana adeada;
E moro naga,
17 Go namarinaleosaana adeada
maga go namarinaleotageleana
adeada maga aga wo da moro
midoa ki da mau.
18 Ma tokora waina namidoakikoro-
koroana ni tea maga wanogoe e doko
asa, naviriana nalakena namari-
naleosaana e da moio doko man.
Nalakena tea wanogoe, tai maga, 19
tu peani naviviariana waina naga
tuga vaki ekopu ni tokora tapu
doko nada ni Yesu, pae napua 20
waina e manigida peakotokotomau
asa, napua vau sikai go mauri, pae
tea taugoropotae, tea wanogoe e pei
napokasina; go waina tu peani 21
tea viri warua sikai dapaugoro
nasuma ki Supe ; tuga vaki mala- 22
digi pilake popo vei lomau doko na
vakavuioana ni nasaralomauana,
po dautau ki nameseurakiana ni
nada paki napopogida meludua ki
natumagida-atae-ana sa, go tea
sarueana nalo ni napatokogida ki
noai tautau: tuga vuasoki na 23
noasaiana ni naleogoroana anigida
naga ega ta parivari mau; nala-
kena tea waina e sai e pei lomau :
go tuga tumagida midoa ki gida 24
naga tuga tumagida pasadie gida
paki nadodomiana go nawosiana
wia maga; doko da doropusi 25
nasaisaiki-gida-ana mau, dapala
waina te naata seara eu do mari
a, ma tuga to dumagida pasa
parati ki gida, go tuga mari parua
ki nia ega tapala waina ku punusi
naaleatia wanogoe e do umai paki
maladigi.
Nalakena tu pe rakaraka mari 26
naleo sa edaku ki tu dape na
ataeana ni nalomauana, naviriana
nalakena namarinaleosaana maga
e pe ta moro pei tea toropusiana
naadoko mau, ma te naleogoroana 27
mataukiana sikai ni navasapo-
taeana, go navivitinuana sikai ni
nakapu waina ega wo gani tea
kokona maga. Te naata waina e2B
midoakipalo ki nawotaeana ki
Moses e mate masale ki namarita-
dodomiana narae ni tea noasoki-
soki dua kite eu dolu : ku midoa 29
ki nia naga tea waina e pasi Supe
Natuna pakitano, po midoa ki nia


naga nada ni navasasokiana, waina
e pei tea maridautaukiana asa, e
pei tea moli, po mari sa ki Na
atana ni nasaupiaana, ega wo pei
tea midoakiana naga e pia ki na
varatiana warua liu sa dapale ?
30 Nalakena tu atae tea waina e naga,
Nasikoana e pei aginau, kinau aga
wo pituadipa. Go e moro naga,
Yehovali ega wo pasapotae narei
31 aneana. E pei tea mataukiana
naga euga rowo paki namelearu
maga ni Supe mauii.
32 Ma kuga midoa ki naaleatia vea
maga, waina, ragi waina ku pei
tea maramalagatiana sua, ku soki
navileleana warua sikai ni narogo-
33 kitesaana maga ara; tea waia,
ku pei tea mariana ku pei tea
leopunusiana sikai ki navasapi-
noakiana maga go ki nariesokiana
maga; go tea waia, ku dumamu
mari mu ku pei tea saisaipeani
sikoti tea maga waina eu do pei
34 tea mariana dapala nogoe. Nala-
kena ku dogosikoti tea maga waina
eu pei tea soliana, go ku dape pi-
lake nalaelaeaana natapepavakoto-
ana ni tea veaniana animu maga,
doko atae naga nimu ku peani
tea veaniana sikai waina e pia liu
ra go waina e doko mau doko.
35 Nalakena tea wanogoe kuga ta
nadi ki naviviariana animu pano
mau, waina e peani namoriana ni
36 navituadipaana warua. Nalakena
e pia naga kuga veani nasokiana,
naga, ragi waina kuga mari sua
namasauana ki Supe, kuga wo
dape nasaiana,
37 Nalakena ragi eko kiki sa,
Tea waina e do umai ega wo
umai, go ega wo da maridali-
ali mau.
38 Ma tea leana aginau ega wo
mauri pae nasaralomauana:
Go e pe tuinana sukasuka ki nia,
naatagu e pe ta midoakimata
ki nia mau.
Ma nigida tu da pei tea ni nasuka- 39)
sukakiana paki namatepuoliana
mau ; ma tu pei tea ni na
saralomauana paki namautipauri-
ana ni naatagida.
Matele 11.
Go nasaralomauana e pei na 1
vavatuana ni tea leogoroana maga,
go namidoakipaiana ni naleo maga
waina eu da pei tea vunusiana
mau. Nalakena doko tea wanogoe 2
tea matua maga eu pei tea noaso-
kisokiana asa. Ki nasaralomauana 3
tu midoakiatae naga maramana
maga eu pei tea maridawana-
kiana ki navasaana ki Supe, dapala
tea waina e pei tea vunusiana e
da pei tea mariana melu naleo
maga waina eu dokolina mau.
Ki nasaralomauana Abel e pitua 4
paki Supe ki naviriana sikai waina
e pia liu agi Kain, waina e pei tea
noasokisokiana pae asa naga e
leana, Supe e do noasokisoki nalo
ni navituaana aneana maga : go
pae asa tea waina e mate e ko do
pasa. Ki nasaralomauana Enok 5
e pei tea lawokidqaana naga ega
ta punusi namateana mau; go e
da pei tea vapaiana mau, nalakena
Supe e lawokidoa e : nalakena pea
ki nalawokidoa-e-ana e pei tea
noasokisokiana naga e pei tea
midoakimatakiana ki Supe : go 6
masale ki nasaralomauana e da
pei tea mariataeana mau naga
tuga vei tea midoakimatakiana
aneana : nalakena e one tea waina
e umai punusi Supe one naga ega
saralomau naga e doko, go naga
e pei tea moripituadipa tea maga
waina eu laga parati ki nia. Ki 7
nasaralomauana Noab ragi waina
e pei tea noakisaiana pae Supe
nalo ni naleo maga waina eu ko
da pei tea vunusiana mau, e ma-
taku, po mari areka sikai raki


namautipauriana ni nasuma ane-
ana ; pae tea wanogoe e dipakotovi
maramana, po pei tea maiiana e
pei tea veani namarinaleoleanaana
8 waina e pae nasaralomauana. Ki
nasaralomauana Abraham, ragi
waina e pei tea sosoana, e dogo
parati ki naga ega melu pano paki
tokora sikai waina ega edaku
dape a naga ega vei tea veaniana
sikai; go e mein pano, po da
atae tokora waina ega vaki asa
9 pano man. Ki nasaralomauana e
paki navanua ni nasaiana po ata-
toko asa, dapala e pe ta pei aneana
mau, e do doko tapaupau maga,
sikoti Isaak go Yakob, waina ero
peani sikoti a nasaiana wanogoe
10 sikai maau: nalakena e leogoro
natokoana waina e peani laketano
maga, waina Supe e pei mataisau
11 kakana go tea tavagi a. Ki na
saralomauana Sarah nae ma e
dape nakasuaana naga ega tumau
ki pipia ragi waina e matua liu
ragi kakana, nalakena e midoa ki
nia naga tea waina e sai e pei
12 lomau : go nalakena tea wanogoe
tea lapa eu pakilina melu tea
sikai maau, go nae e mate sua,
tea lapa dapala masoe maga ni
nakoroatelagi, go dapala nawo-
raone, waina e pisari nagole ni na
tasi, waina e mari sapo pei tea
veveana.
13 Tea maga mamau puti wanogoe eu
mate pae nasaralomauana, ragi
waina eu ko da dape nasaiana
maga mau, ma eu punusi sua ra
po pasa dodomi sua ra pae uvea,
po noasai sua naga eu pei namenaki
maga go atatoko maga doko mara-
H mana. Nalakena tea maga waina
eu noa tea tapala nogoe maga eu
mari a e doko lina naga eu do
laga navanua sikai waina ega vei
15 adeada. Go eu pe midoa ki na
vanua waina eu meludua ki nia
pano, eu pe veani ragi naga euga
liliu. Ma ragi wa ia eu rcaiiu
navanua wia liu sa sikai, tea
wanogoe e pei, tea ni nakoroatelagi:
nalakena tea wanogoe Supe e da
maliere ki da man, naga ega vei
tea sosoana ki Supe adeada ; nala-
kena e madeada mari mata ki
natokoana sikai.
Ki nasaralomauana Abraham, ragi 17
waina e pei tea maridogoana, e pi-
tua ki Isaak e pei naviriana: go
tea waina e dapesoki nasaiana
maga e do pitua ki natuna sikedau
e pei naviriana; waina e pei tea 18
vasaana paki nia, e naga, Na
woraworama euga vei tea sosoana
pae Isaak: e midoa ki nia naga 19
Supe e mariatae sike euga du-
leana, meludua ki tea mate maga ;
waina ma e piragi a melu ara liliu
doko naluluakia sikai. Ki nasa- 20
ralomauana Isaak e pasapia ki
Yakob go Esau, nalo ni naleo
maga waina euga wo umai. Ki 21
nasaralomauana Yakob, ragi waina
e naga ega mate, e pasapia ki
sikasikai ki Yosef natuna rua; po
lotu, e kolovagoro napau ni tiko
aneana. Ki nasaralomauana Yosef, 22
ragi waina e pei maladigi naga
ega mate, e midoakinoa nalo ni na
meluana ki Israel natuna maga;
go e pitipaki nalo ni navatuna
maga. Ki nasaralomauana Moses, 23
ragi waina e pakilina, e pei tea
tasurukiana atelagi dolu pae tea
matua aneana maga, nalakena ero
punusi naga e pei piakiki wia;
go ero da matau ki natipakiana
ki nawota mau. Ki nasaralomau- 24
ana Moses, ragi waina e parua
sua, e karai naga ega vei tea soso-
ana ki natu ni Earaoh natuna
nagoroi; doko matadoa naga ega 25
vei tea marisakiana sikoti narei
ki Supe, liu naga ega veani
namaroana ni namarinaleosaana
ragi sikai; doko do midoa ki 26
nia naga navasapinoaki-Kristo-ana


e pei nasogolapaana warua liu
naloriki tauakiana maga ni
Ityipt: nalakena e leo paid na
27 moripituadipaana. Ki nasaralo-
mauana e doropusi Ityipt e ma-
doko, doko da matau ki namari-
tausuana ki nawota mau: na
lakena e mari kasua doko, dapala
e do punusi tea waina e da pei
28 tea vunusiana naau. Ki nasara-
lomauana e mari navakalauana
go nameseura-ki-nada-ana, naga
tea mari sa ki takalapa maga ega
29 ta kisidogo ra mau. Ki nasara-
lomauana eu surata duagoto na
tasi Miala dapala eu pae navanua
garagara: waina tea ni Ityipt
maga ragi waina eu maridogo
naga euga mari a eu pei tea tino-
-30 miana. Ki nasaralomauana nakoro
maga ni Yeriko eu do wo pakitano,
ragi waina eu pei tea taliviri-
-31 kiana sua naaleatia larua. Ki
nasaralomauana Rahab, nagoroi
masausara, e da mate mau sikoti
tea maga waina eu dogopiri, e
piragi tea leo pavaraka maga pi-
-32 lake natamateana. Go aga moro
noa nasava ? nalakena ragi ega
wo puru ki nau a pe to dogorogo
nalo ni Gideon, Barak, Samson,
Yeftliali; nalo ni David go Samuel
33 go tea veanoasai maga: waina pae
nasaralomauana eu marimatua ki
namarakiana maga, eu posiwosi ki
namarinaleoleanaana, eu papai na
saiana maga, eu pogoro nawoka
34 ni laion maga, eu maripunue na
kasuaana ni nakapu, eu sava dua
ki nawoka ni lova, eu pei tea
mariana eu kasua nielu dua ki
namanainaiana, eu pei tea mariana
eu kasua doko navakalo, eu mari
taua maga ni walu pota maga eu
35 sava pano. Nagoroi maga eu pi-
ragi tea mate adeada melu na
moroduleanaana sikai; ma tea
pota maga eu pei tea wokapori-
woriana, doko da dape natau-
luaana mau : naga euga sua na-
moroduleanaana wia liu sa: go 36
tea pota maga eu dape namari-
dogoana ni namarisaudoakiana
maga go ni navaratiana maga ; io,
go ni natali solisoli maga go ni
nasuma ni navavaiana: eu pei 37
tea nadiana ki vatu maga, eu pei
tea sorokotoviana, eu pei tea mari-
dogoana, eu pei tea maripunueana
ki lova: eu surata pasara suni
nawili maga ni skiip, go ni na
ninani maga ; . eu pei tea tika, eu
pei tea reisokiana, eu pei tea
marisakiana (waina maramana e3B
da pia ki da mau), eu do surata
sasapo doko masopalo maga go
tava maga go valea maga, go
nioru maga ni natano. Go tea 39
maga mamau puti wanogoe, waina
eu pei tea noasokisokiana pae
nasaralomauana adeada, eu da
dape nasaiana mau, Supe e pea 40
punusi nalo kakagida te naleo wia
liu sa, naga euga ta pei tea mariana
euga wia lua masale ki gida mau.
Matele 12.
Nalakena tea wanogoe nigida 1
ma, waina tu pei tea talivirigoro-
ana ki napopouru warua tapala
nogoe ni tea noasokisoki maga,
tuga toropusi sara tea madaga,
go namarinaleosaana waina e du
dalivirigoro gida, go tuga sava pae
nasokiana nasavapileleana waina e
pei tea toropusiana e one kivea
ki gida, doko do leopunusi Yesu, tea 2
maraki ni nasaralomauana anigida
go tea mari sua e, waina nalakena
nalaelaeaana waina e pei tea toro-
pusiana e one kivea ki nia e sold
nakau valadagoto, doko midoaki-
palo ki namaliereana kakana, go
e po dasake pisari namelearu ni
matua ni malo tasake ki Supe.
Nalakana kuga midoakiusiusi tea 3
waina e soki navasadugoroana ta


pala nogoe pae tea mari naleo sa
maga dipa ra, naga kuga ta ma-
wosa man., doko da do dodosua ki
4 naatamu man. Ku ko da lawo-
dugoro pa pa paki nada man,
doko do maripilele dipa namari-
-5 naleosaana: go ku malio ki na
vasaparatikiana waina e pasa ki
mu dapala ku pei natuna maga,
e naga,
Natugu, pa ta midoa ki palo ki
navaratipiseikiana ki Yehovah
Go pa ta dodosua mau ragi waina
ku pei tea vasakasuakiana pae
asa;
G Nalakena tea waina Yehovah e
dodomi a e paratipisei ki nia,
Po parati sara natuna waina e
piragisoki ra,
7 Ku soki raid navaratipiseikiana;
Supe e mari paki mu dapala ku pei
natuna maga; nalakena natuna
sei e doko waina tamana e da
8 paratipisei ki nia mau ? Ma ku
pe toko masale ki navaratipisei-
kiana, waina tea maga mamau
puti eu pei tea mariana eu pea-
nipotae a, ku pe vei natu ni
navanakoana, po da pei natuna
9 maga mau. Go tea pota sikai, tu
peani sua tamagida maga ni napo-
kasigida tea varatipiseiki maga,
go tu dodomadagani ra: tuga ta
doko etano ega warua liu ki nia
paki Tama ni naatana maga, po
10 mauri doko kite ? Nalakena nara
eu paratipisei ki gida naaleatia
visa maau dapala waina eu midoa
ki mata ki nia; ma nae raki
namarimataki-gida-ana, naga tuga
veanipotae natautauana aneana.
11 Sara navaratipiseikiana ragi waina
eu doko eu da alagoro pei tea ni
nalaelaeaana mau, ma eu pei tea
ni nasusueana; ma ragi edaku eu
magi tea maga waina eu pei tea
mari-mau-ana pae ara pitua ki
nawa tafnate ni namarinaleoleana-
nguna-tongoan n.t.
ana. Nalakena tea wanogoe kuga 12
sike namelearumu waina ku doro
ra eu dau, go napatuamu waina
eu sarumate; go kuga magi na 13
melemu mari napua leana maga,
naga tea waina e pei pito ega ta pei
tea roaana fheludua ki napua mau,
ma naga ega vei tea maripauriana.
Kuga sava dausi natamateana 14
sikoti tea maga mamau puti, go
namaridautaukiana waina masale
ki nia te naata sikai ega wo da
punusi Yehovah mau: doko do 15
leo parati ki naga te naata sikai
ega ta pa-pele ki nasaupiaana ki
Supe mau; naga te nakoa sikai
ni nakokonaana ega ta pisou paki-
lagi po mari sa ki mu mau, go naga
tea lapa euga ta pei tea mariana
euga loa pae asa mau; naga te 1G
tea maripele sikai ega ta doko
mau, kite te naatamoli moli sikai
dapala Esau mau, waina e sori
raki nakaniana sikai tea ni navei-
takalapaana aneana maga. Nala- 17
kena ku atae naga ragi waina e
edaku masauna naga ega veani
navasapiakiana, e pei tea tipa-
doaana (nalakena e da papai te
tokora sikai ni namidoakidoaana
mau), go e laga parati ki nia pilake
naririmata maga.
Nalakena ku da umai paki ina- 18
ladigi ki tava sikai waina e pe vei
tea tovidogoana go waina e soro
ki nakapu mau, go ki naloaana, go
ki namaligo, go ki nalagi atu, go 19
Id nadaleo ni paiga, go ki nadaleo
ni navasaana maga mau ; nadaleo
waina tea maga waina eu dogo e
eu pavara naga te navasaana sikai
ega ta moio pei tea sokariana
paki da mau; nalakena eu mari 20
sapo dapetape tea waina e pei tea
vitipakiana. Nalo tua vati sikai
e pe kisidogo tava e pe wo pei tea
nadiana ki vatu; go tea waina 21
e pei tea vunusiana e pei tea ma-
taukiana dapala waina Moses e naga,


A mataku parua po durururu:
22 ma ku umai paki maladigi ki tava
Zion, go ki natokoana ki Supe
mauri, Yerusalem ni nakoroate-
lagi, go ki tivilia maga ni agelo
23 maga, ki nasaisaiana ni tea lapa
go ekkalesia ni takalapa maga waina
eu pei tea midiriana nakoro-
atelagi, go ki Supe, Tea Vasapotae
tea maga mamau puti, go ki na
atana maga ni naatainoli leana
maga waina eu pei tea mariana eu
24 pia lua, go ki Yesu tea vae na
mawota ni navasasokiana van, go
ki nada ni nameseurakiana, waina
25 e pasa pia liu agi Abel. Kuga
vunusi naga kuga ta dipadoa tea
waina e do pasa. Nalakena nara
eu pe ta savadua mau ragi
waina eu dipadoa tea waina e pasa
doko maramana, nigida tuga wo
savadua dapale sava tu pe do
maradoa padua ki tea waina e do
26 pasa pae nakoroatelagi ? waina
nadaleona e parivaria ki mara-
mana ragi wanogoe: ma ragi
waia e sai, po naga, Kinau aga
wo moro paka sikai durua ki mara-
mana ega ta sikina mau, ma aga
27 wo durua ki nakoroatelagi. Go
navasaana wanogoe, Moro paka-
sikai, e paivai ki nalawokidoaana
ni naleo maga waina eu pei tea
varivariakiana, dapala ni naleo
maga waina eu pei tea mariana,
naga naleo maga waina eu da pei
tea varivariakiana mau euga toko
28 mau doko. Nalakena tea wanogoe,
waina tu do dape namarakiana
sikai waina e marisapo pei tea vari-
variakiana, tuga veani nasaupiaana,
waina tuga magi Supe suasua
pae asa ega tapala waina ega
midoa ki mata ki nia ega
vilake natape-pia-ana go namata-
-29 kuana: nalakena Supe anigida e
pei nakapu kanikani sikai.
Matele 13.
Nadodomi-taigida-ana ega toko 1
mau doko. Kuga ta malio ki 2
nadodomi-namenaki-ana mau: na
lakena pae tea wanogoe te naata
seara eu piragi agelo maga eu pei
namenaki go eu pei sapo asa.
Kuga midoa ki tea soliana maga, 3
dapala ku pei tea soliana sikoti
ra ; ki tea riesokiana maga, dapala
nimu ma ku doko napatokomu.
Navitawiriana ega vei tea dodoma- 4
daganiana maleoputo ni tea maga
mamau puti, go nawewele ega ta
pei tea mariana ega loa mau:
nalakena tea maripele maga waina
eu pei naputu go tea maripele
maga waina eu pitawiri go waina
eu laki Supe ega wo pasapotae
ra. Kuga ta pei tea dodomi mone 5
mau ; kuga maro naleo maga waina
ku peani ra ; nalakena nae e naga,
Aga wo da doropusi ko mau, go
aga wo da puoli ki-go mau.
Dapala tu marasike noa, 6
Yehovah e pei tea silae au;
aga wo da mataku mau :
Naatainoli ega wo mari au
nasava ?
Kuga midoa ki tea maraki animu 7
maga, waina eu pasa ki sua mu
navasaana ki Supe; go kuga
mari-oli nasaralomauana adeada,
doko do midoakiusiusi nameluana
ni namauriana adeada. Yesu 8
Kristo e pei tea sikai maau na
nova go masoso, go pa pa pa po
du mau du. Kuga ta pei tea 9
tapetapeluaana ki navasapiseiki-
ana visarasara go vanopota maga
mau ; nalakena e pia naga napopo-
mu ega vei tea lawosokiana ki na
saupiaana; ega ta pei tea lowoso-
kiana ki navinaga maga mau,
waina tea maga waina eu surata
pae ara eu da pei tea silaeana ara
mau. Tu peani wede ni naviriana 10
sikai waina tea maga waina


eu magi tapaupau suasua eu
da peani naveinawotaana naga
euga kanikani iiielu asa mau.
11 Nalakena napatoko maga ni nalo
mauri maga waina nadada e pei
tea tapeana paki ckopu ni tokora
tapu pae tea viri warua liu nalakena
namarinaleosaana, eu pei tea ta-
parakiana etaku ki tokora ni na
12 menakiana. Nalakena tea wano-
goe Yesu ma, naga ega maridautau
ki narei pae nadana, e sua navi-
tinumateana etaku ki namata pua.
13 Nalakena tea wanogoe tuga vaki
etaku punusi a etaku ki tokora ni
namenakiana, doko do dapetape
14 navasapinoaki-nia-ana. Nalakena
tu da peani te natokoana waina e
doko mau doko tokora waia mau,
ma tu do laga natokoana waina
15 ega wo umai. Nalakena tea wano-
goe tuga vitua pae asa ki navi-
riana sikai ni nasamasamaniana
sara ragi paki Supe, tea wanogoe e
pei, nawa ni nagole maga waina
eu do pasasamasamani nagisana.
16 Ma namarimatakiana go nawo-
taepituakiana kuga ta malio ki
da mau; nalakena naviriana ta-
pala nogoe maga Supe e midoa
17 ki mata ki da. Kuga rogo parati ki
tea maraki animu maga, po doko
etano paki da : nalakena nara eu
do magi naatamu leleogoro dapala
tea maga waina euga wo atusi a;
naga euga vilake nalaelaeaana mari
tea wanogoe, go naga euga ta do
gi mau: nalakena tea wanogoe e
da pia ki mu mau.
Kuga to maginami dapasavasa; 18
nalakena au pavatu naga au peani
natuinagami-atae-ana wia, doko do
masauna naga auga to mari pia
nalo ni naleo maga mamau puti.
Go a pasa parati ki parua liu naga 19
kuga mari tea wanogoe, naga
aga vei tea viragiana liliu paloti
punusi mu inaraverave.
Ma Supe ni natainateana, waina 20
e piragi sake meludua ki tea mate
maga tea leoparati ki warua ki
shiip pae nada ni navasasokiana
waina e du mau du, Nawota
anigida Yesu, ega mari mu kuga wia 21
lua nalo ni sara naleo wia naga
kuga mari namasauana aneana,
go ega to mari doko mu tea waina
e pei tea midoakiinatakiana na
matana, pae Yesu Kristo; waina
nasamasamaana ega vei aneana
pa pa ega tu du po du mau du.
Amen.
Ma a pasa parati ki mu, tai 22
maga, kuga sold navasaana ni
navasaparatikiana: nalakena a
midiri paki mu pae navasaana
visa mau. Kuga atae naga tai- 23
gida Timotlieo e pei tea veresi-
luaana; waina epe umai mara-
verave, a pe wo sikoti a paloti
punusi mu.
Kuga vasadodomi tea maraki 24
maga mamau puti animu, go tea
tautau maga mamau puti. Tea
ni Italia maga eu pasadodomi
mu.
Nasaupiaana ega sikoti puti 25
mu. Amen.


EPISTOLE KI YAKOBO
TEA VEI DAPBRAVBRA MAGA.
Matele 1
1 Yakobo, tea suasua sikai ki Supe
go ki Nawota Yesu Kristo, paki
naworawora rualima sikai tamate
dua waina eu pei tea ni Tea vei
daperavera maga, kuga laelaea.
2 Kuga midoa ki nia naga e pei
sara nalaelaelaeaana, taigu maga,
ragi waina ku dowo paki namari-
-3 dogoana visarasara maga ; ku atae
naga namaridogoana ni nasaralo-
mauana animu e do posiwosi ki
4 nasokiana. Ma nasokiana ega
veani nawosiana wia lua aneana,
naga kuga wia lua po pei tea mamau,
doko da pei tea tika nalo ni te
navatuna mau.
5 Ma te naata kakamu epe tika
ki namanumatuaana, ega tatagovi
Supe, waina e do dua tea maga
mamau puti pae naveilomauana
po da pasapinoa mau; go ega
wo pei tea vituakiana paki nia.
GMa ega tatago doko nasaralo-
mauana, po da midoakisara mau :
nalakena tea waina e midoakisara
e dakiusi napeao ni natasi waina
& pei tea sui duletuleakiana ki
Ina lagi. Nalakena naatamoli wa-
nogoe ega ta midoa ki nia mau
naga ega tape te navatuna inelu
8 Yehovah ; naatamoli popo rua, tea
ta laketoko mau te napua aneana
sikai.
9 Ma taigida waina e pakitano
ega vakavakae nalo ni navaki-
lagiana aneana : go tea vei sogo- 10
lapa ega vakavalcae nalo ni na
vakitanoana aneana: nalakena
ega wo pano puoli dapala napuma
ni nainenau. Nalakena elo e sake 11
pilake nalagi tapara ki, po mari
nainenau e kokolo ; go napu-
fnana e pevera, go naleomata-
kiana ni naraena e puoli: dapala
nogoe naatamoli sogolapa ma ega
wo kokolo doko nasurataana ane-
ana maaga.
Ae namaropaana ki naatamoli 12
waina e soki namaridogoana ! na
lakena ragi waina e pei tea mari-
dogoana sua, ega wo dape vau-
vau ni namauriana, waina Ye-
hovah e sai a paki tea maga waina
eu dodomi a. Te naata ega ta 13
noa ragi waina e pei tea mari-
dogoana, A pei tea maridogoana
inelu Supe: nalakena Supe
e da pei tea maridogoana ni
tea sa maga mau, go nae e da
maridogo te naata mau ; ma 14
sara naatamoli eu sikasikai
pei tea maridogoana, ragi waina
eu pei tea vuatiluaana pae na
masauana sa adeada, po pei tea
surueana. Go namasauana sa, 15
ragi waina e diena sua, e piragi
namarinaleosaana: go namari-
naleosaana, ragi waina e matua
sua, e piragi namateana. Kuga 16
ta midoa ki pele, taigu dodomiana


17 maga. Sara navituaana wia go
sara navituaana wia lua eu pae
elagi umai, eu do melu Tama ni
nasulu maga siwo umai, waina
navanopotaana, kite melu ni na
maradoaana e da doko sikoti a
18 mau. B piragi gida tu pakilina
nalakena e masauna ki navasaana ni
nalomauana, naga tuga vei te taka
vea seara ni tea tawanakiana
aneana maga.
19 Ku atae tea wanogoe, taigu
dodomiana aginau maga. Ma sara
naatamoli euga vei tea mari mara-
verave naga euga rogo, tea mari-
daliali naga euga vasa, tea mari-
-20 daliali naga euga maeto : nalakena
namaetoana ki naatamoli e da
mari namarinaleoleanaana ki Supe
21 mau. Nalakena tea wanogoe kuga
toropusi sara naloaana go nasara-
sarapeana ni nasigisigileoana, go
kuga tape ega vilake namate-
mateana navasaana lawoana, waina
c mariatae mautipauri naatamu.
22 Ma kuga vei tea mari navasaana,
go kuga ta pei tea rogo e sikai
maau mau, doko dumamu soro mu.
23 Nalakena te naata sikai e pe vei
tea rogo navasaana, go e pe ta
pei tea mari a mau, nae e pe takiusi
naatamoli sikai waina e do leousiusi
naraena ni navakilinaana aneana
24 doko titiro sikai: nalakena e
dumana leousiusi a, po pano, po
maraverave malio ki nia naga e
25 dapale saana. Ma tea waina e kolo-
leo paki nawotaeana wialua, na
wotaeana ni naveresiana, po doko
mau doko dapala nogoe, po da pei
tea rogo waina e malio ki mau, ma e
pei tea mari nawosiana, naatamoli
wanogoe ega wo maropa doko
26 namariana aneana. Te naata sikai
e pe tumana midoa ki nia naga e
pei tea lotu, ragi waina e da do
likomaraki namenana mau, ma e
do surue napopona, nalotuana ki
naata wajiogoe e pe vei tea palo.
Nalotuana tautau go waina e da 27
pei tea mariana e loa mau narae
ni Supe anigida go Tamagida e pei
tea waia, naga ega va punusi
nainalepu maga go nagoroi malepu
maga doko nariesoki-ra-ana, go
naga ega tumana mauti a ega ta
loa mau meludua ki maramana.
Matele 2.
Taigu maga, kuga ta peani na 1
saralomauana ki Nawota anigida
Yesu Kristo, Nawota ni nasama-
samaana, pilake. naviragi-narae-ana
mau. Nalakena naatamoli sikai 2
waina e sara ki rig ni cold, po suni
sugoro maramalaga e pe umai paki
ekopu ni nasuma ni nasaisaiana
animu, go naatamoli tika sikai
waina e suni sugoro loa nae ma e pc
sili paki asa; go ku pe leopunusi 3
tea waina e suni sugoro maramalaga,
po naga, Nigo pa tasake doko tokora
wia waia, po noa ki tea tika, Nigo
pa lawodu tokora wanana, kite pa
to natano etano ki malovasiana
ni namelegu maga; ku pe ta mi- 4
doakipotawotae doko napalaumu,
po pei tea vasapotae maga ni na
midodoana sa maga late ? Kuga 5
rogo, taigu dodomiana maga ; Supe
e da matadoa tea tika maga nalo
ni maramana naga euga vei tea
sogolapa doko nasaralomauana, go
tea veani namarakiana waina e
sai a paki tea maga waina eu do-
domi a kite ? Ma nimu ku dodo- 6
dao tea tika. Tea vei sogolapa
maga eu da mari sa ki mu, po
dumada dosagi mu paki malo
tasake ni navasapotaeana kite ?
