Nara eu da pasa sa ki nagisa dodq- 7
madaganiana waina ku pei tea
sosoana ki nia kite ? Ma ku pe 8
vakavuro nawotaeana ki Nawota,
pae navasaana midiriana, fa do-
domi tea ni maladigi ki-go ega
tapala waina ku dumama dodoipi


9 ko, ku pe mari pia ; ma ku pe
viragi narae, ku pe wosiwosi Id
namarinaleosaana, doko pei tea
vasapaiana pae nawotaeana dapala
10 tea tapiri maga. Nalakena naata
waina e pe wo dogo parati ki na
wotaeana mamau, ma e pe wo
dapilagona nalo ni naleo sikai,
sogi ni tea mamau puti e pe wo
11 liko asa. Nalakena tea waina e
naga, Pa ta mari pele mau, e moro
naga, Pa ta maripunue mau. Ma
ku pe ta maripele mau, ma ku pe
maripunue, ku pe vei tea tapiri
12 nawotaeana. Kuga to pasa ega
tapala, go kuga to mari ega tapala
naatamoli maga waina kuga wo
pei tea vasapotaeana pae nawo-
-13 taeana ni naveresiana. Nalakena
navasapotaeana e dika nadodo-
miana paki tea waina e da mari
nadodomiana mau : nadodomiana
e pakavakae dipa navasapotaeana.
14 E silae nasava, taigu maga, te
naata e pe noa naga e peani na
saralomauana, ma e pe ta peani
nawosiana maga mau ? nasara-
lomauana wanogoe e mariatae mau-
-15 tipauri a kite ? Taigida sikai kite
goregida sikae e pe malamala, po
16 dika navinaga ni naaleatia, go te
naata sikai kakamu e pe noa ki
da, Koroga vae natainateana pano,
koroga vivitinu go koroga kani-
kani po puka ; ma ku pe ta dua ra
naleo maga waina eu pia ki na
potokoda mau, e pe silae nasava ?
17 Dapala nogoe nasaralomauana, e
pe ta pilake nawosiana maga mau,
e pe tumana pei tea mate doko.
18 Ma te naata sikai ega wo naga, Nigo
ku peani nasaralomauana, go kinau
a- peani nawosiana maga: pa
visei ki nau nasaralomauana anigo
masale ki nawosiana maga, go
kinau aga wo pisei ki-go nasara-
lomauana ki nawosiana aginau
19 maga. Nigo ku saralomau naga
Supe e pei tea sikai maau; ku
mari pia. Dimon maga eu sara-
lomau, po durururu. Ma ku ma- 20
sauna naga pa atae, naatamoli 1
palo 0, naga nasaralomauana ma-
sale ki nawosiana maga e pei tea
oro kite ? Abraham tamagida e2l
da pei tea marileanakiana ki na
wosiana maga, ragi waina e pitua
ki natuna doko wede ni naviriana
kite ? Ku punusi naga nasara- 22
lomauana e do posiwosi sikoti na
wosiana aneana maga, go nasara-
lomana e pei tea mariana e pia
lua ki nawosiana maga; go 23
navasaana midiriana e pei tea
vakavuroana waina e naga, Ma
Abraham e saralomau navasaana
ki Supe, go e maneana pei tea
midoakiana naga ega vei namari-
naleoleanaana; go e pei tea soso-
ana ki Supe tana ri. Ku punusi 24
naga naatamoli sikai e pei tea
marileanakiana ki nawosiana maga,
go e da pei ki nasaralomauana
sikina mau. Go dapala nogoe Ra- 25
hab nagoroi masausara e da pei
tea marileanakiana ki nawosiana
maga kite, ragi waina e piragisoki
tea tautauana maga po dipakilua
ra pae napua pota sikai ? Nala- 26
kena dakiusi waina napatoko
masale ki naatana e pei tea mate,
dapala nogoe nasaralomauana
masale ki nawosiana maga e pei
tea mate.
Matele 3.
Kuga ta pei tea vasapiseiki lapa 1
mau, taigu maga, ku atae naga
tuga wo dape navasapotaeana warua
dua. Nalakena tu mamau puti 2
dapilagona paka lapa. Te naata
e pe ta dapilagona nalo ni nava-
saana mau, nae e pe vei naatamoli
wia lua, po mariatae likomaraki
napatokona mamau. Ma tu pe 3
nadi ki tea katiana maga paki
nawoka ni horse maga, naga nara


euga rogo parati Id gida, tu pe
4 puadoa napatokoda m'amau. Kuga
leo, ship maga, waina eu parua pa,
po pei tea saikiana ki nalagi kasua
maga, eu pei tea roaana ki nawose
wowolau kiki sa, paki tokoro waina
namidoakimasauana ki tea wowo-
-5 lau e masauna. Dapala nogoe
namena e pei naleo kiki, go e paka-
vakae tea warua maga. Kuga leo,
nakapu vavaga kiki dapale e do-
koni mala nakau warua dapale!
6 Go namena e pei nakapu vavaga
sikai, e pei maramana ni namari-
naleotageleana: namena waina e
doko maleoputo ni naleo kakagida
maga, e pei tea waina e do mari
napatokogicfe mamau e loa, po do
dokoni tea taliepu ni navakilina-
ana e soro, po pei tea tokoniana
7 pae pokasi e soro. Nalakena nalo
tuavati visarasara maga go manu
visarasara maga, go tea ni natasi
visarasara maga, eu do pei tea
mariana eu matemate, po pei tea
mariana eu matemate sua pae na
8 atamoli: ma namena te naata
sikai ni naatamoli maga e da
mariatae mari a e matemate mau ;
e pei tea sa waina e da matadorogo
mau, e pura ki noai ni namateana.
9 Tu pasapia ki Yehovah go Tamana
asa; go tu pasasa ki naatamoli
maga asa, waina eu pei tea mariana
eu dapala natakiusiana ni Supe;
10 navasapiakiana go navasasakiana
ero melu nawoka sikai maau umai.
Taigu maga, tea maga wanogoe e
da one ara one naga euga tapala
11 nogoe mau. Namata noai e puta-
puta ki tea mami go tea kokona
melu namata sikai maau kite ?
12 Napuliva sikai e mariatae, taigu
maga, dau ki nawa maga ni oliva,
kite vaine sikai ki nawa maga ni
napuliva kite ? go noai ni natasi
e da mariatae pitua ki noai mami
13 Sej e manumatua po midoa ki
atae maleoputo kakamu ? ega
visei ki melu natomariana wia
aneana nawosiana aneana maga
doko namatemateana ni namanu-
matuaana. Ma ku pe veani 14
naroitoiana kokona go namari-
putuakiana doko napopomu, kuga
ta pakavakae po sorosoro dipa
nalomauana mau. Namanumatua- 15
ana wanogoe e da pei tea waina e
pae elagi siwo umai mau, ma e pei
tea ni maramana, tea ni namero,
tea ni diabolo. Nalakena tokora 16
waina naroitoiana go namaripu-
tuakiana ero doko asa, tokora
wanogoe navariana go sara namari-
analoa eudoko asa. Ma namanu- 17
matuaana waina e pae elagi
umai e pea dautau, edaku ki tea
wanogoe e doko damate, tea mari-
matemate, tea vasadieana wia, c
pura ki nadodomiana go ki nawa
wia maga, tea ta maripotawotae
mau, tea ta pei nakalepo mau. Ma 18
nawa ni namarinaleoleanaana e
pei tea sapurakiana doko nata-
mateana magi tea maga waina eu
mari natamateana.
Matele 4.
Navakalo maga eu pae esava 1
umai go namarimariana maga eu
pae esava umai waina eu doko
maleoputo kakamu ? eu da pae
wanana umai, melu namasauana
maroana animu maga waina eu do
mari navakalo doko naleo kakamu
maga kite ? Ku do masau parua, 2
go ku da peani mau; ku do mari-
punue, po do matamagura, go ku
marisapo papai: ku do marimari po
do mari navakalo; ku da peani mau,
nalakena ku da datago mau. Ku 3
do datago, go ku da dape mau,
nalakena ku do datago sa, naga
kuga sori a doko namasauana
maroana animu maga. Tea mari- 4
pele nagoroi maga, ku da atae naga


nadodomi-maramana-ana e pei
navilosi-Supe-ana kite % Nalakena
tea wanogoe naata waina e pe
masauna naga ega vei tea dodomi
maramana e pe tufnana mari a e
5 pei tea vilosi Supe. Kite ku midoa
ki nia naga navasaana midiriana
e noa moli ? e naga, Naatana wai-
na e mari a e doko gida doko e do
masau parua paki naroitoiana kite ?
G Ma e do pitua ki nasaupiaana warua
dua. Nalakena tea wanogoe e naga,
Supe e do dugoro tea lomadaga ma-
ga, ma e do dua tea vakitano maga
7 nasaupiaana. Nalakena tea wa-
nogoe kuga toko etano paki Supe;
ma kuga lawodugoro diabolo, go
ega wo sava dua ki mu pano.
8 Kuga umai paki maladigi ki Supe,
go ega wo umai paki maladigi ki
mu. Kuga vavano ki nainelearu-
mu maga, tea mari naleo sa maga;
go kuga mari napopomu euga
tautau, tea popo rua maga. Kuga
rogo kite sa, po susue, po dagi:
namuruana animu ega vei tea
roaana paki nasusueana, go nalae-
laeaana animu paki naleopakitano-
-10 ana. Kuga tumamu doro mu
pakitano namata ni Yehovah, go
ega wo dape mu pakilagi.
11 Kuga ta dumamu pasapinoa ki
mu, tai maga. Tea waina e pasa-
pinoa ki tai sikai, kite waina e
pasapotae taina e pasapinoa ki na
wotaeana, popasapotae nawotaeana:
ma ku pe vasapotae nawotaeana,
ku pe ta pei tea mari nawotaeana
mau, ma ku pe vei tea vasapotae
12 sikai. Tea vitua ki nawotaeana go
tea vasapotae sikai maaw e doko,
nae waina e mariatae mautipauri
go waina e mariatae maripuoli:
ma nigo ku pei sei waina ku pasa-
potae tea ni maladigi ki-go ?
13 Kuga umai ragi waia, waina ku
naga, Masoso kite matamai auga
wo paki natokoana waia, po mari
natau sikai asa, po pakokoto po
sorisori, po dalua: waina ku da atao
tea ni matamai mau. Namauriana 14
animu e pei nasava ? Nalakena ku
pei namavu sikai, waina e pakilina
ragi kiki, go edaku ki tea wanogoc
e puoli. Oli naga kuga noa, Ye- 15
hovah e pe suasua, au pe wo
mauri, go au pe wo mari tea waia
go tea waina. Ma ragi waia ku 16
pakavakae navasapakavakaeana
animu maga : sara navakavakaeana
tapala nogoe eu sa. Nalakena tea 17
wanogoe naata waina e atae naga
ega mari pia, go waina e da mari a
mau, e pei tea mari naleo sa asa.
Matele 5.
Kuga umai ragi waia, tea vei 1
sogolapa maga, kuga tagi doko
do lalagaarova nalakena narogo-
kitesaana animu maga waina eu
do umai. Nasogolapaana animu 2
maga eu madada, go sugoro animu
maga eu pei tea kaniana ki tuluki
maga. Gold go silver animu ero 3
dumada madani ra; go nama-
daniana kakada ega wo pei na
noasokisokiana sikai dipa mu, go
ega wo gani napokasimu dapala
nakapu vavaga. Ku daua ki na
loriki maga doko naaleatia edaku
maga. Kuga leo, namoriana ki tea 4
wosiwosi maga waina eu dagau-
kotovi vanua animu maga, waina
e pei tea lawogoroana, e do pioso
inelu mu; go nakuapiosoana ki
tea maga waina eu dagaukotovi eu
sili paki nadaliga maga ni Ye-
hovah ni taua maga. Ku doko 5
namaroana maramana, po gani-
kani po munu po sori paragoto;
ku pagani napopomu naaleatia ni
namaripunueana. Ku dipakotovi, 6
ku maripunue tea leana; e da
dugoro mu mau.
Nalakena tea wanogoe kuga vei 7
maritasoki-parau, tai maga, pa pa
paki naumaiana ki Nawota. Kuga


leo, tea wosiwosi natano e do leogoro
nawa wia ni natano, e pei marita-
soki-parau nalo kakana, pa pa ega
8 tapesuausaveagoteaedaku. Nimu
ma kuga vei maritasoki-parau;
kuga lawosoki napopomu ; nalake-
na naumaiana ki Nawota e pei
9 inaladigi. Kuga ta dauruuru, tai
maga, dumamu dipa mu mau, naga
kuga ta pei tea vasapotaeana mau :
kuga leo, tea vasapotae e lawodu
10 narae ni namata maga. Kuga
tape, tai maga, euga vei navisei-
kiana sikai ni narogokitesaana go
ni naveimaritasokip arauana, prof eta
maga waina eu pasa doko nagisa ni
11 Yehovah. Kuga leo, tu soso tea
maga waina eu soki ki tea maropa :
ku dogo nasokiana ki Yob, go ku
punusi tea waina Yehovah e edaku
maria, nalakena Yehovah e pei
maritadodomi parua, go e pei
popododomi.
12 Ma pea ki sara naleo, taigumaga,
kuga ta pivisa mau, pae nakoro-
atelagi mau, kite pae maramana
mau, kite pae te navivisaana pota
mau ; ma ioro animu ega vei ioro,
go ee ega vei ee; naga kuga ta
dowo paki etano ki navasasapotae-
ana mau.
13 Te naata sikai e dogokitesa
maleoputo kakamu kite ? ega ta-
pasavasa. Te naata sikai e mara-
sike kite ? ega lega samasamani.
14 Te naata sikai e sasana maleoputo
kakamu kite ? ega soso tea matua
maga ni ekkalesia euga umai pu-
nusi a ; go euga tapasavasa goro e,
ragi waina euga vuvurai ki sua e
ki naroro doko nagisa ni Nawota ;
go natapasavasaana ni nasara- 15
lomauana ega wo mautipauri tea
waina e sasana, go Nawota ega wo
sike a ega tuleana; go epe mari
namarinaleosaana maga, e pe wo
maneana pei tea midoakikorokoro-
ana. Nalakena tea wanogoe kuga 16
noasai dumamu paki mu natapiriana
animu maga, go kuga tufnamu
manimu dapasavasa, naga kuga vei
tea maripauriana. Navavaraniana
wosiwosi ki tea leana sikai e marima-
tua parua. Bliyah e pei naatamoli 17
sikai waina e sua narogoana maga
dakiusi gida, go e dapasavasa ki na
tapasavasaana naga usa egatapowo
mau; go usa eda powo navanua
mau natau dolu go atelagi latesa.
Go e moro dapasavasa ; go nakoro- 18
atelagi e pitua ki usa, go navanua
e dau ki nawana.
Taigu maga, te naata sikai 19
maleoputo kakamu e pe vei tea
viragisasapokiana melu dua ki na
lomauana, go te naata sikai e pe
vuadoa e ; ega atae naga tea waina 20
e puadoa tea mari naleo sa sikai
meludua ki nasasapoana ni napua
aneana, ega wo mautipauri naatana
sikai padua ki namateana, go ega
wo kovagoro taua sikai ni na
marinaleosaana maga.


EPISTOLE VEA KI PETERO
TEA MATADOANA MAGA
Matele 1.
1 Petero, apostelo sikai ki Yesu
Kristo, a midiri paki tea mata-
doaana maga waina eu pei name-
nakiatatoko maga ni Tea vei da-
peravera maga ni Ponto, ni Calatia,
ni Kappadokia, ni Asia, go ni
2 Bitliinia, pae naveaataena ki Supe
Tamana, doko namaridautaukiana
ki Naatana, paki narogopratikiana
go nameseurakiana ni nada ni Yesu
Kristo : nasaupiaana go natamate-
ana eroga manimu pei tea mari-
ana eroga lapa.
3 Supe go Tama ni Nawota ani-
gida Yesu Kristo ega vei tea vasa-
piakiana, waina dapala nadodomi-
ana warua aneana e moro pesi gida
paki naleogoroana mauri sikai pae
namoroduleanaana ki Yesu Kristo
4 fnelu dua ki tea mate maga, paki
tea veaniana sikai waina ega
wo da madara mau, go waina e
da pei tea mariana e loa mau, go
waina ega wo da kokolo mau,
waina e pei tea mautiana nakoro-
-5 atelagi doko raki mu, waina ku
pei tea vavaigoroana ki nakasua-
ana ki Supe pae nasaralomauana
paki namautipauriana waina e
pei tea marimatakiana sua naga
ega vei tea maripakasakiana ragi
6 edaku mau. Waina ku laelaea
parua asa, ma ragi kiki ragi waia,
e pe one asa one, ku pe vei tea
mariana ku do susue doko na
maridogoana visarasara maga,
naga namaridogoana ni nasara- 7
lomauana animu, waina e pia
parua liu cold waina e do puoli go
waina e pei tea maridogoana pae
nakapu vavaga, ega vei tea vapai-
ana paki nasamaniana go nasama-
samaana go nadodomadaganiana
ragi ni naumaipakilinaana ki Yesu
Kristo : waina ku dodomi a waina 8
ku ko da punusi a mau; waina ku
do saralomau asa waina ku da do
punusi a ragi waia mau, ma ku
laelaea parua ki nanalaelaeaana
waina e marisapo pei tea vasaana
go waina e pei tea samasamaniana ;
ku do dape namatapago edaku 9
ni nasaralomauana animu, namauti-
pauriana ni naatamu. Nalo ni 10
namautipauriana wanogoe profeta
maga eu laga parati ki po leousiusi
parati ki, waina eu pea noasai nalo
ni nasaupiaana waina ega umai
paki mu: eu do leousiusi nalo ni 11
seve ragi kite ragi tapale sava
Naata ni Kristo waina e doko
ara e paivai ki nia, ragi waina e
pea noasokisoki narogokitesaana
maga ki Kristo, go nasama-
samaana maga waina euga rausi
ra. Waina e pei tea noapakasa- 12
kiana paki da, naga eu da dufnada
madeada mau, ma eu manimu
suasua tea maga wanogoe, waina
eu pei tea uoasaiaua paki mu


ragi waia pae tea maga waina eu
dogorogo ki narogorogoana wia
paki mu ki Naatana Tapu waina
c pei tea tipakiluaana pae na-
koroatelagi umai. Tea maga wa-
nogoe agelo maga eu masauna
naga euga kololeo paki da.
13 Nalakena tea wanogoe kuga ta-
soki pakilagi namalomu maga ni
namidodoana animu, kuga to mi-
dodoa pia po do leogoro pia
lua raki nasaupiaana waina ega
wo manimu pei tea tapeana umai
ragi ni naumaipakilinaana ki Yesu
14 Kristo ; dapala natu maga ni na
rogoparatikiana, doko da dumamu
mari mu kuga tapala namasau-
ana sa animu maga ni sala vea
mau ragi ni nasalupeana animu ;
15 ma dapala waina tea waina e soso
mu e dautau, nimu ma kuga tau-
tau, doko sara namariana animu;
16 nalakena e pei tea midiriana,
e naga, Kuga tautau; nalakena
17 kinau a dautau. Go ku pe soso eki
Tamamu, waina e do pasapotae
pae nawosiana ki sara naatamoli
sikasikai po da piragi narae mau,
kuga to mauri ragi ni namenakiata-
tokoana animu doko namatakuana :
18 ku atae naga ku da pei tea taulua-
ana ki naleo maga .waina eu ma-
dada mau, ki silver kite cold, melu
dua ki natomariana palo animu
waina e pei tea vituakiana fnelu
19 tamamu maga umai; ma hu pei
tea tauluaana ki nada wia, dapala
tea ni sldip natuna sikai waina e
mamaau go waina te naloaana e
20 dika asa, nada ni Kristo : waina e
pei tea veaataeana lomau, pea
ki nanadiki-laketano-ana ni mara-
mana, ma e pakilina ragi edaku ni
21 ragi maga nalakena nimu, waina
ku pae asa pei tea saralomau Supe,
waina e sike a e duleana fnelu dua
ki tea mate maga, po dua e na
samasamaana; dapala waina na
saralomauana animu go naleogoro-
ana animu ero doko Supe. Waina 22
ku mari naatamu maga eu dau-
tau doko narogoparatikiana ni na
lomauana paki nadodomi-taigida-
ana waina e da pei nakalepoana
man, kuga tumamu dodomi kasua
ki mu melu napopomu; ku pei 23
tea moro pesiana, ku da melu na
pati waina e madara mau, ma ku
fnelu tea waina e da madada mau,
pae navasaana ki Supe, waina c
mauri po doko mau doko. Na 24
lakena,
Sara napokasi eu dapala na
menau,
Go sara nasamasamaana kakana
eu dapala napuma ni namenau.
Namenau e kokola, go napumana
e pevera:
Ma nanoaana ki Yehovak e 25
doko mau doko pa pa po du
mau du.
Go nanoaana e pei tea waia, na
rogorogoana wia waina e pei tea
rogorogokiana paid mu.
Matele 2.
Nalakena tea wanogoe waina ku 1
doropusi sua sara navilosiana, go
sara nasorosoroana, go naveina-
kalepoana maga, go naroitoiana
maga, go. navasapinoakiana maga
mamau puti, dapala pipia maga 2
waina eu po pakilina, kuga masau
parua ki milk ni namidodoana
waina nasorosoroana e dika asa,
naga kuga to disu po parua asa
paki namautipauriana; kupemunu- 3
dogo naga Nawota e per tea va-
kale ; waina ku do umai paki nia 4
waina e pei vatu mauri sikai, tea
tipadoaana lomau pae naatamoli
maga, ma narae ni Supe tea ma-
tadoaana, tea dodomadaganiana,
nimu ma, dapala vatu mauri maga, 5
ku do pei tea tavagiana nasuma
sikai ni naatana, naga kuga vei
naveiteaviriana tautau sikai, naga


kuga to pitua ki naviriana maga
ni naatana, tea viragimatakiana
6 ki Supepae YesuKristo. Nalakena
e dokonavasaanamidiriana, e naga,
Kuga leo, a doropusi doko Zion
vatu laketano warua sikai ni
naweloki, tea matadoana, tea
dodomadaganiana:
Go tea waina e saralomau asa
ega wo da pei tea mariana ega
makere mau.

waina ku saralomau pei nadodo-
madaganiana : ma magi tea maga
waina eu da saralomau mau,
Vatu waina tea tavagi maga eu
leodoa e,
Nae e pei tea mariana e pei
napau ni naweloki;
8 go
Vatu sikai ni natapilagonaana,
go vatu laketoko sikai ni na
tapilagona-dowoana;
waina eu do dapilagona navasaana,
doko do dogopiri a : waina eu
pei tea tawanakiana paki asa.
9 Ma nimu ku pei naworawora mata-
doaana sikai, naveiteaviriana ki

dua ki namaligo paki namarama

vea ku da pei narei sikai mau, ma
ragi waia ku pei narei ki Supe:
waina ku da pei tea dodomiana mau,
ma ragi waia ku pei tea dodomiana.
11 Tea dodomiana maga, a pasa
parati ki mu, waina ku dapala na
inenaki maga go atatoko maga,

namasauana sa maga ni napokasi-
mu, waina eu do mari navakalo
12 dipa naatamu; kuga veani na
tomariana animu ega wia maleo-
puto ni tea ni nalauna pota maga ;
naga, nalo ni tea waina eu pasa
pinoa ki mu asa, dapala ku pei tea
mari naleo sa maga, euga, na
lakena nawosiana wia animu maga,
waina eu do leopunusi ra, sama-
samani Supe naaleatia ni naumai-
leopunusiana.
Kuga toko etano paki sara na 13
tawanakiana ki naatamoli nala-
kena Nawota: e pe vei paki
nawota, waina e pakilagi liu; kite 14
e pe vei paki tea maramara maga,
waina eu pei tea tautauana aneana
maga, naga euga mari nasikoana
paki tea mari naleo sa maga, go
nasamasamaniana paki tea mari
naleo pia maga. Nalakena na 15
masauana ki Supe e dapala waia,
naga kuga to mari naleo pia po
mari nasalupeana ki naatamoli
midoakisapo wanogoe maga ega
vunuta: kuga tapala ku pei tea 1G
veresiana dumamu doko, ma
kuga ta dapala ku peani naveresi-
mu-ana e pei tea kovagoro sikai
ni nasigisigileoana mau, ma kuga
tapala naviti maga ki Supe. Kuga 17
dodomadagani tea maga mamau
puti. Kuga dodomi navei-taigida-
ana. Kuga matau ki Supe. Kuga
dodomadagani nawota.
Tea suasua maga, kuga to doko 18
etano paki nawota animu maga
pilake sara namatakuana; ega ta
pei paki tea wia maga go tea
marimatemate maga sikida mau,
ma ega vei paki tea tagele maga.
Nalakena tea waia e pei tea dodo- 19
matakiana, te naata sikai e pe
soki narogokitesaana nalakena natu-
mana-atae-ana paki Supe ragi waina
e pei tea mariana e pitinu dagele.

dapale sava, ku pe soki a ragi

tukiana asa ? ma ku pe soki a
ragi waina ku mari naleo pia po
pei tea mariana ku pitinu asa,
tea wanogoe e pei tea dodomata-
kiana naiae ni Supe, Nalakena 21


ku pei tea sosoana paki tea wanogoe:

kuga rausi naatumeleana aneana

naleosaana mau, go te nasorosoro-
ana e da pei tea vapaiana doko
23 nawokana mau ; waina, ragi waina
e pei tea suoriana, e da suori liliu
mau ; ragi waina e pei tea mariana
e pitinu e da pasadipakotovi mau;
ma e pituaki paki tea waina e do

paki nakau go ragi waina e dau
asa dau, naga tuga mate paki

paid namarinaleoleanaana ; ku pei

25 navarati-a-ana. Nalakena ku do
sasapo dapala shiip maga; ma ku
liliu umai ragi waia punusi Tea
Leo parati ki ni shiip go Tea Leo
parati ki dapau ni naatamu maga.
Matele 3.
1 Dapala nogoe, nagoroi maga,
kuga toko etano paki naanoai
animu maga; naga, nara seara
eu pe rogopiri navasaana, euga vei
tea taluaana pae natomariana ki
nagoroi adeada maga navasaana e
2pe tika; ragi waina eu do leo-
punusi natomariana tautau animu
waina e pilake namatakuana.
3 Waina narikeiana animu ega ta
pei narikeiana ni etaku mau, tea
ni naviri-nalolu-ana, go ni na
talikiana ni naleo maga ni cold,
4 kite ni nasuni-sugoro-ana ; ma ega
vei naatamoli sili ni napopomu,
waina e suni sugoro waina e da
madada mau, ni naatana mate-
mate go tatamate, waina e pei tea
waina navakokotoana kakana e
5 parua namata ni Supe. Nalakena
dapala nogoe tuai nagoroi tautau
maga, waina eu leogoro pavatu Supe,
eu dufhada dikei ki da, eu doko etano
paki naanoai adeada maga : dapala 6
waina Sarah e dogo parati ki na
daleo ni Abraham, po soso e ki
nawota: waina ku pei natuna
maga ragi waina ku do marinaleo-
pia, po da mataku ki tea matau-
kiana sikai mau.
Naanoai maga, dapala nogoe, kuga 7
to doko sikoti nagoroi animu maga,
ega vae naataeana, dapala e pei
lasa manainai, doko do dua ra
nadodomadaganiana dapala nara
go nimu ku mamau peani na
saupiaana ni namauriana; naga
natapasavasaana animu euga ta
pei tea tugoroana mau.
Go tea edaku, kuga mamau puti 8
pei tea popo sikai maau, tea popo
rogosikoti, tea dodomi taigida maga,
tea vei maritadodomi, tea popo
vakitano : kuga ta lagati pitua ki 9
tea sa dipa tea sa mau, kite nasuori-
ana dipa nasuoriana mau ; ma ega
vanopota ki nia kuga to pasapiaki;
nalakena ku pei tea sosoana paki
tea wanogoe, naga kuga veani
navasapiakiana sikai. Nalakena, 10
Naata waina e masauna naga ega
dodomi namauriana,
Po punusi naaleatia wia maga,
Ega mari namenana ega makoto
ki tea sa,
Go nagolena naga eroga ta pasa
nasorosoroana mau:
Go ega tawasi melu dua ki tea 11
sa, go ega mari tea wia;
Ega laga natamateana, po sava-
dausi a.
Nalakena namata ni Yehovah ero 12
paki tea leana maga,
Go nadaligana ero paki navava-
raniana adeada:
Ma narae ni Yehovah e dipa tea
maga waina eu do mari naleo sa.
Go ku pe vei tea suisui ni tea 13
waina e pia, tea waina ega wo


14 mari sa ki mu e pel sei ? Ma ku
pe vei tea mariana ku pe vitinu
nalakena namarinaleoleanaana, ku
pe maro pa : go kuga ta mataku
ki namatakuana adeada mau, go
15 kuga ta manaunau mau. Ma kuga
tapugoro Kristo Nawota doko na
popomu : doko do pei tea mari-
rnata sua sara ragi naga kuga
vitua ki navasakorokoroana sikai
paki sara naatamoli waina eu
datagovi mu ki naatusiana nalo ni
naleogoroana waina e doko mu,
ma ega vilake namatemateana go
16 namatakuana : doko do peani na
tumamu-atae-ana wia, naga, nalo
ni tea waina ku pei tea vasapinoa-
kiana asa, tea maga waina eu pasa-
dao natomariana wia animu doko
17 Kristo euga maliere. Nalakena na
masauana ki Supe e pe masauna,
e pe wia naga kuga vei tea mariana
kuga vitinu ragi waina ku mari
naleo pia, liu naga kuga vei tea
mariana kuga vitinu ragi waina
18 ku mari naleo sa. Nalakena Kristo
ma e paka sikai pei tea mariana e
pitinu nalakena namarinaleosaana,
tea leana oli tea tagele maga, naga
ega viragi gida umai paki mala-
digi ki Supe; e pei tea maripu-
nueana lomau nalo ni napokasina,
ma e .pei tea vakamaurikiana nalo
19 ni naatana; waina e doko asa
pano po dogorogo paki naatana
maga waina eu doko tokora ni
20 nakokoroana, waina eu dogopiri sala
vea, ragi waina namaritasoki-parau-
ana ki Supe e do leogoro naaleatia
maga ki Noah, ragi waina areka
e do pei tea marimatakiana, waina
tea visa maau, tea wanogoe e pei
naatamoli latolu, eu sili asa,
po pei tea mautipauriana pae
21 noai: waina natakiusiana kakana
e do mautipauri mu ragi waia,
nabapeizoana, e da pei natoro-
pusiana ni naloaana ni napokasi-
mu mau, ma e pei navusuusuana
ni natumamu-atae-ana wia paki
Supe, pae namoroduleanaana ki
Yesu Kristo; waina e doko 22
pisari namelearu ni matua ni
Supe, e paki nakoroatelagi pano;
agelo maga go tea vei nawota
maga go tea kasua maga eu doko
etano paki nia.
Matele 4.
Nalakena tea wanogoe nalakena 1
Kristo e pei tea mariana e sua navi-
tinumateana nalo ni napokasina,
nimu ma kuga vuati nalikau ni
namidodoana sikai maau wanogoe;
nalakena tea waina e pei tea mari-
ana e sua navitinumateana nalo
ni napokasina e makoto ki namari-
naleosaana ; naga kuga ta moro 2
mauri ragi animu waina e ko doko
doko napokasimu pae namasauana
sa maga ki naatamoli maga mau,
ma ega vae namasauana ki Supe.
Nalakena ragi waina e pano sua e 3
pei tea lapa naga ku mari sua na
masauana ki tea ni nalauna pota
maga, ragi waina ku surata pae
namasausauana maga, namasauana
sa maga, namunu-waine-ana maga,
namaridarataraana maga, nasaisai-
ana ni namunuana maga, go na
lotij-ki-nasupe-ana mamaragokiana
maga; nalo ni tea wanogoe eu 4
maga nalakena ku da sava sikoti
ra paki namalipakiana sikai maau
ni namaridarataraana mau, doko
do pasa sa ki mu : waina euga wo 5
atusi a paki tea waina e marimata
sua naga ega vasapotae tea mauri
maga go tea mate maga. Nala- G
kena tea waia e pei nalakena na
rogorogoana wia e pei tea rogorogo-
kiana sua paki tea mate maga, naga
euga vei tea vasapotaeana lomau
pae naatafholi maga nalo ni na
pokasida, ma naga euga to mauri
pae namasauana ki Supe nalo ni
naatada.


7 Ma namatapago edaku ni naleo
maga mamau puti e pei maladigi:
nalakena tea wanogoe kuga vei
tea midodoa pia, go kuga to leleo-
goro paki natapasavasaana maga:
8 kuga to peani ega vea ki naleo maga
mamau puti nadodomiana animu
dumamupakimuegakasua; nalake-
na nadodomiana e do kovagoro taua
sikai ni namarinaleosaana: kuga
vei tea dodomi namenaki maga du-
mamu paki mu, natauruuruana ega
10 tika asa: ega tapala waina sara
naatamoli sikasikai eu dape sua
navituamolikiana sikai, kuga to
suasua asa dumamu paki mu,
dapala tasiga leo prati ki wia maga
ni nasaupiaana visarasara ki Supe.
11 Te naata sikai e pe vasa, ega to
pasa ega tapala nanoaana maga ki
Supe; te naata sikai epe suasua,
ega to suasua ega tapala e fnelu
nakasuaana waina Supe e pitua ki
nia: naga Supe ega vei tea sama-
samaniana nalo ni naleo maga
mamau puti pae Yesu Kristo,
waina nasamasamaana go namara-
kiana ero pei aneana pa pa ega wo
du du po du mau du. Amen.
12 Tea dodomiana maga, kuga ta
maga nalo ni narogokitesaana ni
nakapu waina e doko maleoputo
kakamu, waina e pakilina ki mu
naga ega maridogo mu, dapala tea
ni namagaana sikai e pe vakilina ki
13 mu; ma dapala waina nimu ma
nae ku saisai peani narogokite-
saana maga ki Kristo, kuga to
laelaea ; naga ragi waina nasama-
samaana aneana ega wo pakilina
kuga wo laelaea ki nalaelaeaana
14 warua liu. Ku pe vei tea vasa-
pinoakiana nalakena nagisa ni
Kristo, ku pe maropa; nalakena
Naatana ni nasamasamaana go
Naatana ni Supe e doko mu doko.
15 Nalakena te naata sikai kakamu
ega ta pei tea mariana ega vitinu
toau dapala tea maripunue, kite
tea vanako, kite tea mari naleo sa,
kite dapala tea leousiusi naleo
maga ki tea pota maga. Ma te 16
naata sikai e pe vei tea mariana e pe
vitinu dapala Kristiano sikai, ega
ta maliere mau ; ma ega samasa-
mani Supe doko nagisa wanogoe.
Nalakena ragi e po umai waina 17
navasapotaeana ega atulake pae
nasufna ki Supe pa pa; ma epe
vea atulake pae gida pa pa, na
matapago edaku ni tea maga
waina eu dogopiri narogorogoana
wia ki Supe ega wo pei nasava ?
Go tea leana e pe maladigi marisapo 18
pei tea mautipauriana, tea ta ma-
•iu ki Supe mau go tea mari naleo \
sa eroga wo pakilina esava ? Na 19
lakena tea wanogoe tea maga
waina eu pei tea mariana eu pitinu
pae namasauana ki Supe euga
vitua ki naatada doko namari-
naleopiaana paki Tea Tawanaki pei
lomau.
Matele 5.
Nalakena tea wanogoe a pasa 1
parati ki tea matua maga waina
eu doko maleoputo kakamu, waina
a pei tea matua sikai sikoti mu, go
tea noasokisoki sikai ni narogo-
kitesaana maga ki Kristo, go waina
a pei tea saisai sikai peani na
samasamaana waina ega wo pei
tea maripakasakiana: Kuga leo 2
parati ki pakale navata ni
shiip ki Supe waina eu doko
maleoputo kakamu, kuga to leo
parati ki da, ega ta pae navasadie-
mu-ana mau, ma ega vae naraka-
rakaana, ega vae namasauana hi
Supe; go ega ta pae namasauana
ni nataluaana sa mau, ma ega vae
popo suasua; go ega ta dapala 3
ku pei nawota maga dapau tea
veaniana maga mau, ma kuga
tumamu mari mu kuga vei na
atulakeana maga ni navata. Go 4


ragi waina Napau nitea leopratiki
maga ega wo pakilina, kuga wo
dape vauvau ni nasamasamaana
5 waina ega wo da kokolo mau. Da-
pala nogoe, natureai maga, kuga
toko etano paki tea matua maga.
Go kuga mamau puti dumamu
dasoki mu ki naveipopovakitano-
ana, naga kuga tumamu manimu
suasua: nalakena Supe e dugoro
tea leomadaga maga, ma e dua tea
6 vakitano maga nasaupiaana. Na
lakena tea wanogoe kuga tumamu
doro mu pakitano etano ki name-
learu kasua ni Supe, naga ega
7 tape mu pakilagi te ragi; go kuga
to nadi ki namidoakiparatikiarifc
mamau animu paki nia, nalakena
e midoa ki parati ki nalo kakamu.
8 Kuga to midodoa pia, kuga to
leleogoro; tea kokona ki mu,
diabolo, dapala laion waina e do
uru, e do surata pasara, e do laga
9 tea waina ega tinomi a : waina
kuga to lawodugoro e doko kasua
nalo ni nasaralomauana animu, ku
atae naga narogokitesaana maga
sikai maau eu do pei tea mari-
suaana nalo ni taimu maga waina
eu doko maramana. Ma Supe ni 10
sara nasaupiaana, waina e soso
mu doko Kristo paki nasama-
samaana aneana waina e du man
du, ragi waina kuga vei tea mariana
kuga vitinu sua ragi kiki, ega wo
duinana mari mu kuga wia lua, ega
wo lawosoki mu, ega wo mari mu
kuga kasua. Waina namarakiana 11
ega vei aneana pa pa ega tu du
po du mau du. Amen.
Pae Silvano, taigida lomau, da- 12
pala waina a midoa ki nia asa, a
midiri paki mu pae navasaana
visa maau, doko do pasa parati ki
mu, po do noasokisoki kasua naga
tea waia e pei nasaupiaana lomau
ki Supe: kuga to lawodu asa;
Tea waina e doko Babelon, tea 13
matadoaana sikoti mu, e pasadodo-
mi mu, go Marko natugu. Kuga 14
tumamu pasadodomi mu ki natu-
miliana sikai ni nadodomiana.
Natamateana ega vei animu
maga mamau puti waina ku doko
Kristo.
EPISTOLE KERTJA KI PETBRO
PAKI
TEA SARALOMAU MAGA.
Matele 1 . Maumau pauri anigida Yesu Kristo:
Nasaupiaana go natafnateana eroga 2
1 Simon Petero, tea suasua sikai manimu pei tea mariana eroga
go apostolo sikai ki Yesu Kristo, lapa doko naataematakiana ni Supe
a midiri paki tea maga waina eu go ni Yesu Nawota anigida ; dapala 3
dape nasaralomauana wia pataka waina nakasuaana ni navei-Supe-
ni aginami doko namarinaleolea- ana aneana e dua moli ki gida
naana ki Supe anigida go Tea naleo maga mamau puti waina


eu pei tea ni namauriana go ni
namatauki—Supe-ana, pae naatae-
fnatakiana ni tea waina e soso
gida ki nasamasamaana go Id
4 namarimatuaana aneana ; waina
e dua moli ki gida pae ara nasaiana
wia aneana maga go waina eu
parua liu; naga kuga vae tea
wanogoe maga pei tea mariana
kuga saisai pilake natakiitsi-Supe-
ana, xagi waina kuga sava sua
inelu dua ki namadadaana waina e
doko maramana nalakena nama-
5 sauna sa. Go nalakena tea wa-
nogoe kuga to piragi paki ara sara
nafnarekarekaana, po do pitua ki
namarimatuaana ega toko nasara-
lomauana animu ; go ki naataeana
ega toko namarimatuaana animu;
G go ki natumamu-soki-mu-ana ega
toko naataeana animu; go ki nasoki-
ana ega toko natumamu-soki-mu-
ana ; go ki namatau-ki-Supe-ana
7 ega toko nasokiana animu ; go ki
nadodomi-taigida-ana ega toko na
matau-ki-Supe-ana animu; go ki
nadodomiana ega toko nadodomi-
-8 taigidaana animu. Nalakena tea
maga wanogoe eu pe vei animu
po do lapa, eu pe mari mu naga
kuga ta doko moli mau go naga
kuga ta pei tea oro mau paki
naataematakiana ni Nawota ani-
9 gida Yesu Kristo. Nalakena tea
waina e dika ki tea maga wanogoe
e kesa, e marisapo leo paki uvea,
e malio ki nasarueana inelu dua
ki namarinaleosaana tuai aneana
10 maga. Nalakena tea wanogoe, tai
maga, kuga mari marekareka parua
liu naga kuga mari nasoso-mu-
ana go namatadoa-mu-ana eroga
U kasua: nalakena ku pe mari tea
maga wanogoe, ku pe ta dapila-
gona te ragi mau ; nalakena na
pua ni nasiliana ega wo dapala
nogoe manimu pei tea vituaki-
ana pae nasogolapaana paki na-
marakiana waina e du mau du ki
nguna-tongoan n.t.
Nawota anigida go Tea Maumau
pauri Yesu Kristo.
Nalakena tea wanogoe aga wo 12
marimata sua sara ragi naga aga
mari mu kuga midoa ki tea maga
wanogoe, waina ku atae sua ra,
po pei tea lawosokiana doko na
lomauana waina e sikoti mu doko.
Go a midoa ki nia naga e leana, 13
ragi waina a do doko tapaupau
waia, naga aga vasapugoni mu po
mari mu kuga midoaki; a atae 14
naga natoropusiana ni tapaupau
aginau e pei tea inaraverave, da-
pala waina Nawota anigida Yesu
Kristo e paivai ki nia paki nau.
loro, go aga wo mari marekareka 15
naga sara ragi kuga veani naga
kuga mari namidoakiana ni tea
maga wanogoe ragi edaku ni na
meluana aginau. Nalakena au da 16
sarausi navasaana sorosoro tea
manumatua midoakiana mau, ragi
waina au mari mu ku atae naka-
suaana go naumaiana ki Nawota
anigida Yesu Kristo, ma au pei
tea leopunusi natatapauana aneana.
Nalakena e dape ki Supe Tamana 17
nadodomadaganiana go nasama-
samaana, ragi waina nadaleo sikai
dapala waia e pei tea tapeana
umai paki nia pae nasamasamaana
tatapau, Tea waia e pei Natugu
dodomiana, waina kinau a mi-
doa ki inata ki nia : go nadaleo 18
wanogoe kinami au dogo e e pei
tea tapeana inelu nakoroatelagi
umai, ragi waina au do sikoti a
doko tava tapu. Go tu peani 19
navasaana ni naveanoasaiana waina
e pei tea mariana e kasua parua,
waina ku mari pia naga ku do
dogo parati ki nia, dapala ki
nasulu sikai waina e do marama-
laga tokora maligo sikai, papa
paki ragi ni namakotokotoana
ni napogiana, go fnasoe lapa ni
malipogi ega sake doko napopomu
maga: doko do atae tea waia 20


ega vea, naga te naveanoasaiana
sikai ni navasaana midiriana e da
pei tea ni nanoapotaeana aneana
21 man. Xalakena naveanoasaiana e
da pei tea tapeana umai ki na
masauana ki naatamoli te ragi
man: ma naatamoli eu pasa melu
Supe, eu pei tea saikiana pae
Naatana Tapu.
Matele 2.
1 Ma profeta sorosoro maga ma
eu pakilina fnaleoputo ni narei,
dapala waina tea vasapiseiki soro-
soro maga euga wo doko inaleo-
puto kakamu, waina euga wo
piragi panako umai navululuana
maga ni namatepuoliana, doko do
pasagoro Nawota waina e pako-
tovi ra, doko do dumada piragi
paki da namatepuoliana inara-
-2 verave. Go tea lapa euga wo
sarausi namanana maga ni na
masauana sa adeada, go napua ni
nalomauana ega wo pei tea vasa-
-3 sakiana nalakena nara. Go doko
namatamaguruana ki navasaana
sorosoro maga euga wo pakokoto
mu: waina natipakotoviana e da
madeada mari daliali pae tuai man,
go namaripuoli-ki-da-ana e da
4 matamaturu mau. Nalakena Supe
e pe ta mauti agelo maga mau ragi
waina eu mari naleo sa, ma e pe
nadi ki da siwo paki magaseasea,
po pitua ki da paki inorutano
maga ni namaligo, waina eu pei
tea vavaigoroana ara raki navasa-
5 potaeana; go e pe da mauti
maramana tuai mau, ma e pavai-
goro Noah go tea pota eu larua,
tea, rogorogo sikai ki namarina-
leoleanaana, ragi waina e piragi
natave umai paki maramana ni
tea maga waina eu da matau ki
6 Supe mau; go e pe marina
tokoana maga ni Sodom go Go-
morrah ero pei natanoapu po
dipakotovi ra ki natapolosiwokiana
sikai, e mari ra eu pei navisei-
kiana sikai nitea maga waina euga
wo da matau ki Supe mau; go e 7
pualua Lot leana, waina e pei tea
mariana e dogokitesa parua pae
natomariana ni namasausauana ki
tea sigisigileo maga (nalakena na 8
atamoli leana wanogoe ragi waina
e doko maleoputo kakada, ki tea leo
punusiana go ki tea rogoana, e do
mari naatana leana e dogokitesa
parua sara naaleatia ki nawosiana
ni nasigisigileoana adeada maga):
Yehovah e atae naga ega vualua 9
tea lotu pia maga melu dua ki
namaridogoana, go naga ega va-
vaigoro tea tagele maga euga to
pei tea varatiana raki naaleatia
ni navasapotaeana ; ma parua liu 10
ki nia tea maga waina eu do surata
dausi napokasida pae namasauana
sa ni naloaana, po midoakipalo
ki naveinawotaana. Tea viviari
maga, tea to mari namasauana
adeada, eu da durururu mau ragi
waina eu pasasa ki nasamasama-
ana maga: waina agelo maga 11
waina eu parua Hu ra nalo ni na
kasuaana go ni namarakiana eu da
piragi navasapotaeana vasasaki sikai
dipa ra narae ni Yehovah mau.
Ma nara, dapala nalo mauri maga 12
waina eu dika ki namidodoana, tea
vakilina pae navakilinaana iholi
naga euga vei tea vuatiana po pei
tea marisakiana, eu do pasasaki
nalo ni naleo maga waina eu pei
sapo ara, euga wo pei tea marisa-
kiana doko namarisakiana adeada,
doko do pei tea maridagelekiana 13
namoriana ni namarinaleotagele-
ana ; eu midoa ki nia naga nakani-
ana wia liu aleati e pei namasau-
ana maroana, naloaana maga, go
wotu maga, eu do gani navinaga wia
liu nasaisaiana ni nadodomiana ade-
ada maga ragi waina eu ganikani si-
koti mu; eu pilake namatada ero 14


pura ki nagorori masausara sikai,
go eu marisapo makoto ki namari-
naleosaana; eu do surue naata
maga waina eu da pei tea lawoso-
kiana mau; eu pilake napopoda
e pei tea marimaariana ni namata-
maguruana; navasasakiana natuna
15 maga ; eu doropusi napua leana,
go eu sasapo, eu sarausi napua ki
Balaam, natu ni Beor, waina e
dodomi namoriana ni namarina-
16 leotageleana; ma e pei tea vasa-
kasuakiana nalakena natapiriana
aneana : ass pusa sikai e pasa ki
nadaleo ni naatafnoli, po dugoro
17 natarataraana ki profeta. Tea ma-
ga wanogoe eu pei namata noai
maga waina noai e dika ara, go
namavu maga waina eu pei tea
saikiana ki nalagi atu sikai; waina
naloaana ni namaligo e madeada
18 pei tea vavaigoroana. Nalakena eu
do noa tea vuka waraa maga ni
napaloana, po surue doko nama-
sauana sa maga ni napokasida, ki
namasausauana maga, tea maga
waina eu pei maladigi naga euga
sava melu dua ki tea maga waina
19 eu mauri doko nasasapoana; eu
do madeada sai naveresiana du-
mada doko, ragi waina nara eu
dumada pei naviti maga ni namada-
daana: nalakena tea waina te
naata sikai e pei tea marimatua-
kiana asa, e magi tea sikai maau
20 wanogoe pei naviti kakana. Na
lakena ragi waina eu sava melu
dua ki sua naloaana maga ni
maramana pae naataematakiana
ni Nawota go Tea Maumau pauri
Yesu Kristo, ma eu pe moro pei
tea soliana ara po pei tea mari-
matuakiana, tea edaku adeada
maga eu pe sa liu tea vea maga.
21 Nalakena e pia ki da naga euga ta
atae sua napua ni namarinaleo-
leanaana mau, liu naga, ragi waina
eu atae sua e, euga liliu melu dua
ki natipakiana tautau waina e pei
tea vituakiana paki da. Tea ni 22
naluakia lomau e pakilina kida,
Kuria e liliu paki tea luakiana
aneana, go wago waina e pei tea
sarueana sua paki tokora ni nasura-
ana ni nalepa.
Matele 3.
Epistole waia, tea dodomiana 1
maga, e pei kerua waina a midiri
paki mu asa ragi waia ; waina a
pasapugoni doko ara namidodoana
maru animu po mari mu kuga
midodoa; naga kuga midoa ki 2
navasaana maga waina eu pea pei
tea vasaana pae profeta tautau
maga, go natipakiana ki Nawota
go tea Maumau pauri pae apostolo
animu maga : toko atae tea waia 3
ega vea, naga tea marisaudoa maga
euga wo umai ki namarisaudoaana
ragi edaku ni naaleatia maga, doko
do surata pae namasauana sa
adeada maga, po do naga, Nasaiana 4
ni naumaiana aneana wai i na
lakena, pae naaleatia waina tama-
gida maga eu maturu asa pa pa,
naleo maga mamau puti eu doko mau
doko dapala waina eu doko pae ragi
ni naatulakeana ni natawanakiana
pa pa. Nalakena eu suasua malio 5
ki tea waia, naga nakoroatelagi
maga eu doko pae tuai pa pa, go
maramana e saisailawodu • melu
noai go pae noai ki navasaana ki
Supe; pae tea rua wanogoe 6
maramana waina e doko ragi wa-
nogoe e pei tea muagoroana ki
noai po puoli: ma nakoroatelagi 7
maga waina eu doko ragi waia, go
maramana, eu pei tea tauakiana
ki navasaana sikai maau wanogoe
magi nakapu, doko pei tea vavai-
goroana raki naaleatia ni navasa-
potaeana go ni namatepuoliana ni
naatafnoli maga waina eu da matau
ki Supe mau.
Ma kuga ta malio ki tea sikai 8


waia, tea dodomiana maga, naga
naaleatia sikai narae ni Yehovah
e dapala natau manu sikai, go
natau manu sikai e dapala naale-
-9 atia sikai. Yehovah eda marida-
liali nalo ni nasaiana aneana mau,
dapala te naata seara eu midoa ki
namaridalialiana, ma e pei marita-
soki parau paki mu, e da masauna
mau naga te naata seara euga
matepuoli, ma e masauna naga
tea maga mamau puti euga vaki
10 namidoakidoaana umai. Ma na
aleatia ki Yehovah ega wo umai
dapala tea vanako sikai; waina
nakoroatelagi maga euga wo pano
puoli asa ki nasaruruana warua,
sikai, go tea vea maga euga wo
pavaga po pei tea veresiana, go
■maramana go nawosiana maga
waina eu doko asa euga wo pei tea
11 taparakiputiana. Waina tea maga
wanogoe euga wo mamau puti pei
tea veresiana dapala nogoe, e one
mu one naga kuga vei tea tapale-
sava doko sara natomariana tautau
go sara namatau -ki - Supe - ana,
12 doko do leogoro po do suatoro
ki naumaiana ki naaleatia ki Supe,
waina nalakena nae nakoroatelagi
maga euga wo soro po pei tea
veresiana, go tea vea maga euga
13 wo pavaga po sara ? Ma tu do
leogoro nakoroatelagi vau maga,
go maramana vau, pae nasaiana
aneana, waina namarinaleoleana-
ana ega wo doko ara doko.
1 i Nalakena tea wanogoe, tea dodomi-
ana maga, waina ku do leogoro
tea maga wanogoe, kuga mari
marekareka naga kuga vei tea
vapaiana doko ’ natamateana, tea
tika ki naloaana go tea ta pei tea
vasatipaana namatana mau. Go 15
kuga midoa ki nia naga naveimarita-
sokiparauana ki Nawota anigida e
pei namautipauriana ; dapala wai-
na taigida dodomiana Paulo ma,
pae namanumatuaana waina e pei
tea vituakiana paki nia, e midiri
paki mu asa ; go dapala waina 16
e midiri doko epistole aneana
maga mamau puti, e do pasa doko
ara nalo ni tea maga wanogoe;
waina te naleo seara eu doko ara
waina eu kasua ki namidoakia-
taeana, waina tea maga waina eu
da pei tea vasapiseikiana mau, go
waina eu da pei tea lawosokiana
mau, eu pelukidoa ra, dapala
waina eu peluhidoa navasaana mi-
diriana pota maga, paki natufhada-
marisa-ki-da-ana. Nalakena tea 17
wanogoe nimu, tea dodomiana ma-
ga, waina ku atae tea maga wano-
goe pea, kuga tumamu pavaigoro
mu, naga kuga ta pei tea viragi-
luaana ki nasasapoana ki tea
sigisigileo maga mau, go naga
kuga ta dowo fneludua ki nala-
wosoki-mu-ana mau. Ma kuga to
disu po parua doko nasaupiaana 18
ki go naataeana ni Nawota ani-
gida go tea Maumau pauri Yesu
Kristo. Nasamasamaana ega vei
aneana ragi waia go pa pa ega tu
mau du. Amen.


EPISTOLE YEA K 1 YOANE
TEA SARALOMAU MAGA.
Matele 1.
1 Tea waina e doko pae ragi ni
naatulakeana pa pa pa, tea waina
au po dogo e, tea waina an po
punusi a ki namatagami, tea waina
au leosoki a, go waina nafnele
arugami eu dovidogo e, nalo ni
2 Navasaana ni namauriana. (Go
namauriana wanogoe e pakilina, go
au po punusi a, po do noasokisoki
a, po do dogorogo paki mu ki
namauriana wanogoe, waina e
du mau du, waina nara ma Tamana
ero dua doko, go waina e pakilina
3ki garni); tea waina au po punusi
a po dogo e au dogorogo ki
nia paM mu naga nimu ma
kuga veani nasaisaipeaniana sikoti
garni: 10, go nasaisaipeaniana agi-
nami e sikoti Tamana, go e sikoti
4 Natuna Yesu Kristo : go kinami
au midiri tea maga waia, naga na
laelaeaana anigida ega vura.
5 Go tea waia e pei navitaua waina
au po dogo e kiana, po noakisai mu
asa, naga Supe e pei namarama,
go namaligo e dika asa e dika sa.
6 Tu pe noa naga tu peani nasaisai-
peaniana sikoti a, go tu pe surata
namaligo, tu pe sorosoro, po da
7 mari nalomauana mau: ma tu
pe surata namarama, dapala waina
nae e doko namarama doko, tu
pe veani nasaisaipeaniana duma-
gida sikoti gida, go nada pi Yesu
Natuna aneana e pe mari gida tu
pe tantau melu dua ki saia na
marinaleosaana. Tu pe noa naga 8
tu dika namarinaleosaana, tu pe
tumagida piragi sasapo ki gida,
go nalomauana e pe ta doko gida
mau. Tu pe noasai namarina- 9
leosaana anigida maga, nae e pc
vei lomau go leana naga ega
manigida midoakikorokoro namari-
naleosaana anigida maga, po mari
gida tu pe tautau melu dua ki sara
namarinaleotageleana. Tu pe noa 10
naga tu po da mari te naleo sa
mau, tu pe mari a e pe vei tea
sorosoro, go navasaana aneana e
pe ta doko gida mau.
Matele 2.
Piakirikiri aginau maga, a midiri 1
paki mu tea maga waia, naga kuga
ta mari naleo sa mau. Go to
naata e pe mari naleo sa, tu pe
veani Tea Vasakorokoro sikai si-
koti Tamana, Yesu Kristo waina
e leana : go nae e pei natapaugoro- 2
ana nalakena namarinalesoaana
anigida maga; go tea anigida eu
da sikida mau, ma nalakena mara-
mana mamau. Go tea waia tu 3
atae pae asa naga tu atae a, tu pe
Togo parati ki natipakiana aneana
maga tu pe atae a. Tea waina e 4
naga, A atae a, go waina e da dogo
parati ki natipakiana aneana maga


mau, e pei tea sorosoro, go nalo-
mauana e da doko naata wanogoe
5 mau : ma naata waina e pe rogo
parati ki navasaana aneana, na
dodomi-Supe-ana e pe matua asa
lomau. Tea waia tu atae pae asa
6 naga tu doko asa: tea waina e
noa naga e doko asa doko, e one
naata wanogoe one naga ega surata
ega takiusi waina nae e surata.
7 Tea dodomiana maga, a da
midiri te natipakiana vau paki
mu mau, ma a midiri natipaki-
ana tuai sikai waina ku peani a
pae ragi ni naatulakeana pa pa
pa: natipakiana tuai e pei na
8 vasaana waina ku dogo e. A
moro midiri natipakiana vau sikai
paki mu, tea wanogoe e pei lomau
nalo kakana go nalo kakamu;
nalakena namaligo e do pano, go
namarama lomau e po marama-
-9 laga. Tea waina e noa naga e
doko namarama, go waina e pilosi
taina, e doko namaligo doko pa
10 pa paki ragi waia. Tea waina e
dodomi taina e doko namarama
doko, go tea tapilagonaana e da
11 doko asa mau. Ma tea waina e
pilosi taina e doko namaligo, po
surata namaligo, po da atae tokora
waina e paki asa pano mau, na
lakena namaligo e mari namatana
ero kesa.
12 A midiri paki mu, piakirikiri
maga, nalakena namarinaleosaana
animu maga eu manimu pei tea
midoakikorokoroana nalakena na
13 gisana. A midiri paki mu, tamada
maga, nalakena ku atae tea waina
e doko pae ragi ni naatulakeana
pa pa pa. A midiri paki mu,
natureai maga, nalakena ku po
14 marimatua ki , tea sigisigileo. A
po midiri paki mu, piakirikiri
maga, nalakena ku atae Tamana.
A po midiri paki mu, tea matua
maga, nalakena ku atae tea waina
e doko pae ragi ni naatulakeana
pa pa pa. A po midiri paki mu,
natureai maga, nalakena ku kasua,
go navasaana ki Supe e doko mu
doko, go ku po marimatua ki tea
sigisigileo. Kuga ta dodomi mara- 15
mana mau, go kuga ta dodomi
naleo maga waina eu doko mara-
mana. Te naata e pe dodomi
maramana, nadodomi-Tamana-ana
e pe ta doko asa mau. Nalakena 16
sdra naleo waina eu doko mara-
mana, namasauana sa ni napoka-
sigida, go namasauana sa ni na
matagida, go nalomadagaana ni
nasogolapaana, eu da pei tea ni
Tamana mau, ma eu pei tea ni ma-
ramana. Go maramana edo pano 17
pueli, go namasauana sa kakana;
ma tea waina e do mari namasau-
ana ki Supe e doko po doko mau
doko.
Piakirikiri, e po pei ragi edaku: 18
go dakiusi waina ku dogo naga
tea kokona ki Kristo ega wo
umai, tea kokona ki Kristo lapa
eu po paki lina ragi waia; tea
wanogoe tu atae pae asa naga e
po pei ragi edaku. Eu meludua 19
ki gida pano, ma eu da pei nigida
seara kakagida mau ; nalakena eu
pe vei nigida seara kakagida, eu
pe toko sikoti gida doko: ma
eu melu pano, naga euga toko •
lina naga tea maga mamau puti
eu da pei nigida seara kakagida
mau. Go nimu ku peani navuvu- 20
raiana sikai waina Tea Tapu e dua
mu asa, go ku atae naleo maga
mamau puti. A da midiri paki 21
mu nalakena ku da atae nalomauana
mau, ma a midiri nalakena ku
atae a, go nalakena te nasoroso-
roana sikai e da pei tea ni nalo-
mauana mau. Sei e pei tea soro- 22
soro, e pe ta pei tea waina e pasa-
goro naga Aesu e pei Kristo ?
Nae wanogoe e pei tea kokona
ki Kristo, nae waina e pasagoro
Tamana go Natuna. Sera naata 23


waina eu pasagoro Natuna eu da
peani Tamana mau: tea waina e
noasai Natuna e peani ra ma Ta-
-24 mana. Nimu, tea waina ku dogo
e pae ragi ni naatulakeana pa
pa pa' ega toko mu doko. Tea
waina ku dogo e pae ragi ni naatu-
lakeana pa pa pa e pe toko mu
doko, nimu ma ku pe wo doko
25 Natuna go Tamana doko. Go tea
waia e pel nasaxana waina nae e
sai paki gida asa, namauriana wai-
-26 na edu mau du. Apo midiri paki
mu tea maga wanogoe, nalo ni tea
maga waina eu piragisasapo ki mu.
27 Go nimu, navuvuxaiana waina ku
dape a waina nae e dua mu asa e
doko mu doko, go ku da pei sapo
mau naga te naata ega vasapisei
ki mu; ma dapala waina navuvu-
laiana aneana e do pasa pisei ki
mu nalo ni naleo maga mamau
puti, po pei lomau, po da pei na
sorosoroana mau, go dakiusi waina
nae e pasapisei ki mu, kuga toko
28 asa doko. Go ragi waia, piakiri-
kiri, kuga toko asa doko; naga,
nae e pe vakilina, tuga veani
naviviariana, po da maliere pa dua
ki nia mau ragi ni naumaiana
aneana.
29 Ku pe atae naga nae e leana, ku
pe moro atae naga sara naata
waina eu do mari namarinaleo-
leanaana eu pei tea vesiana melu
asa.
Matele 3.
1 Kuga leo nadodomiana waina
Tamana e po dua gida asa e dapale
sava, naga tuga vei tea sosoana ki
Supe natuna maga: go tu pei tea
wanogoe. Nalakena tea wanogoe
maramana e da atae gida mau,
2 nalakena eda atae nae mau. Tea
dodomiana maga, ragi waia tu pei
Supe natuna maga, go tuga wo
pei nasava ? e ko da' doko Una
mau. Tu atae naga epe vakilina,
tu pe wo dakiusi a ; nalakena tuga
wo punusi a dapala waina e doko.
Go sara naata waina eu peani 3
naleogoroana wanogoe paki nia
eu dumada mari ra eu dautau,
dakiusi waina nae c dautau. Sara 4
naata waina eu mari namarina-
leosaana eu moro mari natapiriana
ni nawotaeana: go namarinaleo-
saana e pei natapiriana ni nawo-
taeana. Go ku atae naga nae e 5
pakilina naga ega tapelua namari-
naleosaana maga; go namarina-
leosaana eda doko asa mau. Sara 6
naata waina eu doko asa doko eu
da mari naleo sa mau : sara naata
waina eu mari naleo sa eu ko da
punusi a mau, go eu da atae a mau.
Piakirikiri, te naata ega ta piragi 7
sasapo ki mu mau: tea waina e
mari namarinaleoleanaana e leana,
dakiusi waina nae e leana: tea 8
waina e mari namarinaleosaana e
pei tea ni diabolo; nalakena dia-
bolo e mari naleo sa pae ragi ni
naatulakeana pa pa pa. Supe
Natuna e pakilina raki tea waia,
naga ega rakai nawosiana maga ki
diabolo. Sara naata waina eu pei 9
tea vesiana melu Supe eu da mari
namarinaleosaana mau, nalakena
tea lawoana aneana e doko ara
doko: go eu marisapo mari naleo
sa, nalakena eu pei tea vesiana
melu Supe. Tea waia Supe na 10
tuna maga eu doko lina pae asa,
go diabolo natuna maga : sara naata
waina eu da mari namarinaleolea-
naana mau eu da pei tea ni Supe
mau, go tea waina e da dodomi
taina mau. Nalakena tea waia ell
pei navitaua waina ku dogo e pae
ragi ni naatulakeana pa pa pa,
naga tuga tumagida dodomi gida.
Ega ta dakiusi waina Kain e pei 12
tea ni tea sigisigileo, po mari
punue taina. Go e maripunue
a nalakena nasava ? Nalakena


nawosiana aneana maga eu sa,
go nawosiana ki taina eu leana.
13 Tai maga, maramana epe vilosi
14 mu, kuga ta maga asa mau. Ni-
gida tu atae naga tu po ineludua
ki namateana pano po paki na
mauriana, nalakena tu dodomi
taigida maga. Tea waina e da
dodomi mau e doko namateana
15 doko. Sara naata waina eu pilosi
taida eu pei tea maripunue naata
moli: go ku atae naga te tea mari
punue naatamoli e da peani na
mauriana waina e du mau du doko
16 asa doko mau. Tea waia tu atae
nadodomiana pae asa, nalakena
nae e manigida doropusi namauriana
aneana e madoko: go e one gida
one naga tuga magi taigida maga
doropusi namauriana anigida ma-
il ga euga madoko. Ma naata waina
c pe veani nalo riki maga ni mara-
mana, po leo punusi taina e pe
vei tea tika, po pogoro namaritana
kiana, nadodomi-Supe-ana e pe
18 toko asa doko dapale sava ? Pia-
kirikiri, tuga ta dodomi ki nava-
saana kite ki namena mau; ma
tuga dodomi doko namariana go
19 nalomauana. Tea wanogoe tuga
wo atae pae asa naga tu pei tea
ni nalomauana, go tuga wo mari
napopogida ega midoakilomau asa
20 naraena. Nalakena napopgida e
pe tipakotovi gida, e pe tapala
nogoe nalakena Supe e parua liu
napopogida, po atae naleo maga
21 mamau puti. Tea dodomiana ma-
ga, napopogida e pe da dipakotovi
gida mau, tu pe veani naviviariana
22 paki Supe ; go tea waina tu datago
asa, tu dape a kiana, nalakena tu
dogo parati ki natipakiana aneana
maga, po mari tea maga waina
eu pei tea midoakimatakiana na
23 matana. Go tea waia e pei na
tipakiana aneana, naga tuga sara-
lomau nagisa ni Natuna Yesu
Kristo, po dumagida dodomi gida,
ega tapala waina e dua gida na
tipakiana. Go tea waina e dogo 24
parati ki natipakiana aneana maga
e doko asa doko, go nae e doko
naata wanogoe doko. Go tea waia
tu atae pae asa naga e doko gida
doko, pae Naatana waina e dua
gida asa.
Matele 4.
Tea dodomiana maga, kuga ta 1
saralomau sara naatana mau, ma
kuga mari dogo naatana maga, eu
pe vei tea ni Supe: nalakena
profeta sorosoro lapa eu po melu
paid maramana pano. Tea waia 2
kuga atae Naata ni Supe pae asa :
sara naatana waina eu noasai
Yesu Kristo naga e po umai doko
napokasi eu pei tea ni Supe: go 3
sara naatana waina eu da noasai
Yesu mau eu da pei tea ni Supe
mau : go tea wanogoe e pei naatana
ni tea kokona ki Kristo, waina ku
dogo e naga ega wo umai; go ragi
waia e po doko sua maramana.
Nimu ku pei tea ni Supe, piakiri- 4
kiri, go ku po marimatua ki da :
nalakena tea waina e doko mu e
parua liu tea waina e doko mara-
mana. Kara eu pei tea ni mara- 5
mana : nalakena tea wanogoe eu
pasa tea ni maramana, go mara-
mana e dogo ra. Kinami au pei 6
tea ni Supe: tea waina e atae
Supe e dogo garni; naata waina e
da pei tea ni Supe mau e da
dogo garni mau. Tea wanogoe tu
atae pae asa naatana ni nalo-
mauana go naatana ni nasoro-
soroana.
Tea dodomiana maga, tuga tu- 7
magida dodomi gida: nalakena
nadodomiana e pei tea ni Supe;
go sara naata waina eu dodomi
eu pei tea vesiana melu Supe, go
eu atae Supe. Tea waina e da 8
dodomi mau e da atae Supe mau;


nalakena Supe e pei nadodomiana.
9 Tea waia nadodomiana ki Supe
e pakilina pae asa nalo kakagida,
naga Supe e po dipakilua Natuna
Sikedau umai paki maramana, na-
-10 ga tuga mauri pae asa. Tea waia
nadodomiana e doko asa, e da
pei naga nigida tu dodomi Stipe
mau, ma e pei naga nae e dodomi
gida, po dipakilua Natuna umai
e pei natapaugoroana nalakena
namarinaleosaana anigida maga.
11 Tea dodomiana maga, Supe e pe
dodomi gida dapala nogoe, e pe one
gida one naga nigida ma tuga tuma-
-12 gida dodomi gida. Te naata e
ko da leo punusi Supe te ragi
mau: tu pe tumagida dodomi
gida, Supe e pe toko gida doko,
go nadodomi-a-ana e pe matua
13 gida. Tea waia tu atae pae asa
naga tu doko asa doko, go naga nae
c doko gida doko, nalakena e po
dua gida Naatana aneana seara
14 kakana. Go kinami au po leo
punusi po do noasokisoki naga
Tamana e po dipakilua Natuna
umai e pei Tea Maumau pauri ni
15 maramana. Naata waina e pe
noasai naga Yesu e pei Supe Na
tuna, Supe e pe toko asa doko go
1G nae e pe toko Supe doko. Go
nigida tu atae doko saralomau
nadodomiana waina Supe e peani
a nalo kakagida. Supe e pei na
dodomiana; go tea waina e doko
nadodomiana doko e doko Supe
doko, go Supe e doko naata wanogoe
17 doko. Tea waia nadodomiana e
matua asa sikoti gida, naga tuga
veani naviviariana naaleatia ni
navasapotaeana; nalakena dapala
waina nae e doko, nigida ma tu
dakiusi a doko maramana waia.
18 Namatakuana e da doko nadodo-
miana mau: ma nadodomiana
matua e mari namatakuana e
melu pano, nalakena namatakuana
e peani navaratiana ; go tea waina
e mataku e ko da matua nadodo-
miana mau. Nigida tu dodomi, 19
nalakena nae e pea dodomi gida.
Te naata e pe naga, A dodomi 20
Supe, go e pe vilosi taina, e pc
vei tea sorosoro; nalakena tea
waina e da dodomi taina mau
waina e po punusi a, e mari sapo
dodomi Supe waina e ko da punusi
a mau. Go natipakiana waia tu 21
peani a, nae e dua gida asa, naga
tea waina e dodomi Supe ega
dodomi ra ma taina.
Matele 5.
Sara naata waina eu saralomau 1
naga Yesu e pei Kristo eu pei tea
vesiana melu Supe : go sara naata
waina eu dodomi tea waina e pesi
eu dodomi ra ma tea waina e pei
tea vesiana melu asa. Tea waia 2
tu atae pae asa naga tu dodomi
Supe natuna maga, ragi waina tu
dodomi Supe, po mari natipaki-
ana aneana maga. Nalakena tea 3
waia e pei nadodomi-Supe-ana,
naga tu dogo parati ki natipakiana
aneana maga ; go natipakiana ane-
ana maga eu da madaga mau.
Nalakena sara tea waina eu pei 4
tea vesiana melu Supe eu mari-
matua ki maramana : go namari-
matuaana waina e po marimatua
ki maramana e pei tea waia, nasara-
lomauana anigida. Go tea waina 5
e marimatua ki maramana e pei
sei, e pe ta pei tea waina e sara-
lomau naga Yesu e pei Supe Na
tuna ? Nae wanogoe, Yesu Kristo, 6
e pei tea waina e umai pae noai
go nada; e da umai pilake noai
sikina mau, ma e pilake noai go
nada. Go Naatana e pei tea 7
waina e do noasokisoki, nalakena
Naatana e pei nalomauana. Na 8
lakena tea waina eu do noasoki-
soki eu dolu, Naatana, go noai,
go nada: go tea tolu wanogoe eu


9 noasokisoki tea sikai maau. Tu pe
tape nanoasokisokiana ki naata-
inoli, nanoasokisokiana ki Supe e
pe warua liu sa: nalakena na
noasokisokiana ki Supe e pei tea
waia, naga e po noasokisoki nalo
10 ni Natuna. Tea waina e sara-
lomau Supe Natuna e peani na
noasokisokiana napalauna: tea
waina e da saralomau navasaana
ki Supe mau e po mari a e pei
tea sorosoro; nalakena e da
saralomau nanoasokisokiana mau
waina Supe e po noasokisoki a
11 nalo ni Natuna. Go nanoasoki-
sokiana e pei tea waia, naga
Supe e dua gida namauriana waina
e du mau du, go namauriana
12 wanogoe e doko Natuna. Tea
waina e peani Natuna e peani
namauriana wanogoe; tea waina
e da peani Supe Natuna mau e
da peani namauriana wanogoe mau.
13 Apo midiri paki mu tea maga
wanogoe, naga kuga atae naga ku
peani namauriana waina e du mau
du, nimu waina ku saralomau
14 nagisa ni Supe Natuna. Go tea
waia e pei naviviariana waina tu
peani a paki nia, naga tu pe tatago
te navatuna pae namasauana ane-
-15 ana, epe rogo gida; go tu pe
atae naga e dogo gida tea waina
tu pe tatago asa, tu pe atae naga
tu peani tea tatagoana maga waina
tu po datagovi a ara.
Te naata e pe vunusi taina e pe 16
mari te namarinaleosaana waina e
da paki namateana mau, ega ta-
tago, go Supe ega wo dua e namau-
riana agi tea maga waina eu da
mari naleo sa paki namateana mau.
Namarinaleosaana sikai e doko
waina e paki namateana: a da
noa naga ega vavara nalo kakana
mau. Sara namarinaleotageleana 17
eu pei namarinaleosaana: go na
marinaleosaana sikai e doko waina
e da paki namateana mau.
Tu atae naga sara naata waina 18
eu pei tea vesiana melu Supe eu da
mari naleo sa mau ; ma tea waina
e pei tea vesiana melu Supe e
dumana pavaigoro e, go tea sigi-
sigileo e da kisidogo e mau. Tu 19
atae naga tu pei tea ni Supe, go
maramana mamau e one tea sigi-
sigileo one. Go tu atae naga 20
Supe Natuna e po umai, po dua gida
namidoakiataeana naga tu atae
tea vei lomau, go tu doko tea vei
lomau doko, tu doko Natuna Yesu
Kristo. Nae wanogoe e pei Supe
lomau, go namauriana waina e
du mau du. Piakirikiri, kuga tu- 21
mamu pavaigoro mu pa dua ki
nasupe maga.
EPISTOLE KERUA KI YOANE
TAMA PILADA SIKAI
Matele 1.
1 Tea matua e midiri paki nawota
nagoroi matadoaana go paki na
tuna maga, waina kinau a dodomi
mu doko nalomauana ; go kinau a
da sikigu asa mau, ma tea maga
mamau puti waina eu atae na
lomauana eu dodomi mu; nala- 2
kena nalomauana waina e doko


gida doko, go ega wo sikoti gida
doko pa pa ega tu mau du.
3 Nasaupiaana, nadodomiana, nata-
mateana inelu Supe Tamana, go
inelu Yesu Kristo, Natu ni Tamana,
euga wo sikoti gida doko, doko
nalomauana go nadodomiana.
4 A laelaea parua nalakena a pa-
pal natuma maga seara kakada eu
do surata doko nalomauana, dapala
waina tu dape natipakiana inelu
5 Tamana. Go ragi waia a pavarani
ko, nawota nagoroi, e da dapala a
midiri paki-go natipakiana vau
mau, ma e pei tea waina ku dogo
e pae ragi ni naatulakeana, naga
6 tuga tufnagida dodomi gida. Go
nadodomiana e pei tea waia, naga
tuga surata pae natipakiana aneana
maga. Natipakiana e pei tea waia,
dakiusi waina ku dogo pae ragi ni
naatulakeana, naga kuga surata
7 doko asa. Nalakena tea viragi-
sasapo lapa eu inelu paki maramana
pano, tea maga waina eu da noasai
naga Yesu Kristo e umai doko
napokasi mau. Tea wanogoe e pei
tea viragisasapo go tea kokona ki
Kristo. Kuga tumamu punusi mu 8
naga kuga ta dapepuoli mau ki
naleo maga waina au posiwosi ki
sua ara, ma naga kuga tape na
moriana vura. Sara naata waina 9
eu pea po da doko mau doko
navasapiseikiana ki Kristo mau,
eu da peani Supe mau : tea waina
e doko mau doko navasapiseikiana,
nae e peani Tamana go N a tuna. Te 10
naata e pe umai punusi mu, go e
pe ta ova navasapiseikiana wanogoe
mau, kuga ta piragi a paki ekopu
ni nasuma animu mau, go kuga ta
noa ki nia naga ega laelaea mau:
nalakena tea waina e noa ki nia 11
naga ega laelaea e saisaipeani na
wosiana sa aneana maga.
Nalakena a peani naleo lapa 12
waina aga midiri paki mu ara, a da
masauna naga aga midiri ra pae
tusi go noai loa mau: ma a leo-
goro naga aga valoti punusi mu,
po pasa nawoka paki nawoka,
naga nalaelaeana animu ega vei
tea vakavuroana. Taima mata- 13
doaana natuna maga eu pasa-
dodomi ko.
EPISTOLE KETOLU KI YOANE
CAIO.
Matele 1.
1 Tea matua e midiri paki Caio
tea dodomiana, waina kinau a
dodomi ko doko nalomauana.
2 Tea dodomiana, a dapasavasa
naga nalo ni naleo maga mamau
puti pa to disu pia, go naga pa to
pia doko, dapala waina naatarna
edo disu pia. Nalakena a laelaea 3
parua ragi waina taigida seara eu
rumai po magi nalomauana anigo
noasokisoki, dapala waina ku do
surata doko nalomauana. Nalae- 4
laeaana warua liu tea wanogoe a
da peani a mau, naga aga rogo
naga natugu maga eu do surata
doko nalomauana.


5 Tea dodomiana, ku do mari
nawosiana lomau, tea waina ku
mari a paki tea maga waina eu
pei taigida go namenaki maga;
6 waina eu magi nadodomiana anigo
noasokisoki narae ni ekkalesia;
waina ku pe vusivusi ra naga euga
vano ega tapala waina e pataka ni
7 Supe pa wo mari pia : ■ nalakena eu
pano nalakena Nagisana, eu da
dape te navatuna ki tea ni nalauna
8 pota maga mau. Nalakena tea
wanogoe e one gida one naga tuga
silae tea tapala nogoe maga, naga
tuga magi nalomauana pei tea
wosiwosi sikoti ra.
9 A midiri te navatuna paki ekka-
lesia : ma Diotrefe, waina e ma-
sauna naga ega vei tea vea kakada,
10 e da piragi sold garni mau. Nala-
kena tea wanogoe, a pe valoti a
pe wo mari nawosiana aneana maga
waina e mari ra euga vei tea mi-
doakiana, e do pasapinoaki garni
ki navasaana sa maga: go eda
maro nalakena tea wanogoe mau,
go e da durnana piragi soki taigida
maga mau, go tea maga waina
eu masauna naga euga viragisoki
ra e dipagoro ra asa, go e nadi ki
da paki etaku ni ekkalesia. Tea 11
dodomiana, pa ta marioli tea waina
e sa mau, ma pa marioli tea waina
e pia: naata waina e do mari tea
wia e melu Supe ; naata waina e
do mari tea sa e ko da punusi
Supe mau. B magi Demetrio pei 12
tea noasokisokiana pae tea maga
mamau puti, go pae nalomauana
nae : go kinami ma au do maneana
noasokisoki; go ku atae naga
nanoasokisokiana aginami e pei
lomau.
A peani naleo lapa waina aga 13
midiri paki-go ara, ma a da masauna
naga aga midiri paki-go pae noai
loa go pena mau : ma a leogoro 14
naga aga vunusi ko, go toroga wo
pasa nawoka paki nawoka. Na
tamateana ega vei anigo. Tagida
maga ri eu pasadodomi ko. Pa
vasadodomi tagida maga ri pae
nagisada sikasikai.
EPISTOLE KI YUDA
TEA 80S0ANA MAGA.
Matele 1
1 Yuda, tea suasua sikai ki Yesu
Kristo, go tai ni Yakobo, a midiri
paki tea maga waina ku pei tea
sosoana, tea dodomiana maga doko
Supe Tamana, po magi Yesu Kristo
2 pei tea vavaigoroana : nasaupiaana
go natamateana go nadodomiana
euga manimu pei tea mariana euga
lapa.
Tea dodomiana maga, ragi wai- 3
na a do ,mari sara namarekare-
kaana naga aga midiri paki mu
nalo ni namautipauriana waina e
polosi gida, a peani nasokiana
naga aga midiri paki mu po pasa
parati ki mu naga kuga to mari-
pilele kasua magi nasaralomauana
waina e paka sikai pei tea vituakiana
paki tea tautau maga. Nalakena 4
te naatamoli seara eu siji panako


umai, waina eu pei tea vea midi-
xiana pae tuai raki natipakoto-
viana waia, naatamoli maga waina
eu da matau ki Supe mau, waina
eu do mari nasaupiana ki Supe
anigida e pano pota po pei namasau-
sauana, po do pasagoro Talakea-
gida sikai maau go Nawota anigida
Yesu Kristo.
5 Ma a masauna naga aga mari
mu kuga midoa ki, waina ku paka
sikai atae naleo maga mamau puti,
naga Nawota, waina e mautipauri
sua narei sikai melu dua ki na
vanua ni Ityipt, sala kerua e mari-
puoli ki tea maga waina eu da
6 saralomau mau. Go agelo maga,
tea maga waina eu da pavaigoro
naveiteaveaana adeada mau, ma
eu doropusi natokoana adeada, e
pavaigoro ra doko natali solisoli
maga waina eu du mau du etano
ki namaligo raki navasapotaeana
7ni naaleatia warua. Dapala So-
dom go Gomorrah, go natokoana
maga dalivirigoro ra, waina eu do
maripele dakiusi waina nara eu
maripele, po dausi napokasi pota
pano, eu pei tea toropusiana eu
one kivea, eu pei naviseikiana
sikai, eu do sua nasikoana ni na
8 kapu waina edu mau du. Dapala
nogoe nara ma waina eu do perea
eu mari napokasida e loa, po
midoakipalo ki naveinawotaana, po
pasa sa ki nasamasamaana maga.
9 Ma Mikael agelo warua liu, ragi
waina e pululu ki diabolo po pasa-
■ pululu nalo ni napatoko ni Moses,
e da piviari naga ega viragi dipa
e navasapotaeana sikai ni navasa-
sakiana mau, ma e naga, Yeliovah
10 ega vasakasua ki-go. Ma nara eu
pasasa ki naleo maga waina eu da
atae ra mau : go naleo maga waina
eu midoakiatae ra pae navakilina-
ana, dapala nalo mauri maga
waina eu dika namidodoana, eu
pei tea marisakiana doko naleo
maga wanogoe. Ai ki 1 da ! na 11
lakena eu pae napua ki Kain pano,
po sava pae nasasapoana ki Ba-
laam raki namoriana, po mate-
puoli doko navasadugoroana ki
Korah. Nara eu pei ihalo maga 12
waina eu doko nasaisaiana ni na
dodomiana animu maga ragi waina
eu ganikani sikoti mu, tea leoparati
ki shiip waina eu dumada pagani
ra po da mataku mau; napo-
pourumaga waina noai e dika ara,
waina eu pei tea tapetapeana
pano pae nalagi maga; nakau
maga ni ragi ni pauna rago waina
te nawada e da doko ara mau waina
eu paka rua kokolo, waina eu pei tea
vakudakatiana ; napeao mila-ma-13
ga ni natasi, waina eu do lotalota
ki namaliereana adeada maga;
inasoe vasara maga, waina na
loaana ni namaligo e madeada pei
tea vavaigoroana pa pa ega tu
mau du. Go Enok, tea kelarua 14
pae Adam, e peanoasai nalo ni
tea maga wanogoe, e naga, Kuga
leo, Nawota ega wo umai maleoputo
ni tivilia maga ni tea tautau aneana
maga, naga ega mari navasapo- 15
taeana nalo ni tea maga mamau
puti, go naga ega vasakasua ki
tea maga mamau puti waina eu da
matau ki Supe mau nalo ni na
wosiana adeada maga mamau puti
ni nasigisigileoana waina eu sigi-
sigileo mari ra, go nalo ni naleo
kasua maga mamau puti waina
tea mari naleo sa sigisigileo maga
eu pasa dipa e ara. Nara eu pei 1G
tea tauruuru maga, tea dodosaki
maga, tea surata pae namasauana
sa adeada maga (go nawokada e
do pasa tea vuka warua maga),
eu do midoakiffiata ki narae ni
naatamoli maga nalakeha nasi-
laeana.
Ma nimu, tea dodomiana maga, 17
kuga midoa ki navasaana maga
waina eu pea pei tea vasaana pae


apostolo maga ki Nawota anigida
18 Yesu Kristo; naga eu noa ki mu,
naga, Ragi edaku tea marisaudoa
maga euga wo doko, waina euga
wo surata pae namasauana sa
adeada maga ni nasigisigileoana
19 maga. Nara eu pei tea maga
waina eu mari natapotaeana maga,
eu pei tea ni namero, eu da peapi
20 Naatana mau. Ma nimu, tea do-
domiana maga, waina ku do du-
marnu davagi mu doko nasaralo-
mauana tautau parua liu aminu,
doko do dapasavasa doko Naatana
21 Tapu, kuga tumamu pavaigoro
mu kuga toko nadodomiana ki
Supe, doko do leogoro nadodomi-
ana ki Nawota anigida Yesu Kristo
paki namauriana waina e du mau
22 du. Go kuga dodomi te seara
23 waina eu midoakisara; go kuga
mautipauri te seara, doko do pualua
ra melu dua ki nakapu; go kuga
dodomi te seara pilake namataku-
ana; doko do pilosi sugoro waina
e pei tea mariana e loa melu na
pokasi.
Ma agi tea waina e mariatae 24
pavaigoro mu naga kuga ta da-
pilagona mau, po mari mu kuga
lawodu narae ni nasamasamaana
aneana kuga vei tea mamaau doko
nalaelaeana warua liu, agi Supe 25
sikai maau Tea Maumau-pauri ani-
gida, pae Yesu Kristo Nawota
anigida, ega vei nasamasamaana,
natatapauana, namarakiana, go na
kasuaana ega vea ki ragi varau
mamau, go ragi waia, go pa pa
paki ragi varau maga mamau puti.
Amen.
APOKALUPBSI
YOANE.
Matele 1.
1 Apokalupesi ki Yesu Kristo
waina Supe e dua e asa, naga ega
visei ki tea suasua aneana maga,
tea maga waina e one ara one naga
euga vakilina inaraverave: go e
dipakilua po paivai ki da pae
agelo aneana paki tea suasua
2 aneana Yoane; waina e noasoki-
soki navasaana ki Supe, go nanoa-
sokisokiana ni Yesu Kristo, tea
3 maga waina e punusi ra. Naata
waina e do peve, go tea maga waina
eu do dogo navasaana maga ni
naveanoasaiana waia, po do pavai-
goro tea maga waina eu pei tea
midiriana asa eu maropa: nala-
kena ragi e pei maladigi.
Yoane e midiri paki ekkalesia 4
larua waina eu doko Asia : Nasau-
piaana ega vei animu, melu tea
waina e doko ragi waia, go waina
e doko tuai, go waina ega wo
umai; go melu Naatana larua
waina eu doko narae ni malo
tasake aneana; go melu Yesu 5
Kristo, waina e pei tea noasokisoki
lomau, takalapa ni tea mate maga,
go tea maraki nawota maga ni


maramana. Agi tea waina e do-
domi gida, po peresilua gida melu
dua ki namarinaleosaana anigida
6 maga doko nadana; go e mari
gida tu jjei namarakiana sikai, tea
viri maga ki Supe aneana go
Tamana; nasamasamaana go na
marakiana eroga vei aneana pa pa
ega tu du po du man du. Amen.
7 Kuga leo, e do umai pilake napo-
pouru maga ; go sara namata euga
wo punusi a, go tea maga waina eu
puri a; go naworawora maga
mamau puti ni maramana euga wo
lalagaarova asa. loro, Amen.
8 Kinau a pei Alfa go Omeca,
Yehovali Supe e noa e, tea waina e
doko ragi waia go waina e doko tuai
go waina ega wo umai, tea Kasua
9 Kinau Yoane, taimu ga tea sai-
saipeani sikoto mu doko nariesoki-
ana go namarakiana go nasokiana
waina eu doko Yesu, a doko naure
waina e pei tea sosoana ki Patemo
nalakena navasaana ki Supe go
10 nanoasokisokiana ni Yesu. A doko
Naatana naaleatia ki Nawota, go a
dogo nadaleo warua sikai natakugu,
dapala tea ni paiga sikai e naga,
11 Tea waina ku punusi a, pa midiri a
tusi sikai, po dipakilua e paki
ekkalesia larua; paki Efeso, go paki
Semurna, go paki Percamo, go paki
Tuateira, go paki Sardeis, go paki
12 Filadelfia, go .paid Laodikeia- Go
a dufnagu doa au naga aga vunusi
nadaleo waina e pasa ki nau. Go
ragi waina a dumagu doa sua au
a punusi nakau ni nasulu ni cold
13 larua ; go maleoputo ni nakau ni
nasulu maga tea takiusi naatainoli
Natuna, e pei tea sugoroana ki
sugoro sikai waina e pakitano dipa
namelena, go e pei tea tasokiana
namalona ki tasoki sikai ni cold.
14 Go napauna go naloluna ero dare
dapala namau ni shiip tare, dapala
seno; go namatana maga ero
dapla soro ni nakapu ; go namelena 15
maga ero dakiusi brass waina e
lidalida, dapala e pe vei tea veniana
upu ni nakapu; go nadaleona e
dapala nadaleo ni noai lapa. Go 16
e dape doko namelearuna ni matua
masoe lama : go lova makali sikai
ni navakalina dua a do melu nawo-
kana pano; go naraena e dapala
elo e dara kasua. Go ragi waina al7
punusi a, a dowo paki namelena
maga dapala tea mate sikai. Go
e doropusi namelearuna matua doko
au, po naga, Pa ta mataku mau ; 18
kinau a pei tea vea go tea edaku,
go tea Mauri; go a mate, go pa
leo, a mauri doko pa pa ega tu po
du mau du, go a peani tea viloki
maga ni namateana go ni Hades.
Nalakena tea wanogoe pa midiri tea 19
maga waina ku punusi sua ra, go
tea maga waina eu doko ragi waia,
go tea maga waina euga wo paki-
lina edaku ki tea maga wanogoe ;
paia ni masoe larua waina ku punusi 20
ra doko namelearugu ni matua, go
nakau ni nasulu ni cold larua.
Masoe larua eu pei agelo maga ki
ekkalesia larua : go nakau ni nasulu
larua eu pei ekkalesia larua.
Matele 2.
Pa midiri paki agelo ki ekkalesia 1
ni Efeso;
Tea waina e do dape Soki masoe
larua eu doko namelearuna ni
matua, tea waina e do surata
maleoputo ni nakau ni nasulu ni
cold larua, e. noa tea maga waia :
A atae nawosiana anigo maga, go 2
nawosimawosaana go nasokiana
anigo, go naga ku marisapo dape-
tape naatainoli sa maga, go ku mari-
dogo tea maga waina eu dumada
soso ra ki apostolo maga, go eu da
pei apostolo maga mau, go ku papai
ra eu pei tea sorosoro; go ku 3
peani nasokiana po dapetape nala-


kena nagisagu, po da mawosa as a
1 mau. Ma a peani tea waia dipa
ko, naga ku doropusi nadodomiana
5 vea anigo. Nalakena tea wanogoe
pa midoa ki tokora waina ku po
dowo meludua ki nia pano, go pa
midoakidoa, po mari nawosiana
vea maga ; kite a pe valoti punusi
ko, go a pe wo disua ki nakau ni
nasulu anigo ega meludua ki naliana,
6kupe ta midoakidoa mau. Ma ku
peani tea waia, naga ku pilosi na
wosiana maga ki tea sarausi Nikolao
maga, waina kinau ma a pilosi ra.
7 Tea waina e pilake nadaliga sikai,
ega rogo tea waina Naatana e noa
ki ekkalesia maga. Tea waina e
marimatua, aga wo dua e naga ega
kani tea ni nakau ni namauriana,
waina e.doko Paradeiso ki Supe.
8 Go pa midiri paid agelo ki ek-
kalesia ni Semurna ;
Tea vea go tea edaku, waina e
mate, po moro mauri, e noa tea
9 maga waia : A atae nariesoki-ko-
ana, go naveiteatikaana anigo (ma
ku pei sogolapa), go navasasakiana
ki tea maga waina eu noa naga eu
pei tea ni Yudea, go eu da pei tea
ni Yudea mau, ma eu pei sunacoce
10 sikai ki Satan. Pa ta matau ki
tea maga waina pa wo sua ra mau :
pa leo, diabolo ega wo nadi kite
seara kakamu paki ekopu ni nasuma
ni navavaigoroana, naga kuga vei
tea maridogoana ; go kuga wo
peani nariesokiana naaleatia rualima
sikai. Pa vei lomau pa pa paki
namateana, go aga wo dua ko
11 vauvau ni namauriana. Tea waina
e pilake nadaliga sikai, ega rogo tea
waina Naatana e noa ki ekkalesia
maga. Tea waina e marimatua ega
wo da pei tea marisakiana ki
namateana kerua mau.
12 Go pa midiri paki agelo ki ek-
kalesia ni Percamo ;
Tea waina e peani lova makali ni
navakalina dua e noa tea maga waia:
A atae tokora waina ku doko asa 13
doko, tokora waina malo tasake ki
Satan e doko asa: go ku do dape
soki nagisagu, go ku da pasagoro na
saralomau-au-ana mau, naaleatia
maga ki Antipas, tea noasokisoki
aginau, tea vei lomau, waina e pei tea
maripunueana maleoputo kakamu,
tokora waina Satan e doko asa doko.
Ma a peani tea visa maau dipa ko, 11
nalakena ku peani naatamoli seara
waina eu dapesoki navasapiseikiana
ki Balaam, waina e pasapisei ki
Balak naga ega nadi ki tea tapila-
gonaana sikai narae ni Israel natuna
maga, naga euga kani naleo maga
waina eu pei naviriana paki nasupe
maga, go naga euga maripele. Go 15
dapala nogoe ku peani naatamoli
seara waina eu dape soki navasa-
piseikiana ki tea sarausi Nikalao
maga. Nalakena tea wanogoe pa 10
midoakidoa : ma ku pe ta midoa-
kidoa mau, a pe wo paloti punusi
ko maraverave, go a pe wo mari
navakalo paki da ki lova ni na
wokagu. Tea waina e pilake na 17
daliga sikai, ega rogo tea waina
Naatana e noa ki ekkalesia maga.
Tea waina e marimatua, aga wo
dua e manna waina e pei tea suru-
kiana seara kakana, go aga wo dua
e vatu tare sikai, go nagisa vau
sikai tea midiriana doko vatu
wanogoe, waina te naata sikai e
da atae a mau, ma tea waina e
dape a ega wo sikina atae a.

kalesia ni Tuateira ;
Supe Natuna, waina e pilake
namatana maga ero dapala soro ni
nakapu, go namelena maga ero
dakiusi brass waina e lidalida, e
noa tea maga waia : A atae nawo- 19
siana anigo maga, go nadodomiana
go nasaralomauana go nasuasuaana
go nasokiana anigo, go naga nawo-
siana edaku anigo maga eu lapa
liu tea vea maga. Ma a peani tea 20


waia dipa ko, naga ku suasua ki

21 nasupe maga. Go a dua e ragi
naga ega midoakidoa; go e da

leousiusi napelekevatu maga go

28 a dape aki Tamagu: go aga wo

UGUNA-TONGOAN N.T.
Matele 3.
Go pa midiri paki agelo ki ek- 1
kalesia ni Sardis:
Tea waina e dape Naatana
larua ni Supe, go masoe lama, c
noa tea maga waia : A atae nawo-
siana anigo maga, naga ku peani \
nagisa sikai naga ku mauri, go ku
pei tea mate. Pa to leleogoro, go 2
pa lawosoki tea maga waina eu ko
doko, waina eu pei inaladigi naga
euga mate : nalakena a da papai
te nawosiana anigo seara waina eu
pei tea vakavuroana narae ni Supe
aginau mau. Nalakena tea wa- 3
nogoe pa midoa ki dapala waina ku
dape go waina ku dogo ; go pa
vavaigoro e, go pa midoakidoa.
Nalakena tea wanogoe ku pe ta
leleogoro mau, a pe wo paloti
dapala tea vanako sikai, go pa wo
da atae seve aura waina aga wo
paloti paparati ki-go asa mau. Ma 4
ku peani nagisa visa maau doko
Sardis waina eu da mari sugoro
adeada eu loa mau: go euga wo
surata sikoti au po suni tea tare
maga ; nalakena eu pia ki nia. Tea 5
waina e marimatua ega wo pei tea
sugoroana dapala nogoe ki sugoro
tare maga; go aga wo da kasilua
nagisana ineludua ki tusi ni namau-
riana mau, go aga wo noasai nagi-
sana narae ni Tamagu, go narae ni
agelo aneana maga. ifca waina e 6
pilake nadaliga sikai, ega rogo tea

kalesia ni Filadelfia;

pei lomau, tea waina e peani tea

go te naata sikai ega wo da kokoro
mau, go waina e kokoro go te naata
sikai e da polagati mau, e noa tea
maga waia: A atae nawosiana 8
arigo maga (pa leo, a po pitua ki


namata wolagatiana sikai e doko
naraema, waina te naata sikai e da
mariatae kokoro e mau), naga ku

pitua ki da eu pei tea ni
ki Satan, tea maga waina eu

maga, go naga euga atae naga

pei sogolapa, po dalua sua nasogo-

te navatuna mau; go ku da atae

go tea tagisiana go tea tika go tea

paki-go naga pa vakotovi kiagu cold

ra,. a pasa kasua ki da po parati-
pisei ki da ; nalakena tea wanogoe

do pokawoka : te naata sikai e pe
rogo nadaleogu po polagati namata,

pe wo ganikani sikoti a, go nae e
pe wo ganikani sikoti au. Tea 21
waina e mari matua, aga wo dua e
