Matele 4.
Edaku Id tea maga wanogoe a 1
punusi, go kuga leo, namata sikai
e pei tea wolagatiana nakoroate-
lagi, go nadaleo vea waina a dogo
e, dapala nadaleo ni paiga sikai e
do pasa ki nau, e naga, Pa sake
umai, go aga wo pisei ki-go tea
maga waina e one ara one naga
euga vakilina edaku ki tea maga
waia. B pakilina ki nau marave-
rave naga a doko Naatana; go 2
kuga leo, malo tasake sikai e doko


nakoroatelagi, go tea sikai e dasake
3 malo tasake wanogoe. Go tea
waina e dasake e pei tea vunusiana
e dakiusi vatu yasper sikai go
sardio sikai: go asoara sikai e
doko dalivirigoro malo tasake, e pei
tea vunusiana e dakiusi emerald
i sikai. Go malo tasake rualima dua
tamate pati eu doko dalivirigoro
malo tasake wanogoe : go a punusi
tea matua rualima dua tamate pati
eu dasake malo tasake maga wano-
goe, eu pei tea sugoroana ki sugoro
tare maga; go vauvau maga ni
5 cold eu doko napauda. Go navila
maga go tovae maga eu do fnelu
malo tasake pano. Go nasulu larua
ni nakapu eu doko waina eu do soro
•narae ni malo tasake, waina eu pei
6 Xaatana larua ni Supe. Go narae
ni malo tasake, tea waina e dapala
natasi ni class sikai dakiusi krustalo;
go maleoputo ni malo tasake, go
dalivirigoro malo tasake, nalo mauri
pati waina eu pura ki namata maga
7 naraeda go natakuda. Go nalo
mauri vea e dakiusi laion sikai, go
nalo mauri kerua e dakiusi kau
natuna anoai sikai, go nalo mauri
ketolu naraena e dapala narae ni
naatamoli sikai, go nalo mauri
kevati e dakiusi icila sikai waina e
Bdo diri. Go nalo mauri pati wa-
nogoe, waina eu pilake nalivaru
latelatesa sarasara ra, eu pura ki
namata maga dalivirigoro go etano
ni nalivaruda: go eu da peani te
namaromaroana aleati go pogi mau,
eu do naga, E dapu, dapu, dapu,
Yekovah Supe, Tea Kasua mau,
waina e doko tuai go waina e doko
ragi waia go waina ega wo umai.
9 Go ragi waina nalo mauri maga
wanogoe euga wo pitua ki nasama-
samaana go nadodomadaganiana
go navasadodomatakiana paki tea
waina e dasake malo tasake, waina
e mauri doko pa pa pa e du du po
du mau du, tea matua rualima dua
tamate pati wanogoe euga wo dowo
pakitano narae ni tea waina e
dasake malo tasake, go euga wo
lotu ki tea waina e mauri doko pa
pa pa e du du po du mau du, go
euga wo nadi ki vauvau adeada
maga narae ni malo tasake, po naga,
Ku pia, Nawota aginami go Supe 11
aginami, naga pa tape nasama-
samaana go nadodomadaganiana go
namarakiana: nalakena nigo ku
dawanaki naleo maga mamau puti,
go nalakena namasauana anigo
eu doko tuai, po pei tea tawana-
kiana.
Matele 5.
Go a punusi tusi sikai e doko 1
namelearu ni matua ni tea waina e
dasake malo tasake, e pei tea
midiriana napelena go natakuna,
e pei tea vulusokiana pono ki na
vulusokiana larua. Go a punusi 2
agelo kasua sikai e do dogorogo ki
nadaleo warua sikai, e naga, Sei e
pia naga ega vukepiri tusi, po kisi-
piri navulusokiana kakana maga ?
Go te naata sikai ni nakoroatelagi, 3
kite ni maramana, kite ni etano ki
maramana, e da mari atae pukepiri
tusi wanogoe mau, kite leopunusi
a. Go kinau a dagi parua, nala- i
kena te naata sikai e da pei tea
vapaiana mau waina e pia naga
ega vukepiri tusi wanogoe, kite leo
punusi a: go tea matua maga 5
sikai kakada e noa ki nau, e naga,
Pa ta dagi mau: pa leo, Laion
waina e pei tea ni naworawora ni
Yudali, Nawasi ni David, e mari-
matua naga ega vukepiri tusi po
kisipiri navulusokiana larua ka-
kana. Go a punusi Arnio sikai e 6
lawodu maleoputo ni malo tasake
go ni nalo mauri pati, go maleoputo
ni tea matua maga, dapala e pei tea
maripunueana, e pilake napati larua
ni napauna, go namata larua, waina


eu pei Naatana larua ni Supe,
waina eu pei tea tipakiluaana paki
7 maramana mamau. Go e umai, go
e dape a fnelu dua ki namelearu ni
matua ni tea waina e dasake malo
8 tasake. Go ragi waina e dape sua
tusi, nalo mauri pati go tea matua
rualima dua tamate pati eu dowo
pakitano narae ni Arnio, eu dape
harp sikasikai sarasara ra, go lasa
maga ni cold waina eu pura ki tea
ni napo wia, waina e pei nata-
pasavasaana maga ki tea tautau
3 maga. Go eu do lega nalegaana
vau sikai, eu naga, Ku pia naga pa
tape tusi, go naga pa kisipiri navulu-
sokiana kakana maga; nalakena
ku pei tea maripunueana, po magi
Supe pakotovi ki nadama naata-
moli maga ni sara naworawora, go
ni sara navasaana, go ni sara narei,
10 go ni sara nalauna, po mari ra eu
magi Supe aginami pei namara-
kiana sikai go tea viri maga ; go
euga wo maramara doko maramana.
11 Go a punusi, go a dogo nadaleo ni
agelo lapa dalivirigoro malo tasake
go nalo mauri maga go tea matua
maga ; go naveveana kakada e pei
tivilia maga paka tivilia maga, go
12 manu maga paka manu maga ; eu
do noa ki nadaleo warua sikai, eu
naga, Arnio waina e pei tea mari-
punueana e pia naga ega tape
namarakiana, go nasogolapaana, go
namanumatuaana, go nakasuaana,
go nadodomaraganiana, go nasama-
-13 samaana, go navasapiakiana. Go
a dogo sara naleo tawanakiana
waina eu doko nakoroatelagi, go
maramana, go etano ki maramana,
go natasi, go naleo maga mamau
puti waina eu doko ara, a dogo ra
eu naga, Agi tea waina e dasake
malo tasake, go agi Arnio, ega vei
navasapiakiana, go nadodoma-
daganiana, go nasamasamaana, go
namarakiana, pa pa ega tu du po
11 du mau du. Go nalo mauri pati eu
naga, Amen. Go tea matua maga
eu dowo pakitano po lotu.
Matele 6.
Go a punusi ragi waina Arnio e 1
kisipiri navulusokiana larua sikai
kakada, go a dogo nalo mauri pati
sikai kakada e noa dapala ki na
daleo ni tovae, e naga, Pa umai.
Go a punusi, go kuga leo, horse tare 2
sikai, go tea waina e sakesake asa
e dape naasu sikai; go vauvau
sikai e pei tea vituakiana paki nia :
go e dave umai e do marimatua, go
naga ega marimatua.
Go ragi waina e kisipiri sua na 3
vulusokiana kerua, a dogo nalo
mauri kerua e naga, Pa umai. Go 1
horse pota sikai e dave umai, horse
miala sikai: go e pei tea vituakiana
paki tea waina e sakesake asa naga
ega tapelua nataihateana melu dua
ki maramana, go naga euga tumada
maripunue ra: go lova warua
sikai e pei tea vituakiana paki nia.
Go ragi waina e kisipiri sua na 5
vulusokiana ketolu, a dogo nalo
mauri ketolu e naga, Pa umai. Go
a punusi, go kuga leo, horse loa
sikai; go tea waina e sakesake asa
e dape tea towogi sikai e doko
nafhelearuna. Go a dogo tea waina 6
e dapala nadaleo sikai e doko
maleoputo ni nalo mauri pati e
naga, Totowo sikai ni whit raki
denario sikai, go totowo dolu ni
barle raki denario sikai; go naroro
go waine pa ta marisa ki da mau.
Go ragi waina e kisipiri sua 7
navulusokiana kevati, a dogo na
daleo ni nalo mauri kevati e naga, '
Pa umai. Go a punusi, go kuga 8
leo, horse kolopo sikai: go tea
waina e sakesake asa, nagisana
Namateana; go Hades edo dausi
sikoti a. Go naveinawotaana e pei
tea vituakiana paki da dapau na
magovai kevati ni maramana, naga


eroga maripunue ki lova, go ki
navitoloana, go ki namateana, go
pae nalo mila maga ni maramana.
9 Go ragi waina e kisipiri sua na
vulusokiana kelima, a pumisi etano
ki wede ni naviriana naata ni tea
maga waina eu pei tea maripunue-
ana nalakena navasaana ki Supe,
go nalakena nanoasokisokiana waina
10 eu peani a : go eu pioso ki nadaleo
warua sikai, eu naga, Pa pa paki
seve ragi, Talakeagami 0, tea tapu
go tea vei lomau, pa wo da pasa-
potae po siko nadagami mau paki
tea maga waina eu doko mara-
-11 mana ? Go sugoro tare sikai e pei
tea vituakiana paki da sarasara ra ;
go e pei tea noaana paki da, naga
euga ko maromaro ragi kiki, pa pa
tea maga waina eu mamau pei tea
suasua go taida maga, waina euga
wo pei tea maripunueana dapala
nara, euga wo pei tea vakavuroana.
12 Go a punusi ragi waina e kisipiri
sua navulusokiana kelatesa, go
naruru warua sikai e pakilina; go
elo e pei tea mariana e loa dapala
nakulukulu ni sak ni namau, go
atelagi mamau e pei tea mariana e
13 dapala nada; go masoe maga ni
nakoroatelagi eu dowo paki mara-
mana, dapala napuliva sikai e nadi
ki nawana vusa maga, ragi waina e
pei tea varivariakiana ki nalagi atu
14 sikai. Go nakoroatelagi e pama-
wota pano dapala tusi sikai ragi
waina e pei tea lulukiana ; go sara
tava go sara naure eu pei tea
risuakiana melu dua ki naliada maga.
15 Go nawota maga ni maramana, go
naatamoli warua maga, go kaptin
ni manu maga, go tea vei sogolapa
maga, go tea kasua maga, go sara
naviti go sara naatamoli waina eu
dufhada doko, eu dumada dasuru
ki da sili valea maga go vatu lake-
-16 toko maga ni tava maga ; go eu do
noa ki tava maga go ki vatu lake-
toko maga, eu naga, Kuga rowo
paki garni, po dasuru Id garni pa
dua ki narae ni tea waina e dasake
doko malo tasake, go pa dua ki
namaetoana ki Arnio : nalakena 17
naaleatia warua ni namaetoana
adeada e po umai, go sei e mariatae
lawodu ?
Matele 7.
Edaku ki tea wanogoe a punusi 1
agelo pati eu lawodu naweloki pati
ni maramana, eu dapesoki nalagi
pati ni maramana, naga te nalagi
sikai ega ta sau doko maramana,
kite doko natasi, kite paki te nakau
sikai man. Go a punusi agelo pota 2
sikai e sake pae elo sake, e dape tea
vulusoki ki Supe mauri: go e pioso
ki nadaleo warua sikai paki agelo
pati, waina e pei tea vituakiana
paki da naga euga marisa ki mara-
mana go natasi, e naga, Kuga ta 3
marisa ki maramana, kite natasi,
kite nakau maga mau, pa pa auga
vea pulusoki tea suasua maga ki
Supe anigida doko naraeda. Go a 4
dogo navqveana ni tea maga waina
eu pei tea vulusokiana, nasogosogo
sikai tivilia pati go manu pati, tea
vulusokiana maga ni sara nawora-
wota ni Israel natuna maga.
Tea ni naworawora ni Yudali 5
tivilia sikai go manu dua eu
pei tea vulusokiana :
Tea ni naworawora ni Reuben
tivilia sikai go manu dua :
Tea ni naworawora ni Cad tivilia
sikai go manu dua :
Tea ni naworawora ni Asher 6
tivilia sikai go manu dua :
Tea ni naworawora ni Naftali
tivilia sikai go manu dua ;
Tea ni naworawora ni Manasseh
tivilia sikai go manu dua :
Tea ni naworawora ni Simeon 7
tivilia sikai go manu dua :
Tea ni naworawora ni Levi tivilia
sikai go manu dua :


Tea ni naworawora ni Issakar
tivilia sikai go manu dua :
8 Tea ni naworawora ni Zebulon
tivilia sikai go manu dua :
Tea ni naworawora ni Yosef
tivilia sikai go manu dua :
Tea ni naworawora ni Benyamin
tivilia sikai go manu dua eu
pei tea vulusokiana.
9 Edaku ki tea maga wanogoe a
punusi, go kuga leo, taua warua
sikai, waina te naata sikai e da
mariatae peve ra mau, tea ni sara
nalauna, go ni naworawora maga
go ni narei maga go ni namena
maga mamau puti, eu lawodu narae
ni malo tasake go narae ni Arnio, eu
suni sugoro tare maga, go naulu ni
paama maga eu doko namelearuda ;
10 go eu do pioso ki nadaleo warua
sikai, eu naga, Xamautipauriana
ega vei agi Supe anigida waina e
dasake doko malo tasake, go agi
11 Arnio. Go agelo maga mamau
puti eu do lawodu dalivirigoro malo
tasake, go dalivirigoro tea matua
maga go nalo mauri pati; go eu
dowo dapolosiwo narae ni malo
12 tasake po lotu ki Supe, eu naga,
Amen: navasapiakiana, go na
samasamaana, go namanumatua-
ana, go navasadodofnatakiana, .go
nadodomadaganiana, go namara-
kiana, go nakasuaana, euga vei agi
Supe anigida pa pa ega tu du po du
13 mau du. Amen. Go tea matua
maga sikai kakada e pasadara, po
noa ki nau, Tea maga wanae waina
eu suni sugoro tare maga, eu pei sei,
14 go eu pae esava umai ? Go a noa
ki nia, Nawota aginau, nigo ku
atae a. Go e noa ki nau, Tea maga
wanae eu pei tea maga waina eu
inelu nariesokiana tea warua umai,
go eu same sugoro adeada maga,
po mari ra eu dare nada ni Arnio.
15 Nalakera tea wanogoe eu doko
narae ni malo tasake ki Supe; go
■ eu maneana suasua aleati go pogi
nasufna tapu aneana : go tea waina
e dasake doko malo tasake ega wo
mari tapaupau aneana ega wo
kovagoro ra. Euga wo da moro 16
pitolo mau, go euga wo da moro
madou mau; go elo ega wo da sili
ara mau, go te navivitinuana mau :
nalakena Arnio waina e doko male- 17
oputo ni malo tasake ega wo leo
parati ki pakale ra, po maraki ra
paki namata noai maga ni namau-
riana: go Supe ega wo kasilua sara
naririmata inelu dua ki namatada
maga.
Matele 8.
Go ragi waina e kisipiri sua na 1
vulusokiana kelarua natatainateana
eu doko nakoroatelagi e alagoro pei
aura namagovai sikai. Go a punusi 2
agelo lama waina eu do lawodu
narae ni Supe; go paiga larua eu
pei tea vituakiana paki da.
Go agelo pota sikai e umai po 3
lawodu pisari wede ni naviriana, e
dape pan ni cold sikai ni tea ni
napo wia ; go tea ni napo wia lapa
eu pei tea vituakiana paki nia,
naga ega vitua ki nia paki nata-
pasavasaana maga ki tea tautau
maga mamau puti paki wede ni
naviriana ni cold waina e doko
narae ni malo tasake. Go naasua 4
ni tea ni napo wia, paki natapasa-
vasaana maga ki tea tautau maga,
e sake melu dua ki nainelearu ni
agelo narae ni Supe. Go agelo e 5
dape pan ni tea ni napo wia ; go e
pakavuro e ki nakapu ni wede ni
naviriana, po nadi ki nia paki
maramana: go tovae maga eu
edakugoro e, go nadaleo maga, go
navila maga, go naruru sikai.
Go agelo larua waina eu dape 6
paiga larua eu duinada marimata
ki da naga euga sui ra.
Go tea vea e sui paiga, go usa ni 7
vatu go nakapu ero pakilina, ero


sarisari pilake nada, go e pei tea
nadikiana paki maramana: go
namagovai ketolu ni maramana e
pei tea taparakiana, go namagovai
ketolu ni nakau maga eu pei tea
taparakiana, go sara namenau mala-
kesa eu pei tea taparakiana.
8 Go agelo kerua e sui paiga, go
tea waina e dapala tava warua
sikai waina e do soro ki nakapu e
pei tea nadikiana paki natasi: go
namagovai ketolu ni natasi e pei
9 tea mariana e pei nada ; go nama-
govai ketolu ni tea tawanakiana
maga waina eu doko natasi, tea
maga waina eu peani namauriana,
eu mate; go namagovai ketolu ni
ship maga eu pei tea marisakiana.
10 Go agelo ketolu e sui paiga, go
masoe warua sikai e dowo melu
dua ki nakoroatelagi, e do soro
dapala nasulu sikai, go e dowo
paki namagovai ketolu ni noai sara
maga, go paki namata noai ni noai
11 maga ; go nagisa ni masoe wanogoe
e pei tea sosoana ki Nakokonae :
go namagovai ketolu ni noai maga
eu pei tea mariana eu pei nako-
konae ; go naatamoli maga tea
lapa kakada eu mate ki noai maga,
nalakena eu pei tea mariana eu
kokona.
12 Go agelo kevati e sui paiga, go
namagovai ketolu ni elo e pei tea
wokatiana, go namagovai ketolu ni
atelagi, go namagovai ketolu ni
masoe maga; naga namagovai
ketolu kakada euga vei tea mariana
euga maligo, go naga naaleatia ega
ta maramalaga mau ragi ni na
magovai ketolu kakana, go naga
napogiana ega tapala nogoe.
13 Go a punusi, go a dogo icila sikai,
e do diri maleoputo ni nakoroate-
lagi, e do noa ki nadaleo warua
sikai, e naga, Ai, ai, ai, ki tea maga
waina eu do doko maramana doko,
nalakena nadaleo pota maga ni paiga
ki aagelo dolu, waina euga ko sui ra.
Matele 9.
Go agelo kelima e sui paiga, go a 1
punusi masoe sikai ni nakoroatelagi
waina e dowo sua paki maramana :
go tea viloki ni namadau ni epua e
pei tea vituakiana paki nia. Go e 2
polagati namadau ni epua; go
naasua sikai e sake melu dua ki
namadau, dapala naasua ni upu
warua sikai; go elo go namalopa
ero pei tea mariana ero maligo
nalakena naasua ni namadau. Go 3
midiri maga eu dave melu dua ki
naasua paki maramana; go na
kasuaana e pei tea vituakiana paki
da, dapala waina mataloa maga ni
maramana eu peani nakasuaana.
Go e pei tea noaana paki da naga 4
euga ta marisa ki namenau ni na
vanua mau, kite te navatuna mala-
kesa mau, kite te nakau sikai mau,
ma naga euga marisa ki naatamoli
maga waina eu da peani navulu
sokiana ki Supe doko naraeda mau
euga sikida. Go e pei tea vitua- 5
kiana paki da naga euga ta mari-
punue ra mau, ma naga euga vei tea
mariana euga vitinu atelagi lima :
go navitinuana adeada e dapala
navitinuana waina mataloa sikai e
mari a, ragi waina e dipa naatamoli
sikai. Go naaleatia maga wanogoe 6
naatamoli maga euga wo laga na
mateana, go euga wo da papai a
mau; go euga wo masauna naga
euga mate, go namateana e do sava
dua ki da pano. Go natakiusiana 7
ni midiri maga e dakiusi horse maga
waina eu pei tea marimatakiana
raki navakalo; go tea waina e
dapala vauvau maga dakiusi cold
e doko napauda, go naraeda eu
dapala narae ni naatamoli maga.
Go eu pilake naloluda dapala nalolu 8
ni nagoroi maga, go napatida eu
dapala napati ni laion maga. Go 9
eu suni kororuma maga, dapala
kororuma maga ni airon; go na


saruruana ni nalivaruda e dapala
nasaruruana ni kariot maga, ni
horse lapa waina eu do sava paki
10 navakalo. Go eu pilake napueda
eu dakiusi mataloa maga, go nati-
pada maga ; go nakasuaana adeada
naga euga marisa ki naatamoli
maga atelagi lima e doko napueda.
11 Eu peani agelo ni epua e pei nawota
dapau ra : nagisana pae Heberu e
pei Abaddon, go pae navasaana ni
Hellas e peani nagisa Apolluon.
12 Ai vea e pano sua : kuga leo, Ai
dua ero ko do umai edaku ki tea
maga wanogoe.
13 Go agelo kelatesa e sui paiga, go
a dogo nadaleo sikai e melu napati
maga ni wede ni naviriana ni cold
14 waina e doko narae ni Supe, e noa
ki agelo kelatesa, waina e dape
paiga, e naga, Pa veresi agelo pati
waina eu pei tea soliana pisari noai
15 sara warua Eufrates. Go agelo pati
wanogoe eu pei tea veresiana, waina
eu pei tea marimatakiana sua raki
aura go naaleatia go atelagi go
natau, naga euga maripunue nama-
1G govai ketolu ni naatamoli maga. Go
naveveana ni taua maga ni tea
maga waina eu sakesake horse e pei
tivilia sikai paka tivilia sikai paka
rua: a dogo naveveana kakada.
17 Go a punusi horse maga doko na
vunusiana dapala waia, go tea
maga waina eu ■ sakesake ara, eu
suni kororuma maga dapala nakapu
miala go huakintho go sulfur : go
napau maga ni horse maga eu
dapala napau maga ni laion maga ;
go nakapu e do dave melu dua ki
nawokada pano go naasua go sulfur,
18 Namagovai ketolu ni naatamoli
maga eu pei tea maripunueana pae
nawokatiana dolu wanogoe, ki na
kapu go ki naasua go ki sulfur,
waina eu do dave melu dua ki na
19 wokada. Nalakena nakasuaana ki
horse maga e doko nawokada, go e
doko napueda : nalakena napueda
maga eu dakiusi fnaata maga, go eu
pilake napau maga ; go ki tea maga
wanogoe eu do marisaki. Go tea, 20
pota maga ni naatamoli maga waina
eu da pei tea maripunueana ki na
wokatiana maga wanogoe mau, eu
da midoakidoa melu dua ki na
wosiana maga ni namelearuda mau,
naga euga ta lotu ki dimon maga
mau, go ki nasupe maga ni cold, go
ni silver, go ni brass, go ni vatu, go
ni nakau ; waina eu da mariatae
leosai, kite dogo, kite surata mau :
go eu da midoakidoa melu dua Id 21
namaripunueana adeada maga, go
ki nawosidoaana adeada maga, go
ki namaripeleana adeada, go ki
navanakoana adeada maga mau.
Matele 10.
Go a punusi agelo kasua pota 1
sikai e do siwo pae nakoroatelagi
umai, e pei tea sugoroana ki na
popouru sikai, go asoara e doko
napauna, go naraena e dapala elo,
go nainelena ero dapala tea lawodu
maga ni nakapu; go e dape tusi 2
kiki vukepiriana sikai e doko na
melearuna ; go e lawo ki nainelena
ni matua e doko natasi, go tea ni
mawiri e doko navanua; go e pioso 3
ki nadaleo warua sikai dapala
waina laion sikai e uru; go ragi
waina e pioso, tovae larua eu pitua
ki nadaleoda. Go ragi waina tovae 4
larua eu pasa, a naga aga midiri;
go a dogo nadaleo sikai e melu
nakoroatelagi, e naga, Pa vulusoki
tea maga waina tovae larua eu noa
ra, go pa ta midiri ra mau. Go agelo 5
waina a punusi a waina e lawodu
natasi go navanua, e sike nafnele-
aruna ni matua paki nakoroate-
lagi, po pivisa pae tea waina e 6
mauri doko pa pa e du du po du
mau du, waina e dawana ki na
koroatelagi go naleo maga waina
eu doko asa, go navanua go naleo


maga waina eu doko asa, go natasi
go naleo maga waina eu doko asa,
naga ragi ega ta moro doko mau :
7 ma naaleatia maga ni nadaleo ni
agelo kelarua. ragi Vaina ega naga
ega sui paiga, ragi wanogoe paia
lei Supe e pei tea marisuaana,
dapala waina e dogorogo ki na
rogorogoana wia paid tea suasua
8 aneana maga profeta maga. Go
nadaleo waina a dogo e inelu na
koroatelagi, a dogo e e moro pasa
ki nau, po naga, Pa vano, po dape
tusi waina e pei tea vukepiriana
waina e doko namelearu ni agelo
waina e lawodu natasi go navanua.
9 Go a pano punusi agelo wanogoe,
po noa ki nia naga ega tua an tusi
kiki wanogoe. Go e noa ki nau,
e naga, Pa tape a, po ganidinomi a ;
go ega wo mari napelefha ega ko-
kona, ma ega wo gagadi dapala
10 hone doko nawokama. Goa dape
tusi kiki wanogoe inelu dua ki
namelearu ni agelo wanogoe, po
ganidinomi a ; go e doko nawokagu
e dapala hone e gagadi: go ragi
waina a gani sua e, uapelegu e pei
11 tea mariana e kokona. Go eu noa
ki nau, eu naga, E one ako one naga
pa moro peanoasai nalo ni narei
maga, go nalauna maga, go na
mena maga, go nawota maga euga
lapa.
Matele 11.
1 Go nau sikai e pei tea vituakiana
paki nau e dakiusi tiko sikai: doko
naga, Pa tuleana, go pa towogi na
suiha tapu ki Supe, go wede ni na
viriana, go tea maga waina eu do
2 lotu asa. Go roara waina e doko
etaku ni nasurna tapu, pa toro-
pusi a ega toko etaku, go pa ta
dowogi a mau ; nalakena e pei tea
vituakiana paki nalauna fota maga ;
go euga wo pasi pakitano natokoana
tapu atelagi rualima pati tamate
dua. Go aga wo dua tea noasoki- 3
soki dua aginau, go eroga wo pea-
noasai naaleatia manu sikai ponotia
dua rualima takuna latesa, doko do
suni nakulukulu ni sak. Nara ero 4
pei oliva dua go nakau ni nasulu
dua, waina ero do lawodu narae ni
Nawota ni maramana. Go te naata 5
e pe masauna naga ega marisa ki
da, nakapu e pe tave iheludua ki
nawokada, po ganidinomi tea ko-
kona ki da maga : go te naata e pe
wo masauna naga ega marisa ki da,
e pe one asa one naga ega vei tea
maripunueana ega tapala nogoe.
Nara eu peani nakasuaana naga 6
eroga kokoro nakoroatelagi, naga
ega ta powo mau naaleatia maga
ni naveanoasaiana adeada : go ero
peani nakasuaana dapau noai maga
naga eroga roa ra euga vei nada, go
naga eroga wokati maramana ki
sara naatugiana, ragi maga waina
ero pe wo masauna. Go ragi waina 7
eroga wo mari sua nanoasokisokiana
adeada, nalo mila waina e do sake
inelu dua ki epua umai ega wo mari
navakalo paki da, po marimatua
kida, po maripunue ra. Go napato- 8
koda ero one napua welewelea ni
natokoana warua, waina e pei tea
sosoana pae naatana ki Sodom go
Ityipt, tokora waina Nawota adeada
e pei tea turiana asa nakau valada-
goto. Go tea ni narei maga, go ni 9
naworawora maga, go ni namena
maga, go ni nalauna maga seara
kakada eu do leopunusi napatokoda
naaleatia dolu go namagovai, go eu
da suasua ki napatokoda naga
eroga vei tea toropusiana paki
matigo sikai mau. Go tea maga 10
waina eu doko maramana eu do lae-
laea nalo kakada, po mari katakata;
go euga wo dipakilua duihada dua
ra navituaana maga, nalakena pro-
feta dua wanogoe ero mari tea
maga waina eu doko maramana eu
pitinu. Go ragi waina naaleatia 11


dolu go namagovai wanogoe eu
nopu namero ni namauriana rnelu
Supe e sili ara, go ero lawodu ki
nameleda ; go namatakuana warua
e dowo paki tea maga waina eu
12 leopunusi ra. Go ero dogo nadaleo
warua sikai rnelu nakoroatelagi e
noa ki da, e naga, Koroga sake
umai paki nea. Go ero sake paki
nakoroatelagi pano doko napo-
pouru; go tea maga waina eu
kokona ki da eu leopunusi ra.
13 Go aura wanogoe naruru warua
sikai e pakilina asa, go namagovai
kerualima ni natokoana e dowo;
go nagisa ni naatamoli manu larua
eu pei tea maripunueana ki naruru
wanogoe; go tea pota maga eu pei
tea mariana eu mataku, go eu
pitua ki nasamasamaana paki Supe
ni nakoroatelagi.
14 Ai kerua e pano sua : kuga leo,
Ai ketolu e do umai inaraverave.
15 Go agelo kelarua e sui paiga ; go
nadaleo warua maga eu doko na
koroatelagi, doko naga, Namara-
kiana ni maramana e po pei agi
Nawota anigida, go agi Kristo
aneana: go ega wo maramara pa
16 pa ega tu du po du mau du. Go
tea matua rualima dua tamate
pati, waina eu dasake narae ni Supe
doko malo tasake adeada maga, eu
dowo dapolo siwo, po lotu ki Supe,
17 eu naga, Au pasadodomata ki-go,
Nawota Supe 0, Tea Kasua mau,
waina ku doko ragi waia go waina
ku doko tuai; nalakena ku dape
nakasuaana warua anigo, go ku
18 maramara. Go nalauna maga eu
maeto, go namaetoana anigo e umai,
go ragi ni tea mate maga naga
euga vei tea vasapotaeana, go naga
pa vitua ki namoriana paki tea
suasua anigo maga proveta maga,
go paki tea tautau maga, go paki
tea maga waina eu matau ki na
gisafna, tea kiki maga go tea warua
maga; go naga pa mari sa ki tea
maga waina eu do mari sa ki
maramana.
Go nasuma tapu ki Supe waina e 19
doko nakoroatelagi e pei tea wola-
gatiana ; go arerka ni navasasokiana
aneana e pei tea vunusiana doko
nasuma tapu aneana, go navila
maga eu pakilina, go nadaleo maga,
go tovae maga, go naruru sikai, go
usa ni vatu warua.
Matele 12.
Go navaivaiana warua sikai e pei 1
tea vunusiana doko nakoroatelagi;
nagoroi sikai waina e pei tea su-
goroana ki elo, go atelagi e doko
etano ni namelena maga, go vauvau
sikai ni fnasoe rualima sikai tamate
dua e doko napauna; go e diena: go 2
e kua ki navitinuana, po pitivitinu
naga ega visola. Go navaivaiana 3
pota sikai e pei tea vunusiana doko
nakoroatelagi; go kuga leo, drako
miala warua sikai, waina e pilake
napauna larua go napati ni napauna
rualima sikai, go diadema larua eu
doko napauna maga. Go napuena 4
e dosagi namagovai ketolu ni masoe
maga ni nakoroatelagi, po nadi ki
da paki maramana : go drako e
lawodu narae ni nagoroi waina e
naga ega visola, naga ragi waina ega
visola sua ega ganidinomi natuna.
Go e pisola po dape natuna sikai, 5
natuna nanoai sikai, waina ega wo
maraki nalauna maga mamau puti
ki tiko sikai ni airon: go natuna e
pei tea vuatiana sake punusi Supe,
go paki malo tasake aneana. Go 6
nagoroi e sava paki masopalo pano,
waina e peani tokora sikai asa
waina e pei tea marimatakiana
rnelu Supe, naga euga vakale a asa
naaleatia manu sikai ponotia dua
rualima takuna latesa.
Go navakalo e doko nakoroate- 7
lagi: Mikael go agelo aneana maga
eu -pano naga euga mari navakalo


8 paki drako ; go drako e marina
vakalo nara ma agelo aneana maga ;
go eu da marimatua mau, go tokora
adeada e da moro pei tea vapaiana
9 doko nakoroatelagi mau. Go drako
warua e pei tea nadikiana siwo,
friaata tuai, tea waina e pei tea
sosoana ki Diabolo go Satan, tea
viragisasapo ki maramana mamau ;
e pei tea nadikiana siwo paki mara-
mana, go agelo aneana maga eu
10 pei tea nadikiana siwo sikoti a. Go
a dogo nadaleo warua sikai nakoro-
atelagi, e naga, Ragi waia namauti-
pauriana e umai, go nakasuaana,
go namarakiana ki Supe anigida,
go naveinawotaana ki Kristo
aneana: nalakena tea vasadipa
taigida maga e pei tea nadikiana
siwo, waina e do pasadipa ra narae
11 ni Supe anigida aliati go pogi. Go
eu marimatua ki nia nalakena nada
ni Arnio, go nalakena navasaana
ni nanoasokisokiana adeada ; go eu
da dodomi namauriana adeada pa
12 pa paki namateana mau. Nala-
kena tea wanogoe kuga laelaea,
nakoroatelagi maga, go tea maga
waina ku doko ara. Ai ki mara-
mana go ki natasi : nalakena
diabolo e po siwo paloti punusi mu,
e maritausu parua, e atae naga e
peani ragi kiki.
13 Go ragi waina drako e punusi
naga e pei tea nadikiana siwo paki
maramana, e kopalele nagoroi waina
14 e pisola po dape piakiki nanoai. Go
nalivaru dua ni ioila warua ero pei
tea vituakiana paki nagoroi, naga
ega riri paki masopalo pano paki
tokoro aneana, waina e pei tea
vakaleana asa ragi sikai, go ragi
dua, go ragi namagovai, padua ki
15 narae ni maata. Go maata e lua
ki noai fnelu dua ki nawokana
dausi nagoroi dapala noai sara
sikai, naga ega mari a ega vei tea
tapeluaana ki natave ni noai sara.
16 Go natano e silae nagoroi, go natano
e maga, po dinomi noai sara waina
drako e lua ki nia inelu dua ki
nawokana. Go drako e maeto ki 17
nagoroi, po pano naga ega mari
navakalo paki naworaworana pota
maga waina eu do dogo parati ki
natipakiana maga ki Supe, go
waina eu peani nanoasokisokiana
ni Yesu. Go e lawodu naworaone
ni natasi.
Matele 13.
Go a punusi nalo mila sikai e 1
melu dua ki natasi do sake umai,
waina e pilake napati ni napauna
rualima sikai go napauna larua, go
diadema rualima sikai eu doko
napati maga ni napauna, go nagisa
maga ni navasasakiana eu doko
napauna maga. Go nalo mila 2
waina a punusi a e dakiusi leopard
sikai, go namelena maga eu dapala
tea ni bear sikai, go nawokana e
dapala nawoka ni laion sikai: go
drako e dua e nakasuaana aneana,
go malo tasake aneana, go navei-
nawotaana warua. Go a punusi 3
napauna maga sikai kakada e
dapala e pei tea atugiana paki
namateana; go nawokatiana ni
namateana aneana e pei tea mari-
pauriana : go maramana mamau eu
maga dausi nalo mila ; go eu lotu 4
ki drako, nalakena e dua nalo mila
naveinawotaana aneana; go eu
lotu ki nalo mila, po naga, Sei
e dakiusi nalo mila ? go sei e
mariatae mari navakalo paki nia ?
go nawoka sikai e pei tea vitua- 5
kiana paki nia, waina e do pasa tea
warua maga, go navasasakiana
maga; go naveinawotaana e pei
tea vituakiana paki nia naga ega
toko atelagi rualima pati tamate
dua. Go e maga ki nawokana 6
raki navasasakiana maga dipa
Supe, naga ega vasasa ki nagisana,
go ki tapaupau aneana, go ki tea


maga waina eu doko nakoroatelagi.

naga ega mari navakalo paki tea
tautau maga, go naga ega marima-
tua ki da : go nayeinawotaana e pei

naworawora go sara narei go sara
8 navasaana go sara nalauna. Go
tea maga mamau puti waina eu
doko maramana euga wo lotu ki
nia, tea maga waina nagisada eu
da pei tea midiriana tusi ni namau-
riana ki Arnio waina e pei tea mari-
punueana pae nanadikilaketanoana
9ni maramana pa pa. Te naata e
pe vilaki nadaliga sikai, ega rogo.
10 Te naata e pe viragiluapavakoto, e
pe vei tea viragiluapavakotoana :
te naata e pe maripunue ki lova, e
pe one asa one naga ega vei tea
maripunueana ki lova. Nasokiana
go nasaralomauana ki tea tautau
maga ero doko nea.
11 Go a punusi nalo mila pota sikai e
fnelu dua ki navanua do sake umai;
go e pilake napati dua ni napauna
dakiusi arnio sikai, go e pasa dapala

wotaana mamau ki nalo mila vea
namatana. Go edo mari maramana
go tea maga waina eu doko asa euga
lotu ki nalo mila vea, waina na
wokatiana ni namateana aneana e
13 pei tea maripauriana. Go e do
mari navaivaiana warua maga, naga
ega mari nakapu ega fnelu dua ki

14 Go e do piragisasapo ki tea maga
waina eu doko maramana nalakena

pilake nawokatiana ni lova po
15 mauri, mari nasupe sikai. Go e
pei tea vituakiana paki nia naga
ega vitua ki namero paki nia, paki
nasupe ni nalo mila, naga nasupe
ni nalo mila ega vasa, po mari naga
tea maga waina eu pe ta lotu ki
nasupe ni nalo mila mau euga vei
tea maripunueana. Go e do mari 16
tea maga mamau puti, tea kiki maga
go tea warua maga, go tea vei sogo-
lapa maga go tea tika maga, go tea
veresiana maga eu dumada doko
go tea vei naviti maga, naga euga
tua ra wotu sikai ega toko namele-
aruda ni matua, kite ega toko
naraeda; go naga te naata sikai 17
ega ta mariatae pakokoto kite sori-
sori mau, ma tea waina e pilake
wotu, nagisa ni nalo mila kite
naveveana ni nagisana, ega sikina.
Namanumatuaana e doko tea waia. 18
Tea waina e peani namidoakiatae-
ana ega veve naveveana ni nalo
mila; nalakena e pei naveveana
ni naatainoli sikai: go naveveana

rualima takuna latesa go tamate
latesa.
Matele 14.
Go a punusi, go kuga leo, Arnio 1
e lawodu tava Zion, go manu
ponotia sikai go manu rualima pati
go manu pati eu lawodu sikoti a, eu
pilakenagisana,gonagisani Tamana,
ero pei tea midiriana doko naraeda.
Go a dogo nadaleo sikai waina 2
e inelu nakoroatelagi umai, e

dapala tovae warua sikai: go
nadaleo waina a dogo e e dapala

eu do pokati nalegaana ni harp ki
harp adeada maga : go eu do lega 3
tea waina e dapala nalegaana vau
sikai narae ni malo tasake, go

matua maga: go te naata sikai e
da mariatae ataedogo nalegaana
wanogoe mau, ma manu ponotia
sikai go manu rualima pati go


manu pati eu sikida mariatae, tea
maga waina eu pei tea vakotoviana
4 melu dua ki maramana. Nara eu
pei tea maga waina eu da pei tea
mariana eu loa sikoti nagoroi maga
mau, nalakena eu pei naputu maga.

vakiasa. Nara eu pei tea vakotovi-
ana meludua ki naatamoli maga,
naga euga magi Supe go magi
5 Arnio pei. taka vea sikai. Go na
sorosoroana e da pei tea vapaiana

mamaau.

sikai, e dausi a, e naga, E dowo, e

e dausi ra, e noa ki nadaleo warua

10 naraena kite doko namelearuna, nae
ma ega wo munu waine seara ni
namaritausuana ki Supe, waina e
pei tea marimatakiana po da pei

pitinu ki nakapu go sulfur namata
ni agelo tautau maga, go namata ni
Arnio: go naasua ni navitinuana 11
adeada e do sake pa pa e du du po
du mau du; go eu dika namaro-

waina eu do lotu ki nalo mila go ki
nasupe kakana, go te naata e pe
tape wotu ni nagisana. Nasokiana 12
ni tea tautau maga e doko nea,

natipakiana maga ki Supe, go
nasaralomauana ni'Yesu.
Go a dogo nadaleo sikai waina c 13
melu nakoroatelagi umai, e naga,
Pa midiri, Tea mate maga waina eu
mate doko Nawota eu maropa pae
ragi waia pa pa : ioro, Naatana e
noa e, naga euga maromaro meludua

Go a punusi, go kuga leo, napo- 14
pouru tare sikai; go tea waina e

pauna, go tea tagaukotovi makali

agelo pota sikai e dave melu nasuma

melu nasuma tapu waina e doko

tea waina e pua tea tagaukotovi
makali, e naga, Pa sai ki tea tagau-
kotovi makali anigo, po lei mokai

kena nawana maga eu mame.
19 Go agelo e nadi ki tea tagaukotovi
aneana paki maramana, po lei
vaine ni maramana, po nadi ki nia
paki moru ni navasokiana ni nawa
ni vaine, mom ni navasokiana
warua, ni namaritausuana ki Supe.

dua ki moru ni navasokiana ni
nawa ni vaine, pa pa paki tea
katiana maga ni horse maga, pae
made ponotia dua.
Matele 15.
1 Go a punusi navaivaiana pota
sikai nakoroatelagi, tea warua go
tea ni namagaana, agelo larua
waina eu dape nawokatiana larua,
waina ■ eu pei tea edaku, nalakena
namaritausuana ki Supe e pei tea
marisuaana ara.
2 Go a punusi tea waina e dapala
natasi ni class sikai waina e pei tea
marisarisariana ki nakapu ; go tea
maga waina eu marimatua pa dua
ki nalo mila, go ki nasupe kakana,
go ki naveveana ni nagisana, eu
lawodu pisari natasi ni class, eu
3 dape harp maga ki Supe. Go eu do
lega nalegaana ki Moses tea suasua
ki Supe, go nalegaana ki Arnio, eu
naga, Nawosiana anigo maga eu
parua go eu pei tea ni namagaana,
Yehovah Supe, Tea Kasua mau;
napua anigo maga eu leana go eu
pei lomau, Nawota ni ragi varau
4 maga. Sei ega wo da mataku,
Yehovah 0, po samasamani na
gisama ? nalakena ku masikima
dapu; nalakena nalauna maga
mamau puti euga wo umai po lotu
naraema; nalakena namariana leana
anigo maga eu pei tea mariana eu
doko lina.
Go edaku ki tea maga wanogoe a 5
punusi, go nasuma tapu ni tapaupau
ni nanoasokisokiana waina e doko
nakoroatelagi e pei tea wolagati-
ana; go agelo larua waina eu 6
dape nawokatiana larua eu dave
melu nasuma tapu umai, eu pei tea
sugoroana ki linen tautau go mara-
malaga, go eu pei tea tasokiana
dalivirigoro namaloda ki tasoki
maga ni cold. Go sikai ni nalo 7
mauri pati e dua agelo larua lasa
larua ni cold waina eu pura ki na
maritausuana ki Supe, waina e do
mauri pa pa e du du po du mau du.
Go nasuma tapu e pei tea vaka- 8
vuroana ki naasua waina e melu
nasamasamaana ni Supe, go waina
e melu nakasuaana aneana ; go te
naata sikai e da mariatae paki ekopu

wokatiana larua ki agelo larua euga
vei tea marisuaana.
Matele 16.
Go a dogo nadaleo warua sikai 1
waina e dave melu nasuma tapu, e
noa ki agelo larua, e naga, Kuga
vano, po da ki lasa larua ni nama-
ritausuana ki Supe paki maramana.
Go tea vea e pano, po da ki lasa 2
aneana paki navanua; go e pei
namanuka sa go pitinu paki na
ataiholi maga waina eu pilake wotu
ni nalo mila, go waina eu do lotu ki
nasupe kakana.
Go kerua e da ki lasa aneana paki 3
natasi; go e pei nada tapala nada
ni naataiholi mate sikai; go sara
naata ni namauriana eu mate, tea

noai sara maga go namata noai ni
noai maga, go e pei nada. Go a 5
dogo agelo ni noai maga e naga,

go waina' ku doko tuai, Tea Tapu,
nalakena ku pasapotae dapala no-
-6 goe : nalakena eu da ki nada ni
tea tautau maga go ni profeta maga,
go ku dua ra nada naga euga mu-
-7 nugi a : eu pia ki nia. Go a dogo
wede ni naviriana e naga, loro,
Yehovali Supe 0, Tea Kasua mau,
navasapotaeana anigo maga eu pei
lomau go eu leana.
8 Go kevati eda ki lasa aneana
paid elo; go e pei tea vituakiana
paki nia naga ega tapara ki naata
9 inoli maga ki nakapu. Go naata
moli maga eu pei tea taparakiana
ki navivitinuana warua: go eu
pasasa ki nagisa ni Supe waina e
peani nakasuaana dapau nawo-
katiana maga wanogoe; go eu da
midoakidoa mau naga euga tua e

10 Go kelima eda ki lasa aneana
paki malo tasake ki nalo mila; go
namarakiana aneana e pei tea
mariana e maligo; go eu kati na
11 menada nalakena navitinuana, go
eu pasasa ki Supe ni nakoroatelagi
nalakena navitinuana adeada maga
go nalakena namanuka adeada
maga; go eu da midoakidoa melu
dua ki nawosiana adeada maga mau.
12 Go kelatesa eda ki lasa aneana
paki noai sara warua, Eufrates;
go noai kakana e dapa, naga napua
ki nawota maga waina eu pae elo
sake umai ega vei tea marifnataki
13 ana. Go a punusi naatana dolu
waina eu da dautau mau, eu dave
melu nawoka ni drako, go melu
nawoka ni nalo mila, go melu na
woka ni profeta sorosoro, eu dapala
H froc maga: nalakena eu pei na
atana maga ni dimon maga, eu do
mari navaivaiana maga; waina
eu do dave pano punusi nawota
maga ni maramana mamau, naga
euga saisai ki da paki navakalo ni
naaleatia warua ki Supe, Tea Kasua
15 mau. (Kuga leo, aga valoti dapala
tea vanako sikai. Tea waina edo
leleogoro, po do pavaigoro sugoro
aneana maga e maropa, naga ega
ta malamala surata mau, go naga
euga ta punusi tea ni namaliereana
aneana mau.) Go eu saisai ki da 16
paki tokora waina e pei tea sosoana
pae Heberu ki Harmacedon.
Go kelarua e da ki lasa aneana 17
paki namalopa ; go nadaleo warua
sikai e dave melu nasuma tapu pae
malo tasake umai, e naga, E pei
tea marisuaana; go navila maga, 18
go nadaleo maga, go tovae maga eu
pakilina ; go naruru warua sikai e
pakilina, dapala waina tea takiusi a
e da pakilina mau pae ragi waina na
atamoli maga eu doko maramana
pa pa, naruru sikai waina e parua
go waina e kasua dapala nogoe. Go 19
natokoana warua e pei tea mariana
e pei matele dolu, go natokoana
maga ni nalauna maga eu dowo ;
go Babelon warua e pei tea midoa-
kiana namata ni Supe, naga ega
tua e lasa munu ni waine ni namari-
tausuana ni namaetoana aneana.
Go sara naure eu sava pano, go 20
tava maga eu da pei tea vapaiana
mau. Go usa ni vatu warua, da- 21
pala talent sikai, e do siwo pae na
koroatelagi umai paki naatamoli
maga: go naatamoli maga eu pasasa
ki Supe nalakena nawokatiana ni
usa ni vatu; nalakena nawoka-
tiana kakana e parua pa parua liu.
Matele 17.
Go sikai ni agelo larua waina eu 1
dape lasa larua e umai, po pasa ki
nau, e naga, Pa umai, aga wo pisei
ki-go navasapotaeana ni nagoroi
masausara warua waina e sakesake
doko noai lapa; waina nawota 2
maga ni maramana eu maripele
asa, go tea maga waina eu doko
maramana doko eu pei tea mariana
eu matamaloku ki waine ni na


3 maripeleana aneana. Go e dapelua
au doko Naatana paki masopalo :
go a punusi nagoroi sikai e sakesake
nalo mila miala kakakala sikai,

vasasakiana, po pilake napauna larua
go napati ni napauna rualima

tea sugoroana Id tea mialakesakesa

ragoldana maga, go ki naleo maga
waina eu da dautau mau ni na
5 maripeleana aneana, go nagisa sikai
e pei tea midiriana doko naraena,

NAGOROI MASAUSAEA MAGA GO NI
TEA MAMAEAGOKIANA MAGA NI
6 maeamana. Go a punusi nagoroi
wanogoe e matainaloku ki nada ni
tea tautau maga, go ki nada ni tea
noasokisoki maga ki Yesu. Go
ragi waina a punusi a, a maga ki
7 namagaana warua. Go agelo e noa
ki nau, e naga, E kasana ku maga ?
Kinau aga wo noa ki-go paia ni
nagoroi, go ni nalo mila waina e do
ova e, waina e pilake napauna larua
go napati ni napauna rualima sikai.
8 Nalo mila waina ku punusi a e doko
tuai, go e da doko ragi waia mau;
go ega wo sake fnelu dua ki epua pei,
go ega wo paki namatepuoliana
pano. Go tea maga waina eu doko
maramana euga wo maga, tea maga
waina nagisada e da pei tea midiri-
ana doko tusi ni namauriana mau
pae nanadikilaketanoana ni mara-
mana pa pa, ragi waina euga to
punusi nalo mila, naga e doko
tuai, go naga e da doko ragi waia
9 mau, go naga ega wo umai. Na
midodoana waina e pilake namanu-
matuaana e doko nea. Napauna
larua eu pei tava larua, waina na
10 goroi e sakesake ara: go eu pei
nawota larua; tea lima eu dowo
sua, tea sikai e doko ragi waia, tea
pota eko da umai mau; go ragi
waina ega wo umai, e one asa one
naga ega toko ragi kiki. Go nalo 11
mila waina e doko tuai, go e da doko
ragi waia mau, nae e pei kelatolu,
go e pei tea ni tea larua ; go ega wo
paki namatepuoliana pano. Go na 12
pati rualima ni napauna waina ku
punusi ra eu pei nawota rualima
sikai, waina eu ko da dape nama-
rakiana mau ; ma euga wo dape na
veinawotaana dapala nawota maga,
aura sikai, sikoti nalo mila. Nara 13
eu peani namidoakipotaeana sikai
maau, go eu do pitua ki nakasuana
go naveinawotaana adeada paki
nalo mila. Nara euga wo mari 14
navakalo paki Arnio, go Arnio ega
wo marimatua ki da, nalakena e
pei Nawota ki nawota maga, go
Tea Maramara ki tea maramara
maga; go tea maga waina eu
sikoti a, tea sosoana maga go tea
matadoaana maga go tea sara-
lomau maga, nara ma euga wo
marimatua. Go e noa ki nau, el 5
naga, Noai maga “waina ku punusi
ra, waina nagoroi masausara e do
sakesake ara, eu pei narei maga, go
taua maga, go nalauna maga, go
namena maga. Go napati rualima 16
sikai ni napauna waina ku punusi
ra, go nalo mila, nara euga wo pilosi
nagoroi masausara, go euga wo
mari a ega vei maso maladi, go
malamala, go euga wo gani napo-
kasina, go euga wo dapara ki puti
a ki nakapu. Nalakena Supe el 7
pitua ki nia paki napopoda naga
euga mari namidoakipotaeana ane-
ana, go naga euga mari namidoaki-
potaeana sikai maau, go naga euga
vitua ki namarakiana adeada paki
nalo mila, pa pa navasaana maga
ki Supe euga vei tea marisuaana.
Go nagoroi waina ku punusi a e pei 18
natokoana warua, waina e peani


namarakiana dapau nawota maga
ni maramana.

rama ni nasulu sikai ega wo da

ako mau: nalakena tea sorisori
anigo maga eu pei naatamoli warua
maga ni maramana; nalakena na
launa maga mamau puti eu pei
tea viragisasapokiana ki nawosi-
doaana anigo. Go nada ni profeta 21
maga go ni tea tautau maga, go ni
tea maga mamau puti waina eu pei
tea maripunueana maramana, e pei
tea vapaiana asa.

Tea Maramara ki tea maramara
MAGA, GO NAWOTA KI NAWOTA
MAGA.
Go a punusi agelo sikai e lawodu 17
elo ; go e pioso ki nadaleo warua,
e noa ki manu maga mamau puti
waina eu do diri maleoputo ni na
malopa, e naga, Kuga umai, kuga
vei tea saisaildana paki nakaniana
warua ki Supe ; naga kuga kani 18
napokasi ni nawota maga, go napo-
kasi ni kaptin ni manu maga,
go napokasi ni tea kasua maga,
go napokasi ni liorsc maga, go ni
tea maga waina eu sakesake ara,
go napokasi ni tea maga mamau
puti, ni tea maga waina eu dumada
doko go ni tea maga waina eu
pei naviti, go ni tea kiki maga go
ni tea warua maga.
Go a punusi nalo mila, go nawota 19
maga ni maramana, go taua adeada
maga, eu pei tea saisaikiana naga
euga mari navakalo paki tea waina
e sakesake horse, go paki taua
aneana. Go nalo mila e pei tea vua- 20
sokiana, nara ma profeta sorosoro
waina e mari navaivaiana maga na
matana, waina pae ara e piragisa-
sapo ki tea maga waina eu dape
wotu ni nalo mila, go tea maga
waina eu do lotu ki nasupe kakana :
ero dua pei tea nadikiana mauri paki
uamarourou ni nakapu waina e do


21 soro ki sulfur; go tea pota maga
eu pel tea maripunueana ki lova
ki tea waina e sakesake horse, ki
lova waina e dave melu nawokana
umai: go manu maga mamau puti
eu puka ki napokasida.
Matele 20.
1 Go a punusi agelo sikai edo siwo
pae nakoroatelagi umai, e dape
tea viloki ni epua, go namori ni vatu
2 warua sikai e doko namelearuna. Go
e puasoki drako, maata tuai, waina
e pei diabolo go Satan, po soli a
3 natau manu sikai, po nadi ki nia
paid epua, po pogoro e, po pulusoki
a elagi ki nia, naga ega ta more
piragisasapo ki nalauna maga man,
pa pa natau manu wanogoe euga wo
nopu : edaku Id tea wanogoe e one
asa one naga ega vei tea veresiana
ragi kiki.
4 Go a punusi malo tasake maga, go
eu dasake ara, go navasapotaeana
e pei tea vituakiana paki da: go
a punusi naatana maga ni tea maga
waina eu pei tea takotovi-napauda-
ana nalakena nanoasokisokiana ni
Yesu, go nalakena navasaana ki
Supe, go ni tea maga waina eu da
lotu ki nalo mila mau, go ki nasupe
kakana mau, go waina eu da dape
wotu aneana paki naraeda go paki
nafhelearuda mau; go eu mauri,
po maramara sikoti Kristo natau
5 manu sikai. Tea pota maga ni tea
mate maga eu da mauri mau pa pa
natau manu sikai wanogoe euga
nopu. Tea wanogoe e pei na
6 moroduleanaana vea. Tea waina e
peani matele sikai doko namoro-
duleanaana vea e maropa go e
dautau : nara namateana kerua e
da peani nakasuaana dapau ra
mau ; ma euga wo pei tea viri maga
ki Supe go ki Kristo, go euga wo
maramara sikoti a natau manu
sikai.
Go ragi. waina natau manu sikai 7
wanogoe euga nopu, Satan ega
wo pei tea veresiana melu dua Id
tokora ni nakokoroana aneana, go 8
ega wo dave umai naga ega viragi-
sasapo ki nalauna maga waina eu
doko naweloki pati ni maramana,
Coc go Macoc, naga ega viragisaisai
ki da paid navakalo : waina naveve-
ana kakada e dapala naworaone ni
natasi. Go eu sake usuraki nawele- 9
weleana ni navanua, po dalivirigoro
tokora ni namenakiana ki tea tau-
tau maga, go natokoana dodomiana:
go nakapu e pae nakoroatelagi
siwo umai, po ganidinomi ra. Go 10
diabolo waina e piragisasapo ki da
e pei tea nadikiana paki namarou-
rou ni nakapu go ni sulfur, tokora
waina nalo mila go profeta sorosoro
ero doko asa; go euga wo pei tea
mariana euga wo pitinu aleatia go
pogi pa pa ega wo du du po du
mau du.
Go a punusi malo tasake warua 11
tare sikai, go tea waina e dasake
asa, waina maramana go nakoro-
atelagi ero sava dua ki naraena
pano ; go tokora sikai e da madeada
pei tea vapaiana mau. Go a punusi 12
tea mate maga, tea warua maga
go tea kiki maga, eu lawodu narae
ni malo tasake ; go tusi maga eu
pei tea vukepiriana; go tusi pota
sikai e pei tea vukepiriana, waina e
pei tusi ni namauriana: go tea
mate maga eu pei tea vasapotaeana
melu tea maga waina eu pei tea
midiriana tusi maga, pae nawosiana
adeada maga. Go natasi e pitua 13
ki tea mate maga waina eu doko
asa; go namateana go Hades ero
pitua ki tea mate maga waina eu
doko ara: go eu pei tea vasa-
potaeana sara natamoli sikasikai
pae nawosiana adeada maga.
Go namateana go Hades ero pei 14
tea nadikiana paki namarourou ni
nakapu. Tea wanogoe e pei na


mateana kerua, namarourou ni
15 nakapu. Go te naata e pe ta pei
tea vapaiana e pei tea midiriana
tusi ni namauriana man, e pe vei
tea nadikiana paki namarourou ni
nakapu.
Matele 21.
1 Go a punusi nakoroatelagi vau
sikai go maramana vau sikai: na
lakena nakoroatelagi vea go mara-
mana vea ero pano sua ; go natasi
2e da moro doko mau. Go a punusi
natokoana tapu, Yerusalem vau,
e do siwo pae nakoroatelagi melu
Supe umai, e pei tea marimata-
kiana dapala nagoroi laki sikai
waina e magi anawota pei tea rikei-
-3 kiana. Go a dogo nadaleo warua
sikai e melu malo tasake umai, e
naga, Kuga leo, tapaupau ki Supe
e sikoti naatainoli maga, go ega wo
doko sikoti ra, go nara euga wo pei
narei aneana, go nae ega wo pei
4 Supe sikoti ra, Supe adeada. Go
ega wo kasilua sara naririmata
melu dua ki namatada maga; go
namateana ega wo da moro doko
mau ; go nasusueana, go natagiana,
go navitinuana, euga wo da moro
doko mau : tea vea maga eu pano
5 sua. Go tea waina e dasake malo
tasake e naga, Kuga leo, a mari naleo
maga mamau puti eu pau. Go e
naga, Pa midiri: nalakena nava-
saana maga wanogoe eu pei daleo
6 atatu go lomau. Go e noa ki nau,
e naga, Eu pei tea marisuaana.
Kinau a pei Alfa go Omeca, na
atulakeana go nanopna'na. Kinau
aga wo dua moli ki tea waina e
madou noai ni namata noai ni
7 namauriana. Tea waina e mari
matua ega wo peani tea maga wa-
nogoe ; go aga wo pei Supe aneana,
8 go nae ega wo pei natugu. Ma agi
tea mataku maga, go tea maga
waina eu da saralomau mau, go
tea mamaragokiana maga, go tea
maripunue maga, go tea maripele
maga, go tea wosidoa maga, go tea
lotu ki nasupe maga, go tea soro-
soro maga mamau puti, matele
adeada ega wo doko namarourou
waina e do soro ki nakapu go ki
sulfur; waina e pei namateana
kerua.
Go sikai ni agelo larua waina eu 9
dape lasa larua, waina eu pura ki
nawokatiana larua edaku mau e
umai; go e pasa ki nau, po naga.
Pa umai, aga wo pisei ki-go nagoroi
laki, nagoroi ki Arnio. Go e dape- 10
lua au doko Naatana paki tava
warua go pakilagi sikai, go e pisei
ki nau natokoana tapu Yerusalem,
e do siwo pae nakoroatelagi melu
Supe umai, e pilake nasama- 11
samaana ki Supe : namarama ka-
kana e dakiusi vatu sikai waina e
pia parua liu, dapala vatu yasper
sikai, e maru dapala krustalo : el 2
pilake nakoro warua go pakilagi
sikai; e pilake namata-pua rualima
sikai tamate dua, go agelo rualima
sikai tamate dua waina eu doko
pisari namata-pua maga; go nagisa
maga waina eu pei tea midiriana
ara, waina eu pei nagisa maga ni
naworawora maga ni Israel natuna
maga : namata-pua dolu eu doko 13
taleva ni elo sake ; go namata-pua
dolu eu doko taleva ni north; go
namata-pua dolu eu doko taleva
ni sauth ; go namata-pua dolu eu
doko taleva ni elo musu. Go na 14
koro ni natokoana e pilake laketano
rualima sikai tamate dua, go e pilake
doko ara nagisa rualima sikai ta-
mate dua ni apostolo rualima sikai
tamate dua ki Arnio. Go tea 15
waina e pasa ki nau e dape tea
totowo napati nau ni cold sikai,
naga ega towogi natokoana, go na
mata-pua kakana maga, go nakoro
kakana. Go natokoana e pei pala- 16
pala one, go navarauana kakana


e pataka ni naweleweleana kakana :
go e dowogi natokoana ki napati
nan, e pei maile manu sikai go po-
notia lima : navarauana go nawele-
weleana go navakilagiana kakana
17 eu pataka sikai. Go e dowogi na
koro kakana, kubit ponotia sikai
rualima takuna pati tamate pati,
totowo ki naatamoli sikai, waina e
18 pei, tea ki agelo sikai. Go natavagi-
ana ni nakoro kakana e pei yasper :
go natokoana e pei cold tautau da-
-19 kiusi class tautau. Laketano maga
ni nakoro ni natokoana eu pei tea
rikeikiana ki sara vatu wia. Lake-
tano vea e pei yasper; kerua,
safer; ketolu, kalkedon; kevati,
20 emerald ; kelima, sardonux ; ke-
latesa, sardio ; kelarua, krusolitho ;
kelatolu, berulo ; keloveti, topaz ;
kerualima, krusopraso ; kerualima
sikai tamate sikai, huakintho ; ke-
rualima sikai tamate kerua, ame-
21 tliusto. Go namata-pua rualima
sikai tamate dua eu pei napati ni
vilavila rualima sikai tamate dua ;
sara namata-pua eu pei tea ni na
pati ni vilavila sikasikai puti: go
napua lapa ni natokoana e pei cold
tautau, dapala class lagaduruana.
22 Go a da punusi te nasuma tapu
sikai asa mau ; nalakena Yeliovab
Supe, tea Kasua mau, go Arnio, ero
23 pei nasuma tapu kakana. Go na
tokoana e da dapala waina e pia
naga elo kite atelagi eroga marama-
laga asa mau: nalakena nasama-
samaana ni Supe e maramalagati
a, go Arnio e pei nasulu kakana.
24 Go nalauna maga euga wo surata
pae namafama kakana ; go nawota
maga ni maramana eu do dape na
samasamaana adeada umai paki
25 asa. Go namata-pua kakana maga
euga wo da pei tea kokoroana aleati
mau, (nalakena pogi ega wo da
26 doko tokora wanogoe mau); go
euga wo dape nasamasamaana go
nadodomadaganiaua ni nalauna
maga umai paki asa : go te nava- 27
tuna sikai waina e da dautau man
ega wo da sili paki asa mau, kite tea
waina e do mari namamaragokiana
go nasorosoroana: ma tea maga
waina eu pei tea midiriana tusi
ni namauriana Id Amio euga wo
sikida sili fdki asa.
Matele 22.
Go e pisei ki nau noaisara sikai 1
ni noai ni namauriana, e maru da-
pala krustalo, e do dave melu malo
tasake ki Supe go ki Arnio, maleo-
puto ni napua lapa kakana. Go 2
nakau ni namauriana e doko taleva
waia ni noaisara go taleva kerua,
e do dau ki nawana rualima sikai
tamate dua, e do dau ki nawana
sara atelagi: go naulu maga ni
nakau eu pei agi namaripauriana
ni nalauna maga. Go te navasa- 3
sakiana ega wo da moro doko mau :
go malo tasake ki Supe go ki Arnio
ega wo doko asa: go tea suasua
aneana maga euga wo maneana
suasua; go euga wo punusi narae- 4
na ; go nagisana ega wo doho na
raeda. Go pogi ega wo da moro doko 5
mau; go eda dapala waina euga
masau namarama ni nasulu go na
marama ni elo mau; nalakena
Yehovah Supe ega wo maramalaga
paki da; go euga wo maramara
pa pa ega tu du po du mau du.
Go e noa ki nau, e naga, Nava- G
saana maga wanogoe eu pei daleo
atatu go lomau ; go Yehovah, Supe
ki naatana maga ni profeta maga
e dipakilua agelo aneana paloti
naga ega visei ki tea suasua aneana
maga tea maga waina e one ara
one naga euga valdlina marave-
rave. Go kuga leo, aga valoti ma- 7
raverave. Tea waina e dogo
parati ki navasaana maga ni na
veanoasaiana ni tusi waia e maro pa.
Go Kinau Yoane a pei tea waina 8


a dogo po punusi tea maga wanogoe.
Go ragi waina a dogo po punusi, a
dowo pakitano naga aga lotu narae
ni namele maga ni agelo waina e
9 pisei Id nau tea magajranogoe. Go
e noa ki nau, e naga, Pa vunusi naga
pa ta mari a mau : a pei tea suasua
sikai sikoti ko go sikoti taifna maga
profeta maga, go sikoti tea maga
waina eu do dogo parati ki nava-
saana maga ni tusi waia : pa lotu
ki Supe.
10 Go e noa ki nau, e naga, Pa ta
pulusoki navasaana maga ni navea-
noasaiana ni tusi waia mau ; nala-
kena ragi kakada e pei maladigi.
11 Tea waina e dagele, ega to mari
naleo tagele : go tea waina e loa,
ega to pei tea mariana ega loa : go
tea waina e leana, ega to marina
marinaleoleanaana: go tea waina
o dautau ega to pei tea mariana
12 ega tautau. Kuga leo, aga valoti
maraverave; go namoriana agi-
nau ega sikoti au, naga aga lagati-
dua sara naatamoli euga sikasikai
ega tapala waina nawosiana adeada
13 eu doko. Kinau a pei Alfa go
Omeoa, tea vea go tea edaku, na
14 atulakeana go nanopuana. Tea
maga waina eu do sarue sugoro
adeada maga eu maropa, naga euga
veani nasuasuakiana paki nakau ni
namauriana, go naga euga sili pae
namata-pua maga paki natokoana.
15 Etaku kuria maga eu doho, go tea
wosidoa maga, go tea maripele
maga, go tea maripunue maga, go
tea lotu Id nasupe maga, go sara
naata waina eu masau nasorosoro-
ana po mari a.
Kinau Yesu a dipakilua agelo 16
aginau paloti naga ega noasoldsoki
tea maga wanogoe paki mu nalo ni
ekkalesia maga. Kinau a pei nawasi
go nawora ni David, inasoe lapa
marama ni malipogi.
Go Naatana go nagoroi laki ero 17
naga, Pa umai. Go tea waina c
dogo ega naga, Pa umai. Go tea
waina e madou, ega umai : tea
waina e masauna, ega tape nioli ki
noai ni namauriana.
Kinau a noasokisoki paki sara 18
naatamoli waina eu dogo nava-
saana maga ni naveanoasaiana ni
tusi waia, a naga, Te naata e pe
sokari ra, Supe e pe wo sokari naata
wanogoe ki nawokatiana maga wai-
na eu pei tea midiriana tusi waia :
go te naata e pe tapelua te seara 19
ki navasaana maga ni tusi ni na
veanoasaiana waia, Supe e pe wo
dapelua matele aneana ffielu dua
ki nakau ni namauriana, go melu
dua ki natokoana tapu, waina ero
pei tea midiriana tusi waia.
Tea waina e noasokisoki tea 20
maga wanogoe e naga, loro: aga
valoti maraverave. Amen; pa
umai, Nawota Yesu.
Nasaupiaana ki Nawmta Yesu ega 21
sikoti tea tautau maga. Amen.
E NOPU.


nguna-tongoan psalms




TUSI
NI SALAMO MAGA
PAB
DAVID MAGA
TEA BOA ANA PAKI NAVABAANA
NGUNA-TONGOA, NEW HEBRIDES
LONDON
BRITISH AND FOREIGN BIBLE SOCIETY
1912


THE PSALMS IN NGUNA-TONGOA.


SALAMO MAGA.
TUSI
Salamo 1.
1 Ae namaropaana ki naatamoli
waina e da surata pae namidoa-
kipotaeana ki tea sigisigileo
maga mau,
Go waina e da lawodu napua
ki tea mari naleo sa maga mau,
Go waina e da dasake tokora ni
natasakedokoana ki tea vasa-
saudoa maga mau!
2 Ma namaroana aneana e doko
nawotaeana ki Yekovah;
Go e do midodoa nawotaeana
aneana aleati go pogi.
3 Go ega wo dakiusi nakau sikai
waina e pei tea lawoana pisari
noai sara maga,
Waina ega wo pitua ki nawana
ragi kakana,
Go nauluna ega wo da kokolo
Go sara naleo waina ega wo mari
ra euga wo disu pia.
4 Tea sigisigileo maga eu da dapala
nogoe mau ;
Ma eu dapala napolaga waina
nalagi e do sui pulua ki nia
pano.
5 Nalakena tea wanogoe tea sigi-
sigileo maga euga wo da du
navasapotaeana mau,
Go tea mari naleo sa maga euga
wo da du nasaisaiana ni tea
leana maga mau.
6 Nalakena Yekovak e atae napua
ki tea leana maga :
Ma napua ki tea sigisigileo maga
ega wo puoli.
Salamo 2.
Ekasana nalauna maga eu midi, 1
Go narei maga eu do midoa ki
tea palo ?
Nawota maga ni maramana eu 2
do dumada lawo ki da,
Go tea maraki maga eu do saisai
seke,
Dipa Yekovak, go dipa Tea Vu-
vuraikiana aneana, eu naga,
Tuga vuakotovi natali adeada 3
maga,
Po nadi ki namea adeada maga
euga melu dua ki gida pano.
Tea waina e doko nakoroatelagi 4
maga doko ega wo muru :
Nawota ega wo pasasaudoa ki da.
Ega wo edaku pasa ki da namae- 5
toana aneana.
Po mari ra euga wo durururu
namaritausuana aneana :
Go kinau a puvurai ki nawota 6
aginau
Zion tava taps aginau.
Aga rogorogo ki natawanakiana : 7
Yekovak e noa ki nan, Nigo ku
pei natugu ;
Kinau a pesi ko masoso.
Pa tatagovi au, go aga wo pitua 8
ki nalauna maga euga vei tea
veanipiolikiana anigo,
Go namatapago ni maramana


maga euga vei tea veaniana
anigo.
Pa wo mariporae ra ki tiko ni
_ airon sikai;
Pa wo mariporaworae ra euga
takiusi lasa ki tea mari lasa
ni naruku.
Go ragi waia, nawota maga, kuga
manumatua :
Kuga vei tea tapavanauana, tea
vasapotae maga ni maiamana.
Kuga magi Yehovah suasua pi-
lake namatakuana,
Go kuga laelaea pilake naruru-
ruruana.
Kuga tumili Natuna naga ega
ta maeto mau, go naga kuga
ta puoli napua mau,
Nalakena namaetoana aneana ega
wo pavaga maraverave.
Ae namaropaana ki tea maga
mamau puti waina eu pavatu
asa !
Salamo 3.
Salamo sikai kiDavid, ragi waina e sava
dua ki narae ni natuna Absalom.
Yehovah, tea maga waina eu do
diesoki au eu lapa pa !
Tea maga waina eu do duleana
dipa au eu lapa.
Tea lapa eu do noa nalo ni na
atagu,
Namautipauriana e da maneana
doko Supe mau. Selah.
Ma nigo, Yehovah 0, ku pei
nakokoro sikai dalivirigoro
au;
Nasamasamaana aginau, go tea
sike napaugu.
A do pioso paki Yehovah ki na
daleogu,
Go e do pasadara au pae tava
tapu aneana umai. Selah.
Kinau a one natano po naaturu ;
A darapa ; nalakena Yehovah e
silae au.
Aga wo da matau ki tivilia maga 6
ni narei,
Waina eu duinada la wo ki da
dipa au daliviri.
Pa tuleana, Yehovah 0; pa 7
mautipauri au, Supe aginau 0 :
Nalakena ku atu puti tea kokona
ki nau maga navatu ni nasida ;
Ku maripori napati ni tea sigi-
sigileo maga.
Namautipauriana e pei tea ki 8
Yehovah :
Navasapiakiana anigo ega toko
narei anigo. Selah,
Salamo 4,
Salamo sikai ki David.
Eagi waina aga vioso, pa vasa- 1
dara au, Supe leana aginau ;
Eagi waina a doko nariesokiana
ku maginau mari a e pelewe-
lea :
Pa saupia ki nau, go pa rogo
natapasavasaana aginau.
Naatamoli natuda maga, nasama- 2
samaana aginau ega wo pei
nadododaoana pa pa paki seve
ragi 1
Kuga wo dodomi tea palo, po
laga nasorosoroana pa pa paki
seve ragi ? Selah.
Ma kuga atae naga Yehovah e 3
potae lua tea dodomi-dodo-
miana naga ega vei aneana :
Yehovah ega wo dogo ragi waina
aga vioso paki nia.
Kuga mataku, po da mari naleo 4
sa. mau;
Kuga noa e napopomu one na
wewele animu, go kuga tata-
mate. Selah.
Kuga vitua ki naviriana maga 5
ni namarinaleoleanaana,
Go kuga vavatu Yehovah,


6 Tea lapa eu naga, Sei ega wo
pisei Id gida tea wia 1
Yehovah, pa sike namarama ni
naraema paki garni.
7 Ku pitua ki nalaelaeana e doko
napopogu,
■ E parua liu tea adeada ragi
waina korn go waine adeada
ero parua.
8 Aga wo one natano natamateana
po maturu :
Nalakena nigo, Yehovah, ku ma-
sikifha mari au a doko pia
doko.
Salamo 5,
Salamo sikai ki David.
1 Pa ta ki nadaligama paki na
* noaana aginau maga, Yehovah
. o,
Pa vunusi namidodoana aginau.
2 Pa takidorogo nadaleo ni nakua-
piosoana aginau, Nawota agi-
nau, go Supe aginau :
Nalakena aga wo dapasavasa
paki-go.
3 Yehovah 0, pa wo dogo nada-
leogu malipogi;
Malipogo aga wo marimatana
ki natapasamsaana aginau
paki-go, go aga wo do leogoro.
d Nalakena nigo ku da pei Supe
sikai waina ku masau nasigi-
sigileoana mau :
Tea sa ega wo da fhenaki sikoti
ko mau.
5 Tea leomadaga maga euga wo
da lawodu kivea ki namatama
maga mau:
Ku pilosi tea maga mamau puti
waina eu do mari namarinaleo-
tageloana.
6 Pa wo maripuoli ki tea vasa
nasorosoroana maga :
Naataiholi ni nada go ni namari-
soreana Yehovah e mamarago
ki nia.
7 kinau, aga wo paloti paki
nasuma anigo nalapalapaana
ni nadodomiana anigo :
Aga wo suai natano paki nasuma
tapu anigo namatau-ki-go-ana.
Yehovah 0, pa maraki an 8
ega vae namarinaleoleanaana
anigo nalakena tea kokona
ki nau maga ;
Pa mari napua anigo ega leana
kivea ki naraegu. •
Nalakena tea vei lomau e da 9
doko nawokada mau ;
Napalauda e pei namarisakiana
maga :
Namanuda e pei matigo wolaga-
tiana sikai;
Eu mari namenada e moinoaa.
Pa tipakotovi ra, Supe 0 ; 10
Euga wo dowo pae namidoaki-
potaeana adeada maga :
Pa tosiva ki da pano doko
nalapalapaana hi natapiriana
adeada maga ;
Nalakena eu mari pauluulu
paki-go.
Go tea maga mamau puti waina 11
eu do pavatu ako euga wo
laelaea,
Euga wo kolalaelaea pa pa ega
tu mau du, nalakena pa wo
kovagoro ra;
Go tea maga waina eu do
dodomi nagisama euga wo
darasa ako.
Nalakena nigo pa wo pasapia ki 12
tea leana ;
Yehovah 0, pa wo dalivirigoro
e ki nasaupiaana ega tapala
nakokoro sikai.
Salamo 6.
Salamo sikai ki David.
Yehovah 0, pa ta pasa kasua ki 1
nau namaetoana anigo mau,
Go pa ta parati au namarita-
_ usuana anigo mau.
Pa saupia ki nau, Yehovah 0; 2
nalakena kinau a malaulau :


Yehovah 0, pa maripauri au;
nalakena navatugu maga eu
manaunau.
Go naatagu e manaunau parau :
Go nigo, Yehovah 0, seve ragi ?
Pa liliu umai, Yehovah 0, pa
vualua naatagu :
Pa mautipauri au nalakena na
dodomiana anigo.
Nalakena, namidoa-ki-go-ana e
da doko namateana mau :
Sei ega wo pasadodomata ki-go
Sheol ?
A mawosa Id nagiana aginau ;
Sara napogiana a do mari nawe-
wele aginau e sale ;
A do mari nawewele saragoroana
aginau e sara Id naririmatagu
maga,
Namatagu e modave nalakena
napoposaana.
E pei tea t-uai nalakena tea ko-
kona ki nau maga mamau puti.
Kuga rnelu dua ki nau pano,
tea mari namarinaleotageleana
maga mamau puti;
Nalakena Yehovah e dogo na
daleo ni natagiana aginau.
Yehovah e dogo navavaraniana
aginau ;
Yehovah ega wo piragi natapa-
savasaana aginau.
Tea kokona ki-nau maga mamau
puti euga wo maliere po ma-
naunau parua :
Buga wo liliu pano, euga w t o
maliere maraverave.
Salamo 7.
Shieoaion ki David, waina e lega ki
Yehovah asa, nalo ni navasaana
magaki Kush nawora ni Benyamin.
1 Yehovah 0, Supe aginau, a sava
sili ako :
Pa mautipauri au meludua Id tea
maga mamau puti waina eu do
kopalele au, go pa vualua au :
2 Epe katiporae naatagu daldusi
laion sikai,
Po puaporaworae a, go tea vualua
e pe tika.
Yehovah 0, Supe aginau, a pe 3
mari tea waia ;
Namarinaleotageleana e pe toko
namelearugu maga ;
A pe lagati-dua tea tamate paki 4
nau tea sa;
(Go a pualua tea kokona Id moll
Id nau :)
Tea kokona ega kopalele na 5
atagu, po pa parati Id nia ;
Go ega vasi namauriana aginau
paki natano,
Po mari nasamasamaana aginau
ega toko namotamota. Selah.
Pa tuleana Yehovah 0, namae- 6
toana anigo,
Pa tumama sike ko pakilagi dipa
namidiana ki tea kokona Id
nau maga:
Go pa maginau darapa ; ku dipa
ki navasapotaeana.
Go nasaisaiana ni narei maga 7
euga talivirigoro ko :
Go pa liliu dapau ra umai paki
malo ni elagi.
Yehovah ega wo pasapotae narei 8
maga :
Yehovah 0, pa vasapotae au ega
vae namarinaleoleanaana agi-
nau, go ega vae nawialuaana
aginau waina e doko au.
Nasaana ki tea sigisigileo maga 9
ega makoto, a pavarani ko asa,
go pa wo lawokilaketoko tea
leana ;
Nalakena Supe leana e do mari-
dogo napopo maga go napele-
kevatu maga.
Nakokoro aginau e doko Supe, 10
Waina e do mautipauri tea popo
leana maga.
Supe e pei tea vasapotae leana, 11
Go Supe e maeto sara naaleatia.
E pe ta liliu mau, e pe wo pakali 12
lova aneana;
E puapelua ki naasu aneana, po
marifhata ki nia.


13 Go e dutua ki naleo maga ni
namateana paki nia ;
Ega wo mari nalua aneana maga
euga vavaga.
14 Pa leo, edo pitivitinu ki namari-
naleotageleana;
Go e dumau ki namarisakiana,
go ega wo piragi nasorosoroana.
15 B kili moru sikai,'po mari a e
pakipua,
Go e dowo paki morutano waina
e do mari a.
16 Namarisakiana aneana ega wo
liliu paki napauna,
Go namaripavakotoana aneana
ega wo siwo paki namasuana.
17 Aga wo pasadodomata ki Yeho-
vak ega vae namarinaleoleana-
ana aneana :
Go aga wo lega-samasamani na
gisa ni Yehovah, Tea Vakilagi
mau.
Salamo 8.
Salamo sikai ki David.
1 Yehovah 0, Nawota aginami,
Nagisama e parua pa maramana
mamau !
Waina pa vitua ki nasamasama-
ana anigo ega toko elagi ni
nakoroatelagi maga.
2 Ku mari nasamasamaniana wia e
dave nawoka ni pipia maga go
tea susu maga,
Nalakena tea kokona ki-go maga,
Naga pa mari tea kokona go tea
sikosiko eroga makoto ki nia.
3 Ragi waina a do punusi na
koroatelagi anigo maga, na
wosiana ni nakinima maga,
Atelagi go fnasoe maga waina
ku lawokilaketoko ara;
4 Naatamoli e pei nasava, naga pa
midoa ki nia ?
Go naatamoli natuna, naga pa
umai punusi a ?
5 Go ku mari a e pakitano kiki ki
agelo maga,
Go ku pauvau ki nia ki nasama-
samaana go nadodomadagani-
ana.
Ku mari a e maramara dapau 6
nawosiana maga ni namele-
aruma maga ;
Ku doropusi sara naleo eu doko
etano ki namelena maga :
Skiip maga go ox maga mamau 7
puti,
Go nalo mila maga ni namalasi;
Manu maga ni nakoroatelagi, go 8
naika maga ni natasi,
Tea maga waina eu do pano dua-
duru napua maga ni natasi
maga.

Nagisama e parua pa maramana
mamau !

Aga wo pasadodomata ki Ye- 1
hovah ki napopogu mamau ;

mamau puti.

gisafna, nigo Tea Vakilagi
mau 0.

maga eu liliu pano,

pa dua ki naraeiha.

ana aginau go navululuana
agmau ;

maga,

du du po du mau du.

pei maso maladi pa pa e du
mau du;


Go natokoana maga waina ku
pakulua ra,
Namidoa-ki-da-ana e puoli.

pei ncnvota pa pa e du man
du:

aneana naga ega vasapotae.

vakilagi sikai,

ni nariesokiana;

maga waina eu do laga ako

aneana maga inaleoputo ni

namateana;

samani-ko-ana mamau :

tuna nagoroi,

ana amgo ara.

waina eu duihada kili a ;

naiheleda e pei tea solisokiana

navasapotaeana;

maga. Namidodoana. Selah.

liliu panojpa pa paki Sheol,

eu do malio ki Supe.

ega tu mau du mau.

moli ega ta marimatua mau:

hovah 0 :

sara ragi;

aneana,

pona.
3 Tea waina eda pinoa ki namc-
nana mau,

tana ri man,

vasapinoaana dipa tea ni ihala-
digi ki nia man.

midoakipalokiana namatana
maga;

Yehovali.

marisakiana asa, go waina e
da mari a e pano pota man.

aneana raki narogoviana man,
Go waina e da dape te ruku
sikai dipa tea waina sogi e dika
asa man.
Tea waina c do mari tea maga
wanogoe ega wo da parivari
mau pa pa ega tu mau du.

Salamo 18.
Salamo silcai ki David, tea snasua ki

nakasuaana aginau.

nau, go nasuma ni paka agi-
nau, go tea vualua au ;

aginau, aga wo pa vatu asa ;

napau ni namautipauri-au-ana,
tokora valdlagi aginau.

na e pei tea waina ega vei tea
samasamaniana :

meludua ki tea kokona ki nau
maga.
4 Natali maga ni namateana eu
dalivirigoro au,

taku.

goro an :

na ega wo sili nadaligana maga.
Go maramana e nuanua po duru- 7

eu parivari

na e maeto.

kana e do ganikani:

pei tea tokoniana asa.
Go e kolo ki nakoroatelagi maga 9
po siwo umai;

etano ki nainelena maga.

diri:

B mari namaligo e pei tokora ni 11
natokolokuana aneana, tapau-
pau aneana dalivirigoro e ;

pouru maligo maga ni nakoro-

nia napopouru maligo aneana
maga eu pano,

vaga maga ni nakapu.
Go Yehovah e mari tovae e kati 13
nakoroatelagi maga,
Go Tea Valdlagi mau e pitua ki
nadaleona ;
Usa ni vatu go namelevara va-
vaga maga ni nakapu.


Go e dipe ki nalua aneana maga,
po daperavera ki da ;
Go ki navila lapa, po marimatua
ki da.
Go namorua maga ni noai maga
eu pei tea vnnusiana,
Go laketano maga ni maramana
eu dokolina,
Nalakena navasakasuaana anigo,
Yehovah 0,
Nalakena suidaka ni namero ni
namaetoana anigo.
Ega wo dipakilua pae clagi umai,
ega wo puati au ;
Ega wo dosagi au melu dua ki
noai lapa.
Ega wo pualua au melu dua ki
tea kokona ki nau waina e
kasua,
Go ki tea maga waina eu pilosi
au, nalakena eu kasua liu
au.
Euga wo sua au naaleatia ni na
riesoki-au-ana ;
Ma Yehovah e pei tea silae au.
Go e piragilua au paki tokora
welewelea sikai;
Ega wo pualua au, nalakena e
maro au.
Yehovah ega wo lagatidua au
ega vae namarinaleoleanaana
aginau ;
Ega wo dua au liliu ega vae
natautauana ni namelearugu
maga.
Nalakena a pavaigoro napua ki
Yehovah,
Go a da sigisigileo melu dua ki
Supe aginau mau.
Nalakena navasapotaeana aneana
maga mamau puti eu doko
naraega,
Go aga wo da mari natawana-
kiana aneana maga euga melu
dua ki nau pano mau.
Go a pialua sikoti a,
Go a dufnagu pavaigoro au
melu dua ki namarinaleotagele
ana aginau.
Go Yehovah e dua au liliu pae 24
namarinaleoleanaana aginau,
Pae natautauna ni namelearugu
maga kivea ki namatana maga.
Paki tea dodomi-dodomiana pa 25
wo maridodomi;
Paki naatamoli wialua pa wo
maripialua ;
Paki tea tautau pa wo maridau- 26
Go paki tea tagele pa wo mari-
dagele.
Nalakena nigo pa wo mautipauri 27
narei rogokitesa ;
Ma namata vakilagi maga pa wo
mari ra euga vakitano.
Nalakena nigo pa wo dokoni na 28
sulu aginau :
Yehovah Supe aginau ega wo
maramalagati namaligo aginau.
Nalakena pae ako aga wo sava 29
sua taua sikai;
Go pae Supe aginau aga wo
diri kalau nakoro ni vatu
sikai.
Supe, napua aneana e pialua : 30
Nanoaana ki Yehovah e pei tea
maridogoana ;
Nae e magi tea maga mamau puti
waina eu pavatu asa pei nako-
koro sikai.
Nalakena sei e pei Supe masale 31
ki Yehovah ?
Go sei e pei vatu laketoko
masale ki Supe aginami ?
Supe waina e do dasoki au ki 32
nakasuaana,
Po do mari napua aginau e
pialua.
B do mari namelegu maga ero 33
dakiusi namele ni diir maga :
Go e do mari au a lowodu tokoro
vakilagi aginau maga.
E do pisei ki namelearugu naga 34
eroga mari navakalo ;
Go naarugu ero puapelua ki
naasu ni brass sikai.
Go ku dua au nakokoro ni na 35
mautipauriana anigo :


Go namelearuma ni matua ega
wo silae au,
Go navakaleana anigo ega wo
mari au aga warua.
36 Pa wo maripelewelea ki navasi-
ana aginau maga etano ki
Go namelegu maga eroga wo da
pa parasai mau.
37 Aga wo sava dausi tea kokona ki
nau maga, po pa parati ki da :
Go aga wo da liliu mau pa pa
aga wo man ra euga nopu.
38 Aga wo atu ra, go euga wo da
mariatae duleana mau:
Euga wo dowo etano ki namelegu
maga.
39 Go ku dasoki au ki nakasuaana
paki navakalo :
Pa wo mari tea maga waina eu
duleana dipa au euga titipatua
pakitano ki nau.
40 Go ku mari tea kokona ki nau
maga eu atutaku ki nau,
Go tea vilosi au maga, aga wo
mari ra euga vunuta.
41 Euga wo kuapioso, ma tea vualua
e dika :
Paki Yehovah, ma e da pasadara
ra mau.
42 Go aga wo pokaporaworae ra
euga tapala namotamota narae
ni nalagi:
Aga wo dakilua ra euga tapala
nalepa ni napua maga ni
natokoana.
43 Pa wo pualua au inelu dua ki
navululuana ki narei;
Pa wo mari au aga vei napau ni
nalauna maga :
Narei waina a da atae ra mau
euga wo maginau suasua.
44 Eagi waina euga wo dogo au
euga wo dogo parati ki nau :
Tea ni navanua pota maga euga
wo doko etano sorosoro paki
45 Tea ni navanua pota maga euga
wo manainai,
NGUNA-TON6OAN PSALMS
Go euga wo durururu, umai
melu dua ki tokora kokoroana
adeada maga.

laketoko aginau ega vei tea
vasapiakiana ;
Go Supe ni namautipauri-au-ana
ega wo pei tea ‘vakilagi:

nasikosikoana maga,
Go e mari narei maga eu doko
etano paki nau.
E do paulua au inelu dua ki tea 48
kokona ki nau maga :
Go pa wo sike au pikalagi melu
dua ki tea maga waina eu
_ duleana dipa au :
Pa wo pualua au melu dua ki
naatamoli ni namaripavakoto-
Nalakena tea wanogoe aga wo 49
pasadodomata ki-go, Yehovah
0, maleoputo ni nalauna maga,
Go aga wo lega-samasamani na
gisama.

namautipauriana warua maga ;
Go e do magi tea vuvuraikiana
aneana mari nadodomiana,
E do magi David go nawora-
worana maria , pa pa e du
mau du.
Salamo 19.
Salamo sikai ki David.
Nakoroatelagi maga eu do dogo- 1
rogo ki nasamasamaana ni
Supe ;
Go namalopa e do pisei ki nawo-
siana ni naihelearuna maga.
Naaleatia e do lua ki nanoaana 2
pa pa paki naaleatia,
Go napogiana e do noasai na
ataeana pa pa paki napogiana.
Nanoaana e dika go navasaana e 3
Nadaleoda e marsapo pei tea
rogoana.


Name a totowo adeada e pano
usuraki navanua mamau,
Go navasaana adeada maga eu
paid namatapago ni mara-
mana.
E magi elo lawo Id tapaupau
sikai ara,
Go nae e dapala, tea vitawiri
sikai waina e do dave efnago
aneana,
E do laelaea dapala naatamoli
kasua sikai naga ega sava
napua aneana.

matapago ni nakoroatelagi,
Go nataliviriana aneana e paid
namatapagona maga :
Go te navatuna sikai e da pei tea
tasurukiana pa dua ki navivi-
tinuana kakana mau.
7 Nawotaeana ki Yehovah e pialua,
e do piragi-liliua ki naata :

e pei lomau, e do mari tea
manumatavusa e pei tea manu-
matua.

hovah eu leana, eu do mari
napopo e laelaea :

e do maramalagati namata
maga.

tau, e do lawodu pa pa e du
mau du :
Navasapotaeana maga ki Yeho-
vah eu pei nalomauana, go eu
leana puti.

cold, go cold tautau warua :
Eu pei tea gagadi parua liu hold,
go tea lawo melu nasumana.
11 Go tea suasua anig® e pei tea
vasakorokoroana ara :
Go namoriana warua e doko na
vavaigoro-ra-ana.

sasapoana aneana maga 1
Pa mari au aga tautau pa dua ki
tea sili maga.

pa dua ki tea leomadaga maga;

mau: ragi wanogoe aga wo
pia lua,
Go aga wo dautau pa dCa Id na
tapiriana warua.

go tea taulua au.

Salamo sikai ki David.

pae tokora tapu umai,

maga mamau puti,

kiana anigo ; Selah.

potaeana mamau anigo.

pauriana anigo,

nami maga nagisa ni Supe
agmami:

e mautipauri tea vuvuraikiana

atelagi tapu aneana maga umai

namautipauriana ni namele-
aruna ni matua.

seara horse maga ;

nagisa ni Yeliovali Supe agi-
nami.

leana.

Salamo 21.

1 Yeliovali 0, nawota ega wo lae-
laea nakasuaana anigo ;
Go ega wo sokamidi parua pa
namautipauriana anigo !
2 Namasauana ni napopona ku dua
Go natatagoana ni nagolena maga
ku da mauti a asa mau.
Selah.
3 Nalakena pa wo pea ki nia ki
navasapiakiana maga ni na
wiaana :
Pa wo sawa ki vauvau sikai ni
cold wia napauna.
4 E datagovi ko ki namauriana,
ku dua e asa ;

pa pa e du du po du mau
du.

pauriana anigo ega wo parua :

pauana pa wo doropusi ra asa.

pa ega tu mau du :

nalaelaeana doko naraema.

Yehovah,

ki Tea Vakilagi mau ega wo
da parivari mau.

kokona ki-go maga mamau

papai tea maga waina eu do
pilosi ko.

upu ni nakapu ragi ni namae-
toana anigo.

maetoana aneana,
Go nakapu ega wo gani ra.

dua ki maramana,

naatamoli natuda maga.

ko :

sikai, waina euga wo da mari-
atae mari a mau.

wo atutaku,

ki nalua maga dipa naraeda.

nakasuaana anigo :

Salamo sikai ki David.
Sufe aginau, Supe aginau, eka- 1
sana ku doropusi au ?
Ehasana Tcu madu uvea ki nasilae-
au-ana, go hi navasaana maga
ni nauruana aginau ?

ma ku da pasadara mau ;
Go pogi, go a da punuta mau.
Ma nigo ku dapu, 3
Waina ku do doko nasamasama-
niana maga Id Israel.
Tamagami maga eu pavatu ako : 4
Eu pavatu, go ku pualua ra.
Eu kuapioso paki-go, po pei tea 5
vualuaana :
Eu pavatu ako, po da maliere
mau.

a da pei naatamoli mau ;

atamoli maga, go tea midoaki-
palokiana Id narei.
7 Tea maga mamau puti waina eu
do punusi au eu do pasasaudoa
ki nau :
Eu do maga ki nagoleda, eu do
ligiligi pau, eu naga,

pualua e ;

ki napele :
Ku mari au a pavatu ragi waina
a doko nasusu maga ni pilagu.

nasunia ni kanao :
Nigo ku pei Supe aginau pae
napele ni pilagu.
11 Pa ta madu uvea ki nau mau ;
nalakena nariesoldana e pei
maladigi;
Nalakena tea silae e dika.

virigoro au;
Tea kasua maga ni Bashan eu
lawodu dalivirigoro au.

porae po uru.

Go navatugu maga mamau puti
eu lawo pele kolopuda :
Namogu e dakiusi wax ;
E sara maleoputo ni namaritagu
maga.

dakiusi matele sikai ni lasa ni
naruku ;
Go namenagu e puluti nasigu
maga;
Go ku piragi au paki namotamota
ni namateana.

goro au :
Taua sikai ni tea mari naleo sa
maga eu lawodu dalivirigoro
au :
Eu turisai namelearugu maga go
namelegu maga.
A mariatae peve puti navatugu 17
maga ;
Kara eu do leopunusi au po do
siko au :
Eu madeada potae sugoro aginau 18
maga eu sarasara ra,
Go tea suniana aginau eu nadi
ki gole asa.
Ma nigo, Yehovali, pa’ ta madu 19
uvea mau :
Nakasuaana aginau, pa mari
maraverave naga pa silae au.
Pa vualua naatagu fiielu dua ki 20
Sikedau aginau melu dua ki na
melearu ni kuria.
Pa mautipauri au pa dua ki 21
nawoka ni laion ;
Go ku po pasadara au pae napati
maga ni napa,u ni ox mila
maga.

paki taigu maga :
Aga wo samasamani ko maleo-
puto ni nasaisaiana.

kuga samasamani a ;

pei naworawora ni Yakob, kuga
dodomadagani a ;
Go kuga mataku pa dua ki nia,
tea maga mamau puti waina ku
pei naworawora ni Irsael.

go e da mamarago ki narogoki-
tesaana ki tea rogokitesa mau ;
Go e da dasuru ki naraena paki
ma mau ;
Ma ragi waina e kuapioso paki
nia, e dogo.

saisaiana warua e pae ako
umai:
Aga wo lagatipitua ki nasaiana
aginau maga narae ni tea maga
waina eu matau ki nia.


26 Tea matemate maga euga wo
ganikani po puka :

hovah euga wo samasamani a :
Napopomu ega mauri pa pa cga
tu mau du.

ni maramana euga wo midodoa
po maradoa paki Yehovali:
Go naworawora maga mamau
puti ni nalauna maga euga wo
suai natano naraema.

Yehovah :
Go nae e pei tea maramara inale-
oputo ni nalauna maga.

puti ni maramana euga wo
ganikani po suai natano :
Tea maga mamau puti waina eu
do siwo paki namotafnota euga
wo ditipatua naraena,
Go te waina e marisapo mauti
naatana e mauri doko.

ana suasua ;

nalo ni Nawota paki tagona
waina ega wo umai.

Salamo 23.
Salamo sikai ki David.
1 Yehovah e pei tea leo parati ki
nau ; aga wo da dika mau.
2 Ega wo mari au aga one natano
napega malakesa maga ;
Ega wo maraki au pisari noai
maga ni namaromaroana.
3 Ega wo piragi naatagu ega liliu ;
Ega wo maraki au napua maga ni
namarinaleoleanaana nalakena
nagisana.
4 Go ragi waina aga wo surata pao
napaloa ni melu ni namateana,
Aga wo da matau ki tea sa mau ;
nalakena nigo pa wo sikoti au :
Nakau tagau anigo go tiko anigo,
nara eroga wo pakavakale au.
Pa wo ovaraki paki wede sikai 5
naraegu kivea ki tea riesoki
au maga:
Ku puvurai ki napaugu ki na
roro ; lasa munu aginau e do
sarasarape.
Nawiaana go nadodomiana eroga 6
wo sikida dausi au naeleatia
maga mamau puti ni namauri-
ana aginau ;
Go aga wo doko nasuma ki Ye-
hovah pa pa paki navarauana
ni naaleatia maga.
Salamo 24.
Salamo sikai ki David.
Navanua e pei tea ki Yehovali, 1
go navuraana kakana ;
Maramana, go tea maga waina
eu doko asa doko.
Nalakena nae e lawo ki nia elagi 2
ki natasi maga,
Go e lawokilaketoko asa elagi ki
noax sara maga.
Sei ega wo sake paki tava ki 3
Yehovah ?
Go sei ega wo lawodu tokora
tapu aneana ?
Tea melearu tare, go tea popo I
tautau;
Waina e da sike naatana paki
nasigisigileoana mau,
Go waina e da pivisa ki namari-
soreana mau.
Ega wo dape navasapiakiana 5
sikai ki Yehovah,
Go namarinaleoleanaana ki Supe
ni namautipauri-a-ana.
Tagona waia e pci tagona ni tea 6
maga waina eu do laga asa,
Waina eu do laga naraema, Supe
hi Yakob 0. Selah.
Kuga sike napaumu maga euga 7


valdlagi, namata - pua maga
0;
Go kuga vei tea sikeana pakilagi,
namata maga waina ku du
man du :
Go Nawota ni nasamasamaana
ega wo umai paid ekopu.
8 Sei wanogoc, Nawota ni nasama-
samaana ?
Yehovali tea kasua go tea mari-
matua,
Yehovali tea marimatua nava
kalo.
9 Kuga sike napaumu maga euga
valdlagi, namata-pua maga 0 ;
Go kuga sike ra euga vakilagi,
namata maga waina ku du
mau du :
Go Nawota ni nasamasamaana
ega wo umai paki ekopu.
10 Sei nae wanogoe, Nawota ni na
samasamaana ?
Yehovah ki taua maga,
Nae e pei Nawota ni nasama-
samaana. Selah.

1 Yehovali 0, aga wo sike naatagu
paki-go.

ta darasa nalo kakagu mau.

weluki palo euga wo maliere.

maga.

mauana anigo, go pa vasapisei
ki nau;

namautipauri-au-ana ;

mau.

anigo maga, Yehovali 0, go na
dodomipakaleana anigo maga ;

pa pa e du mau du.

midoa Id da mau :

nadodomiana anigo,

hovah 0.

digipisei ki tea mari naleo sa

mate maga napua aneana.

hovah eu pei nadodomiana go
nalomauana

parati ki navasasokiana aneana
go nanoasokisokiana aneana
maga.

marinaleotageleana aginau, na
lakena nae e parua.

Yehovah ?
Ega wo digipisei ki nia napua
waina ega wo matadoa e.

Go naworaworana euga wo peani-
pioli ki navanua.

pei agi tea maga waina eu
matau ki nia,

ega mari ra euga atae.

sara ragi;

namelegu eroga meludua ki
kupena.

pa saupia ki nau ;
