Salamo 26.
Salamo sikai ki David.
1 Pa vasapotae au, Yehovah 0,
nalakena kinau a surata na
wialuaana aginau:
Go a pavatu Yehovah, aga wo
da pa parasai mau.
2 Pa tovidogo au, Yehovah 0, go
pa sidogo au;
Pa venidogo napelekevatugu
maga go napopogu.
3 Nalakena nadodomiana anigo e
doko kivea ki namatagu maga ;
Go a surata nalomauana anigo.
I A da dasake sikoti naataiholi
maga ni nasorosoroana mau ;
Go aga wo da paid ekopu sikoti
tea maga waina eu pei na
kalepo mau.
A pilosi nasaisaiana Id tea mari 5
naleo sa maga,
Go aga wo da dasake sikoti tea
sigisigileo maga mau.
Aga wo pavano Id nafhelearugu 6
maga natautauana ;
Go aga wo dalivirigoro wede ni
naviriana anigo, Yehovah 0 :
Naga aga mari nadaleo ni na 7
vasadodomatakiana ega vei tea
rogoana,
Go naga aga rogorogo ki nawosi-
ana ni namagaana anigo maga
mamau puti.
Yehovah 0, a dodomi natokoana 8
ni nasuina anigo,
Go tokora ni natokoana ni na
samasamaana anigo.
Pa ta dapelua naatagu sikoti tea 9
mari naleo sa maga mau,
Go namauriana aginau sikoti
naataiTioli maga ni nada mau ;
Waina nawosiana sa e doko na 10
inelearuda maga,
Go namelearuda ni matua e pura
ki ruku maga.
Ma kinau, aga wo surata nawia- 11
_ luaana aginau :
Pa taulua au, go pa saupia ki nau.
Namelegu e lawodu tokora mate- 12
mate sikai:
Aga wo pasapia ki Yehovah
nasaisaiana maga.
Salamo 27.
Salamo sikai ki David.
Yehovah e pei namarama aginau 1
go namautipauri-au-ana; aga
matau ki sei ?
Yehovah e pei paka ni namau-
riana aginau ; aga manaunau
nalakena sei ?
Ragi waina tea marinaleosa maga 2
eu rumai paki maladigi ki nau
naga euga kani napokasigu,


Tea riesoki au maga go tea ko-
kona ki nau maga, nara eu
darataara po dowo.
Taua ni naatamoli maga eu pe
rnenaki goro au,
Napopogu e pe ta mataku mau :
Navakalo e pe vakilina ki nau,
Ragi wanogoe kinau a pe vavatu
doko.
A datagovi Yehovah ki tea si-
kai maau, tea wanogoe aga wo
do laga asa;
Naga aga toko nasufna ki Ye-
hovah naaleatia maga mamau
puti ni namauriana aginau,
Naga aga to leopunusi namasauni-
ana ni Yehovah, go naga aga
to pusuusu ekopu ni nasuma
tapu aneana.
Nalakena ega wo dasuru ki nau
tapaupau aneana naaleatia ni
nasaana:
Ega wo dasuru ki nau takora ni
natokolokuana ni tapaupau
aneana ;
Ega wo sike au sake paki vatu
laketoko sikai.
Go ragi waia napaugu ega wo
pei tea sikeana pakilagi da-
pau tea kokona ki nau maga
dalivirigoro au;
Go aga wo mari naviriana maga
ni namariparai-laelaeaaria ta-
paupau aneana;
Aga wo lega, go aga wo lega-
samasamani Yehovah.
Pa rogo, Yehovah 0, aga vioso
ki nadaleogu ;
Pa saupia ki nau, go pa vasa-
dara au.
Ragi waina hu naga, Kuga laga na
raegu ; napopogu e noa ki-go,
Aga laga naraeiha, Yehovah 0.
Pa ta dasuru ki naraema paki
nau mau ;
Pa ta dipatipa tea suasua anigo
namaetoana mau ;
Ku pei tea silae au ;
Pa ta siya ki pau mau, pa ta
doropusi au mau, Supe ni na
mautipauri-au-ana.
Nalakena tamagu go pilagu ero 1C
doropusi au,
Ma Yehovali ega wo piragisoki
Pa rigipisei Id nau napua anigo, 11
Yehovah 0 ;
Go pa maraki au napua leana,
Nalakena tea kokona ki nau
maga.
Pa ta pitua ki nau paki nama- 12
sauana ki tea riesoki au maga
Nalakena tea noasokisoki soro-
soro maga eu duleana dipa au,
go tea waina e marousu ki na
maripavakotoana.
A pe ta saralomau naga aga leo- 13
punusi nawiaana ki Yehovah
Navanua ki tea mauri maga
mau, a pe tapale sava ?
Pa leogoro Yehovah ; 14
Pa kasua, go napopoma ega ma-
rasike;
Go pa leogoro Yehovah.
Salamo 28.
Salamo sikai ki David.
Aga vioso paki-go, Yehovah 0 ; 1
Vatu laketoko aginau, pa ta
paro paki nau mau :
Ku pe vunuta paki nau,
Go a pe takiusi tea maga waina
eu do siwo paki rnoru.
Pa rogo nadaleo ni navavarani- 2
ana aginau maga, ragi waina
aga vioso paki-go,
Ragi waina aga sike namelearu-
gu maga paki tokora tapu ni
navasaana anigo.
Pa ta dosalua au sikoti tea sigi- 3
sigileo maga mau,
Go sikoti tea maga waina eu do
mari namarinaleotageleana;
Waina eu do pasa natamateana
paki tea ni maladigi ki da,
Ma tea sa e doko napopoda,


4 Pa tua ra ega tapala nawosiana
adeada, go ega tapala nasaana
ni namariana adeada maga ;
Pa tua ra ega tapala namariana
ni namelearuda maga ;
Pa mari namariana adeada ega
liliu paki-da.
5 Nalakena eu da midoa ki nawo-
siana maga ki Yehovah man,
Go namariana ni namelearuna
maga man,
Ega wo dakai ra, go ega wo da
davagi ra mu.
6 Yehovah ega vei tea vasapia-
kiana,
Nalakena e po dogo nadaleo ni
navavaraniana aginau maga.
7 Yehovah e pei nakasuaana agi-
nau go nakokoro aginau ;
Napopogu e pavatu asa, go a pei
tea silaeana :
Go napopogu ega wo laelaea pa-
rua;
Go aga wo aamasamani a ki na
legaana aginau.
8 Yehovah e pei nakasuaana ade-
ada,
Go nae e magi tea vuvuraikiana
aneana pei paka sikai ni na
mautipauriana.
9 fa mautipauri narei anigo, go
pa vasapia ki tea veaniana
anigo :
Go pa leo parati Id pakale ra, po
dapetape ra ega tu mau du.
Salamo 29.
Salomo sikai ki David.
1 Kuga tua Yehovah, tea kasua
natuda maga 0,
Kuga tua Yehovah nasamasama-
ana go nakasuaana.
2 Kuga tua Yehovah nasamasama-
ana ni nagisana ;
Kuga suai natano paki Yehovah
doko narikeikiana ni natapu-
Nadaleo ni Yehovali e doko elagi 3
Id noai maga ;
Supe ni nasamasamaana e mari
tovae e kati,
Yeliovah waina e doko elagi ki
noai maga lapa.
Nadaleo ni Yehovali e pura ki 4
nakasuaana ;
Nadaleo ni Yehovah e pura ki
natatapauana.
Nadaleo ni Yehovah e do mari- 5
porae sidar maga ;
Go Yehovah e mariporaworae
sidar maga ni Lebanon.
Go e mari ra eu sokamidi dapala 6
kau natuna sikai;
Lebanon go Sirion dapala ox
mila tureai sikai.
Nadaleo ni Yehovah e do daelua 7
mena maga ni nakapu.
Nadaleo ni Yehovah ega wo mari 8
masopalo ega rurururu ;
Yehovah ega wo mari masopalo
ni Kadesh ega rurururu.
Nadaleo ni Yehovah ega wo mari 9
diir goroi maga euga visola,
Go ega wo mari mala ni nakau
maga euga fnalu :
Go sara naleo ni nasuma tapu
aneana eu do naga, Nasamasa-
maana.
Yehovah e dasake e pei nawota 10
ragi ni Natave ;
Go Yehovah e do dasake e pei
nawota pa pa e du mau du.
Yehovah ega wo dua narei ane- 11
ana nakasuaana ;
Yehovah ega wo pasapia ki na
rei aneana ki natamateana.
Salamo 30.
Salamo sikai; Nalegaana sikai ni
Naveakotokotoana ni Nasuma.
Salamo sikai ki David.
Aga wo pasasike ko pakielagi, 1
Yehovah 0; nalakena ku po
puati au sake,


Go ku da mari tea kokona ki
nau maga eu laelaea nalo
kakagu mau.
2 Yeliovah, Supe aginau 0,
A kuapioso paki-go, go ku mari-
paun au.
3 Yehovah 0, ku po pirajgi naatagu
e pae Sheol sake umai;
Ku po mari au a mauri doko,
naga aga ta siwo paid fhoru
pano mau.
4 Kuga lega-samasamani Yehovah,
tea dodomi-dodomiana aneana
maga,
Go kuga vasadodomata ki nagi-
sana tapu.
5 Nalakena namaetoana aneana e
doko ragi ni nawilimataana
sikai;
Namauriana e doko nasaupiaana
aneana ;
Ragimelu nakaiana ega wo umai
menaki,
Ma nakolalaelaeaana ega wo umai
malipogi.
6 Ma kinau a noa, ragi waina a doko,
daihate, a naga,
Aga wo da parivari mau pa pa
ega tu mau du.
7 Yehovah 0, ki nasaupiaana anigo
ku mari tava aginau e lawodu
kasua :
Ku dasuru ki naraeiha; go a
manaunau.
8 Aga vioso paki-go, Yehovah 0 ;
Go aga vavarani Yehovah naga
ega saupia ki nau :
9 Seve nataluaana e doko nadagu,
ragi waina aga siwo paki inoru
pano ?
Nafnotafhota ega wo samasamani
ko kite % ega dogorogo ki
__ nalomauana anigo kite ?
10 Pa rogo, Yehovah 0, go pa
saupia ki nau :
Yehovah 0, pa vei tea silae au.
11 Ku po maginau doa nalalagaaro-
vaana aginau e pei nasaleana ;
Ku po peresilua nakulukulu ni
sak aginau, po dasoki au ki
nalaelaeaana:
Xaga nasamasamaana ega lega- 12
samasamani ko, po da punuta
mau.
Yeliovah, Supe aginau 0, aga wo
pasadodomata ki-go pa pa ega
tu mau du.
Salamo 31.
Salumo sikai ki David.
Yehovah 0, a pavatu ako ; aga 1
ta maliere mau pa pa ega tu
mau du:
Pa vualua au doko namarina-
_ leoleanaana anigo.
Pa ta ki nadaligama paid nau; 2
_ pa vualua au maraverave :
Pa maginau pei vatu laketoko
kasua sikai, nasuina sikai ni
paka maga naga pa mauti-
pauri au.
Nalakena nigo ku pei vatu lake- 3
toko aginau go nasuina ni
paka aginau;
Go nalakena nagisama pa maraki
au po pitana ki nau.
Pa vualua au meludua ki kupena 4
waina eu dasuru ki nia raki
Nalakena nigo ku pei paka kasua
aginau.
Aga toropusi naatagu paid na 5
melearufha :
Ku daulua au, Yehovah 0, Supe
ni nalomauana.
A pilosi tea maga waina eu do 6
pavaigoro nalo palo maga ni
nasorosoroana :
Ma kinau a pavatu Yehovah.
Aga wo sokamidi po laelaea 7
nadodomiana anigo :
Nalakena ku punusi narogokite-
saana aginau;
Ku atae nariesokiana maga ni
naatagu:
Go ku da kokoro au paki na 8
fnelearu ni tea kokona mau ;


Ku mari namelegu ero lawo-
du tokora welewelea sikai.
9 Pa saupia ki nau, Yehovah 0,
nalakena a pei tea riesokiana :
Xamatagu e modave ki napopo-
saana, naatagu go napelegu.
10 Nalakena namauriana aginau e
sirinopu ki nasusueana, go
natau aginau maga ki na
giana :
Nakasuaana aginau e darataara
nalakena namarinaleotagele-
ana aginau, go navatugu maga
eu dosa.
11 Nalakena tea kokona ki nau
maga mamau puti a pei tea
vasapinoakiana sikai,
Go parua ki nia paid tea ni
fnaladigi ki nau maga, go a
pei tea mataukiana sikai paki
tea atae au maga :
Tea maga waina eu punusi au ka-
tama eu savadua ki nau pano.
12 A pei tea maliokiana dakiusi tea
mate sikai pa dua ki namido-
doana :
A dakiusi lasa mawora sikai.
13 Nalakena a dogo navinoaana ki
tea lapa,
Namatakuana e doko daliviri;
Ragi waina eu saisai seke dipa au,
Eu midoa ki nia naga euga
tapelua namauriana aginau.
14 Ma kianu a pavatu ako, Yeho-
vah 0 :
A naga, Nigo ku pei Supe aginau.
15 Ragi aginau maga eu doko na
fnelearuma :
Pa vualua au meludua ki namele-
aru ni tea kokona ki nau maga,
go ki tea kopalele au maga.
16 Pa mari naraema ega maramalaga
_ paki tea suasua anigo :
Pa mautipauri au doko nadodomi-
ana anigo.
17 Agata maliere, Yehovah 0;
nalakena a pioso paki-go :
Tea sigisigileo maga euga mali-
ere, euga vunuta doko Sheol.
Nagole sorosoro maga euga vei 18
pusa:
Waina eu do pasa pakaalapa dipa
tea leana,
Ki naleomadagaana go namidoa-
kipalokiana.
Nawiaana anigo e parua pa, waina 19
ku magi tea matau ki-go maga
daua ki nia,
Waina ku magi tea vavatu ako
maga posiwosi ki nia kivea ki
naatainoli natuda maga !
Pa wo dasuru ki da tokora ni 20
natokolokuana ni naraema pa
dua ki nasekeana maga ki
naatainoli:
Pa wo dasuru ki da tapaupau
sikai padua ki navululuana ni
namena maga.
Yehovah ega vei tea vasapia- 21
kiana :
Nalakena e po mari nadodomiana
aneana paki nau e pei tea ni
namagaana natokoana sikai
waina e pei paka.
Go kinan a noa ragi waina a 22
mataku, a naga, A pei tea
taeluaana ineludua ki kivea ki
namatama maga :
Ma ku dogo nadaleo ni navava-
raniana aginau maga ragi
waina a pioso paki-go.
Kuga dodomi Yehovah, tea do- 23
domi-dodomiana aneana maga
mamau puti:
Yehovah e do pavaigoro tea vei
lomau maga,
Go e do lagatidua parua ki tea
marileomadaga.
Kuga kasua, go napopomu ega 24
marasike,
Tea maga mamau puti waina ku
do leogoro Yehovah.
Salamo 32.
Salamo sikai ki David, Maskil.
Ae namaropaana ki tea waina 1
natapiriana aneana e pei tea


tapeluaana, waina namarina-
leosaana aneana e pei tea
tapaugoroana !
2 Ae namaropaana ki naatamoli
waina Yehovah e da midoa-
kidipa e namarinaleotageleana
mau,
Go waina te nasorosoroana c da
doko naatana mau !
3 Ragi waina a punuta doko, na
vatugu maga eu disu duai
Nalakena nauruana aginau na
aleatia mamau.
4 Nalakena aleati go pogi nafhele-
arufna e madaga doko au :
Nasuagu e pei tea roaana paki
nagaragaraana ni ragi m sui.
Selah.
5 A mari namarinaleosaana aginau
e pei tea ataeana paki-go, go
a da dasuru Id namarinaleo-
tageleana aginau mau ;
A naga, Aga noasai paki Yehovah
natapiriana aginau maga ;
Go nigo ku dapelua namarina-
leotageleana ni namarinaleo-
saana aginau. Selah.
6 Nalakena tea wanogoe sara naata
waina eu pei tea dodomi-dodo-
miana euga tapasavasa pakigo
ragi waina pa wo pei tea vapai-
ana asa :
Lomau ragi ni natave ni noai
lapa euga wo da pa-parati ki
da mau.
7 Nigo ku pei tokora ni natoko-
lokuana aginau ; pa wo mauti
au ki nariesokiana;
Pa wo dalivirigoro au ki nakola-
laelaeaana maga ni navualua-
ana. Selah.
8 Aga wo pasapisei ki-go po digi-
pisei ki-go napua waina pa
wo surata pae asa :
Aga wo pasa parati ki-go, namata-
gu ega ivo doko ako.
Kuga ta dakiusi horse, kite 9
mule,waina e dika ki namidoa-
kiataeana :
Waina narikeiana kakana e pei
tea katiana go tea liko naga
ega vei tea vuasokiana asa,
Nalakena e da umai paki fnala-
digi ki-go mau.
Narogokitesaana lapa eu pei agi IC
tea sigisigileo :
Ma tea waina e pa vatu Yehovah
nadodomiana ega wo daliviri-
goro e.
Kuga laelaea Yehovah, po soka- 11
midi, tea leana maga :
Go kuga kola-laelaea, tea maga
mamau puti waina ku pei tea
popo leana.
SaJamo 33.
Kuga kola-laelaea Yehovah, tea 1
leana maga ;
Nasamasamaniana e pataka ni
tea leana maga.
Kuga vasadodoinata ki Yehovah 2
ki harp sikai;
Kuga lega-samasamani a ki sal-
ted ni nagalo rualima sikai.
Kuga lega ki nia nalegaana vau 3
sikai;
Kuga lega pia ki daleo paki-
lagi.
Nalakena navasaana ki Yehovah 4
e leana ;
Go nawosiana mamau aneana e
pae naveilomauana.
E dodomi namarinaleoleanaana 5
go navasapotaeana ;
Maramana e pura ki nadodomi-
ana ki Yehovah.
Nakoroatelagi maga eu pei 6
tea mariana ki navasaana ki
Yehovah ;
Go taua mamau kakada ki na
mero ni nawokana.
E do saisai ki noai maga ni 7
natasi eu dapala taua sikai;
B do doropusi epua maga ekopu


nl nasuma maga ni nalo taua-
kiana maga.
8 Euga matau ki Yehovah, mara-
mana mamau :
Euga mataku padua ki nia, tea
maga mamau puti waina eu
doko maramana doko.
9 Nalakena nae e noa, go e paki-
lina ;
Nae e pitipaki, go e lawodu.
10 Yeliovali e maripiri namidoaki-
potaeana ki nalauna maga :
E mari namidodoaana maga ki
narei maga eu pei tea palo.
11 Namidoakipotaeana ki Yeliovali
ega wo lawodu pa pa ega tu
mau du,
Namidodoaana maga ni napopona
pa pa paki tagona go tagona.
12 Ae namaropaana ki nalauna
waina Yehovah e pei Supe
adeada !
Ki narei waina e matadoa ra
naga euga vei tea veaniana
aneana !
13 Yehovah edo leo pae nakoroate-
lagi umai;
B do punusi naatamoli natuda
maga mamau puti;
14 Edo leo pae tokora ni natokoana
aneana
Punusi tea maga mamau puti
waina eu doko maramana doko ;
15 Nae waina edo maridawana ki
puti napopoda,
Waina e do midoa ki nawosiana
adeada maga mamau puti.
16 Nawota sikai eda pei tea mauti-
pauriana pae nawaruaana ni
taua ni naatamoli maga mau :
Naatamoli marimatua sikai ega
wo da pei tea vualuaana pae
nawaruaana ni nakasuaana
17 Horse sikai e pei nasorosoroana
agi namautipauriana :
Go ega wo da pualua pae nawa-
ruaana ni nakasuaana aneana
Kuga leo, namata ni Yehovah e 18
paki tea maga waina eu matau
Id nia,
E paki tea maga waina eu do
leogoro nadodomiana aneana ;
Naga ega vualua naatada padua 19
ki namateana,
6a naga ega mari ra euga mauri
doko ragi ni navitoloana.
Naatagida e leogoro Yehovah : 20
Nae e pei nasilae-gida-ana go
nakokoro anigida.
Nalakena napopogida ega wo 21
laelaea asa,
Nalakena tu pavatu nagisana
tapu.
Nadodomiana anigo, Yeliovali 0, 22
ega toko garni doko,
Ega tapala waina au leogoro
ako.
Salamo 34.
Salamo sikai ki David; ragi Waina
e mari namidodoaana aneana o
ponopota narae ni Abimelek, waina
e kopasilua e, go e pano.
Aga wo pasapia ki Yehovah 1
sara ragi:
Nasamasamani-a-ana ega wo doko
mau doko nawokagu.
Naatagu ega wo pakavakae Ye- 2
hovah :
Tea matemate maga euga wo
dogo e, po laelaea.
Kuga sikoti au noa naga Yehovah 3
e parua,
Go tuga mamau sike nagisana
ega vakilagi.
A laga Yehovah, go e pasadara au, 4
Po pualua au meludua ki nama-
takuana aginau maga mamau
puti.
Eu leo paki nia, po marama- 5
laga :
Go naraeda euga wo da mata-
maliere mau.
Tea dogokitesa waia e pioso, go 6
Yehovah e dogo e.


Po mautipauri a melu dua ki
nariesoki-a-ana maga mamau
puti.
Agelo ki Yehovah e do menaki
dalivirigoro tea maga waina eu
matau ki nia,
Go e pualua ra.
Kuga katidogo po punusi naga
Yeliovali e pia :
Ae namaropaana ki naatamoli
waina e do pavatu asa !
Kuga matau ki Yeliovali, tea
tautau aneana maga :
Nalakena tea matau ki nia maga
eu da dika mau.
Laion tureai maga eu dika, po
pitolo :
Ma tea maga waina eu laga
Yeliovali euga wo da dika kite
navatuna wia mau.
Kuga umai, piakirikiri, kuga
rogo au :
Aga wo pasapisei ki mu namatau-
ki-Yehovah-ana.
Naatamoli sei waina e masau
namauriana,
Po dodomi naaleatia maga, naga
ega vunusi tea wia ?
Pa vavaigoro namenama ega va
dua ki tea sa,
Go nagolema naga eroga ta
__ pasa nasorosoroana mau.
Pa tawasi inelu dua ki tea sa, go
pa mari tea wia ;
Pa laga natainateana, go pa sava
dausi a.
Namata ni Yehovah ero paki
tea leana maga,
Go nadaligana ero paki nakua-
piosoana adeada.
Narae ni Yehovah e dipa tea ma-
ga waina eu do mari naleo sa,
Naga ega taelua namidoa-ki-da-
ana melu dua ki maramana.
Tea leana maga eu kuapioso, go
Yehovah e dogo,
Po pualua ra melu dua ki narie-
soki-ra-ana maga mamau puti.
Yehovah e pei maladigi ki tea
maga waina napopoda e ma
worawora,
Go e do mautipauri tea maga
waina naatada e pei tea mari-
poroworosiana.
Nasaana ki tea leana eu lapa : 19
Ma Ychovah e do pualua e melu
dua ki puti ra.
E do pavaigoro puti navatuna 20
maga :
Sikai kakada e da mawori mau.
Nasaana ega wo maripunue tea 21
sigisigileo :
Go tea maga waina eu pilosi tea
leana euga wo pei tea tipako-
toviana.

tea suasua aneana maga :
Go tea maga waina eu do pavatu
asa sikai kakada ega wo da pei
tea tipakotoviana mau.
Salamo 35.
Salamo sikai ki David.
Pa vululu, Yehovah 0, ki tea 1
waina eu pululu ki nau :
Pa mari tea waina eu mari au.

Go pa tuleana naga pa silae au.

dipa tea sava dausi au maga.

namautipauri-ko-ana.

gu euga maliere po pei tea
dododaoana :

nanmarisaki-nau-ana euga vei

nalagi,

dausi ra.


7 Nalakena eu dasuru ki moru-
tano ni kupena adeada raki

nia ragi waina e da atea a mau ;

suru ki nia ega soli a :

rowo paki asa.

navaliana;

kite taigu;

au, go a da atea a mau ;

ki nia mau:

maga ni nakaniana,

_ paki seve ragi ?

maga,

tureai maga.

saisaiana warua :

puto ni naatamoli lapa.

ana mau :

po puniusi a.

Yehovah.
1 Natapiriana ki tea sigisigileo e
noa napalau ni napopogu,

kivea ki namatana maga mau.

mari a e momoaa namatana
maga,

go tea vilosiana mau.

ana go namaripiaana.

pei epua warua :

noai sara m namaropaana
anigo maga.

ko ;

noa sara ragi,

Go kinau a pei tea rogokitesa go 17
tea tika ;
Ma Nawota e midoa ki nau :
Nigo ku pei nasilae-au-ana go
tea vualua au;
Supe aginau 0, pa ta mari daliali
mau.
Salamo 41.
Salamo sikai ki David,
Ae namaropaana ki tea waina e 1
do midoa ki tea tika !
Yehovah ega wo pualua e na
aleatia ni nasaana.
Yehovah ega wo pavaigoro e, po 2
mauti a ega wo mauri doko, go
ega wo pei tea mariana ega
risu pia navanua ;
Go pa ta pitua ki nia paki na
masauana ki tea kokona ki nia
maga mau.
Yehovah ega wo silae a nawe- 3
wele saragoroana ni namanai-
naiana :
Ku peleSidoa nawewele mamau
aneana nasasanaana aneana.
Kinau a naga, Yehovah 0, pa 4
dodomi au:


Pa maripauri naatagu ; nalakena
a mari naleo sa paki-go.
5 Tea kokona kinau maga eu do
noa tea sa nalo kakagu, eu naga,
Nagasa ega wo mate, go nagisana
ega wo puoli ?
6 Go epe umai naga ega vunusi
au, e pe wo pasa nasorosoro-
ana;
Napopona e do saisai ki namari-
naleotageleana duinana paki
nia :
Ragi waina ega wo dave paid
katama, ega wo pasa asa.
7 Tea maga mamau puti waina eu
pilosi au eu do pasadalakolako
dumada paki da dipa au :
Eu do midoa ki dipa au tea sa
paki nau.
8 Eu naga, Nasasanaana sa sikai e
sikoti a :
Go nae waina e one ega wo da
moro duleana mau.
Go naatamoli ni natamateana 9
aginau, waina a pavatu asa,
waina e gani navinaga aginau,
Nae ma e sike namago ni na
fnelena kupe au.
Ma nigo, Yehovah 0, pa dodomi 10
au, go pa sike au aga tuleana,
Go aga wo lagati dua ra.
A atae pae tea waia naga ku 11
maro au,
Nalakena tea kokona ki nau e da
kola-laelaea dapau au mau.
Go kinau, ku silae au doko na 12
wialuaana aginau,
Go ku mari au a lawodu narae
ni naraema pa pa e du mau
du.
Yehovah, Supe ki Irsael, ega vei 13
tea vasapiakiana,
Pae tuai waina e pano pa pa po
paki tuai waina ega wo umai.
Amen, go Amen.
TUSI
Salamo 42.
Maskil ki Korah natuna maga,

gaegae paki noai sara maga,

paki-go, Supe 0.

paki Supe mauri:
Seve ragi aga wo paloti po
pakilina narae ni Supe ?
Naririmatagu maga eu pei na
vinaga aginau aleati go pogi,
Ragi waina eu do noa ki nau
naaleatia mamau, Supe anigo
wai ?

wanogoe, po do da ki naatagu
doko au,

pano, po maraki ra pa pa paki
nasuma ki Supe,

ana go ni nasamasamaniana,
taua ni naatamoli maga waina
eu do mari nasaisaiana.

naatagu 0 ?

doko au ?
fa to leogoro Supe: nalakena
aga wo moro pasadodomata
ki nia

naraena.

pakitano doko au :

midoa ki-go pae navanua ni

Mizar.

ni nadaleo ni toroa anigo
maga:

anigo maga eu mamau puti
dapaugoro au pano.

nadodomiana aneana,

kena nariesokiana ki tea

eu pasapinoa ki nau ;

maga, tamagami maga eu dogo-
rogo ki nia paki garni,
Nawosiana waina ku posiwosi ki
nia naaleatia adeada maga,
naaleatia maga ni tuai.
Nigo ku kopasilua nalauna maga 2
ki namelearuma, go ku la wo
ki da;
Ku marisa ki narei maga, go ku
saikipelesa ki da.

nua ki lova adeada mau,

namautipauriana mau :

matua, go naaruma, go nama-
rama ni naraema,
Nalakena ku saupia ki da.
Nigo ku pei Nawota aginau, 4
' Supe 0:
Pa tipa ki namautipauri-Yakob-
ana maga.
Auga wo dipa pae ako tea riesoki 5
garni maga;


Auga wo pasi pae nagisama tea
maga waina eu duleana dipa
garni.

naasu agmau man,
Go lova aginau ega wo da mauti-
pauri au man.

rrrelu dua ki tea riesoki garni
rnaga,
Po mari tea vilosi garni maga eu
maliore.

aleatia mamau,
Go auga wo pasadodomata ki na
gisafna pa pa ega tu mau du.
Selalr.
9 Ma ku po dipadoa garni, po mari
garni au pei tea dododaoana ;
Go ku da sikoti taua aginami
maga pano mau.
10 Ku do mari garni au liliu atu-
taku ki tea kokona :
Go tea vilosi garni maga eu do
dumada madeada dape pava-
koto.
11 Ku pitua ki garni au dakiusi
shiip waina euga vei navinaga;
Go ku daperavera ki garni ma-
leoputo ni nalauna maga.
12 Ku sori palo ki narei anigo,

anigo e parua ki naulu maga
ni navakokotoana kakada

noakiana ki tea maga waina
eu doko fnaladigi ki garni,

daoana ki tea maga waina eu
doko dalivirigoro garni. •

kiana sikai maleoputo ni na
launa maga, '

leoputo ni narei maga.

ana e doko kivea Iri nau,
Go namaliereana ni naraegu e
dapaugoro au,

pinoa go ni tea vivisuori;
Nalakena narae ni tea kokona
go ni tea sikosiko.
Tea maga mamau puti wanogoe 17
eu pakilina ki garni; go au da
malio ki-go mau,
Go au da mari sorosoro paid
navasasokiana anigo mau.
Napopogami e da liliu pano 18
Go navasiana aginami maga eu
da dawasi fneludua ki napua
anigo mau ;
Waina ku mariporaworae garni 19
tokora ni yakal maga,
Po dapaugoro garni ki melu ni
namateana.

aginami,

maga paki supe pota sikai,

wanogoe kite ?

kiana maga ni napopogami.

nueana naaleatia mamau na
lakena nigo;

dapala sliiip waina euga vei

Nawota 0 ?

pa ega tu mau du mau.

Salamo 46.
Kalegaana sikai.
1 Supe e manigida pei tokora ni
nasavasiliana go nakasuaana,
Nasilaeana vapaiana lomau ragi
ni nariesokiana maga.
2 Nalakena tea wanogoe tuga wo
da mataku mau ragi waina
maramana ega wo pano pota,
Go ragi waina tava maga euga
wo parivari maleoputo ni' na
tasi maga;
3 Noai kakana maga euga wo sa-
ruru po lotalota,
Tava maga euga wo durururu ki
navukaana kakana. Selah.
4 Noai sara sikai e doko, arana
maga eu do mari natokoana
ki Supe e laelaea,
Tokora tapu ni nasuma-tokoana
maga ki Tea Vakilagi mau.
5 Supe e doko maleoputo kakana ;
ega wo da parivari mau :
Supe ega wo silae a ragi ni
namakotokotoana ni malipogi.
6 Nalauna maga eu midi, namara-
kiana maga eu parivari:
E pitua ki nadaleona, maramana
ega wo sara.
7 Yehovah ni taua maga e sikoti
gida:
Supe ki Yakob e manigida pei
tokora vakilagi sikai. Selah.
8 Kuga umai, kuga vunusi nawosi-
ana maga ki Yehovah,
Waina e mari masomaladi maga
maramana.
9 E do mari navakalo maga eu
makoto pa pa paki namatapago
ni maramana ;
Ega wo maripori naasu po dako-
tovi naio ;
Ega wo dapara ki kariot maga
ki nakapu.
Kuga toropusi, po atae naga 10
kinau a pei Supe :
Aga wo pei tea vakilagi maleo-
puto ni nalauna maga, aga wo
pei tea vakilagi maramana.
Yehovah ni taua maga e sikoti 11
gida;
Supe ki Yakob e manigida pei
tokora vakilagi sikai. Selah.

lagi mau, e pei tea matau-

ana pano,

aneana.

Salamo 48.
Nalcgaana sikai; Salamo sikai ki
Korah natuna maga.
1 Yehovah e pei tea warua, go ega
vei tea samasamaniana warua
liu,
Natokoana ki Supe anigida, tava
tapu aneana.
2 Tea leomatakiana ki navakilagi-
ana, nalaelaeaana ni mara-
mana mamau,
Tava Zion, taleva maga ni north,
Natokoana ki Nawota warua.
3 Supe e pei tea ataeana nasuma
warua kakana maga naga e pei
tokora vakilagi sikai.
4 Nalakena, kuga leo, nawota maga
eu saisai,
Eu pei taua liu pano.
5 Nara eu punusi a, ragi wanogoe
eu saramakoto;
Eu mataku parua, eu sava pano.
6 Narurururuana e puati ra tokora
wanogoe;
Navitinuana tapala tea ni tea
visola sikai.
7 Ki nalagi ruatu
Pa wo mariporaworae ship maga
ni Tarshish.
8 Dapala waina tu dogo e, dapala
nogoe tu po punusi a
Natokoana ki Yehovah ni taua
maga, natokoana ki Supe ani-
gida ;
Supe ega wo lawokilaketoko asa
pa pa ega tu mau du. Selah.
9 Au midoa ki nadodomiana anigo,
Supe 0,
Maleoputo ni nasuma tapu anigo.
Dapala nagisama, Supe 0, 10

ana e doko pa pa paki namata-
pago maga ni maramana :
Nainelearuma ni matua e pura
ki namarinaleoleanaana.

Yudah natuna nagoroi maga euga
sokamidi,
Nalakena navasapotaeana anigo
maga.

kuga taliviri ki nia :

varan pakilagi kakana maga.

ni paka kakana maga,
Kuga leousiusi nasuma warua
kakana maga;
Naga kuga rogorogo ki nia paki
tagona edaku.

anigida pa pa e du du po du
mau du :
Nae ega wo maraki gida pa pa
paki namateana.
Salamo 49.
Salamo sikai ki Korah natuna maga.
Kuga rogo tea waia, nalauna 1
maga mamau puti;
Kuga takidorogo, tea maga
mamau puti waina ku doko
maramana:
Tea vakitano maga, go tea vaki- 2
lagi maga,
Tea vei sogolapa go tea tika
kuga mamau.
Nawokagu ega wo pasa namanu- 3
matuaana;
Go namidodoaana ni napopogu
ega wo pei namidoakiataeana.
Aga wo da ki nadaligagu paki 4
naluluakiana sikai:
Aga wo lagai navasamalulua-
kiana aginau ki harp.
Ekasana aga mataku naaleatia 5
maga ni nasaana,


Ragi waina namarinaleotagele-
ana ki tea kusugoro au maga
ega wo dalivirigoro au %
Tea maga waina eu do pavatu
nakasuaana adeada,
Po do pakavakae nalapalapaana
ni nasogolapaana adeada ;
Sikai kakada e da mariatae dau-
lua taina mau,
Naataiholi e marisapo dua Supe
naulu ni natapaugoroana ka-
kana :
(Nalakena naulu ni nataulua-
naatada-ana e madaga,
Go e dika pa pa e du mau du :)
Naga ega to mauri pa pa ega tu
mau du,
Naga ega ta punusi namesoana
mau.
Nalakena ega 'wo punusi a : tea
manumatua maga euga wo
mate,
Tea vei lala go tea tapala nalo
tua-vati euga wo pei taua
puoli,
Po magi tea pota maga doropusi
nasogolapaana adeada.
Namidodoana ni napalauda e pei
naga nasuma adeada maga
euga wo doko mau doko,
Go natokoana adeada maga pa
pa paki tagona go tagona ;
Eu soso natano adeada maga pae
nagisada.
Ma naatamoli ega wo da doko
nadodomadaganiana mau:
E dakiusi nalo tua-vati maga
waina eu pei tea maripuoli-
kiana.
Tea wanogoe e pei napua adeada,
naveilalaana adeada :
Ma tea maga waina eu dausi ra
euga wo midoakimata ki na
vasaana adeada maga. Selah.
Eu pei tea kopasiana dapala
navata ni shiip paki Sheol
Namateana ega wo pei tea leo
parati ki da :
Go tea leana maga euga wo
maramara dapau ra malipogi;
Go namaridawanakiana kakada
Sheol ega wo mari sa ki nia
naga ega ta moro doko mau.
Ma Supe ega wo daulua naata- 15
gu .meludua ki namelearu ni
Sheol:
Nalakena ega wo piragisoki au.
Selah.
Pa ta mataku mau ragi waina 16
naata sikai e po pei sogolapa,
Ragi waina nasamasamaana ni
nasuma aneana e po parua :
Nalakena ragi waina ega wo 17
mate ega wo da dape te nava-
tuna pano mau;
Nasamasamaana aneana ega wo
da dausi a siwo pano mau.
Nalakena ragi waina e mauri 18
doko e pasapia ki naatana,
Go euga wo pasasamasamani ko
nalakena ku dumafha mari-
ihata ki-go,
Ega wo paki tagona ni tamana 19
maga;
Buga wo da punusi namarama
mau pa pa ega tu mau du.
Naatamoli waina e doko nadodo- 20
madaganiana, po da midoa-
kiatae mau,
E dakiusi nalo tua-vati maga
waina eu pei tea maripuoli-
kiana.
Salamo 50.
Salamo sikai ki Asaf.
Tea Kasua mau, Supe, Yehovah 1
e pasa,
Po soso maramana pae nasakeana
ni elo pa pa paki namusuana
aneana.
Pae Zion, nawialuaana ni naleo- 2
matakiana,
Supe e maramalaga dave.


3 Supe anigida ega wo umai, go
ega wo da punuta mau :
Nakapu sikai ega wo ganikani
naraena,
Go ega wo atu parua daliviri-
goro e.
4 Ega wo pioso paid nakoroatelagi
maga elagi,
Go paid maramana, naga ega
vasapotae narei aneana ;
5 Kuga saisai ki tea dodomi-dodo-
miana aginau maga euga umai
punusi au;
Tea maga waina eu marina
vasasokiana sikai paki nau
pilake naviriana.
G Go nakoroatelagi maga euga wo

wo naga,

menaki.

ana anigo ;

miana anigo malipogi:

vakilagi sikai,

aleatia ni nariesoki-au-ana.

lega-samasamani ko :

au-ana.

ku puaporae a ;

kana maga; nalakena e do
pan van.

lagi nalakena nalomauana.

Edom ?

waina eu diesoki gida.

masopalo :

goroana ki korn ;

lega.

na a do leogoro Supe aginau.

digi dapilagona ;

digi pa-parasai.

maga,

punopu.

vanua.

tu mau du;

elo ega wo doko :

wo soso e ki tea maropa.

darapa pa wo midoakipalo ki
nunuda.

vunana :

sapo ;

sikoti ko.

Ku puasoki au ki namelearugu
ni matua.

parati-ki-ana anigo,

nasamasamaana.

Go a da masau tea pota sikai
maramana sikoti ko mau.

sirinopu :

ni napopogu, go tea veani
potaeana aginau pa pa e
du mau du.

eu madu uvea ki-go euga wo
puoli:

waina eu maripele padua ki-go
pano.

kora ni nasavasijiana aginau,

anigo maga mamau puti.

fcalamo sikai ki Asaf, nalegaana sikai.

safna e pei maladigi:

namagaana amgo maga.

tatutakiana,

waina eu doko asa eu sara :

maga. Selali.

sike napati ni napaumu mau :

pakilagi mau ;

Nalakena nasikeana pakilagi e
da pae ist, go e da pae west,
Go e da pae sauth umai mau.
Nalakena Supe e pei tea vasa-
potae :
E do mari sikai e pakitano, go
do mari tea pota sikai e
pakilagi.
Nalakena-lasa munu sikai e doko
namelearu ni Yehovah, go
waine kakana e do lotalota ;
E pura ki tea lipakisariana, go e j
do da ki lua e :
Lomau tea nadisoki kakana
maga, tea sigisigileo maga
mamau puti ni maramana
euga wo dumililua ra, po
munugi ra.
Ma kinau aga wo dogorogo pa 9
pa ega tu mau du,
Aga wo lega-samasamani Supe
ki Yakob.
Go aga wo dakotovi napati maga 10
mamau puti ni napau ni tea
sigisigileo maga;
Ma napati maga ni napau ni tea
leana euga wo pei tea sikeana
pakilagi.
Salamo 76.
Salamo sikai ki Asaf, Nalegaana sikai.
Supe e pei tea ataeana Yudah ; 1
Nagisana e parua Israel.
Go tapaupau aneana e doko 2
Salem,
Go natokoana aneana e doko Zion.
Tokora wanogoe e mariporiwori 3
nalua maga ni naasu ;
Nakokoro, go lova, go navakalo.
Selali.
Nigo ku pei tea maramalaga r/o 4
tea tatapau, parua liu tava
maga ni natapepavakotoana.
Tea popo kasua maga eu pei tea 5
vutiluapavakotokiana, eu ma-
ture namaturuana adeada ;
Go naatainoli maga ni namari-
matuaana te seara kakada eu
da papai namelearuda mau.
Nalakena navasakasuaana anigo, 6
Supe ki Yakob 0,
Kariot go horse eu pei tea mari-
ana eu maturu daratara.
Nigo ku pei tea waina pa vei tea 7
mataukiana, nigo :
Go sei ega wo lawodu naraema
ragi waina pa wo maeto ?
Ku mari navasapotaeana e pei 8
tea rogoana pae nakoroatelagi;
Maramana , e : mataku, po da-
mate doko,


9 Ragi waina Supe e duleana paki
navasapotaeana,
Naga ega mautipauri tea mate-
mate maga mamau puti ni
maramana. Selah.
10 Nalakena namaetoana ki naata-
moli ega wo samasamani ko ;
Namagovai ni namaetoana maga
waina e ko doko pa wo
dumama otisoki ko asa.
11 Kuga sai, go kuga lagati-dua
Yehovah Supe animu:
Tea maga mamau puti waina eu
doko dalivirigoro e euga magi
tea waina ega vei tea matau-
kiana dape navituaana maga
12 Ega wo daelua naata ni tea
maraki maga :
E pei tea waina ega vei tea
mataukiana pae nawota maga j Vakilagi mau
ni maramana.

kite %

a sasana ;

ni namelearu ni matua ni Tea

anigo maga.

Salamo 78.
Maskil ki Asaf.
1 Narei aginau 0, kuga takidorogo
nawotaeana aginau :
Kuga ta ki nadaligamu maga
paid nanoaana maga ni nawo-
kagu.
2 Aga wo polagati nawokagu na
luluakiana sikai;
Aga wo lua ki navasamalulua-
kiana maga ni tuai ;
3 Waina tu dogo ra po atae ra,
Go waina tamagida maga eu
dogorogo ki da paki gida.
4 Tuga wo da dasuru ki natuda
maga ara mau,
Tuga wo do dogorogo paki tago-
na edaku ki nasamasamani-
Yehovak-ana maga,
Go ki nakasuaana aneana, go ki
nawosiana ni namagaana ane-

e doko Yakob,
Go e lawo ki nawotaeana sikai
e doko Israel,

Naga euga mari ra eroga vei tea
ataeana paki natuda maga :

natuda maga waina euga wo
pakilina ;

gorogo hi da paki natuda
maga :

ana adeada ega toko Supe,

siana maga ki Supe mau,
Ma naga euga rogo parati ki na-
tipakiana aneana maga ;
Go naga euga ta dakiusi tamada 8
maga mau,
Tagona kasua go pauluulu ;
Tagona waina eu da mari mata
ki napopoda mau,
Go waina naatada e da pei lomau
paki Supe mau.

pua nalikau maga po pei tea

ki Supe mau,
Go eu karai naga euga surata pae
nawotaeana aneana ;

maga,

aneana maga waina e pisei ki
da ara.

narae ni tamada maga,
Navanua ni Ityipt, vanua ni

duagoto pano;

masopalo,


Po dua parua ki da noai munu e

Po maripunue maleoputo ni tea

mari naleo sa,

wosiana ni namagaana aneana

ragi wanogoe eu pusuusu ki
nia :

pei tea taulua ra.

da man ; \

fnata ki napua sikai;

Salamo 81.
Salamo sikai ki Asaf.
1 Kuga kola laelaea paki Supe
nakasuaana anigida :
Kuga mariparai laelaea paki Supe
ki Yakob.
2 Kuga sike nalegaana, go kuga
tuki timbril,
Harp masauniana ega vilake
salteri.
3 Kuga sui paiga atelagi vau,

saisaiana anigida.
4 Nalakena tea wanogoe e magi
Israel pei natawanakiana sl-

Yakob.

nanoasokisokiana sikai,

nua ni Ityipt umai;
Tokom waina a dogo nagole asa
waina a da atae a mau.

natapetapeana pano :

pano.

go a pualua ko ;
A pasadara ko tokora ni natoko-
lokuana ni tovae;
A maridogo ko pisari noai maga
ni Meribah. Selah.

go aga wo noasokisoki paki-
mu :

wanogoe.

la atelagi,

Selah.
Ma nigo ku doropusidao po 38
dipadoa,
Ku maeto ki tea vuvuraikiana
amgo.
Ku mamarago ki navasasokiana 39
paki tea suasua anigo :
Ku mari vauvau anaena e pei tea
moli paki natano.
Ku mariporae nakoro aneana 40
maga mamau puti;
Ku mari paka aneana maga eu
makaka.
Tea maga mamau puti waina eu 41
do liu sa pae napua pano eu do
dape pavakoto asa:
E po pei tea vasapinoakiana ki
tea maga waina eu doko mala-
digi ki nia.
Ku sike pakilagi ki namelearu 42
ni matua ni tea maga waina
eu kokona ki nia ;


Ku marl tea maga mamau puti
waina eu kokona ki nia eu
laelaea.
43 Go ku mari wora makali ni lova
aneana e liliu umai,
Go ku da mari a e lawodu nava-
kalo mau.
44 Ku mari a e makoto ki nalaga-
ana aneana,
Go ku nadi ki malo tasake
aneana paki natano.
45 Ku mari naaleatia maga ni na
veinatureaiana aneana eu
puru :
Ku dapaugoro e ki namaliere-
ana. Selah.
46 Pa wo dumama dasuru ki-go,
Yehovah 0, pa pa paki seve
ragi, pa pa ega tu mau du
kite ?

vaga dapala nakapu pa pa paki
seve ragi ?

ni namauriana aginau :

naatamoli natuda maga ma*
man puti ?

doko po da punusi namateana
mau,

padua ki namelearu ni Sheol ?

wai, Nawota 0,

veilomauana anigo ?

pinoaana dipa tea suasua anigo
maga ;

waina a do dape a e doko
narumagu ;

eu pasapinoa asa, Yehovah 0,

kiana pa pa ega tu mau du.

Salamo 90.
Natapa'savasaana sikai ki Moses, naata-
moli ki Supe.
I Nawota, nigo ku maginami pei
nasumatokoana sikai.
Tagona go tagona.
2 Ragi waina tava maga eu ko da
pakilina mau,
Go ragi waina ku ko da piragi
navanua go maramana mau,
Pae ragi vea mau pa pa paki
ragi edaku mau, nigo ku pei
Supe doko.
3 Ku do mari naatamoli e liliu
pa pa paki namotaihota,
Go ku do naga, Kuga liliu, naata-
moli natuna maga.
Nalakena natau manu sikai na 4
matama
Eu dapala nanova ragi waina e
do pano,

ni napogiana.

tave sikai ; eu dapala nama-
turuana sikai:

waina e do ulua sake.

ana, po do kokolo.

namaetoana anigo,

maritausuana anigo.

sikai.

latolu;

nami maga,

ragi %

Salamo 99.
1 Yehovah edo maramara; na
launa maga euga rurururu :
E do doko kerub maga ; navanua
ega vanvan.

parua ;

launa maga mamau puti.

waina e parua go waina e pei
tea mataukiana :
Nae e dapu.

dodomi navasapotaeana ;
Nigo ku lawokilaketoko naleana-

go namarinaleoleanaana doko
Yakob.

gida ega vakilagi,

vasiana ni namelena maga :

maga waina eu do pioso-noa
nagisana;

e pasadara ra.

lawodu:

aneana maga, go natawana-

pasadara ra :

korokoro,

ada maga.

gida ega vakilagi,

tapu aneana ;

e dapu.

Kuga mariparai laelaea paki 1
Yehovah, maramana mamau.
Kuga magi Yehovah suasua 2
pilake nalaelaeaana :
Kuga umai paki naraena pilake
nakolalaelaeaana.
Kuga atae naga Yehovah nae e 3
pei Supe:
Nae e mari gida, go nigida tu
pei aneana ;
Tu pei narei aneana, go shiip ni
napega aneana.

maga pilake navasadodomata-
kiana,
Go roara maga ni nasuma aneana
pilake nasamasamaniana :
Kuga vasadodoihata ki nia, po
pasapia ki nagisana.
Nalakena Yehovah e pia ; nado- 5
domiana aneana e du mau du ;
Go naveilomauana aneana pa pa
paki tagona go tagona.
Salamo 101.
Salamo sikai ki David.
Aga wo lega nadodomiana go 1
navasapotaeana :
Yehovah O, aga wo lega-sama-
samani ko.
Aga wo marimanumatua pae 2
napua wialua :
Pa wo umai punusi au seve
ragi ?
Aga wo surata pae nawialuaana
ni napopogu ekopu ni nasuma
aginau.
Aga wo da lawo kite naleo sa 3
sikai kivea ki namatagu
maga mau :


A pilosi namariana ki tea maga
waina eu dawasi;
Ega wo da puluti au mau.
4 Popo tagele ega wo melu dua ki
nau pano :
Aga wo da atae tea sa mau.
5 Tea vasapinoa ki panako ki tana
ri, aga wo mari a ega vu-
nuta :
Tea leolagi go tea popo-welowc-
lea aga wo da mariatae soki a
mau.
6 Namatagu eroga wo doko tea
veilomau maga ni navanua,
naga euga toko sikoti au :
Tea surata pae napua wialua,
nae ega wo magmau suasua.
7 Tea mari namarisoreana ega wo
da doko ekopu ni nasuma
agmau mau:
Tea vasa nasorosoroana maga
ega wo da pei tea lawokilake-
tokoana kivea ki namatagu
maga mau.

sigisigileo maga mamau puti ni
navanua euga vunuta ;
Naga aga taelua puti tea mari
namarinaleotageleana melu-
dua ki natokoana ki Yeho-
Salamo 102.
Natapasavasaana sikai ki tea rogokitesa,
ragi waina e pei tea tapaugoroana, po
da ki namidodoaana aneana narae ni
Yehovah.
1 Yeliovali O, pa rogo natapasava-
saana aginau,
Go nakuapiosoana aginau ega
valoti paki-go.
Go navatugu maga eu pavaga
dapala naseati vavaga sikai.
Napopogu e pei tea atugiana 4
dapala namenau, po kokolo ;
Nalakena a malio ki nakani-
navmaga-ana agmau.
Nalakena nadaleo ni nagiana 5
agmau

kasigu.

palo;

suma makaka maga.

sparro sikai

nau eu do pasapinoa ki nau
naaleatia mamau ;

namaetoana paki nau eu do
pivisa pae au.

dala navinaga,

munuana agmau.

nadi ki nau pano.

nau.

na edaku pei tea midiriana :

pei tea tawanakiana euga wo
samasamani Yah.

ra vakilagi tapu aneana ;

soliana ;

pei tea saisaikiana,

nainai napua;

ta dape au sake maleoputo ni

gu 0;

dodomiana maga :

maga eu lapa pa !


Ku mari puti ra pae namanu-
matuaana :
Maramana e pura Id nasogo-
lapaana anigo maga.
Natasi waia, tea warua go tea
welewelea ni taleva dua,
Waina tea kakaravi maga waina
eu mari sa pei tea veveana eu
doko asa,
Nalo mauri laid maga sikoti tea
warua maga.
Tokora wanogoe ship maga eu
do sava asa ;
Leviathan waia, waina ku mari-
dawana ki nia naga ega paro-
paro asa.
Eu mamau puti do leogoro
Naga pa tua ra navinaga adeada
ragi kakana.
Ku do dua ra eu do pilae ;
Ku do pukesi nafnelearuma, eu
do puka ki tea wia.
Ku do dasuru ki naraefha, eu do
ihanaunau ;
Ku do dapelua nameroda, eu do
mate,
Po do liliu paki namotarhota
kakada.
Ku do dipakilua naatama, eu do
pei tea tawanaldana ;
Go ku do maripau ki narae ni
natano.

tu po du mau du ;

aneana maga :

mana, go e do durururu ;

do asua.

namauriana aginau :

aginau.

Salamo 105
Kuga vasadodomata Id Yehovah, 1
kuga vioso ki nagisana ;

maga euga vei tea ataeana
fhaleoputo ni nalauna maga.
Kuga lega ki nia, kuga legasama- 2
samam a ;
Kuga noa nawosiana ni namaga-
ana aneana maga mamau puti.
Kuga vakavakae nagisana tapu ; 3
Napopo ni tea maga waina eu
do laga Yehovah euga to lae-
laea.
Kuga laga Yehovah go nakasua- 4
ana aneana ;
Kuga laga naraena sara ragi.
Kuga midoa ki nawosiana ni 5
namagaana aneana maga
waina e mari ra ;
Navaivaiana aneana maga, go
navasapotaeana maga ni na
wokana;
Nimu naworawora ni Abraham 0
tea suasua aneana,
Nimu Yakob natuna maga, tea
matadoaana aneana maga.
Nae e pei Yehovah Supe ani- 7
gida :
Navasapotaeana aneana maga eu
doko maramana mamau.
E midoa ki navasasokiana ane- 8
ana pa pa e du mau du,
Navasaana waina e magi tagona
manu sikai dipa Id nia ;
Navasasokiana waina e mari a 9
paki Abraham,
Go navivisaana aneana paki
Isaak;


10 Go e lawosoki a paki Yakob
naga ega vei natawanakiana
sikai,
Paki Israel naga ega vei navasa-
sokiana waina ega tu man
du.
11 E naga, Aga wo dua ko navanua
ni Kanaan,
Laine totowo ni tea veanipioli-
kiana animu ;
12 Ragi waina eu ko pei naatamoli
visa maau,
Tea visa maau sa, go namenaki-
atatoko asa ;
13 Go eu surata pa sara pae na
launa paki nalaima,
Pae namarakiana sikai pa punusi
narei pota sikai.
14 E da suasua kite naata naga
ega maripavakoto paki da
mau ;
Go e pasa kasua ki nawota maga
nalakena nara;
15 E naga, Kuga ta kisidogo tea
vuvuraikiana aginau maga
mau,
Go kuga ta mari sa ki proveta
aginau maga mau.
16 Go e soso navitoloana sikai e
umai paki navanua ;
E mariporiwori sara tiko ni na
vmaga.
17 B dipakilua naatamoli sikai e
pea ki da ;
Yosef e pei tea soriana naga ega
vei naviti sikai:
18 Eu mari natuana ero pitinu ki
tea moti;
E pei tea motiana ki namori ni
airon maga:
19 Pa pa paki ragi waina navasa-
ana aneana e lolomana ;
Nanoaana ki Yehovah e mari-
dogo e.
20 Nawota e dipakilua po peresi a ;
Tea maraki nalauna maga, go e
polagati a.
21 B mari a e pei nawota ni nasuma
aneana,
Go tea maramara ni nasogolapa-
ana aneana mamau :
Naga ega soli tea maraki aneana 22
maga ragi waina e masauna,
Go naga ega mari tea matua
aneana maga enga manu-
matua.
Go Israel e umai paki Itypt; 23
Go Yakob e menaki-atatoko na
vanua ki Ham.
Go e mari narei aneana eu pava- 24
kawora parua,
Po mari ra eu kasua liu tea
maga waina eu kokona ki da.
E doa napopoda naga euga vilosi 25
narei aneana,
Naga euga mari sore paki tea
suasua aneana maga.
B dipakilua Moses, tea suasua 26
aneana,
Go Aaron waina e matadoa e.
Ero doropusi navasaana maga ni 27
navaivaiana aneana maga
maleoputo kakada,
Go tea ni namagaana maga na
vanua ki Ham.
E dipakilua namaligo, po mari 28
a e maligo;
Go eu da maripauluulu paki na
vasaana aneana maga mau.
E doa noai adeada maga eu pei 29
nada,
Go e maripunue naika adeada
maga.
Navanua adeada e pura ki froc 30
maga,
Ekopu ni emago maga ki nawota
adeada maga.
E pitipald, go lago e umai, 31
Go kutu maga usuraki navanua
adeada mamau. 32
B dua ra usa ni vatu e oli usa,
Go mena maga ni nakapu doko
navanua adeada.
Go e atugi vaine adeada maga go 33
napuliva adeada maga ;
Po mariporiwori nakau maga ni
navanua adeada mamau.
E pitipaki, go midiri e umai, 34


Go urasi, waiua eu mari sapo
pei tea veveana,
Po gani sara nataputea ni na
vanua adeada,
Po gani nawa ni natano
adeada.
Go e atugi takalapa maga mamau
puti ni navanua adeada,
Takavea maga ni nakasuaana
adeada mamau.
Go e piragilua ra eu nielu pilake
silver go cold :
Go tea manainai sikai e da doko
maleoputo ni naworawora
aneana maga mau.
Ityipt e laelaea ragi waina eu
ihelu pano ;
Nalakena namatau-ki-da-ana e
dowo ara.
B pelesa ki napopouru sikai
naga ega vei tea tapaugoro
sikai;
Go nakapu naga ega marama-
laga pogi.
Eu datago, go e piragi kuel
maga eu rumai,
Po mari ra eu puka ki navinaga
ni nakoroatelagi.
E polagati vatu laketoko sikai,
go noai maga eu sara dave ;
Eu sara tokora garagara maga
dajtala noai sara sikai.
Nalakena e midoa ki navasaana
tapu aneana,
Go Abraham tea suasua ane-
Go e piragilua narei aneana eu
inelu pilake nalaelaeaana,
Tea matadoaana aneana maga
pilake nakolalaelaeaana.
Go e dua ra navanua maga ki na
launa maga ;
Go eu dape peani nawosiana ki
narei maga :
Naga euga vavaigoro natawana-
kiana aneana maga,
Po dogo parati ki nawotaeana
aneana maga.
Ruga sarnasamani Yah.
Salamo 106.
Ruga sarnasamani Yah. 1
Ruga vasadodomata Id Yehovah;
nalakena e pia :
Nalakena nadodomiana aneana e
du mau du.
Sei ega wo noa namarimatuaana 2
maga ki Yehovah ?
Sei ega wo mari nasamasamani-
a-ana mamau ega vei tea rogo-
Ae namaropaana ki tea maga 3
waina eu do pavaigoro na
vasapotaeana,
Go ki tea waina e do marina
marinaleoleanaana sara ragi!
Pa midoa ki nau, Yehovah 0, 4
pilake nasaupiaana waina e
paid narei anigo ;
Pa umai punusi au pilake na
mautipauriana anigo :
Naga aga leo punusi doko nawia- 5
ana ki tea matadoaana anigo
maga,
Naga aga laelaea doko nalae-
laeaana ki nalauna anigo,
Naga aga vakavakae sikoti tea
veaniana anigo.
Au mari naleo sa sikoti tama- 6
garni maga,
Au mari naleo tagele, au mari
nasigisigileoana.
Tamagami maga eu da midoa- 7
kiatae nawosiana ni namaga-
ana anigo maga Ityipt mau ;
Eu da midoa ki nalapalapaana
ni nadodomiana anigo maga
Ma eu maripauluulu pisari na
tasi, Natasi Miala.
Ma e mautipauri ra nalakena nagi- 8
sana,
Naga ega mari namarimatuaana
aneana ega vei tea ataeana.
Go e pasa kasua ki Natasi Miala, 9
go e garagara :


Go e mari ra eu surata duaduru
epua maga, dapala masopalo
sikai.
10 Go e mautipauri ra meludua ki
namelearu ni tea vilosi,
Po daulua ra meludua ki namele-
aru ni tea kokona.
11 Go noai maga eu dapaugoro tea
maga waina eu diesoki da :
Sikai kakada e da doko mau.
12 Go eu saralomau navasaana ane-
ana maga ;
Eu lega-samasamani a.
13 Eu mari inaraverave, eu malio
ki nawosiana aneana maga ;
Eu da leogoro namidoakipotaeana
aneana mau :
14 Go eu masau vinaga parua maso
palo,
Po maridogo Supe maso ma-
ladi.
15 Go e dua ra tea waina eu datago
Po dipakilua namaguraana paki
naatada.
1G Go eu doitoi Moses tokora ni
namenakiana,
Go Aaron tea tapu ki Yeliovah.
17 Natano e maga po dinomi Da-
than,
Po tonigoro taua ki Abiram.
IS Go nakapu sikai e pei tea toko-
niana taua adeada;
Go mena ni nakapu e sorovi tea
sigisigileo maga.
19 Eu mari kau natuna anoai sikai
Horeb,
Po suai natano paki nasupe ta-
kiana sikai.
20 Go eu surupioli ki nasamasama-
ana adeada
Raid nunu ni ox sikai waina e do
gani nafnenau.
£1 Eu malio ki Supe waina e mauti
paun ra,
Waina e mari tea warua maga
Ityipt;
22 Tea ni namagaana maga navanua
ki Ham,
NGUNA-TONGOAN PSALMS.
Tea mataukiana maga Natasi
Miala.
Go e noa naga ega marisa ki da, 23
Ma Moses tea matadoaana aneana
e lawodu naraena tokora mari-
poraeana,
Naga ega mari namaetoana ane-
ana ega liliu padua ki namari-
sakiana.
Go eu midoakipalo ki navanua 24
masauana,
Eu da saralomau navasaana ane-
ana mau.
Go eu dauruuru ekopu ni tapau- 25
pau adeada maga,
Eu da dogo parati ki nadaleo ni
Yehovab mau.
Go e sike nainelearuna paki da, 26
Naga ega mari ra euga rowo
maso palo :
Go naga ega mari naworawo- 27
rada euga rowo maleoputo ni
nalauna maga,
Go naga ega taperavera ki da
usuraki navanua maga.
Go eu puluti Baal-peor, 28
Po gani naviriana maga paki tea
mate maga.
Go eu mari a e maeto ki namari- 29
ana adeada maga ;
Go naatugiana e dave duapora
paki da.
Go Finehas e duleana po pasa- 30
potae:
Go naatugiana e pei tea tugoro-
Go e maneana pei tea midoakiana 31
naga e pei namarinaleoleana-
ana,
Pa pa paki tagona go tagona pa
pa e du mau du.
Go eu mari a e maeto pisari noai 32
maga ni Meribab,
Go e sa ki Moses nalakena nara :
Nalakena eu maripauluulu paki 33
naatana,
Go e pasa pele ki nagolena
maga.
Eu da mari sa ki narei maga mau, 34


Waina Yehovah e noa ki da
Ma eu sari nalauna maga,
Po ataedogo nawosiana adeada
maga :
Go eu magi nasupe adeada maga
suasua ;
Waina eu pei vaivai sikai paki
da :
Go eu maripunue natuda naanoai
maga go natuda nagoroi maga
eu pei naviriana paki dimon
maga,
Go eu da ki nada tautau, nada
ni natuda naanoai maga go ni
natuda nagoroi maga,
Waina eu maripunue ra eu pei
naviriana paki nasupe maga
ni Kanaan;
Go navanua e pei tea mariana e
loa ki nada.
Go eu dumada mari ra eu loa ki
nawosiana adeada maga,
Po maripele pano ki namariana
adeada maga.
Go namaetoana ki Yehovah e
pavaga dipa narei aneana,
Go e mamarago ki tea veaniana
aneana.
Go e pitua ki da paki namelearu
ni nalauna maga ;
Go tea maga waina eu pilosi ra
eu maramara dapau ra.
Go tea kokona ki da maga eu
diesoki ra,
Go eu pei tea mariana eu diti-
patua etano ki namelearuda.
E paka lapa pualua ra ; 43
Ma nara eu do maripauluulu ki
namidoakipotaeana adeada,
Po pei tea viragiana pakitano ki
namarinaleotageleana adeada.
Ma e leopunusi nariesoki-ra-ana, 44
Eagi waina e dogo nakuapioso-
ana adeada :
Go e madeada midoa ki navasa- 45
sokiana aneana,
Po midoakipiri pae nalapalapa-
ana ni nadodomiana aneana
maga.
Go e dua ra namaritadodomiana 46
narae ni tea maga mamau puti
waina eu piragiluapavakoto ara.
Pa mautipauri garni, Yehovak 47
Supe aginami 0,
Go pa viragi-saisai ki garni melu
dua ki nalauna maga,
Naga auga vasadodomata ki na
gisama tapu,
Go naga auga vakavakae na
samasamani-ko-ana.
Yehovah, Supe ki Israel, ega vei 48
tea vasapiakiana,
Ega vae tuai mau pa pa paki
tuai mau,
Go narei mamau euga naga,
Amen.
Kuga samasamani Yah.
TUSI
Salamo 107.
1 Kuga vasapia ki Yehovah ; na
lakena e pia:
Nalakena nadodomiana aneana e
du mau du.
2 Tea tauluaana maga ki Yehovah
euga noa e,
Waina e daulua ra melu dua ki
namelearu ni tea kokona ;
Po piraghsaisai ki da melu dua 3
ki navanua maga,
Pae ist go pae west,
Pae north go pae natasi.
Eu surata sasapo masopalo pae 4
napua waina e pei maso ma-
ladi;
Eu da papai te natokoana waina
euga toko asa doko mau.
Eu pitolo go eu madou, 5


Naatada e mateldmala ara.
Go -eu pioso paki Yehovah doko
nariesoki-ra-ana,
Go e do pualua ra meludua ki na
palaasa adeada maga.
Go e maraki ra pae napua leana,
Naga euga vaki natokoana waina
euga toko asa doko.
Euga vasadodomata ki Yehovali
nalakena nadodomiana aneana,
Go nawosiana ni namagaana
aneana maga paki naatamoli
natuda maga !
Nalakena e do mari naatana
madou e maro,
Go e do pakavuro naatana pitolo
ki tea wia.
10 Tea maga waina eu do doko na
maligo go melu ni namateana,
Tea soliana maga ni narogoki-
tesaana go ni airon ;
11 Nalakena eu maripauluulu paki
nanoaana maga ki Supe,
Po pasadao namidoakipotaeana
ki Tea Yakilagi mau ;
12 Go e mari napopoda e pakitano
ki nawosimawosaana ;
Eu dapilagona, go tea silae e da
doko mau.
13 Go eu pioso paki Yehovah doko
nariesoki-ra-ana,
Go e do mautipauri ra meludua
ki napalaasa adeada maga.
14 Bdo piragilua ra ffielu dua ki
namaligo go melu ni namate-
Go e do puakotovi natali adeada
maga.
15 Euga vasadodomata ki Yehovah
nalakena nadodomiana ane-
ana,
Go nawosiana ni namagaana
aneana maga paki naatamoli
natuda maga !
16 Nalakena e mariporaworae na
mata-pua maga ni brass,
Po dakotokotovi tea walagoto
maga ni airon.
Tea vei lala maga nalakena 17
napua ni natapiriana adeada,
Go nalakena namarinaleotagele-
ana adeada maga, eu do pei tea
mariana eu dogo kite sa.
Naatada e do mamadago ki sara 18
navinaga kaniana ;
Go eu do paki maladigi ki na
mata-pua maga ni namateana.
Go eu do pioso paki Yehovah 19
doko nariesoki-ra-ana,
Go e do mautipauri ra meludua
ki napalaasa adeada maga.
E do dipakilua navasaana ane- 20
ana, po do maripauri ra,
Po do pualua ra meludua ki na
marisaki-da-ana maga.
Euga vasadodomata ki Yehovah 21
nalakena nadodomiana aneana,
Go nawosiana ni namagaana
aneana maga paki naatamoli
natuda maga!
Go euga vitua ki naviriana maga 22
ni navasadodomatakiana,
Po do dogorogo ki nawosiana
aneana maga ki nalega-lae-
laeaana.
Tea maga waina eu do siwo na 23
tasi ship maga,
Waina eu do mari nawosiana
noai warua maga;
Nara eu punusi nawosiana maga 24
ki Yehovah,
Go tea ni namagaana aneana
maga epua.
Go e pitipaki, go nalagi atu si- 25
kai e duleana,
Go e sike napeao aneana maga
pakilagi.
Eu do sake paki nakoroatelagi, 26
eu do siwo paki epua maga ;
Naatada e do sara nalakena na
saana.
Eu do dalitaliepu, po do darataa- 27
ra dapala tea matamaloku si-
kai,
Go namanumatuaana adeada e
pei tea tinomiana puti.


Go eu pioso paki Yehovah doko
nariesoki-ra-ana,
Go e do piragilua ra ineludua ki
napalaasa adeada maga.
E do mari naatugiana e damate,
Go napeao adeada maga eu do
punuta.
Go eu do laelaea nalakena eu
damate doko ;
Go e do maraki ra paki nawora
masauana adeada.
Euga vasadodomata ki Yehovah
nalakena nadodomiana aneana,
Go nawosiana ni namagaana
aneana maga paki naatamoli
natuda maga !
Go euga vasasike pakilagi ki nia
nasaisaiana ki narei,
Po samasamani a natasakedoko-
ana ki tea matua maga.
E do mari noai sara maga eu pei
maso palo sikai,
Go namata ni noai maga eu pei
maso madou sikai;
Navanua ni nawa sikai e pei tea
ni natasimena sikai,
Nalakena nasigisigileoana ki tea
maga waina eu doko asa doko.
E do mari masopalo sikai e pei
namarourou ni noai sikai,
Go navanua garagara sikai e pei
namata ni noai maga.
Go e mari tea vitolo maga eu
doko tokora wanogoe,
Go eu lawokilaketoko natoko-
ana sikai waina euga toko asa
doko;
Go eu sapura ki vanua maga, po
lawo roara ni vaine maga,
Po mari nawa ni nataluaana.
Go e pasapia ki da, go eu po
lapa parua;
Go e da mari katel adeada eu
pisa maau mau.
Go eu pei tea mariana eu pisa-
maau po kolo pakitano
Nalakena nariesokiana, nasaana,
go nasusueana.
E do da ki namidoakipalokiana 40
paki tea maraki maga,
Go e mari ra eu surata sasapo
masopalo sikai, waina napua e
dika asa.
Go e sike tea tika pakilagi melu 41
dua ki narogokitesaana,
Po mari a e pei naworana maga
dapala navata sikai ni sliiip
go nanmani.
Tea leana maga euga wo punusi 42
a, po laelaea ;
Go sara namarinaleotageleana
euga wo pogoro nawokada.
Sei e manumatua go ega wo 43
pavaigoro tea maga wanogoe.
Go euga wo midoakiusiusi nado-
domiana maga ki Yehovah ?

Salamo 109.
Salamo sikai ki David.
1 Supe ni nasamasamaniana agi-
nau, pa ta punuta mau ;

namarisoreana dipa au :
Eu pasa dipa au ki namena sikai
ni nasorosoroana.

ki nau.

nadodomiana aginau:

dipa tea wia,

ana aginau.

ega tapaugoro e :

namelearuna ni matua.

wo pei namarinaleosaana.

visa maau ;

tealeoparatikiana aneana.

maga,

uvea ki nasuma makaka adeada

e peani ra ;

aneana.

domiana ;

maga.

Salamo 110.
Salamo sikai ki David.
Yehovah e noa ki Nawota aginau, 1
fa toko pisari nafnelearugu
ni matua,
Pa pa aga wo mari tea kokona
ki-go maga euga vei malo
vasiana ni namelema maga.

ni nakasuaana anigo fhelu
fa to maramara maleoputo ni
tea kokona ki-go maga.
Narei anigo eu pei navituaana 3
suasuakiana maga naaleatia
ni nakasuaana anigo :


Doko narikeikiana maga ni
natapuana, fnelu nasuma ni
kanao ni malipogi,
Ku peani nasovaki ni naveina-
tureaiana anigo.

midoakipiri man,
Nigo ku pei tea viri sikai pa pa
e du man du
Pae natakiusiana ni Melkizedek.

namelearuma ni matua

aleatia ni namaetoana aneana.

nalauna maga,

ni tea mate maga ;

nua lapa.

. Nalakena tea wanogoe ega wo
sike napauna.
Salamo 111.
1 Kuga samasamani Yah.

hovali ki napopogu mamau,
2 Natoko-pusumaki-ana ki tea
leana maga, go nasaisaiana.

parua,
Eu pei tea lagaana pae nama-
sauana adeada maga.
3 Nawosiana aneana e pei nadodo-
madaganiana go natatapauana:
Go namarinaleoleanaana aneana
e du mau du.
4 E mari nawosiana ni namagaana
aneana maga eu pei tea midoa-
kiana:
Yehovah e saupia go e pei marita-
dodomi.
5 B pitua ki navinaga paki tea
maga mamau puti waina eu
matau ki nia ;
Ega wo midoa ki navasasokiana
aneana pa pa ega tu mau du.
E noakisai narei aneana naka- 6
suaana ni nawosiana aneana
maga,
Naga ega tua ra tea veanipioli-
kiana ni nalauna maga.

maga eu pei nalomauana go
navasapotaeana ;
Navasaparatikiana aneana maga
mamau puti eu pei lomau.
Eu pei tea silaeana pa pa e du 8
du po du mau du,
Eu pei tea mariana pae nalo-
mauana go naleanaana.
B dipakilua natauluaana agi 9
narei aneana ;
E dawana ki navasasokiana ane-
ana pa pa e du mau du :
Nagisana e dapu go e pei tea
mataukiana.

naatulakeana ni namanuma-
tuaana;

mari ra eu peani namidoakia-

du.
Salamo 112.
Kuga samasamani Yah. 1
Ae namaropaana ki naatamoli
waina e matau ki Yehovah,
Waina e masau jparua ki nati-
pakiana aneana maga !
Naworaworana euga wo pei tea 2
marimatua maramana ;
Tagona ni tea leana maga euga
wo pei tea vasapiakiana.
Naveaniana go nasogolapaana 3
ero doko nasuma aneana :
Go namarinaleoleanaana aneana
e du mau du.
Namarama e do magi tea leana 4
maga pakilina namaligo :
E saupia, go e pei maritadodomi,
go e leana.
Naatamoli waina e do saupia po 5
do suasua-ki-pitua e doko pia ;


Ega wo silae naleo aneana maga
ki navasapotaeana.
Nalakena ega wo da parivari
mau pa pa ega tu man du ;
Tea leana ega wo p.ei tea midoa-
kiana pa pa ega tu mau du.
Ega wo da mataku nalakena
narogorogoana sa mau :
Napopona e pei tea lawokilake-
tokoana, e do pavatu Yehovah.
Napopona e pei tea silaeana, ega
wo da mataku mau,
Pa pa ega wo leopunusi tea ko-
kona ki nia maga.
E daperavera, e dua tea tika
maga ;
Namarinaleoleanaana aneana e
du mau du :
Napati ni napauna ega wo pei
tea sikeana pakilagi ki nado-
domadaganiana.
Tea sigisigileo ega wo punusi a,
go napopona ega wo sa asa ;
Ega wo kati napatina maga po
Namasauana ki tea sigisigileo
ega wo puoli.
Salamo 113.
Kuga samasamani Yah.
Kuga samasamani, tea suasua
maga ki Yehovah 0,
Kuga samasamani nagisa ni Ye-
hovah.
Nagisa ni Yehovah ega vei tea
vasapiakiana
Pae ragi waia pa pa go ega tu
mau du.
Pae nasakeana ni elo pa pa paki
namusuana aneana
Nagisa ni Yehovah e pei tea
waina ega vei tea samasama-
niana.
Yehovah e pakilagi dapau na
launa maga mamau puti,
Nasamasamaana aneana e dapau
nakoroatelagi maga.
Sei e dakiusi Yehovah Supc 5
anigida,
Waina e do dasake elagi,
Waina e do dumana doro e paki- 6
tano naga ega leopunusi
Tea maga ni nakoroatelagi go ni
maramana ?
B do sike tea manainai fnelu dua 7
ki namotamota,
Ega wo sike tea tika ega vaki-
lagi fnelu dua ki natapata ;
Naga ega mari a ega tasake 8
sikoti tea maraki maga,
Sikoti tea maraki maga ni narei
aneana.
E do mari nagoroi dimo ni na 9
sufha e dasake,
Po pei pila ni natuna maga doko
laelaea.
Kuga samasamani Yah.

go silver.

3 PE.

eu pei tea ni namagaana :

e do dogo parati ki da.

anigo maga e do marama-
lagati;

maga eu midoakiatae.

gaegae;

paki tea maga waina eu do-
domi nagisama.

aginau maga doko nanoaana
anigo ;

kai ega ta maramara dapau
au mau.

pavakotoana ki naatamoli ;

paratikiana anigo maga.

laga paki tea suasua anigo ;

nakiana anigo maga.

noaisara maga,
Nalakena eu da pavaigoro na
wotaeana anigo mau.

Yehovah

doko po doko mau doko.

dalivirigoro e,

narei aneana,

mau du.

matele veaniana ki tea leana
maga mau ;

ki nameleaduda maga paid na
marinaleotageleana mau.

maga waina eu pia,

napopoda.

si pae napua tagele adeada
maga,

sikoti tea maga waina eu do
mari namarinaleotageleana.
Natamateana ega toko Israel.

Go tea otisoki napu maga e da
pakavuro narumana asa mau.
Go tea maga waina eu do liu 8
pano eu da naga,
Navasapiakiana ki Yehovali ega
umai paki mu ;
Au pasapia ki mu doko nagisa
ni Yehovali.

nau maga.

koti ko,

aneana.

lagi mau;

maga mau,

leotageleana.

paki kupena adeada maga,
Bagi waina kinau aga liu pano.
